Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds  but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side  Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.

title_en: Yashaou No Saiai Shitagerareta Chiyu No Otome Wa Dekiai Sareru
description: Mei  the daughter of a family that exterminates vicious monsters  was raised in a cold environment  lacking the power to exorcise demons. Meanwhile  her arrogant younger brother violates a taboo and awakens Ryouga  the king of another world! Mei is left behind... Mei is in danger  but Ryouga is actually a gentle  intelligent  and handsome young man. He teaches her the value of the rare "healing power" she possesses  and invites her to "become my princess."  (Source: Comic Walker  translated)

An omnibus of horror stories that explores relatable  everyday fears experienced in the contemporary Reiwa era. Each story in the series reflects modern anxieties  focusing on the fears lurking within daily life  which continue to escalate.

Riku Mikami  who is starting as a university student in the spring  finds out that his favorite VTuber is taking a hiatus. The one who cheers him up is Rui Saionji  his classmate. Will Riku resolve to make Rui his "oshi"?

High school student Kusakabe Makoto has to work all day to raise money for the treatment of his younger sister  who suffers from a serious illness. The father is unemployed  the mother ran away  leaving the children  bullying at work … Despite all this  he does not lose hope and continues to live for her sister. But having learned that she did not have long  Makoto falls into despair. Fear of the unknown causes him to take a different look at the value of human life.
It's not Koha Ace! It's not the European Death Front 1945 either! Here comes a new serialization!

"If the life that you had regained  was one that I had breathed back into you… Is it too much to hope for you to love me back with that life?" The year is 1926  in Japan-occupied Joseon. 17-year-old Soo-a is an illiterate handmaiden working for the household of a prominent Japanese collaborator. One day  she discovered an injured young man lying unconscious at the beach  an independence activist called Eui-hyeon. The sweet and innocent Soo-a nursed him back to health  and Eui-hyeon told her the tale of the "Little Mermaid"  a princess of the sea who saved a prince from his death. Having fallen in love with Eui-hyeon  Soo-a was determined to meet him once again. But she knew not then  of the fate that awaited the "Little Mermaid" on her quest to reunite with her beloved.

There was once an oni mother who gave birth to a human-looking child. Instead of an oni's horn  this child was born with a sword in hand called the "Onigirimaru" or Oni Slayer. He has no name and is only referred to by the name of his sword. Though he appears human  he is pure oni.      Believing that he will become human once all of his kind vanished from the world of humans  he sets out on his destiny to slay all of his kind. Even now  in the mother world of Japan  he is still out there slaying oni.

High school boy Towa lives with his father Takaaki  a truck driver  in a working-class neighborhood in the Kansai region. They eat well  but don't like to cook elaborate meals. So what's on the dinner table today?   An old  small apartment  a warm meal  and casual conversation. They thought it was just an ordinary house you could find anywhere  but...!?   A heartwarming dining tale about a single father and a high school boy!

title_en: Ore no Choukyou Skill ga Nanka Hen
description: Takashi  a beast tamer who can't use his training skill well  is constantly suffering rebellion by his beasts. However  on a particular occasion  his skill is activated! For some reason  the companion it worked on was a girl!? ___ **Alt Official Raws:** - [Gaugau Monster+](https://gaugau.futabanex.jp/list/work/lHouo5z7U6r1s3GIwqpwUEIUN) - [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/70320)

title_en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita
description: Junpei  a loner high school boy  became a gyaru after saving the God of Gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections  he was able to transfer to an all-girls school  but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! Every day is a sensory overload for Junpei  who's never even talked to a girl  let alone a gyaru. ___  [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)

title_en: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kitan - Jack the Ripper no Jikenbo
description: In 1888  a number of prostitutes were murdered in London  by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day  looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper  the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok  who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll  is finally revealed! ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0212)
A housewife and her daughter's friend have a little affair. Will they be caught or will it end as just "sex-friends"?

Michi  plagued forever by her ability to see ghosts  pretends like she can't in order to avoid them at all costs. But recently she found a ghost she just can't ignore: Aizawa Honami  ex-classmate and ex-member of the famous idol group De:LPhinus  hanging around school from some lingering attachment.  Still  no matter what ghost it is  Michi's not getting involved. Though while she steels her heart  her eyes keep coming back to Honami's bizarre antics and passionate fanservice...(?)

title_en: Hone To Kawa To Ga Hanareru Oto
description: That day  a beautiful young man visited the detective agency  troubled by strange  mysterious noises of unknown origin. Detective Sakagami  driven by ulterior motives  offers an overnight investigation  but time passes by without any clues. Yet  something feels off…

title_en: Kamiina Botan  Yoeru Sugata wa Yuri no Hana.
description: Kamiina Botan is a 20-year-old college student. At the welcome party for the dorm she was assigned to  the dorm leader Ibuki gives her a highball to drink and she becomes tipsy  leading to her involvement with Ibuki from now on... ___ Official Manga Twitter: [@Kamiina Botan](https://twitter.com/kamiinabotan)

title_en: Zero no Tsukaima Gaiden: Tabasa no Bouken
description: The adventures of Gallia's knight Tabitha.

title_en: Hachigatsu Kokonoka Boku wa Kimi ni Kuwareru.
description: In order to eat me  my enigmatic stalker is protecting me from other strange women―      A high school boy  Sakurai  has a secret he cannot tell anyone: he has been plagued by stalkers since he was a child. One day  his classmate  Ueda  suddenly transforms into a monster  revealed to be one of his stalkers. Miyako  who has always been closely following him  appears and saves him. She tells Sakurai that the monsters  commonly known as urban legends in Japan  are after him because they love him. What will be the fate of Sakurai who is loved by countless creatures disguised as beautiful girls?

title_en: Essei Manga Matome ~30-nen Akiramezu ni Mangaka ni Natta Nīto no Ohanashi~
description: This is an essay-style manga about a person named Yamase Chika and their journey to becoming a manga artist. She is known as the author of The Jeweler’s Maid.

NOTE: Includes an adaptation of ***Day of the Dead*** at the end of volume 1 and a ***Re-Animator*** adaptation at the end of volume 2.  Miyuki  a girl who bought a pair of mysterious binoculars from a shady antique store  gets angry and thinks that the binoculars  which do nothing  are fake. Just when she was about to stop her occult-tinged observations  there was a black figure flying in the sky at the end of the binoculars!? Miyuki was so shocked that she lost her composure. However  as a result of this  a major incident that involves the school occurs!

Deculein von Grahan-Yukline is the mid-boss of the AAA-grade game REW was developing. A villain who dies 999 times out of 1 000.  One day  Kim Woojin  a game developer for REW  woke up as him.  As a villain  Deculein is inevitably destined to perish.  [Primary Survival Goal: Become necessary to the game.]  If death is his fate  then he will twist fate itself to survive.

There exists an old rumor relating to cats within the ancient capital of Kamakura... that if you go to the "Bakeneko Club"  located somewhere in Kamakura  you can meet cats that have gone missing. Even today  people wander into "Kamakura Neko Club"  where Maya and Gakuto work  relying on this rumor.

Reborn as the prince and princess of a fantastical land  Arienne Yuriana and her twin brother  Arhen  should have been living a life of luxury… But instead of beautiful palaces  magical adventures  and attentive servants  the twins are left by the emperor to live with their abusive mother in a rundown castle full of cruel maids. However  after a freak accident suddenly leaves them without a guardian  their father reappears  saying that now he wants them to live in the palace! Thrown into an unfamiliar world of royals  can the twins forgive their neglectful dad and make the most of their new life with him? Or will this world prove too dangerous for the two of them to survive?  (The main story ends with Chapter 138  with 21 Epilogue chapters released afterwards.)

title_en: I Only Want to Beat You
tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: The male lead 'Lee Gigo'  who has never lost a single time in his life  and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?

title_en: I Became the Patron of Villains
description: I  a corporate slave  transmigrated into a game as a noble.   But I'm just an extra that will die at the hands of the villains in the future?   Not a chance! I'll somehow reform them and live a lavish life!   For this I started sponsoring the future villains to prevent them from turning evil and helped them overcome their difficult circumstances. As a result  they all grew up to be upstanding and ordinary  enough to make me feel proud.   And so  I became the ultimate mastermind of the kingdom... Huh?

The "Bokura" version  the phantom comic  has finally been made into a paperback version of the famous "Yokai Ningen Bem" horror anime. A complete collection of all 9 episodes of a serialized magazine that reveals the "secrets of birth" of Bem  Bella  and Bello  which were not introduced in the anime version.

Universal Century 0096. Several months have passed since the incident surrounding Laplace's box also known as the Universal Century Charter. The Earth Federation Forces dispatches a group of investigators to the severed Axis which is drifting outside the Earth Sphere. Two civilians participate as members of the research group: Arlette Almage and Danton Hyleg. Both have pasts with government service to the Principality of Zeon and Neo Zeon as an engineer and test pilot. Having infiltrated Axis  the investigators come under attack inside a base where no one should be. Arlette and Dalton are confronted with an incident they never imagined.

tags: Award Winning|Animals|Romance|Comedy|School Life|Monster Girls|Slice of Life|Supernatural
description: Today  we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.  One human boy  Yutaka Shinsou  is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School  where many "Genjin" attend  he meets Tsumiki Ogami  a werewolf. She is cute  powerful  a little out of the ordinary  and kind. When he spends time with her  Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.
The story of a guy and a girl with glasses in the next seat over who always has her mind in the gutter...

title_en: New Year’s TS Girl Before & After Illustration Board
description: Author’s DESCRIPTION:  My New Year’s TS girl sketch!  My buddy kept whining about wanting to visit the shrine with his girlfriend. The wish came true—though instead of going with a girlfriend  he went as one. The gods knew what they were doing: turned him into my ideal type—tiny but busty  super cute—and even put him in a kimono!  He’s so adorable everyone’s staring  and since he doesn’t realize how cute he is  he keeps clinging to me nervously  especially since he can’t walk properly in sandals and a kimono.  What an amazing first shrine visit of the year!  …Well  in the end  I got TS’d too  and we ended up as a pair of pretty girls in kimonos.
Imagine finally adjusting to your new lifestyle as a girl and they hit you with the “free trial’s over  time to turn you back to a male!”

title_en: The Long Way of the Warrior
tags: Traditional Games|Historical|Action|Long Strip|Survival|Sports|Martial Arts|Adventure|Gore|Web Comic|Full Color|Tragedy
description: In the second half of the 2nd century  Naru  a warrior from the state of Koryo  was sold as a gladiator-slave to the Roman Empire and waged a desperate struggle for freedom.

They often say “Love is a game of heart and mind”.   They also say that when you fall in love  you become stupid.   But what if both sides participating in the game are fools? Then no one will have the upper hand right? It's so obvious  yet only the outsider can see it.   That is why Hà and Ngân can only blame themselves for being friends for 11 years straight. Who knows when it will end? Definitely not these two dumbasses.

title_en: Osoraku Kanojo wa Ore no Aniki wo Neratteru
description: A high school guy who doesn't trust girls anymore has been tricked too many times by girls who just wanted to get close to his good-looking older brother. After all that  he decides he'll never trust a girl again. But then  a pretty girl in his class suddenly starts talking to him a lot. Is she just trying to get to his brother too...? Or does she actually mean something else?

Sucking up all the boys' nectar.♥  Miya-chan  a member of the track and field club  has been in poor condition for the last few days due to some unknown reason... So she thought  but one day  she suddenly became able to see heart marks on top of the boys' heads...!? Not only that  but she even saw a picture of herself being used for what looks like XXX!? Just what will happen to Miya-chan!?
A gag manga written by Hanabana Tsubomi. It features numerous characters from various TYPE-MOON works in a school setting.

title_en: A Playthrough of a Certain Dude's VRMMO Life
description: Typical company employee Tanaka Daichi (38 years old  single) loves games and plays a new type of VRMMO called "One More Free Life Online" under the username "Earth". Inside this free world he chose several skills that are generally regarded as useless. Be it wasting time crafting potions  cooking up pointlessly tasty food  or hunting monsters with some absurd weapon he crafted  he simply enjoys playing the game.

In the 18th century  seeking "freedom and equality"  the event that became the starting point of modern French society  the French Revolution  began. There was one more protagonist that lived within the darkness  Henry Charles Sanson. He was the fourth generation family head of the Sanson Family  and executioner of Paris.   This is the historie of him nobly facing the harsh fate.

title_en: Kimi no Risou no Maid ni Naru!
description: A few months into his high school life  Renya Nijou has neither friends nor a girlfriend and spends his days living alone. But one day  he witnesses a group of mysterious men dressed in black attempting to kidnap Maya Kamishiro  the most beautiful girl in his class. Apparently  Maya's parents sold her off to pay their debts  so Renya decides to help her with the financial resources he obtained through investments. Maya can't help but want to return the favor  and declares that she will become Renya's maid...?

title_en: See You Tomorrow at the Food Court
description: Yamamoto and Wada are two childhood friends attending different high schools who convene every afternoon at the food court at their local mall to engage in blissfully mundane conversations.

After fierce bullying  Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide  his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl  Kubaru  tells him  “Give me your life”.  Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.

Gigantic oxygen-doped bees are attempting to dominate the human race by reversing the food chain. Lee is a mid-level manager at a large company who only has one thing on his mind: to save his family from the bug-apocalypse.  ---  • [Naver Webtoon Fan Translation (English)](http://webtoons.com/translate/episodeList?titleNo=65&translatedWebtoonType=WEBTOON&languageCode=ENG&teamVersion=0)
Renata  a once almighty goddess  has returned in the modern day and must do odd jobs to earn offerings in order to restore her powers and save the world from an incoming monster uprising.

Sudo  is an unassuming second-year junior high boy  who likes to draw. Kamoi-san  his classmate  is a middle school girl (JC) in a short skirt who stands out everywhere she goes! These are the days between a flamboyant gal and an ordinary boy.

When their mother dies  junior high school student Ryota takes care of his toddler brother Chika and their home. Overwhelmed by all the work  he begins neglecting himself. Without any time to himself  Ryota comes to resent his little brother and soon the resentment turns into murderous thoughts. Little by little the pressures of childrearing make Ryota lose his mind. But is Ryota truly the issue? Or...

Following a certain event  Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi  a middle school boy  who one day encounters a girl who just moved in...

In the blink of an eye  his blissful days with his little sister are suddenly stolen from him forever by a certain "being". What lies in store for a man sworn to vengeance? Find out as you follow him on his enthralling mission for revenge  with the aid of his sword imbued with the flames of his intense anger and hatred.

Ikuto Touhohin just had a last fight with his old man  one that led him to make a rash decision to run away from home. He boards a ship  deciding to take a vacation  but the ship is suddenly hit by a huge storm–one that sends Ikuto overboard! When he regains consciousness  he realizes he is still alive... on some island. An isolated island. An isolated island with nothing but girls. Stranded on an island with only girls  no electricity  gas  radio  television... like he was back in the stone age.

Hunters are a special breed  dedicated to tracking down treasures  magical beasts  and even other men. But such pursuits require a license  and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas  amazing stores of information  and the right to call themselves Hunters.
What if bees were big and fluffy? Like  really big and fluffy.

title_en: Kuuki ga "Yomeru" Shinnyuu Shain to Buaisou na Senpai
description: A slice-of-life story about a new employee who can literally read emotions and an inexpressive but actually very kind senpai at work.

In a world where the line between human and machine fades  an organization known as CTR fights to eliminate cyborgs.  Among their operatives is Sun  a skilled assassin loyal to their mission. Partnered with Wrench  a cybernetic monkey hybrid  he is sent to infiltrate Affamato  a ruthless cyborg mafia that holds Florence in its grip.  But when the mission goes awry  Sun's left to navigate a world where allies and enemies blur into one.

title_en: Mitame Jirai-kei Osananajimi no Ren'ai Story
description: This is my love story with a landmine girl who's convinced that I'm her childhood friend. ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [X](https://x.com/onnoveltet/status/1829430063294738758)  **Buy:** [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2704719)
The girl sitting next to me at the start of the new semester is the rumored "landmine" girl... but... is Chihara-san really the "landmine" that everyone says she is?

Japan's greatest disaster  the King of the Monsters Godzilla  attacks Young Champion! The battle between mankind  Godzilla  and a new space Kaiju begins! What will become of Earth? ___ **Godzilla Designer:** [Nishikawa Shinji](https://mangadex.org/author/c45309c6-604d-42c8-915a-f7246f2323ed) **Space Monster Designer:** [Maruyama Hiroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/8ef8a70e-27e8-4462-9fe5-0739a06f5840)  **Additional Links:** - [Official X](https://x.com/g_comic_yc)

Yano Maya  an office worker tired of work and seeking healing  met a naïve and weak God “Rinjin-chan.” This is her daily life with a God  being gently swung around and healed.      Note: 'Rinjin' is a pun on '隣人' (neighbor)  replacing the kanji for 'person/人' with 'god/神'.

Faced with a life-threatening crisis  a game addict who lives in a poor household  Inarikawa Erika  decided to take the matter into her own hands. With a sweet proposal from her long-time gaming friend  promising a one-time huge-paying job  she takes the plunge into the underworld. Where she also finds love for the first time in the most unlikely place.

*Second arc of Kiichi!!  taking place 10 years after the events of volume 9.*  Ever more uncompromising in the face of injustice  Kiichi has become a star. Known around the world for shaking the Japanese establishment  he doesn't intend to stop there. Now at the head of a big company  between school of thought and mafia  whose members number in the thousands  he wants once again to get the population moving  even if it means provoking the powerful of the country!

title_en: Horror Anthology Comic Blindside: Tainted Love
description: From just beyond your field of vision—  The gem of horror anthologies  “Comic Shikaku (Blindside) ” returns with an all-new lineup!  Nine brand-new stories that explore the thin boundary where love and madness meet.

tags: Action|Long Strip|Boys' Love|Sexual Violence|School Life|Delinquents|Web Comic|Full Color
description: Hong Il-tak  the only red spot at Daemun Namgo. Despite his name and nickname  he's a boy  and his dwarfism and peculiar appearance have led to him being looked down upon by everyone from the nerds to the elders  and he's at the bottom of the school hierarchy.   In the past  until his sophomore year  Iltak had been a famous member of the Iljin  but a problem of his own brought him to the bottom of the food chain...   "His secondary sexuality. If only he'd come to me...!"   After enduring daily teasing and bullying because his body stopped growing like his peers  Hong Il-taek thought of a way to move up in the ranks...   "If I can befriend this guy  who's in the second grade at Dae-moon Boys' High School  I'll be able to move up again!"   But for some reason  Lee Hyun-woo tries to keep his distance from Hong Il-taek... Can Hong Il-taek find his former glory again?

The main character’s father passes away. The will states that each of the three siblings receive a portion of the father’s wealth. The main character receives a Porsche Carrera. She doesn’t know what a Porsche Carrera looks like  didn’t know the car company Porsche  can’t drive a manual and had absolutely no interest in cars  at the time.

title_en: Tensei Shita Kuukan Mahoutsukai wa Shoutai Kakushite Medachitai!
description: "With this power  couldn't I become a mysterious mage who stands out while no one knows who he is?"   Higashiyama Touri is reincarnated and granted the ultimate talent for a rare and special type of magic  "Dimensional Magic" by God himself. Dreaming of becoming the cool  enigmatic powerhouse whose name spreads through whispered rumors while he enjoys a quiet drink at the bar  Touri decides to act out his fantasy. Right after reincarnating  he rescues an adventurer party from being wiped out by a giant monster. Expecting the girls to spread rumors about him  he is shocked when instead... the country's strongest party  full of beautiful women  starts following him around?!

title_en: Warui ga Watashi wa Yuri ja nai
tags: Romance|Comedy|Sexual Violence|Girls' Love|Harem|School Life|Slice of Life
description: In an attempt to win her homeroom teacher's heart  Itsumi Toudou purchased a shady love potion  and tested it out on her stuck-up student committee president  Yomotsuka. Now  she has an uncharacteristically affectionate girl to deal with  and she's not even a lesbian! Right?

One day  Amagi Sai and Ebihara Chikage are transported to another world by a mysterious woman who wants them to save the world.  The first volume of the collaboration comic for the popular arcade game "Mobile Suit Gundam EXVS.2 XB" is now available!

title_en: Shi ni Modori Reijou wa  Kanpeki na Shiawase wo Teniireta
description: A time-rewind anthology from ZERO-SUM focusing on stories published on Syosetu.  Cover Illustrator: Takamatsu Tsubasa.  **Volume 1 Contents:** 1. "Hakanage na Reijou wa Yarinaoshitai" (儚げな令嬢はやり直したい)  Art by Mayuzumi Kei  story by Sakimori Aoi. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9416gm/) 2. "Gyakkou Reijou wa Moto Konyakusha no Sugao wo Shiru" (逆行令嬢は元婚約者の素顔を知る)  Art by Yumoto Miko  story by Nakamuro Akina. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9896gg/) 3. "Maki Modori Joou Heika wa Saishou no Tenohira de Odoranai" (巻き戻り女王陛下は宰相の手の平で踊らない)  Art by Toyama Koma  story by Ecchan. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2337gw/) 4. "Kon'yaku Hakisareta Akuyaku Reijou wa Danzai Event wo Yarinaosu" (婚約破棄された悪役令嬢は断罪イベントをやり直す)  Art by Kosaji  story by Mizuno Saaya. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8029ge/)  **Volume 2 Contents:** 1. "The Wimpy Daughter and the Frog's Guide" (弱虫令嬢とカエルの手引き)  By Kurosuke Kuina. 2. 巻き戻った星薔薇の乙女は悪夢を祓う  By Nakakura Chikage. 3. 七度目の人生で、私が願ったことは  Art by Gemuta  Story by Kiramomozo. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1129hv/) 4. 死に戻り令嬢ヴィオレッタ・マルタンが愛されるのを諦めて好きに生きたその顛末。  Art by 鱧永あるひ  Story by Michikusa Yamori.  **Volume 3 Contents:** 1. たとえその身が蛞蝓になろうとも. Art by Hoshina  Story by Kizaki Yuu. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5421fu/) 2. 過去に戻ったので姉をヤンデレから守ったら、代わりに妹の私が監禁されたのですが. Art by Urita Nohito  Story by Kobato Kosuzu. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0944ho/) 3. 初恋は二度目に叶うみたいです. Art by Azuya Chitose  Story by Asagao. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6160gk/) 4. 死に戻り令嬢の優雅な仕返し. Art by Takamatsu Tsubasa  Story by Michikusa Yamori.

The story revolves around the lives of two rough-and-tumble high school friends Kato Hiroshi and Nakama Toru  who seemed to make a habit of getting into trouble and starting up fights. In keeping with the spirit of the manga  Toru and Hiroshi sport slicked back 50's style ducktails and adopted exaggerated swaggers that made them comical and yet also oddly cool. The drama also features an assortment of outlandish characters who sport even weirder fashions and hairdos. To describe the action in this drama  think Fight Club meets The Breakfast Club.      ---  - **Won the 12th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 1988  which it shared with Bonobono**

title_ja: Gimai Seikatsu
description: From classmates to brother and sister  living under the same roof. After his father’s remarriage  Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister  coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year  Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents  they promise each other not to be too close  not to be too opposing  and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance. On one hand  Saki  who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family  doesn’t know how to properly rely on others  whereas Yuuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground  these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together. Their relationship slowly evolves from being strangers the more the days pass. Eventually  this could end up in a story about love for all we know.

Michi gets into another world without any memory of his past life  now he is just following his new life... and a lots of secrets are being revealed and dark shades are started to cover the life of Michi!

While an island half-disappearing from the face of the earth  a mysterious organization is sending out invitations for a tournament to every skilled fighter in the world. If you win you can have ANYTHING you want.   They're recruiting only the best to fight the best and claim the title of The God of High School!

title_en: Onee-san wa Joshi Shougakusei ni Kyoumi ga arimasu
description: From the mangaka of Hshs Sasero!!  the comedic story about a high school teacher  who happens to be a lolicon  and the girl she babysits with her roommate!      Other Official Retailers:   ![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/search/search.php?mode=search&search_disp=&category_id=0&text_type=&text_type=all&name=%E3%81%8A%E5%A7%89%E3%81%95%E3%82%93%E3%81%AF%E5%A5%B3%E5%AD%90%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E3%81%AB%E8%88%88%E5%91%B3%E3%81%8C%E3%81%82%E3%82%8A%E3%81%BE%E3%81%99)   ![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Toranoana](https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/app/catalog/list/?searchDisplay=0&searchBackorderFlg=1&searchWord=%E3%81%8A%E5%A7%89%E3%81%95%E3%82%93%E3%81%AF%E5%A5%B3%E5%AD%90%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E3%81%AB%E8%88%88%E5%91%B3%E3%81%8C%E3%81%82%E3%82%8A%E3%81%BE%E3%81%99)

After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref  Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for  and also to the members who had remained at the guild  something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded  a new adventure now begins! ___ **Official English Volumes:** [Kodansha USA](https://kodansha.us/series/fairy-tail-100-years-quest/)

title_en: The Fed-Up Office Lady Wants to Serve the Villainess
description: A heart-pounding reemployment(!?) story between a fed-up corporate slave and a cold  callous  villainess!  Three years after graduating college  Natori Midori  who once idealized the "grown-up adults" she saw as a child  is working hard at her job as a temporary employee. However  one day  her contract is suddenly terminated for an absurd reason. As she sits there  wondering if there would ever be a workplace for her to devote herself to  her phone flashes and she finds herself in the world of the novel RPG she was playing. And before her eyes is the villainess  Lapis Tenebrae  who betrayed the heroine and committed countless atrocities before losing her life!  --- **Links:** - [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/60556)

On days when she is sick  on days when she has a tedious day job  on days when she has regular tests.  On days when she is too lazy to go to school  I am called upon. I am a convenient substitute for the body of a girl named Sunao Aikawa  and that is me. I may look exactly the same  but my personality is a little different. I can't go out freely  I can't even make plans for tomorrow  I am a replica whose mission is to work for the original. I was supposed to be a replica  but I fell in love.  A very pure and slightly mysterious "love story" that takes place in a town by the sea.

title_en: A Girl Who Can't Speak Thinks "She Is Too Kind."
description: A serialization about the story of a mute transfer girl who uses a sketchbook to talk to people  and a bullish classmate with a special ability who befriends her.

title_en: Kono Boukensha  Jinruishi Saikyou desu ~Hazura Skill "Kantei" ga "Keishou" ni Kakusei shita no de  Amata no Eiyuu-tachi no Chikara wo Uketsugi Musou suru~
description: Lacking any combat skills  Eustus was just another adventurer stuck at the bottom. That is  until the day his life changed forever when he awakened "Inheritance"  the power to gain the memories and abilities of anyone  simply by touching something they once owned! He starts by tapping into the legacies of the heroes who once saved the world: the unmatched Sword Saint  the far-seeing Archer  the god-speed Lancer  the miracle-working Saintess  and the prodigy Archmage... inheriting their very lives and skills!

Once  a hero has been summoned to a different world in order to defeat the demon king. After the war stretching 3 years ended  the commendable hero slayed the demon king. And he was forcibly deported back to earth after being dismissed.  "Give me a break! Elves in addition to beast race  dwarfs and demon race. Even though I wanted to make a harem in the different world I saved! My dream will not come true on earth  where there is no magic at all."  Thus  the hero returns on his own. Without the blunder of being extradited to earth this time  he will build a harem of his own in a different world.

Born in the remote countryside  Ryuuto's childhood friends were a cheat of a female hero and a wise man. One day at the age of 16  he was killed by a wise man  who was his childhood friend. Soon  Ryuto was reincarnated as a villager. Get the "effort cheat" and the "knowledge cheat"! Although the status is the weakest  he is capable of even saving a hero! ___ **Chapter Designer:** [Siraso Famy](https://mangadex.org/author/0797af36-9014-4dd6-a70f-c9a8e555bade)  **Additional Links:**   - [Official Raw Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3830dd/)

Aldred  the leader of a kingdom's A-ranked party  Black Silver  has accomplished the task of slaying a dragon. However  he who has pursued strength his whole life has lost sight of his goal from taking down a monster of the strongest species. As he worried about what to do next in his life  it was the scenery of Nordende that popped up in his mind; A rural village by the countryside  full of natural beauty  which he only visited once during a quest in the past. After declaring the disbandment of his party  he heads towards Nordende for a comfortable  relaxing life.

A lewd body  with lewd underwear...  It’s insanely arousing.   Even though he’s capable  Shouji is a corporate slave  who is always being berated by his boss  Gokudera-san. In an unexpected turn of events  Gokudera-san accidentally sends him the link of a sexy man wearing women’s underwear instead of his dog’s social media account... This can't be...?!?! The gap between the boss who is devilish by day  and erotic and cute by night is enough to make a corporate dog explode in desire!!!
Dam  who at some point stopped growing  avoids people and leaves to the forest.       [Author's twitter](https://twitter.com/dahongcomic)

Some children live in a comfortably numb world  surrounded by walls. However  one day  a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now  from the Heaven that is starting to crumble  the children begin their adventure!

The popular action RPG series is finally being adapted into a manga!  Set in Edo in the fourth year of Keian  seven riders engage in a deadly battle—the curtain rises on “The Ritual of the Full Moon.”

title_en: Doumo  Suki na hito ni Horegusuri wo Iraisareta Majo desu
description: "I want you to make me a love potion."  The “Witch of the Lake” had her heart broken when the object of her one-sided affection requested that she make him a love potion.  If that’s the case  then I wish to spend more time with him  even if it’s just up until the preparations for the love potion are complete. That was what I had told myself  and yet…  The romantic tale of a reclusive witch and a solemn knight that begins from unrequited love.  ---  [Official English Light Novel](https://crossinfworld.com/Hello-I-am-a-Witch-and-my-Crush-Wants-me-to-Make-a-Love-Potion.html)

title_en: Ore wa Shiranai Uchi ni Gakkou Ichi no Bishoujo o Kudoiteita Rashii: Baito-saki no Soudan Aite ni Ore no Omoibito no Hanashi o Suru to Kanojo wa Nazeka Tere Hajimeru
description: The protagonist begins to get involved with the most beautiful girl in school  who is famous for her cold attitude  and slowly becomes attracted to her. That protagonist finds himself in a consulting relationship with a plain girl in glasses at his part-time job. He doesn't realize that the girl he is consulting is the same girl he is in love with  and just keeps telling her about his growing feelings while continuing to fall in love with her. The heroine realizes that the person he is in love with is herself  and although she is embarrassed by the protagonist’ feelings  she gradually becomes attracted to him.

title_en: OL ga Gesen de Atta Yankee Danshi Koukousei ni Natsukareru Hanashi
description: Office lady Haru frequents the arcade daily to distract from her discontent with her company. There she easily crushes a delinquent high school boy in a game and somehow  he becomes attached to her. From acquaintances who just met at the arcade to gaming buddy  and beyond that  their relationship is...!?

The story of the "Three Jinnai from Edo" (Kosaka  Tobisawa  Shoji)   Eight year of the Keicho era  3 years after the Battle of Sekigahara (1603 AD) Okubo Nagayasu calls on Kosaka Jinnai  who is known as the best thief in Japan  to eliminate the bandit gang led by Fuma Kotaro.   A fierce battle between the Jinnais and the Fuma clan opens its curtain !!

4-Koma comedy following the super genius grade school student Haruna Raika and her every day life. Where she's the class president  the room leader  the top student  and even fills in for the teacher when they've overslept!

Manga adaptation of 1980s.      Five hundred years ago  Rudolf von Goldenbaum united the disparate governments of humankind and established a mighty human empire  a tribute to his own greatness that stretched across the galaxy. Demanding loyalty and discipline  Rudolf created an order designed to long outlast his own rule; but all human works fade in time. Today  the decaying empire faces the threat of the Free Planets Alliance  and military leaders on both sides jockey for power in the face of a seemingly inevitable conflict. On the side of the empire  the young general Reinhard von Lohengramm sees war as opportunity  and the empire as soft clay ready for his own sculpting. On the side of the alliance  would-be historian Yang Wen-li would like nothing better than to live out his days in peace - but times of war have little use for men who waste their days studying the mistakes of the past. Circumstances will make heroes and villains of both these men  as they write new history one blood-splattered page at a time.        ---

They are twins. Suddenly  the sisters find themselves drawn to a con artist who pretends to be the owner of a piece of land and swindles people out of their money. The two sisters  "Ei" and "Hotaru " who are genetically identical but have slightly different personalities  somehow get things moving when they get involved. A new twist in the crime suspense genre is born.

Chitose Morishige is a 12-year-old seventh-grader without a friend in the world. Her father  Professor Morishige  built a robot companion for his daughter to ease her loneliness. The only problem is that Ichika Robata  the android  is so lifelike that Chitose believes she's a normal human girl who either ran away or was kidnapped by her father. Ichika attempts repeatedly to prove that she's a real robot  with hilariously disastrous results.

I drew a lottery at the Shopping District and won the privilege to go to another world. After drawing a lot of balls  unexpectedly I got a cheat-like skill. Silencing those who are noisy and getting hold of all the things that I want. I will satisfy all my desires.

title_en: Menhera Usagi wa Yandere Ookami ni Dekiaisareru
description: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi  the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her  comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart  however  there's something he's hiding...!?

The complicated story of a young man who goes to work for a lingerie company.  One of the very first harem manga  done by a former shojo mangaka known for his peculiar tendencies  (was known to cross dress among other things) and serialized in the now defunct Business Jump.   +++Volume titles and Romaji equivalent:   1. ランジェリーに恋してる♥ (Ranjerī ni Koishiteru ♥)   2. 愛の悩み (Ai no Nayami)   3. 恋模様みだれ髪 (Koi Moyō Midare-kami)   4. おかしな二人 (Okashina Futari)   5. 弓香の日記 (Yumika no Nikki)   6. 二人の気持ち (Futari no Kimochi)   7. 伸介の選択 (Shinsuke no sentaku)   8. おかしな気分 (Okashina Kibun)   9. おかしな三角関係 (Okashina Sankaku Kankei)   10. よみがえる美 (Yomigaeru Bi)   11. 東京ショック (Tokyo Shock)   12. ユミカ・センセーション (Yumika Sensation)   13. セルフヌード (Self-nude)   14. 能力喪失 (Nōryoku Sōshitsu)   15. お嬢様の初体験 (Ojō-sama no Shotaiken)   16. 巴の目覚め (Tomoe no Mezame)   17. ぱんつのお披露目 (Pantsu no Ohirome)   18. 女優・佐倉澪 (Joyū Sakura Mio)   19. 弓香が女優 (Yumika ga Joyū)   20. 美人双子姉妹 (Bijin Futago Shimai)   21. 政略結婚！？ (Seiryaku Kekkon!?)   22. 触りのライセンス (Sawari no License)   23. がんばれ！！大統領！！ (Ganbare!! Daitōryō!!)   24. ブービー・トラップ (Booby Trap)   25. ガマン大会 (Gaman Taikai)   26. 世界新記録！？ (Sekaishinkiroku!?)   27. 殿・姫・伸介 (Tono Hime Shinsuke)   28. 姫のお目覚め？ (Hime no o Mezame?)   29. ニューゴッドハンド？ (New God Hand?)   30. コスプレ秘書 (Cosplay Hisho)   31. 天才×天才 (Tensai × Tensai)   32. ナマで大事件！？ (Nama de Daijigen!?)   33. 4回転マッサージ (4 Kaiten Massage)   34. 官能タイフーン (Kan'nō Typhoon)   35. デザイナーの資質 (Designer no Shishitsu)   36. 伸介の痴漢騒動 (Shinsuke no Chikan Sōdō)   37. ベガスの狂乱 (Vegas no Kyōran)   38. 1000万ドルの下着 (1000 Man-doru no Shitagi)   39. 幼なじみの下着 (Osana Najimi no Shitagi)   40. 呪いのコルセット発動！？ (Noroi no Corset Hatsudō!?) +++

Ikurumi Akuto is the top of his class in every subject  including sports  and he knows it. The son of a well-known politician  a degree of arrogance is to be expected. But Akuto takes it to a new extreme with his condescending and self-important attitude. It doesn't help matters that his effeminate voice makes him a target of constant ridicule by his "lower class" schoolmates.      Then Harusaka Nari enters his life  and Akuto's controlling personality is thrown off kilter by the optimistic but manipulating young seiyuu. With his life on the line  he agrees to be a voice in her Anime Research Society's project for the upcoming Cultural Festival... as the female lead?!

title_en: Tensei Renkin Shoujo no Slow Life
description: Meria  a village girl who is on her third life after two overworked lives. She is determined to live a slower life this time  but her enthusiasm is tempered by an alchemy that she did not know was already out of date  however  said alchemy led to her suddenly being taken away...!

Ayumu Otsuki is a space lover with an ambitious dream—to meet an alien. Despite lacking friends or romantic experience  she started the Astronomy Association by herself  which is the only place where she feels she belongs. One day after school  she dropped an association poster  but an upperclassman picked it up for her. The upperclassman introduced herself as Hayami  and Ayumu completely fell in love at first sight when Hayami recognized her passion! Ayumu's mind is now filled with love  and she goes all out to share her feelings. However  Senpai seems to already adore something else. She fell for a fitness junkie?! A peculiar girl's straightforward romcom!!

title_en: Bokura ni wa Bokura no Kotoba ga aru
description: Aizawa Mashiro  the 'deaf' pitcher  and Nonaka Hiroaki  the 'hearing' catcher.   A coming-of-age story about a high school battery that bridges the world of silence and the world of sound!   At the entrance ceremony  Mashiro takes the stage as the school's first-ever 'integration student'  introducing himself in sign language. Hiroaki shrugs it off  thinking it has nothing to do with him. Baseball's all he cares about  and he just stuff the sign language chart they handed out into his pocket.   But after school  Mashiro showed up in front of Nonaka again at the baseball club hoping to join the team as a pitcher. Forced to form a battery with him  Nonaka thought  'A guy like him's nothing but a dead weight.'   However  when he caught the ball Mashiro threw straight at him  the words that came out of Nonaka's mouth was 'Nice ball...'   That was the moment their story began.

title_en: Mobile Suit Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz - Glory of the Losers
description: Centuries in the future  in the year After Colony 195  Earth is surrounded by orbiting space colonies. The colonists are cruelly oppressed by the Earth Alliance  which uses huge humanoid fighting machines called "mobile suits" to control the populace. Behind this tyranny is the secret society called "Oz " which has infiltrated the Alliance military and steered it towards its repressive course.      Now  the space colonies are ready to strike back. Five young pilots  equipped with advanced mobile suits called "Gundams " are sent to Earth to wage guerrilla war against Oz and its Alliance puppets. The war to decide humanity's destiny begins…

The same part-time job  the same surname  the same family environment - other than that  Satou Yuna and Satou Ema have absolutely nothing in common. But due to a strange twist of fate they end up sharing an apartment... Sometimes they fight  but maybe it's because they're total opposites that they can be together. A new-generation of girls story about young women who live flexibly and resiliently!

The story takes place in Japan  right now  where the Coronavirus has completely changed our way of life. In the house of a young man  his childhood friend who lost his job due to the Coronavirus moves in. However  this childhood friend is a scumbag...  The story depicts the depressing feeling of not knowing how long the coronavirus will last  and the rotten relationship between the two young men.  (Source: Yanmaga  translated)  Note: The one-shot that was published for Young Magazine's 40th anniversary project "Wagaman".

Kanan is a demon hiding in a high school in the human world to feed on the souls of humans. She sets her sights on a single high school boy  but somehow ends up in a lovers contract with him!? Kanan  who has never been in love  is now filled with new feelings!

Karen Mikogami  eldest son of the president of a large company called the Mikogami Group  lives a lazy life while bossing around his servant Nanami Miyamori.  For some reason  he has to deal with his father  who loves cross-dressing and forces him to "dress up" almost every day. But one day  he is told a major secret that has been passed down in the Mikogami family...!?  The fate of the company is entrusted to his "cross-dressing"!?  The hectic training of a cross-dressing man to become a great president begins!!
Stowing himself away on a slave ship  Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves  all yearning for freedom  until...?!
The overly serious vampire  Chitose's first love is her childhood friend  Santa. But when she sucked his blood  she realized. There's no way I have a fetish like this...!?

An orphan whose family was destroyed by the underworld discovers a shocking truth—the very organization that took everything from him was built by his own father. Fueled by vengeance  he infiltrates a school that trains future crime syndicate leaders  determined to take down the traitor responsible for his mother’s death. Surrounded by enemies  he must climb to the top through sheer strength and strategy. The battle for revenge begins now.

Having been inspired by the character designs of a particular video game when she was younger  Suzukaze Aoba  a high school graduate  begins working as a character designer for the game's developer  Eagle Jump. As she works on modelling and designing characters for games in development  she becomes acquainted with her fellow co-workers in the character design department  as well as those from across the company.

tags: Award Winning|Romance|Comedy|School Life|Monster Girls|Slice of Life
description: The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou  a young boy  is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!  Won the 70th Shougakukan Manga Award.

A drifter who lost his family to aliens as a child. He possesses the rare ability to manipulate black holes but keeps it hidden. One day  aliens attack the city in a terrorist act  and when he faces them again  they threaten his life... "Sorry  but I can't die for you. Do you know what I went through to survive?"

Cha In-woo  a shy student with zero presence  becomes partners with Kwak Ha-jun  who looks exactly like his favorite game character. While Cha In-woo is excited to bond with him while working on homework assigned by his teacher  Cha In-woo suddenly finds himself drawn into a cruel bet by Kwak Ha-jun...  A heartwarming romantic comedy between two high school students!

Raised by an older brother who was a genius gambler and learned countless tricks of the trade  the man known as "Bull" knows every kind of cheat. However  he himself has never used any of them—he lives a regular life as a full-time office worker. Then one day  his brother goes missing. As Bull searches for him  he uncovers a clue: his brother has fallen into "the Swamp " a deadly gambling den where those consumed by greed end up. To save the kind brother he once knew—and to uncover his brother's hidden side—Bull steps into "the Swamp"!

title_en: Flash of the Exorcising Blade: The Strongest Swordsman Pierces the Darkness
description: Thirty years ago  fallen gods and fallen towers suddenly appeared across the land. Monsters poured forth from the fallen towers  destroying the world's peace. In response  all the gods above bestowed sacred weapons upon outstanding humans. Heroes who rose to reclaim peace by conquering the towers and purifying the fallen gods. Among them stood an unmatched warrior named Shotaro Kusunoki  wielder of the 'Exorcising Blade ' was hailed as one the Three Great Heroes.  Watching his brother's legendary feats from the sidelines was Hiromu Kusunoki  a lowly baggage carrier who longed to see the day peace returned. However  fate took a cruel turn when the fallen god Futsunushi possesses Shotaro's body  turning him into a vessel of darkness. On the brink of death  Hiromu hears a mysterious voice call out from the Exorcising Blade. That voice is Gayamaru  the mighty god sealed within the blade. To save his brother  the boy forms a pact with the mighty god  and together  they will climb to the peak of power and overcome darkness itself!  The curtains rise on a modern battle fantasy of gods  blades  and the bonds between brothers!

Reginald Guevarra  a 4th year college student felt like his life is stuck on repeat. Every day is the same schoolwork  research  thesis  exams  and more. He misses the fun and excitement of his senior high school days  where everything felt exciting for him.  One day  he gets a strange text with a QR code and a location. Curious  he decides to go  and on the way  he meets a familiar face from the past. But what waits at the end of the road is more than just a reunion.  All his old classmates are there  and they’ve been forced in a massive game venue. To escape  they’ll have to play  and win.  Friendships will be tested  memories would be a weapon  secrets will be revealed  and there’s no guarantee everyone will make it out.

You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!      Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club  he admired so much  was beyond all imagination!      From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

Alice had woken up in Room 431 of a mysterious manor.      "You must not leave this room " warned the Serpent  but she paid it no heed and her body began to rot…      Will she be able to escape the cursed manor?      *Was nominated for the [2019 Japan Media Arts Festival Awards - Manga Category](http://archive.j-mediaarts.jp/en/festival/2019/manga/).*
Youshou Xihua- a non-canon  spinoff slice-of-life mini-theater of the Youshou Yan Manga unrelated to the main plotline.

Misa Kuroi  a beautiful girl who manipulates black magic. When the spell of "Eko Eko Azarak" resounds   something happens in the city and in the classroom... The gold standard of occult mysteries is finally here!

title_en: Fukushuu wo Koinegau Saikyou Yuusha wa  Yami no Chikara de Senmetsu Musou Suru
description: Raoul  who had defeated the demon king as the strongest hero  should have become the savior of the world. Having his treasured companions and family killed by power-hungry aristocrats  he was executed with false charges brought against him by the princess. Just before his life collapsed  at last  his heart fell into darkness.  "I'll tear those traitors from limb to limb. Burn them at the stake. Sever them to pieces. Skewer them. I'll kill every one of those bastards without mercy and make them taste hell's suffering......!!!"  Obtaining the power of darkness  Raoul was revived. Sneering  he vowed revenge. "Oh  I'm looking forward to it – from now on  I'll bask in their blood as I please." Several days after the hero's revival in the imperial capital where flowers bloomed in profusion  the parade that would advance towards tragedy began. ___ **Storyboarder:** [Hanji](https://mangadex.org/author/ce336432-7da7-45a0-bcdd-523cc0e5c3e5) **Character Designer:** [Araya](https://mangadex.org/author/01944b4f-2580-447d-9e18-9b1eac224beb)  **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39335)

Young swordsman Alvin has put together a nearly perfect adventuring team with his best friend and ranger  Renka  and the adorable priestess Milis. Though they have managed well so far  things really start improving after the wizard Shinji joins their group. Now  they're becoming the best team ever! But what Alvin doesn't know is that while Shinji is a capable and reliable wizard in the streets  behind closed doors  he's tangled up in the ladies' sheets. And his lust doesn't stop with his teammates—Shinji's also managed to find his way into the beds of companions and enemies alike. Will Alvin remain blissfully unaware of Shinji's lecherous ways  or will things come to a head if he finds out?

title_en: Lock Up: Warera Akatsuki Pro Wrestling-dan
description: (from ebookjapan):Samson Takaki  president of the impoverished indie organization "Akatsuki Pro Wrestling Troupe " is terminally ill with cancer. Although his body is in shambles after years of wrestling  he continues to put on a good show. He believes in turning his life around. ...The Mandala of men's lives! Life is wrestling!

When Seo Junho and his companions sacrificed themselves to defeat the Frost Queen  they thought they were restoring peace to Earth. But after 25 years of being frozen solid  Junho thaws out only to find that nine more floors appeared in his absence  only one of which has been cleared!  As the only one who holds the key to clearing the next floor and defrosting his friends  Junho must step up once again. But has this hero been in hibernation too long to take on the world’s fearsome new foes?  --- - [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%96%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%B6%99%EC%9D%80-%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4%EC%9D%98-%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98/2463) ---  - [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%97%87%E5%A4%9C%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%E7%A0%B4%E5%86%B0%E8%80%8C%E5%87%BA/176)  - [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.podoteng.com/)  - [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/79447)

title_en: Duke Pendragon: Master of the White Dragon
description: Born as the successor of a low-ranking noble household  Raven Varte wears the sin of plotting a rebellion against the empire. To be granted amnesty  he was sent to fight demons alongside the worst corp of the empire  the ”Demon” corp. Most say that it is a place where most won’t survive for even a year  but Raven somehow managed to survive for ten. When his amnesty was in front of his eyes  on his last battlefield  he met the ‘Successor of the Pendragon Duke Household  Eren Pendragon.  --- - [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRX266roHHM)  --- - [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58558135)

High school home economics expert Tenichi earns extra money with a part-time job cleaning houses. But one day  Himari  the owner and model of the popular cosmetics brand Hima Riz  transfers into his class.

Makoto Kuribayashi is your typical high schooler with a not-so-typical after-school gig as a housekeeper. His latest client? None other than his school’s most popular teacher  the gorgeous Rumiko Hotta. But Hotta-sensei is hiding a dirty little secret: she's a total slob  the polar opposite of her flawless public image! Now  Makoto's got the unenviable task of cleaning up after her mess. Will his admiration for Hotta-sensei survive a dose of harsh reality in this irreverent comedy?

title_en: Gorin no Megami-sama ~Nadeshiko Ryou no Medal Gohan~
description: The main character  Kominato Ryo  who is only engaged in cooking  was allowed to enter the prestigious Cho Gakuen Private School on the condition that he work as a cook in a student dormitory under the supervision of his father. However  the "dormitory" was the women's dormitory where future gold medal candidates lived. The nutritional requirements of top athletes are naturally high. Fill their stomachs and take on the challenging mission of building your body for the Olympic Games!

title_en: A Returner's Magic Should Be Special
tags: Time Travel|Action|Long Strip|Comedy|Martial Arts|Adventure|Magic|School Life|Fantasy|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Adaptation|Full Color
description: "Now that I'm back  I won't allow my loved ones to die again!"      The Shadow Labyrinth - the deadliest catastrophe humanity has ever known.   Desir Arman  one of the six remaining survivors of mankind  is inside the Labyrinth. The six of them attempt to clear the final level of the Labyrinth but ultimately fail  and the world comes to an end.   However  when Desir thought he would meet his demise  what appears before him is the world… thirteen years ago?!      Desir is returned to the past  back to the time when he enrolled at the nation's finest magic academy  Havrion. He is reunited with his precious friends  and he is determined to change the past to save the world and his loved ones…!      Three years remain before the emergence of the Shadow World!   Change the past and gather powerful comrades to save mankind!  --- - [1st Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NS6o8phnUKo) | [ENG](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C8Z02WbpE8c) | [JP](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YdHjqPsN5gQ) | [Renewal](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C6GFn5z9ru0) - [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Returners-Special-Magic/3095)  - [Official Vietnamese Translation](https://www.comico.vn/title/662)  - [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/8944)  - [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/returners-magic-should-be-special-de)  - [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/returners-magic-should-be-special-fr)  - [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%B1%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B4%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88/49)

Souji Enishiro  15 years old (high school dropout)  is a controversial streamer  "Aoringo " who makes a ton of money through his violent and outrageous video content. Although he is seen as a troublemaker  in reality  he is a kind older brother who loves his younger sister and sweets. Even his controversial videos are just a means to cover the huge medical expenses for his sickly younger sister. No matter if everyone in the world hates him  he is happy as long as his sister is doing well. That is until something happens to his beloved sister...
The extraordinary Princess Parfait's marvelous fantasy adventure!
Children who are beginning their youth.   Their growing pain on their way to spring.

Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano  the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day  their relationship takes a sharp turn. ___ Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)

title_en: The Knight Who Only Lives Today
description: Is dying repeatedly a blessing?   Enkrid's life-long dream of becoming a knight looked to be forever out of reach  until one day he died... and woke up at the beginning of that same day!   Now that he has unlimited chances to train and engage in mortal combat  just how far can he go?
After falling through a magic mirror  Nanako and company find themselves stuck in a world where the people are talking animals - and now must find their way back home.

title_en: Psycho × Past - Ryouki Satsujin Sennyuu Sousa
description: Godai  a policeman  who was removed from the investigations division of the police due to violence toward criminals. He teams up with Hidaka  a man who is a self-proclaimed "paranormal police investigator" with claims to have the ability to send Godai in the past to prevent all the horrific crimes that happened  is that even possible and what will be the consequences?

After just starting at his new school  Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint  his father  Mashio Harumi  can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him. Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.  At his father's wake  Gaku finds out he was  in his words  a big fuckin' deal. In mourning  Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would  only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water... When he comes to  he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**

Beings from a different dimension have started a war with mankind. To counter this threat  an academy called "Genetics" that trains female warriors called "Pandora " who can wield special weaponry and armor  was formed. Kazuya Aoi decided to enroll in this school because of a promise with his sister  an outstanding alumnus who died in battle. There he meets second year Satellizer L. Bridgette  nicknamed "The Untouchable Queen" due to her solitary demeanor but also top of her class whose battle simulation streak is undefeated  until he came… and slowly changed her.      The Prequels gives back story to several characters; does not effect the main story.      Most FTH and all LetItGo are joint with Vexed Scans.  There were 33 volumes when the series went on hiatus  however  the site producing the chapters is still ongoing.

Even in her second year of high school  she has no friends. A young lady  Suu  who is a "loner" to the extreme  dreamed of a normal  uneventful adolescence. Then one day  a beautiful young man named Yuki appears in front of her. He was a mysterious boy who had lost his memory and was the first friend she had ever made. But what is he really...?

tags: Demons|Comedy|4-Koma|Fantasy|Monster Girls|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: A 4-panel comic depicting the easy-going daily life of the Arcanadea girls.  Arcanadea is a Sci-Fi/Fantasy line of Bishoujo Plastic Model kits by Kotobukiya based on illustrations done by various artists.

After he and his entire class died on a field trip  Odamori accepts a job offer from a mysterious man to be reincarnated. However  his new job turns out to be that of a Slavemancer  with the power to dominate the minds of others and turn them into his toys. Soon  however his evil actions lead to a Princess Knight (who turns out to be one of his previous  more popular classmates) being dispatched to apprehend him. But Odamori  of course  has something different planned for their reunion...!

title_en: Makikomarete Isekai Teni suru Yatsu wa  Taitei Cheat
description: One day during lunch break  High School student Takanashi Kyousai and four friends are suddenly transported to another world of Swords and Magic. The Princess of the Other World  who was the Time-Space Magician that summoned them  wants them to be Heroes and defeat the Demon King to save her world. While his four friends were taken aback by this sudden turn of events  Kyousai was calm and said  "It's just like a story." However the Princess made a shocking statement: "I only summoned four Heroes  didn't I?"

In a Japan laid to waste by a meteorite strike  two survivors  Habane and Saku  travel the desolate landscape in a lone 4x4. They have a single goal: to journey south to a place where they can finally see the Southern Cross in the night sky. But their path is far from easy  as every person they encounter on the road is more eccentric  unpredictable  and dangerous than the last...  (Source: Comic Days  translated)

title_en: Koi ni Koi suru Koibito Kankei
description: Asako Ichijou  the student council president at a prestigious girls' high school  has been racking her brain about the ladykiller Nagi Tenma. That's the sort of person Asako is  but Nagi discovers Asako has broken school rules by bringing a shoujo manga to school... Asako pleads with Nagi to keep it a secret  and Nagi reveals her condition: "Become my lover."  (Source: Takeshobo  translated)

I want to see the look on Senpai's face when she falls in love.''  Chisaki  a reality dating show geek  has formed many couples in her daily life and because of this  everyone calls her Machiapu Senpai (MatchApp-senpai). She had given up on her love life  but Reo-kun  her popular and good-looking kouhai  somehow became emotionally attached to her! While supporting Reo-kun’s friend's love journey  she decides to rehabilitate her own love life with Reo-kun too?!

title_en: Zettai ni Yuuwaku sarenai Otoko VS Zettai ni Yuuwaku suru Onna
description: Reishi Kiyota  a ronin student  has a phobia of love due to a traumatic experience and has never been with a woman in his life. His neighbor  Aika Toyokawa  an office worker  likes Reishi and tries to seduce him with all her might...!

title_en: Tobioriru Chokuzen no Doukyuusei ni "Sekkusu Shiyou!" to Teianshite Mita.
description: My first love  Koga Kurumi. Her beauty and personality  which are beyond what you'd expect from a high school student  invite jealousy  isolate her  and - she was on the verge of jumping off the roof due to bullying. So  what can I do...? "Let's have sex!" I'll scream out my love to the death and make a place for you in this world!

title_en: Koppa Mai Chiru - Sono Koro ni
description: Maebara Kei Gets a Job!  In the 13th year of the Heisei era  in the Tokyo Metropolitan Area  Coastal Region. Due to the prolonged economic recession  the police force has weakened  and the growing number of disillusioned youth turning to loosely organized criminal gangs has led to a drastic decline in public peace... Amidst all this  Maebara Kei begins working at the ward office. Can he become a respectable public servant...?  (Source: Young Champion)

title_en: Kamigami no Kago de Seisan Kakumei ~Isekai no Katasumi de Mattari Slow Life Shi Tetara  Naze ka Tasaina Jinzai ga Atsumatte Saikyou Kokka ga Dekitemashita~
description: During his reincarnation  Japanese corporate slave Tadashi impresses the gods by choosing the blessing of agriculture  something no one else has chosen before  and receives unprecedented  generous blessings. He is then meant to live the slow life of his dreams in another world  but instead he lands on a huge  desolate  miasma-filled peninsula known as "Limbo"! Tadashi struggles  but thanks to his natural earnest personality and the blessings of the gods  he steadily expands the scale of his farming operations. A persecuted former elf queen  a beastwoman hero  and a master dwarf craftsman all gather in search of the goods Tadashi makes...

title_en: Reincarnation Coliseum: The Weakest Skill Conquers the Strongest Women and Creates a Harem
description: His grades are average. His physical fitness is average. But when it comes to games  high school student Mikagami​ Kouji is a battle-worn veteran. After being summoned to another world by a magic circle  he's given only the Copy skill  which is derided as useless trash in this world. Enslaved as a gladiator by his summoner  Head Priestess Zayd  Mikagami is forced to fight in the horrible Battle Coliseum. Losing means getting raped. In this moment  as despair turns to hope  this is Mikagami's chance to grow!!

title_en: Kaji Daikou no Arubaito wo Hajimetara Gakuen Ichi no Bishoujo no Kazoku ni Kiniirarechaimashita
description: During his second year of high school  Haruto Otsuki starts a part-time job in housekeeping during the summer vacation. His first client turns out to be none other than Ayaka Tojo  the most beautiful girl in school! Despite being bewildered by this unexpected turn of events  Haruto continues doing his housekeeping duties. Over time  he becomes well-liked by Ayaka's family and begins regularly visiting her house. From making home-cooked meals that delight Ayaka  to going grocery shopping together like a newlywed couple  and even going on shy movie dates like young lovers  they begin to grow closer by spending these special moments outside of school.

Feng Wu was born with the true blood of the phoenix and was hailed as a peerless genius in all of Junwu. However  her blessing was also a curse...it placed a target on her back. After she was attacked and had her blood stolen  her master Mu Jiuzhou exhausted his spiritual power to save Feng Wu and disappeared right in front of her. Powerless  she could only watch.  Starting again from the beginning  she resolves herself "Zuo Qingyun  our relation is irreconcilable  I cannot live in a world with you in it!"  Watch how our "useless" protagonist becomes a phoenix step by step!

Former pro boxer Harima Ryo plunges into a two-year vegetative state after a fateful match. When he awakens  he’s met with the crushing end of his athletic career  his father’s death  and ruthless betrayal by the gym he once called home. Consumed by rage and grief  Harima vows to claw his way back into the boxing world  not as a fighter  but as a promoter  manipulating the sport’s shadowy underbelly to seize power and profit.  A raw  unflinching tale of those who thrive in boxing’s darkest corners. A place where fists forge legacies  money fuels corruption  and survival demands bending the rules.

Gol D. Roger  a man referred to as the "Pirate King " is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise  he confirms the existence of a great treasure  One Piece  located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it  the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.      Twenty-two years later  a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure  searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat  a small boat  and an elastic body  he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.  ---  **Note:**   **Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series  English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**  --- - **The Best-Selling Manga in History** - **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012**  - **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
A newly built 1LDK apartment with rent of 4 800 yen! The reason is the "earthbound spirit of a Shiba Inu"...!?

Yataro Araki  a member of the Tojo High School soccer team  has big dreams. Within a decade  he sees himself conquering the soccer world’s loftiest peak: European “football!” Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation  the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts  he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred  no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!

Gotsuji and Uruka  two exorcists  spend their days hunting down and banishing evil spirits. Their mission is to track down and slay a specific evil spirit.   At the heart of this quest lies Gotsuji's deep  unresolved grief and desire for vengeance for a woman who died long ago. While Gotsuji is consumed by a thirst for revenge  Uruka  who struggles to understand this obsession  faithfully stays by his side.   Together  these two exorcists are bound on a journey  but where will it lead?

A guy who is satisfied with his 2D wife and anime and games. One night he ended up nursing a girl. Unexpectedly  the girl's love interest is… another girl! With this going on  what's going to happen to Midori?!
In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable  days that can't be found anywhere else have begun!

title_en: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma wo go Kibou desu
description: The hero  Chloe  is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people. And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women  so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.  "If you want me to save the city  give me your most beautiful married woman!"

title_en: Shimotsuki-san wa Mobu ga Suki ~Hitomishiri na Kanojo wa Ore ni Dake Dere Amai~
description: "Only you are special."  After school  Koutarou Nakayama returns to school to pick up something he forgot and finds Shiho Shimotsuki asleep in an empty classroom. Shiho is rumored to be Ryouma Ryuuzaki's crush  a popular boy who has formed a harem in his class  but she is always expressionless and no one has ever seen her smile. But now  her fair skin is holding Koutarou's hand...?!

Ritsuki  an elementary school boy  hasn’t been able to wake up early for half a year and now lives a reversed sleep cycle.  One day  on his way to school  he wonders what will happen if he stays like this forever.  Just then  a strange woman suddenly speaks to him  saying she want to be his big sister.

After dying in an accident  a young man is reincarnated in a world of swords and magic as Arte  the second son of a powerful marquis. His new life seems like a dream come true  surrounded by a warm and loving family. But everything changes during the sacred ceremony where he is granted magic.  He receives a mysterious  unique power called [Light]  a skill immediately dismissed by everyone as a useless dud. Just as he faces their scorn  memories of his past life come rushing back. With knowledge from his former world  Arte alone understands the hidden  extraordinary potential of his magic.  Now  by applying the wisdom of his past  can he transform a "dud" into the strongest magic of all?!  Thus begins the saga of an adventurer defined by ultimate power and unrivaled freedom  the man who would become 'The Flash'!

This is a story set in the near future. One day  a cheerful but slightly shy high school girl  Ueshita Amami  receives an email from a mysterious sender saying  "I love you." Although shaken by her first love confession  Amami heads to the meeting place written in the email  intending to meet the man and reject him properly. Little does she know that this is the beginning of a major incident that will shake the world. Girl meets...? A love story like no one has ever read before begins now!

title_en: I Was Immediately Mistaken for a Monster Genius Actor
description: One day  Kang Woo-jin suddenly gains the ability to enter a subspace when he reads a script or scenario  and to become the character himself through the subspace.   And then  at an audition location where he followed his friend  he happened to show the acting he experienced through the subspace…?

A lighthearted adventure series based off then-current Sonic games  changing focus nearly every year. Games covered in story arcs include:      - Sonic Unleashed   - Sonic & The Black Knight   - Sonic Chronicles   - Sonic Colors   - Sonic Generations

The popular teen model niPA  aka Asahino Futaba  is strong willed and independent  but the plain guy who is her seatmate refuses to budge before her... "Damn that four-eyed loser  how dare he tell me off!". However  at the same time  remembering that makes her feel somehow strange. Her fingers slip beneath her skirt as if by reflex and while thinking about getting assaulted by that disgusting man  she pleasures herself against her better judgment while she is brought to climax in her fantasies!?

title_en: Gokufuri Kyohi Shite Tesaguri Start! Tokka Shinai Healer  Nakama to Wakarete Tabi ni Deru
description: Many people suddenly find themselves in a white  empty space  where a God-like figure tells them that they are to be reincarnated and sent to an isekai known as Tesla. They are given a limited number of points to spend in various attributes  such as their race and abilities  which will determine their reincarnation into Tesla.  The story follows a young boy sent there along with his clanmates from an MMORPG  and they plan to stick together and specialize into different skills  just like they did in-game. Although his clanmates and everyone else sent there are strangely accepting of the situation  he finds it too suspicious and decides to go his own separate way  balancing his points out to be an all-rounder instead of a healer. He leisurely goes about life in Tesla as an adventurer  but it slowly starts to seem like there was a reason behind them being sent there... ___ - [Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054885201112) (Raw)
Everyone's favorite magic-loving cutie  Enokida Juri  can't help but tease the intimidating bookworm Aritsuki Kenji again today!

title_en: Legend of Crystania: The First Adventurers
