description: Rika is a new shy student at her new school. She’s always had troubles making friends because of her personality. Her past best-friend  Mirai  encourages her to change before she moves to the new school. Will Rika be able to gather some courage to change herself and make new friends?

Tatsuhiko inherits his grandfather's home after his passing. It's been ages  so he heads to the old homestead for a visit. In a storage room there  he encounters a tanuki who claims to be a god. Tatsuhiko and the tanuki god repair the home together while sharing stories about his grandfather. Following this strange turn of events  the two decide to get married?!

The Souha Public High School Baseball Team is one step away from the pinnacle that is the Summer Koushien. They only need a star pitcher to have a chance. Could the Baseball Club Slasher  the powerful pitcher who appears every night and terrorizes other players  be their guy? There's only 1 problem: he can only pitch 3 full-power balls a day!

title_en: I'm the Only One With Genius DNA
description: A status window appeared in front of Ryu Young-jun  a researcher at a pharmaceutical company.   Rosalin's status window  an artificial cell that knows everything about biology.  ---  - [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%98%BC%EC%9E%90-%EC%B2%9C%EC%9E%AC-DNA/2412)  ---  - [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/64743)

In her desire to find the perfect evil man to be her slave  the devil Eclair travelled all the way from the netherworld to a local country town's police station. And she set her sights on the evil looking cop  Kuwahara Daichi. Eclair wants to do everything to tame Daichi  and Daichi wants to drive her back to hell. What a romantic battle... or that's what it looks like. Actually Eclair is completely useless and Daichi can't let her be alone.

In the 13th century  Fatima  a captive of the Mongol Empire  the most powerful empire on earth  was taken prisoner and assigned to serve in the imperial palace. With knowledge from Iran  the era's foremost experts on medicine and science  Fatima seeks a world in which she can display her talents. She meets Töregene  the sixth wife of the second emperor  Ögedei  who has mixed feelings about the Mongol Empire....

title_en: Imouto ga Onna Kishi Gakuen ni Nyuugaku Shitara Naze ka Kyuukoku no Eiyuu ni narimashita. Boku ga.
description: My little sister enrolled in an all-girls academy that trains aspiring knights. Even at this academy  renowned as the most prestigious in the kingdom  my brilliant little sister still easily displays her overwhelming prowess!  "Nii-san  I told you already—you're much stronger than someone like me!"  No  I'm just an ordinary commoner  you know... (※That's a lie. Nii-san is insanely strong. He just doesn't realize it.)  Because of that  a female knight from the academy appeared and challenged me to a mock battle. (※The strongest female knight in the academy instantly realized the difference in their strengths.)  Then  I gave her some post-battle care. (※The female knight enjoyed Nii-san's massage so much that it became popular among the nobility.)  And just by doing what I normally do  I caught the eye of the QueenーEh? Why!?

Rinta  who moved to the city from the countryside and enrolled in a university in the heart of the city  meets "Fumi-san " rumored to be the most beautiful girl on campus  in the literature club he joined. After attending a drinking party together  he ends up walking her home. He safely escorts her to her house and is about to head back when suddenly... Fumi-san transforms and forcefully invites him to her bed—!? "I wonder how long you can keep being a good person  Rinta-kun...?" Fumi-san pushes Rinta to his limits  testing his self-control until it shatters.

Arata Tsuchiya  a company employee  reunites with Ako Hino  who used to be his classmate during his high school days  and ends up falling into bed with her. Being conscious about each other's feelings and motives  their erotic yet wholesome friend-with-benefits romantic comedy  in which they couldn't help but become sex friends  is about to unfold! ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/2550912964923103989)

A prodigy of science and a solitary genius—yet terrible at so many things!?  Poor university student Sanosuke Saraki unexpectedly reunites with his admired genius classmate  Koharu Kobachi  at his part-time job back at his old school. However  this supposed genius is now a "5th year high school student" who has repeated her second year in a row...! Saraki's mission is to "make Koharu graduate by the end of the year."

title_en: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu
description: Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou  a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school  this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate  and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul. In reality  though  it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright  if somewhat strange  beautiful girl. ___ **Awards:** - Won the 2020 Next Manga Award in the Web category. - Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taishou Award. - Won the top prize of the 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards.  **Additional Links:** - [Official X](https://x.com/boku__yaba)

Itsuki-kun has someone he’s interested in — a senior  Ririko-senpai  the president of the disciplinary committee! In his efforts to talk to her  he purposely messes up his uniform  but Ririko is always one step ahead—?!   A heartwarming  dedicated youth romantic comedy begins!

Kuyou Temple is a place where all kinds of cursed objects are brought.  One day  the head priest of a neighboring temple risked his life to deliver a book called the “Record of the Strange.”  But what happens when that book is opened…?!

When Harimanada makes his grand entrance into the world of Sumo  he causes complete uproar throughout the entire arena. The novelty headmask is clearly not a good idea but not content with just ruffling the feathers of all the spectators  he sends the the entire Sumo Association into a frenzy when he arrogantly declares that he will surpass the legendary Futabayama's consecutive run of 69 victories. Should he fail to achieve such a feat  he will immediately retire all together. Harimanada's impudent remarks cause a huge backlash as every high-ranking Yokuzuna wants the chance to knock him down and humiliate him for showing such arrogance. Thus begins Harimanada's journey to the top as he battles to topple the entire Sumo hierarchy!

title_en: Bocchi no Boku ni Kyousei Kanojo ga Yattekita
description: On my 24th birthday  I came home to find a woman who wanted to be my girlfriend! As a "loner" since junior high school  I was confused by all this. But the truth is she is my mother's junior at work  and my mother asked her to!? A pseudo-romance between two people with the same interests has begun!

title_en: Cool na Megami-sama to Issho ni Sundara  Amayakashi Sugite Ponkotsu ni Shite Shimatta Ken ni Tsuite
description: One day  Haruto Akihara  a high school student living alone  moves in with his classmate Rei Mikoto  an extremely beautiful girl! Rei  nicknamed the "Goddess of Ice"  has a cold attitude towards Haruto  who is devoted to her  but gradually...?

title_en: S-Rank Party Kara Kaikosareta "Jugushi" ~"Noroi no Item" Shika Tsukuremasen ga  Sono Seinou wa Artifact-kyuu nari......!~
description: Gaile  a Cursificer  is left penniless when he's expelled from his party as soon as they reach S Rank. Apparently he wasn't contributing enough?! But they hadn't realized that his cursed items outperform even holy relics and legendary equipment! Gaile decides to try to make a living on his own off of his cursed items.
Get to know the operators with Amiya and the Doctor!

A talented nobody feels as if there's no challenge to him in this life. He feels as if life is too easy. But little does he know  his background actually holds more than he ever wished for. Can he face his destiny and accept what has been laid before him?

Kasane Hayafuji's secret joy in life is seeing Aoyama-san  a waitress at a family restaurant. One night  she saw Aoyama standing alone in the rain. When she tried to help  Aoyama suddenly made her an offer.  "Will you be my big sister?"

title_en: Osananajimi wa  Nyaa to Naite Skirt no Naka
description: In the cat-filled town of Miyakecho  there is an urban legend that says cats sometimes put curses on humans. Ichika and Maki were once childhood friends until a certain incident led them to stop talking to each other. When Maki rushes in to save a mysterious white cat from an oncoming truck  however  she somehow finds herself under the cat's curse with Ichika being the only one she can turn to for help.
U149  also known as "Under149"  is a spinoff story of Cinderella Girls encompassing the younger idols  who are under 149 cm  and their pursuits to be big time idols with their newly hired P-san.
A gloomy boy suddenly getting close with the popular track and field club ace?! A short comedy about invading someone else's spot to skip class is about to begin!!

title_en: Ookami wa Tsuki ni Koi wo Suru
description: I'm the only one who knows my senpai's face. Senpai  who was supposed to hate me  ended up saying "I like you" to me...  The perfect but slightly scary Student Council President  "Wolf-senpai" aka Ookamigawa Rina  and the frivolous and clumsy Vice-President  Tsukiyama Yuuga. These two are complete opposites of each other  save for the fact that both of them have a secret face. One day  at his secret part-time job  he discovers Wolf-senpai's secret face...?

title_en: On the Way to Meet Mom
tags: Action|Long Strip|Comedy|Adventure|Fantasy|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Mori  a child found by a rescue team in an abandoned house  wakes up in a shelter. While adapting to an unfamiliar life  one day  he begins to be looked after with unconditional love from a mysterious sponsor... And then Mori learns about the existence of a "mom" when a close friend leaves with hers. The child starts to wonder about the sponsor: "Could this person... be my mom?" This is the story of Mori's long and challenging journey to find his mom.

Taiga Amachi  a diehard SD Gundam fan  joins the Gundam Research Group (also commonly known as "G-Group"). He does battle in a Gunpla battle simulator against the many enemies aiming to take down G-Group.

title_en: Gomi Ika da to Tsuihou Sareta Shiyounin  Jitsu wa Zense Kenja desu ~Shijou Saikyou no Kenja  Sekai Saikouhou no Gakuen ni Kayou~
description: One day  Gard  a servant of a count's family  was framed for a crime he did not commit and was fired from his job.  "You're worse than trash! Get out of this house immediately!"  Expelled from the Count's family and with nowhere to go  Gard saw a flyer recruiting students for Remillion Magic Academy and decided to take the entrance exam in the royal capital. It was said to be the most difficult exam to enter a magic academy  but Gard passed it with ease. How could this happen to Gard  who was just a servant?! Yes  in his previous life  Gard was actually the "strongest sage"!

Takeru Kamishiro is an ordinary middle aged salaryman who was chosen by god to be reincarnated into a fantasy world in the body of a handsome young man in his prime. Takeru sets out to learn more about the world while gathering rare and interesting materials along the way to sell for money which he can use to gather even more materials ad infinitum.

Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare  but his real dream is to be a singer  a soccer player  or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist  a girl named Benio Adashino arrives  Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists " two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.   --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)
A manga adaptation of the Yuukoku no Moriarty light novels.

title_en: Zenbu Kimi no Sei - Extras / After Story
description: Extras and After Story of [Zenbu Kimi no Sei](https://mangadex.org/title/82476383-e6a9-41a7-b98c-87cc8be9efbb/zenbu-kimi-no-sei)  mainly centred around Ryou and Nagisa. (the Official Raws are free to view)

title_en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse
description: Percival  a kind boy  lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However  the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate  and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey.

The “sixth sense” is the ability to perceive the providence of nature with one's “mind” and transform it into “power”.  The “Fallen World” at the bottom of the earth.  One day  Ruo  a boy who dreams of the skies  comes into possession of “relic iron” and comes across the carcass of an Ironman  a monster from the earth. However  it is a forbidden power that must not be touched! Aim for the earth's surface!  A ≪super-royalistic boys' manga≫ where a “sixth-sense-less” changes the world!! ___ [Official X](https://x.com/man_of_rust_)

The year is 2030 in Midnight City  USA. Josiah Jones  an ex-convict  faces the cruel changes that have undergone his home city. While crime  gang violence  and political corruption wreak havoc throughout the city  Josiah must find where he belongs in the world all the while facing strange humans with even stranger powers. This is a fan-creation inspired by the works of Hirohiko Araki in Jojo's Bizarre Adventure (ジョジョの奇妙な冒険)

title_en: The Knight Commander Wants to Monopolize the Former Glasses Girl
description: I was caught up in a trip to another world and was treated as a nuisance  but the person who helped me was the commander of the Second Knights  Leon  who was super strong and handsome! He was blunt but kind and always took care of me. But why does he get so nervous when I take off my glasses?       Melissa's popular high-tension love fantasy is finally available in comic form!       Underneath the thick-rimmed glasses is a beautiful girl! The misfortune girl is loved with all her might by the knight commander who is full of possessiveness!

title_en: Guild Tsuihousareta Zatsuyou-gakari no Gekokujou ~Chou Bannou na Seikatsu Skill de Sekai Saikyou~
description: Tim  a boy serving as an errand runner at a huge adventurer's guild  had been stuck at the beginner rank for three years and was subjected to insidious bullying. One day  his fate begins to dramatically change after being summoned by the guild leader  Guilne  as Tim  who had zero talent in both swordsmanship and magic  starts to turn his luck around...!   Although he was framed and expelled from the guild  the beautiful guild leader who believes in him ends up following him for some reason.   However  Tim had hidden talents that even she finds surprising...!

The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity  and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it  giving humanity a fighting chance  but this only works for women. As such  as protectors of humanity  women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.       Cue Yuuki Wakura  a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him  an event opens before him  and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps  she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.       However  there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"... and it's not him who has to pay it.

title_en: Ore no "Full Auto Buff" de Nakamatachi ga Sekai Saikyou ~Soko ni Iru Dake Mujikaku Musou~
description: One of a kind in the world - unique skills for a lifetime. Slad  who possesses "Fully Automatic Support" and "Fully Automatic Weakening " was fired from his party one day after being treated as an obstacle by the heroes. "Well  I guess they can do it without me." Slad tries to live a carefree adventurer's life with an elf girl  Echika. But without him  the heroic party struggles and the world is on the verge of extinction!

title_en: Maou to Ryuuou ni Sodaterareta Shounen wa Gakuen Seikatsu wo Musou suru You desu
description: A boy named Ruisha is trapped in a distorted space created by the ancient hero. What he finds there is the Demon King and the Dragon King  who should have been defeated by the hero 300 years ago. Ruisha befriends the Demon King and the Dragon King  and is trained by them  going from a weak child to a legendary warrior with the power of both demons and dragons. Using his power  Ruisha escaped from the strange place and was accepted into the magic academy where the hero’s descendants live. And now he will have to face many challenges to free the Demon King and Dragon King.

title_en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Nichijou wo!
description: Spinoff of the KonoSuba series  featuring the daily life of Kazuma and Co.

In the year 202X  when self-driving electric and fuel-cell vehicles are ubiquitous  the racing organization MFG exists. Hosting races in Japan exclusively using cars with internal combustion engine. We follow young half-British  half-Japanese racing driver  Kanata Rivington. Who graduated at the top of his class in racing school and was invited into the series thanks to his teacher's connections.

It's been roughly one year since Chūya Nakahara joined the Port Mafia  and he's got his sights set on an executive position. But as he makes plans to move up  a man by the name of Paul Verlaine—claiming to be his older brother—appears and vows to assassinate everyone he cares about! Now  Chūya must team up with Adam  a European A.I. investigator  to stop this lunatic before the storm swallows Yokohama once again…

The story revolves around a 202-pound  18-year old girl named Okome Akino (whose name is a pun of "autumn rice"). After Okome enters a sumo match and wins against a male amateur fighter by a landslide  a trainer named Akane scouts her  and she enters the world of women's boxing.

title_en: Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle
description: On the night the kingdom fell and the entire royal family was being executed  Clarisse  who naturally thought she would also die  heard something unexpected.   “We cannot execute anyone who has not reached the age of eighteen. Instead  I will kill you the day you turn eighteen.”   And so  Clarisse is given ten years to live.  Clarisse then heads North as a “prisoner.”  And she asks the Grand Duke for only one thing…   “Um  is it okay if I take this friend with me? It’s my only friend.”   But what Clarisse holds out is a rock?   It’s a new life in the North!  But this life as a “prisoner” keeps on getting better…?

title_en: Juunenme  Kikan wo Akirameta Tenisha wa Imasara Shujinkou ni naru
description: Ten years after being transported to another world.  It was more than enough time to awaken from what at first  felt like an exciting fantasy dream world. And on this 10th year Wasa Tooru gives up searching for a way to return to Japan  after being unsuccessful for so long. It was then that a job offer found its way to him — it was to be the bodyguard of twins who have knowledge of Earth.

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Kael and Baby are neighbors who have been friends since childhood. Kael is a shy and reserved boy  while Baby is an outgoing and passionate girl. When Baby meets Kai  Kael's older brother  she is instantly attracted to him. Kael is also interested in Beryl  Baby's older sister. The two decide to collaborate to help each other set up a relationship with their siblings  but Kael keeps a secret...

Mameda Wakatsu is a second-year student at Ohka Gakuen High School and the manager of the basketball club's 5th-string team. Despite his low-profile role  he harbors a secret: he is the son of the club's head coach  Shirakami Jin'ichi—a fact he desperately hides. When his talent is discovered by genius player Akuro Hajime  the duo teams up to challenge Jin'ichi's ironclad regime and revolutionize high school basketball!

title_en: Isekai Kaeri no Yuusha wa  Dungeon ga Shutsugen shita Genjitsu Sekai de  Influencer natte Kane wo Kasegimasu!
description: One day  an ordinary high school student is transferred to another world. He raises his level in the other world  successfully defeats the Demon King  and saves the world! With his strongest status  he decided to return to his own world; however  in the world to which he returns  a new "dungeon" has appeared.

"Hanako-san  Hanako-san... are you there?"  At Kamome Academy  rumors abound about the school's Seven Mysteries  one of which is Hanako-san. Said to occupy the third stall of the third floor girls' bathroom in the old school building  Hanako-san grants any wish when summoned. Nene Yashiro  an occult-loving high school girl who dreams of romance  ventures into this haunted bathroom... but the Hanako-san she meets there is nothing like she imagined! Kamome Academy's Hanako-san... is a boy! ___ **Note:** Volume 0 includes the original pilot version of Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun and the debut oneshot of Aida Iro - Dear My Living Dead.

title_en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsunomanika Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken: after the rain
description: A spin-off of the series *[The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten](https://mangadex.org/title/2fec6641-beb1-4ae9-a32f-204dd06688ac/the-angel-next-door-spoils-me-rotten)* which comicalizes the stories from Volume 5.5 of the Light Novel and its special edition booklet  which contains additional short stories.
Akihiko Shimura  20 years old (male). When I woke up in the morning  I was a little blonde loli.

Don't think that mediocre men have no spring time.    A little gangster that takes protection fees in front of the school entrance strangely became the highest administrator of hell. Now  things are getting interesting. Being King Yama  fighting the heavens  reforming hell's system  and leading ghosts to resist the oppression by the gods of heaven… Finally  I'm at the highest position within the heavens and hell.   Mwahaha…
Kashuu Kiyomitsu/Yamatonokami Yasusada

title_en: "Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume desu." Isekai Ossan Kyoushi Totsuzen no Moteki ni Konwaku suru
tags: Romance|Sexual Violence|Harem|Isekai|Drama|School Life|Fantasy|Monster Girls|Slice of Life
description: Some 20 years have passed since the protagonist was summoned to another world and retired from the army. He is still single in his 40s and lives as a low-ranking professor  until one day  an elite 'monster girl' transfers into his class.

title_ja: EVOL
description: Work  sleep  work  sleep... what a dull existence Why even live?! No hopes  no dreams Everything’s predictable... Suicide is salvation But when you wake up in purgatory... ...and it's the same world you left?  One option left Let's turn this fuckin' world upside down   The story of "Evol" begins in a village occupied by an armed group when a young girl  driven by despair  attempts suicide. She survives and wakes up  but when a man tries to drive her into a corner  a strange phenomenon occurs. The place changes  and something also happens to the boy who wakes up in the hospital after committing suicide.
A story based on real-life events in 1966. The Sanrizuka Struggle told from the perspective of the peasants fighting for their land.

title_en: Toshiue Elite Onna Kishi ga Boku no Mae de dake Kawaii
description: Haru is a 16-year-old recruit of the "Black Hawk" 4th Cavalry Unit of the Knights' Regiment under the command of Captain Karen  a profoundly beautiful and fierce 29-year-old swordswoman  who  unbeknownst to all the unit except Haru  is a pure maiden with exactly zilch experience with men. Being privy to this delightful side of her  Haru secretly henpecks her and teases her lovingly  which turns her into a flustered and heavily-armed tomato. Watch as he slowly inches his way into her heart as he dodges her longsword!    - Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/228090)  (Series has been on Hiatus since June 2024)
Distributing thrilling videos in secret! A school game that puts life and death on the line!

A very ordinary and serious high school student  Kamou-kun. Though his days are filled with diligent study  his concern lies in his childhood friend  Katabami-san  who interferes with his studies every day. And to make matters more complicated  Katabami-san's true identity is… a fox spirit!? ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66393)

My mother passed away when I was young. Dad wanted to ease my pain  so he let me live a life without worry. Then suddenly one day  my father introduced me a young and beautiful woman he married because she coveted the man's property. Seeing her sincerely loving my father  I began to open my heart to her gradually  however…

title_en: You Like Me  Not My Daughter?!
description: “I will take in and raise this child.”  I'm Katsuragi Ayako  thirty-\*BEEP\* years old. It's been 10 years since I took in the daughter of my late sister and her husband. My daughter's now in high school and is getting on well with her childhood friend  Aterazawa Takumi. Maybe they'll start dating? Takumi's a really nice guy  so I'm all for it.  Eh? He has something to say to me? Is it something like “Please give me your daughter.”? No way  I'm getting ahead of myself.  “Ayako-mama… I've always loved you. Please go out with me.”  “…You like me (mama)  not my daughter!?” ___ **Character Designer:** [Giuniu](https://mangadex.org/author/657f488c-ba3d-4910-8ec3-539871b99fcc)  **Alt Official Raw:** [Young Animal Web](https://younganimal.com/series/5d1e949cd0b52)

Ed Rothstaylor is a third-rate villain in a game  disowned by his family and kicked out of the dormitory for his misdeeds. One day  our main character wakes up as this very Ed  and realizes he must earn a scholarship so he can graduate and be set for life.   Now living in the woods  he resolves to keep away from the protagonists  but four of the female leads just won't leave him alone. Not only that  his presence starts to change the timeline and events of the game!   Can Ed help the story progress while staying out of the limelight?  --- ***Note:** LINE Webtoon (Official English) has made changes to the main character's "original emotional facial expressions" in some chapters like for examples  CH.01  CH.02 and CH.06 is changed while it's kept in all other official language platforms.*
The slapstick days between Trainer and his Uma Musume.

title_en: A Record of a Mortal's Journey to Immortality
description: A poor and ordinary boy from a village joins a minor sect in Jiang Hu and becomes an Unofficial Disciple by chance. How will Han Li  a commoner by birth  establish a foothold for himself in in his sect? With his mediocre aptitude  he must successfully traverse the treacherous path of cultivation and avoid the notice of those who may do him harm. This is a story of an ordinary mortal who  against all odds  clashes with devilish demons and ancient celestials in order to find his own path towards immortality.   ---  **Links:** - [English Novel](https://www.wuxiaworld.com/novel/rmji)

Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor  Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead  she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day  during a public lecture at her university  she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

title_en: Yuusha no Gawari ni Maou Toubatsu Shitara Tegara wo Yokodoroi Saremashita
description: As a member of the hero's party  Arga hid his identity and was on a journey to subjugate the Demon King with the hero. At last the party chased the demon king  and Arga brought him down. However  the hero insists that he was the one who killed the Demon King  and then charges Arga with an innocent sin and banishes him from the Imperial Palace. The warrior who devoted his life to the hero as a part of his corp would walk a new life in a strange country town.  --- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6658ej/)

College student Sanwa Honoka is ridiculed by male students for her plump figure. As her best friend gets the most out of college life  her only solace is the Ancient Tomb Study Group  where she can talk about her favorite things  surrounded by two laid-back male members. However  Honoka considers member Iida as a lover at a certain moment. A poetic psychological depiction of how a girl with low self-esteem finds spiritual support and matures.  --- Note: The series moved to Bunshun Online website in April 2022 and started releasing new chapters in June 2022. All 3 volumes that were published by Line  were released again by Bungei Shunjuu as shinsouban (new cover edition) as of September 2022.  A Jury Selection award winner in the Manga Section of the 23rd Japan Media Arts Festival.
Ami  an office worker and alien  is demoted to Earth due to certain circumstances. Furthermore  she has an accident while heading to Earth!!?
A story about an ordinary boy named Mekh  whose life is about to change the moment he accidentally hit the infamous and easily-misunderstood girl named Saran.

title_en: Isekai NTR ~Shinyuu no Onna wo Saikyou Skill de Otosu Houhou~
description: This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game  he and I will definitely escape it together. So  all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse  it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them. That's why  for his sake  I'll eat them up first. But  just what is this power...?

title_en: I Ran Away and Got Married
description: “You’re mine.”  When Raphia met her demise after having been used and thrown away by her benefactor  Yuri  she went back nine years in the past.  ‘I’m not going to relive that hell!’  Running away from her benefactor  she went to Kasein Soleia  Yuri’s archnemesis  and signed a new sponsorship contract with him.  “I shall kill every single person you despise  Milord.”  “The necessary role happens to be open  and you might just be the right person for it.”  Young Duke. This is a sponsorship contract  right? But why . . . why are we getting married?  ===  “Throughout the time I won’t be by your side . . . I will think of nothing but your small  cute head.”  That low voice sent shivers down her spine.  “I can’t believe you’re leaving. I’ll just . . .”  Kasein looked at her sharply as if he was daring her to continue making up excuses.  “You have to answer well  brat. Depending on what you say  all the wagon and shoe craftsmen of the Empire might lose their livelihood.”  Despite his harsh words  Kasein’s touch was gentle. He couldn’t take his eyes off of Raphia  who strangely grew more beautiful by the day.  --- **Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%84%EB%A7%9D%EC%B3%A4%EB%8D%94%EB%8B%88-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC%EC%9D%84-%ED%95%98%EA%B2%8C-%EB%90%90%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3299)  [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61190666)

title_en: Isekai Kara Kita Elf to Tomo ni Sugosu Nichijou
description: "I'm going to start living with an elf!"  Oribe Eiichi  a young man without a job and at the bottom of his life  picks up a mysterious stone in the park one day. When he opens his eyes  he finds himself on top of a giant tree with a beautiful elf in his arms! Eichi tries to save her  but he falls from the tree and loses consciousness.  When he wakes up in the hospital a short time later  he finds Kurokawa  who claims to be a public security officer  and the elf Tia.  There he learns a shocking truth...

title_en: The Flower That Wields a Sword
description: An empire stained with blood  That day  consumed by the cursed sword  I cut down the people I loved most with my own hands.  Fifteen years have passed under its curse. Now  having claimed all ten legendary swords forged by man  I made a wish upon the holy sword.  "Take me back—to the time I killed anyone."  Time rewound to the moment before all tragedies began. And yet  the sword remained in my hand.  This time  I won't succumb in the same way. Neither the cursed sword  nor fate  nor anyone else will control me again.  "There won't be a second miracle. This time  I will find happiness."

A regular high school girl loses her way en route to a friend’s birthday party  only to stumble into a twisted realm where wishes are granted through bloodshed. Her escape becomes a surreal nightmare: endless misfortunes  a mysterious guardian  and a crimson sky frozen in eternal dusk. As she glimpses the world’s hidden face  will the joy of survival crumble beneath the weight of a brutal truth?  “Do you have a wish you’d kill to make real?” The demon with violet eyes raises its gun. “There is no such thing as kindness.” “Welcome to: the Lawless World.”

The witch Hildegar  who received the blessing of the Sun Goddess Karia  is known far and wide for her fearsome reputation.   The Northerner Elkin  who lost his homeland  chases after the witch towards a nameless castle…

title_en: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darou ka Gaiden - Sword Oratoria
description: After having descended upon this world  the gods have created guilds where adventurers can test their mettle. These guilds  known as "familia " grant adventurers the chance to explore  gather  hunt  or simply enjoy themselves.  Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka Gaiden: Sword Oratoria begins in Orario  the lively city of adventurers. The Sword Princess  Ais Wallenstein  and the novice mage  Lefiya Viridis  are members of the Loki Familia  who are experts at monster hunting. With the rest of their group  they journey to the tower of Babel in hopes of exploring the dungeon underneath. Home to powerful monsters  the dungeon will fulfill Ais's desire to master her sword skills  while bringing Lefiya closer to her dream of succeeding Riveria Ljos Alf  vice-captain of the Loki Familia  as the most powerful mage in the land. ___ **Links:** [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/is-it-wrong-to-try-to-pick-up-girls-in-a-dungeon-on-the-side-sword-oratoria-manga)

One day  a picture book writer named Yorozu Hikaru was asked by his close online friend  Chintarou  if they could share a room together while he attended a nearby university. Although they only knew each other through online interactions  Hikaru agrees to it without much thought. However unbeknownst to Hikaru  Chintarou  despite having a male name  is actually a girl: a very well endowed girl.

After leaving his mark on Japan  Dai is taking on Europe!  Direct continuation of Blue Giant  a manga about the evolution of the young saxophonist Dai Miyamoto in the jazz world. Blue Giant Supreme sees our protagonist travel to Europe. Having just arrived in Munich  without being able to speak a word of German and with just average English  he manages to secure a roof over his head  food and drink  but struggles to get the most important thing: a place where he can have his music heard.   A whole new element added on top of the enthralling story that enchants every music lover: the discovery of a new culture. Dai will travel all over Europe  from Germany to France  accompanied by his instrument  growing as a musician and a person in the process of fulfilling his dream of becoming the best in the world.   [Official Site](https://bluegiant.jp/)
This is the life story of a cute and dumb fox.
A serialization for the hit game Splatoon with manga-original characters featuring Team Blue's  and more specifically Goggles'  antics.

tags: Reincarnation|Sci-Fi|Action|Long Strip|Martial Arts|Adventure|Virtual Reality|Video Games|Fantasy|Web Comic|Full Color
description: When the end of the world came  in the hopeless darkness  Gu Qingshan broke away from time and space  and returned to the world before it collapsed  determined to change his fate. But as time went on  he gradually realized that the apocalypse is not as simple as it seemed…

When high school student Kakeru Daiba runs for long enough  he enters into a runner's high state that heightens his senses. When his crush  Natsume  disappears mysteriously one day he's forced to use his ability in ways he never expected.

title_en: Kimi to Koete Koi ni Naru
description: Mari is a high school student living in a town where beastmen and humans coexist. When she is late for school  she meets Tsunagu  a beastman who has come to the school as a "special student" for the Beastman Education Program  at the front gate. Mari is bewildered by her first contact with a beastman  but as she gets to know him  she is drawn to his kind and pure side. However  some of her classmates don't seem to take kindly to beastmen  and suddenly the two of them are locked in a warehouse. Suddenly  they are locked in a warehouse and Tsunagu hugs her! He says  "You smell sweet..." His breathing becomes ragged.  A human and a beastman. What will happen to the love between two people who transcend race? Pure and exciting interspecies youth love.

The once-prosperous Japanese ninja are said to have been dismantled by the GHQ following the Pacific War and disappeared. In reality  the ninja still exist in secret  and their number is rumored to be as many as 200 000. Some of the elite ninja work behind the scenes at the national level. On the other hand  the ninja at the end of the line are often unable to find work. One such ninja  Kuro Kumogakure  is living the life of a NEET.

Broke young man + chainsaw demon = Chainsaw Man!   Denji was a small-time devil hunter just trying to survive in a harsh world. After being killed on a job  he is revived by his pet devil-dog Pochita and becomes something new and dangerous—Chainsaw Man!

title_en: Outo no Hazure no Renkinjutsushi ~Hazure Shokugyou Datta node  Nonbiri Omise Keiei Shimasu~
description: Daisy von Preslaria  born in a viscount family that produces excellent magicians  was the only one in the family that was granted the failure job  Alchemist. Since this has happened  she's going to try studying hard and becoming independent as a worthy alchemist! The five-year-old girl so resolved and began to make potions by trial and error. Thanks to the Appraisal skill that she secretly possessed  let alone failures  her finished products were of such high quality never seen anywhere! She cultivated medicinal herbs  indulged herself in research  went harvesting  and opened a store.

Inubuse Kuromu aspired to be King in Chess  he was so skilled he represented Japan in the World Youth Chess Championship at age 11. However  due to his loss to a mysterious  wolf-like player  he developed a condition where he can't sit in front of anyone?! Because of this condition  he stopped playing Chess and chose to solely focus on his studies until his fingers break. Three years since his loss  while desperately still holding onto his title as 'King' through internet Chess  he meets an incredibly strong opponent. This game…starts his tale to become King.

Tatsuya Uesugi  the older brother who has no relationship with the word "hard work " and Kazuya Uesugi  the younger brother who tries his hardest in everything he does.   They are twin brothers. They have known Minami Asakura  the only daughter of the neighboring coffee shop "Minamikaze" since childhood. You can't take your eyes off the "youth" of these three...!   --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media (2008)  --- - **Won the 28th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen**

The United Kingdom of Euchronia is thrown into chaos following the assassination of its king… Our Hero  the Traveler Will  and his Fairy Companion Gallica  race to Grand Trad to undertake a Special Mission. Discover the bonds that form between eight races across three countries. (MangaPlus)  Based off [the award-winning game!](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2679460/Metaphor_ReFantazio/)

title_en: Kono Sekai no Kouryakubon wo Hirotteshimaimashita
description: Sana is the hardworking daughter of a shop owner  and she often ventures out into the forest to gather the herbs needed for the restorative potions they sell. But on one trip  she happens to pick up a mysterious strategy guide for a game—and it’s filled with detailed information about her town  those around her  and even what’s yet to come! However  the future may not be at all what she expects… With such a powerful—and dangerous—book in hand  what will Sana do? (Yen Press) ___ **Additional Links:** - Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/61995) - [Official X](https://x.com/sekaino_hon)

Itou-san  who's poor at interpersonal relations  was jealous of her mild-mannered classmate Takahashi-san  who gets along well with everyone. But one day  she witnesses Takahashi-san swallow a person whole. Takahashi-san was a monster mimicking a human! Such a terrifying monster was calmly blending in with the class – that's extremely admirable!! I definitely want to be her friend!! And so Itou-san learns the "normality" of human society from Takahashi-san the monster. But while Itou-san is in high spirits  Takahashi-san has her own motives...

Gomi Jirou  a 29-year-old virgin  has spent the past 9 years nerding out with his work colleagues about anime during lunch and drawing erotic doujinshi at night so he can masturbate. However  one day  this comfort zone of his is thrown into disarray by the introduction of a new colleague  Yumezora Kuroko  a bespectacled beauty with long  dark hair and a massive chest. It only takes a moment to fall in love  just like how it takes a moment to lose your footing.

Teru is a boy who  haunted by a childhood trauma  sees himself as a loner and avoids human connection. His only joy comes from video games… until a fateful encounter at his usual arcade starts to shake up his quiet world. A heartfelt  88-page  full-length boy-meets-girl story of two awkward souls drawn to each other night after night.

title_en: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu
description: A boy named Ryuuji Aizawa is getting treated by his gyaru classmates like he wasn't there  like this girl named Nana Aino who sits on his seat. With him still in it.  ---  Note:  Released as a free ebook compilation on Amazon under the title: *Aino Nana no Keikaku: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu (愛乃ななの計画 クラスのギャルに空気扱いされています)* "Nana Aino's Plan: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air"; Volume 1 contains chapters 1-24 including some new textless illustrations.  * Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Tranquillity650/status/1721818260436644142)

Living in an unfortunate reality  schoolgirl Tachibana Himeka spends her days in despair... Until one day  out of the blue  she is summoned to another world! As she finally finds hope in being able to start anew  the reason she's given for being summoned is... to be the body pillow of the much too stunning imperial princess pretending to be a prince!?  A story about seeking love and a good night's sleep (?) from the author of "The Anemone Feels the Heat"  Sakuragi Ren!

Our hero  Mo Fan  inherits a magical necklace—the next day  he wakes up to find that the world has changed. His high school now teaches magic  and students are encouraged to try and become accomplished magicians. A world that ran on science now runs on magic. However  some things are still the same. He still has a teacher who sees him as a hopeless student  classmates who look the same  a father who struggles to make ends meet  and a not-by-blood little sister who can't walk on her own. However  Mo Fan discovers that the vast majority of magicians can only harness one element of magic. As luck would have it  however  he is an exception—a versatile mage!  (Source: WebNovel)   ---

Centuries ago  humanity’s natural enemy  Demons  invaded the world and oppressed humankind. The Great Demon Lord and 47 subordinates known as Demon Lords have since dominated the world  while the human race lives on in fear. In desperation  a last-ditch effort for humanity’s very survival is placed in the hands of 47 people gathered from across the world. These heroes will oppose the demon army and win back humanity’s freedom… or die trying!  **Award:** Won the 49th Koudansha Manga Award in the Shounen Division (2025). ___ **Compositor:** [bose](https://mangadex.org/author/aa8eb4f2-d4a2-4c4e-b6e8-2394f3b09b71)  **Alt Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10569/episode/349625) - United States  Japan  Canada  Australia  New Zealand  Singapore  Philippines  Thailand  Vietnam  Hong Kong  Taiwan  India  Mexico  and Brazil only.

(from ebookjapan):  The series has sold over 8.3 million copies! The gold standard of zombie manga  "I Am a Hero " is now available in a "complete edition" with a new cover design  reprinted color pages from the serialization  and over 80 pages of new artwork in the final 22 volumes! Witness the new ending of the story.   He is 35 year old who spends his time as an assistant to a mangaka  sometimes escaping into delusion in order to win over the agonizing reality. One day  however  a mysterious infection begins to spread without him noticing...and the real world begins to break down...⁉   He wanders into a world where the ordinary and the extraordinary  the mundane and the insane intersect. A personal survival panic horror story!   [Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/25-142/I-Am-a-Hero-Omnibus-Volume-1-TPB)  ---   - **Won the 58th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2013**  ---  - Adapted into a Live Action film in 2016. Link to the [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=24660) Page

The story of two foreign men living in Japan.  (from ebookjapan):  Nick  with his stylish hair  and Lever  with his dazzling eyes behind his sunglasses  are a HOT & CRAZY foreign duo who will face any obstacles that come their way!   The genius Kyogoro Miyata  who wastes no time in drawing  unleashes a shocking high-speed manga. Nick and Lever are finally here!

Ibaraki Prefecture ranked worst in Japan for attractiveness.  Ibaraki ranks first in the nation in the number of yankees.  If you get picked on in Ibaraki... your life is over!  Nobue Sarujima  born and raised in Tokyo  moves his family to Bando City  Ibaraki Prefecture  with a grand misunderstanding.  The grand misunderstanding develops into a very big mistake  and he makes a shocking debut as a new student.  City People Meets Ibaraki Prefecture! A local loose-fitting daily comedy that will make you realize the charm of Ibaraki and love Ibaraki more!
Collection of 70s works by Takemiya Keiko. The volume contains:  - Atsumaru Hi - Orphée no Yuigon - Seireki 2763-nen no Douwa - Yoru wa Chinmoku no Toki - Auf Wiedersehen - Alfalfa-kun Funtousu

Baili Jin  a fairy who was living in heaven  eating and drinking without a care  broke her Majesty’s colourful  stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive  the former fairy has to deliver take-out….      An endearingly silly fairy  a gentle restaurant manager  a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside  dark/possessive on the inside)   let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!      Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)    Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)

Earth had been invaded by creatures from another dimension  and it has been a few years since peace was restored  thanks to the help of various supernatural humans that revealed themselves during this invasion. Gwangik Yu  our protagonist  was born between two supernatural parents. His father is an immortal while his mother is a transformer with exceptional physical abilities along with the power to transform into beasts. Neither parent  however  is aware of each spouse’s power and both want Gwangik to follow in their footsteps.

title_en: Watashi wo Koroshita Wankokei Kishi-sama ga  Yandere ni Job Change shite Kyou mo Inochi wo Nerattekuru
description: Tiana's engagement was broken off by the prince of her own country  and she was sentenced to exile. However  the knight of a neighbouring country  who was an aide to that country's prince  suddenly proposed to her. Since he was her type  Tiana accepted the marriage proposal and traveled with him to his country  but what awaited her was an unjust death. However  although she should have died  Tiana finds herself back when her engagement was broken and she was proposed to by the knight!  "Now... Now it's too late... I'll have to kill her."  The last words the knight spoke before killing her lingered in her mind. But Tiana doesn't want to die again! Terrified  she tries to refuse the marriage proposal  but she can't escape from the knight who has gone completely crazy! A cat-and-mouse rom-com about Tiana  whose memories construe murderous intent  and a knight who refuses to let her escape and gets more and more yandere... ___ [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7132gu/) (R18)
One Shot Manga By Ghostmaya.

In 20XX  the Love Education Law was enacted. "Love" has become a mandatory subject in a response to the declining birthrate. Michitaka Sato  a high school student who has given up on romance and works hard on his studies  is on the verge of failing school. When he attends a supplementary class to avoid repeating a grade  Mai Aihara  a beautiful girl who is a problem child  appears as his partner...? Suddenly  he begins to study love alone with the beautiful girl in the three C's. Close contact  close quarters  and behind closed doors! Does Aihara-san have a secret...?

A prequel to the Saki series  focusing on Shino Shiratsuki  a young girl with an affinity for the 1-sou who is seeking out her missing mother. Future professional mahjong players like Hayari Mizuhara  Harue Akado and others are also featured.

An isekai series from the creator of Hellsing. The story of Drifters begins during Japan's Sengoku Period (~1467-1600)  a time of constant warring between the island's states. A samurai on the verge of death suddenly finds himself thrown into another  fantastic world  alongside important military figures from history. It's time to battle in a brand-new world war.

In Animal Town  humans and animals live together. Iroha is a young girl who loves animals and her close companion is her dog Komugi! One day  a mysterious creature GaruGaru goes berserk in the city. In order to protect Iroha  Komugi transforms into a human and not just any human  a Pretty Cure! These two Pretty Cures join forces to protect the berserk animals and return them to the Niko Garden.  (Source: Toei Animation USA)

title_en: Maou ni Natta node  Dungeon Tsukutte Jingai Musume to Honobono Suru
description: Before I realized  I had become the guardian of a dungeon  a Demon Lord. I was suddenly in a dangerous world with giant monsters loitering around  fighting for their existence. So I thought to go about developing the dungeon in order to not die  but for some reason I was having quite the good time... How did it turn out like this?      The protagonist  Yuki  having to live in that world now  uses his bold and sharp senses and spends time with a supreme dragon girl and a vampire girl  sometimes laughing  sometimes being angry  passing days doing what he likes.

Kuroko is a member from the legendary middle school basketball team known as -The Generation of Miracles-  and while nobody seems to know about him  the main 5 players of the team all admit that he is a better player. When he joins the high school basketball team  everyone is surprised to find out that he is small  weak  and easy to miss. What is the secret that makes him so strong  and how will he help his high school team?  Official Release: - Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Kuroko's Basketball** (2013)

After saving Earth  aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto  a factory worker with an abusive alien boss  one day meets Kitami  who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship  but one day Kitami does the unthinkable...  (MANGA Plus)
Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.

The year is 20XX... A time when every household owns cute maid robots known as OrderMaids. Average grade-schooler Bondo dreams of having his very own robot. But what he got was... Unable to compute!!! Life is gonna get a whole lot weirder when Roboco  the most powerful clumsy maid ever created  shows up at his door!

Tamako comes for an interview at a ramen shop run only by cats  with no humans. The cat manager asks her if she likes cats  and when Tamako honestly says she is a dog person  she is easily hired. However  her job is not to run a ramen shop  but to look after cats...?

title_en: Project SEKAI COLORFUL STAGE! feat. Hatsune Miku Comic Anthology
description: Now  to the story of finding your true feelings...  The popular game "Project Sekai Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku"'s first comic anthology!  The world of 'Proseka' is expanding with this all-new comic book.  Each unit's daily life is presented in a large volume!

Morihito  a boy with the strength of an ogre  is about to start living together with his childhood friend Niko  who is training to be a witch. Niko's magic leads to all sorts of unpredictable trouble  and with two teens under one roof...

Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling  where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical Japanese entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test  Akane takes her own steps into this unique world!

Yusei Matsui  creator of Assassination Classroom and Neuro: Supernatural Detective  is back! Set in feudal Japan in between the Kamakura and Muromachi periods  our hero Hojo Tokiyuki is a boy on the run that history all but forgot! When the Kamakura shogunate is overthrown by Ashikaga Takauji  Tokiyuki's family and standing are visciously taken away from him  and he must flee to the far reaches of the land to survive and seek out his revenge!

Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin  feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day... he fell in love! Retirement  marriage  fatherhood and then... Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger?

title_en: Once Upon the Gates of Hell
description: There are four Magic Divisions in the military giant that is the Kingdom of Hiraith. The First Magic Division is the elite of the royal guard  the Second Magic Division is the field combat unit  the Third Magic Division is the research and development organization for magic and magical tools  and the Fourth Magic Division consists of those who have other unique skillsets. Among them  Levi was the most unusual  being a sorcerer incapable of using magic and having nothing he wanted to accomplish. In the midst of his days of mere subsistence and despair  Levi meets Prince Saphir  the 13th prince  who is known as the Moribund Prince. Levi  16 years old  and 6-year old Saphir...it was a fateful encounter! In a royal palace full of malice  the two of them discover human warmth for the first time...

Lately  Kouhei can't get his friend Kurara out of his mind. Even though he has known her since elementary school  all of a sudden  ever since she came back from summer vacation  he has been crushing on her… hard.      But something is different about Kurara–she's acting very oddly. Sometimes she seems wholesome  pure  and innocent  and at other times she is extremely forward and unabashed. Kouhei soon learns that Kurara has multiple personalities–and decides to help her keep her secret from their classmates. But Kouhei finds himself struggling between helping Kurara as a friend and trying to win her heart… which is a challenge  since she has many!    ---    English OOP from Del Rey ISBN for those who maybe interested in supporting the author.   Vol 01: 9780345486219   Vol 02: 9780345486226   Vol 03: 9780345486233   Vol 04: 9780345486790   Vol 05: 9780345492326

Jouichirou Shishido  a 19-year-old man whose frank honesty has cost him 26 part-time jobs. One night  he runs into a group of muscular bodyguards who protect the streets at night  members of a private security firm known as “Tokyo Fist”  which ends up changing his life. ___ **Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/bouncer-tokyo-fist)

Shin is a high school girl whose hobby is quietly uploading her original songs to the internet. When an unexpected character responds to one of her songs  her blinded youth suddenly picks up with a boom!
A humorous 4-koma series about the daily activities of the Seraph Squadron that helps us to know a bit more about their personalities and outlook on life.

"Minimum" or "minor miracle"? special hereditary powers discovered only in an extremely limited number of humans. Those who possess such powers are known as "Minimum Holders."      Partners Nice (Ryota Ohsaka) and Murasaki (Wataru Hatano) form a detective agency called "Hamatora" in Yokohama in 2014 ? but their "office" is a table at Cafe Nowhere where they and their friends wait for clients. An old acquaintance of theirs  a cop named Art (Hiroshi Kamiya)  hires them for a serial murder case he is investigating  and they discover that the murder victims are all "Minimum Holders." As Minimum Holders themselves  Nice and Murasaki are drawn into this case  whether they like it or not.      [See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15752)

Marie  a sparkling university student who craves validation  takes up a part-time job at a concept cafe for their uniforms. There  she meets Akira  a spontaneous and unpredictable person. Their meeting sets off a chain of events that changes Marie's life  and they end up spending time together as...accomplices!? An overdose of desire begins in the neon-glowing sleepless city!!

title_en: Rookie Chef with the Magic Touch
description: Kang Sunghoon  the youngest member of a 4 star hotel kitchen in Korea  has the ability to memorise different kinds of ingredients. However  as the youngest  he's still unable to escape dishwashing duty.

title_en: Fights Break Sphere – Return of the Beasts
description: The demonic race from outer territories have invaded The Great Thousand Worlds once again  The Ruler Mu Chen  Martial arts godfather Lin Dong  Flame emperor Xiao Yan and other strong ones fight to the death in order to protect billions of lives.      While also at this time  Godly Beast continent is shrouded in the shadow of war. Ministers plotting for power while the Ape King was assassinated. The youngster Lu Zhun that wandered for three years has returned to Dong Chuan  the territory of the Ape race.      Lu Zhun  a member of the Ape race  will he be able to uncover the truth behind his father’s death  can he seize the throne that's rightfully his? Can he become the True Emperor of the Godly beast race!?

The manga details the adventures of the Skull Force  a special forces team affiliated with WSO composed of several members including the Death Caprice Squad composed of Ken Kaido and Ryo Magami  a pair of pilots personally selected to pilot the Mazinkaizer SKL a powerful battle robot that many other pilots failed to control.

title_en: Kotowarenai Kaichou wa Tomoe-kun ni Dake shite Agetai
description: The student council president  who is big in all sorts of ways  can't refuse when asked to do something. She tries her best to do whatever it takes to help the students  so Vice President Tomoe-kun stops her from going too far. But all she wants is to be asked for a naughty request from Tomoe-kun...
A spin-off of Sakigake!! Otokojuku focusing on Akashi Gouji.

A formerly unsuccessful idol turned vagrant  Sumire-chan (31). A vanquished survivor of the cutthroat competition in the showbiz world  with her mind and body both beaten by the struggle  she now lives in a run-down apartment where she spends her days lazing around  for the time being.  Her cousin Yuusei  a first-year highschooler  has been keeping an eye on her and comes to her with a proposal for a moneymaking idea.  “You have a nice body  so let's release a doujin gravure photobook.”  Will Sumire-chan actually be able to stage a comeback in the world of the Reiwa era!? Stay tuned!

Sunghoon Lee is nothing but a victim of a changing world  a powerless man in a land infested with beasts and magic. Monsters from another world invaded earth  and they brought with them a sickness that pushes Sunghoon’s mother into an endless sleep. To pay off her medical bills  he braved a dangerous job as bait used by powerful superhumans called Awakeners to hunt monsters. But when he found himself at death’s door  the image of his past life flashes through his mind. There  he found his truth: he is the reincarnation of the Sorcerer King!  --- - [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337) --- - [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)  - [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)  - [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)

title_en: Ushiro no Seki no Gal ni Sukarete Shimatta. - Mou Ore wa Dame kamo Shirenai.
description: What if you find the cutest girl in your class  soaked in ditch? Sandai helped her... and his life changed from that day!  A high-school boy Sandai  who liked to spend his time alone  accidentally helped the most beautiful girl in his class  Shino  when she fell into a ditch near his home. He let her use shower at his home  and lend her some clothes  although he had never talked with her before.  From that day  she started to act like his friend. In fact  she seems to like him... but that can't be! She's the most popular babe in his high school! But what he didn't know was  Shino had never went out with a guy. She was not very good with guys  and Sandai was the first guy she could talk naturally with. As they spend time together  Sandai can't help himself to have special feelings for Shino.  (Source: BookWalker Global)

Once hailed as a soccer prodigy  high school girl Arai Haru transferred to a school far from her hometown  hoping to start a new life away from soccer. However  a new student  Osanai Satsuki  who admired Haru's past glory  appeared before her and declared her intention to join the Soccer Club  which is on the verge of disbandment. This is a girls' soccer story about a girl who gave up her dream and a girl who chases after it! ___ **What is a regista?** The regista is a creative player who operates in front of the defense  almost always in a central position  and looks to get on the ball as often as possible. They are responsible for providing the link between defense and offense  and controlling the tempo of the game through their passing. The regista is also known as the deep-lying playmaker: they retain their deep position and dictate their team's play with their distribution. ([Coaches' Voice](https://www.coachesvoice.com/cv/what-is-a-regista-explained-jorginho-andrea-pirlo/))

To create a paradise where humans and demons can coexist  a human and a demon strive in order to fulfill that dream. This is their story.  --- - [Official Korean Translation](https://www.comico.kr/comic/38)  - [Official Thai Translation](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/85)

title_ja: Kamiyama-san No Kamibukuro No Naka Ni wa
description: On his very first day of starting high school  Namito Kominato's homeroom teacher has him sit behind a strange girl who wears a paper bag over her head and is always soaking wet with sweat. Her name is Samidare Kamiyama  a extremely shy girl with severe social anxiety. Ultimately  she meets Hinata Arai (the student council president who's kind and helpful  but alarmingly obsessed with her uniform) and Harusame Amano (a girl who only speaks to a cardboard cutout of a magical girl). These three unfortunate  but beautiful girls form a "conversation club"  opening the curtain on this somewhat pitiful and comedic tale of adolescent romance!  [Alt official source](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/63800f8c032ad)

Ooyama-kun normally doesn't get involved with Akutsu-san  a delinquent girl in his class  but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place! Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san's sexy  cute behavior in such a confined space... he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home  but he also doesn't?

title_en: Osake to Senpai Kanojo to no Amaama Doukyo Lovecome wa Nijuusai ni Natte kara
description: Living together with a naughty older girlfriend is full of excitement!  “Shall we try living together?”  That was the question my girlfriend Kureha Senpai asked me on the day I turned twenty.  From there  our lovey-dovey cohabitation began  and there’s practically zero distance between us!  Kureha Senpai  who loves alcohol  becomes even more enchanting and seductive once she starts drinking… my reasoning is about to explode!  The two of us  deeply caring for each other  grow bolder in our affection whether we’re drinking at home or out  using every trick in the book to flirt and get closer!  A slightly naughty and pure love comedy about two people who can’t contain their love for each other  living out their exciting days! ___ **Character Designer:** [Monoto](https://mangadex.org/author/96b3bbe2-e878-4dee-9573-26aadbc78b3f)

title_en: Kono Koi  Okuchi ni Aimasu ka? ~Yuutousei no Shirahime-san wa Mondaiji no Ore to Mainichi Kiss shiteru~
description: Nobody even tries to understand me...  I  Toui Kiminami  known as the number one troublemaker in school  have a dream for the future. And for that dream  I don't give a damn about anything else. But one day  everything changes when my father forces me into an arranged marriage. Her name is Lila Shirahime  the most beautiful girl in school and the top student  daughter of a company president and a popular model known as "S-Hime." Everything about her is the complete opposite of me. With a true nature very different from her outward appearance  she gets in the way of my dreams and even threatens to kiss me every single day  taking it upon herself to reform me.  This is bad. I need to do something about her quickly for the sake of my future... But it seems even the seemingly perfect and unbeatable Shirahime has circumstances forcing her to be that way...

Ozu Kotarou (25) recently changed his career from a white collar worker to a high school teacher. His new workplace is at Odawara High School  a girls only school. He starts off his first day by leaving a significant impression on the entire school by announcing that he has no interest in younger girls  especially under age girls. Kotarou is assigned to assist Hara Takako  a fellow teacher  until he gets experience teaching. Hara is a beautiful 32 year old woman but is insecure about being single and is worried about her future. How will the relationship between these two people develop as they start working closely together?
The Glory Hole

The Iyahaya family  one of Japan's most prominent conglomerates based in Iyahate Prefecture  has decided to take care of a relative named Nantomo while his parents are transferred overseas. Iyahaya Sayoko can't help but be curious about her relative's boy of the same age. What kind of boy is this eccentric Nantomo?  In the meantime  a boy in a tattered coat appears before Sayoko's eyes  a poorly dressed eccentric person who eats their dog's food. When she asked him what his name was  he said  "Iyahaya Nantomo (Oh no... Not at all...)"  how unclear. Sayoko and her grandmother hurriedly invited him into their house  convinced that he was their relative  Nantomo.  Even though he is not Nantomo  the head of the Iyahaya family  Totetsumo  decides to keep the poor  mysterious boy as the Nantomo and sends him to Kenkin school  the same school as Sayoko.  The school is in the state of Cold War between the Hatesate family conglomerate and the Iyahaya family conglomerate. With the arrival of Nantomo  the school is dragged into a great explosion of madness.

title_en: Akuyaku Reijou Level 99 ~Watashi wa UraBoss desu ga Maou de wa Arimasen~
description: I reincarnated as the "Villainess Eumiella" from an RPG Otome game. In the main story  Eumiella is merely a side character  but after the ending  she re-enters the story as the Hidden Boss  a character boasting high stats on par with the heroes! Lighting a fire in my gamer's soul  and taking advantage of being left on my own in my parent's territory  I trained  trained  and trained! As a result of my training... by the time I enrolled in the academy  I managed to reach level 99. Though I had planned to live out my days as inconspicuously and peacefully as possible  soon after entering the school  I'm suspected by the Heroine and Love Interests of being the "Demon Lord"...? ___ **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/46067)

title_en: Mujintou de Elf to Kyoudou Seikatsu
description: Kento (30 years old)  won 1 billion yen in a lottery. In order to enjoy a nice slow life for the rest of his days  he bought a small uninhabited island off the coast of Southern Japan. However  one day he finds an unconscious woman on his beach that should not be there. When he runs up to check on her  he notices some rather sharp edges... The behaviors Elize brought from the other world are a little bit exciting for a normal guy like Kento... ___ **Links:** - [WebNovel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3587dx)

Say hello to Daichi  a.k.a. Mr. Harmless. Because of his compulsive need to be liked  he never makes waves and maintains an easy going attitude. So easy going  everyone thinks he's a dud. But online he's a stud! His angry otaku online persona has garnered him thousands of followers! But real life and online life are two very different things. A lesson he's going to learn the hard way! ___ Included one-shots: - Volume 2: [Haru yo  Koi!: Fuyu-hen  Haru-hen](https://mangadex.org/title/0de39efd-86b2-4738-85ba-95c0ab402a0e) - Volume 3: [Gachipin.](https://mangadex.org/title/72cb65db-2d4a-4302-b5fa-6469aa852dde) - Volume 4: [Gesu no Ongaeshi](https://mangadex.org/title/04d257a1-1e57-4f3d-934d-113b1834b2df/)

The communicative  corporate animal Kei Sato applies to move into a share house in order to make friends with whom he can have casual conversations. The three people there were Chiyuki Himiiyama (Snow Woman)  Meme Janome (Medusa) and Melodrama Incuria (Incubus). This was a share house exclusively for subhumans  who were supposed to be invisible to humans...  The share house life begins with a lot of difficulties ahead!  (Source: Mangaupdates)

title_en: Konoyo no Hate no Seireigoroshi ~Party wo Tsuihou Sareta Boukensha  Densetsu no Ryuusei to Keiyakushite Saikyou ni Itaru~
description: "Spirit Contract" is the ability to make a contract with a powerful spirit and receive its divine protection. However  Kyle  who possesses a strange and "mysterious flame " accidentally burns a spirit to death and is banished from his party. Filled with despair  Kyle begins the journey back to his hometown. Along the way  he comes across a girl being attacked by a monster. He tries to help  but without a "Spirit Contract " he is too powerless... Just when things seem hopeless  the girl suddenly reveals her true identity. She is a legendary "Dragon Spirit"?!

title_en: Kyuutei Kajishi no Shiawase na Nichijou: Black na Shokuba wo Tsuihou Saretaga  Ringoku de Koushaku Reijou ni Dekiaisarenagara White na Seikatsu Okurimasu
description: A popular slow life romantic comedy!  Fake  a court blacksmith who is very serious about his work  was bullied every day by his colleagues and boss.  Fake  who worked hard on blacksmithing no matter how much he was bullied  suddenly gets picked up as the fiancé of the daughter of the Duke of the neighboring country  Alicia!? He is provided an environment where he can work freely and demonstrate his talent.

Umika is a very shy girl who has always been very bad at communicating with others. Over time she gave up on making any friends  until one day she meets the transfer student Yuu. Yuu claims to be an alien with the power of "Foreheadelepathy" - being able to read people's emotions by pressing her forehead to theirs.

tags: Psychological|Long Strip|Romance|Sexual Violence|Girls' Love|Drama|School Life|Delinquents|Web Comic|Full Color
description: "If you don't want your fake identity exposed to the world  then complete my seven little demands  Qi ChaoYue." [Dominant Sadistic Queen True Heiress X Submissive Masochistic Tsundere Fake Heiress] Despite how much she hates these outrageous demands  her body seems to be falling deeper into this world...

It's been a few months since the neighborhood Chinese restaurant closed down  and when I stopped by for the first time in a while  I found that it had been transformed into a flashy  mysterious restaurant with its old signboard still intact. When I went inside  there was a gal there...

title_en: Sachiiro no One Room Gaiden - Seikai no Meitantei
description: This is the story of Detective Matsubase three years before he fatefully meets xxx.  Hijiri Matsubase finally quits the police force and fulfills his dream of running his own detective agency. However  life isn't smooth sailing as it seems and the poor guy is in massive debt after getting scammed. Luckily  or unluckily for Matsubase… Aketoyo  the son of a billionaire reaches out to him for a deal. "Entertain me  I'll pay you $100 000 per case." A deal with the devil can be oh so enticing.   (source: AOC Translations)

Mumyeong Heo’s grandmother passed away years ago. But when he visits her home to spend some time in the quiet countryside  he notices that someone kept it clean all this time. His new neighbors aren’t exactly thrilled by his visit. In fact  most of them don’t want him around. But that’s when his nasty neighbors go missing one by one… for better or worse.

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Drama|School Life|Slice of Life|Cooking|Full Color
description: The classmate she's crushing on is secretly a butler at a butler cafe?! To win him over  Bang Gowoon is serving up desserts at 999% sweetness in her all-out effort to capture his heart. A sweet and fluffy romantic comedy about fresh love and even fresher desserts.

title_en: Yuusha Party wo Kubi ni Natta node Kokyou ni Kaettara  Member Zenin ga Tsuite Kitan da ga
description: "Jin... I'm expelling you from the party."  Jin had been adventuring with his childhood friend  Reki the Hero  aiming to defeat the Demon Lord. Along the way  they were joined by Yuuri the Saint and Ryushika the Sage  and at last  they reached the Demon Lord's castle. However  just before the final battle  Jin was suddenly told he was no longer part of the party. Heartbroken  Jin returned to his hometown... But soon after  the remaining party members—who swiftly defeated the Demon Lord—began showing up one after another with marriage proposals!?

On my 8th grade summer break   I arrived at my grandma’s house to find it turned into a daycare? A tone-deaf mermaid  a timid zombie a hectic daily life as I take care of these monsters with unique traits. Although  I can’t seem to get used to this job  I’ll try my best! A cute and heartwarming monster-daycare comedy!

title_en: Saikyou no Shounen Seikishi  Tenseisha o Karu
description: The Reincarnated are beings that threaten to break the peace of the world. Blessed with the transcendent power of cheat-like skills  they rampage freely  doing as they please.   A young boy  Rai Conwell  lost his family and everything he had when a reincarnated burned his village down. Drowning in despair  he swore vengeance  "I will never forgive the reincarnated."   Years later  after undergoing relentless training  Rai becomes a Purge Knight  a warrior specialized in hunting down the reincarnated. With swordsmanship and physical prowess that surpass even their cheats  he completely overwhelms them.

title_en: Saikyou Kizoku wa Shibou Flag wo Kutsugaesu
description: High school student Namiki Hiroto found himself possessing  "Zeke Lagias" a character from "Wish Soul"  a game that he had played many times. Zeke is the worst villain in the game  and no matter which route you take  he's a character whose death is certain... In order to survive  he tried fixing his personality  but he can only speak like a villain?!  "...If I really can't avoid making villain-like moves  then I just have to get stronger to survive!!"

Miho is a gearhead  Hiroshi is her brother and Keisuke is a teacher. But one thing they have in common is that they're in love with cars and racing! So when rumors begin that the famous king of touge racing has returned  Miho and the others are determined to do whatever it takes to take the crown!

Kamino Tatari  known as Tatari-chan  gets bullied everyday for her appearance and behavior  however  she has strange magical powers that help her in her daily life...  Note: Kamino Tatari is pronounced the same way as 神のたたり which means "God's Curse".  Her classmate  Noroi Kakeru's name is pronounced the same as "Put a curse on"

tags: Long Strip|Comedy|Isekai|Fantasy|Monster Girls|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: She was once a proud elf adventurer from a mystical realm. Now? She's a tired convenience store clerk addicted to gacha games  anime  and Coca-Cola Zero. Trapped in modern Japan with no way back  our cute-yet-pathetic elf isekai’d straight into a life of minimum wage  follow Elf-san as she navigates the absurdity of otaku life  retail hell  and existential dread—with some unexpected moments of drama slapping her in the face like a surprise SSR pull.
A girl who calls herself the Demon Lord falls upon the main character  an elementary school teacher living in the countryside  and they decide to get married?!

Kuramochi Sakurako has become totally sophisticated since her high school debut. However  deep down inside  she still bears the scars of being dumped by a girl she used to like. One day after school  while walking downtown  Sakurako bumps into a random high school girl who turns out to be the very same girl who dumped her in the past! What's more  for some reason  that girl doesn't recognize her and falls in love with her at first sight and asked if they could meet again. Sakurako is furious at that girl for trying to pick her up based only on her appearance and comes up with a plan to get revenge...!
