This is an youthful revenge romcom where Sakurako disciplines a spoiled dog and is twice as delicious with both candy and a whip!

title_en: The Case of Selecting a Joseon Queen
description: Eul  the most eligible bachelor in Joseon  was ordered by the king to investigate five noble young women who had not submitted their names for the royal selection process. To find a suitable queen among them  he made a deal with Seo-gyeong  the most skilled apa (a woman who sells goods to the royal court)  and they began their journey to find a queen  disguised as a married couple…

title_en: I Look Too Much Like the Boss and the World Actually Believes It
description: Moon king  Su Liang! The invincible youth who commands the Moon God Flash Butterfly—a divine entity capable of rewinding time and reversing the laws of yin and yang—to reign supreme over this world! To think I’d transmigrate here and get handed such an overpowered identity card… a heavenly golden finger from the start  right? WRONG! The beast inside me isn’t the legendary Moon God Flash Butterfly at all! It’s just the lowest-tier  weakest Flash Butterfly… a glorified glowstick with wings!  Now  staring down millions of fanatical devotees  a three-year deathmatch with the Cang Yue Emperor  and every major sect plotting my demise… This is… an unprecedented crisis for a weak beast tamer like me!

title_en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?
description: A story about 28-year-old salaryman Haru Ikeda and his new girlfriend Taya.

title_en: Watashi no Hatsukoi wa Hazukashisugite Darenimo Ienai
description: Chiaki is handsome  academically gifted  athletic  and born into a wealthy family with a beautiful sister. Despite his seemingly perfect life  he faces a persistent problem: he's never been lucky in love and struggles to capture the attention of girls. Determined to turn things around in high school  he wakes up one morning to a surprising transformation—he has turned into a girl!  He is shocked to find out that he has lost the appearance he was so proud of  but when he looks in the mirror  he sees a very cute girl in the reflection. He immediately goes to show it off to his twin sister Kaede  who happens to be very popular with the girls  but there is also something very strange happening to her...  (Source: Kadokawa  translated)

title_en: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kinden - Kamigami no Apocalypse
description: Zeus  supreme chairman of the Council of Valhalla  announces to the gods twelve of the thirteen fighters set to participate in Ragnarok--and is met with the dissenting voices of those who were not chosen. However  Zeus has foreseen this  and immediately declares the holding of another tournament to decide the final spot on the Ragnarok lineup  one which will break the taboo on gods fighting one another.

*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*  From oldest to youngest  there's **Nadeshiko**  the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**  the silly  lazy  and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**  the intelligent and mature elementary schooler!   This story focuses on these three sisters  their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!

tags: Monsters|Action|Long Strip|Comedy|Survival|Martial Arts|Adventure|Virtual Reality|Video Games|Magic|Wuxia|Isekai|Drama|Fantasy|Web Comic|Adaptation|Full Color
description: Large numbers of monsters come out the gate which is the boundary of the world. After many sacrifices  People won the fight against monsters through their awakening. Jin Taekyung is alive as an 'F class hunter' which is the lowest level. After Jin has a hard time  he gets an old capsule then he goes into the capsule that is the martial heroes' world. And the game system gives him special abilities  he starts growing up to become the best martial hero.    --- - [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A1%9C%EA%B7%B8%EC%9D%B8-%EB%AC%B4%EB%A6%BC/2384) --- - [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/11042/)  - [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/55123)

Kobayashi lives alone in an apartment  until one day  Tooru appears and they end up living together. Tooru looks down on humans as inferior and foolish  but having been saved by Kobayashi-san  she does everything she can to repay the debt and help her with various things  although not everything goes according to plan.

The manga centers on Poro  a demon from the underworld who comes to the human world.      As a part of the JUMP START initiative  the first three chapters of Poro's Foreign Exchange Records were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.

title_en: Ore Igai Dare mo Saishu Dekinai Sozai na no ni "Sozai Saishuritsu ga Hikui" to Pawahara suru Osananajimi Renkinjutsushi to Zetsuen shita Senzoku Madoushi  Henkyou no Machi de Slow Life wo Okuritai.
description: Lloyd  the assistant mage of the genius alchemist Ruby  has an abnormally low chance of gathering materials for alchemy use. Hence  he is treated as baggage and is made to be the bottom of the entire country's joke. Everyday is a day he is scolded by Ruby. It's become too much of a despairing environment that he's come to hate it. And so  he finally decided to part ways with her. However  unbeknownst to everyone was that the materials Lloyd gathered were all high-grade materials no one else could gather. The mage  who was treated as "incompetent" and saw himself as such  now aims for an ideal easygoing life!

title_en: Majo Taisen - 32-nin no Isai no Majo wa Koroshiau
description: Joan of Arc  the hero who saved France  was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death  a demon sent her to another world. There  she found 32 women from across history  known as "witches". ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0171) **Official English Volumes:** [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/the-war-of-greedy-witches)

"To end his eternal suffering  he must slay one thousand enemies!" Manji  a ronin warrior of feudal Japan  has been cursed with immortality. To rid himself of this curse and end his life of misery  he must slay one thousand evil men! His quest begins when a young girl seeks his help in taking revenge on her parents' killers… and his quest won't end until the blood of a thousand has spilled!    [Official English](https://digital.darkhorse.com/series/373/blade-of-the-immortal)   ---  - **Won the 1st Japan Media Arts Award Division Excellence Prize**  ---    AnimeNewsNetwork Links:   [Anime](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=9691)   [Live-Action Movie](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18861)

title_en: Fuufu no Hiketsu wa Banshaku Desu
description: After six years of marriage  this hardworking couple barely sees each other due to mismatched work schedules. Despite their busy lives  they've found the ultimate secret to keeping their love alive  late-night drinks together! From sharing a quiet toast to getting a little too tipsy  their drunken heart-to-hearts keep their bond strong and their passion burning. Can a little alcohol be the cure for a fading spark?

The elixir  a magical drug that instantly heals any wound. What if this elixir of legends and fairy tales were real? Dasha  a female knight who has retired for some reason  and Moimir  a charming pharmacist. After a chance encounter  the two hit it off for the elixir and plunge into the stormy seas of adventure. A retired knight and an active pharmacist are on a quest for the wonder drug!

For as long as he remembers  Komi has been shorter than his fellow classmates. He always felt inferior as a result  until he met Obinata - a girl who is head and shoulders above him. Yes  Asumi Obinata is tall. She's imposing. But she's also Komi Amane's girlfriend. And these two are the happiest kids in the world.
Hiiragi-san is a single woman who is exhausted from work and life. No matter how depressed she is  she always ends up hungry.

Chen Fan  who was rejected by 999 girls after confessing his love  surprisingly succeeded on his 1000th attempt! What's more  the 999 girls who had previously turned him down came back to chase after him  creating the ultimate harem chaos!

The story is set in the modern world  but there exist doors that can take people to the "other side " where strange urban legends and internet stories prove to be true. College student Sorawo Kamikoshi finds herself exploring one of these doors  and almost dies on the other side  when she is rescued by another girl named Toriko Nishina. Toriko is a mysterious girl  but very skilled with a gun  and she seems to be searching for someone else on the other side. Together  both girls start to explore these doors to the other side.

The original story which the popular manga series Horimiya is based on.      It's said that youth is bittersweet  but maybe it's just bitter? Kyoko Hori is a flashy high school girl  who  despite her ostentatious appearance  excels in academics and loves her family. Izumi Miyamura is a bland high school boy  who  regardless of not wanting to stand out in class  secretly wears piercings outside of school and has a large body tattoo. One day  Miyamura finds Hori's little brother injured and helps him back to Hori's house  where the relationship between Hori and Miyamura begins with Hori's discovery of Miyamura's secret  and his of her's.        ---

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends  when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there. ___ - **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013** - **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12  2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**  Parution: Weekly Young Jump ___ **Officially Translated:**   - In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)   - In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
Comic Commission by   Dejimon11   Art by Majinunicorn99  Story Dejimon  Script  Lorenzo \  https://bsky.app/profile/lorenzohall.com

title_en: The Regressed Mercenary Has a Plan
description: Cecil Perdium  the Mercenary King  was killed in battle before he could avenge his family. As he faces death  he learns that Duke Delphine  the man who caused the downfall of his family  didn't work alone.   Suddenly waking up as his teenage self  Cecil must work to both overcome his poor reputation and build up his strength to save his family. With their soldiers and knights defecting due to the harsh conditions they must endure  he has his work cut out for him.   Can Cecil become the mighty warrior he once was and avert his family's fate?

title_en: Mythical Invasion: I Slay Gods on Earth
description: The descent of the deities had ushered the invasion of Earth  eventually leading to the collapse of human civilisation! Guardian Deity Lin Fang has returned back to three months before the descent of the deities. In this life  he must lead humanity  charged with the might of the nation  to wage war against the deities!

With the rising tide of steam power and machinery  who can come close to being a Beyonder? Shrouded in the fog of history and darkness  who or what is the lurking evil that murmurs into our ears?  Waking up to be faced with a string of mysteries  Zhou Mingrui finds himself reincarnated as Klein Moretti in an alternate Victorian era world where he sees a world filled with machinery  cannons  dreadnoughts  airships  difference machines  as well as Potions  Divination  Hexes  Tarot Cards  Sealed Artifacts…  The Light continues to shine but mystery has never gone far. Follow Klein as he finds himself entangled with the Churches of the world—both orthodox and unorthodox—while he slowly develops newfound powers thanks to the Beyonder potions.  Like the corresponding tarot card  The Fool  which is numbered 0—a number of unlimited potential—this is the legend of "**The Fool**."  ---  **Updated Monthly**: 1st & 15th

Wanderer  imposing  somewhere in the vast void of space  Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being  where the best scientists  warriors  explorers and engineers of the galaxy live. Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.

Genjou is a monk on his way to Tenjiku (early East Asian name for India). Along the way  he happens to visit a house and meets an old couple. The couple has an adopted son  Taro Yamada  and they ask Genjou to rehabilitate Taro who makes trouble with his magical powers. Genjou takes Taro and travels with him to Tenjiku.

Rinne Miki is a normal first year's high school girl who loves fashion and is close with her friends. But  she has a caring personality too  so though she has opposite-sex friends  that never became romantic  and she lived her life without romance. But  on the day of the school festival  she meets Toma  a boy with a slightly mysterious atmosphere to him... though she's bewildered by how aggressively the younger boy approaches here  gradually  she starts to see him as...?

title_en: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi
tags: Award Winning|Romance|Comedy|Office Workers|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair  but he always has her back  he always keeps her company  and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…  Won 1st place in the 2018 Next Manga Awards Web Category. ___ +++ Difference to volumes Pixiv/Twitter (Web) to volume mapping: | Web Ch. | Volume Ch. | Change | Difference  | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | | 64 | v.4 64 | | 0 | | 65 | v.4 64.5 | - | 1 | | 66 | v.4 65 |  | 1 | | 79 | v.4 77.5 | - | 2 | | 146.5 | v. 5. 145 | + | 1 | | 149.5 | v. 8 149 | + | 0 | | 150.5 | v. 8 151 | + | 1 | | 153.5 | v. 8 155 | + | 2 | | 154.5 | v. 8 157 | + | 3 | +++

A dark comedy for the modern era  from CoroCoro Comic!  Enter Black  the "Demonic Yo-Tuber"! With his sidekick Camera-chan  and the aspiring 5th grade Yo-Tuber Satoshi  he makes all kinds of crazy videos using his demonic powers. Filming the "true natures" of anyone from top honor students  to class idols  to supernatural monsters  he makes crazy videos with his demonic powers! What will Black film next...?
The beloved girlfriend he thought he had broken up with is somehow at his house. But she’s hiding a secret...

Six fantastic tales from classic Japanese literature as interpreted by horror manga master Hideshi Hino. The narrative power of these tales  and in particular the frightening scenery of Rashomon  has inspired  and continues to inspire  artists from the most diverse disciplines of art such as the celebrated writer Ryunosuke Akutagawa and the great director Akira Kurosawa. "The Demon of Rashomon" represents one of the pinnacles of auteur manga capable of combining two seemingly irreconcilable elements: the formal sophistication of traditional Japanese storytelling and the violence of the horror genre.

For Youta  Maiko is the goddess who fills the void in his lonely soul. What he doesn’t realize is that she has other plans for him. Sex without affection. An unrequited love. A suspenseful story of both pure and immoral love.

Rin and his exorcist classmates are caught in a secret war against the forces of darkness. Raised by Father Fujimoto  a famous exorcist  Rin Okumura never knew his real father. One day a fateful argument with Father Fujimoto forces Rin to face a terrible truth—the blood of the demon lord Satan runs in Rin’s veins! Rin swears to defeat Satan  but doing that means entering the mysterious True Cross Academy and becoming an exorcist himself.

Patalliro is the story of the young boy king Patalliro and his many misadventures as he avoids being assassinated by various beautiful boys thanks to the skills of his bodyguard  Major Jack Bancoran from England's Information Bureau.  Later they're joined by the hot-blooded Maraich  and a beautiful love-and-hate relationship blossoms between him and Bancoran.

She throws out the jokes  and I can’t help but be the straight man. An after-school rom-com filled with emotion and laughs!  “Machino-san from the swim team always drops by the Domino Club's room  where I’m the only member  before her practice starts. She constantly fires off jokes in a sketch-style conversation  and I can’t help but fire back. Back-and-forth banter  teasing words. Conversations full of nonsense... and maybe something more. Every day passed in a flash  yet those summer days felt like they could last forever in that clubroom. But when this summer ends  the dominoes between us will all begin to fall  at once.”  “Why did you suddenly start narrating a light-novel-style summary  Machino-san?”

Amu  a robot built to assist humans in their day-to-day lives  faces the cold and irrational reality of human nature when it begins to develop emotions that shouldn't exist in its programming.  A cruel and sad dark fantasy.

Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation  he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison  but instead of killing him  the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret  Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro  who is a private detective.

A story about the twisted entanglement between a depressed  shut-in  have-been mangaka  and another best-seller  Super Darling mangaka. This is an independent manga done by Eno Sumi (After God) under the alias of Hanae Deki (英恵 溺).

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Drama|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: He has the absolute power. He kills without hesitation and is a cold  fickle man. Yet he becomes obsessed with her and dotes on her nonstop.      The first time they met  he asked  “Was it you  six years ago?”      The second time they met  he’s holding onto the DNA test  “You still dare to say he’s not my son?”      The n time they met  “Mr. Duke  do you have an end to this?”   The guy smiled with a deep charm  “The second child have yet to be born. Of course  there’s no end to this.”

In the summer of his second year of high school  Yuushin Tahara finds that his childhood friend  Miyu Fukagawa  who had moved away  has returned to the house next door. Although Miyu has grown up to be quite cute  there's something a little strange about her…

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Drama|School Life|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: "It may be hazy blue  but that's alright"  Taking place a year after the epilogue of Seasons of Blossom  this story focuses on the new opening of “Cafe Blossom and NEMONE Atelier” as well as Bomi’s new classmate “Pureum” as they explore a new found youth.   Campus romance  after school romance  office romance  it has it all.    The heartwarming series is back with another youthful story!

"Be my ideal girl..."  It's been two months since childhood friends  Yuuka and Kouta  started dating. However  due to their inexperience  their "first time" together doesn't go as planned. Enter Kouta's younger sister  determined to ensure the couple's happiness... No matter the cost... A boy  a girl  and his younger sister...

title_en: May I Ask for One Final Thing?
description: The engagement between Scarlet  a noblewoman from a ducal family  and Second Prince Kyle was suddenly annulled during a ball.  She had been falsely accused of harassing a girl called Terenezza  daughter to a baron  whom the Prince doted on heavily.  Condemned by everyone around her and forced to burden all manner of crimes  she finally decided enough was enough.      “Before I leave here  may I please ask you just one last thing?”      As the crowd threw their boos and jeers  and that good looking guy flung his insults──  her palm spun like a drill and the ballroom floor was stained with blood. From her fists  their reckoning!

title_en: A Revenge Guide for the Terminally Ill Maid
description: Framed for a crime she didn’t commit  Isabel died leaving behind her little daughter. 10 years later  she awakens in another woman’s body  with only one year left to live.  But the world she returns to is even crueler. Her daughter is now married to the very man who murdered her  all in the name of revenge.  With just one year  Isabel must find a way to save her daughter  no matter the cost.

title_en: Yuusha to Yobareta Nochi ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru
description: In a world where humans and demons clash  the one who decimated the Demon Lord's army was a lone hero named Lloyd. Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike  after the war  Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore  he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land  which he quickly defeated. However  the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd's companion!?

title_en: Soredemo Ashita mo Kareshi ga Ii
description: Kouhei and Mako are a couple deeply in love  but Kouhei worries about Mako’s reluctance to have sex with him. One day  Mako makes an unexpected proposal…

"Only do good deeds."  Asura follows his late mother's teachings and always strives to do good in life. No matter how much he is bullied  he goes on with a smile  firmly believing that evildoers will receive divine punishment.   Until one day  an ominous old man offers him a key that can open the doors to hell...

In the present day  tower dungeons called Magic Towers have appeared throughout the world.  Takamichi Yoshito is a convenience store clerk. The manager yells at him every day  making his life miserable. Yoshito dreams of making a fortune  and soon after the Magic Towers appear. He becomes a Challenger of the towers  but he has no savings to invest in weapons or equipment  leaving him completely late to the game.  Aiming for a quick turnaround  Yoshito sells his real-life savings and the few items he has in the tower  and buys the [Infinite Revival] skill from a shady merchant. This skill allows him to revive himself within the dungeon. However  [Infinite Revival] had a hidden disadvantage.  When reviving  the user is randomly given a [Death Penalty]  a permanent debuff so strong that once it is applied  the user is no longer able to work as an adventurer. Yoshito despairs over the cursed skill  but his situation changes drastically when he obtains the rare skill [Inversion] in a hidden room of the dungeon.  The skill [Inversion] reversed the heavy negative effects of [Death Penalty]'s permanent debuff caused by Infinite Revival and turned them all into positive stats!

Contrary to her appearance  Hatsuse Sakura is an idiot. Because of her  "honor student looks " she is appointed as the class president. To meet up to everyone's expectations  Sakura tries her hardest  however  for some reason since then Shinokura  who is rumored to be a delinquent  has been starting to approach her? The romance of two awkward people.

Due to work  Tatsu moves back into his parents' house; soon after that  he encounters a young woman who turns out to be Ri-chan  the little girl he used to play together with in his childhood. However  this girl he reunited with has somehow become very different from the cheerful childhood friend in his memories...  ---  Additional Links  Volume/Tankoubon release: * [Comic Beam](https://comicbeam.com/product/322312000115.html) (Publisher) * [Kadokawa Store](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322312000115)

Due to the Gear Expansion  witches who had been friends with the people become unnecessary. Humans  who were afraid of unscientific power  begin a witch hunt… And a human boy who has his beloved witch killed becomes the “Wizard of vengeance”.

Scary stories tend to hide what's truly within an author's heart. What exactly could this truth be  as it comes to light between author and listener...? Frightening yet gentle  eerie yet warm. A new and exciting therapeutic horror story takes the stage!  (Source: MangaPlus)

In a near-future where humanity stands on the edge of extinction  we turn our gaze to the stars. But in the depths of space  a new menace looms—the 'Star Beasts.' To combat these creatures  warriors donning mechanical armor emerge as humanity's last hope.

Ryouma runs a public bathhouse with his grandfather in a seaside town. One day  during his usual routine of running the bathhouse after school  a boy named Reo appears  claiming to be his father's illegitimate son.  (MANGA Plus)
One day  school teachers come as freeloaders to the inn run by his parents!? Kazami Hiro  a high school boy  decides to take care of the inn and his future!?

title_en: Tensei Kusushi wa Isekai o Meguru
description: "Are you in need of drugs effective against villains?" Poisons  aphrodisiacs  wonder drugs  anything. Shin  a mysterious pharmacist whose origin is unknown to everyone  is creating miracles today too with the deluxe medicine he creates.
男子高校生・穂木立雄の前に現れたサキュバス課の新人・ピュア。サキュバス業に自信の持てないピュアだけど、会社からのノルマを達成するためには立雄のＨな願望を叶えることで性的興奮を回収するしかなく!?

title_en: Josou Danshi wa Skirt wo Nugitai!
description: Uichiro  a junior high school boy  harbors a secret he cannot share with his childhood friend  Tama-chan. He has been cross-dressing for her because she has a phobia of men. This is a thrilling yet agonizing comedy about a boy who cross-dresses for the girl he loves!

Rex is a half man half dog. He was created when a drunk old man forced himself on a stray female dog in the street.  Because of his father  Rex has to live his life as a freak rejected by society. So one day he’s gonna find that man  and RAPE him.  --- **Links:** - Alternative Official English - [MANGA Plus Creators](https://medibang.com/mpc/titles/wt2208302035572710014241408/) | [ART street](https://medibang.com/book/xb2005061537310810014241408/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/61917191/series/172665) - Discord - [Server](https://discord.gg/BzQXA4vwXt)

title_en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - Beyond the Celestial Sphere of Stars (Doujinshi)
description: An Umamusume oneshot doujinshi set after the events of Beginning of a New Era. After the Japan Cup  Agnes Tachyon disappeared from Tracen Academy. Months later  Jungle Pocket receives a letter and sets out looking for answers.  ___ **Mod note:** Access for all chapters from this title entry has been disabled due to a content removal request from the author. Chapter entries have been kept for archival purposes  but chapter images can no longer be accessed. You can support the author directly by purchasing the work [here](https://www.postype.com/@umamogu/post/20037004?utm_source=md&utm_campaign=md_official_ver_links).
吾郎の息子・大吾は、才能のなさと二世の重圧から、ドルフィンズをやめていた。だが野球を諦めていた小6の大吾の元へ、一人の転校生が現れる。佐藤寿也の息子と名乗る光の登場で、大吾の野球人生が大きく変わり始め…？

title_en: The cafe worker who is only nice to me

description: This tongue-in-cheek semi-autobiography follows the absurdly gruesome adventures of a lonely boy and his singularly crazed family. His escape from the madness that surrounds him is his collection of pickled animal and human body parts  to which he adds as one family member after another meet with a grotesque and sometimes terrifyingly funny death... (Source: AniList)  Note: there were 37 total chapters published in the magazine  only 16 got collected. It ended in January 1998.

title_en: Mofumofu to Isekai Slow Life wo Mezashimasu!
description: The place where the overworked adolescent man was dropped was a different world. Having been turned into a boy Arito  while playing with monsters  he is led by the old elven man Orst and becomes familiar with the life of the magical forest. ___ * [Original Web Novel](https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/975363136/603153445)   * [Alternative Raw Source](https://rawdevart.com/comic/mofumofu-isekai-slow-life-o-mezashimasu/)

title_en: Kuina: Rise of the All-Girl Harem
description: Kuina is a tough girl with a shitty past and an abusive father she swore to kill. Instead  she gets thrown into a crazy world with a System that makes her level up from bloody battles… and from being with women.  She builds a wild harem of dangerous  seductive  and broken girls  each one giving her power in their own way. Now she has to decide: will she use that power to burn the world down  or learn that maybe love really can beat hate?

A manga about high school kids going through the high and lows of relationships. Watch as they learn a few things about life  love  and sushi while they're at it. ___ **Alt Official English Links:** - [ Kodansha USA](https://kodansha.us/series/tsuredure-children/) - [azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/tsuredure-children)

title_en: Zombie no Afureta Sekai Ore Dake ga Osowarenai
description: Takemura wakes up after falling ill for 3 days and realizes the world has been overrun by zombies  but for some strange reason  he's not being attacked by them! What will he do now with this great power he has? ___ **Character Designer:** [Saburou](https://mangadex.org/author/9db8b2d0-08d1-46a7-be91-a0277faf1b70)

Chen Li works at Mo city  he works there every day with no hope to be seen for the future… until one night. Chen Li obtains a special ability  an ability to buy “Time” and “Lifespan” from people  sell “Time” and “Lifespan” and also let things speed up “Time leap” and slow down “exhaustion time”. So he begins to build a top-class “Lifespan club”!  --- Alt. Official English: [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/3792-eternal-club) [Mangatoon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/eternal-club?content_id=2907349) [Webcomics](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/Eternal-Club/660525488c252b58163a77ad) [Webnovel](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/eternal-club_30193712705829601)
The story follows Tachibana Misaki  a 15-year-old girl who's bullied at school. In her quest to become stronger  she decides to enter the delinquent path  aiming for a shinny tomorrow.

Vampires exist. It is the duty of Hellsing  an organization sponsored by the British government  to hide that frightening fact and protect the blissfully unaware populace. Along with its own personal army  Hellsing also has a few secret weapons. Alucard  an incredibly powerful vampire  has been controlled by Hellsing for years. Although he dislikes being a servant to the Hellsing family  he certainly enjoys his job as Hellsing's vampire exterminator. Seras is a fledgling vampire and a former police woman. Although reluctant to embrace her new self  she is still a valuable member of the organisation. Integra Hellsing  the current leader  is usually fully capable of fulfilling her duty  but lately  vampire activity has been on the rise. Unfortunately  the cause is more alarming than anything she could have imagined. A group long thought dead has been plotting in secret since their apparent destruction over 50 years ago. Plotting to plunge England  and perhaps the entire world  into war.     ---

After Lyren Morsman destroyed the world on 2062  transforming it into a wasteland  the story's main protagonist Eric Lassen must navigate this new world Lyren altered and find a way to survive while creating a plan to revert the world to how it was before.
In a world of monsters and esoteric magic  Minami Kotaro  a hard working and kind boy  simply wishes to help his family any way he can.

Cross Academy is attended by two groups of students: the Day Class and the Night Class. At twilight  when the students of the Day Class return to their dorm  they cross paths with the Night Class on their way to school. Yuki Cross and Zero Kiryu are the Guardians of the school  protecting the Day Class from the Academy's dark secret: the Night Class is full of vampires!

Yoishi  the owner of a bar  is disappointed with the poor food his adventurers are eating. One day  he begins to explore the cooking method  a bitter and inedible food found in the city's labyrinth  for a group of new adventurers.

A dog named Weed happens to hear he is the son of Gin  the great leader of Ohu  who lead the dogs of Ohu to victory in a fight against the monstrous bear Akakabuto.    Weed wants to find his father no matter what.    On his way to find him  Weed hears that his father has been captured by a ruthless villain called Hougen.      Sequel to Ginga Nagareboshi Gin.

title_en: Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam: Day After Tomorrow - From Kai Shiden's Report
description: Written and illustrated by Tsukasa Kotobuki  published by Kadokawa Shoten and serialized by Gundam Ace magazine between May 2005 - January 2007. This manga shows numerous points between the One Year War and the Gryps War.

※ [Stubborn but kind hearted Premier top x Double faced top scholar bottom] It easy to be enemy but hard to be friends. Shen Moqing and Lu Cangming fought for ten years. Yet  at the end  they realised the one who knew them well  is each other. ※

Yuan Chu transmigrated as the opposing boss in the novel  but she was wiped out by the male lead Ye Chen Yuan. Fortunately  she reincarnates once more  but back to the past  when Yuan was still young! Looking at the pitifully weak Little Yuan  she is troubled by a dilemma. Should she: 1. kill him  or 2. raise him up and openly ask for treasures from him. However  since she wants to get all sorts of treasures from him  she chooses the second option. Things don't always work out though  as she accidentally raises a sheep up to be a big bad wolf.       Master? Want treasure? Let's cultivate together  but alone  just us two  then.

Mizuki gets confessed to by a boy in front of a special mirror. Legend has it  that if you confess to someone you like in front of that mirror your wish comes true.      There is a slight problem in this equation: Mizuki is just a very feminine looking boy.      Also  it seems that he caught the attention of the Norse Trickster God  Loki  while glancing into the mirror. Loki decides out of boredom to mess with Mizuki and turns him into a real girl.

Vampires Charles J. Chrishunds (Charley) and Johnny Rayflo have a strange relationship. Charley is a cyborg and a vampire hunter for the Vatican  while his master Rayflo enjoys a playboy lifestyle. While fighting crimes involving vampires  Charley struggles to control his lust for blood and for Rayflo  while Rayflo delights in seducing his servant and attempts to deal with issues from his own past. Rayflo cares about Charley (also known as Cherry and Chris)  and these feelings don't seem to be one-sided.      *The second volume of Vassalord contains a bonus one-shot in the back  a fantasy story called "Zoul Harf" or "Zoul Half." This special one-shot was first published in the Comic Blade Masamune summer issue in 2003.
A mountain spirit is strangely attracted to the club members of the Roman club in the high school near her shrine … and thus begins all their adventures into the unknown.

title_en: Kiraware Majo to Karada ga Irekawatta Keredo  Watashi wa Kyou mo Genki ni Kurashiteimasu!
description: A happy slow life begins with a switch! Marietta  princess of the snow country of Snewe  is trapped in a magic tower because she can't use magic. 8 years later  on her wedding day with the prince of the silver country  she thought she had succeeded in summoning a holy beast  but then... What appeared was...?

title_en: Unmei no Hito ni Deau Hanashi
description: Yuuki is a 20-year-old college sophomore who has wished for one thing since moving to Tokyo: to find her soulmate. Growing a bit desperate after a long drought  she goes along with a friend to a club for the first time. Her friend thrives  but it’s chaotic and loud…just not Yuuki’s scene. Just when Yuuki begins to despair that she’ll ever find a real  adult relationship  she meets Iori  a man with bleached hair and a slightly scary demeanor…but first impressions don’t always tell the whole story. Could destiny still have more cards to play? [Kodansha]

A world where demons prevail and humans are rare. Hiyori  a human  is considered to be delicious to demons. However  his classmate  Hodaka  a pushy big-horned demon  found out his secret. On top of that  he kissed and tasted him…Charming a demon—a troublesome situation?! Surrendering to one's instinct and pleasure leads to…
An abused little girl with nothing to live for meets an old man with a nasty personality.

A group of nine boys (called the Hikari Club) are intent on making the Ultimate AI. The attractive leader of the club  Zera  is a twisted man polluting the minds of the club members to make them do whatever he pleases. Tamiya  the original founder of the club  wants to reclaim the club. Niko  the second in command  is pissed off at Jaibo  the one obsessed with Zera. They kidnap a schoolgirl  but the AI Raichi falls in love with her and she with him  and things get messy.

title_en: Ponkotsu Kawaii Mamiya-san: Shanai no Bijin Kouhou ga Tonari no Seki ni Isuwaru Ken
description: "I know I'm a bit of a weeb  but I'm looking forward to working with you!"  Ms. Mamiya  a senior employee with big breasts and a beautiful face  has moved into the seat next to Fujishiro  a working adult in the shadows. While hiding the fact that he is "Nisemono-san " an influencer whom Mamiya-san admires  he weaves a gem of an office love comedy with Mamiya-san and other unique heroines such as her colleague  a cool beauty  and a high school girl who is a good tease!

title_en: Sekai Saikyou no Kishi wa  Kanarazu Shinu Heroine wo Sukuu Tame Isekai Demo Saikyou no Kishi to Naru ~Ryoutei ni Hana wo  Ryoute ni Ken wo~
description: A young boy named Mikazuki Kenya was abandoned by his parents  bullied in high school  and left in solitude. At the brink of despair  he encounters a fateful meeting in his only hobby  VR gaming. A meeting with Kaguya and Reina  the heroines from the immensely popular game Knight of Giant. The time spent with the two heroines saved him  and he was head over heels for both of them.  However  in the story  one of them is destined to die. To change that fate  he dedicated his life to mastering the game and becoming the strongest in the world. Suddenly  Kenya finds himself entering the world of Knight of Giant?!

title_en: Herami Shimai wa Docchi mo Yanderu
description: Sera  (Real Name: Herami Sera) is an approval-seeking girl (26 years old) who works at a maid café. Her younger sister  Kira  is an idol (19 years old) who is rapidly gaining popularity with her cool  and mature character. However  the real Kira only ever thinks of her sister and tries to cheer her up in every possible way to help her sister with her mental health and anxiety.
After escaping from a mental institution  a girl with a self-inflicted facial deformity enacts twisted justice on those who mistreated her  face hidden underneath the disguise of a pumpkin.

title_en: Harem Ou no Isekai Press Manyuuki ~Saikyou Musou no Ojisan wa Arayuru Shuzoku wo Yome ni suru~
description: The erotic-comedy fantasy begins with a gentleman uncle who brings justice while doing some consensual seeding here and there.

20-year-old Sawatari Tatsurou is a male college student. While others around him are rejoicing in the springtime of their youth  he's enjoying his solitary life to the fullest. He has a noble hobby. Which is... appreciating lewd vide*s. "I don't need a girlfriend. Because I have AVs." A fulfilling everyday where he continuously releases his male desires with his exceptional AV love... However one day  his classmate and gal galpal Kaniko Eimi witnesses him cranking it at his place! Then  she says something shocking to Tatsurou  who thinks the world is ending.  "I-is it fine if I watch the AV together with you...?" ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/watch/mg878860)

PREVIOUSLY: The six girls of NMIXX set off on a journey to reach MIXXTOPIA  a world where everyone's individuality is cherished. Experiencing many difficulties along the way  they fall victim to the villain Monopole's trap and even have their ship set aflame. While repairing the burned ship the girls stay in FIELD  confronting the stubborn prejudices of society and gathering people willing to travel to MIXXTOPIA. The newly repaired MMU sets sail safely once again. In order to reach MIXXTOPIA  NMIXX heads forth into a vast black hole.

title_en: The Vampire Dies in No Time
description: Vampires are said to have many weaknesses to balance out their incredible powers. The vampire lord Draluc just so happens to be weak to… everything. He dies  disintegrating into a pile of sand  at the slightest shock.  After a disastrous encounter with the vampire hunter (and author) Ronaldo leaves Draluc's castle destroyed  Draluc decides to pack up his remaining belongings and adorable armadillo familiar John and move into Ronaldo’s office (despite the hunter’s protests). Chaos ensues as this unlikely duo is forced to work together while fending off perverted vampires  Ronaldo's terrifying editor  Draluc's eccentric family  and more—with Draluc dying continuously along the way. ___ **Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/the-vampire-dies-in-no-time)

title_en: When the Villainess Meets the Yandere
description: Yandere Commoner × Villainess Noble Lady.   The arrogant noble  Miss Hesha  is jealous of the commoner girl Jolene and does whatever she can to sabotage her. However  during one of her many schemes  her first kiss is stolen by Jolene. What started as a prank to get back at her  later sees Hesha desperately finding any excuse to get Jolene’s attention.   When the villainess meets the yandere  it’s a constant cycle of torment and trouble  but the more she gets hurt  the more tsundere she becomes.

title_en: Wazawai no Avalon ~Game Saijaku no Akuyaku Debu ni Ten'i Shita kedo  Ore dake "Yasereba Tsuyokute New Game" na Sekai datta no de  Saisoku Level Up & Hametsu Flag Kaihi de Kage no Eiyuu wo Mezashimasu~
description: The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day  a beta test event was announced  and he managed to beat it. In exchange for clearing the event  he was granted permission to try the beta test server. Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own  he eventually settled on random. However  he is transferred to a place where  as expected  he finds a fat  villainous mob character...!

title_en: Ijime kara Tasuketa Osananajimi ga Yandere ni naru made

description: The world is wrapped in flames and about to be destroyed by the actions of primordial gods intending to cleanse the planet. While the goddess Athena stands alone in a desperate attempt to contain the worst of the attack  it is up to Seiya  the last Saint standing  to battle the gods and join her to save the earth. The final battle of the Gold Saints is about to begin.

“My sister… Is she really my sister?” Can you truly say  without a shred of doubt  that the person you love by your side is family?  Haruka lost her parents when she was just a child. For a time she was separated from her older sister  Yurina  but now the two live together again  seemingly close as ever. To Haruka  beautiful Yurina is the very picture of the perfect sister.  But even so  two unsettling doubts have taken root in her heart. The first one is that every time Yurina starts dating someone new  she always calls him her “first love.”. And the second one is whether Yurina is truly her sister at all.  Desperate to shake off these suspicions  Haruka opens her sister’s old graduation album. What she discovers inside leaves her reeling.  And one night  her worst fears take shape before her eyes. Haruka catches Yurina “carving up” her so-called first love with a kitchen knife…?!

Meat has been the trainer of the great Choujin superhero Kinnikuman for long. He thought his job was done helping his greatest subject become a master Choujin and king of his homeworld. But…what if upon waiting for his next subject  the little trainer was sent to another world?…      A world where Kinnikuman has yet to become a great hero… and a world where he is… female!?      Welcome to the world of Kinnikuman Lady! A world that promises to be as bizarre and exciting as the one of the original Kinnikuman.

Following instinct alone  a tale of solo lunch exploration!!  Hitomi  known as the 'Lunch Bancho' for her unmatched passion for a good meal  lets her own 'lunch antenna' guide her once again today as she hunts down another perfect 'nice lunch'.  A satisfying gourmet story presented by Qusumi Masayuki  the master behind 'Kodoku no Gurume (Solitary Gourmet)'  and the talented newcomer Amei Ryo. Savour the delicious harmony created by these two!!

I am an aspiring mangaka  currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school  a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things  Sasha-san  suddenly called me "Master"!? ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57098)

Rai Genji always dreamed of becoming a world-class professional football player  especially one to play for the Japanese team. And by the efforts of his passion  he was invited to the Blue Lock project  where he developed his ego. Coming across foes  rivals  teammates  and friends; Rai learns time and time again that he needs to learn and improve beyond anything he thought was possible to survive. Will he be able to conquer the Blue Lock? Or will he be doomed by the very people he stands with?  Blue Lock Legions is a Blue Lock spin-off created for the purpose of pure enjoyment and not profit. The series follows very similar concepts to the original Blue Lock series  but with an original twist on the characters  plot line  events  etc.  Blue Lock Legions stands independently from the original Blue Lock Manga  and is posted on Mangadex without any involvement in the websites views  beliefs  practices  or problematic norms. It is simply here as the website provides a proper layout for the series to be viewed.

title_en: Kono Class ni Gal wa Inai
description: Mirei  a diligent honor student  longs for the flashy  fashionable "gyaru" lifestyle she admires in manga. With newfound courage  she decides to give herself a makeover and reinvent her image upon entering high school. There  she meets Yushin  a rough-around-the-edges boy  and... they hit it off?!

title_ja: A Banished Sage's Progress to Discovering the World: The Story of What Happened When I Freed Myself from My Childhood Friend
description: The wizard Haru spent his days being abused by the hero  his childhood friend Leticia  when one day while being scolded he thought to himself  "This is no good". And thus began Haru's adventure to regain his true self!

The fish circle the bait beneath calm waters of a lake. Inside the club  Jiang Rang follows Qing Zhou's invisible "fishing line" into a private room. Qing Zhou plays prey  but he's the hunter. As passion ignites  a hidden camera rolls and intimate sounds reach a third listener. Blood fades in the dark water. Who's really the catch in this deadly game of seduction?

title_en: Chounin A wa Akuyaku Reijou wo Doushitemo Sukuitai ~Dobu to Sora to Koori no Himegimi~
description: Allen  an eight-year-old boy from a poor family in the royal capital  is living a poor but happy life together with his mother. One day  however  memories of his previous life suddenly come back to him and he remembers that he is in an dating sim game and that the capital will be destroyed by war if he doesn't do something about it. If this continues  both he and his mother will be killed! With a sense of urgency  he decides to rise to the occasion in order to save his precious mother's life and save his favorite character  the villainous young lady Anastasia  the only girl he liked in the game  from her all too tragic and ruinous end.

title_en: The Demon Emperor Ex-Husband Has Resurrected
description: In order to escape the confines of life in the harem  Liang Jian travels a thousand years into the future. During an archaeological dig  the tomb of Emperor Sheng is unearthed  and his body is put on display in a museum. Hoping to finally sever his ties to the past  Liang Jian visits the museum to say his last goodbye to Sheng Mingzhou. But unexpectedly... Sheng Mingzhou is resurrected?!

title_en: Shijou Saikyou no Mahou Kenshi  F Rank Boukensha ni Tensei Suru ~Kensei to Matei  2 Tsu no Zense wo motta Otoko no Eiyuutan~
description: Yuri  the hero who saved the world  was called the Demon Emperor in his first reincarnation and the Sword Saint in his second. However he was considered a monster  and shunned by the people.  Yuri finally grows tired of this and resolves to live 100% for himself next time. He reincarnates once again in the world of the future. Immediately after his reincarnation  monsters start attacking him. As he quickly responds  Yuri acquires skills from his previous lives one after another  and annihilates the enemies in no time. Yuri eventually makes it to the guild  and while he possesses the ultimate powers of the Demon Emperor and Sword Saint  he begins his life as an F-rank budding adventurer.
Extra comics and illustrations from the author's twitter.

title_en: Despite Coming From the Abyss  I Will Save Humanity
description: The Abyssals represent pure destruction. They have unparalleled power and follow their instinct to remove all life from the world. However  one day  a traitor appeared among them. Silvija  a clueless girl  woke up on the battlefield and learned that she is the "Twilight Abyssal" that the humans hate. After escaping numerous pursuits  Silvija was adopted by the Ilia family and gradually formed her conviction. *She will save mankind using the body of an Abyssal. She will protect the kindness and warmth she received.* However  it seems the Will of the Abyssals does not intend to succumb to her...  "Miss Silvija  it's time to display your power." "Eh~ but I hafen't finifed my defferts yet..." Still a Chad as ever. PS: The protagonist is single. Feel free to tease her~
Piyohiko has a dream: He wants to be a succesfull guitar-player. Then this guy Jaguar shows up  and coaxes him into playing the 'recorder'. Thus ending Piyohiko's noble dream.

title_en: Koukando ga Mieru you ni natta n da ga  Heroine ga Count Stop shite iru Ken
description: High school student Kirisaki Touma can view his affinity stats with other individuals after an incident. Acquaintances are around 30; friends are around 70. Even though he is confused about these affinity statistics  he found out that one of the four goddess at school  Kujou Momoka  has maxed out the affinity count-!? The perfect girl has fallen in love with me  why?!

title_en: Drama na Koi wa Kihon kara
description: Shinji Yuuki is an ordinary businessman  35 years old  single  no girlfriend  living at home. He is worried about his future as a single man  but he has little experience in love and is afraid of marriage activity. But when he meets a female doctor  he falls in "love beyond his imagination " a love that turns his life upside down!

title_en: Kuromaku Ikka ni Tensei Shita kedo Gensaku Mushishite Dokuritsu Suru
description: The protagonist  who has been reincarnated into the world of a game he played extensively  has become Yuri  the third son of a villainous family!! His father  siblings  and the entire household are the worst and most ruthless  all doomed to be brutally massacred. As for Yuri himself  he is destined to betray the Hero as the final boss  dragging the heroine down with him to meet the worst possible death. Not wanting to die  he decides to completely distance himself from both his villainous family and the Hero's party  intending to live a peaceful and carefree life... Or so he thought  but now  one by one  the original story's characters keep gathering around him...!? ___ **Compositor:** [Kasama Sanshirou](https://mangadex.org/author/03725218-796b-4514-b7f6-caad06847d56) **Character Designer:** [Ruroo](https://mangadex.org/author/c3fecffb-c301-4e20-90d9-309e4acf19fc)  **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71281)
A slice-of-life romantic comedy about Yuuya and Rio  a young couple where she's about 4 years his senior  who have just started living together.

The bloody Splatter Zone reveals people's dark sides. A series of blood-pumping  flesh-pulsating short stories await you...  Mommy had a baby in her belly. One night  I overheard a conversation between Mommy and Daddy... They said that they were going to kill me because they were going to give birth to a real child... Am I destined to be killed from birth?

title_en: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai
description: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful  cute  cool  and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story  a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.

title_en: Otonari no Onee-san wa XXX Shitai
description: Naoto  who gets treated terribly by his parents  has Naruko  a beautiful lady  show up at his doorstep and starts living next to him as his neighbor. Naruko seems to be kindly accommodating Naoto  but her actions are somewhat "unnatural"...

Naruse Hiroya is an ordinary high school student  but his normal daily life is often ruined by his friend Kokutou Miyabi. Miyabi has an intense personality  and he constantly drags Hiroya and their other friends at school (level-headed Wasshi and Katarun of the vision-obscuring hair) into the most ridiculous situations!  (Source: MangaHelpers)

After Greed  a creature of the same species as Ridley  stole Samus's suit upgrades using the Dominion device  Samus  Joey  and Diesel embark on a quest to retrieve them in the Extreme Galaxy and restore Samus back to full power. However  Greed has given Samus's upgrades to each of his most trusted henchmen known as the Deadly Six Stars.  Note: This manga was only published in Comic BomBom and was never collected into volumes.

The jewelry store Rohstein is an unconventional shop where "a maid sells jewels". Off of the main street  the shop is visited by an elderly gentleman  a noble  an actress  a poor student  and all sorts of people who have heard the rumors of it. When they hold the jewels selected by the maid  their own lives also begin to shine.

An introverted high school student  Souichi Sakuraba  is being bullied severely by the "Yokai" classmates. The bullying escalates  and Souichi's childhood friend  Azusa  who was the only one who trusted him  is defiled by them. In front of Souichi  who was in the depths of despair  the succubus  Asmode  appeared. Souichi makes a contract with a succubus who possesses a mysterious ability  and decides to make the bully's loved ones suffer the same pain as himself by "cuckolding" them.

A dark gloomy castle with endless stairways and an ancient library. Scary  mysterious creatures live here  hiding in the night. One day  a girl who lost her memory ends up there. Who is she and how can she get back? And  most importantly  how will the owner of the castle decide her fate?
Yuri addict and alien Lily in search of new stimulus sets her sights on two childhood friends Iori and Runa who can't be honest about their feelings  to create "real yuri" by her own hands!

"If you truly want to get stronger  you have to challenge and defeat those stronger than yourself."  While being transmigrated to another world  Kelvin bartered away his memories for a collection of powerful new abilities. Setting out on the ultimate adventure as the world’s strongest Summoner — with his first Follower being the very goddess who brought him over! — he soon discovers his true nature as a battle junkie. Someone wants to pick a fight? Sure  bring it on!  Facing off against one formidable foe after another  Kelvin can hardly contain his delight as he revels in the absolute exhilaration of a good fight! The curtain rises on the start of an epic saga as this black-clad warrior and his allies carve their way into the annals of history!  ___ **Character Designer:** [Kurogin (DIGS)](https://mangadex.org/author/ad469135-32c7-4fcc-b490-d0ebc07eea16)  **Additional Links:**   - [Official Raw Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1222ci/) - [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/black-summoner)

After—something—changed his life four years ago  Sunny has not left his house once  living in his own reclusive bubble. Hoping for a fresh start for her son  his mother decides to move their family out of town. However  when his childhood friend Kel re-enters his life  Sunny finds himself thrust back into a world he once knew. With only three days before the move  the duo come across familiar faces as they go through town—reawakening a dark past that Sunny has tried so hard to forget.
Author's comment: "A heartwarming four-panel depiction of the daily lives of those who could not become either human or monster." (MTL)

Imagine there is a bar with many weird kind of food and drink that might bring you to another world! The bar  so-called "Nobu" is located in a alley of the old city Aiteria. At the very first step  diners feels like falling into another completely country  with cold  super cool beer  so-called "Toriaezu Nama"! ___ Adapted from [web novel (raw)](http://ncode.syosetu.com/n9773bj/) / light novel of same name. - [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%95%B0%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E5%B1%85%E9%85%92%E5%B1%8B%E3%80%8C%E3%81%AE%E3%81%B6%E3%80%8D)

Takara Itosaki's boyfriend of two years  whom she had been thinking of marrying  suddenly dumps her. He states  "I'm not sure if you like me anymore because you don't get jealous." She has liked and cherished her past boyfriends in her own treasured way  but for some reason she is not always depressed when they break up. One day  a beautiful woman visited the real estate agency where she works. After talking with her for a while  she realizes that she is Ema  a classmate of hers  who transferred to another school in the second year of junior high school...

It has been more than ten years since Holo and Lawrence  who became a happily married couple after completing their long journey to send the Wisewolf back home  opened the bathhouse Spice and Wolf in the hot spring resort of Nyohhira.   This is a story of continued happiness spun in the bathhouse  which is said to bring happiness and laughter.  ---  **Note:** This series starts from light novel volume 18. Heavy spoilers ahead!

Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan  so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night  he takes a shower  changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world  and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day  he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare " he sulks  until he finds his elf friend in his bed. Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? ___ - [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)

Kal is an E-Rank healer; the lowest rank of adventurers. Even though her comrades call her useless  she continues to diligently make medicine for them  hoping they will accept her as one of them... Until one day  she is kicked out of the group she was traveling with! She wants to go back to her village  but she doesn't have the money. She is left helpless in a village she is completely unfamiliar with. Then  one day  she comes upon an adventurer  Kaido  who is on the brink of death. She heals him and offers him medicine she has created. He is impressed and fascinated with her medical skills! A fantasy about an "incompetent" healer whose talent blossoms as she goes on adventures with a handsome companion!

title_en: Sensei! Boku-tachi ga Sekai wo Horoboshimasu.
description: Teachers are entrusted with the sacred duty of guiding and protecting their students—but not undercover assassin Mr. Solo. In a world where magic users and non-users coexist  he walks a solitary path as the wizard hitman "Number Zero." His latest mission: pose as a magic instructor for the unruly  bottom-tier  second-year students of Class D. To complicate things  he’s saddled with a new partner—a transfer student with the same deadly assignment.  (Source: Manga UP! Global)

*The story is adapted from the light novel of the same name.*  Sayama Takahiro  a carefree high school student  was transported to a fantasy world identical to the one in a VR Game. His go-with-the-flow attitude eventually overpowered his desire to return home  and now he runs Free Life  a small business dedicated to fulfilling the requests of its customers. Assisted by the hard-working Yumiel  what kinds of jobs will Sayama end up doing? If only someone would hire him to sleep till noon.

The star of a male idol group who has a cold demeanor  who also has no control in restraining himself. And an idol with a harmless and childlike cutesy personality on cameras and is able to stay in character  but is an complete opposite off-stage… They're sworn enemies that hate each other and somehow ends up having to act like a couple with each other as fan service?! Yup  Looks sweet!
This is just my first step into the world of manga writing. I’d be delighted to read all of your comments  thoughts  and advice on how I can improve myself further. Thank you so much for reading.

Izumo is a scary-looking top student. Everyone is afraid of him  but in reality  he just wants friends and a fun school life. One day he is targeted by a succubus named Anastasia who attempts to steal his virgin soul.  A reboot with improved art but similar story of the old version.

A hitman targets a princess who lives in lavish luxury. When she arrives  she finds her flirting with the prince. The prince steps in to protect her  but in the struggle  the princess hits her head and dies instantly. Though the hitman succeeds without staining her hands  the prince makes an unexpected and shocking request…

"The human race will become extinct in 2017." The Chaldea organization  an organization charged with preserving the future of humanity  observes a singularity. To solve it  Rika Fujimaru and Mash Kyrielight will be transported to the city of Fuyuki in 2004. ___ **Note**: This manga adapts the first  third  fifth  seventh and final singularity from Part 1 of Fate/Grand Order.

The remote town of North Hill has been quarantined to prevent the spread of the mysterious Couper disease that is turning people into cannibals. Young soldier Billy returns to his hometown for the first time in six years for the woman he loves  but what horrors will be awaiting him...?

In 2045  extreme summer weather and A.I. automation have transformed daily life. As traditional summer culture fades away  children of this generation find themselves yearning to experience the intense heat of summers past...

title_en: Vigilante: Boku no Hero Academia Illegals
description: It is illegal for civilians to use their quirks out in the open; that privilege is reserved for registered heroes. However  a select few have chosen to reject this rule. They are known as vigilantes - people with the hearts of heroes  but the reputation of villains.  This is their story.
Jimmy is a gang member in one of the world's few underground cities  Silent Bay City. One day  he meets a girl and gets embroiled in a fight between the creatures of the night.

The love between brother and sister. The love between man and woman. That which is most forbidden is most unyielding. The two sons and five daughters of the Shiunji family shine like brilliant gems  each with intelligence and beauty in equal measure. And with the pedigree of their wealthy father behind them  how could they not be the talk of the town? Eldest son Arata has spent his life being tossed around by the whims of his colorful sisters  yet a little teasing won't stop him from valuing his family over anything and anyone else. But when his youngest sister turns fifteen  their father reveals a long-hidden secret of the Shiunji "siblings" and knocks Arata's world off its axis...

A notorious property with a hidden past is now in the hands of Dan  a sharp and talented real estate agent. The place? A manor that once belonged to the affluent Midnight family—whose bloodline vanished over a century ago.  (Source: Square Enix  translated)

Guts  known as the Black Swordsman  seeks sanctuary from the demonic forces attracted to him and his woman because of a demonic mark on their necks  and also vengeance against the man who branded him as an unholy sacrifice. Aided only by his titanic strength gained from a harsh childhood lived with mercenaries  a gigantic sword  and an iron prosthetic left hand  Guts must struggle against his bleak destiny  all the while fighting with a rage that might strip him of his humanity. ___ Won the 6th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 2002.  Note: Following Miura Kenta's death in 2021  the series has been taken over by Kouji Mori  who supervises the series with art done by Studio Gaga.
Nanoha Takamachi  now age 13  and her friends work as magical girls!

Gideon Sever  code-named 404  is the newest recruit in a secret war against cults trying to birth Antichrists. He's thrown into a hidden world full of witches  demons  and ancient conspiracy. To succeed  he'll have to hold onto his sanity and faith while uncovering the truth of his own enigmatic past.

One day  Ritsu Kodo  a country boy  is sent into the world of the game he is playing  the Digital World! There  he meets the Digimon Pulsemon he created in the game!! Ritsu was baffled by the sudden turn of events  but when he learned that his partner Pulsemon had summoned him as his Tamer to break the 'cannot evolve' curse  he promised cooperation in evolution...!!

Kinu-san  a girl who's come to the Fujidana family as a bride  thinks of her husband as a man who lazes around everyday  but as she gets to know him she starts to think "My Husband has a bigger heart than I thought"
Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory  locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night  on his way home  he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...

title_en: Saikyou Skill "Inochigoi" de Kuyashii Kedo Musou Shichau Moto Maou-sama no Sekai Seifuku Katsudou
description: Village girl Chelsea  who is beloved by everyone  is actually the reincarnated ex-Demon King. However  when she reincarnated  for some reason neither her magical powers nor skills were inherited  and she was forced to live as a normal human being. Humiliating days continued until one day  the remnants of the Demon King's army appeared to loot the village. Hunted down by her former subordinate  who did not realize her true identity  Chelsea finds herself in a perilous situation. Then  a skill finally manifests! The name of that skill is "Begging for Mercy"!?

Yato is a homeless god. He doesn’t even have a shrine  not to mention worshippers! So to achieve his ambitious goals  he’s set up a service to help those in need (for a small fee)  hoping he’ll eventually raise enough money to build himself the lavish temple of his dreams. Of course  he can’t afford to be picky  so Yato accepts all kinds of jobs  from finding lost kittens to helping a student overcome bullies at school.

title_en: Doteihen Reijou ni Hyoui Shita 800-nen Mae no Akujo wa Hissori Seishun wo Tanoshinde Iru
description: Nora Nose  the "Nonpareil Villainess"   has been sealed away for 800 years for her crimes. Her latest amusement is using her Farsight magic to see into the world of school.  One day  while gazing into the school as usual  she hears a voice pleading for help: "I want to die..." "If you want to die  why don't you leave your body to me?"  Nora possesses the voice's owner body  Cecily  also known as "Withered Grass Lady." She must work to improve the situation surrounding of she  who was once bullied!  --- **Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16817330650682304831)  [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9868hy/)

title_en: Danzai Sareta Tensei Seijo wa  Akuyaku Reijou no Michi wo Iku!
description: The Saintess Luna used her immense power to save the people  only to be executed for a crime she didn't commit. Now  she's been reincarnated 300 years in the future  with all of her incredible powers intact.  "I don't care if someone's in trouble anymore. I'll never save anyone again. I'm going to become a villainess!"  With this new vow  she enrolls in the Saintess Academy  aiming to secure the role of the story's villainess. She even starts a side career as an adventurer  hiding her true identity beneath an armor. But her overwhelming holy power ends up causing massive trouble wherever she goes?!

It has been 700 years since a certain "war" in which more than half of the human race lost their lives. The Gundam  which had protected the Earth during the Great War  was no longer necessary for humankind. In such a peaceful world  there was a woman called "Bloody Kaoris". This is a story of betrayal over the lost "God" named "Gundam".

One day  Tarou Yamada  who runs a detective business  slips on a banana peel and reincarnates into Tsukushi Shikisaki  the younger brother of three beautiful big-breasted sisters who will all die on the same day. As he spends time surrounded by the three beautiful sisters  he finds out that the boy he is reincarnated as will be killed by one of the three sisters ...!?

The story of a possessor from a book who  for the sake of its goal  won’t mind killing others.  Brinny  who’s living while adapting to her stepfather  thought that story had nothing to do with her. Up until she was swept into an incident with the sickly second prince  Lucian.  In the midst of the crisis  Brinny rescued Lucian by displaying her superhuman strength  and looking at the possessor ‘Ariadna’ tied up had reassured her that everything had been resolved.  But for whatever reason  her beloved older sister and the first prince died in a carriage accident  and then even Lucian  who later becomes her fiance  started to display some abnormal behavior.  The possessor wasn’t executed in the past. Would ‘Ariadna’ still be alive? In order to regain the empty seats of their lost loved ones  Brinny made a decision.  To fight against the possessor.

A boy said to have been taken by a tengu to the "Enchanted Realm". From his mouth pours the tale of an unbelievable world made real—those who yearn for it race toward the pinnacle of "martial prowess".

title_en: Oujodeshitaga Kossori Ryuu Kishidan no Senzoku Kusushi ni Narimashita!
description: Rotte  who had been an apprentice pharmacist in a remote town  unexpectedly discovers that she is actually a princess of the Kingdom of Sironia. She is welcomed into the royal palace  but life in the unfamiliar court feels stifling. While secretly entering the Dragon Knights’ order under a false identity  she ends up becoming the Dragon Knights’ dedicated pharmacist due to their shortage of personnel.  Even while hiding her true identity  Rotte finds herself drawn to the earnest yet clumsy commander of the knights  Reginald. Amidst all this  Rotte and Reginald become embroiled in a conspiracy within the royal palace――.
When a forgetful man forgets everything  will he lose it all in the end?

Based on the life of real life historical figure/potentially mythological artist Hidari Jingoro. Jingoro is an extremely talented woodworker  sculptor  painter  wordsmith  you name it. But when his lover  Osen suddenly falls ill he must use his artistic skills to make her healthy again.

An ordinary office worker  Takuya Tomizawa  promised his future to his girlfriend  Kazumi Hirose. However  one day  Tenzen Kugayama   who is the head of the Kugayama Zaibatsu and has enormous financial power and power  is forced to shoulder a debt of 10 billion as a joint guarantor for his mother who has evaporated . From this time on  the battle between Takuya's Hell and Kugayama Tenzen began. In front of Takuya  a variety of women  such as Yang Mei Chuan  who is young and the top of the overseas Chinese  the cute Maejima Marie  the active Naoko Mimura  the intelligent Kaori Hayami  and the daughter of Tenzen  Saki Kugayama. It becomes a partner  an enemy  and finally a story of economic reform involving the financial industry. The main focus is a money war between the weak and the strong that makes use of the author's career  but it is also characterized by many women getting involved with the main character  Takuya Tomizawa.

title_en: Kanojo ni Norowareterukedo Shiawase Nanode OK Desu ☆
description: Being kind to girls is the most important thing to 17-year-old Iida Harunari. As the kind of guy to carry the bags of all the girls in his class with him to school each morning  those around him sarcastically called him the "ultimate gentleman Iida". One day  he encountered a beautiful girl with a strange aura  Kageura Sari  but he noticed a cursed-looking monster emerging from her body. Iida was going to hurry and flee  but wasn't something amiss...? He was cursed by the heroine?!

title_en: Dìqiú Rén Shízài Tài Xiōngměng Le
description: Fifty years ago  Dracon City fell into another dimension. Despite having to fight and defend themselves alone  they held fast to the banner of Earth and stood tall against the terrifying Exbeasts found within the Altermension.  Fast forward to the present day  Meng Chao was reborn. Much to his surprise  he found out that he could become stronger by contributing to society. He then decided that he would become the most powerful of them all  wipe out every single Exbeast  and conquer the entire Altermension.

title_en: Hibike! Euphonium - Kitauji Koukou Suisougakubu e Youkoso
description: The Kitauji high school wind instrument club had at one time participated in national tournaments and was a champion school  but after the club's adviser changed  they have not been able to even participate in the qualifying tournament. Under the strict leadership of Taki  a substitute for Ms. Rikako  they steadily build up their strength. As they fight over who plays solos  some students give priority to studying and quit club activities. Finally  the long wished-for day of the contest arrives.

Mini 4WD Fighter  the iconic superhero of the Mini 4WD hobby! He loves the hobby just as much as the kids and shows his enthusiasm though his commentary through tournaments while cheering the racers in fair play.

title_en: Mobile Suits Gundam: Red Giant 03rd MS Team
description: The "Red" Comet  the Black "Tri-Star " and the Blue "Giant" -- we are the "Red Giant Tri-Stars"!  Universal Century 0079 - December  the so-called "One Year War" has reached its final stage. After the battle for Jaburo  the Zeon forces's "Wandering Group" were retreating. Somehow  they will make it up into space and rejoin their comrades... Meanwhile  a Federation Forces unit known as the Red Giants Tri-Stars are making a name for themselves!

title_en: Bokura no Ai wa Kimochi Warui
description: Everyone is hiding a "secret."  Azuki Komugi is obsessed with ruminating on her memories of her high school girlfriend "Meguru " and creating a body model of hers out of clay. One day  Azuki drops her homemade "Meguru" at the 100-yen shop where she works part-time  and sneaks into her workplace on her off-shift to get "her" back. However  what she sees there is a fellow co-worker  high school girl Yakoui Remu  who is about to express her lust for "Meguru" in a way that is different from Azuki's...

Spring. The 'season of love' has arrived and it seems that finding himself a girlfriend was harder than Jun'ichi believed. To break the status quo  Jun'ichi's friends have forced him into confessing to the gyaru  Yame Yukana. However  things do not go quite as he expected.

I found out that my long-distance girlfriend had gotten a new older boyfriend from the city and while I was in the grip of despair  a girl named Haibara Enako  more affectionately called "Hyena-chan" suddenly appeared before me and confessed  "I don't have a boyfriend and I'm free right now."

title_en: Maou-sama no Machizukuri! ~Saikyou no Dungeon wa Kindai Toshi~
description: Beings that create and control monsters and demons  beings that build and reign over malicious labyrinths  the chosen individuals to possess an overwhelming Unique Skill... They are the Demon Lords. Demon Lords entice people to come to the labyrinth they've built and eat the people’s despair as their nourishment. However  Creation Demon Lord Procell has decided that he will obtain people's hopes and not their despair as nourishment  and built a happy town instead of a malicious labyrinth to collect human beings.
A collection of the Pyonko and Friends mini-stories taken from the Author's X (Formerly Twitter) and Patreon accounts.  Uploaded out of chronological order.

Hajime  a young man who has returned to his hometown from Tokyo  heads out to explore a cave with his childhood friend Umi and five others on a local mountain  Mt. Shirao  which is famous for its legends. However  it turns out to be a different world where something spectacular and unprecedented awaits them…!?  Is it a monster or a god protecting this area? The despair the group witnesses as they advance through the lightless hole is…!  A new release from the animal horror master Okada Takuya  a shocking caveman panic grandly appears!

From childhood  Artezia Rosan's happiness was dependent on ensuring the success of her brother. As a master manipulator and schemer  she became his most valuable ally in seizing the empire’s throne. That’s exactly why her brother's betrayal cut so deeply when Artezia was imprisoned as punishment for all of her crimes. Soon after being rescued by Grand Duke Cedric Ebron  she vows to help him overthrow the cruel new emperor by sacrificing her own life with forbidden magic. Now waking up several years earlier back in time  she will forsake her own family to help Cedric at all costs. They say that blood is thicker than water  but can Artezia destroy her brother while her own romance blossoms amidst the chaos?

Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business  he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school  Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better  as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer  giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning. ___ Official Release: - Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
