Shindo Manabu is a student at a very prestigious high school whose goal is to get into Tokyo University. He studies constantly and tries to never lose sight of that goal. That is until his childhood friend  Amano Megumi  who goes to the same school starts to distract him. He originally only remembered her as the tomboy she was as a kid  until he notices how "developed" she has become. As these two get closer to each other  hilarity often ensues and subsequently  Manabu becomes more and more distracted from his goal of getting into Tokyo U.
Toto is a novice hero who has finally put together the team that he'd always wanted. And he's ready to set out on a new adventure. But Toto's new party members' actual target is... his life?!

title_en: Mobile Suit Gundam Pulitzer - Amuro Ray Beyond the Aurora
description: In UC0095  following the events of Char's Counterattack  Kikka Kobayashi gathers testimonies about Amuro Ray to show the world the kind of person he was.
It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...

Inept at dealing with people  Hikawa Koyuki maintains a wall between herself and others. She spends her time in highschool away from others  all alone. At least until she encounters Amamiya Minato who keeps closing the distance between them for some reason?! The aloof Koyuki  the popular Miki  the boundary-less Minato  and the easygoing and kind basketball team member  Youta. This is the story of these somewhat complicated four  and their tantalizing  bumbling youth! ___ **Additional Links:** - **Alt Official Raw:** [Shounen Jump+](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/14079602755350023318) - [Official X](https://x.com/ramparts_ice) - [Official Anime Site](https://korinojoheki-pr.com/)

Jashin-chan Dropkick is a violent slapstic comedy about a delusional gothic lolita  Yurine  who summons a demon girl with the tail of a cobra  Jashin-chan. They'll have to live together until Yurine finds a way to send Jashin-chan back to hell  or until Jashin-chan kills Yurine.

At Saint Ruri Girl's Academy  there are two opposing factions: the "Ruri Class " consisting of refined  well-bred ladies  and the "Ai Class " made up of delinquents with poor behavior. Nanase Mitsuki  among the students of the Ai Class  is the most feared by the Ruri Class due to her intimidating appearance  though Mitsuki harbors a complex about her looks. One night  she meets Hosho Yuka  a young lady wandering alone at night...
A prequel series revealing Goblin Slayer's past and the events that led him to become an adventurer with the sole purpose of exterminating all goblins from the world.

The story revolves around Fukuroji  a high school boy who tries to live in the shadows. However  his life takes an unexpected turn when  as part of a punishment game  he has to confess his love to the most popular girl in his class. Through a misunderstanding  he ends up confessing his feelings to Tsubaki Sakura  the most feared girl in school. As he tries to clear up the confusion  Tsubaki surprisingly attacks him  adding an unexpected and hilarious twist to the situation.

After his live-in girlfriend breaks up with him  Santa Hayashiya runs away from his apartment at night because he can no longer afford the rent. A classmate  Junko Sakurada  invites him to move in with her and her brother  but the relationship between the Sakurada siblings seems... strange.  A story of yearning and people that want to love and be loved.

31 year old Takehiko Nakamaru has trained all his life to never be disturbed by anything that the world throws at him  no matter what comes at him  he will remain unfazed. He had conquered "life" and was living in perfect harmony. But when he realizes that his existence in the house inhibits his sister from getting married  his peaceful life is thrown off balance. In his panicked state  he leaves the house for Tokyo in his journey to slay the monster that is called "life".
The unpopular science student Yukito Takiguchi develops the ultimate matching system. Then  a beautiful woman appears before him  claiming to be his wife...!?

title_en: Josou ni Hamatta Kareshi to Hameta Kanojo
description: A story about a girl and her crossdressing boyfriend.

In the "Demon City" where humans and demons coexist  one of the seven demon kings is murdered. In order to solve the case  Alsarisa  the daughter of a hero who enforces justice under the law  teams up with Keed  a bad investigator who values honor over the law. In a world swirling with violence and conspiracy  the unconventional investigation drama of the two twisted people begins.
In Sakura Shiori's "The Best Lover " two women who  for different reasons  haven't found love with men end up falling in love with each other.   (**RAPE** warning in an early page)

title_en: I  A Harvest Mouse  Will Take Cinderella Away
description: After marrying the prince  Cinderella’s “happily ever after” ends when he falls for another woman and proposes to her. A small  powerless field mouse  who dearly loves Cinderella  wishes she could smile again. Mysteriously  the mouse dies and wakes up in the past  when Cinderella was still mistreated by her stepfamily. Then comes a twist: the mouse isn’t ordinary  but a noble beastman from the prestigious Field Mouse clan. With her true identity revealed  she decides to run away with Cinderella — before the prince and his glass slipper ever show up.  --- Cinderella married the prince. But she never thought that her vow of eternal love would end in just 10 years. The prince fell in love with a certain young lady at first sight  made her his mistress  and even proposed to her. 'Damn!' But she couldn't do anything for Cinderella  who was withering away day by day. Because I was  "Click!" a mouse! And the smallest of all mice  the lowest in the hierarchy  a field mouse. 'Fairy grandmother. I'm just a disgusting mouse. Cinderella was the one who embraced me. What I wish for is... '... I wish Cinderella could smile again.' I thought I died. When I woke up again  I was back in time. Back to Cinderella's childhood when she was being abused by her stepmother and older sisters.   "I came here on the request of the Ratson family."  But I wasn't really an ordinary mouse  but a beastkin of the field mouse family? My family was desperately looking for me? Then  Cinderella  run away with me! Prince  I'll take her away before you come looking for her with that glass slipper!

Yuan Ding  an otaku  was transported to another world. After taking Shuo Yue Academy's entrance exam  Yuan Ding's life in another world begins  aiming to collect the Demon Spirits said to exist in the legends. A lighthearted  comedy and harem manhua.  [Official English: Season 2](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/fairies-cultivation-manual-s2_20785533706975401)

title_en: The Legendary Weapon Became My Bride When I Overwhelmed the Production Job
description: I walk in a different world with my strongest management and smithing ability!      I belonged to the management team of MMORPG "Armed Edda"  and when I awoke one day  I was embraced by a red-haired girl in a strange world. What's more  my figure and ability are exactly like the game's debugging character  Blacksmith Laguna Smith  and the girl Rein who helped me is the legendary weapon "Laevatein" that I trained in the game! When I live  I start to explore the mysteries of the world….!? Using a trained Legendary weapon as a bride  fantasy begins!      Author's Twiter: [@amauisiroichi](http://twitter.com/amauisiroichi)

tags: Romance|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Depicts the journey of three sets of childhood friends - 'childhood friends with a physical difference ' 'childhood friends who are conscious of height differences ' and 'childhood friends with an age gap' - until they start dating.

We aim for the bowling high score…    Next week  we watch the TV…    Our senior friend is rich…   Yes  our life is full of hope!       The story centers on a group of friends who are satisfied and complacent with their everyday lives. The friends include Tobio  a passive high schooler who makes it a rule not to hope too much; Maru  a scheming boy who gossips behind people's back; Isami  a gaudy student who likes girls and recently got a girlfriend with big breasts; and their senior Paisen (slang for senpai  or upperclassman)  a 20-year old man who is rich and has long graduated from high school.

title_en: Neko to Futari no Kamakura Techou
description: Ryo and Mihoko are a newly married couple who move to Kamakura… but they are not alone in this adventure  because they are accompanied by their five cats! The seven make up the entire Katagiri family.
A collection of Twitter shorts posted under the pen姉 (@pensis_x) account.

A collection of **early** works by Not Osada that makes fresh blood jump like rose petals!!! Inspired by Tokyo Grand Guignol plays such as Litchi Hikari Club.   This is the preferred adaptation of the cast. **Some** stories have homoerotic themes.  Works:  TLH-25 ***[トルハイト―25]*** Eien Shōjo ***[永遠少女]*** Paradise Snow ***[パラダイス・スノー]*** Kyōsō Byōin ***[狂想病院]*** Das Blut - Ketsueki - ***[ダス・ブルート―血液―]*** Yume no Object ***[憧憬(ゆめ)のオブジェ]*** Hiiro no Koro ***[緋色の頃]*** Jinta☆Jinta ***[ジンタ☆ジンタ]***

tags: Historical|Long Strip|Romance|Boys' Love|Drama|Slice of Life|Full Color|Tragedy
description: Young Ruan  the little lord of House Marcellion  has never had an easy childhood. With his older brother constantly feigning illness  the burden of the harsh heir’s training falls squarely on his small shoulders. One day  unable to take it any longer  Ruan dashes out of the mansion and loses himself in the forest. There  he stumbles upon a boy his own age. They don’t exchange names  and yet none of that seems to matter. With him  even nibbling on grass becomes an adventure. Ruan finds himself laughing  playing  and perhaps for the very first time  feeling free. Day by day  his thoughts drift further from the rigid lessons of succession and closer to the warmth of that kindhearted boy. But gossip spreads quickly  and soon even the stern Count Marcellion hears whispers of his son’s wandering heart… Could a simple forest friendship change the path of an heir?

Protecting his sister Shizuka from a bullet  the strongest assassin Nagi Taira falls into a coma. Against all odds  he regains his consciousness... but only when faced with killing intent! ___ **Alt Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10517/episode/349974) - United States  Japan  Canada  Australia  New Zealand  Singapore  Philippines  Thailand  Vietnam  Hong Kong  Taiwan  India  Mexico  and Brazil only.
The manga stars the black-silhouetted "criminal" who appears in Meitantei Conan series who represents the mystery culprits.
A true story about the creation of the camera.

title_en: Kikaku-gai no Danjon Kouryaku-sha  Jitsu wa Isekai Kaeri no Moto Yuusha
description: In an era overtaken by dungeons  hunters who make a living by conquering them have risen to prominence.  After killing the demon lord in another world  the former hero Yuuki Rento returned tired of wars and vowed to spend his remaining life peacefully playing video games.  However  when his friend discovered his identity and dragged him into the job of conquering dungeons  his overpowered abilities quickly become known across the world.  "At this rate  I won't even have time to play my gal games!"  Will the day Rento can finally enjoy a peaceful life ever come...?!  A refreshing fantasy where the hero who once saved another world now dominates with his overpowered abilities!
A gruesome historical manga about French revolutionary politician Louis Antoine de Saint-Just  a prominent figure in the infamous Reign of Terror.
Sumi bears a birthmark on her face. Meanwhile  the most popular student in her class seems to be having fun every day  even after catching the mysterious "transparency disease"...

Lim Chungah is a highschool student whose household got swindled by her own trusted uncle. With her parents leaving in pursuit of finding her uncle  she is temporarily left alone to live in her uncle's empty house. HOWEVER  what if Chungah's family weren't the only ones duped by her uncle's con? Enter Millenium Adventist Church  the biggest cult in their community and one of her uncle's scam victims. Lim Chungah finds herself cohabitating with Kim Yohan  the cult leader's one and only son. Oh God  will their living situation be okay?!

title_en: Haikei  Tengoku no Neesan  Yuusha ni Natta Mei ga Ero Sugite —— Ojisan  Hogosha Toka Sorosoro Muri Desu+
description: Angel  a former top-tier mercenary  was forced to retire due to an injury. Left by his fiancée  he now spends his days drowning in alcohol—a middle-aged adventurer (and a virgin). One day  his niece Liz  whom he once taught swordsmanship  suddenly barges into his life! Angel is bewildered by how she has grown into an astonishingly beautiful girl  but Liz pays no heed to his hesitation and boldly declares that she will become his wife—?!

title_en: Gyakusatsu Happy End: Ao no Shou
description: Ao Minato  a young man who killed his father-in-law who repeatedly abused his family and entered a juvenile reformatory. However  the sister who should have protected committed suicide at the end of suffering  and her sister Akane is also missing. Ao  who arrived at a certain shrine  wished for the safety of his sister  which is the only hope left  and swears to God that he will do anything for that ... The blockbuster panic suspense "Massacre Happy Ending". The new chapter is finally opening---.

Kotoyorozu Kotoha  a boy with an underground past as a former mafia underling  had given up on youth. However  his life changes completely after meeting certain girls. With massive guns  they fight against mysterious beings threatening to destroy humanity! This is their school life — full of chaos  action  and unexpected twists. Behind the facade of the world lies a wild and outrageous youth like no other!

Souji Hataki  an ordinary high school boy  ends up working part-time as a housekeeper at the house of Momogusa  the most beautiful girl in school!! Momogusa-san is a perfect girl who is talented at both academics and sports  but at home she becomes super lazy?! For some reason  she grows fond of Hataki and lets her guard down around him enough to let him pamper her?!

title_en: Galge no Sekai de Shinyuu ♂ ga Ore o Sukida to Iidashite!?
description: Aoi  a hard-headed young man secretly yearning for love. When playing the harem game he secretly bought in his best friend Ritsuki’s house  he somehow gets sucked into the game’s world with Ritsuki! While understanding that if they don’t clear the game they can’t leave  Aoi decides to try his best in romancing one of the girls  but suddenly Ritsuki confesses to him…? The story between a whole hearted ikemen childhood friend x a hard headed young man who secretly yearns for love virtually unfolds!

Tae-Yang runs away to the other world after getting caught sleeping with a married woman... The best married woman in this world  and a bed? Can Tae-Yang complete his harem in this other world successfully?

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Boys' Love|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: When he was young  Lee-ahn found and returned a large bag of money and garnered fame as a "Christmas Angel." Since then  Lee-ahn has been very conscious of how others perceive him. Yugeon  who has just moved into Lee-ahn's building  could care less about the gazes of people around him. He acts out at school and even ditches classes. When she learns of Yugeon's arrival  Lee-ahn's mother hopes that he will take care of the outsider for the sake of his reputation. Reluctantly  Lee-ahn obeys his mother. However  Yugeon realizes that Lee-ahn used him for his own image. When Yugeon threatens to tell Lee-ahn's schoolmates about it  Lee-ahn gets defensive... "I don't care if you tell them. Just know  whatever happens next is not my responsibility." I was just going to end things with no regrets... Just wait! Do whatever you want!! Like a beautiful marbling that doesn't mix with water  these two create a beautiful dissonance.

The clock strikes at the single second before the end of the world. Yet humanity has escaped extinction and carry on with their daily lives in the strange and terrible apartment where time stands still. A young girl Maison  Landlord by birth  is on the brink of revealing its secrets...

Seventeen year old Satsuki Moriyama is enjoying her life to the fullest with the boyfriend of her dreams! After 3 months of dating  they finally hold hands and Satsuki is over the moon! Sasaki-kun is the coolest and her reason for living  yet...

Graduate student Kim Jihoon's life is turned upside-down when the long-lost daughter he didn't know he had turns up on his doorstep. After he takes in his daughter Chaerin at her mother's request  Jihoon's life takes a surprising turn for the better. Things start going his way at school  and even his eyesight improves. Although parenting a precocious 7-year-old is a handful  Jihoon loves his little girl  and life is better than ever. It's almost as if there's some magical force at work...
The story follows a third-year high-school girl (Nee-san) who likes building plastic models in a model-making club along with fellow club members Makimaki and Okappa.

Ura baito  also known as a shady part-time job: a gray area job that pays very well. The price you pay is your life. Yume Kokuryo and Nagomi Shirahama are seeking a large sum of money for some reason. To that end  they casually dive into various shady part-time jobs. ___ This work may affect you physically and mentally. Read it at your own risk. We are not responsible for any damage to your health.
An introverted young woman focused on her art makes a connection at a laundromat.

In the near future  after the collapse of civilization  a young man stands up to reunite Japan  which has once again become a warring nation. His name is Seiki Sankaku. He was later described as a military genius  and now his legend begins!

It was surely not love  but it was definitely love. One day  high school student Seiya Maki fell in love at first sight with a bad-looking lunch box prepared by the most beautiful girl in her class  Arisa Asahina. "I want to eat your lunch  so I want you to go out with me". Arisa feels ridiculed by his confession and angrily rejects Seiya  but she is gradually drawn to his unabashed innocence and the kindness with which he accompanies her through her troubles. However  one day Arisa discovers Seiya's secret that he can't tell anyone... Where will their relationship go  and why is Seiya attracted to Arisa's bento? Sad  bitter  loving and beautiful. A coming-of-age story.

Tohru Yanagi  aka BYDE  is an obsessive gamer with a penchant for fantasy tropes. It should come as no surprise  then  that after playing his favorite VR game "Last Fantasy" for 100 hours straight  his heart gave out and he died.   In the endless void after death  he met Celuenon  the god of gaming. Intrigued by his skills  Celuenon invites him to the world of Krenaklem  a land of swords and sorcery and all of those typical isekai tropes. Tohru accepts  and naturally is sent to another world.   So what's the catch this time  you might ask? In lieu of giving him any skills from Last Fantasy  Tohru instead was gifted a deck from "Monster and Magic Masters" - a physical card game he used to play in the past. And just like the trading card game  as long as he has the required mana he can summon any card from his deck  ranging from monsters to his faithful wolfgirl assistant Waff.   Anyway  by now you get the jist of it. If you made it to the end of this synopsis  you know exactly what you're getting into - and you've likely already committed to reading this. Don't let me stop you.

tags: Action|Long Strip|Comedy|Martial Arts|Adventure|Drama|Fantasy|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Adaptation|Full Color
description: Noh Gajang is a strong  dedicated  and humble man  with much respect for the martial arts. But after the death of his lovely wife  this muscle-for-hire just wants an easy job that allows him to be a good father to his three little babies. He’s even happy to pull guard duty and fend off amateur fighters if it means he can return home safely each night.   But when a creepy cult starts stealing children from the city  Gajang must step up to the challenge and discover his true warrior potential.  --- - [Original Webtoon <kakao> Season 1](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52226628) - [Original Webtoon <kakao> Season 2](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59925132) --- - [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/47154) - [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99/132)
A slime girl gets sealed away into the body of a human. . .   . . . and these humans don't listen! I'm not one of you!  Will she be stuck in this nightmare  or will she be free once again?

The New Gate — an online game transformed into a life-and-death struggle for its players. Thanks to the valiant efforts of Shin  the most powerful of them all  an end to the game and freedom for everyone seemed within reach. But just moments after Shin defeats the game's final boss  he finds himself bathed in an unknown light and transported some 500 years into the future of the in-game world!

title_en: Since When Do Guys Find Divorcees Attractive?
description: "I'm going to enjoy my second time being single!". Ono Kazuha has divorced her husband at 35 over an affair. She stood tall and announced "I'm officially divorced" to the fashion magazine's editorial department where she works. To add insult to injury  a handsome new hire happened to overhear. She expected it to be awkward  but for some reason it made him attracted to her?
The cool  lone-wolf girl and her precious  unrequited crush!  (Source: Ganma!  translated)

This battle action manga tells the story of how humanity is threatened by overwhelmingly mighty monsters called "Kijū."  While cities are destroyed and people fall into despair  a single rooster stands up against the threat trying to save humanity...

title_en: The Crossdressing Boy Who Got Hit On

description: Rei Inou  a disillusioned young woman who  driven by existential despair  travels to the famed Aokigahara forest (“sea of trees”) near Mt. Fuji—known for its eerie atmosphere and tragic associations. There  she encounters a powerful  otherworldly phenomenon that sets her on a journey into the realm of the supernatural.

tags: Reincarnation|Action|Long Strip|Romance|Crime|Martial Arts|Military|Drama|School Life|Delinquents|Web Comic|Supernatural|Adaptation|Full Color
description: “Who am I?!”      Leaving only black soot and dead bodies in his wake  Kang Chan  the “God of Blackfield ” struck fear into the hearts of his enemies.  But one day  in the chaos of battle  his life was abruptly snuffed out.  “I’ve been shot… but the bullet came from behind me!”  Revived three years later  this “god” is now a wimpy high schooler with major problems — savage bullies  shady business dealings  and even girls.  Revenge seemed like a straight shot  but high school is a battlefield all of its own!

title_en: Tonde Hi ni Iru Natsu to Mushi
description: Brand new high school first year Mizuhara has but one goal: to quit the sport of basketball he's played for so long! Yet  the very opponent that incinerated his dreams is stopping at nothing to keep him in the game.

Yuna  a cute yet cunning high school girl meets Ema  a flashy gyaru with the same surname at her a part-time job. Despite their similar backgrounds  both feel they probably won't get along... A story about a strange yet comforting bond -  a Reiwa-era sisterhood.  (Prequel two-shot of "Ano Ko to Futari de.")

title_en: It’s true  I did say I wanted a bride. But I draw the line at a crossdressing prince!
description: An unasked for love story between a cross-dressing prince who came to get marry and a cross-dressing miko who was rejected by the hero!  I was summoned to another world  and after defeating the Demon King  I was exhausted. As soon as I returned to the royal palace  I was rejected by the heroes and treated as a nuisance  and so I spent my days training to become a knight with the extra strength I was given during the summoning ceremony.  One day  a fellow knight asked me  "Is there anything you want?" So I answered  "I want a wife."  That was obviously a joke though!

*By Seishun Scans: WARNING! This series contains scenes that may depict sexual harassment  attempted sexual assault  and/or verbal abuse. Reader discretion is advised!*  ---  Shinra has a mother who rarely comes home. Everyday  she pinches her pennies just to survive. Rai  a popular guy from her school keeps bothering her  and she’s getting sexually harassed by the manager at her part-time job. After finally coming home after 2 months  Shinra’s mom promises to stay with her. Rai unexpectedly shows up at Shinra’s part-time job and sees her being sexually harassed. He urges her to quit  but she refuses. Shinra comes home only to find out that her mother has disappeared once again

The story of a contract marriage set in an old-fashioned goldfish shop.   Asahi and Nana are newlyweds who run a goldfish shop. At first glance  they seem to be a normal couple  but in fact  they are a contractual couple who got married because of their mutual interests! They are not true husband and wive   let alone lovers. And yet...  [I'm sorry. I know this is our first time meeting  but will you marry me?]

Gaku Kitada is a prodigy in Mathematics and a scholarship holder at Wels Private Academy  a renowned institution with a long history in the International Mathematical Olympiad. After a series of unfortunate events  he meets Kai Asakura  a culinarian prodigy with his own catering business. What does the future hold for these two geniuses  and how do their paths intertwine with each other's?

Fabre  a famous million-viewer streamer known for his daring encounters with venomous creatures  is bitten by a black mamba while filming in Africa and wakes up in the mystical world of Murim. To his surprise  the jungles of Murim offer him a peaceful farming life in which he enjoys cultivating various poisonous species. But his tranquility is short-lived when he crosses paths with members of the Tang Clan  the masters of poison and devious tactics. "I see potential in you. Become a part of our family.""

Madoka is obsessed with shoujo manga—specifically manga that features younger  innocent guys who fall for their Senpai. So she should be thrilled when a gorgeous kohai comes to work at her father’s restaurant…except he’s rude and standoffish  and wants nothing to do with her. But when she protects him from some extra-pushy fans  he finds that maybe he’s found someone letting his walls down for…!  --- Madoka is a high school girl who loves cute younger boys. One day  Shikura arrives as a part-time worker at her parents' diner! Shikura is beautiful and handsome  but he's not super nice?! She thought she would never like him  but the way he sometimes looks is agonizingly cute! How can she not really like him?!

title_en: Gekai Kiara wa Shibou Furagu wo Yurusanai
description: Akira Kirihara  a genius surgeon  is suddenly reborn as Kiara Bellworth  the protagonist of "Cinderella's Engagement." In Kiara's world  injuries were cured by magic power  but those who could not be cured by magic power were abandoned. After providing first aid to Prince Cecil's follower  Chiara is favored by the prince  who wants to revamp the country's medical system  and he proposes to her. With the prince's backing  she performs surgical procedures on patients who cannot be cured by magic. At first  the prince and Kiara are like partners  but they gradually become attracted to each other.

The manga centers on Yuru  a boy who lives in a remote mountain village  spending his time hunting birds and being one with nature. But one day  Yuru's younger twin sister Asa is called to serve in the jail at the heart of the village  her duty also confining her there. Yuru slowly unravels the unnatural mystery hidden beneath his quiet village. ___ **Official English Volumes:** [Square Enix Manga & Books](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/daemons-of-the-shadow-realm) **Official Indonesian Volumes:** [Elex Media Komputindo](https://elexmedia.id/produk/judul/yomi%20no%20tsugai%20-%20pair%20of%20the%20underworld)

Set in the France 1835. The pretty Rose Dupre is bullied and called the witch's daughter. People say her mother is a witch who kills and eats humans. However  Marie and Peter don't believe all those rumors and decide to protect Rose… But what if the rumors are true?    --- **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Kakao Webtoon](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B0%BD%EB%B0%B1%ED%95%9C-%EB%A7%90/783) - Defunct Official English - [SpotToon](https://www.spottoon.com/workHome/39/THE%20PALE%20HORSE)  [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/palehorse)  **Note:** - The author has split the storyline into parts and seasons. Volume 1.1 for example means Part 1  Season 1.

Tar-chan  a hero living in the jungle  spends his days fighting poachers and assassins to protect the peace of the animals. However  one day  an invitation to an open mixed martial arts tournament was sent to Tar-chan...!?  The series ran in Weekly Shōnen Jump from 1988 to 1990 as Jungle King Tar-chan  and then from 1990 to 1995 as New Jungle King Tar-chan.  At this time most chapters were only 7 pages in length  Two years into serialization  the stories began to run 13-15 pages  "NEW" was added to the title  and the simple episodic gag premise were switched to a fighting manga premise. Although long battles and emotional development began to unfold  after the end of these battles  the series would return to its gag style  switching back to the fighting manga style with each new battle.

title_en: My Harem Consists Entirely of Female Demon Villains
description: I  the earthling "hero" of this story  crossed over into another world based on a video game and suddenly appeared in a villainous female demon's bed when I arrived. If not for the fact that I had married all the villains in the game before crossing over  I'd have been killed pretty quickly. Now  the villains keep pestering me  asking me to help them rule the world  and vying for my hand in marriage. What am I supposed to do? I'll await your answers online! It's urgent!

Eunuchs  the only men allowed to serve in the secret garden known as the harem. When a young eunuch named Jafar encounters three beautiful sisters there  their meeting shakes the country to its foundations!  (MANGA Plus)
A young girl named Kana  a self-proclaimed traveler  meets a young mage named Clevy deep within a forest. After they begin living together  the two gradually start to build a mutual trust...

title_en: I Want to Become an Incubus  Too!
description: In the summer of 202X  a crisis comes for the majority of demons who have been receiving human souls and filling their mana. As there are more devilish humans than demons  there is no need to seek help from demons even while selling their souls. In order to overcome this employment difficulty  demons are preparing to move to a 'mongma' that can absorb energy without human consent. It’s the same for Uffir  but it's not as easy as it sounds. In the end  a detective  Cheol-ho  appears in front of Uffir  who is trying to become a mongma by tricking him...

title_en: Osananajimi Kanojo no Morahara ga Hidoin de Zetsuen Sengen shite Yatta ~Jibun Rashiku Ikiru Koto ni Shitara  Naze ka Tonari no Seki no Kakure Bishoujo kara Kokuhaku Sareta~
description: My childhood friend is also my girlfriend. A dream come true  right? Hell no. She insults me on a daily basis. She grinds my dignity into shreds and it takes a toll on my mental well-being. I can't take it anymore. So I'm left with no choice  I'm going to break up with her. In order to maintain my sanity  it's the only option.

The story follows Fujii To-y  lead singer of GASP  and his attempts not to sell out during his rise through the recording industry.  It also follows To-y’s growing relationship with Niya  who find comfort in one another while they are shunned by mainstream society.

The story could basically be split into two halves. The main story is about Tamai Shiina  who is an energetic middle-school teenage girl. She visits her grandparent's over the summer where she runs into a very strange creature. Shiina has had lots of strange dreams as of late and also when she was younger  and this strange creature is somewhat related to her visions. She names the small cuddly star-shaped creature  Hoshimaru.      Little did she know that this cuddly creature is really part of herself. After her vacation  Shiina goes back to her home  living with her father. She runs into other children with similar creatures the following days. However  these children have developed their creatures  and they have complete control over them. They mostly use these creatures for their own destructive pleasure and not for good. There is a group of teenagers that all have these strange creatures  and they plan to basically conquer the world  creating a utopia of whatever they desire. Will they succeed? Will Shiina ever develop Hoshimaru?

The genius  Cordyceps silkworm  which received a great response every time it was announced  The long-awaited book version of the masterpiece short story!!!   Including "Kikou"  which became a hot topic for depicting the feeling of stagnation and suffocation in the countryside   Jealousy and friendship with female friends  rejection of the word "cute"  etc.  Vividly depicts the pain and bitterness of the heart that everyone has once had  First commercial work collection woven with 6 gem short stories!   In addition to the completely new short story "Tattoo"  there is an epilogue of "Homecoming".  Delivered in a large volume of over 200 pages recorded with newly drawn illustrations!

Toshiki and Kazu Fujiwara are brothers who live an ordinary life in an ordinary world working as insurance salesmen. While Toshiki is content with this salaryman life  Kazu strives to be part of a Guild: a registered group of individuals who hunt artifacts and capture criminals. After finishing up a quest  they begin to unravel the truth: that everything is not as normal as it once seemed.

"So  what shall I eat today?"  Tuna and cheddar cheese  an egg sandwich  and strawberry daifuku toast are breads that brighten the morning.  The unforgettable pasta from that neighbourhood shop run by real artisans.   Washing down sizzling hot dumplings with drinks would be the perfect weekend bliss.   A special brunch with the table filled with crepes.  Packing a pretty tin with all my favourite snacks.  My favourite cute cup.  Buying a new dining table to welcome a new way of living.  Ida Chiaki  beloved for 'Ie Ga Suki Na Hito'  draws her very first essay manga here  depicting about the many small joys of eating.   It's warm  grounded  and filled with the texture of everyday life. It's such a delicious ramble.   Well then  go ahead and dig in.

There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.      Tsukasa  a young man with shattered dreams  and Inori  a girl no one believed in. However  in the face of adversity  those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together  they meet on the ice  and aim for the world with their figure skating! ___ **Links:**   - [Series' Twitter](https://twitter.com/medalist_AFT) - Alternative Official English - [K MANGA (U.S. Only)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10231/episode/318207)  [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/medalist/)

title_en: Kanojo to Kare no Kankei ~Heibon na Hayakawa-san to Heibon na Miura-kun no Hibon na Kankei~
description: "I wish I had a girlfriend  I don't even care who—" "Really? Anybody? Even me?"  Kaho  who has never had a boyfriend before  wanted to have a male-female relationship. Takumi  who wanted a girlfriend  just happened to be talking about it in front of her.  --- Alternate Raws: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8556)

During the wedding of the famous actress  Jing Xiu  Weibo was flooded instead by the shocking headline "New Hit Actress Ji Youyan Dies of Alcohol Poisoning". The headlines were soon changed when the wedding was called off... for reasons unknown.  Ji Youyan suddenly wakes up three years back in time  two years after she broke up with Jing Xiu. This time  she swears to never lose her again...

“Let the survival game begin!”  Designated as a disruptive species in the universe’s ecology  humanity must now participate in the ‘league’ under the watchful eye of the universal administrators.   Jin Jae-hui  sent back in time during the final stage of the game  arrives at one conclusion - only Kang Sion has the power to lead humanity to victory.

After the war  there are many "Extends" in the city  people whose bodies were modified to make them into dangerous weapons. Inui Juuzou is one of them  and he has no memories of his life and body before his head was transformed into a gun. Strangely enough  his head-gun is designed so that only someone behind him can pull the trigger. Juuzou makes a living by taking on cases involving Extends in the city  and he is assisted by Mary  an intelligent young woman that he has taken under his protection.

The popular AV actress Miyama Yuri has suddenly announced her retirement. At the same time  Shikishima  a convenience store manager and her biggest fan  finds himself at a loss—unsure of how to move forward without her in the industry. Amidst this  a girl named Tamagawa-san shows up  applying for a job at Shikishima's store. Coincidentally  she bears a striking resemblance to Miyama Yuri. This uncanny similarity leaves Shikishima torn. Should he ask Tamagawa-san if she's ever appeared in AVs? But in today's politically sensitive climate  such a question feels risky... Who is Tamagawa-san really?
Two Onee-sans bring an innocent Shota into their room… and show him the time of his life!
One day  Satsuki Yamato saw the jagged teeth behind Kiraragi Aisu's mask. As he approached her  those teeth marked the beginning of a sharp and prickly romantic comedy.

Summer of 1940 in Shigaraki  Shiga Prefecture. Yoko Matsubara is a young girl with a talent for pottery. She dreams of becoming a ceramic artist  unaware of the horrors yet to come… In commemoration of the 80th anniversary of World War II  Shonen Jump+ presents an untold account of life during the war.

Despite his athletic gifts  Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams  all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness  he discovers the "Bambies " an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates  but...
In a run-down shopping street  brothers Fuji and Kiri run a small barbershop as they wait for their father's return. In their effort to make ends meet  every day brings something new to their door.

Welcome to Kindergarten Noir  an exclusive school catering to children of the global elite!  Rita  one of the teachers  has been on the hunt for a boyfriend but has had absolutely zero luck so far. One day  an assassin comes after one of the children... and he’s totally dreamy?! ___ * Alt. Official English: [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/kindergarten-wars)

“If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink  isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?”  The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaidou.  The year is 2010.   Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly  he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.   Now nicknamed the “Rabid Prince”  Rou ends up in Tamakomai  an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake  he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong  yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey! ___ **Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/dogsred)

title_en: Dungeon Gakuen no Teihen ni Tensei Shita kedo  Naze ka Ore ni wa Kouryaku Hon ga Aru
description: "Takashi Takasugi is the lowest-ranked student in his class  plagued by bad luck. He clashes with the protagonist  leaves the academy  and is rumored to have died—a truly unfortunate character." That's how the game's strategy guide described him... and now  the protagonist finds himself reincarnated as this bottom-tier nobody!  Drowning in despair  he searches his classroom desk—only to discover the very strategy guide he bought in his previous life. "If I use this  I can become the strongest!?" Determined to escape his tragic fate  Takasugi sets off to secretly grind his skills in dungeons... but hardship awaits at every turn. However  when he starts traveling alongside the game's beautiful heroine  Hanagasaki  his destiny takes a dramatic turn—accelerating toward an unexpected reversal!

title_en: Shin'yuu no Otto wo Ubatta no wa  Watashi deshita
description: Spin-off of *Shin'yuu no Furin Aite wa  Otto deshita*.

title_en: Punishing: Gray Raven — In Sync with You
description: "Could you get closer to me? Like the dream that will never come true. What's in the dream...? It's a secret."  This is a story about Liv and the Gray Raven Commandant — a tale of connection and healing.   In reality  no matter the circumstances  Liv has never given up hope. Perhaps for her  fairy tales can come true.  Created by meteorgale  an officially approved content creator on PGR's Global server. Artists: meteorgale and zenokim.   Primarily slice of life genre/romance  not action.

*What he caught was one unusual mermaid!?*  A man captures a mermaid to profit from her flesh  which is said to grant eternal life to anyone who eats it. But while waiting to make the exchange  something unexpected begins to bloom between them! A new interspecies romance from Yuki Subuta!  *Part of the Shonen Jump+ 11th Anniversary Special 11-page 11 oneshot project* [Official Webpage](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2083/) | [View Others](https://mangadex.org/list/51d1bfc8-4f7c-455b-a4ae-26d5fb36dd9d/jump-11th-anniversary-special-11-page-oneshot-project)

Hugo  the grandson of Adam  is struggling to reopen the bakery left by his late grandfather. However  he is not good at baking. Then  Adam's former apprentice  Sumino Mitsuyuki  comes to the store. Hugo decides to ask Sumino  who he's not very fond of  if he can help reopen the bakery  but it turns out that Sumino hasn't made bread for three years! Hugo is at a loss  but... how does the bread made by Sumino taste?  (Source: Shogakukan  translated)

Naoto  a “corporate slave ” and Ren  a “host ” meet at 5:00 a.m.  at a beef bowl restaurant in Shinjuku's Kabuki-Chō. They are complete strangers who just so happen to share breakfast each day side by side  a rather unusual relationship.  A corporate slave whose day is about to begin and a host whose day has finally come to an end. This is a morning routine story that depicts the only 15 minutes in which these two people  who live on opposite sides of the clock  intersect!

title_en: Kuzu Rouninsei  Jinsei ga Tsurai no de Yoru no Onee-san wo Yondemita
tags: Award Winning|Psychological|Romance|Comedy|Office Workers|Girls' Love|Drama|School Life|Delinquents|Slice of Life|Gyaru
description: Makino failed her college entrance exam. Her only comfort is in her 2D game characters... until she found an ad for a call-girl who looked exactly like her favorite in-game waifu! The yuri love comedy between a gullible young woman and a street-wise call-girl begins now!

In this world  the concept of levels exist. Other than those who live off defeating monsters  most people are only around Level 1 to 5. What's more  not just anyone can go out to hunt monsters; it's heavily influenced by one's role appointed by God. There are eight such eligible roles: warriors  fighters  clerics  magicians  rogues  merchants  hunters  and sorcerers. Those blessed with extraordinary power are divided into three types: royalty  heroes  and sages. But for the majority of the population  they have no such powers and live by farming or running shops. Towns are developed by those with the weakest role: villagers. For the powerless villagers going out to hunt monsters is equivalent to committing suicide. But one day  a certain two-year-old child given the role of villager notices something: once you defeat a monster... you can earn great wealth.

title_en: Chronicle of the Searing Winds of Tianzhu
description: The manga tells a fictional version of the story of historical Tang China diplomat Wang Xuance  centering on his diplomatic journey from Tang Dynasty China to the Empire of Harsha in India in the 7th century CE. When he comes upon a crumbling empire that is now hostile to him he escapes to Tibet and raises a confederation of Tang  Nepalese  and Tibetan soldiers to mount a raid on the Empire of Harsha.

Minato Usami is a high-school girl with a new little brother from her father's remarriage. Having high expectations after being told that her new brother is an adorable little boy  Koshiro—said little brother—turns out to be a little different than she imagined.

The year is 200X  an age where everything is covered with computer networks  and everyone in the world has a "PET" mobile terminal. Hikari Netto  a grade school student at Akihara Elementary  is in perfect harmony with his NetNavi  Rockman  and is obsessed with Net Battles. But then  he gets caught up in an incident involving World Three (WWW)  a criminal organization that stages cyber-terrorist attacks. Finally  the Ministry of Science is taken over  and Netto's father is taken hostage. In order to save his father and stop WWW's plan  he confronts the Dream Virus  the most powerful computer virus fused with the "Ultimate Program."

title_en: Kimi no Negai ga Kanau made
description: For his high school debut  Minto Shishidou pretended to be an outgoing playboy  spinning lies about the girlfriends he goes through. This corner he backed himself into weighs heavily on his mind when he joins a school trip  and he’s determined to use the occasion to get a girlfriend for real. But then an unimaginable incident strikes him and his classmates  setting the stage for a locked-room love comedy centered around the wishes of these boys and girls.  (Source: Natalie  translated)

Takumi Aono really wants to be a competitive swimmer! Like  really  really  really wants to be one. Although he swims everyday  rain or shine  he's still not there yet. But when he meets a very bitter lifeguard  something unexpected happens!      **Included one-shots:**   Volume 2: Best Blue (pilot)   Volume 3: 31 Heroes      As a part of the JUMP START initiative  the first three chapters of Best Blue were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.

During summer break  a junior high school student Mitsuharu collides with an unusual creature while speeding on his bicycle. That unusual creature was a genderless alien called Toki who came to Earth for a "purpose". An unpredictable story about a lonely human and an alien starts! ___ **Links:** - [Jump Square](https://jumpsq.shueisha.co.jp/rensai/sentakunotoki/)

A boy who looks up to his police officer father keeps getting hurt while helping others  until one bandage leads to a fateful encounter. But there's a reason they can never be together...?! A pure story about defying destiny begins‼︎

title_en: Kiraware Majo Reijou to Dansou Ouji no Kon'yaku
description: Vilified by others as a "witch"  Evris  the youngest daughter of the House of Bradley  is engaged to Mark  the fifth prince of the Kingdom of Klengel. When he abruptly announces that their engagement is broken off  Evris is plunged into despair. However  someone reaches out to her instead... The cross-dressing crown prince (♀) of a neighboring country!?  This is the story of a red-haired witch who manipulates shadows and a cross-dressing crown prince (♀) who is serving as a body double for her missing older brother.   The curtain rises on a fantasy romantic comedy of a girl being teased by a princess!  Serialization began in the July 2023 issue of *Yuri Hime*.

Hatoko is a girl who can see youkai. Her job is to deliver packages to the youkai lurking around town.   Today  like many other days  she will go around to meet them with the nekomata Kokone by her side. A not-so-scary yonkoma about youkai filled with laughs and a touch of sadness.

Yuna  a 15-year-old girl  started playing the world's first VRMMO. She has earned billions of yen in stocks and confines herself in her house playing the game without going to school. Today  a major update has arrived and she obtained a non-transferable rare bear outfit. But the equipment is so embarrassing that she can't wear it even in the game. Furthermore  when she answers the survey regarding the new update and relaunches the game  she appears in an unknown forest in the bear outfit. Where is this? Email from God? A different world? If she wears the bear outfit she's a cheat  if she takes it off she's a normal girl.

Ninjas  known for their exceptional physical abilities  mastery of various tools  and expertise in stealth operations. Knights  who pledge loyalty to their lords  excel in advanced swordsmanship  and are skilled in combat.

Haruto  a second year high school student  has two secrets.  The first is that anyone he kisses loses consciousness and their memories of the preceding five hours.  The second is darker and more bloody  and binds him - like the friendship bracelet he wears - to first-year student Umi  although she cannot remember why.  Secrets  like memories  can come to haunt you...  Debut serialisation by Minato Ayase.
A short epilogue to the movie of the same name. It was included in the ".hack//Archives_05".

Sudo Nagiko acquires a boyfriend unwillingly. The boy named Tobita decided to be her boyfriend after calling her ugly. He does not seem the type to take no for an answer  especially after showing Yandere tendencies.

title_en: My Father Has Become a Beautiful Girl and It's a Lot of Pain
description: One day  a beautiful girl enters Tatsuya's room... only to reveal that it’s his father  completely transformed by the shock of losing his job! Confused by the father he no longer recognizes  Tatsuya begins to experience gradual changes in their once-distant father-son relationship. As the father takes on a more motherly role  and Tatsuya starts acting more like the father  or perhaps a close friend becomes like a father figure...  A new TS comedy that  despite being called ‘biologically impossible’ on social media  is surprisingly a father-son story that will warm your heart!  (Source: Amazon JP  edited)

Aurora el la Porta is a noblewoman with one love—the art of embroidery. While she attends the lavish evening parties her peers so adore  she's not looking for a dance but inspiration for a new design! On one such night  distracted by the many beautiful dresses on display  she's struck in the face by a mysterious wedding ring. When she picks it up  one of the finest knights in the kingdom approaches  declaring her his new fiancée! Aurora has no idea what's going on  but one thing's for sure—she's got a big decision to make... ___ - [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FL00200618010000_68/) - [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1253cj/)

title_ja: Backstabbed in a Backwater Dungeon: My Party Tried to Kill Me  But Thanks to an Infinite Gacha I Got LVL 9999 Friends and am Out for Revenge
description: There are six races in this world: human  beast  dragon  elf  dwarf  and demon. Humans are discriminated against and looked down on as the most inferior race. The "Gathering of Races" was a party with members from each race gathered to dispel such discrimination  but they also had a hidden purpose. They were ordered by the non-human countries to search for the human "Master " and take it to their own country.  Light  a human boy with the gift "Infinite Gacha " was welcomed into the Gathering of Races as he was suspected of being a Master. But in the end  their investigation showed that Light was not a Master. Just as Light was about to be killed by his teammates  he accidentally stepped on a transfer trap and was teleported to the lowest level of the dungeon. In the deepest dungeon  he was attacked by a mythical level 1000 demon. In a desperate situation  Light used "Infinite Gacha" repeatedly. Luckily  he draws the SUR level 9999 card "Mei the Seeker Maid." Mei helped Light repel the demons and saved his life.  After finally escaping from the crisis  Light decides to take revenge on his former comrades. Mei advises him to remain in the dungeon and use Infinite Gacha to increase his number of trustworthy friends. Light agreed began building up the power necessary to oppose the non-human nations. Three years later  Light had built the strongest nation in the depths of the dungeon. Once again  he will return to the surface to take revenge on his former comrades and search for the truth that nearly killed him. ___ [Alt Official English (US ONLY)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10040/episode/345702)
Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...?

title_en: Saegusa-san wa Megane-senpai to Koi wo Egaku
description: Saegusa-san is a cool lone wolf who in reality is asocial  a downer  and overall sucks at interacting with others. But she harbors a secret. She's actually going out with her senior  referred to by everyone as Glasses-Senpai. In order to close the gap between them  every day Saegusa-san puts herself on the line (in more ways than one!) On the other hand  Glasses-Senpai is agonized over Saegusa-san's unintentional sex appeal. If he is Saegusa-san's first boyfriend  then she is his first girlfriend  and neither of them have any clue about how far they should go! Where will this romance end up?!

"I'll be your mother."  After losing her biological mother  Mayu Kanda was abused by her guardian uncle every day  and could barely eat properly  but she just laughed it off. Until she met a mysterious beauty  Kamakura Komachi  who suddenly appeared.  Is she  who acts like a mother  a ray of hope for Mayu? Or...?  (Source: AniList; Ichijinsha  translated)

tags: Traditional Games|Action|Romance|Comedy|Adventure|Virtual Reality|Video Games|Harem|School Life|Delinquents|Slice of Life|Supernatural|Mystery
description: Kazama Kenji likes to believe he is something of a delinquent. Moreover  others seem to like to agree that he is. Of course  Kenji's gang finds their way to a group of four not-so-normal girls - Chitose  Sakura  Minami and Roka - and all at once  whatever reputation he may have  is nothing compared to the outrageous behavior of the girls. Shanghaied into joining their club  what will happen to his everyday life from that point on?

title_en: Watashi to Kanojo no Kawaii Koi no Hajime Kata
description: Yoshiko Yokozawa is an office lady who loves cute things and being cute herself. Because of this  she is often not taken seriously and she is fed up with it. On the other hand  Chiaki Kurisu  a sales representative from a trading company  always seems very serious when she visits for business. For some reason  Kurisu suddenly invites Yokozawa to dinner!? Outside of work  Kurisu-san is completely different from her usual business-like behavior  being totally open and vulnerable...!?  "This woman  is cuter than me!?"  You can't help but fall for her. ♡ Adult girls-love ♡

In the 6th year of the Enka era  a scientist invented Myther  a device designed to create an ideal personality. With it  people could become their ideal selves and break away from their weak selves. However  underneath the surface  Myther Crime - a hidden social issue -  has emerged  where those who abuse Myther suffer from their minds breaking  before carrying out horrific acts of violence. Kyo of Special Intelligence Agency  directly controlled by the Japanese authorities  works from the shadows to fight against these crimes. All for the sake of loyalty to the government...

He was born fast. He had nothing else  only the ability to run fast. It gave him “a place at school” and “a bridge between friends”. That was all the boy had. Then he met another boy who ran to forget the hardships in life. He was not fast by any means  but he had passion. The passion was infectious  and he gradually came to feel the same excitement. But that was the beginning of the “abnormality”.

title_en: Harapeko Kopeko wa Niku to Sumu!
To Remain a Magical Girl Is Hard
description: Chosen from above  a selection of teenagers are made into magical girls to fight for the city and to aspire everyone! Rin Yamabuki has just moved into town and still has a lot to learn about and still needs time to get adjusted to everything. Rin's close friend  Wakaba  reveals he himself is a magical girl.  As things start settling  a monster appears in the city that almost defeats Wakaba. With his friend in danger  Rin  now faced with new dangers must act on a decision and quickly.
A story about a flirty kouhai seducing her senpai.
The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However  their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then  an incident occurs  and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.

Back in sixth grade  Mirei hurt her best friend Soprano with heartless words after she confessed to her. Five years later  Soprano  now a famous model  transfers to Mirei's high school. While Mirei hopes to reconcile with Soprano and go back to being friends with her  friendship isn't what's on Soprano's mind.

In the distant past  the prosperous nation of Karma waged war against the nation of Spectra  resulting in the creation of an AI that wiped out all humans. Centuries later  Raye  the last surviving human  lives amongst an android society on the outskirts of Karma. On the night of her 13th birthday  her peaceful life is upended when Spectra attacks  destroying her home and forcing her friends to the front lines. Desperate to save everything she loves  Raye calls upon humanity's last bastion: "Sky Striker"  the Karma-developed secret technology made to turn humans into the ultimate living weapons.… Unexpected  right? In this newest adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh  the focus of the plot is not on the card game  but instead the many storylines featured in the cards. The first arc surrounds the Sky Striker series  with more to come in the future.

Battle tournament manga set in the Sengoku Era. The year is 1600. Ten years have passed since Oda Nobunaga unified Japan. When Nobunaga realized that he was dying  he announced that he would hand over the country to the one who produced the strongest warriors. The warlords  whose dreams of unifying the country had been dashed  set up their own strongest warriors and set their sights on becoming the ruler of Japan. ___ **Additional Links:** - **Alt Official Raws:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/3269754496359886083)  [YanMaga Web](https://yanmaga.jp/comics/%E3%83%86%E3%83%B3%E3%82%AB%E3%82%A4%E3%83%81_%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E6%9C%80%E5%BC%B7%E6%AD%A6%E8%8A%B8%E8%80%85%E6%B1%BA%E5%AE%9A%E6%88%A6) - **Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10585/episode/356567) - United States  Japan  Canada  Australia  New Zealand  Singapore  Philippines  Thailand  Vietnam  Hong Kong  Taiwan  India  Mexico  and Brazil only. - [Official X](https://x.com/tenkaichi_MYM)

title_en: Kono Fukushuu ni Gyaru wa Iranai
description: Nozomi Kashihara  a lonely hitman whose parents were killed  has never known warmth in his life. He betrayed the "family" that raised him and lived his life as a plain high school student  but after he saves a gal in his class from a group of delinquents  he somehow finds himself getting closer to her. Kashihara begins to suspect that she may be an assassin targeting him...

Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly  tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge.

title_en: Dragon Quest: The Great Adventure of Dai - Avan the Brave and the Demon King of Hellfire
description: The Demon King's army led by Hadler is attacking the world. The Kingdom of Carl and Princess Flora stand up to stop the invasion. And then there's young Avan!

In 2200  with humanity's declining birthrate  Japan became a cat country.  High school girl Mugishima-san lives with her cat Sora. The town they live in is especially full of cats  who have all learned to speak Japanese and have Opinions. A slow  happy  kitty slice of life comedy.

A collection of short stories. English scanlation is based on the censored SEA release.    *Diabolic Tales • 1: Ninjin Daisuki:* A little boy named Takashi-chan hates eating carrots  so one night  he prays that somehow  he will be able to like eating them. Little does he know how dangerous this wish turns out to be...  *Diabolic Tales • 2: Saishuu Bus.* Sachiko visits Hitomi in her new rural home on the pretext of visiting an old friend. She gets on the last bus back to avoid having to stay at Hitomi's creepy new house  but...  *Diabolic Tales • 3: FAMILY* Yuka lives with her gentle father and mother and mischievous  but cute  younger sister Eri. Things seem like they should be so happy  but why is it that sometimes Yuka feels so uneasy? What important memory is she forgetting?  *Diabolic Tales • 4: Noriawaseta Shinigami* Miya was supposed to just take her father his lunch  but an earthquake stops the elevator she is on. Before the lights go off  a woman calls out that there is a shinigami (a grim reaper) among them  but suddenly dies before everyone is able to see where she pointed. Was the woman just crazy or is everyone's life now in grave danger?  *Bonus: Soshite Yami wa Yomigaeru* Minori is on a trip to a small lodge in the mountains with her school club. They are specifically going because the site is rumored to be frequented by UFOs  and they want to investigate. They are meeting Minori's cousin  Naoki  there  but why is it that Minori keeps experiencing deja vu?

title_en: Asumi-chan is Interested in Lesbian Brothels!
description: Sweet but awkward college student Asumi never got over her childhood crush on her old friend Mai. Their first and only kiss couldn’t have gone worse. So when she learns that Mai may be working at a nearby brothel  she sets her sights on redemption! But there’s one catch: none of the women on the brothel’s website use full photos or real names. Thus begins a journey of self-discovery and sexual exploration as she sets out to find her one that got away.

title_en: Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru ni Watashi wa Naru!
description: In middle school  friendless otaku Arimoto Airi had a revelation after reading (legally distinct) *Gals Can't Be Kind to Otaku*. If she turned herself into a gal  wouldn't she be able to make a ton of friends? Now in high school  her plan is about to come to fruition.

A secret relationship with a mysterious entity... In a world with demonic monsters called Shenguai  a young orphan named Kou lives alone in the mountains with a mysterious Shenguai named Chiyou. But Chiyou has a tragic past  and Kou will have to give all of himself in order to save her. A beautiful East Asian adventure now begins!

title_en: Ki no Mi Ki no Mama
description: She's competent at work  but her personal life is a mess. Then she meets a younger boy... or is it a girl?  Note: this is published in "Rakuen Le Paradis"  with an issue every 4 months.

title_en: Ryuu to Ayumu Nariagari Boukensha-dou: Youzumi Toshite S-Rank Party kara Tsuihou Sareta Kaifuku Majutsushi  Suterareta Saki de Saikyou no Shinryuu o Fukkatsu Sasete Shimau
description: **“Understand for yourself that you are worthless. You are already obsolete.”**  Dion  the recovery wizard who was told so  was seriously injured by the hands of party members and left behind in the interior of the highest difficulty dungeon.  On the verge of running out of his life  he happens to encounter a dying dragon. Dion realized that he couldn't help him anymore  and he treated the dragon to live as a recovery wizard until the end. Then the dragon thanked him and even shared the power of the dragon. In addition  this dragon seems to have been a legendary god dragon-class. Dion escapes from the dungeon with his new companion  the dragon  and restarts as an adventurer. He captures the difficult dungeons that stand in his way  and his abilities are recognized and he has all the strong men on his side. ___ **Character Designer:** [Sisoe](https://mangadex.org/author/9a1a04cb-1d27-4601-809d-665b4f4918c4)  **Additional Links:**   - Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55539) - [Official Raw Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6844gh) - [Official Raw Light Novel](https://www.bunkasha.co.jp/author/a236341.html)
In the shadows of Edo  under the ban on Christianity  lurks an ominous supernatural presence no one should approach. Give in to curiosity  and there will be no way back!

Starting his second year of high school  Ren Tabata was determined to get over his loner past and make some new friends. The first person he approached was the girl next to him  Toruko Sasaki  who seemed gloomy and a little intimidating at first  but he couldn't seem to take his eyes off her. A romantic comedy between two shy but cute people who don't want to be alone anymore!

Yachiru is a hasshakusama youkai living in the human world. Because the prevailing public image of hasshakusama is that they're lewd  her powers have weakened and her height has shrunk from its original 8 shaku (240 cm) to about 190 cm. She strives to correct that impression  but each day is another failure. However  while at the cinema to study horror films  she meets Seiichirou  a young man who is a huge fan of hasshakusama. That's when Yachiru realizes that whenever Seiichirou praises her  her height returns to its original size...!!! ___ **Additional Links:** - **Alt Official Raws:**   - [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/title/02927/episode/420064)   - [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/73100)   - [YanMaga Web](https://yanmaga.jp/comics/%E3%82%84%E3%81%A1%E3%82%8B%E3%81%95%E3%82%93%E3%81%AF%E3%81%BB%E3%82%81%E3%82%8B%E3%81%A8%E3%81%AE%E3%81%B3%E3%82%8B) - [Official X](https://x.com/yachirusanha)

Annoying! Cute! But Annoying!  Shinichi Sakurai is a grumpy-faced  athletic and quiet college student who just wants to be left alone   but he is frequently teased by his cute  stacked underclassman Hana Uzaki  whom he has known since high school.     Sugoi Dekai means something along the lines of "impressively huge." ___ **Additional Links:** - Alt Official Raws: [KADOComi](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_004657_S?episodeType=first)  [KADOKAWA](https://promo.kadokawa.co.jp/uzakichan/) - [Official X](https://x.com/uzakichan_asobi)

Historical war drama set in Summer 1945 on the northern Kuril islands. Even though the Pacific War has ended already   a group of Japanese tank soldiers is suddenly confronted with an unexpected battle.

Since ancient times  the arcane arts have been used as tools of political strife and weapons of war. Practitioners of these arts  known as spellcasters  sought to ensure the survival of their kind by demonstrating the utility of their powers to the government. However  as the ages passed and the number of spellcasters grew  momentum built within the arcane community to reassess their societal standing. It was in this climate that a nation of spellcasters—commonly known as the Eastern Enchantment—was born. And the governing body of this land came to be called... the Empyreal Cabinet. ___ **Additional Links:** - [Official X](https://x.com/tembodaikaku)

title_en: Ato wa Gojiyuu ni Douzo! ~Tutorial de Kami-sama ga Last Boss wo Taoshi Chatta node Watashi wa Suki Houdai Ikiteiku~
description: My name's Karina—or at least  it is now! I used to be a nondescript  run-of-the-mill Japanese salaryman until I was whisked away to a divine realm where the Goddess of Time and Space told me I'd be living a new life in a new world—and as a girl  since apparently she prefers it that way. First she wants me to beat some final boss she has a grudge against  then she takes control of my body to show me how to use my new spatial magic powers in a tutorial fight... Wait  isn't that the final boss I'm supposed to beat?! Less than in a minute into the tutorial and he's dead?! And now she says the world's my oyster. Seriously?! ___ [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/knock-yourself-out-the-goddess-beat-the-final-boss-in-the-tutorial-so-now-i-m-free-to-do-whatever)

title_en: I'm in Love with the Villainess
description: Ordinary office worker Oohashi Rei wakes up in the body of the protagonist of her favourite otome game  *Revolution*. To her delight  the first person to greet her is also her favourite character  Claire François – the main antagonist of the story!  Now  Rei is determined to romance Claire instead of the game’s male leads. But how will her villainous lady love react to this new courtship?!

This is a shorts manga version of the [main work](https://mangadex.org/title/b8fd9d83-40c4-40f9-8525-bfcab3a6c3eb/osananajimi-wo-erabenai) serialized in Gangan Joker.  It's not necessary to read the main story to be able to follow this one.

title_en: Global Freeze: I Created an Apocalypse Shelter
description: The world is plunged into an icy age  and 95% of humanity is wiped out! In his previous life  our hero Zhang Yi was tragically killed by the very people he helped  thanks to his kind heart.  But fear not  for Zhang Yi has been reborn and now possesses the awesome power – space manipulation! He's gone completely bonkers hoarding supplies for the icy apocalypse and is ready to rule the frozen wasteland! He vows to unleash a hundred times the pain on those who harmed him in the past!

From Suspense & Horror 1998/08. Part 4 of the Stalker Stories special feature.  Since the day Masumi dropped his driver's license he has been haunted by small creatures. The other important thing he dropped that day was...

title_en: My Childhood Friend Is A Dragon Who's Embarrassed About the Size Of Her Tail
description: Life's already tough for a dragon girl with an unusually large tail  but when she starts having feelings for her childhood best friend  life gets even tougher. With a little help from her friends  maybe she'll be able to navigate the trials and tribulations of young love.  An original 4-page webcomic formerly hosted on Twitter  now available in chapter format.  Reads left to right.

In the middle of the school day  on the second floor of the gym. This is where the two came to skip class  and it's where their friendship began. A story of two high school girls  playing ping-pong and chatting as they spend the heydays of their youth.

A young man born deaf and mute  shunned by those around him and named 'Kegare' (Unclean). He's hired as a guard by a lady at a certain estate. The lady  who possesses a mysterious constitution  attempts to communicate with Kegare through sign language while telling him  "You may kill me."   A stunning one-shot from a Monthly MAG Garden Manga Award winning author.

"I wanted to understand my oshi's feelings." ― Sakurako  a shut-in otaku  called a call boy and tried to perform a sexual act for the first time in her life. However  just before the act  Sakurako became afraid  and in her rush  she accidentally revealed an eroge she was in the middle of playing  causing her to panic! Having her fetish revealed to the extroverted and handsome call boy Fuji-kun  she becomes embarrassed  but as she despairs  it's revealed that Fuji-kun was an otaku comrade as well...? This is a pure oshikatsu love story between an otaku girl and a call boy!

Kikuru Madan  a monster hunter with excellent performance because of his particular job in the forest  decides to quit his job because he doesn't want to waste his youth. The reason he wants to quit was that one of his friends got married. One day there is a new recruit. Enome the Guild Receptionist asks him to accompany Hitamuki Kyan the Lolipai Martial Artist to watch her back and teach her how to work. He accepts the request  half because he was worried about her and half because he wanted her to become his successor before he retires completely. Sadly  his plan to retire is derailed by Hitamuki being useless and always attracting some monster. Can Kikuru Madan retire peacefully  despite being saddled with a useless newbie?

This work is being published after discussions with the relevant parties  using manga data left on a used PC that was purchased by Komori Hiki-sensei. Please enjoy it without concern  no matter what events may occur in this manga.

title_en: Isekai H Eiyuuden ~Bishoujo Senshi-tachi wa Saikyou Gunshi no Muchana Onegai ni Sakaraenai~
description: Noa Zuiho  a second-year high schooler with amazing tactical analysis skill  is brought to another world! In order to save this other world from monsters  the goddess gives him the Power of Wisdom  which increases his tactical insight through... erotic actions?! In an epic war between humanity and monsters  who will prevail? A brilliant strategist rises — with unorthodox methods and adult incentives to motivate his all-female army!

17-year-old Iguchi Tatsuya has just been released from juvenile detention and is on probation. He's been relocated to a new area  away from the bad influence of his old friends  and is under the care of his aunt. He is determined not to be sent back to lockup  and he works hard in his aunt's restaurant. However  he still has the same personality  the same tendency to violence  and still falls in with the same sort of people. It's going to be difficult for him to stay out of trouble.

Japanese sweets save a debt-ridden elf!  Alice  an elf  runs a confectionery shop in the forest of Auin to pay off the debt left by her parents. One day  however  when she is worried that her sweets are not selling  she suddenly falls into the "Fountain of Wishes. When she opens her eyes  she finds herself in a strange world...

Between a recent move to Tokyo and the first day of high school  Rei starts his day filled with anxiety and insecurity. His nervousness accompanies him to the classroom  where amidst the classroom chatter  Rei is suddenly struck with a strange dream  followed by an aching in his chest.  Once he wakes up  Rei is greeted by a small creature standing on his desk. Passing it off as part of his dream  Rei heads home. However  to his surprise  numerous other strange creatures of all shapes and sizes roam the streets  seemingly invisible to everyone else.  With countless questions and the small creature from before trailing behind him  Rei's life is changed forever when he encounters a tall one-eyed figure  dressed in all black  smiling at him. ___ **Note:** This manga is based on the song of the same name.

"I will show no mercy to anyone who lays a hand on my family!"   A world in which people are desperate to obtain the power of spirits  who possess enormous magical power and wisdom. Vilm  an abomination with black hair and black eyes  spends his days protecting the village with his spirit family. One day  he is forced to take responsibility for a decision he made and set off on a journey to the outside world... An exhilarating summoning battle fantasy in which a loner and a spirit beast sister "ultimately" change the world begins now!    The long-awaited comic adaptation of the exhilarating summoning battle fantasy in which a human x spirit family shakes the world!    [Orignal Webnovel](http://ncode.syosetu.com/n4180ei/)

"Is this person already dead...?   Behind the door  lying in bed  is a grotesque figure...  Akane Kuritani  a new caregiver  arrives at a secluded Western-style mansion deep in the mountains to provide live-in care for Kiwako Miyazono  the bedridden owner. Hoping for a fresh start  Akane is shocked to find Kiwako emanating a putrid smell  with discolored skin and a burlap sack over her face  looking nothing less than a 'corpse.' The nature of the care she must provide is clearly abnormal...  Based on a Kadokawa Horror Bunko novel  a terrifying nursing care horror tale begins.

Having forgotten his keys  Tamao Hiroi a high-school student  returns home using the back entrance and is surprised to find a stranger in his bed... Soon he realizes this is no stranger but Ran Homura  one year younger  softball ace and one of the most beautiful girls at school! Hiroi watches her masturbating on his bed and instinctively does the same peeking through the glass door.

title_en: Mahou wa Isekai ni Oite Kimashita. ~ Tensai Madoushi Datta Imouto no Yowakute New Game ~
description: Mikan  a young girl transported to a world of swords and magic  grows up to become a great mage who saves that world from crisis—only to be sent back to her hometown  Niigata. Having lost her magic and companions from the other world  Mikan becomes a shut-in. Her older brother Itsuki  who has waited ten long years for her return  does everything he can to show her the joys of this world and gently coax her outside—but will he succeed…?!

Magazine model Miyu-chan is busy with a photoshoot again today. Of course  her lunch isn’t the low-calorie meal a model should have... instead  it’s tonkotsu ramen packed with calories ♡. With noodles  extra noodles  rice  and soup  Miyu-chan was enjoying a hearty diet when suddenly a disaster struck her…!

A story about the relationship between Tainaka Seri  a mid-career manga artist who has only had one successful work  and her new editor Futami Sumire. When her editor  who has been with her for 10 years since her debut  decides to transfer  Seri is introduced to her new editor Sumire. Sumire says she is a fan of Seri's  and while Seri is surprised by her unique way of closing the distance  she is somehow fascinated by her...  (Source: Natalie  translated)

It's been 10 years since Takamichi reincarnated in hell. His Incubus power becomes stronger by having sex with women  but his growth peaked.  "I'll move to a new area  wait for me beautiful women of the new world!"

This is a story of the life of Napoleon. The tale begins just before the Battle of Austerlitz. Then  it jumps back to 1769 to tell the story of Napoleon's life from the very beginning  including the circumstances of his birth  his childhood on Corsica  and his difficulties as a Corsican boy in a French school. All of these experiences eventually culminate in his becoming the famous Emperor of the French.

title_en: THE iDOLM@STER MILLION LIVE! Blooming Clover
