description: Part of [THE iDOLM@STER](https://mangadex.org/?page=search&title=iDOLM%40STER) series.

title_en: Last Boss Toubatsugo ni Hajimeru Nishuume Boukensha Life - Hajimari no Machi de Wakeari Bishoujo-tachi ga Mechakucha Natsuite kimasu
description: Adventurer Might lost his life while defeating an evil dragon. However  he was brought back to life by the blessing of a goddess who heard the wishes of the companions who saved the world together. Furthermore  due to Might's own wish  his class changed from Thief to the Sage he had always admired! When Might  who returned to Level 1 as compensation for changing his class  heads to the beginners' guild  he finds 'a group of girls in a beginner party' arguing about something...?

Gotou  a virgin high school boy  has a crush on his affectionate gal classmate  Agawa. But one day after school  he catches Agawa having sex with Takayama in an empty classroom. Gotou is devastated  but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama  Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even...!? ___ **Note:** After the release of Chapter 35  author Takeda Super decided to take the story in a new  different direction  so Chapters 31–35 were retconned and new chapters were drawn. However  for fans that enjoyed the original timeline  the old chapters were later compiled into [their own volume](https://mangadex.org/title/b782186f-60d9-4f6c-b050-7b21013040ff) that even included an additional chapter in that timeline.  **Alternative Official Raws:** - [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361135826437) - [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/4856001361243117705)

title_en: Tensei Shita Ore ga Kawaii Sugirunode  Aisare Kyara wo Mezashite Ganbarimasu
description: I was hit by a car while protecting a child  and before I knew it  I had been reincarnated in another world as Yumie Granbell  the extraordinarily beautiful daughter of a count. When I looked in the mirror  the reflection staring back at me was that of an angelic girl  absolutely peerless in beauty!  The Granbell family  into which I was born in this life  is a prestigious magical family with considerable influence. I thought I had hit the jackpot  reincarnating into a winning life  but it turned out that the family was on the verge of collapse. And to make things worse  the cause of that collapse was... ME!?  Now  I want to finally obtain the family I've always dreamed of! With my cuteness  I'll solve any problem and restore the family to its former glory! ___ Alternative raw: [Niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/69838)

title_en: Watashi ga 15-sai de wa Nakunatte mo.
description: “Maybe I've been waiting for such a moment for a long time!”  While being estranged by his daughter and being blamed by his wife  middle-aged office worker Iwashita lived modestly in his own way. This was his norm at least until he met a girl  Shiina  who suddenly appeared one day in front of him. She approached Iwashita as a “customer” for “a meal of 20 000 yen”. A story of a small escape begins with a painful and dazzling 15-year-old girl seeking her own value and a 40-year-old middle-aged man struggling between reason and desire.

An anthology of girls' love short stories about one night love affairs.  Cover Illustration: Yukiko  Koryouriya Kemari (小料理屋けまり) [Tsuzura Ryou] Anata wo Yume ni Tojikomete (あなたを夢に閉じ込めて) [Kawakami Shion] Kuro ni Majiwareba Aka ni Naru (黒に交われば赤になる) [Yodokawa] Itsuwari no Yubiwa to Hontou no Yoru (偽りの指輪と本当の夜) [Shinogi Asa] Inugai-Hanchou no Kaiinu wa Mike (犬飼班長の飼い犬はミケ) [Ikuta Hana] Koukai ni Idakaretero (後悔に抱かれてろ) [Ajiichi] Jaa One Night tte Koto de (じゃあワンナイトってことで) [Sumire]

Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan  Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17  Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However  the Tokugawa win a crushing victory  leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However  after their paths separate  Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.      **Awards:** - Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000. - Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002  **Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.

title_en: Ero Mangaka Onee-san to Otsukare Ryman
description: Sanzo Teshigahara  a salaryman  moves in next door to an erotic manga artist  Kikon Tadano. Teshigahara gets pushed around by the free-spirited manga artist all over the place  but surprisingly  he doesn't seem to mind. This is a heart-pounding love comedy between two impetuous people.  (Source: Kurage Bunch  translated)

title_ja: Shiawase Tori-mingu
description: Suzu  an art student in a creative rut  finds new inspiration when she meets a beautiful girl at the park who introduces her to the colourful world of birdwatching.      Serialised monthly in Manga Time Kirara.

title_en: The Dark History of the Reincarnated Villainess
description: Konoha Satou has a dark history  written throughout middle school-a fantasy adventure of love and magic about the Count's daughter Konoha Magnolia and the knights who love her! But when it looks like that dark history is going to be uncovered by her mother  Konoha panics and dies in a traffic accident! Opening her eyes  she finds that she's been reincarnated into the world of her own dark history as Iana Magnolia  the worst villainess of her own creation!      Ghost-seeing School Boys oneshot included in volume 1 as chapter 3.5.

title_en: The Crushing Weight Of This Universe
description: What will you do to get what you want?  [Updates monthly (usually).]

Yuuta Kiryuu is an abusive man who raises his hands to women. One day when they're on a date  Yuuta shows violence toward his girlfriend as usual  but unexpectedly  life is turned around in an instant. His girlfriend dies and while fleeing the scene  he encounters a group of serial murderers. He finds himself repelled by their "values" but is nonetheless pulled into their world. The manga features an array of criminal types including men who commit domestic violence  a murderer-rapist  a cannibal  and a necrophiliac. Who do you want to be killed? ___ **Additional Links:** - [Official X](https://x.com/satsukare)

Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress  he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend  and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent  the three sisters are surprisingly...?! ___ **Official English:** [emaqi](https://emaqi.com/manga/dealing-with-mikadono-sisters-is-a-breeze) - United States & Canada only.

title_en: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Taster
description: After dying in a car accident  an office worker finds herself reincarnated as Giselle Rozevin  a villain doomed to be poisoned while awaiting a death sentence. Although many assassins try to poison her  they all end up failing! In fact  the poisons Giselle ingests actually taste… good?! Can Giselle leverage this ability to survive her new surroundings?

Iori Igarashi is a talented radiology technician who has patiently waited for his chance to work with An Amakasu  his childhood friend. After being hired at her family's hospital  he is determined to fulfill a promise that he made with An when they were younger.   Unfortunately  having been out of touch for years  she doesn't recognize him and it doesn't help that she also isn't a fan of the way he performs his duties. As all sorts of cases come into the department  she must acknowledge his skills and learn to work together so that patients can receive the best treatment possible.   While the two of them adapt to each other  will An recognize her childhood friend  who has been working with her all this time?

Keinoshin and Shotaro are students who spend their after school hours as Dark Hunters. Darkness and light both exist in the world  and it is their job to protect the balance between them. Kei and Sho used to be close friends when they were little  but now they are only reluctant partners. At school  they're seen as opposites--the cool and aloof Sho and the cute and friendly Kei. However  they must work together if they want to stop the forces of darkness. Their first case of the manga involves the mysterious vanishing of many cats and dogs in the area  and a second involves a little boy who can see the 'ghost' of an old homeless man he had befriended.  (from mangaupdates)

In early summer  2nd year of high school  Koguma's mom suddenly abandons her  leaving only a note that says "Bye." She is alone  having no parents  no friends  no hobbies. She silently reflects  "I don't have anything." But a chance encounter results in her buying a Honda Super Cub with a disturbing history  and a new life suddenly blossoms open.      Based on the [light novel series with the same name](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Super_Cub_(novel_series)).

Yu Yang had never thought the world could harbor something as bizarre as evil babies. But meeting Zhang Cheng changed everything. The man who nurtured him and tended to his every need was  in truth  his greatest enemy. Now  Yu Yang faces an impossible choice: should he kill him?

Misa is a cabaret girl who frequents a lesbian bar used for one night stands. She meets a shy girl by the name of "Ai" one night and finds herself attracted to her  and discovers later that she is actually a famous actress...

Yona is the sole princess of the Kingdom of Kouka  living a luxurious and carefree life as a princess should. She has it all: the finest clothes and cosmetics  the most divine sweets  a loving emperor as a father  and the hottest cousin crush  Soo-won  any girl could ever hope to have. Now  if only her bodyguard  Son Hak  weren't so annoying towards her  and if her hair weren't so red...  But her nearly perfect world quickly shatters as the man she loves  Soo-won  murders her father and the path to his ascension to the throne is assured. Son Hak escapes with Yona  and they lead a life on the run from that point on. ___ Yona reels from the shock of witnessing a loved one's murder and having to fight for her life. With Hak's help  she flees the palace and struggles to survive while evading her enemy's forces. But where will this displaced princess go when all the paths before her are uncertain?

Once upon a time  a Demon King named Rchimedes caused havoc and destruction in the Human World. He was sealed away by the great hero Creasion  and peace returned to the world.      1000 years later  Rchimedes has returned  a hole has opened up in the Human World  and countless monsters have sprung up. To prevent any further destruction  the King calls upon all 75 (probable) descendants of Creasion.      This story focuses on the adventures of descendant number 45  Alba  and the royal soldier appointed to assist him  Ross.      [Senyuu Season 1](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu)     [Senyuu Season 2](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu2)   [Senyuu Season 3](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu3)   [Senyuu Season 4](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu4)   [Senyuu+](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyuplus)   [Senyuu F5 Reload](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39515)

Meari is a pretty  young girl who makes a living through papakatsu. What seemed like an ordinary date takes a surprising turn when  instead of the usual "papa". a woman shows up. Unlike the men with hidden motives  this woman simply enjoys spending time with Meari  showering her with gifts of money and luxury cosmetics. Delighted by such generosity  Meari lowers her guard… until the two of them find themselves alone in a love hotel. A tale of forbidden eroticism between two women!

title_en: Shinigami Koushakuka no Heiyaku Haha ni Nattara Shuushaku Saresugimashita
description: Killed by her own husband  the prince  Lady Amelie wakes up one year before her doomed marriage. Determined to change her fate  she proposes a contract marriage to Duke Gazelle Isaac—infamously known as the “Grim Reaper.”  His only condition?  She must bond with his emotionally scarred twins.  Surrounded by secrets and shadows  can Amelie rewrite destiny—for herself and the feared duke?

With everyone's memories having been altered  Boruto finds himself being hunted by his own village. After escaping with Sasuke  what future awaits Boruto...?  (Source: MangaPlus) ___ **Links:** - [Viz - Alternative Official English](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/boruto-two-blue-vortex)

tags: Action|Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Sports|Adventure|Drama|School Life|Delinquents|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Jay's the perfect student. He's got straight As and he's the student body president.   But after being coerced into joining the school's biking team  the Hummingbird Crew  he discovers a whole new world outside of studying.   What new adventures will he face outside the comfort of his textbooks?  ---  **Contents:** - **Season 1:** 65 Chapters + Prologue + Special (0-65) - **Season 2.1:** 65 Chapters + Prologue (66-130) - **Season 2.2:** 117 Chapters (131-257) - **Season 3:** 128 Chapters (258-375) - **Season 4:** 53 Chapters (Ongoing) (376-)

Ide Nobuhisa has always been a boy full of vitality and a young promise in the field of track running. However one day after a competition  he stumbled over the prettiest pair of legs he had ever seen! Their owner  a young girl practicing tennis makes a promise with Ide that she will teach him how to play. After seeing the name tag on her racket bag  Ide puts all his efforts into passing the test for accessing the same high school she goes to  Makunogama.      In his first days in his new high school  Ide discovers two things: an old friend of his is also attending  and nobody knows of a girl with the name he saw on the tag! He and his friend join the school tennis club  where they meet another first year  Takita Louis (Ruui)  a very good tennis player with a little of an attitude problem.      However things start to look better for Ide when his dear missing girl appears in the school! As it happens  he misread her name on the tag… Takada Hinako was well known as one of the members of the tennis club  but some time after meeting Ide for the first time she suffered an accident and has now lost the use of her left leg. Hinako is no longer a happy spirited girl and tells Ide she can't fullfill her promise.      Eventually the opposite characters of Louis and Ide end up confronting each other in a tennis match. Ide is an incredible fast learner  but he is no match… until Hinako decides to give him advice. Things only get worse  however  when their club president decides to put Louis and Ide as a doubles pair for the upcoming inter-high-school tournament!

title_en: Kyou Kara Ore wa Loli no Himo!
description: I  Tendou Haru  who was aiming to become a mangaka  somehow became a winner in life; super-rich bishoujo elementary school student  Nijou Touka  was a big fan of mine and  on top of that  she said that she was going to be my patron. Just like that  my ideal lifestyle of living off of someone had started.
Hangyaku no Nijigasaki (Nijigasaki of the Rebellion) is an official Love Live! manga by Choboraunyopomi featuring the cast of Love Live!'s Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.
女のコにイタズラをするえっちな悪は許さない！  長き戦いの末、ついに邪心クイーン・ミノリリスの封印に成功した魔法少女たち。3人の戦いは終わった・・・かと思われた。しかし、次の日登校するとなぜかクラスメイトがみんなでスカートめくりをしていて・・・！？それは封印したはずのミノリリスの仕業だった！

Cheerful  energetic high school girl Chika and shy  reserved boy Waya couldn’t be more different. But they have a secret: every Wednesday after 9PM they meet outside the convenience store where Waya works. Bit by bit  under the light of the moon  a unique connection begins to blossom in this enchanting coming-of-age love story!

The manga centers on veteran novelist Mariko Kōda  who lives with the families of both her son and her grandson in one house. Feeling like she no longer has any place in her home  she decides to leave the house and strike out on her own  beginning with living in a manga cafe in the city.  Won 42nd Annual Kodansha Manga Award for "Best General Manga" (2018)
A cool gyaru tries to set her anxious friend up with a date  after thorough practice and preparation.

Sela Seo is a high school girl who has a complex about her deep voice. Ever since she was teased about her voice in middle school  she has been unable to say what she thinks out loud and has been unable to fit in with her class. In Sela's class was another outcast  Tatsuto Narukami  a boy who always wore headphones. She assumed he was just another “loner” like herself  but when she saw him singing behind the school building during lunch break  her feelings changed.

Maruo failed in his debut in high school and has become a bit of an outcast. He earns some extra money by taking spy photos of girls at school and selling them to boys. Recently  Maruo is concerned about Tabe  a girl who is always covered in scars and being bullied. He wants to help her  but he is afraid of being bullied. In addition  Tabe is also a target of his voyeurism  and Maruo feels self-loathing. Maruo's days are filled with worries  but a fact comes to light that brings him to the brink of despair.

title_en: Danshi dato Omotteita Osananajimi tono Shinkon Seikatsu ga Umaku Ikisugiru Ken ni Tsuite
description: Shuichi  a high school student  ended up marrying his childhood friend whom he thought was a boy. At their reunion after 10 years  his childhood friend Yuika had transformed into a beautiful girl  which initially made Shuichi quite nervous. However  as time passed  he gradually grew accustomed to the sense of closeness as best friends—and thus  their love story as an ideal couple with a charming touch of innocence begins!

It's been a few months since the gate to the underworld opened and cross-cultural exchange with the otherworldly inhabitants began. An ordinary high school boy  Tsuna Sakurai  is suddenly supposed to have an oni-girl come live with him! And it turned out she's quite the excitable gal!

Cheng Huan  the female lead  unexpectedly runs into Liao Jia  her senior from high school who works at the same company  on her way home. Taking the opportunity to hitch a ride from him  the number of times they start to meet each other begin to increase wildly. For some reason  Cheng Huan is always able to get a ride from her senior. Unconsciously  they start to realize each other's feelings  with every ride together becoming yet another opportunity for them to grow even closer.

The amnesiac protagonist  Yuma  wakes up at a train station and discovers through his luggage that he is a detective working on a case. Yuma heads for "Kanai Ward " where he was supposed to investigate the case with the Shinigami who haunts him. However  an incident occurs on the train they are on...?  ---  Note: This manga is an adaptation of the game *"Master Detective Archives: Rain Code"*
oneshot prequel to Tail Concerto game  serialized in Monthly Shonen Ace  June 1998

A guest from the planet of happiness  the alien Takopi  arrives on Earth to spread happiness throughout the Earth and meets Shizuka  a girl who never smiles. Looks like she has problems at school and with friends... What will the simple-minded Takopi face? An amazing story begins! ___ **Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/takopi-s-original-sin)

title_en: Oya ga Urusai node Kouhai (♀) to Gisou Kekkon Shitemita
description: Morimoto is getting bugged by her parents to marry (a guy). Her (female) kouhai suggests she fake her marriage so her parents would stop but they will scrutinize every guy she might choose no matter what. Since there's a new law that allows homosexuals to marry  her kouhai suggests herself; only this kouhai has confessed to her before. What will become of their married life?      Incluedes additional oneshot: Anaerobic Love   Your back is always facing me. I'm watching you way up close.

Kobayashi is a thirty-something high school art teacher  and Rin-chan is the beautiful and popular girl at the school. These two people shouldn't have anything to do with each other  but actually they share a common secret.

title_en: Dameo no Shiina-senpai to Yabao no Sasaki-kun
description: Sasaki-kun  a slightly crazy boy  is in love with his senpai  a bad boy  and he likes that even more! Siina-senpai changes girlfriends more than pants and Sasaki-kun has a record of more than 160 confessions to his senpai. While Siina-Senpai devises ways to make Sasaki give up  Sasaki is in love with this bad boy and won't give up until he wins him.

Fifty-year-old Yuria has a quiet life teaching embroidery classes in her home  where she lives with her writer husband and his mother. Then one day her world is turned upside down when husband has a subarachnoid hemorrhage and upon arriving at the hospital  Yuria is met by a tearful young man who announces that he is her husband's lover.  Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award in General Category in 2021.

title_en: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha Movie 1st the Comics
description: Manga adaptation of Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha MOVIE 1st.

As a result of a successful campaign on Catarse  Axioma Vetiti is a Brazilian work of dark fantasy that chronicles the revenge journey of Yana  a warrior as mysterious as the relic she wields  and Beatrice  one of the most prominent Axioms of her time. The two walk side by side  driven by their shared vendetta: to eliminate the existence of all those who proclaimed themselves Gods.  Using its own magic system  called Teorema  the comic delivers frenetic and fluid action  balancing it with questions about human existence and the nature of things.  (Source: Amazon Brazil  edited) ___ ### Links * [Amazon Brazil](https://www.amazon.com.br/dp/B0CTKF3SM3)

Han Qingyu lived peacefully for nineteen years  and never thought that one day he would become one of the main characters in an epic. An accident occurred out of the blue. The boy was forced wield a knife and began to face everything he knew nothing about: the invasion of civilization  the Azure Alliance  the mobile energy suit  the unique witness corps; the blade of exile  the sharp streams... He is narrow-minded  he is "The Qing Major" painted on cars and high-rise buildings in the era of full-scale military conscription; he will make the first cut in the Zenith War.

"Healing magicians cannot fight alone."  Keyaru  who was bound by this common knowledge  was exploited again and again by others. But one day  he noticed what lay beyond healing magic  and was convinced that a healing magician was the strongest class. However  by the time he realized that potential  he was deprived of everything. Thus  he used healing magic on the world itself to go back four years  deciding to redo everything.
One day  when I was making school supplies in the art room  a very scary-looking girl was staring at me...!?

Karada Sagashi is back! Set in an amusement park after midnight  this latest installment in the hit survival horror series is set to hit theaters in Japan in September 2025 as a live-action film. Don't miss the manga adaptation before the movie drops!

title_en: Tenohira Kaitaku Mura de Isekai Kenkokuki ~Fueteku Yome-tachi to Nonbiri Mujintou Life~
description: Kai  a sickly kid  wished for a lively normal life on his deathbed when he was suddenly reincarnated into another world. Not only the boy's wishes were fulfilled  he was also gifted an ability to be a god of his own little world at the back of his palm. Yet such bliss did not last long...  Kai was abruptly separated from his loving adopted family and banished into an uninhabited island teeming with dangerous creatures. Using his ingenious wit and a help from a mysterious horned girl  Kai managed to survive and establish a small foothold with his army of cute stubby helpers. Watch as Kai tries to further tame this wilderness  building up his sanctuary and harem. Easy living! ___ **Character Designer:** [Aruya](https://mangadex.org/author/9bad1f2c-05c3-4d04-b7f3-2ea7fbca765e)

title_en: Yowaki MAX Reijou nanoni  Ratsuwan Konyakusha-sama no Kake ni Notte Shimatta
description: Reincarnated as a mob villainess! But isn't there something off about this situation?!  I was reincarnated into an otome game as a count's villainous daughter  Pia. But fearing my fate of banishment from the kingdom  I became extremely timid. After deciding the breaking of my engagement and becoming a curator  the Prime Minister's son steps forth and I'm thrown into an unexpected plot twist…?!  --- She was reborn as a villainous daughter in a reverse harem otome game. After being sick with a high fever at the age of ten  Pia Rockwell suddenly remembered her past life as a university student in Japan. But far from going down the villainess route  all this super timid girl wants is to finally use her knowledge from when she was a grad student studying to get her doctorate in paleontology. Her ultimate goal is to become a commoner  excavate fossils  build a museum and then become a curator.  So in order to escape the villainess route and avoid being deported by her fiancé during the graduation ball  Pia decides to avoid the upcoming hurt and heartache and asks to break off her engagement to Rufus  the Prime Minister's son.  But will her cunning fiancé let her go that easily?

In 1755  in three European countries  three people are born who will eventually have a fateful meeting in Versailles  France.   Hans Axel von Fersen  born the eldest son of a Swedish senator; Oscar François de Jarge  born the youngest daughter of a French general; and Marie Antoinette  born the princess of Austria and the Habsburgs!   The great masterpiece that shines in the history of Shojo Manga is finally here!

The story is set in the world of Luento  where beastmen live and phantom beasts dwell  and describes the journey of Balm  a beastman  and Polo  a stray child phantom beast. Parm is a trimmer of phantom beasts and travels around trimming their overgrown nails and hair. The story begins when Parm meets a child of a new species of phantom beast that can speak.

Kitaooji Mamoru is so popular in the company that he is called "the prince of the sales department". In contrast  Kurone-san is a quiet colleague who is isolated from everyone around her. One day  on his way home from work  Kitaooji sees Kurone-san enjoying herself in the park  taking care of a cat...!?

title_en: Arasaa Majutsushi no Yuru ii Harem Life ~Black Shachiku ga Isekai de Jiyuu Kimama ni Yuukyuu Shouka~
description: This is the story of a nearly-30-year-old office worker who suddenly remembers—he was a powerful mage in a past life! Now  he switches back and forth between the two worlds  living a laid-back  slow-life existence. But one day  out of the blue  he's approached by a fierce female adventurer—from the legendary all-women Valkyrie party  rumored to hate men! Just what will happen to this near-30s mage’s peaceful  dual-world life now!?

When Makato accidentally caused a flowerpot to fall onto a girl from three stories high  he thought his life was over.   However  can he handle the 'heavy' responsibility of his action.     ---  **Links:**   - [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/gogogorx)   - [Rookie Shonen Jump](https://rookie.shonenjump.com/series/FlR8CfElFuw)

title_ja: Demon Academy
description: The Fierce Demons pride themselves as being the reigning delinquent gang of Mikado High School  but their name lets on much more  as they are being influenced by strange occult forces. Dan Hayato  a mysterious transfer student with an unknown past  arrives at the school with a hidden agenda. With his power to separate his soul from his body  what does he know about the motives of the Fierce Demons and what events will lead to the destruction of the school?

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Drama|School Life|Fantasy|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Because of her personality  highschooler Xu Ting is often picked on by her classmates. Until one day  the school’s young  new maintenance worker saves her.  His attractive looks and mysterious aura enthrall the bullies.  Xu Ting feels indebted  yet in the small forest after school  she accidentally discovers his deepest secret?!

title_en: For Her  I'd Give It My All
description: Jiaxia is a new editor for the comic company BliBli. Ever since high school she has admired comic artist Taiji-sensei  who inspired her to pursue a career in the 2D world. Although Taiji-sensei has a bad reputation in the publishing world for being lazy and troublesome  Jiaxia is determined to be her new editor. But will she be able to get Taiji-sensei to finally get motivated to draw a new comic?

From Maiu Cafe:  « A voice  some cheers… and a destiny that changes! » Yuyu  a first-year high school student  is instantly captivated by the cheer squad’s performance during club introductions. Determined to join  she’s shocked to find herself paired with Kozuka  the most irritating boy in her class…!? A thrilling story of friendship  love  and the passion of cheerleading.

title_en: Shitsurenshita node Vtuber Hajimetara Toshiue no Onee-san ni Motemashita
description: Shocked after Yuki Himemura found out that the club senpai he was crushing on got a boyfriend  he decided to become a VTuber—something both he and his senpai have always liked—and used his savings to assemble his equipment. He gets his virtual character designed only to discover that it's a 3D model of a cute girl and  in the process  unintentionally ends up portraying one! Not only that but the person who designed and rigged his model and his favorite VTubers are starting to take a liking to him...?  (Synopsis via Novel Updates)

tags: Sci-Fi|Long Strip|Romance|Sexual Violence|Girls' Love|Web Comic|Full Color
description: Su  born in prison  has always wanted to see the "crow" from what her mother told her. On the day when she was about to be secretly executed  Gill  a sex android  was thrown into prison for a test run. She compasses everything from the outside world in her database. Su developed special feelings for Gill  although she didn't care that the words Gill spoke were programmed or from her own consciousness. Unable to distinguish her own human feelings... in this small cell  the lonely Su got her first doll--she met a "person" who could bring her solace.

title_en: Senpai  Jitaku Keibiin no Koyou wa Ikaga desu ka?
description: One day  Hajime Tamachi  an apathetic man  receives an unexpected message from Renafalt  a friend he met five years ago in an online game  whose face he has never seen: "Senpai  how about hiring a home security guard?" Convinced that Renafalt is 200% a man  Tama arrives at the meeting spot and sees someone with a red suitcase  just as they had arranged. However  that person turns out to be a beautiful girl with large breasts. "Ah... A-Are you... Senpai?"

title_en: Nigoru Hitomi de Nani wo Negau - Highserk Senki
description: One day  Raizou ​​Takakura  an average salaryman  had a heart attack and his life ended that day. But  he got a second life in a different world.  Reincarnated with strong skills― wasn't what happened to him. Instead  he was reincarnated as a foot soldier in a small country  Highserk Empire  which is surrounded by large countries. With a new name  Walm  he was thrown into the frontlines of a war. Covered in blood and stench of death  along his comrades  he was slipping through the life-or-death situations.  An adventurer party with members who could use powerful magic  transferees with overwhelming power called the "heroes." In a deadly battle with them  Walm gradually developed his talent as a warrior which would've never awoken if he were to stay in times of peace. While his eyes becoming dark and muddy over time. ___ **Character Designer:** [So-taro](https://mangadex.org/author/c4ae5d7f-3399-4b1f-a509-d7388ad47826)  **Alt Official Raws:** - [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/title/01873/episode/355528) - [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58990)

title_en: Hazure Skill Nendouryoku (Tadashi Level MAX) de Musou suru ~Te wo Kazasu Dake desu. Eishou to ka Hissatsu Waza to ka Irimasen. Nenjiru Dake de Taosemasu~
description: "With your power now  no one can defeat you – Even the Gods guarantee it!"  Elk Kinesis  the protagonist  was born as the eldest son of a prestigious duke’s family. However  due to his weak and seemingly useless skill  "Telekinesis"  he was ridiculed and looked down upon by those around him. One fateful day  he was betrayed by his own father and half-siblings. In front of the only person who truly cared for him—his maid  Emma—he was brutally killed.  When he awoke  he found himself before the goddess Pipina. Despite being offered a powerful skill  Elk refused. Instead  he wished to grow stronger using nothing but "Telekinesis". Moved by his determination  Pipina subjected him to an unimaginable 2 000 years of training.  After centuries of grueling effort  Elk was finally sent back to the mortal world by the goddess. Reuniting with Emma  he now sets out on his ultimate goal—to take revenge on the Kinesis family that betrayed him!

tags: Psychological|Long Strip|Romance|Girls' Love|School Life|Web Comic|Full Color
description: "Is this how it feels to have a friend?"   Bibi is obsessed with Peter  the prince of the school. When she spots Amy next to him  she starts to feel jealous. She invites Amy to her house to warn her  but instead takes a liking to the girl. They agree to be friends on the condition that Amy has to help Bibi confess.  **Links:** - Alternate Official Raw - [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/detail/A001)  [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/i_love_amy)  [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2901012070)  [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=12533803) - Defunct Official Raw - [Peanutoon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/6317)

title_en: Hina no Mama ja Dame desu ka?
description: Hina from 5th grade has a secret she can't tell anyone: 3 months ago she started having periods. However  one day her childhood friend Daichi found out about it. These are the endless worries of children starting puberty.

title_en: Nageki no Bourei wa Intai Shitai ~Saijaku Hunter ni Yoru Saikyou Party Ikuseijutsu~
description: The golden age of treasure hunters who seek wealth  honor  power and glory  and explore dungeons around the world without regard to the danger. "Lets be treasure hunters " said Cry Andolihy  who swore an oath with his childhood friends to become the strongest... but he discovered during his first quest that he has no talent. But that was only the beginning of his adventure.      "I can't do this anymore. I want to quit." "Oh  I see. In other words  we should fight harder and cover for you  that's a good handicap."   "Rest assured  Cry. We'll protect you!"   "Oh  wait. If you step on that  the trap will destroy you without leaving a speck of dust behind. Be careful  Leader!"  Protected by his overpowered childhood friends  sought out by newbies and nobles  they aim to be heroes and find powerful treasures. Will Cry really be able to retire safely from being a Treasure Hunter? ___ [Alt Official English](https://global.bookwalker.jp/series/276659/)

tags: Romance|Comedy|Boys' Love|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life
description: [#BL Manga] [Omegaverse] *Even if they can't put their gratitude and love into words…* A story about two people who deeply understand each other! A Puppy-like Alpha × Tsundere Omega Childhood Friends Omegaverse Story When he goes into heat  the uke becomes honest... This is the daily life of Kousuke × Natsuki!
Second spin-off featuring Otoha and his manager.

title_en: The Demon King who lost his Job
description: He is the Demon King who was impeached. She is the brave hero who was laid off because of a failed expedition. Bound by destiny  the two of them embark on an adventure to repay their debts.

Suddenly  a fleet of ships with mysterious super-weapons called the "Fleet of Fog" appeared all around the world. Humanity didn't have the technology to fight such a fleet  so they were driven out of the sea…   Seventeen years after the battle  for some reason  Gunzou Chihaya and his crewmates aboard the I-401 and the personification (Mental Model) of the I-401  Iona  started fighting the Fleet of Fog…

title_en: Nukitashi R - Nukige Mitai na Shima ni Sunderu Watashi wa Dou Surya Ii desu ka? R
description: "I'm going to destroy the Perverted Sex Law!"  The story takes place on Seiran Island  a tropical island where the "Perverted Sex Law" has been enacted to combat population decline. Non-sexual behavior is punishable!? On this island where lewdness is mandatory for everyone  proud virgin Junnosuke Tachibana and the anti-copulation front NLNS rise up to destroy the Perverted Sex Law!

Cowboy is a four-panel comic series drawn by Hong Kong cartoonist Wong Sima in the 1970s and early 1980s. The comic was originally serialized in the supplement of Ming Pao for many years and was later compiled and published as a book by Boyi Publishing Group Co.  Ltd. The complete set of Cowboy consists of 41 volumes  telling the life fragments and interesting stories between the two fathers  Cowboy and "father"  in the comic. It describes the appearance of a well-off family in Hong Kong at that time and also shows the innocence of Cowboy and his affection for his father. The prototypes of Cowboy and father cartoon are the author Wong Sima and his three sons.

I see what Angels see and do what Demons do. Those are the words a psychopath named Dennis saw when he found "The Channeler"... A powerful artifact that two massive evil corporations (Ravenfort) and (Blue Hand)will stop at nothing to get it back. at the same time Dennis Trauma haunts his day and night  while his adopted brother is still suffering from the loss of his wife ten years ago to a mysterious disease. #thriller_mystery #mystery #thriller
An omnibus release compiling the three Kamen Rider ZX manga by Yuuji Hosoi  Goro Yamada  and Joe Azuchi (formerly Shizuo Kanayama). Digital Versions Delisted
After witnessing her secret girlfriend's murder  normally calm and cool-headed police detective Seolah becomes obsessed with finding him and taking revenge.

Being a manga author has always been Yamakawa Nanao’s dream. He even postponed college for two years so that he could pursue it  but when his work that he put everything he has into it is rejected by every publisher  he loses hope. At a below average college and no real direction in life  Nanao meets a fortune teller that leads him to the horse tracks. There  he meets a group of college students  Beniko  Midori  Shun and Soukichi  who form their own winner's circle  a group of people who bet on horses not for entertainment but as a form of income. Nanao has no knowledge of horse betting but his ability to see the smallest of details in the horses shocks the members and he is allowed to join the club. If he plays it right  he could make an extremely comfortable living off of this new found talent.

Risa Ito  who considers herself an urban manga artist  actually grew up deep in the mountains! Food  vehicles  events  dialects  customs  Jomon pottery... The strongest Deep Japan is here! A heart-wrenching autobiographical comic brought to you by “Native Countryside” Risa!
The manga centers on Yano  a virgin boy who dreams of success as an erotic manga artist. One day  he encounters a totally naked palm-sized girl.

The legendary manga is reborn with new art! Wataru  a lazy high school student  is visited by the earnest and slightly airheaded teacher  Runa-sensei! So that Wataru can become a respectable adult  she gently starts giving him naughty private lessons!  (Source: Comic-Days) ___ **Note:** This is a remake of the 1986 original "Ikenai! Runa-sensei" manga

title_en: The Many Sides of Voice Actor Radio
tags: Award Winning|Comedy|Girls' Love|School Life|Slice of Life|Adaptation|Gyaru
description: Yugure Yuhi and Utatane Yasumi  two high schooler voice actresses who just happened to attend the same school and coincidentally got placed into the same class  are the two hosts of a radio weekly program. As fellow classmates and voice actresses  they show all the listeners their great friendship! At least  on the surface. In reality  the quiet girl Chika and the gyaru Yumiko are complete opposites. And they absolutely cannot stand each other. Off air  chaos and insults erupt. On air  they're the best of friends. Just where will this tumultuous relationship lead them?

title_en: Hazure Skill Level Up no Sei de Party wo Tsuihou Sareta Shounen wa  Level wo Agete Butsuri de Naguru
description: Only I can "level up"!? Become stronger by "union" with a beautiful girl! Best partner fantasy! Everyone is gifted with a talent at the age of 15 - "Skill". Chamber was a member of "Dawn"  a party that was prominent in the city  although it was made up of only young members. After acquiring a mysterious skill with an unclear "level up" effect  he is expelled from "Dawn"...! Although he was abandoned by other members who gained powerful skills  Chamber continues to work as a solo adventurer. In the midst of all this  he learns the true value of the skill "Level Up". The more enemies you defeat  the more you level up and become stronger... Chamber realized that his own skill was not a "useless skill"  he also has a fateful encounter with a certain girl  and ends up spending his days pursuing strength...!

Born the son of a mercenary in the war-torn north  Almark sets out on a long journey to the Nork Academy of Magic in the south to fulfill a promise he made to his father to become a sorcerer. After a long journey  his life at the academy was completely different from the world he was in. Almark is always confused by the gap. However  while making mistakes  with the help of his colleagues and teachers  he gradually shows a glimpse of his talent. With the pride of being the son of a mercenary  Almark takes the first step toward becoming a sorcerer.

title_en: Kareshi o Jibun Dake no mono ni Shitai Kanojo-chan

description: A Japanese arcade worker meets a young girl from England and strikes up a friend(?)ship.

title_en: The Genius Who Sees Through the World
description: As a child  Shin Woo-jin was kidnapped and locked away in a warehouse  forced to live as a slave. But against all odds  he was rescued and finally stepped into the outside world. Though free  Woo-jin wasn’t like other children. He had an extraordinary gift—the ability to read people. By observing the smallest facial expressions and unconscious gestures  he could see through their thoughts  emotions  and intentions with near-perfect accuracy. Like a profiler  like a modern-day Sherlock  Woo-jin learned to navigate the world  one observation at a time. But for someone who sees too much  living an ordinary life is the hardest thing of all. All he ever wanted was a peaceful  simple life. But the world had other plans. “As I thought… living a normal life is far too difficult.”

Two high school students are using bugs in our reality to exploit them for their advantage. But then a ridiculous exploit leads to severe consequences for one of them… ___ **Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/bug-ego)

title_ja: Nyanta to Pomeko ~Imasara Shinjiteiru to Iwarete mo Mouteokureda~
description: This is a love story of a man and a woman who doesn’t believe in anyone.  The popular psychological betrayal web novel finally gets a manga adaptation!

title_en: Kaiibu ~ M-ken Y-shi no Kai Genshou ni Tsuite~
description: When transfer student Sakuraba Sakura arrives in Yuuyamichou  she discovers a place steeped in bizarre  ancient customs.  The children there all have strange names and are bound by a curse that prevents them from leaving the city until they graduate high school. Caught in an escalating nightmare  Sakura must navigate curses  summonings  and betrayals. To break the curse and free the children  Sakura teams up with Andou Uzu  the mysterious president of the Paranormal Club. Their strange "club activities" are about to begin!

In a cursed corner of Japan  the past and present collide through tales of haunting and vengeance tied to the Shinomiya Shrine.  #### Volumes 1-3: Hanging Town Believe in it or not  that doesn't matter. But “it” certainly does exist…  In the 1970s  in a certain prefecture in Kyushu  mysterious phenomena suddenly start occurring in a peaceful rural town like any other. Wild dogs  disasters  accidents  strange noises  and hangings… What on Earth could this be?  From elementary school to high school  “I” have experienced strange happenings and the tragedies associated with them. Please don't look away as you watch.  #### Volumes 4-5: The Story of How I Couldn't Enter the Mountains In a land of rich greenery and shifting seasons  there are places a young man must never enter. When a series of uncanny events and a cursed video come to light  a new terror takes shape.   ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [piccoma](https://piccoma.com/web/product/138204?etype=episode)

Anko and Ko are assigned to investigate a mysterious religious cult called "Paradise"  after Amu Miyamoto from the idol group "Wednesday is Sunday" reaches out for assistance. Her fellow bandmate  Mei  is entangled with this sect. The group's enigmatic leader appears ageless and perpetually radiant  hinting at a vampiric nature. Their arrival in the secluded countryside where "Paradise" is based is met with suspicion and hostility... and thus  the pursuit kicks off!

title_en: Disney Twisted Wonderland: The Comic—Episode of Scarabia
description: On the way to his target audition  Yu  an ordinary high school student  encounters a mysterious carriage and is taken away. When he wakes up  he finds himself in a parallel world called "Twisted Wonderland"!? Yu has enrolled in Night Raven College  a school for training magicians  and has become accustomed to school life. While many students return home for the winter holidays  Yu and Grimm remain at school  and there they meet a student...

"I'm an average girl  living an average life."  One day Ayakami Mia attends school to confront her bullies  only to find out that she's ended up in a situation that she can't get out of  without the help of a magical creature named  Poppu.

Nervous about being alone with her new boyfriend  Takeda  Yuma insists that her once angelic childhood friend  Hotaru and Hotaru's boyfriend come along for a double date. But when Hotaru begins to touch Yuma and volunteers herself as "practice"  Yuma feels inner turmoil as she enjoys the now devilish Hotaru's kiss more than Takeda's.

Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair  his wife leaves him  and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day  however  a flyer from a strange religious group  the "Heart Laughing Society " changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife  whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!

High school student Misumi Makoto is called into a fantasy world by the god Tsukuyomi  in order to be a hero. However  powerful others in this world aren't as thrilled to have him there  and they kick him to the edge of the world just as Tsukuyomi declares that he must leave Makoto to find his own way. Now it's up to Makoto to find his own way! ___ [Official English Light Novel](https://hanashi.media/tsukimichi-moonlit-fantasy/)

Hellsing  an organization devoted to the elimination of the vampire threat  has recently uncovered information regarding the attempted production of "man-made" undead. The world is presently in the thick of WWII  and the current leader of Hellsing fears the Nazis could potentially use these creatures as front-line super-soldiers. Although the technology of creating artificial vampires is still in its infancy  it has advanced enough to be a serious threat. In an attempt to put a stop to this perverse and dangerous experimentation  Hellsing has sent two of its most skillful agents to Poland. A young man by the name of Walter C. Dornes - a.k.a. "The Angel of Death " and Alucard  an ancient vampire currently in forced service to the Hellsing Organization. Together  they attempt to stop the progress of the Nazi's efforts.

title_en: The Demon Sword Master of Excalibur Academy
description: In the fantasy story  the demon king Leonis sealed himself away for 1 000 years in order to prepare for the final battle  but when he woke up  he found himself in the body of a 10-year-old boy. A beautiful young woman named Lisellia from the Holy Sword Academy then says to him  "Why were you locked up in such a place? It's OK now  this big sister will take care of you!" Under Lisellia's care  Leonis is shocked to see that the world has completely changed. Bewildered and confused  Leonis finds himself enrolling at the Holy Sword Academy.
Kind words to her plant

title_en: An Extra Stole the Male Leads
description: Reborn as Selonia Bessin  the heroine of a romance fantasy novel  a girl is thrust into a demon-slaying mission with the novel's three male leads. They successfully defeat the demon lord  but Selonia falls unconscious for three months on the journey back. Upon awakening  she discovers the trio is now enamored with Grace Benet  an unknown extra. Moreover  the supposedly defeated demon lord is back in hot human form! Why has he returned  and who is this mysterious Grace stealing the limelight?  --- A woman who has lost her male leads to an extra who did not appear in the original story... That's me.  Selonia fell into a coma on the way back from defeating the Demon King. After wandering through death for several months  she survived  but what?   “I want you to break off the engagement. I want to hurry up to marry Grace.”   “I want you to pretend my knight’s oath to you didn't happen.”   “Give me back my heart. I’ll give it to Grace.”   The fiancé who was the male lead  the paladin and the dragon who were the sub-male leads  and the fellows all turned away. These reckless bastards! There was a lot of cursing  but what can I do to stop it? I was trying to start a new life in a cool way. By the way…   “Do you know me?”   How is the dead demon king alive?   “What  I don’t know…”  “No  you know me. tell me Who am I?”   To make matters worse  the Demon King  who has no memory  sticks to my side and does not leave. Inevitably  I tried my best to prevent the return of the Demon King.   “How can I always hold your hand?”   Why is it not enough to spit out vulgar words?   “Are you going to kill all those who left you? Just speak.”   He’s even going to kill the male leads for me!

The Biblia Academy's Headmaster has asked to a Trinity Seven Kazama Levi  looking for the mythic weapon "Murasame"  the legendary demonic sword. Along with Charme (Big Boobs)  a kouhai mage that admires to Levi  she will infiltrate to a town where is said "Murasame" is sealed  however a Breakdown Phenomenon occurs—– Aiming to that treasure Lugh appears  who is the same "Envy" mage  also going to war  the leader of the Ninja Army's Five Shadow Magic Elements  Kashin Ryuhime  the story of a ninja having a heroic battleッス!!
How much can you endure? How much can you resist?

"Are you the one who called me…?"  A black-haired beast looked at him with glowing yellow eyes.  "It’s okay. It won't hurt anymore. You'll be okay."  Estio was born as the youngest son of a farmer  but everyone hated him. He was a child who could read the hearts of people and animals. And…  "A cursed child."  He finally turned 19  and it was now time for his coming-of-age ceremony. Now starts Estio's journey to find happiness.  --- Estio is just an ordinary farmer's son  but with an extraordinary ability-he can read the thoughts and memories of humans and animals. For this  he is shunned by the people in his village  finding happiness only in his animal friends. After years of silently enduring the villagers' hostility  Estio runs away the night he turns 19. His journey brings unexpected friendships and encounters  but will such bonds be able to show him there is more to him and his ability than meets the eye?  --- **Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761)  [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)  **Official Translations:** * [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info) * [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)

All Jeong wants is a second chance -- for revenge! His grandfather’s gruesome death has transformed him into the bloodthirsty and ruthless Scythe Demon. He will stop at nothing until he has killed the man responsible. Yet rage and determination alone are not enough. He must train in martial arts if he ever wants to stand a chance against such a formidable foe. Will he succeed in his revenge on the murderer of his grandfather?  **Original Webtoon:**   - [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=821597) - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=10782038)  **Official Translations:**   - [S.Chinese](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/ANCIENTCHINESE/guaililuanshen/list?title_no=2722) - [T.Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/myst-might-mayhem/list?title_no=6345) - [Indonesian](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/myst-might-mayhem/list?title_no=6367) - [Thai](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/myst-might-mayhem/list?title_no=6511) - [Japanese](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0003353) - [French](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/myst-might-mayhem/list?title_no=6711)

title_en: Sugu Gyakuten Sareru Desugēmu no Shusaisha-chan...
[Kamikai] Ikemen Haishinsha ni Ria Totsu Shitemita

description: When Lord El-Melloi II  the later Waver Velvet  gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle  he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestants—including Luviagelita Edelfelt—must compete in a game of wits to win the castle.

title_en: Itsudemo Jitaku ni Kaereru Ore wa  Isekai de Gyoushounin wo Hajimemashita
description: "Won't I be able to get filthy rich if I use this skill?"      Continually exploited at work  Amata Shirou quits his job and moves to his grandma's house. When he finds out that it's connected to another world  he comes up with a plan to set up a business selling Japanese goods. The story of a man getting rich using his skill that converts the currency of the other world to Japanese yen and so forth.

The urban workplace light comedy begins! From Zhou Yi to Zhou Mo  endless laughter everyday! The poorest second-generation millionaire Husky x A hot tempered and intelligent woman in the city. When a Husky becomes a intern  there is no escape from disaster! "Promotions! Bonuses! Pay raises! Discipline(?) a Husky!"
A spin-off of the Rozen Maiden series.

title_en: Issho ni Kurashite ii desu ka?
description: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend  no job  and no home  until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However  the share-house has a certain condition...

The dreams and passions of dancers for all ballet and manga fans. A masterpiece of ballet manga  depicting a girl who  while troubled and hurt  blossoms her unfathomable talent!   A high quality volume long-awaited by fans  it includes color pages and chapter covers from the serialization  as well as newly-drawn manga showing what happened to the main character.
In the near future  a team of misfits explore the ruins of the internet  searching for friendship and battling mutated memes!

title_en: Dorei kara no Kitai to Hyouka no sei de Sakushu dekinai no daga
description: A reincarnated boy  Allen  gets granted by a goddess the cheat skill  [Restoration]. Even though he can heal all and any injuries and illnesses  there aren't a lot of places where he can use that skill to the fullest  so he planned to "regenerate" the slaves he bought and lead a slow-paced life. But the healed slaves' cheats turned out so out of the ordinary that the crops they tend to and their living conditions turned for the better in a blink of an eye.  The protagonist  Allen  who slowly but surely is robbed of opportunities to shine  tried to counter that with his modern knowledge  and yet  those talented slaves absorbed it all and brought success to any and all businesses. The protagonist is becoming irrelevant with each passing day?!

tags: Award Winning|Monsters|Comedy|School Life|Fantasy|Monster Girls|Slice of Life|Supernatural
description: Ruri faces the usual high school issues: pushy classmates  annoying teachers  and… waking up with dragon horns?!  Just after starting high school  Ruri gets hit with the biggest reveal of her life—she’s a dragon! Well  a half dragon. Her mom admits Ruri inherited her draconic traits from her father  who  yes  is actually a dragon.  As if dealing with curious classmates wasn’t already challenging enough  Ruri and her dragon genes literally turn up the heat in the middle of a lecture. Her life is about to be anything but ordinary!  (Source: Viz Media  edited)

title_en: The Day of the Shooting Star
tags: Long Strip|Romance|Office Workers|Girls' Love|Slice of Life|Supernatural|Full Color
description: Chen Xin and Lin Anyun were looking up at the sky on an ordinary night after getting off work. They saw three shooting stars pass by at the same time and made their own wishes. When they woke up the next day  they found that their souls had been swapped and began a wonderful journey. In the process  the things that they usually ignored  the things they couldn't see clearly because of their own identities  what they wanted but couldn’t get  and the compromises they had to make... Were all solved miraculously. The two were attracted to each other and eventually they ran towards each other; turning into partners who worked and grew together hand in hand. When the night where three shooting stars pass by comes again  will they be able to return to being themselves?

Lately  Odachi has been struggling with a lack of confidence in his play. Since his debut match  where he faced off against the “God” of shogi  something has changed within him. Will the day come when he can surpass the God of his generation? A tale of a self-proclaimed average shogi player  his friends  peers  and rivals  and the God before him.

The strongest swordsman of the Warring States period  transferred to another world.  At the end of the Warring States Period  Ginko  the greatest swordsman of the time  was always hungry for a fight to the death with someone stronger than herself. After cutting and cutting and cutting  she finally despairs that there is no one stronger than her in this world  and then she is transferred to another world! Before her eyes - a dragon! ___ **Award:** Won the Traditional Chinese Global Special Award in the Web category of the 2024 Next Manga Awards.
Official 4-koma webcomic from the popular mobile game Azur Lane.

“School is a bit suffocating.” 16-year-old high school girl Yonagi Fuji lives and sleeps in her car  but only in the backyard of her house because she doesn't have a driver's license. She wants to sleep in her car wherever she likes. Then  she meets a cheery girl from the same school who has a driver's license  Ichinose Asahi?  A story that  if you read it  you'll definitely want to sleep in your car!? The curtain opens on a new and exciting high school girl × car-sleeping hobby life manga!!

title_en: O↑re↓mmusume JK ga Shou 4 Danshi Sugite Tanoshii

description: Has anyone ever made fun of your dream?      Magic is something everyone in this world desires. Dawn Hill  with absolutely no experience in magic  has been accepted to the best magic school in Wuzhou. The only problem is she's the "worst student" they've ever seen. Faced with ridicule  rejection  and contempt  can the stubborn little witch fight back?

title_en: Falling in Love With My Ex-Fiancé's Grandfather
description: After getting rejected by her fiancé  20-year-old Mary Menoushire passed out from the shock. She then got possessed by a 50-year-old lady from another world... who thinks her (ex) fiancé's grandfather is hotter.

An organization that saves people who have tragically died  the Space-Time Police Special Task Force  also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens  hundreds  thousands of times until you solve the case!

Hard-pressed to find good luck in this universe  Sun Woojoo gives up on his dream of becoming an idol in favor of living a normal life. That is  until he finds himself waking up from a car accident on his exam day! But as luck would have it  Woojoo can now copy any move exactly as he sees it  and his two left feet that kept him from debuting are now moving to the beat! With this newfound skill  will Woojoo be able to turn things around and become the star that shines the brightest on stage?

Due to certain circumstances  Heike Waku transfers to a new high school. There  he meets a very cool classmate named Oura-san. With a famous model for a sister and a face that never smiles  she seems like a distant and untouchable presence... or so it seemed. But by chance  Waku happens to catch a glimpse of Oura-san's dazzling smile. In that moment  his world changes completely! For that smile... I'll do anything!! ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/title/02854/episode/416673)

*I love him when he's stanning but...*  On the day their favorite idol group disbands  a couple stands together in silence in a quiet corner of the venue. Their own relationship is also approaching a crossroads... A short one-shot by Kyo Yoneshiro!  *Part of the Shonen Jump+ 11th Anniversary Special 11-page 11 oneshot project* [Official Webpage](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2083/) | [View Others](https://mangadex.org/list/51d1bfc8-4f7c-455b-a4ae-26d5fb36dd9d/jump-11th-anniversary-special-11-page-oneshot-project)

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Girls' Love|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Full Color
description: Akane  who's always longed for a fateful encounter like in shoujo manga  has entered a prestige all-girls high school  ran into a beautiful upperclasman Iori and fell in love on first sight. Wanting to get closer to her  Akane joins the student council  but how will she approach the flawless Iori-senpai? A school yuri starring a heroine reject fantasizer girl and a perfect senpai who's always on her guard!

title_en: Yarikonda Otome Game no Akuyaku Mob desu ga  Danzai wa Iya nanode Mattou ni Ikimasu
description: Kanda Hajime  an avid gamer and overworked office worker  collapses from exhaustion—only to wake up as Ridd  the villain of the otome game "TokiRella"! Awaiting him is an unavoidable fate: condemnation and ruin. Determined to escape this grim ending  Ridd leverages his sharp intellect and deep knowledge of the game to rewrite his destiny. His first goal? Mending his broken family—a cold  distant father  a lonely sister  and a bedridden mother. But as he sets out to change their fates  his actions ripple far beyond the game’s original story  igniting a revolution that will shake the entire continent!

title_en: How Do I Turn My Best Friend Into My Girlfriend?
description: High schoolers Minami Ikoma and Yuzu Makita have been childhood friends since grade school. Since their parents are friends  they have always been together. However  as Minami sees her friend get confessed to  feelings in her own heart start to sprout.

Raimon Middle School 's soccer club captain  Endou Mamoru is in a pinch - his club is about to be destroyed! Literally! To avert the wrecking ball and disbanding of the club  his team must win against the toughest soccer team in the area - Teikoku. Will Endou and his team meet a crushing defeat or will a mysterious transfer student with a fiery kick save them from disaster?!      Won the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for Best Children's Manga.

Shaolan (Xiao Lian) is an orphaned girl who lives alone in the mountains at the very nook of an impoverished village. One day  an envoy from the palace arrives and scouts her to to be a lady-in-waiting for the imperial harem. This was how a wild girl raised on the mountains was able to live in a luxurious palace working as a lady-in-waiting  however...  On her first day (due to various reasons)  Shaolan had suddenly become a criminal after slapping one of the consorts.  Though execution appeared certain  she was specially pardoned and demoted from a lady-in-waiting to a maidservant in charge of odd jobs. She is ridiculed by the other consorts as the  "Princess of Odd Jobs " however  this is where her rapid advance begins. She implements reforms to the worn-down palace and optimizes her chores through the knowledge she learned from her life of living in poverty  earning the gaze of the other ladies-in-waiting and the imperial consorts alike. Continuing these course of events  Shaolan's name spreads through the imperial palace  reaching even the emperor's ears...

After with the sudden and mysterious death of the youth who was to be selected as the next king  the Library Tower  which housed all the books of the country  was sealed off. However  deep in the recesses of the tower  where no one should have been able to enter  sat the one who was known as the “Chief Librarian” (“Shisosei”). In the palace where rumors flutter about  conspiracies begin to swirl. What is the astonishing reality behind the connection of the youth's death  the Library Tower  and the country's secret tool  the Chief Librarian?

title_en: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai
description: Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules  he can't interact with girls - and what's more  he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona  the "queen bee" of the school  however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her  but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple. ___ **Alt Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) - United States  Japan  Canada  Australia  New Zealand  Singapore  Philippines  Thailand  Vietnam  Hong Kong  Taiwan  India  Mexico  and Brazil only.

title_en: Saikyou Onmyouji no Isekai Tenseiki ~Geboku no Youkaidomo ni Kurabete Monster ga Yowai Sugirundaga~
description: Haruyoshi Kuga's power as the strongest exorcist is all for naught when he is betrayed by his closest ally. With his dying breath  he casts the secret Spell of Reincarnation — when he next opens his eyes  he finds himself in a different world altogether  reincarnated as Seika Lamprogue  the son of a family of magic scholars! He quickly learns that the magic in this new world is quite unlike the sorcery he learned in his past life and that he can't use it. Fortunately for him  with his mastery of curses and the hordes of youkai at his disposal  he doesn't need to.   Haruyoshi (now Seika) is determined not to repeat his past mistakes in his second life by smartly laying low and avoiding flaunting his power. Yet accomplishing his goals and without drawing attention to himself proves to be easier said than done — will his powers be enough to live a happy life?! ___ [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-reincarnation-of-the-strongest-exorcist-in-another-world)

title_en: Tearmoon Teikoku Monogatari ~Dantoudai kara Hajimaru  Hime no Tensei Gyakuten Story~
description: In the Tearmoon Empire  the disdained selfish princess Mia was sentenced to death – or at least  she was supposed to have been! Instead  she woke up as her twelve-year-old self?? To avoid the guillotine in her second life  she won't repeat her past failures... "F-For me  something of this level is an easy task!" Ultimate self-defense! Strongest self-awareness! Using her previously clumsy  timid princess image  she will go against fate- a once-in-a-lifetime fantasy of fixing history!

Akasegawa Naoya's mother remarried recently and he suddenly finds himself trying to get along with his new big sister Amane  a student of the prestigious Kasugano Girls' School. But his new big sister isn't like what you might first expect.

Shoto Kazama  a boy who has never been able to win at card games because of his habit of giving up on things easily  enters the immersive world of Digimon Liberator through the invitation of his childhood friend  Arisa Kinosaki.  The game allows players to engage in highly realistic card battles. At first  Shoto is hesitant towards it  but through his engrossing encounters with the Digimon there  he becomes a fan of the game.  Encounters with wild Digimon such as Pteromon and battles with NPCs who have gone rogue. These various happenings set the wheels of fate in motion for Shoto and his companions.  This is a story about Digimon  and the world.

Anzu is a high school girl living under the strict control of her mother  in a household where the idea of defying her will is unthinkable. With no smartphone and no allowance  one of her few escapes is sneaking away to a nearby CD shop and listening to music.  But one night  in the plaza outside a train station  she encounters a shady-looking guy who has the looks of a devil... but plays the guitar like an angel.

Koumoto Umi  a normal high school girl  falls in love with the pretty girl from the class next door  Segawa Shou. Even though she feels overwhelmed by her feelings  she can't help but want to get closer to the mysterious Shou.

title_en: Ano Ko no Oppai kara Dounimo Me ga Hanasenai Anthology Comic
description: ## Volume 1 **Cover:** Masuishi Kinoto (桝石きのと) **Comics:** 1. Nakamura Morris 2. Kashima Ui 3. Tamura Yuuki 4. Saburic 5. Sako Misaki 6. Ikoma You 7. Onda Chiro  ## Volume 2 **Cover:** oekakizuki **Comics:** 1. Akegata Iruka 2. Onda Chiro 3. Geshumaro 4. Emua 5. Kazama Ayami 6. Hino Haruto 7. Aoshima Kanae  ## Volume 3 **Cover**: [Yumeno Tanuki](https://mangadex.org/author/c957fd2c-b05e-459b-9438-e34180d71eec)  **Author list**: 1. Aoshima Kanae 2. Furumoto Takeru 3. Sasaki Masahito 4. Taira Kenji 5. Tamura Yuuki 6. Ainan Zero 7. Enda Marimo  ## Volume 4 **Cover:** [Chigusa Minori](https://mangadex.org/author/8543c0af-463f-41ba-b029-fb2d10243fba) **Comics:** 1. Misu Shinya 2. Nekoi Yasuyuki 3. Takuji Yusaku 4. Hotomura 5. Takeuchi Junya 6. Furumoto Takeru 7. Hayashi Takaaki  ## Volume 5 **Cover:** pon (ぽん) **Comics:** 1. Kashima Ui 2. Chiaki Tarou 3. Leafy 4. Hori Hiroaki 5. Hayashi Takaaki 6. Masubuchi Unamu 7. Hino Haruto

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school  her whole family was involved in an accident  but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school  she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era! The next day  Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao  a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji  "You are a demon  aren't you?" ___ Official Release: - Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

As the distinguished son of a family who run a financial conglomerate  Gatarou Barazono took full advantage of his money to live a rosy life and enjoy it to its fullest. But one day  he suddenly got hit by a truck  and when he awoke  he found himself in the "Afterlife!" There  he finds the dubious-looking "Meiten Restaurant" (Underworld Restaurant)  where the deceased are served their final meal before going to rest in peace...
A spin off where the One Piece cast goes to a big academy & lives modern lives.

title_en: 2-dome no Jinsei  to Omottara  Jitsu wa 3-dome Datta ~Rekishi Chishiki to Naisei Doryoku de Fukou na Rekishi no Kaihen ni Idomimasu~
description: "This time  I'll protect my happy family for sure!"  Takhir  a young baron who had lost his beloved family  was unable to do anything and thus labeled as an incompetent. However  as he was dying  his time-space magic suddenly manifested and he regained the memories of his previous life before being transported back to his childhood?! He no longer faltered in the face of war or the epidemic. He vowed to use his revived modern knowledge to improve their level of civilization... and to change his family's fate!  By using his knowledge of the future  he was determined to reduce the damage caused by the poor harvest and flood  while doing everything he could to get talented individuals on his side  strengthening the Solis barony! By moving without concerning himself with the gaze of others  he would go beyond the Kair Kingdom  altering history across the entire continent! With his "family-first principle"  the child prodigy would alter his depressing fate!

In the Great Orient  lies a continent called Rodenius. One day  an unidentified flying object arrived at Qua-Toyne Principality's airspace. That UFO defied the Principality's common sense  but it was just a harbinger of something even more shocking. Far to the eastern sea  a group of islands suddenly appeared. The country of the islands called itself: Japan. According to them  their nation had been transported to another world. Now finding themselves separated from their old world and must survive in the new one  how will Japan interact with the native countries of this world? Will they greet it as a friend or as an enemy?

It has been 150 years since the Declaration of Victory by Women. Since then  all men have been reduced to slaves  forced to serve  obey  and satisfy women. In this matriarchal society  the story unfolds of a slave who fights to build a nation where men and women can coexist. Stimulation and pleasure!

The manga is a re-imagining of the famous Chinese classic Journey to the West story  and centers on the Buddhist priest Genjou and his journey to India as he is accompanied by three beautiful and charming women: Son Goku  Cho Hakkai  and Sha Gojyo.

title_en: Gendai Shakai de Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou wo Suru no wa Chotto Taihen
description: In the tough times after the Japanese economic bubble burst  a career woman suffering through the aftermath reincarnates as Keikain Runa  the villainess of an otome game with a modern setting! However  not long after reincarnating  she realizes just how dire a situation her family is in due to the ongoing financial recession. Using knowledge from her previous life  Runa sets out to rescue her new family from crisis and stand against the tide of 'the times' that caused her past life to end in misery.

A teenager who was orphaned as a young boy returns to the city of his childhood. Shortly after transferring to Gekkoukan High School  he is attacked by Shadows — creatures that feed on the minds of their victims. He soon discovers that he shares a special ability with other students at his new school. From them  he learns of the "Dark Hour " a hidden time that exists between one day and the next  swarming with Shadows. He joins the Specialized Extracurricular Execution Squad (SEES)  and with his new friends  confronts the threat of the Shadows.      Based on the PlayStation 2 game of the same name.

title_en: Oshi V ga Oshiego de Watashi ga Mama de!?
description: Karasawa Kazuki is a university student who wants to become an art teacher  and is middle of teaching-training. However  she's bothered by her student Tsubosaki Mimi  who gets involved with her at her teaching practice.  Kazuki finds solace in watching the VTuber "Tsubomi " who is her favorite VTuber But then she finds out that Mimi is Tsubomi's true identity...! Her favorite VTuber is her student  and the artist she admires is her teacher...!  A new sensation of VTuber x Yuri romantic comedy has begun!

title_en: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun: If Episode of Mafia
description: The beloved characters of Mairimashita! Iruma-kun star in this Mafia-based spinoff! Young Iruma saves an injured mob boss from death... and then becomes his grandson!?

title_en: Watashi no Yuri wa Oshigoto desu!
tags: Psychological|Comedy|Sexual Violence|Girls' Love|Drama|School Life|Slice of Life
description: Hime is a girl who has developed her cuteness as a deliberate act with the plan of marrying a billionaire. One day  she is more or less forced to work as a replacement for a girl injured by bumping into her in the street. The place of work is a concept cafe where the waitresses put on a show as though the cafe were run by the yuri cliche ojousama school. There's a large contrast between the performances and the off-duty staff.

title_en: Boukenka ni Narou! Skill Board de Dungeon Kouryaku
description: Karaboshi Haruki has no presence as far as can be recognized  and so he became an adventurer with only the desire to "stand out." One day  a dungeon appeared under his home in Hokkaido. Coincidentally  he picked up a "Skill Board" with which he can spend skill points to increase his growth rate. Is it possible to become a popular person by obsessively diving into your home dungeon everyday?  Based on the popular fantasy Light Novel: "Become an Adventurer " winner of the 6th Net Novel Grand Prize.

Umio is a shy kid who just started his part time job at a manga store smack dab in the middle of the city. But his lifestyle isn't as glamorous as the neon lights that illuminate the city. Umio's closest friends are his co-workers who are all unique characters  to say the least  and although they're nice people  they have their quirks. They are a tight knit group of friends  have nicknames for each other and spend their weekends inside  sheltered from the extravagant scene happening on the outside.

Otogiri Tobi  a 2nd grade middle school student  spends his depressing days searching for his missing older brother alongside his inhuman companion  Baku. Tobi used to rarely speak to anyone besides Baku  however one day after his classmate Shiratama Ryuuko suddenly approaches him  his life begins to change…?  This is an adventure surrounding the “human” and the “inhuman” that a lone boy faces. ___ **Character Designers:** [Mariyasu](https://mangadex.org/author/c4b0336b-a879-4634-9053-9efb11c3f71b)  [Waboku](https://mangadex.org/author/03dcd51c-8a6b-4302-8c84-d943a039db25)  [lack](https://mangadex.org/author/b68dc199-aaab-4deb-825a-5f3df6482b28)  **Note:** Adapted from the song and novel of the same name.

title_en: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!!: Fune Shoukan Skill de Isekai Rich Life o Te ni Irero
description: Wataru Toyoumi  an average college student  suddenly finds himself stranded in another world. Just when he’s at a loss  he discovers he has a unique skill: the ability to summon ships! With enough EXP and money  he could even call forth an unsinkable luxury cruise liner... But how can he do that with no sea in sight? Set sail for adventure aim for luxuries in another world!  (Source: Manga UP! Global)

Jang Suchan is an extraordinary college student at the top of the social food chain.
