But underneath the perfect façade  he hides a pair of insect wings that suddenly grew when he used a mysterious bug spray called "Jungle Juice.” Suchan's life crumbles when he bares his wings to the world to save someone's life. When all hope seems lost  Suchan stumbles upon a hidden world of insect humans where everyone is accepted for what they are.  But the law of the jungle governs this secret society and all must fend for themselves in order to survive.

The soul of the charming and imposing Martial Arts Alliance Leader  Hu-Gong  suddenly wakes up in the body of a young man.  That young man’s name is Beom-Hang. He’s the young master of the ‘Heavenly Grand Archive’  one of the three major archives of the Jianghu  yet he is a sorry excuse of a person.  To determine why his soul has swapped bodies  Hu-Gong begins to train Beom-Hang’s body. When the possessed young master of the Heavenly Grand Archive’s movements are totally different from how they used to be  it starts to attract the attention of the Jianghu...

Doctor Lee Han is reborn as Lachiel  the sickly Crown Prince of the Empire of Magentano. Han is now armed with medical knowledge and skills found nowhere else in this new world - but can he heal an empire and mend his own body at the same time?   Witness his journey of self-exploration and resilience as he maps destiny's meridian  in pursuit of the acupoint that can reverse his fate.

Naofumi Iwatani  an uncharismatic Otaku who spends his days on games and manga  suddenly finds himself summoned to a parallel universe! He discovers he is one of four heroes equipped with legendary weapons and tasked with saving the world from its prophesied destruction.   As the Shield Hero  the weakest of the heroes  all is not as it seems. Naofumi is soon alone  penniless  and betrayed. With no one to turn to  and nowhere to run  he is left with only his shield. Now  Naofumi must rise to become the legendary Shield Hero and save the world!

title_en: Outo One Ope Golem Master. Masakano Tsuihou!? ~Jiyuu no mi ni Nattanode Deshi no Bijin Yuusha-tachi to Issho ni Saikyou Gouremu Tsukurimasu. Modotte Koi to Iwarete mo Mou Shiran!~
description: Horace  man who was singlehandedly handling the Diamante Kingdom's operations by using a countless number of machine puppets called [Golems] remotely by using his skill that goes beyond comprehension  was dismissed from his work thanks to an ignorant noble. He set out on a leisurely journey to search for ore to aid his research  but... the beautiful hero (disciple) who admired him wouldn't let him be!! She had already made preparations to build him a home in order to repay him but it was all a ploy to keep him for herself?!  But not only did the tomboyish female alchemist barge in as well  he also caught the attention of the troublesome eldest son of a marquis...  "Come at me  I'll settle this with one punch." "As expected of my master!!"  Unwavering like a rock  unleashing a devastating single punch that shows no mercy!

title_en: Tensei Oujo to Tensai Reijou no Mahou Kakumei
description: Despite her supposed ineptitude with regular magic  Princess Anisphia defies the aristocracy's expectations by developing "magicology " a unique magical theory based on memories from her past commoner life. One day  she witnesses the brilliant noblewoman Euphyllia unjustly stripped of her title as the kingdom's next monarch. Thus Anisphia concocts a plan to help Euphyllia regain her good name  somehow involving them living together and researching magic! Little do these two ladies know  however  that their chance encounter will alter not only their own futures  but those of the kingdom... and the entire world! ___ - [Official Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8558fh/)
A romcom featuring 2 childhood friends who'll get married one day and the process that leads to that point.

Iori is a young man in his twenties who has been stressed at work  lost his cat that he had kept for many years  and is suffering from insomnia and loss of appetite. The next morning  he finds a beautiful  naked girl lying beside him...?

title_en: Erased dj - Welcome Home  My Ataraxia
description: Erased dj. General: Yashiro Gaku & Fujinuma Satoru. Takes place years after the last episode of Erased anime.

September 1945  Tokyo. A troubled post-war process is underway.  It is the extermination of the Variants  human weapons created by the notorious 731 Unit: remnants of the war which are to be shut down.   Yet a young immortal soldier girl  Saika  is determined to live and be free with the aid of Kankuro Konoe  a former combat medic  as her subordinate.

tags: Oneshot|Genderswap|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: A TS (Former Boys) Compilation posted by the author on X. I found it on pixiv though.

title_en: Fukushuu no Tensei Kizoku ~Subete wo Ubawareta Daikenja  Onore wo [Fukusei] shite Nidome no Sei wo Eru~
description: In a world where abusing prisoners of war is considered normal  there was a genius mage named Rein who was bestowed the title of "Great Sage" despite being born as a prisoner. However  that prisoner along with his land and fame that he obtained  was nothing but thorn in the side of the nobles that needed to be purged. Rein  who was set up and killed mercilessly  used his magic to duplicate his own soul. He then reincarnates as the son and heir of his sworn enemy  and swears revenge against the nobles that killed him! Come  it's purging time. ___ **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/63075)
It's a typical confession scene of a boy confessing his love to a girl... Or is it?  (It's just a single panel lel)

An unimaginable talent without rivalry. Will it prove itself to be a blessing or a curse?     ---  **Links**:   - [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/the-boxer/list?title_no=1896)   - [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/the-boxer/list?title_no=2037)   - [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000747)   - [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/quanjishou/list?title_no=1482)   - [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/the-boxer/list?title_no=1926)      - [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eSeGyKj-hOg)

title_en: Orc no Shuhai ni Shukufuku wo
description: Half-Orc Elpis and Margit  the daughter of a corrupt nobleman  go on an adventure in search of WHISKEY  left behind by the teleporter Tanaka!

**Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/24367326/series/222807)  **Notes:** - The Pixiv series does not contain all of the chapters and combines some. Do not follow the chapter numbering on Pixiv. Instead  enable Japanese chapters on MangaDex to see the proper chapter order and links to all of the raw chapters. - This series uses characters the author used in illustrations beforehand.

Kikka Tsumugu (28 years old) lives alone on the 2nd floor of an apartment building. Kikka  who works as a wasai (traditional Japanese clothing manufacturer) at home  is a job given by Mashimo  her ex-boyfriend from high school. One day Kikka was selected to be a board member of the apartment complex lives at and met with a man named Hirara...!? Mashimo lives 200 meters away from Kikka's house and Hirara lives 200m above. The vertical and horizontal romance triangle has begun!

title_en: Akuyaku Reijou wa Ouji no Honsou (Dekiai) wo Shiranai
description: Isekai  reincarnation  romcom of a Yandere Prince × super insensitive villainess daughter!  In a meeting with Prince Dylan  Belltier suddenly recalls her previous life and realizes that she has been reincarnated as the villainess in an otome game.  In order to avoid the bad ending  just as she thought to distance herself from the Prince  she was chosen as his fiancee.  "Do not let the prince have a sad childhood!”  It's only 5 years until the lonely prince meets the heroine. She is a temporary fiance  but she decides to become a friend and support him until then.  But as we get along smoothly  the skinship of the prince gets intense!?  i love you so much.  Not the heroine  but I have been doted on ──!!?

April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club  he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people  but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?

The cheerful and energetic gyaru  Anzai Eri  dies after falling down a flight of stairs. In the afterlife  she meets Polero  a yuri-obsessed shinigami  who offers to bring her back to life - on one condition! "Get together with the girl you love!" Eri's crush is Seike Fumi  a high-spec ojou-sama from her school. But she was always too embarrassed to even talk to her... To help her out  Polero assigns Eri a series of "missions" to being them closer together - but the missions turn out to be a bit too bold and daring...!?

title_en: Sword Art Online - Dengeki Comic Anthology
description: The Sword Art Online Dengeki Comic Anthology is a comic anthology of Sword Art Online-themed short  independent manga stories by various illustrators  published under the Dengeki Comics imprint.  --- **Volume 1** **Cover**: [Natsume Eri](https://mangadex.org/author/7030f48e-28e1-425b-bc3b-b78632fd3d5c)  **Author list**: 1. Uonuma Yuu 2. Iida Pochi 3. Mori Airi 4. Uzuki Ai 5. Igarashi Yui 6. Takano Itsuki 7. La-na 8. Bibi 9. Island  **Volume 2** **Cover**: [Nanase Meruchi](https://mangadex.org/author/b4360759-a180-463a-9a9e-63a60e662650)  **Author list**: 1. Uno Ryoku 2. Domoto Yuuki 3. Muchi Maro 4. Asakusa Tsukumo 5. Kosuke Haruhito 6. errant 7. Homing 8. Shikkarimono no Takashi-kun

Wheat  a young man with a passion for making sweets  starts working in a kitchen in a strange world full of magic! The treats may be a little quirky  but they're cute and oh so delicious! Thus begins a soothing café tale.

Haruaki is a scaredy-cat with a fetish for girls' school uniforms  but he also wants to be a good teacher. However  his new school isn’t exactly what he thought it would be: it's an academy for monsters  demons  ghosts and all sorts of supernatural creatures!

The hero and his party finally reach the Demon King's castle. However  the Demon King's room is cursed with a death sentence for any virgin who enters it!! In order to defeat the Demon King  the virgin hero and his fellow heroines try various strategies to get rid of their virginity... The heroines are shocked by the hero's terrible behavior... but it turns out that they are all in love with the hero...!?

One day  average salaryman Yamai Zenjirou has an out-of-this-world experience—literally! He's pulled from Earth and dragged to another world where magic thrives and a gorgeous  powerful queen needs a consort. Now he's being pressured to marry that very monarch and help her bear a child. Will Zenjirou accept this life of lazy  luxurious love at the cost of leaving his home behind?

title_en: Kamigami no Kennou wo Ayatsurishi Mono ~Nouryoku Suuchi "0" de Sagesumareteiru Ore da ga  Jitsu wa Sekai Saikyou no Ikkaku~
description: Over a hundred years have passed since the emergence of "Ability Users " those who possess supernatural powers and the monstrous aberrations that can only be defeated by said powers.   Living in such a time  Yanagi Hayato's ability score is "0" marks him as a powerless individual  subjecting him to  a life of constant oppression and mistreatment.  In reality  Hayato's displayed score is nothing more than a bug caused by his ability  [Transcendent]  the power to "sublimate himself into any existence." But the truth is  he's just been hiding the power to easily annihilate monsters―?!
From Maiu Cafe: A girl searching for love meets a caring boy at a café. Drawn to him  she gets closer… but are their feelings truly mutual? A sweet and uncertain romance unfolds behind the counter.

title_en: Death Game ni Makikomareta Yamamoto-san  Kimama ni Game Balance wo Houkaisaseru
description: "...Is this a death game?"   The full-dive RPG "Life is Adventure" has 100 000 players due to the failure of management  and it has turned into a death game that is going out of control. Yamamoto Rinka  a beautiful player in her thirties  curses her fate and falls into despair - or did she?  "It's a forced long vacation! If I'm going to do it  I might as well take my time and enjoy the game!"  Moreover  due to a cheat skill that was activated despite her own will  she suddenly became an all-round player...

Lorena chose death to avenge her ruined life—but wakes up in the past. This time  she’ll protect her family and destroy her husband through a scandalous divorce. To do it  she needs a mad dog to hunt the beast. Let the revenge begin.

Dating can be tough when you nerd out over barbecue. Kenta  a practical pitmaster  looks for a grill-friend in Chihiro  an aloof and faultless business babe... or is she? Scared of being rejected for who they really are  the two of them find comfort in food and each other... and all is well until Kenta must transfer away. With their developing relationship at steak  Chihiro proposes they tie the knot and they marry for better or wurst. Winging a long-distance marriage is one thing  but here's the rub — they barely know each other!

Blue Archive GLB's official 4-Koma  featuring snippets of the daily occurrences in Kivotos!  For the Official English and Korean versions  you can find them on the respective server's Twitter account.  The series is titled (Global) to differentiate it from the Japanese 4-Koma.  --- **Links:** - [Blue Archive EN's Twitter](https://twitter.com/EN_BlueArchive) - [Blue Archive KR's Twitter](https://twitter.com/KR_BlueArchive) - [JP Server's 4-Koma](https://mangadex.org/title/1f63ea84-6bc6-4312-81bf-b28d5592d802/blue-archive-japan)

Ogata Shinsaku is a Homeless 17 years old boy  one day an old man appeared in front of him and grant him 100 million yen. Using the money Shinsaku started a company to go against his father's Empire  Tatsumi Takaaki  who didn't accept him as his son.

title_en: I Became the Mother of the Evil Male Lead
description: The newly reincarnated Sheriel learns she has become the mother of Karthizel Roperam  the male lead of a dark romance fantasy novel. All the neglect Karthizel faces as a child leads him to become a crazy and obsessive man who’s willing to kill anyone to get what he wants  even his own mother! Then the only way for Sheriel to keep herself alive in this timeline is to have him be raised right under loving parents  which means she’ll also need to make amends with her cold  estranged husband. Will Sheriel be able to save herself and this broken family?

title_en: Kyuuseishu «Messiah» ~Isekai wo Sukutta Motoyuusha ga Mamono no Afureru Genjitsu Sekai wo Musou Suru~
description: The **former** savior  Takeru Yamato  was summoned to another world and executed because of his strength. When he wakes up  he finds himself in Japan  where he spent time before being summoned. However  in the city  demons appear from "gates" and rampage  and those called hunters fight them using magic. Returning from another world  Takeru decides to hide his powers and live  but...

title_en: My Best Friend is a Magical Girl

description: Spin-off from Drop. Follows the daily life of legendary thug  Tatsuya Iguchi who is not afraid of anything or anyone.

title_en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Shizoku Kaigi-hen
description: At the Yotsuba New Year's gathering  Miyuki was names as the successor whilst Tatsuya was named her fiancé. Tatsuya and Miyuki's non-sibling relationship and engagement are now public knowledge. Among the shocked students the most shocked are those that knew the siblings.   Meanwhile  the Ten Master Clans selection meeting  followed by magicians all over the world  is due to take place at a hotel in Hakone.      Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 17-19.

Kenzaki Makoto  a debuting sculptor  was arrested as the serial killer of the Yokohama Line series of murders. He insisted that he was innocent but was sentenced to the death penalty. He was executed 11 years after the crime. But when he reopened his eyes  by a twist of fate  he had returned to 11 years ago  25 days before the crime was committed. Burning with the desire for revenge against the real murderer  Kenzaki begins to take action. The only one he can trust is HIMSELF. The crime suspense story of two selves fighting against fate unfolds.

title_en: Isekai Rakuraku Survival ~Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu~
description: More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer  but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!

title_en: Goshujin-sama Shika Katan! Light BL Anthology ~Bokutachi Kedamono Goshujin no Koi Mimamoritai~
description: Rooting for my dear owner's love!!!!!  Pomeranians  raccoons  cats  beavers  dragons  ponies  hamsters  ring-tailed lemurs... So many cute animals!  A 200% therapeutic  new take on the youth BL anthology scene!  Cover by Kasukabe Akira [Included Stories] 1. Bibatto Koi Shite by Hanabusa Suuji 2. Kimi to Koisuru Sankakukei by Yamamoto Mato 3. Wanko to Ookami-kun no Love Letter by Shimajirou 4. BIG CAT LOVE by Sakumoto Ayu 5. Iwakuma-kun wa Nekomishiri by Kusege 6. Shiba to Omawari-san by Nihonmatsu Shino 7. Zootto Oshi! by Ichizen Hono 8. Aiken Beru wa Joubutsu Dekinai! by Yamaguchi Suguri 9. Wai no Mission by Hamasaki 10. Toto no Rival by Tanno Chikuwabu 11.  Kawaii Kimi ni Pink no Hanabira - Written by Date Kiyo  Art by Sakurazaka Mai (Short Story) 12. TOBI'S TIME by JIN

title_en: Spy x Family — trick or treat!! (Doujinshi)
Henkyou Mob Kizoku no Uchi ni Totsuidekita Akuyaku Reijou ga  Mechakucha Dekiru Yoi Yome Nanda ga?
description: Ragna  the heir to a frontier noble family  is a reincarnated former Japanese citizen who realizes that the world he now lives in is the setting of an otome game. Dreaming of a carefree life as an adventurer  his plans are derailed when a war takes his family  forcing him to take on the responsibilities of managing his family’s lands. Struggling with the unfamiliar duties of a lord  his already chaotic life takes another turn when an unexpected engagement to a noblewoman from a higher-ranking family is arranged.  To his surprise  the bride-to-be is Alicia  the "villainess" of the otome game's story — a character destined for heartbreak  a demonic pact  and ultimate destruction. Now sharing his life with someone fated for tragedy  Ragna is swept up in the wheels of fate. Can he rewrite the predetermined outcomes of this world and secure a peaceful life for himself and Alicia?

title_en: Eiyuu Onna Kishi ni Yuunou to Bareta Ore no Bijin Harem Kishidan - Gaikaku Hikume no Kijutsu Kishidan
description: Gaikaku  a genius mage with unparalleled magical prowess  lives in quiet seclusion under the employ of a gluttonous regional lord  Borick. While earning pocket change through secretive assignments  he devotes himself freely to magical research  surrounded by a diverse group of girls from various races. However  after taking down a certain elite elf  his incredible talents as a mage begin to draw attention across the land...?! ___ **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/70163)

A murderer who can't stop the urge to kill people  even though he wants to stop  is happy when his desired death sentence is carried out - only to be reincarnated into another world. The mission entrusted to him by the goddess was to kill 12 reincarnated people using his murderous impulses! Not all reincarnated people are saints!  **Notes:** - With the debut of the spinoff series  it was revealed that “Hitotsubu Ichigo” (the credited author) was actually an alias of Kawamoto Homura. Starting with Volume 5  the credited author is “Kawamoto Homura”. - Won the Rakuten Kobo Ebook Award 2024 Special Award.

The white and black maid are against each other  trying to win the love of their young master  who will be victorious? Guess we'll find out~  --- **Notes:** - There is an R-18 version.  **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/18815611/series/203244) ([Chapters 4](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/110018654) and [5.5](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/110876097) aren't in the Pixiv series  but were still uploaded to Pixiv.)

title_en: Hakanai Kimi wa Moukou wo Hajimeru
description: Kagari  an ephemeral beauty  reunites with her older childhood friend  Nana-kun  and begins her romantic assault on him.

title_en: A Yuri Manga That Starts With Getting Rejected in a Dream
description: For your very average high school girl  Tsukushi  there's her cool and beautiful childhood friend (with some very particular weaknesses) Hinoka. Tsukushi always thought they would be normal childhood friends forever… That is until Tsukushi saw Hinoka rejected her confession in a dream.   The hypnagogic romantic comedy between a cheery maiden  and a cool girl which begins with a dream  starts right now!   [Serialization of Popular Twitter manga by Hijiki](https://mangadex.org/title/088db207-6c42-4fa9-9e6f-1b831c21c1ac/a-yuri-manga-that-starts-with-getting-rejected-in-a-dream)

title_en: Hyakki Chousho - Kaii Chousa wa Kochira Made
description: Sakaki is transferred to a paranormal investigation agency and is partnered with Kunugi  an old high school classmate. Unfortunately  Sakaki has a strong sensitivity to the supernatural and is afraid of ghosts  and together  the unlikely duo investigate cursed and haunted locations.

Shirai Otome is a beautiful honor student who seems serious at first glance… But deep down  she’s endlessly curious about all things naughty!   These are the rose-tinted days of Shirai Otome  an “Ero Seeker” who explores the hidden eroticism tucked between the cracks of everyday life!

In this world there are 5 different races: Angels  Demons  Beastkin  Vampires  and Humans. Among them  Elle  an angel boasting immense power  belongs to the Angel Police. Having a strong sense of Justice in her heart  she is strict with both herself and others and diligently carries out her duties. One day  Elle  because she is a member of the Angel Police Elite Force  is ordered to capture the timid demon Eve. Elle ends up chasing Eve who is a bit of a problem child who manages to escape from prison every time she is caught! Moreover  both Eve's ability to swiftly escape and her strong summon beasts make it quite difficult for her to be captured! While she is chasing Eve  she gets caught up in an outrageous incident!!

"This guy's my lover."  Ryou quit his job after his girlfriend invited him to join a pyramid scheme.  One day  when he went to her home  he was worried about her and found a large number of Yakuza!  Ryou is in a desperate situation when he is suspected of being in league with his girlfriend  who has absconded with money belonging to the Daikoku clan  and is rescued by Miyoshi  a junior high school classmate who happens to be a member of the Daikoku clan.  The two end up living together as fake lovers until the situation cools down  but Miyoshi  who was supposed to be a good friend at the time  is quite cold toward Ryou...?
These are the recollections of a group of men who bet everything on their bicycles. The central pillars of their respective teams  the 3rd years. New stories revealing their pasts is about to begin!!

title_en: Will You Let Me Stay Here?
description: I want to be the reason you  whose name I don't even know  choose to live one more day tomorrow.

"I can see your number. The number of people you will kill in the future."   If he kills before they kill  the murder will not occur. Serial killer Number punishes the 'Destined Murderers' one at a time under that resolution. Could his wish to create a world without murder through murder ever be accomplished?
The manga will focus on the character Koharu Hidaka  who is a middle school teacher close to 30 years old in 2007.

title_en: Koharu to Minato: Watashi no Partner wa Onnanoko
description: A sweet essay comic by a real-life couple  that attracted a lot of attention on social media  is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!  Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life  even with a 10-year age difference  will heal you from the fatigue of modern life…!

title_en: Kimi ga Hoeru Tame no Uta wo
description: Oogami Haru  a high schooler troubled by her childish appearance and contrasting deep voice secretly uploads videos of herself singing on the internet. One day  when her classmate Narumiya Yuu finds out about this  instead of the ridicule she expected  Yuu instead invites Haru to form their own musical group...

Fujiyama Shinobu aka Sexy Fujiyama  is a general working for the evil Flower Bud Gang who are trying to take over the city. Standing in her way is the masked magical girl  Princess Mamu  who wouldn't you know it  has just moved in next door to Fujiyama's place...

title_en: Imokusa Reijou desu ga Akuyaku Reisoku wo Tasuketara Kiniiraremashita
description: Agnes  who was ridiculed in the social circles for being an unfashionable noble  happened to help Nazelbert  the duke's son  who had been betrothed to the Princess. However  the Princess saw this and ordered Nazelbert to marry Agnes as punishment. Isn't it terrible to marry me as a punishment? Look  he seems to hate it too. Wait  he doesn't?  This is a story about an unfashionable noble and a duke's son  who grow closer to each other.  --- * [Orignal Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2047go/)

title_en: Suterare Shiro Mahoutsukai no Koucha Seikatsu
description: “Thank you for your efforts so far  Amalia.”  Amalia  a white witch  was traveling in a party with her friends  but when the group failed to defeat the dragon  Amalia was mocked as a “useless old woman” and was abandoned on the dragon mountain.  Amalia was ready to die  but the golden dragon took a liking to her and took her to the Magic Realm to heal her injuries.  The dragon seemed to be interested in the Human World and took the form of a human child to live with Amalia in the countryside.  Amalia was living with the dragon child  making the most of her skills in white magic and her favorite hobby of making tea  when a mercenary appeared in front of her.  He was once the young boy that Amalia had lovingly raised in the orphanage.

title_en: The Delinquent and the Transfer Student
description: The strongest sukeban × air-headed transfer student! A beautiful girls' comedy with too much happiness!  Riri Kanzaki  a transfer student  is looking forward to hanging out with Atsuko Nagumo  a sukeban  every time they play their silly word game.  As Atsuko sees Kanzaki's happiness  she begins to think that it's not so bad...  --- **[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/suketen_pr)** Licensed in Spanish by Arechi Manga.

Katou Narumi (19) suffers from Zonapha Syndrome  a rare ailment that stops his breathing unless he makes people laugh. He's been forced to abandon his training in Chinese kenpo and return to Japan  where he now works as a clown. The only problem: he's not very funny.      One day he meets Saiga Masaru (11)  the recent inheritor of a huge fortune  who gives him the first laugh he's gotten all day. When he realizes Masaru is being pursued by assassins  he steps in to protect the boy  only to discover that instead of conventional weapons  the assassins wield huge  eerie puppets. They soon encounter the mysterious Shirogane (age unknown)  who controls a puppet of her own  and claims she was sent from France by Masaru's late grandfather to protect him.      Their paths intertwine and diverge  splitting into two stories: Karakuri and Circus  puppets and performers  tears and laughter. The strange circus of living dolls that spreads Zonapha Syndrome  the human puppets known collectively as the Shirogane  and the puppeteers whose undying grudge set in motion both sides of this performance.
The manga centers on Nagumo  a penniless college student who moves to a town filled with bizarre people. ___ [Alternative Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/city/)

Taking place on the planet Efinea  Asbel Lhant seeks the strength to protect those he holds dear. Along with his childhood friends and the mysterious and innocent Sophie  he must explore the bonds of friendship as they find themselves drawn into the conflict between three kingdoms competing for dominance of the planet.      Based on the role-playing game of the same name by Namco Tales Studio.

Fumi Isshiki works as an accountant at an entertainment agency. One day he is transferred to the management department  where Ayano Haga  a 13-year-old child actress  seems to take a liking to him... She is just a child  yet she acts more mature than many adults.

title_en: Oswald the Overman in the Lesser Planes of Hell
description: An idiot wakes up in hell  and goes on a journey to reclaim their life.

title_en: I Made a Harem in the Underworld
description: Zhang Xiao entered a game called “King of Hell”  but after his death  he came back to life in another body. From then on  he counterattacked and reached the peak of his life. Can he overturn the conspiracy of the whole hell on his own and conquer all the girls here!

The city of Shibugaya was once known for its youth and bustle  however now  all that remains are ruins since man-eating rabbits have made a nest of its subway... One wolf-eared girl dares to challenge the underground with by her side a girl with rabbit ears...

title_en: A Meek Little Brother Like Me
description: Tetsuya reunites with his elder sister after their mother passed away.      This oneshot appears in volume 30 of *ハルタ* (Hull) magazine.

Mineral collecting is a modern-day treasure hunt!  Ruri  a high school girl who loves jewelry and accessories  ventures into the world of mineral collecting in mountains  rivers  and caves. The first volume features numerous minerals  including quartz  garnet  pyrite  gold sand  and fluorite. The collection scenes are full of fascinating scenes using specialized tools such as a panning dish  hammer  and topographical maps. This is an authentic science adventure based on the solid knowledge of the author  who is trained in mineralogy!

Mitsuru Fujita is a girl who loves playing piano. When she moves into her high school dormitory  her roommate is Kanade Kobayashi  a former rival at piano competitions. She was hailed as a prodigy  but Kanade has given up the piano due to trauma she suffered while studying abroad. Until Mitsuru invites Kanade to play a duet with her...  (Source: Manga Time Kirara  translated)

When I bought a mountain  I never expected it to be from another world! And while I was leisurely enjoying a countryside life suited to this strange realm  I unknowingly began making the mountain more powerful!?  (Source: Amazon JP  edited)

"O  Hero!"  With that cliched line  Kazuya Souma found himself summoned to another world and his adventure - did not begin.   After he presents his plan to strengthen the country economically and militarily  the king cedes the throne to him and Souma finds himself saddled with ruling the nation! What's more  he's betrothed to the king's daughter now?!   In order to get the country back on its feet  Souma calls the wise  the talented  and the gifted to his side. Five people gather before the newly crowned Souma. Just what are the many talents and abilities they possess?!   What path will his outlook as a realist take Souma and the people of his country down?

Izumi  a university student part-timing at a manga cafe  got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami  a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?
Sequel to [Wu Liu Qi: Heibai Shuanglong](https://mangadex.org/title/757ffc27-5baf-40c3-9bad-3a1859837936)
Four girls  an illustrator  a former idol  a VTuber  and a composer  form an anonymous artist group called "JELEE"  each pursuing their artistic dreams while supporting one another.

His name is Touji  20 years old. Following a certain incident that made him infamous  his only way get by is by working insconspicuous part-time jobs without involving himself with others.   One day  while working at a supermarket  he gets dragged into a conflict between an employee and a rude Customer and ends up getting acquainted with a beautiful high school girl named Sakuya.   Though she is blessed with an astounding memory  which some even call her ''super eye''  she struggles to adjust to her school life. In this illustrated human drama  those two who have difficulty adapting to this cruel society begin their share-house lifestyle and grow together.

title_en: Sonic and the Blade of Courage
description: The blue hedgehog has come to CoroCoro! The world-famous *Sonic* has been adapted into a manga with a completely original story!  The author is Imada Yuuki  well-known for *The Jet Black Hedgehog: Shadow the Hedgehog*.  Witness Sonic's high speed action at its max!

title_en: Hanitora! Shoukan Yuusha wo Hameru Honey Trap Hoi Mou
description: After defeating the evil god with his companions  Yuuri's adventure had come to a term. All that remained was for him to go back to the world he came from... or so he thought  but it seemed like he would have to stay here?! Now that he has to live in this world  Yuuri isn't sure what to do next and fears remaining a NEET. In the meantime  the princess Lunaria  who knows Yuuri has little interest in power or luxury  sets up a honey trap as part of her plan to make the hero never leave her country.

Ye Lin transmigrated into a world overrun by demons and monsters. On the day of his class transfer  he became an SSS-rank Forbidden Spellcaster—and was immediately met with ridicule. Why? Because casting forbidden spells costs lifespan  and most Forbidden Spellcasters die young. But only Ye Lin knows: with his immortal body  the profession’s fatal flaw means nothing to him. When Ye Lin casually unleashed hundreds of forbidden spells in a single move  everyone around him was terrified. “How many lives do you have?!” “You’re using forbidden spells like normal attacks?!”

title_en: Chou Nankan Dungeon de 10-mannen Shugyou shita Kekka  Sekai Saikyou ni ~Saijaku Munou no Gekokujou~
description: The Most Incompetent Person in the World.  Kai Heinemann received this gift at the age of 13. The effects of the gift resulted in Kai's significantly reduced physical abilities  and he became despised and bullied in the gifted supremacy of Lamour. Kai is forced to leave his home and is attacked on his way to the royal capital  and while desperately running away  he wanders into a dungeon. In the dungeon  he had to clear the "Trial of the Gods" to get out  and the time did not progress. Kai  feeling like he was going to die  spent 100 000 years clearing the dungeon. In the process of clearing the trial of the gods  Kai becomes the most powerful being in the world  gaining unique and strong friends along the way.

Gull  a mercenary boy whose life was saved by the highly ranked magician Kuon when he was young  now accepts a job to serve with a group of knights to subjugate a magician and retrieve a stolen magear. However  as the knights are on the way they are discovered by the magician and a battle ensues. Faced with an opponent with overwhelming power  Gull is...!! After that  Gull somehow becomes Kuon's apprentice...?!

title_en: I Dominate a Magical Continent with an Industrial Revolution
description: This is a **Medieval Fantasy World** brimming with magic and adventure  where various races and cultures coexist.   The protagonist  a young lord  inherits his family’s lands and wealth  but must overcome many challenges. With the aid of his system  he introduces an industrial revolution to this magical continent and ultimately rises to dominate it!

Because I've been watching her more closely than anyone else  I could tell. That she's fallen in love. And that the one she's in love with... is my best friend—our mutual childhood friend. Determined to let go of his own feelings and support her love instead  the protagonist  Tsubaki  makes up his mind. Thanks to his efforts  the two childhood friends—always by each other's side—finally end up together. After seeing it all through  Tsubaki spends a sleepless night  choking on the urge to scream... And then  when he next opens his eyes  he finds himself back one week in the past  to the moment before he gave up on his feelings.  (Source: ComicWalker  edited)

Tamotsu Sugawara  a corporate employee who can't say no to anything  finds himself unable to go to work and decides to recuperate for a while at his family's shrine. One night  a ghost that looks exactly like Makoto Hiiragi  a university student working part-time at the shrine during the day  appears before him.

title_en: 10-Nen Buri ni Saikai shita Kusogaki wa Seijun Bishoujo JK ni Seichou shiteita
description: Yuu Arizuki returned to his hometown after quitting his job at an exploitative company in Tokyo. Just as he was getting ready to start a new life back home  he met a beautiful and innocent high school girl  who turned out to be Haruyama Miya  one of the little girls (brats) Isamu used to play with when he was young. But Isamu didn't recognize her because of how much she had changed after growing up...?

**[You better prepare yourself  damn world.]** Everything in this world is absurd. The heroes who pretend to fight with grace  the minor villains who can only commit petty crimes  his classmates who always hang out in groups… and his own weak and miserable self. And so the boy yearns to change everything  not only himself but also the world—for he will become the lonely  the aloof  the supreme "Greatest of all Villains"!  By the creator of "The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses " Fujichika Koume  comes a new story  a story about Villains!  *(Source: Square Enix  translated)*
Follow the antics of a snowman turned Yuki-Onna hellbent on destroying the sun with the help of a child named Himari and her Aunt Koharu.
Side Stories (and Extra Content) from the author's Twitter.  *Note: If a chapter name starts with **'(chX)'**  that means it includes **Spoilers for ch. X** of the Main Story.*

title_en: Shibou Yuugi de Meshi wo Kuu.
description: Player Name: Yuki Age: 17 Profession: Death Games  A huge amount of money  with lives on the line. Participants? Beautiful girls only.  A deadly showbiz where people die. These death games are her calling and her reason to live.  For some reason she knows: This is where she belongs. Elegant. Ruthless.  Cutting through the dazzling gauntlet of death. Playfully. Desperately.  Aiming for the unprecedented "99 Consecutive Wins"!

title_en: I Want to Write Your Heart into Kanji
description: A high school boy  Yomi Hashiba  is troubled. He is unable to understand what Mizuki Hanai  a cool girl who became his girlfriend a month ago  is thinking... One day  while he is worrying about his relationship with Mizuki Hanai  he starts to understand her "Kanji"...? (same pronunciation as feeling) This is the beginning of a thrilling coming-of-age romantic comedy about love and kanji!

title_en: My Childhood Friend Teaches Me Everything
description: The boy teaches the girl nearly everything he knows when she got troubles.

title_en: Ko  Konna Ikemen ga Watashi no Osananajimi de Kon'yakusha Desutte? Sasuga Akuyaku Reijou  Sore Kurai no Utsuwa Janakereba Konna Taiyaku Tsutomaranai Wa
description: Before she knew it  Rin suddenly finds herself reborn as Richelie  the daughter of a duke from a country called Eirland. Her fiancé is the crown prince  Zenon... Could this really be the world of the otome game her little sisters are crazy about? And what's more  she's the villainess who tricks all the targets into having sex?!  …For someone with a zero love quotient  naturally this is far too difficult! Rin wants to quietly aim for the bad ending and go to a convent  but she finds herself getting sucked deeper and deeper into Zenon's swamp of suspicion…  A turbulent love fantasy about the heroine  reincarnated as a villainess  who is the polar opposite of her character × her sadistic childhood friend  the crown prince. ___ **Character Designer:** [Surada Mami](https://mangadex.org/author/a0b57f33-75f8-40c4-aa94-a861765447ca)

title_ja: Silent Witch - Chinmoku no Majo no Kakushigoto
description: Monica Everett is revered as "The Silent Witch." She's the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though  she's just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent  Monica is chosen as one of the "Seven Sages " and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?

title_en: Buchigire Reijou wa Houfuku wo Chikaimashita. ~Madousho no Chikara de Sokoku wo Tataki Tsubushimasu~
description: Lady Elizabeth has her engagement annulled at a party by the crown prince  whose heart has moved on to another young noblewoman. She is then imprisoned in the dungeon over unjust accusations  and learns she has been betrayed by the country to which she has devoted everything...  At the peak of her frustration  Elizabeth finally decides to defect  with a grimoire holding hidden and formidable powers in hand!! She begins her new life and trade with the help of Viscount Lucas from the neighbouring country. With a fierce desire for revenge against her home country in her heart.

title_en: Made in Abyss - Made from Fortunes (Doujinshi)
description: The Abyss. A giant pit filled with gigantic cave system that goes down to extreme unknown depths  filled with wonderful and terrifying treasures and creatures never before seen. Only the bravest of the delvers are able to see what horrors truly lie in wait at the bottom.  People are familiar with the great story of Made in Abyss  following a young orphaned cave raider  a mysterious amnesiac robot  and a tragic narehate. But  what if something went differently? What if one single decision changed these unfortunate childrens' story?  Up on Orth a pair of friends  Fyuo and Kwazan  a newly promoted red and blue whistle start experiencing a few strange things happening to them. Fyuo is having dreams of an unfamiliar figure and Kwazan decides to help him figure out the cause of these nightmares using notes she stole from another delver. But  what they find waiting for them only a few hundred meters down  will change their lives forever.
Posting one-page yuri every day for 100 days!

The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world  where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other  it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.

The main character  Iroha  is a first-year high school student who finds it difficult to talk to others. Even though it’s been about two months since she started high school  she still hasn’t had a proper conversation with any of her classmates. During every break  she quietly slips out of the classroom and heads to the courtyard by the old school building. She does this to meet and talk with a senior she met at the town library while studying for exams. This senior  who is a year older  has become a source of support for Iroha. However  the two of them share a secret...

Little Ghost Q-Taro  by Fujiko Fujio  is a Japanese manga about a ghost  Q-Taro who lives with the Ohara family. Q-Taro  also known as Q-chan or Oba-Q  is a mischief-maker who likes to fly around scaring people and stealing food  though he is deathly afraid of dogs.      The story is usually focused on the antics of Q-Taro and his friends. The manga was drawn in 1964–1966 by Fujiko Fujio (Fujiko F. Fujio and Fujiko Fujio A) and in 1971–1974 by only Fujiko F. Fujio. An English manga volume was published in Japan as Q the Spook.

title_en: Fuufu de Itonamu Monster Farm ~Mezase  Mattari Slow Life~
description: Haito and Lina  a newlywed couple  purchase the full-dive VR game "Free Frontier Online". Their reason for playing is to be able to pet and fluff as many monsters as they wish! The two  who are unable to keep pets due to animal allergies  come up with the idea that they can interact with fluffy animals as much as they want in the game  so they start the game as tamers. They thought they started with the purpose of relaxing with the monsters  but before they knew it  they ended up obtaining a familiar stronger than the monsters...!? They will tame  they will battle and they will flirt!

title_en: Shounin Skill de Maoujou no Kouryaku wo Mezasu ~Isekai Tenishita no de Saikyou Item to Tookujutsu de Ikinuku to ni shita~
description: One day  Sota  a university student  is summoned to another world! Moreover  after being summoned  he was mistaken for a hero and imprisoned in the Demon King's Castle  where he was in a desperate situation...! Sota gets through the predicament with his natural skill  but for some reason he ends up solving the embarrassing problem of Fafnir  a super beautiful demi-human...!?

Zero grew up in an orphanage. Contrary to the orphanage's philosophy of "If you want it  believe in and fight for it " Zero hates competition and conflict and prefers peaceful days. However  after discovering a certain secret  Zero finds himself caught up in the whirlpool of a cruel fate...!?

After graduating from university  new member of society Moriya Mamoru begins working at city hall. However  it turns out to be an "underground" city hall used by various races known as "demi-humans"...!?

Nemuro-kun sits next to me. He always hides his face with his bangs  and most people at school do not know his real face. One day  Takamura happened to know his face  and she couldn't take his eyes off Nemuro-kun! I love Nemuro-kun's face. But that is all I know. This is a school love comedy that begins with a face  where they gradually get to know each other!
The official manga for the Bombergirl arcade game. All pages are posted on the official Bombergirl Twitter account.

title_en: Fate/ Grand Order: After A Singularity (Doujinshi)
tags: Action|Ghosts|Comedy|Martial Arts|Magical Girls|Adventure|Self-Published|Crossdressing|Doujinshi|Fantasy|Delinquents|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Aliens|Supernatural|Full Color
description: The story follows Taida (Female Ritsuka)  the final master of Chaldea  and her shenanigans with her friends  Mash  Astolfo  and Mordred  across Chaldea and its residents after every singularity.  After A Singularity is a fan comic with the approval of MangaDex staff.
Violence!!!! Shootouts!!!! Zombies!!!! Electricity!!!! An office life comedy with no straight man begins.

title_en: Watashi no Tamashii wo Tabete Kudasai!
description: Yuu  a plain and exhausted office worker stuck in a soul-crushing black company  dies and is reincarnated as a young girl with horns. To her surprise  she encounters Ajisai  a beautiful beast-woman  and ends up “sharing her soul” with her… through a deep  passionate kiss!  Even as her life force is being drained  Yuu feels a nervous thrill around the alluring Ajisai and a growing sense of fulfillment in being able to give herself to someone else. As for Ajisai  who initially saw Yuu as nothing more than a meal  she slowly begins to open her heart.

In a world where people are given several skills as a blessing from God when they turn 10  the eldest son of the Desemann family  Alec  was only able to acquire one unpopular skill  earth magic - even though everyone in the family is amazing!! But his younger sister Maria says  "You're a monster  big brother."

The more he carries  the stronger he becomes! An unmatched fantasy by the weakest adventurer duo!  Ryuk  a boy with a unique skill "Porter " which allows him to carry a massive amount of items  was being exploited as a chore boy for the S-rank party "Black Lion of Foresight." One day  the party managed to acquire a storage item more convenient than Ryuk's skill  thus no longer needed  Ryuk is banished inside a dangerous dungeon. Despairing in this hopeless situation  suddenly he meets a shrine maiden girl  Mio — and then?

title_en: Kensei no Osananajimi ga Power Harass de Ore ni Tsuraku Ataru no de  Zetsuen Shite Henkyou de ma Kenshi to Shite Denaosu Koto ni Shita
description: The power harassment from Alfine ー his girlfriend and childhood friend ー who is the same age  grew up with him  and became adventurers together  is painful. She is a peerless beauty  a person with the title "Sword Master" and called the "Flawless Sword Goddess " a capable woman with achievements recognized by the kingdom and rewarded with appointment as a knight and became a noble. On the other hand  he is treated as that capable woman  Alfine’s accessory  gets abusive language hurled at him by her  and suffers from her harsh power harassment and insults to him as an adventurer  resulting in him losing his dignity as a man and as a person He has resigned himself to spending his daily life in the position of a lover-caretaker.      However  changes came to that daily life. Alfine  who becomes busy as the kingdom's knight  often is unable to take part in adventures. As a result  the times he takes requests alone increases  and he is able to regain his lost dignity. Then he becomes aware of the abnormality of his circumstances. So  to regain himself  he chooses to leave her and her repeated power harassment behind. In addition to all of the equipment he has received until then  he returns his sword  one of a pair they had exchanged when they became adventurers. Declaring that they are over  he leaves the place quickly.      "From now on  I will change my name and appearance and live freely."      As soon as he decides that  everything goes well. When he realizes  he is praised by the people around him and is the greatest adventurer on the frontier. What's more  he got a proposal to marry the frontier lord’s daughter from a female adventurer.
A single encounter with a card will take you to the skies! The Card Game that Soars through the Skies  this is Vanguard's New series  'SkyRide'!

title_en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity II: Subterranean World of Folklore  Agartha - Women of Agartha
description: Fate/Grand Order official comicalize start!  In 2000 AD  the bottom of the mountain range in Central Asia... In a place where no obvious wars or incidents have been confirmed  "Organization for the Preservation of Human Order  Chaldea" finds the existence of a Singularity. Ritsuka Fujimaru and his team started the Rayshift immediately...

*Evil is still here.*  The villain Melgast has been defeated. When elementary schooler Yuki learns this shocking news from his morning superhero show  he decides to take action to avenge the fallen villain! A story of small moments and big growth by Minamine.  *Part of the Shonen Jump+ 11th Anniversary Special 11-page 11 oneshot project* [Official Webpage](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2083/) | [View Others](https://mangadex.org/list/51d1bfc8-4f7c-455b-a4ae-26d5fb36dd9d/jump-11th-anniversary-special-11-page-oneshot-project)

A gray Earth  where humanity was transformed into deformed beings. The curtains open on an action series where the goal is to recover a lost world  with the help of a strange-looking gun!   An enormous solar flare caused the planet to lose all of its colors. Humans are deformed and declining in numbers. The key to reclaiming the old world lies within the power hidden in *color*  and one *girl*. Knowing that the few remnants of colors in the world yield a great power  Avidia  who is conducting research while protecting a girl named Chie  uses the colors to expand his own power  and throws himself in a battle against the Cult.  --- A cosmic disaster changed the Earth forever  stripping away every last drop of color from the world. Mankind also changed: the familiar human face is almost forgotten in a world now populated wholly by mutants. Against the backdrop of a moody urban landscape  a lone-wolf investigator named Avidia relies on both his wits and extraordinary gun to hunt down the world's last hidden scraps of color. He soon crosses paths with a very special girl -- one who just might hold the key to bringing back what the world has lost.

title_en: Kaijin Mira no Dai 2 Keitai ga Kawaisugiru
description: Cuteness is unbeatable!  Monster Mira is on another rampage  aiming to steal the hero's transformation belt. Having just reached full power thanks to the Doctor's modifications  Mira's new form turns out to be way too cute!

Mayo  who is gloomy and lacks self-confidence  is currently active as the bright and cheerful popular VTuber "Mahiru".  The more Mahiru  the polar opposite of his true self  is loved  the more the reality of being alone becomes painful...  Even his manager Ogino  who praises him a lot and spoils him  is probably only looking at Mahiru  not the real "me".  Because he knows this  he can't take Ogino's words "I love you" seriously and wish to be loved by him so much...!  However  as if seeing through Mayo's "desire to be bullied"  Ogino asks  "Shall I bully you instead?"  revealing the depths of his body trembling with anticipation...!?  A sweet  sadistic  caring manager x an unconsciously masochistic  gloomy VTuber  Development of the mind and body! Pampered Love Days!!!!

Childhood friends who've been together since they were little. They both realize their feelings for each other  but they're too close to be honest. What connects them is the I Love You Game that they've been playing since they were little. The conclusion of their love is entrusted to this silly game  where you win if you make the other person embarrassed!
The official Spinoff manga  following Konata and her friends in their 30s.

From the author of Asobi Asobase comes a new comedy series  about… the Art Club from Asobi Asobase.  Oficial chapter 1 RAW: https://comic-action.com/episode/14079602755364921618  Due to health problems  the author said that the work would be on hiatus (from December 2024).
New enemies  new bugs and an even bigger island.

In a far-off corner of another world where only nobles can use magic  a certain thirty-something salaryman is reincarnated as a five-year-old village boy named Ren.  For him  the slow-paced countryside life is peaceful and enjoyable—that is  until a group of adorable but terrifying little angels (a.k.a. troublemaking children) takes a liking to him.  Even though he just wants to be lazy  he ends up doing things perfectly—like playing hide-and-seek from morning till night  reading stories aloud  and calming their wailing cries—because he's just too good at taking care of others!  One day  while thinking of ways to slack off more  a monster suddenly attacks their once-peaceful village. And when the problem children are put in danger  the usually unmotivated Ren unleashes a hidden power he's kept secret—just to avoid getting dragged into more trouble!  A laid-back reincarnated boy ends up babysitting (and saving the kingdom) in this reluctant hero’s tale!

The cute and cheerful girl working at a Japanese style maid cafe  Hana. The black haired cold beauty  Mei. Though the two are in love with each other  they have not realized it. However  they have a secret that should not be discovered…

When the daughter of a shaman gets "strung up" with a centuries-old vampire  is it love or something more sinister that binds them? From Narae Lee  artist of the hit OEL manga ’Maximum Ride ’ comes the story of two misfits and their quirky  fantastical romp to find one another.

title_ja: Shiboritoranaide  Onna Shounin-san!!
description: Tartaros: A mysterious and massive underground dungeon. There  adventurers are engaged in a night and day struggle to find the treasure they seek. Lavi the New Adventurer is taking on the challenge of Tartaros  but has a problem. A renowned dark merchant  Philo the Beastkin  is pestering him to buy her strange items! She pushes items (often erotic) onto Lavi for him to use in every situation they come across. What will become of Lavi's adventures?! Is he willing to buy anything from this adorably annoying merchant girl?!

Midori Makibao is a small white racehorse. Compared to other thoroughbred horses  he looks more like a donkey with wide nostrils. However  with his guts and speed as his weapon  Makibao wins in every big race. In the beginning of his career  Makibao had a trouble making his debut as a racehorse  because of his appearance and various disadvantages he had. But Makibao had reasons to overcome his difficulties; there was a lifelong rival horse called Superhorse Cascade  that Makibao needed to defeat. Plus  he was determined to win back his mother  a horse that had been taken away for pay back the debt on the farm. There are many hardships that Makibao has to overcome  but he thrives in the series of races to become a great racehorse    ---   - **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Children in 1997**

Yoshida the class president has a nervous temperament. But recently her worries are caused by one of her classmates  Yano. He somehow always arrives at school covered in all sorts of injuries  she can't get her eyes off him! She can't control herself  she needs to patch him up!

title_en: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King
description: After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life  Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.  However  his “guide line ” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth  was filled with errors  causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.  When he is finally released from this personal hell  he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level  super-tutorial newbie survive?  ---  **Links:** - [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLzbAKkDpYM) - [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EA%B3%84-%EA%B2%80%EC%99%95-%EC%83%9D%EC%A1%B4%EA%B8%B0/2363) - [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%95%B0%E7%95%8C%E5%8A%8D%E7%8E%8B%E7%94%9F%E5%AD%98%E8%A8%98/66) - [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6885/) - [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/34782) - [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81/103) - [Official Brazilian Portuguese Translation](https://br.comikey.com/comics/latna-saga-a-jornada-do-rei-espadachim-webtoon/429/)

<Checkpoint> A drug eradication message from artists Song Ga & Eunso! *This content is a brand webtoon from the Ministry of Food and Drug Safety  and is a drug prevention campaign delivered by artists Song Ga & Eunso.

A shinigami  as a god of death  can kill any person—provided they see their victim's face and write their victim's name in a notebook called a Death Note. One day  Ryuk  bored by the shinigami lifestyle and interested in seeing how a human would use a Death Note  drops one into the human realm.      High school student and prodigy Light Yagami stumbles upon the Death Note and—since he deplores the state of the world—tests the deadly notebook by writing a criminal's name in it. When the criminal dies immediately following his experiment with the Death Note  Light is greatly surprised and quickly recognizes how devastating the power that has fallen into his hands could be.      With this divine capability  Light decides to extinguish all criminals in order to build a new world where crime does not exist and people worship him as a god. Police  however  quickly discover that a serial killer is targeting criminals and  consequently  try to apprehend the culprit. To do this  the Japanese investigators count on the assistance of the best detective in the world: a young and eccentric man known only by the name of L.

Chan-Woo finds it difficult talking to Sul-Hee  who always seems to be angry about something. However  what he says to her actually makes her heart beat like crazy! A sweet  romantic story of a young couple’s first love!  (Source: Toptoon Plus)  **Links:** - Promotional Video - [YouTube](https://youtu.be/YB-GVf_HXLk) - Defunct Official English - [Toptoon Plus](https://toptoonplus.com/comic/100306)
A BL (Bloody Love comedy) set in a long established bathhouse between a skilled vampire and a super pure virgin high school boy.
The trials and tribulations of a single father  who one day meets the reincarnation of his deceased wife  who perished a decade before.

Seven years ago  Toraji met the most beautiful man he had ever seen.  The time they spent together was as passionate as it was brief  and the man disappeared among the multitudes of Edo  the shogunate's capital. Toraji never learned his real name  or address  or occupation - but he never gave up on finding him again.  Only  he didn't expect that when he did  the man would turn out to be the master of a high-class ryokan and restaurant  or that he would have a young daughter. How did this happen? Why did he run? Who is the child's mother and where is she?  And most of all  will Toraji get a second chance to pursue the one great love of his life?

Nitori is dead. Or at least he should be  except  he was sent by mistake to the Bird Afterlife instead of the human one. Chief Karasuma  a raven deity and also a salaried afterlife manager  is unamused at first  but then concedes to give Nitori a chance to work for him. Nitori loves birds  and even more so  he loves chief Karasuma  with his glossy feathers and powerful beak. How will he manage this strange new... afterlife?

On his way home from work after an all-nighter  the workaholic Dr. Jikumaru Touji falls through a mysterious hole and wakes up in... another world! There  he stumbles upon the nearly dead assassin Naina and saves him with his "healing powers " but come morning  he discovers that for some reason  he now looks like a kid!? Jik (Jikumaru) starts looking for a way to return  while Naina protects him from this strange new world where the only law seems to be the law of the jungle. While Jik is busy with that  though  he starts to feel that maybe living in this world together with Naina wouldn't be so bad... but is that possible?
A love story between a young cat and a protective dog.

Yuto follows Mikoto  a childhood friend and high school girl who is one year older  to enter the same high school. When she goes home with Mikoto for the first time in a year  it turns out that Mikoto only sees Yuto as her younger brother. Yuto is a little dizzy about the difficult road ahead  but an alien "onee-san" in a very erotic outfit appears in front of the two...!? "One Shota" space opera opens here!!

Kaoru Matsubara  a common girl  and Reiko Higaki  a girl from a zaibatsu family  are two girls who attend the prestigious Aisei Girls College. They are complete opposites in their upbringing and personalities  and can hardly stand each other. However  when their parents remarry  they become sisters! The two clash and quarrel  but gradually come to an understanding  and many complicated feelings begin to emerge as they develop a bond... Riyoko Ikeda delicately depicts the emotional turmoil of adolescent girls as they face the absurdities of the world on a journey that can only be embarked by the two of them alone!  Note: Also contains the one-shot Gomennasai: Ryoko Hagiwara  an elementary school girl  decides to stand up for Yasue Yamada  an impoverished girl in her class. Little did she know the harsh reality awaiting her... A work that frankly depicts class divide and privilege  and how children emulate the practices and discrimination of adults.

Kaoru Shinonome  who had been living as a freelancer  invests her inheritance in property and buys a vast old condominium. Her dream life as a wealthy landlord is about to begin—but there are no living tenants  only spirits  and her new property is a rollercoaster ride of psychic phenomena. Kaoru embraces her new specter-filled life as the owner of Ghost Mansion and starts recruiting for new non-living residents! (Titan Manga) ___ **Additional Links:** - [Official X](https://x.com/wakearimanshon)
The story of a game development company employee and her boss  who happens to be her ex-girlfriend.

After meeting terrible ends in her first two lives  Vivielle Andante didn't have high hopes for her third. Luckily  she's reborn as a wealthy duke's daughter this time. The catch? The kingdom is quite literally crumbling due to the lack of architects. Vivielle may still be a child  but she has lifetimes' worth of training as an architect stored in her brain! If she rolls up her sleeves and gets to work  can she lay a strong foundation for her future and build back up hope in the kingdom?  --- In her third life  she was reborn as the only daughter of a villain that didn’t have blood nor tears. People lived in a house that was on the verge of collapsing  so she designed a building using her previous life’s knowledge. However  her dad caught her and—  "We passed a bill that the building's ownership would be given to the person who organized the building's construction."  She became the owner of a large building.  'Let's just get some slush funds and retire!'  "The lady kept me from getting hungry!"  "I can sleep in a warm  new house thanks to milady!"  "The youth employment rate rose sharply!"  What did I do? Is it such a big deal that everyone had to praise me this much? To make things worse  my father found out about my plan to flee from home…  "What did I do wrong? I'll fix everything  so don't leave."  "T-that's not it…"  "I'll give you anything you want. Oh  right  didn’t the emperor’s son bother you? I can also cut the emperor's neck  what do you think?"  Then  like a bolt from the blue  he thought of starting a war.  'Why do I keep getting more work?'  …C-can I retire safely?  --- **Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84%EA%B8%B0-%EA%B1%B4%EB%AC%BC%EC%A3%BC%EB%8A%94-%EC%9D%B4%EB%A7%8C-%EC%9D%80%ED%87%B4%ED%95%A9%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2904)  [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/58712950)  **Official Translations:** * [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-little-landlady/info) * [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com?contentId=260&platform=AA&adtag=appshare.android.detail%2526%25E5%2585%25B6%25E4%25BB%2596%2526260) * [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A4%A9%E6%89%8D%E5%BB%BA%E7%AF%89%E5%B8%AB%E7%B6%AD%E7%B6%AD%E7%88%BE/310) * [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Bayi-Pemilik-Gedung-Pensiun/116) * [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/102505) * [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%88%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%97/354)

Yoshida is a gloomy second year middle school student whose precious youth has been spent stuck in the corner of his class without being able to make any friends. Shigure is the girl who sits next to him in class and she is as gloomy as he is. One day  she struck up a conversation with Yoshida and declared  "I'm going to become a cheerful person!" ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [Tonari no Young Jump](https://tonarinoyj.jp/episode/3269754496338555558)
Just an every day life of cute girls doing cute things.

While reminiscing about the good old days at a middle school reunion  Kusui is unable to stop thinking about his first love: his middle school boyfriend Chizuwa  a petite classmate with a shy smile. A special guest crashes the party  and this confident man in a suit turns out to be none other than Chizuwa  who’s here to confront Kusui about the end of their relationship.  The debut work of promising author Shinachaso!

After confessing to my beloved Hanazono-san  I was rejected with the reason  'I already have an engagement arranged by my parents.' That person is the wealthy and handsome Ikegai-kun  who also happens to have a good personality. Thinking that I had no chance in a straightforward competition  I  Hachiya  decided to cross-dress as a maid and work at the Ikegai house. My plan is to make Ikegai-kun fall for me and break their engagement... Thus begins a slightly silly  cross-dressing maid's comedy that leads to a chaotic love triangle (?)

title_ja: Saijo no Osewa - Takane no Hana-darakena Meimon-kou de  Gakuin Ichi no Ojou-sama (Seikatsu Nouryoku Kaimu) wo Kagenagara Osewa suru Koto ni Narimashita
description: A poor high school boy  Izuki Tomonari  got caught up in a kidnapping attempt on Hinako Konohana  a young lady from one of Japan's largest conglomerates. On the surface  Hinako appears to be a brilliant and beautiful young woman  but in reality  she is a lazy girl with no life skills. However  due to family reasons  Hinako has to play the role of the "perfect young lady" at school. Wanting to protect her  Izuki took on the job of caring for her. Eventually  Hinako began to spoil Izuki with all her might. "I don't want... Izuki to leave my side right now."

In the Republic of China  famous Shanghainese author Xu Youyi has everything anyone could want– until the day an anonymous letter arrives  revealing the truth behind her perfect life. Betrayed by both her best friend and her husband  she meets Yan Wei  the outwardly cold but inwardly warm owner of a photography studio. They click instantly  both independent yet in harmony with one another. Growing closer in the turbulent dangers that surround them  the two different women soothe the scars within each other's heart. Will they be able to save each other?

Koutarou and Shunpei were classmates  childhood friends and neighbors. They were almost like brothers  Shunpei even stayed in Koutarou's house while his parents worked.      "But we're not family or brothers  and we haven't been kids for a long time."

Tsutomu spends the day driving as if fleeing from something. Exhausted and sick  he stops at a service area where a strange woman offers him water. She asks for a ride  and though he feels a lingering unease  Tsutomu reluctantly agrees…

Yaotome Kai is a sixth grade elementary school student with a new neighbor living in the apartment next door. The slightly weird girl Yaotome Haruru. Eating school lunches  having likes and dislikes  and forgetting things as elementary school students do. Casually hanging out whilst their parents get along  as next-door neighbors do.

title_en: Isekai Drug ~Yakugaku Chishiki de Monster Musume-tachi wo Toriko ni shite Nariagaru~
description: One day  Dr. Shiro  a harmless and kind-hearted doctor of agriculture  is transported to another world along with his students and laboratory. It's a hopeless world where humans are treated as slaves and ruled by monster girls! In this grim world  he'll use his knowledge of pharmacology to subvert and control the cruel monster girls! ___ **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/63813)

tags: Psychological|Long Strip|Romance|Mafia|Office Workers|Sexual Violence|Drama|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair  leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow  she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent  Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However  a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life  asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo  challenging her to reconsider her path forward.  --- Romance  flowers  and dates-- once upon a time  that was the perfect description of Haesu and Mincheol. Now  all Haesu has is the ashes of their marriage and a mountain of debt. But her world shatters completely when Mincheol cheats on her with a young coworker. Hurt and betrayed  Haesu finds herself drawn to Taeha  a young man who seems desperate for her affection… and may be hiding more than he shows.

"I'll have you join me in matrimony..."  Toono Itsuki is a university student who majors in folkore studies. He's currently headed towards his grandparents' hometown as part of his thesis' fieldwork. There  a local warned him to "not get close to the mountain on days when the rain is cold". Despite the warning  Itsuki still went towards it and there he met!?  Here's a BL about a local god and a folklore geek!

*I think I grew up a bit.*  Satsuki spends some quality time with her father for the first time in ages. Through moments with her parents and watching carp streamers flutter during her walk  she begins to understand the world just a little bit more. A new one-shot from Mado Saito!  *Part of the Shonen Jump+ 11th Anniversary Special 11-page 11 oneshot project* [Official Webpage](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2083/) | [View Others](https://mangadex.org/list/51d1bfc8-4f7c-455b-a4ae-26d5fb36dd9d/jump-11th-anniversary-special-11-page-oneshot-project)

Luke is the languid second son of a villainous duke. By some unexpected instance  he comes to know of his own fate and in an attempt to avoid his own fate he works hard at finding a peaceful family to marry into and researching magic. All his hard work is to live a peaceful and slothful life... And yet he gets involved in one pain to deal with after the other!? The road to laziness is a steep one!

title_en: Sekai de Yuuitsu no Tenshokushi: Job Hopper na Ore wa  Isekai de Subete no Job o Kiwameru Koto ni Shita
description: Tsukasa  a company employee who repeatedly changes jobs in search of better conditions  challenges the final interview of a major corporation.  But as soon as he went past the door  he found himself in another world. His past career seems completely irrelevant  leading to a sense of discouragement. But  the "Job Changer" bestowed upon him grants him a unique ability!  With the power to freely switch between jobs like swordsman  mage  spear user  alchemist  appraiser  pharmacist  and more  he begins a leisurely life in this different world. Whether dealing with monsters or making use of abundant knowledge from herbs to items  he adapts effortlessly  engaging in everything from helping people to earning money.   Unstoppable with his versatile skills  the powerful corporate slave leaps into a fantasy of career advancement!

Persona 4 takes place in the same universe as Persona 3 in a rural town named Inaba. There have been mysterious murders occurring whenever there was fog after heavy rain. There were also rumors about a channel on television airing only at midnight called Mayonaka TV  during which it is said that one can see his/her "other half" when staring at the TV screen. After hearing about a recent unsolved murder which occurred during the fog  the characters—the main character  Chie  and Yōsuke—discuss how each of them had attempted to watch the mysterious TV channel and witnessed the murder victim.      The protagonist later realizes that during midnight when the channel is on  his body can phase into his television set as a gateway to enter another world infested with shadows. After discovering this  they all decide to explore. When first completely entering the world  dazed and confused  the main character meets Teddie. Mayonaka TV and the town murders seem to have a connection. The murder victims may be merely victims of Mayonaka TV. Everyone decides that they will together try to solve the mysterious murders by exploring the hidden world of Mayonaka TV. After the closing events of Persona 3 on January 31  2010  Persona 4 starts April 11  2011  Putting the start of Persona 4 fourteen months after the end of Persona 3  this is also evident by the appearance of an older Chihiro  who is now a 3rd year student.

title_en: The Return of the 8th Class Mage
description: As a powerful 8th class mage  Ian Paige took countless innocent lives under the orders of Emperor Ragnar  a close friend and ruler of the Greenriver Empire. Yet despite their closeness  Ragnar views Ian as a threat and subsequently poisons him.   Using time magic  Ian saves himself and returns 30 years to the past. Now a young boy  Ian joins an elite order of mages to hone his abilities once again.   This time  he’ll get revenge on the emperor who betrayed him and reclaim glory as an 8th class mage!  --- **Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/8%ED%81%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%8A%A4-%EB%A7%88%EB%B2%95%EC%82%AC%EC%9D%98-%ED%9A%8C%EA%B7%80/2514)  [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57140255)  **Official Translations:** * [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-return-of-the-8th-class-mage/info) * [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://podoteng.com) * [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/8%E7%B4%9A%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E5%B8%AB%E5%86%8D%E8%87%A8/231) * [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Return-of-the-8th-Class-Magician/559) * [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112773) * [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A_8/299)

Do you know what a shaman is?　It's said that they have the mysterious ability to connect this world with the other world and communicate with gods  spirits  and spirits of the dead. The third generation shaman  Anna  a.k.a. Aluminum Nium Birch  is searching for a super class spirit to win the proxy war of the gods. The story intersects as the beautiful stars gather in Nagano  followed by Aluminum  Death Zero  and Hana.  ___ *Continuing after the events of Shaman King Flowers  the group of "Super Stars" will join together and spin together a new legend…*    **Officially licensed:**   - In Taiwan by [Tongli](https://www.tongli.com.tw/BooksDetail.aspx?Bd=KD1554001) as "通靈童子THE SUPER STAR"   - In Thailand by Siam Inter Comics
Yukari pays a visit to Reimu while Futo decides to attack Myouren Temple.
Christmas of Gensokyo
Satori comes above ground to search for Koishi. She teams up with Remilia and hijinks follows.
