What if I Told You  touhou girls are looking up to tying the knot in Gensokyo.       Kanako is there to help. Not everything goes according to the plan. there is someone who is trying stop it. Are you still going to join the battle royale?

Matsutaka Nanako is a normal university student  who happened to enroll in Abnormal Physiology Seminar. She tries to keep her mental state sound  but other abnormal classmates start to influence her personality…
A Bomber Grape doujinshi in two parts.      Sakuya appears to suffer from fatigue and is resting at Eientei for a week.      Reimu seems to have died of starvation. How is Erin going to revive her?

‘How long have i been laying down at home…?’ Han Jia  who is turning 32 this year (she’s a freelancer who’s still doesn’t have a full-time job/jobless)  suffers because of the pressure given by people around her that keep telling her to get married. Around the same time  Jin Mincheol  her childhood friend who came to Jia’s hometown for holiday  is having the same problem. Then  the two people got married just like that. Now that they have married….. ‘Huh? We match each other more than i thought?’
The events of Symposium of Post-mysticism with a twist.
Futo and Miko are trying to convince Marisa to join Taoism.

title_en: Orcsen Oukokushi ~Yaban na Orc no Kuni wa  Ikanishite Heiwa na Elf no Kuni wo Yakiharau ni Itatta ka~
description: Gone are the days of swordsmanship and chivalry. Now is the age of gunpowder and war. Our story has two players. The first is Orcsen  a unified nation with many demonic races  led by the oft-reviled orcs. And the second is Elfind  the kingdom ruled by the beautiful yet vainglorious elves. Dineru  chieftain of the dark elves  has been forced to flee her homeland from enemies she had once trusted as friends. In the midst of their forced diaspora  she has a fated encounter with the leader of Orcsen  the orc king Gustav...

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Boys' Love|Sexual Violence|Web Comic|Full Color
description: Jun  who lives a perfect life. He was full of confidence that he would take first place this semester as well  but it got taken over by the over motivated Cha Si Won. Even on the day of the farewell party  Jun gets drunk and kisses Si Won. To cover the dark story  he takes a leave of absence and goes to the army. But after 2 years  Jun and Si Won have returned to school together. They seem to have a lot in common  they have the same classes  they continue to meet each other and they also have the same phone model. Jun shudders at the constant feeling of being associated with Si Won. He tries to relax his stress with the Phone Sex  but due to the accidental change of cell phones  Si Won discovers Jun's sexual preference (SM) …

In the mysterious institution of Familie  girls are raised in isolation. Kurumi  a resident child  falls asleep the day before her 10th birthday. When she next awakes  14 years have passed. The curtain opens on this tale of misfortune  following Kurumi's journey in an unfamiliar place  surrounded by friends who have long since grown up  and ridden with missing memories.

Yeon Lokheun is a girl who grows up living as a boy learning martial and spiritual arts. She heads for the palace in order to clear the name of her father  a wanted criminal  where she meets the young Emperor Garyun. He promises to save her father's life in exchange for her lifelong services. After gaining Garyun's trust  she travels the world solving supernatural-like problems that arise in place of the Emperor. But how long can she continue this life without the others finding out that she is actually a woman?  --- Lokheun’s name means "happy morning " but her life takes a tragic turn when her mother is murdered and her father becomes a fugitive after exacting revenge. To save him  Lokheun devotes her life to Garyun  the dashing emperor who’s committed to right the wrongs of his father. Believing Lokheun to be a boy  Garyun is determined to mold her into an unsurpassed martial artist  even if it means sending her to hell. Their strained relationship turns into something more as Lokheun searches for the one thing she’s never had: a life befitting her name.  --- **Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%B0%EB%A1%9D%ED%9D%94/2621)  [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51793959)  **Official Translations:** * [English](https://tapas.io/series/his-majestys-secret-heroine/info) * [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/76054)

The world's largest collection of used bookstores  Kanda-Jinbouchou. There begins the story of the unforgettable days the three Karakida sisters spend surrounded by the scent of used books when they inherit the used bookstore their grandfather left behind. ___ **Additional Links:** - [Official X](https://twitter.com/gj_karakida)

Sanayama Kazura  a girl who just wants to be loved  discovers that the girl she had been spending all of her money on to look her way has betrayed her. In her moment of despair  she is approached by Yoshibe Kinka  who asks if she would like to die with her. Together  they head to the top of a high-rise apartment bulding and jump off it. However...  A story of two women at a crossroads in their lives  facing the feelings they've kept deep inside their hearts.

Every family has its own "secrets"... Shota Minamoto  a junior high school student  lives in an orphanage. One day  he is taken in by a family who lives in a gorgeous Japanese style mansion. Shota is welcomed with open arms  but the family has a secret that must not be revealed to the world.

Nobuyuki Fukumoto's very first work is about a rowdy  alcoholic high schooler who finds love in a childhood friend.  --- - **Winner of the Outstanding New Author Award in the 7th Tetsuya Chiba Awards**

At the risk of his own life  a young man sets foot in the ruins of a devastated old world. His name is Akira  and in order to claw his way out of the hellhole that is his birthplace of Slumtown  the boy became a hunter. In the wastelands he happens upon a strange woman  standing perfectly still  stark naked.    She is beautiful  but it seems that only he can see her. She exists incorporeal  tantalizingly beyond any touch  and she tells him her name is Alpha.   Alpha won’t show even a sliver of her real intentions  but with a wide smile  she brings Akira his first commission as a hunter. Akira takes the task  if only to become a stronger hunter  and having entered a contract  their dramatic lives in the hunting profession was set to begin.      From Stories of the Boy Hunter as recorded by the Eastern Hunters’ association.   Written post-collapse of scientific civilization.

title_en: Dungeon no Aru Sekai de Kashikoku Sukoyaka ni Ikiru Houhou
description: Ten years ago  dungeons suddenly appeared all over the world. Yuma Minashiro fell into a dungeon on his way to a job interview. With no equipment and resigned to his death  Yuma obtained an incredible skill: summoning. It was tough because all the spirits he summoned were beautiful girls  and the only way to become stronger was to flirt with them  but he set up a company  made money  and lived a happy life as a dungeon explorer.

In a world where half of humanity's territory has been taken by demons  Balt  who bears the crest of the hero  is the hope of humanity. Just before his 17th birthday and his heroic powers awaken  Balt learns a certain truth…

Kayan is a villain. His task is to be a whetstone for the male lead  to make him a suitable male lead. However  the male leads he met were all defects. They all lacked motivation. Even when they had him under their feet  they were indifferent. So Kayan changed his strategy. He worked hard to bond with the male lead  and after gaining their trust and affection  he suddenly turned hostile and betrayed them  stabbed him in the back  framed them  etc. Everything that villains do  he did to the male lead. Sure enough  the male lead became monstrously powerful and very qualified to be the male lead. Kayan is very satisfied  and none of the male leads can take revenge against him  and once he completes his villain's task  he can go to the next world. Until... After Kayan completed all his tasks  the system told him: [You must return to every world you completed tasks in  and survive for ten years.] Kayan was silent: [Say that again.] System: [You must return to every world you completed tasks in and survive for ten years]

Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to  but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra  a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for  he eventually agrees to it.  --- **Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)  --- **Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771)   [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)

"This makes it the 562nd time I’ve killed this bastard."  Centuries ago  a monster by the name of Shinyoung cursed Dongyi with immortality. For years  he’s done nothing but wait for the perfect chance to get revenge  but killing an immortal is nearly impossible. Trapped in a twisted  endless cycle  he’s long since given up and settled into a strange form of cohabitation with his greatest enemy. But one day  when Shinyoung pushes him too far  Dongyi actually manages to kill him. Shinyoung  who always comes back laughing  doesn’t return this time.  An uneasy feeling creeps in  and Dongyi sets out to find him  only to discover that Shinyoung  for some reason  has lost all memories of him. "If you forget about me… then what happens to my revenge?!"

A new kind of jidaigeki (period drama) action series  reconstructing the legendary masterpiece of “the strongest”!  The Edo era  on the eve of the Bakumatsu  under the Tenpō era name. Inflation  rice shortages  political corruption  epidemics… In a world where common people suffer  a swordsman who has lost his sight and an Akita dog journey together in pursuit of “justice” and “strength.” Where did they come from  and where are they heading? At the end of their path  will they find light—or darkness?  The young talent Fusai Naba  known for ALIENS AREA and Kyokuto Necromance  reconstructs the immortal classic Zatōichi Monogatari (by Kan Shimosawa)! A completely new Zatōichi is born here!

An unlikely relationship blossoms. Do opposites attract? Or will their differences tear them apart? Follow the story of the goth girl Ophelia and the popular footballer Tyler  as they go through their high school life  sitting next to each other in class!

This woman makes herself at home in my parents' house. She is a senior in the same high school and a friend of my sister's. It seems to take her two hours to get to school each way  so she stays at my house almost every day. Yoda is defenseless and a bit out of the ordinary  and I'm always on the edge of my seat!

Cynthia is a carefree young witch. She lives peacefully with her mentor  Leander  hidden among humans in a small village. Their potion shop is their little corner of paradise  far from the conflicts between humans and sorcerers. However  murders are on the rise within the magical community  and the appearance of a mysterious agent is about to turn their world upside down.
その昔、人類は獣の形とそれ以外に進化を遂げた。牙や爪がある肉食獣、体力や運動能力がある草食獣、そして何も持たない最下層・人間。借金返済のため、獣人の屋敷でメイドとしてこき使われている少女・ブッチ。彼女の人生は「獣化実験」により一変する。牙と爪、“獣”の力で弱肉強食な格差社会に抗え。

SeishunScans: When Sayo saved a handsome young man named Kurogane who had collapsed on the roadside  he quickly became very attached to her. To her surprise  he even asked her to become his mentor! Now  she finds herself caught up in a quirky master-student romcom  with an oblivious young man turning her world upside down.

Olivia  the daughter of a duke  is betrayed by her fiancé  Crown Prince Luke  and is publicly executed. However  the moment Olivia thinks she has lost her life  she wakes up as Hanabi  a high school girl in a different world: Japan. What's more  it seems that Hanabi is being bullied at school...? The story of a duke's daughter's rise to power is about to begin!

The building was taken away by her first love. Yu Hari  the owner of the "Tiffany" building in Cheongdam. Eunho  her first love who came back after 5 years  pushed the transferring registration paper in front of her.   “Ah  the name of this building has changed since yesterday to Cha.Eun.Ho.” Thus  Hari went from being a building owner to a homeless person overnight.   "From now on you’re not my first love  you're my first loser." She hated him so much that she wanted to pour out all the curses in the world and strike him with lightning  but she needed to sort out her bare necessities first. That's how Hari got employed for the first time in her life as a resident helper for Eunho  the "first-loser." Her new job was difficult day in and day out  as she used to spend 99.9% of her life eating and messing around. She was also angry at Eunho  who was openly rude to her  but it was more bearable than she thought. No  sometimes it was fun. And…You know what they say  old habits die hard  she fell back into the habit of having feelings for Eunho...   "The second clause in the contract is that the employee does nothing to seduce their fellow employee." Will Hari be able to regain both the Tiffany building and Eunho?

It has been half a year since Aini Mikkola  the saintess in training who hails from a barony in the countryside  arrived at the Royal Academy. The school is in turmoil.  The boys  the sons of aristocrats  are at the mercy of Aini's innocent  natural cuteness  while the girls are angry at her disregard for the manners of the aristocracy. In the midst of all this  there were three daughters who were dubbed "the villainesses " in reference to a popular story. Seraphina  the crown prince's fiancée and the daughter of an upright marquise. Sandra  the noble daughter of a viscount who made their wealth from commerce. Bernardetta  the brilliant daughter of the current Prime Minister's who is a marquise. When a sense of disquiet begins to grow in the school  these women finally stand up! To correct Aini's mistakes and to follow their own hearts. ___ [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3353hv/)

title_en: Net Game Haijin no Isekai Tenseiki - Kobushiou to Yobareta Saikyou no Kobushi ga Tsukaenai node  1-nichi 8-jikan Konbou wo Furu Koto kara Hajimeta
description: In the VRMMORPG Versus Online  Kazuya was known as the Fist King. But when he defeated the Labyrinth King Pharaoh  he woke up and had somehow been transported back to when he was 12 years old! Moreover  this world is a game world where monsters exist?! However  he can no longer use his once-invincible fists  and his stats are all at beginner level. For now  Ichiyo starts by practicing swinging a wooden staff for eight hours a day...  In a world where heavy weapons reign supreme  he aims to become the strongest by utilizing analog weapons  his fists  and the cheat skills he alone knows from the game world!
Masato Ooizumi just entered high school and he finds himself staying with a relative. Living there is his "big sister cousin" who's being way too close with him!?

"I will become a hero!"  With that dream in her heart  Shirumiruku Eru became an adventurer. But because she had no special skills  she struggled to find companions. That's when she got the chance to join the dungeon investigation led by Yuris  a great sage who specializes in healing. However  rumor has it that all adventurers who accompanied Yuris have had their spirits broken and abandoned their path as adventurers halfway through... You see  Yuris had a bizarre interest in getting excited by the sight of female adventurers being attacked by monsters. ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71785)

Purgator of Perdition follows the journey of Lucas Graham — a man trapped between a sinful past and a present full of danger. He wakes up in Mortalis  a brutal and unfamiliar land plagued by bloodthirsty creatures  madness  curses  and shadowy forces lurking at every turn. With no memory of how he got there  Lucas is forced to confront the ghosts of his past while struggling to survive in a world that seems determined to destroy him...

Upon transfering to a new school Alice meets Uchuu  a gloomy classmate.  He reveals to her that their world is a manga of which he is the protagonist. With this revalation Alice starts occasionally noticing text bubbles appearing accompanied by the feeling of being watched.
A Kouhai wants to tease her senpai  but she has a weak defense.

title_en: Uma Musume - Pretty Derby: Uma Musumeshi
description: In their daily lives  as well as their special moments  Uma Musume enjoy eating "tasty dishes"♪

The fate of an entire nation rests on the shoulders of one girl. World War III has finally broken out.  After fierce battles  Japan has been carved up and placed under foreign rule. Miharu  a prodigy with unrivaled sniper skills  meets Shou  a former marksman who can no longer bring himself to pull the trigger on a human target. Together  they are drawn into fights that will decide the fate of their homeland.

title_en: Botsuraku Yotei Nanode  Kajishokunin wo Mezasu
description: The main character is reborn as a character from a game he played in his previous life. This character falls into ruin along with the villainess  spending the last of their years together. A man named Kururi Helan. No details of this decline is written inside the game  it can´t be understood why this sub-character ended up with the villainess route. However  that is of no importance. Living as a needy farmer along with someone is unpleasant  so the main character seeks a profession. For now  he aims for becoming a blacksmith as he originally had skill in it.

Office worker Joji got married a month ago  and his wife is Karen from Russia. She is beautiful like an angel  and shines with her bright silver hair. However  Karen is a mangaka  so they can't do what a married couple would  due to her busy schedule. When Karen's work settles down  they can finally spend time together after a while. In order to do things a married couple would  Joji decided to take his wife on... a honeymoon!!! The couple who got to know each other through travelling decided to return to their roots and headed for Niijima Village...!! Let's go on a trip together♪

title_en: Shinimodori Koujo wa Kurikaesu Sekai wo Owarasetai
description: "I can't afford to die yet...!" At a royal soirée  Lady Lillianna  a noblewoman  is publicly rejected by the crown prince—and shortly after  she is attacked by an unknown assailant and loses her life... However  when she opens her eyes  she finds herself back on the day before the soirée!  With the help of a mysterious man named Zeke  Lillianna begins to fight to change her fate. As they're drawn into a certain incident and get closer to the truth  both she and Zeke lose their lives once again—only to find themselves back on the day before the soirée!?  To break free from the cycle of repeated deaths  Lilli and Zeke's battle begins now!

title_en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - We Are Roommates (Doujinshi)
description: Bari and Chev are a bit like sisters! I'd be happy if you can enjoy the daily life of the two of them where nothing really happens. Artist socials: [Twitter](https://x.com/Taratine_831) [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/988588) [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=25867)
Girl who is only romantically attracted to snakes falls in love with her teacher.

tags: Thriller|Reincarnation|Sci-Fi|Genderswap|Monsters|Action|Demons|Psychological|Ghosts|Animals|Ninja|Comedy|Survival|Martial Arts|Samurai|Adventure|Office Workers|Post-Apocalyptic|Sexual Violence|Crossdressing|Military|Philosophical|Gore|Drama|School Life|Horror|Fantasy|Delinquents|Monster Girls|Police|Slice of Life|Supernatural|Mystery|Tragedy
description: September 11  197x  In the whole Kanto region a magnitude 8-9 violent earthquake occurred. Scholars called it the great destruction of the Showa Era  but the people called it the earthquake from hell! Volcanoes erupted  buildings crumbled  Tokyo became decimated in a single day. The government  after failing to recover the city  abandons Tokyo and moves the capital. The survivors form a society with no laws. In this harsh lawless world emerges Jack  a 10 foot giant who annihilates anyone and anything in his path. The manga details his journey.      The numbering is from the Complete Edition  with around 20 Chapters per volume.

title_en: Kyou mo E ni Kaita Mochi ga Umai
description: Tougo is a high school student who loves drawing more than anything. One day  he woke up in a deep forest filled with vegetations he had never seen before... While he went on an exploration finding answers in this new world  he found them without putting much effort. When he drew a Mochi using pencil and paper  something unusual happened...?! Not just a log house but legendary beasts too?! With ability to bring anything into being  he creates a paradise for everyone! A young boy who unbeknownst to him is loved by others.

Kozu Ippei  a high school boy with a scary-looking face but mature (motherly) personality  runs into Yayoi  a cute but devious college girl. Misunderstandings lead to more misunderstandings  as they fall in love.  (Source: Ichijin Plus)

title_en: Boku wa Konyaku Haki Nante Shimasen kara ne
description: "Ah… Ahhhhhhhhhhh!"      The one who's become the Crown Prince's fiancée is the Duke's daughter Serea  but during their first meeting  she screamed and collapsed! Had she remembered something from her previous life? Are you an evil villainess? Am I going to break you if I fool around too much? A me that's programmed to be like that  is so horrible. Isn't that right~ An "event" and those "program settings" have no connection to me though. Let's go back to my place and I'll slowly and sweetly make you fall desperately in love with me!      This otome game's villainess is going to follow a harsh path  and will fight to change her fate. ___ **Character Designer:** [Nardack](https://mangadex.org/author/f27853e1-c9b2-442a-a8f8-ca3962078222)

There are times in our youth that are awkward  messy  and unforgettable that stay with us forever. In the heart of adolescence  this is the story of first love.   Mingyu has quietly loved his childhood friend  Jiwoo  for as long as he can remember. Every time she laughs  complains  or casually drifts closer  his feelings deepen slowly but surely. The problem? Jiwoo has always had a thing for a very specific type: big  muscular "beast-like" guys. That's the total opposite of Mingyu. Thankfully  she’s never seriously liked anyone in real life so Mingyu has stayed in his role as the dependable “guy friend ” standing loyally by her side. But one calm autumn day  his peaceful world is shattered. “Joo Mingyu… I think I’m in love.” Out of the blue  Jiwoo falls head over heels for Kang Taemin  the captain of the school volleyball team. Now faced with the terrifying possibility that this might be her first real love  Mingyu realizes: it’s do-or-die. Determined not to lose her  he sets out on a last-ditch mission to become her ideal type… even if it means becoming a swole “muscular man” overnight!

title_en: 10-nenmae ni Time Leap shite Osananajimi no Ojousama wo Tasuketara Iinazuke ni Narimashita
description: Reaching his limit due to daily work  the corporate slave Enami Shuusuke collapses on the station platform one day. In that moment  memories of his childhood friend  Yorumiya Hina  who died in an accident  flash before his eyes.  "I'm sorry  I couldn't save you then."  As Shuusuke falls into a deep sleep bearing regret  he finds himself time-leaping back 10 years!

title_en: The Strongest Earthbound Spirit and the Guy With No Spiritual Sense
description: On the last day before a guy who can't sense any spirits at all moves out from his supposedly haunted house  Kinako-sama  the self-proclaimed strongest earth-bound spirit  will try her best to scare the living hell out of the guy before he leaves for good. ___ **KADOKAWA Version Links:** - [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0BW9BSLZ7) - [ebookjapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/745607/)

title_en: Ore ni Dake Koakuma na Kouhai wa Genjitsu demo Kawaii ga  Yume no Naka de wa Motto Kawaii
description: "I know we both have feelings for each other  so please confess quickly  Senpai!"  Keigo  the strict and disliked student council president  and Chiharu  a junior council member who is the child of famous actors and is well-behaved and popular  are both unaware that the other has feelings for them  making it hard for them to get closer. One day  they buy matching amulets at a matchmaking shrine  and that night  they meet in a dream. Since it's just a dream  they reveal their true feelings and passionately confess to each other.  "Don't act flirtatiously with someone like me  who's an outcast!" "But I like you! Everything I do is for the sake of being united with you  Senpai!"  However  is Keigo the only one who remembers the events of the dream—? In reality  she's a cunning little devil  but in the dream  her feelings are fully exposed  leading to a reversal of roles?!
Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san)  a self-important  clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady  climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!

title_en: Makenshi no Maken Niyoru Maken no Tame no Harem Life
description: Fujinomiya Soujirou is transported to a fantasy world with only his Daisho (pair of samurai swords) in hand. The katana can talk and swiftly informs him that it is Hotarumaru  the legendary national treasure of Japan thought lost during World War II. The wakizashi is too young to have a voice  so Souji names it Sakura. This is the story of Souji and Hotarumaru's journey through a new world as he seeks to achieve... a sword harem?

Do-yeon and Eun-ha  who became a family due to their parents' remarriage  become strangers again due to their parents' divorce. The two met again after many years. Eun-ha is obsessed with Do-yeon  and Do-yeon is burdened by his younger brother... What's even worse is that his feelings for Eunha are not 'brotherly love'.

title_ja: Chotto Dake Ai ga Omoi Dark Elf ga Isekai kara Oikakete Kita
description: Hinata is a high school student who reincarnated into a different world and became a hero by the power of God. He defeated the Demon King with the help of the dark elf Mariabelle and other friends. Thus he safely fulfilled the wishes of God and returned to this world. One month after Hinata returned to this world  for some reason Mariabelle also came here from the other world!! The reason she came here is to be with her beloved Hinata!! ~~~ With heavy love and a teaspoon of jealousy  she attacked Hinata every time he refused!! (in many ways). Will Hinata  who has decided to live with the Yandere Mariabelle  be able to live safely (?)!!

Ebisawa  who plays guitar and sings in a band  was inspired by Shake's guitar playing and singing in "The Salmons." Determined not to lose  he pushed himself harder. Though his efforts paid off and Ebisawa gained popularity  the seemingly unbridgeable gap between himself and Shake eventually broke his spirit...

Kafka hopes to one day keep his pact with his childhood friend Mina to join the Japan Defense Force and fight by her side. But while she’s out neutralizing kaiju as Third Division captain  Kafka is stuck cleaning up the aftermath of her battles. When a sudden rule change makes Kafka eligible for the Defense Force  he decides to try out for the squad once more. There's just one problem. He's made the Defense Force's neutralization list under the code name Kaiju No. 8. ___ **Links:** - Alternative Official English - [Viz](https://www.viz.com/kaiju-no-8)

title_en: Banished to the Frontier for My Useless Earth Magic—Now I'm Developing My Territory Aggressively!
description: Ecto  the third son of the Count Glenreed family  received the skill "Earth Magic" during his coming-of-age ceremony. Earth magic  which is not suitable for combat  is also called the "failure attribute". He was disowned and appointed as the lord of the ultra-remote Boda Village. However  thanks to "a certain secret"  Ecto devised a way to use earth magic that ordinary people would not have thought of! Together with his bodyguard female adventurer party "Advancing Wings" and his companions  they defeat magical beasts  clear up forests  cultivate fields...  Thanks to earth magic  Boda Village undergoes remarkable development!?

In Arboral Year 1294  the world is dominated by nine massive towers known as the Spires  remnants of an ancient civilization. Filled with lost secrets and powerful knowledge  nations struggle to possess them. Luca is a bugler in a mercenary company who wants nothing more than to leave the battlefield behind and become a true musician  a maestro. But marked as one of the enigmatic Branch-hexed  and gifted with the strange ability to see the sound of his instrument  Luca finds himself drawn reluctantly into a war of epic proportions!  Left for dead after a battle  Luca is saved by the mysterious Pontiff and learns he is not the only person with unusual powers. The Pontiff has formed a special team of Branch-hexed individuals he plans to use to help him defeat rival empires  and Luca learns that his powers  rather than being an escape from the battlefield  now force him to be a muse of massacre.

From cotton candy scans:      Yukito is a handsome scholarship student who also excels at sports. Just starting high school  he has never had the time to think about things like love.      One day  he was saved by a girl he didn't know. Turns out  she's actually Yukito’s classmate who’s been absent since the school’s opening ceremony…

Homeless and haunted by ghosts  high schooler Kogarashi thinks his luck has finally turned when he finds Yuragi-sou–a cheap boarding house that was formerly a hot springs inn  now full of super sexy  scantily clad female tenants. If Kogarashi can use his spirit abilities to banish the ghost that haunts the inn  he can even live there rent-free! But when the ghost  a beautiful teenage girl named Yuuna  appears before him  Kogarashi takes pity on her and is suddenly not so sure about the exorcism. Will he help save Yuuna from becoming an evil spirit? And what supernatural secrets do the other boarders hold?

title_en: Isekai Yurutto Survival Seikatsu ~Gakkou no Minna to Isekai no Mujintou ni Tenishitakedo Ore Dake Rakushou desu~
description: I'm Shinomiya Hokage  a 3rd-year high-school boy who dreams of a survival life. One day  everyone in my school transferred to a mysterious island in a parallel world. I woke up in an unknown cave and I started moving on my own. Then  I met up with some of my classmates. My knowledge and tools in survival shines through. I was a plain guy in school but I’m the leader in this world.

Kim Yong  a Zainichi Korean boy from Osaka  accidentally gets caught up in a fight with the nephew of a yakuza.   Kim Yong is given the mission of infiltrating a Korean village and stealing an ID card by order of the yakuza. The villagers  who seemed ordinary  seem to be up to something...   At first  he only thought of completing the mission and receiving money  but Kim Yong gradually becomes one with the villagers and joins the village's goal of establishing a homeland in Osaka.

title_en: Watashi ga Shinde Manzoku desu ka? - Utomareta Reijou no Shi to  Nokosareta Hitobito no Hametsu ni Tsuite
description: Countess Rorona Ryus died in an accident. The news came the day after her fiancé  Bellveut  called off their engagement. Rorona was accused of mistreating her sister  a crime she had no right to be accused of  but she accepted the blame without hesitation. She was found dead in an overturned carriage on a suburban street  her face smashed in. When Rorona's sister learned of her death  she was delighted. "Bellveut is now mine " she said. Bellveut laughed  "I wish she had died sooner." But they did not know that Rorona's death would bring them more than just good fortune...

title_en: I Want to Be the Director's Husband
tags: Long Strip|Romance|Office Workers|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Kang A-jin  the CEO of Korea's No. 1 security company  and Joo-hyun  a super rookie in the actor community  will start a heartbreaking marriage! There is only one taboo: never fall in love.

title_en: Tensei Shitara Sainou ga Atta Ken ~Isekai Itte mo Doryoku Suru~
description: In a twist of fate  a diligent ronin student finds himself transported to an unfamiliar realm. This unexpected journey began when he valiantly attempted to stop a robbery alongside a female store clerk. Longing for a unique ability that he could hone through hard work  he sought the blessings of a deity. Consequently  he was endowed with two rare talents: "Innate Talent " allowing him to consistently surpass others  and "Clairvoyance " which grants him the insight to assess both individuals and objects. Yet  there's a catch; he requires thrice the standard experience to ascend in levels.  Reborn as Mars  the second son of a noble viscount lineage  he remains committed to refining his abilities. However  the town's periphery shows alarming indications of an imminent monster incursion. Thus  Mars' extraordinary journey of reincarnation in this fantastical world commences.

tags: Ghosts|Romance|Comedy|Anthology|Magical Girls|Office Workers|Crossdressing|Girls' Love|School Life|Slice of Life|Supernatural
description: An anthology with five oneshots. To explain the title: each story contains  "replacement"  in other word "change" - change of genre of manga  change of decision etc  and one hell of consequences that the said change brings with it.

title_en: Starting From Today I'll Work as a City Lord
description: When a gaming otaku gains the power to cross over to other worlds  he will obviously have to figure out what to do with it! But what is this?! A domineering cat-woman elder sister  a loli fox-woman  a cuddly rabbit-woman younger sister… This isn't a zoo! Welcome to a world where the strong prey on the weak. Then again  it's all so wonderful! An authentic strategy game  a huge conspiracy crisis  this other world's hegemony is now loading  all waiting for thou scum…     ---

Calypso has experienced repeated reincarnation  and this is her 4th reincarnation.   In her previous lives  she always died before she reached the age of 22 and returned to where everything started. During her 3rd life  she discovered that when a dragon goes on a rampage  it distorts dimensions.   Determined to use this knowledge  she plans to exploit the dragon’s power to return to her original world. Currently  Calypso finds herself in a childcare story  where she encounters a man who she believes to be her father but the latter doesn’t recognize her.   Seeking his help  Calypso involves her "father" and family in her quest  turning them into unwitting allies in her journey.  --- At age 3  Calypso Aquasiadel is the most outstanding genius her family's ever seen  and no wonder... She's actually a modern girl who's been reborn into the same novel thrice! This time around  Calypso's determined to harness the powers of the mysterious dragon duke and send herself back home. The only problem is  she'll first need to earn the respect of her hardened family to survive until then! Can Calypso win their approval and even their hearts? Or is this life doomed for another do-over?

Kyo Aizawa is very excited about getting to attend Seisyu Academy  which is famous for its adorable girls' uniforms. Her spirits are crushed  however  when she opens the package containing her school uniform to find a boy's uniform.      Her father explains to her that  as Seisyu Academy is also famous for its boys' basketball program  he enrolled her as a boy so she can fulfill his own dream of becoming an NBA basketball star. To make matters worse  she has to stay in the boys' dorms  and her roommate is the same boy she came to hate at tryouts. (Source: Tokyopop)

The valuable treasure  the "Encore" which was left by the legendary Elline the Brave Hero  has the recording of the end of the world and the reincarnation of the world. The countries and brigades (parties) all over the world are searching for its whereabouts; the age to fight for the Encore. The boy called Ren who wants to become a knight has no talent in wielding swords despite looking exactly like the Elline the Brave Hero  he has been having a lifestyle where people taunts him as the "Fake Brave Hero".  The one that appears in front of him is the legendary Dragon Princess Krische  who had woken up from her seal. She mistakes Ren for Elline  though she gets disappointed since he simply looks like him  but she later finds out a hidden potential in him. And she invites him to the journey to find the Encore together with the Archangel Phia and the Demon-Lord Elise that saved the world before. "Do you want to come with us?" This is the prelude of wild excitement played by the heroes.

title_en: Doutei Otaku to no Sex ga Ii Hazu ga Nai
description: Makoto Mitsuya  an economics student living in a dorm.  After his roommate was hospitalized  he indulged in his otaku hobbies to the fullest while living alone. However  his new roommate  Ken Hayami  turned out to be the complete opposite—a flashy  party animal with a totally different personality and appearance!  Frustrated by their clashing personalities and Hayami’s annoying behavior  Mitsuya initially held a grudge  but slowly begins to open up thanks to Hayami’s attempts to get closer.  One night while drinking together  Hayami teases Mitsuya for being an inexperienced virgin. Annoyed by the teasing  Mitsuya impulsively pushes him down. But when Hayami reacts with obvious pleasure  Mitsuya gets carried away—and the two end up having sex…!?!?

Look forwards to the ghost story of the red person. "Hey  Asuka… search for my body". At school in the middle of the night  Asuka and her friends search for the scattered body-parts. If they don't find the entire body  the 9th November is repeated and the red person will continue to kill them. Who is the red person? Why is Haruka asking them to search for the body-parts?

"Living isn't fun anymore."  So I decided to die. But before I could leave  in the last moments of my life...  "Should we make life fun for you?"  The Vina people appeared in front of me. They asked me to live. They told me if I died  they'll die as well. Do they want to live for eternity?  "We'll make you happy. So  don't die yet."  "If you pledge to be one of us  you can have all the money you'll ever need for the rest of your life."  "Love  just talk to us. What do you need?"  "You can tell us everything you desire."  --- Alcheris Voygianna has had enough. Enraged  purposeless  and no longer wanting to go on after years of torment  she runs away with her stepmother's ring. But when she crushes the ring and falls asleep after failing to end her own life  she dreams of five demigods  who greet her in person a week later after she awakes! Their one request to her is this: live on so that they may live forever. In return  they promise to make her life worth living  but can they uphold that promise?  ---  **Links:** - [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%88%EB%A5%B8-%EA%B0%80%EC%A7%80%EC%9D%98-%EB%9D%BC%EA%B0%80/2747) - [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/93102)

Philomel—the fake princess—conspires with her mother to impersonate the imperial princess and cause a war between the Mage Tower and the Empire. Once her crimes were exposed  she was sentenced to execution. A death truly befitting of a wicked—  “Even if the Philomel within the book had done some wrong  it wasn’t enough to warrant death!”  Philomel yelled and threw the book she'd been reading. She had simply been curious about a book she'd picked up in the garden  but the contents of the book stated that she would die! Although she wanted to believe it was nothing but fiction  everything that happened from that moment onwards went just like in the book.  “Since it has come to this… my goal is to survive!”  Will Philomel be able to discover the origins of the suspicious book and live on?  --- After finding a mysterious book in the imperial garden  Princess Philomel not only discovers that the book's villain shares her name  but that other events in the story are coming true too. Now  she believes that she's an imposter and that the real princess will take her rightful place  leading to the execution of Philomel the Fake! So to avoid a tragic death  she has to make sure the rest of the book doesn't come true. Can this fake princess change what's already been written?

The story focuses on the 16-year-old protagonist  Akira Kurusu  who got transferred to Shujin High School in Tokyo after he was sued by a man with political connection for a non-existent violence when Akira saved a woman from being molested by the man  leading to his probation. Arriving in Tokyo  he finds a mysterious app got installed into his phone that enables him to enter another world formed from corrupt hearts of adults where he awakens his power called Persona. During his times there  he is joined by two fellow students Ryuuji Sakamoto and Ann Takamaki  and a shape-shifting cat-like creature known as Morgana. Feeling suppressed by their environment  the four form a group known as the "Phantom Thieves of Heart" to steal corrupt hearts of adults and reform society.
Hana is a child who is only known by the public as a genetically modified mouse. This is the story of what happens after Hana escapes from the lab.
The series follows the adventures of Ryne and the BareBones Brigade.

'A matchmaker that helps marry off those who can't get married'  namely Hakujo Entaro is busy supporting women in their spouse hunting endeavour today yet again. However  he soon discovers that all the members that have gathered around him are a 'disappointment' in that very field…? A never-before-seen youthful romantic comedy in a marriage agency ensues  alongside these women who have trouble getting married!! ___ **Character Designer:** [Yoshida Bana](https://mangadex.org/author/56906172-8bf4-4e55-9f12-9e93283072e1)  **Additional Links:**   - [Official Raw LN ](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/volume/48987)

Higuchi Kotarou is a slightly cool sixth grader preparing for junior high school entrance exams. His mother died in an accident when he was young  and now he lives an ordinary but peaceful life with his busy father. One day  a mysterious girl named Misha moves into the room next door to Kotarou's house. When Misha finds out that Kotarou does not have a mother  she declares that she will be Kotarou's mother and wants to take care of him in any way she can. In fact  Misha is actually a half-human angel who came to the human world to stand on her own...

title_en: Tenkuu no Isekai Bistro-Ten ~Kanban Musume Sorano ga Oishii Shiawase Todokemasu~
description: Rebuild a rundown restaurant in another world!?  Sorano  a high school girl  is transported to another world where flying sailing ships come and go. In order to repay the kindness of the beast couple who helped her  she uses her natural vitality to try to improve the business!

title_en: Koi wo Suru ni wa Toumei Sugiru
description: Kazuya  the manager of a hair salon  is a gay man who enjoys impersonal flings with no strings attached. One day  his childhood friend pressures him into taking on an assistant beautician – although he rejects the troublesome idea of having men in the workplace  he relents when he hears that the assistant in question is "Miki-chan"… but he turns out to be a man with drop-dead gorgeous looks –?!

Araki is a serious and proper type gay guy. Honest  older men are his type. Even then  the guy who moved in next door is Araki's most hated type  a flashy guy called Higata. That Higata told Araki  "I feel good when I'm with you " and suddenly kissed him. Although he doesn't like him  Araki gets excited--!

"If you encounter a ghost  think of something naughty."  Megumi Sano (33 years old) is a housewife trying to conceive. She also has a fairly strong spiritual sensitivity. One night  during sex with her husband  a ghost suddenly appears in their bedroom. However  the humiliation of being seen having boring sex outweighs the fear... From that day on  the ghost frequently appears in their bedroom  but what is his purpose...?

title_en: Doutei Yuusha no Harem Maou Toubatsuki
description: For the Subjugation of the Demon Lord  the hero Alvin was invited by the king. The first to join his party was the elven priestess  Rishel. As soon as they met  she invited him to the inn before the other companions joined... It seems there's another purpose besides defeating the Demon Lord!? To the somewhat shy and virgin hero... the priestess (elven girl)  the warrior (beast girl)  and the assassin (tan-skinned girl) are all coming on to him with their charms ♥

Follow the story of Charlene  the Fire Mage  in this High Fantasy world full of magic and myths. Learning the same steps from her mother  a great adventurer who died in the hands of an unknown individual  Charlene embarks on an odyssey to achieve her goals of greatness and vengeance.

"The Apothecary Diaries" author Natsu Hyuuga's new frontier!  --- A Cannibalism Comedy with Supernaturals × an Immortal Girl × Death Flags  "Hey... What kind of meat is this?" Set in modern-day Japan — though it’s a world where supernatural beings like werewolves and vampires live quite normally. A sixth-grade girl named Yukiko  who is preparing for her junior high entrance exams  suddenly gets a new transfer student in her class. The boy  who introduces himself as Fushio Yamada  is actually the son of the Immortal King. One day  Yukiko is attacked by a man-eating monster while trying to save a classmate  but is rescued by Fushio.However  as the price for saving her life  Yukiko ends up no longer human  but an immortal being herself.  This is the story of an immortal girl and the son of the Immortal King as they face all kinds of death flags together.
Stories of a city's inhabitants guarded by a magical girl  as well as her own stories and questions she answers.

A dramatic story set in the past of Gensokyo  before the creation of the spell card rules  following around a young Reimu. Unofficial and non-canon. Published in the web edition of Strange Creators of Outer World.

More than ten years ago  the "aberrant beings" suddenly appeared all over the world. With forms similar to creatures from various legends and mythologies  these "aberrant beings" led countries to gather their best specialists to confront them... People called them "exorcists."  A young man named Tojuro  who works as an exorcist due to his family's circumstances  dreams of living an ordinary life. However  during one of his missions  he encounters Behemoth  a legendary sacred beast mentioned in ancient legends. But  despite being an "aberrant being " Behemoth does not have the appearance of a monstrous beast; instead  she takes the form of a beautiful woman.

Ha Do-wan is a bullied gamer  whose bullies force him to grind to obtain in-game items for them.   After one such bully demands that Dowan obtain an impossibly rare item for him or be beaten in front of the prettiest girl in school  Dowan games day and night for a week until he drops dead from exhaustion.   However  as soon as he dies  he respawns back in his classroom one week before his death. Everything is the same as it was before  except now he has all the skills he’s acquired from the games he’s played in real life!   Will Dowan be able to use his newfound abilities and gamified existence to defeat his bullies?

title_en: Tensei Youjo.: Shinjuu to Ouji to  Saikyou no Oji-san Youhei-dan no Naka de Ikiru.
description: Upon awakening  a little girl named Lizey finds herself standing alone in an unfamiliar meadow. In front stands a massive dog. Such a creature had never been seen near home before. At that moment  a conclusion forms that this must be what is called reincarnation into another world. Soon  a band of muscular mercenaries appears  seemingly on a mission to subdue the giant dog. However  it turns out this dog is no ordinary beast  but a divine beast. The divine beast  Ranag  becomes deeply attached to Lezay  the only one it can communicate with. In response  leader Alragia offers to take both Lezay and Ranag under the protection of the mercenary troop...? A little girl  a divine dog  and a mercenary squad. This is a bizarre off-world fantasy with some strange members!(Source: Alpha Manga)

Vlad  Luke  and Tauryu work in Café Forbidden  a mysterious coffee shop that only opens at night.       The three men look pretty normal  but they hide a secret they cannot share with anyone: every evening  they rush around London to uncover the mysterious incidents that take place in the city.

title_en: Seichou Cheat de Nandemo Dekiru you ni Natta ga  Mushoku dake wa Yamerarenai you desu
description: I  Ichinosuke  failed to get a job 100 times in a row. In fact  my lifelong unemployment streak remains unbroken. On my way to yet another job interview  I was involved in an accident with a truck and tragically passed away. Suddenly  a goddess bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal... and another goddess  making a mistake  bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal  before sending me to a game-like other world.  Wait  20 times 20... 400 times faster than normal?!  However  knowing that I would not become stronger even if I continued growing while being jobless  I aimed to get a job... but I discovered that remaining Jobless was a cheat in and of itself  provided you can stomach the slow leveling process... Which I do at 400 times faster than normal. As my Growth Cheat and Jobless Cheat existed side-by-side in this other world  the story of my adventure  no doubt certified by the job-placement agency as harmful material  begins here.
A feud? A dating rumor? What's the drama between the hottest member of DOT  Yoon-chan  and the leader of the group  Kang Sol?

Takuro Sakamoto is a 30-year-old loser still living with his parents. Fed up with his dead-end job and his life in general he’s persuaded by a friend to try out virtual reality games. But even his virtual partner Tsukiko or simply “Moon” turns out to be more trouble than expected.

Toyama Kanesada is constantly pushed around at his work in a dead-end job. But then  one day  he wakes up to find a beautiful elf from another world beside him? Moreover  she declares that Kanesada is now in charge of taking care of her and in addition  so as to live discreetly in this world  she decides that the simplest solution is to be his girlfriend! A love comedy with a cute elf!

His family name is Suke and his given name is Banji  but he's known as Sukeban. Any town the Suke house settles in just can't contain the violent nature of this family  forcing them to move time and time again. Because of his name  Banji ends up transferring to Amazon School as a female student! However  this situation coupled with Sukeban's rebellious nature undoubtedly will result in mayhem littered with maddening jokes and lewdity.  The manga has been adapted into two live-action films and an OVA.

You know the drill by now - Naoe is a massage therapist whose life is turned upside down when he starts dealing with girls from another world and their weight issues. But this isn’t called Shin Elf-san for nothing. You’re going to get fully-colored pages due to its digital release  as well as new scenarios involving your favorite chubby elf.   Get ready to get down with the thiccness!

In the near future  human rights aren’t guaranteed  but they are for sale. Without your rights  you’re nothing—a mujina. There are no laws to protect the rightless. But if the laws don’t apply to you  you can do anything you want. You just need the skills to back it up. And if you’re really good  you can become an elite assassin! (VIZ)

Cats usually walk on two legs! Super orthodox cats  Kohana understands human language by walking on two legs  and loves small cats and cookies. It looks like you're wearing a sailor suit  but it's probably like hair. My head is a little big  so it's unbalanced  and I'm hungry  but it's basically a good cat. The owner Achan and the strange residents of Boro Apartment Nebula-so are just a little dramatic  and the days are quite small.

3 years after the war. The war volunteers still haven't gotten their normal lives back. Known as the "Assassin of Adenzi"  Ef  the girl who was feared on the battlefield  had been spending her days with nowhere to go. A certain missionary reaches out to her. The look in her eyes is suspicious  and warm. "I will make you happy. I promise..."
Ray and Trice grew up together in this post apocalyptic world. She was his only friend. But then one day... An unwelcomed guest arrives and says "Glory to Humans".

title_en: Dachou Juujin no Hachamecha Musou Ahokawaii Saikyou Shuzoku no Leader ni Narimashita
description: Cute but dumb as hell… and somehow still the strongest! ...Reincarnated as an ostrich beastkin with innate physical ability?!  With intelligence from my previous life  I lead a flock through a monster-filled hellscape just to stay alive… One day  after saving a party of human adventurers from certain doom  I finally made contact with the civilized world I had dreamed of!!! Unlike the uncommunicative ostrich-kin I'm used to  I'm overjoyed to meet people I can actually talk to… However....!  Strong  silly  and completely out of control... Watch out  the ostrich beastkin is on a rampage!

Tsubamegaoka Private Academy - All Girls' High School  located just inside the city and has clubs a plenty. From the common ones to some freakishly impressive ones  it varies greatly. It's always okay to make one  no matter what kind of club. It's not uncommon to see students join this school for the sole purpose of making a new club. But what happens when five girls want to make a club and only one new club is allowed?

Kuroda catches his boyfriend cheating and gets dumped on the spot  only to discover another man  Shirato  was also dumped. Out of pity  Kuroda takes the crying Shirato home  and their shared loneliness leads to a one-night stand. But what should have been a one-time mistake turns into something deeper  as Kuroda finds a strange comfort in being embraced by Shirato. But how can he confess his growing feelings now?

title_en: Sayonara  Watashitachi ni Yasashikunakatta  Subete no Hitobito
description: The girl dedicated her life to taking revenge on the seven people who killed her sister.  Akada Town  a rural area surrounded by mountains on all sides. Shiori Nakagawa  a high school student in this town  had stopped attending school due to bullying. One day  Mei Satou comes to live with Shiori as a cohabitant. Mei  who doesn’t open her heart to anyone  reveals her purpose for coming to this town only to Shiori.  “I want to kill the seven people who drove my sister to her death.”  Three years ago  Mei’s sister  Akari  was subjected to horrific bullying in this town and took her own life. Mei has returned to exact revenge. She plans to perform the blood-soaked ritual ‘Okakashitsutsumi ’ handed down at Akada Shrine  to embody the giant serpent god ‘Okakashisama’ and kill the seven people involved.  On the night of the summer solstice  Mei successfully performs the ritual. From that point on  with the power of the god and together with Shiori  Mei begins to kill those involved in her sister’s death  one by one each day. Amid their days of vengeance and escape  the two eventually develop romantic feelings for each other. However  Mei keeps one secret from Shiori: anyone who performs the ‘Okakashitsutsumi’ must ultimately offer their soul to the god  meaning Mei’s own death is inevitable.

A collection of sometimes tender and sometimes sad short stories depicting different forms of love.  1. Chishiryou no Koufuku (致死量の幸福) As long as you’re alive  I will always suffer. My older childhood friend is a hopeless jerk  and on top of that  he wants to die. He attempted many times  over and over again. I want to leave him. I know I can’t be happy if I stay with him… Why can’t I leave him? 2. Kurokami no Omoide (黒髪の思い出) 3. Me ni ha Me wo (目には目を) 4. Chalk no Ie (チョークの家) 5. Dekisokonai Robot (できそこないロボット) 6. Share Happy ! (シェア・ハピ !)

title_en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon - Elma OL Nikki
description: Some people live to work  others work to live. But Elma works to... eat! Elma is a Harmony Dragon who came to the human world to bring fellow dragon Tohru back home. In order to stay close to Tohru  Elma has taken a job as an office lady (OL). This charming new series from the world of Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid follows the 9-to-5 adventures of Elma as she learns to work and eat her way through the OL life. From mixed-up mixers to death marches  Elma learns that being an OL is just as hard as being a dragon...

Shirahama Kenichi is a book lover who has just entered high school  but he is often bullied by others. One day  he became good friends with the new transfer student  Fuurinji Miu  who was also looking for a friend. Kenichi was shocked at how powerful she is at first  but he is still somehow attracted to her…so he later goes to the dojo of her family and starts a training that will change his life.

If Yokodera were an equation  he'd be 'peeping at girls' plus 'does not care what others say ' therefore 'he peeps vigorously  intensely  diligently  and frequently.'   Yokodera mops so that he can see the reflection of panties in the floor. He weeds so that he can see up skirts. He rides fast so that each girl he passes has her skirt flipped. He does these sorts of things every day.   To everyone else though  he's a nice and diligent guy who's greatly appreciated. Lucky? Far from it  at least in his eyes. Yokodera doesn't like being misinterpreted  but he is also a coward. He wishes others would stop seeing his actions as good  but he just can't do anything about it.   Then his friend told him about a cat statue  which might remove this unwanted trait…      Note: This manga is adapted from a light novel of the same name and illustrated by Kantoku.      Project H: Only has released 3 volumes in English Print

*Our bond was supposed to last forever...*  Was it creative differences  personal conflicts  or money troubles? What made three close friends suddenly break up? A new one-shot by Kokoro Onodera!  *Part of the Shonen Jump+ 11th Anniversary Special 11-page 11 oneshot project* [Official Webpage](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2083/) | [View Others](https://mangadex.org/list/51d1bfc8-4f7c-455b-a4ae-26d5fb36dd9d/jump-11th-anniversary-special-11-page-oneshot-project)

tags: Award Winning|Long Strip|Sports|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: A young protagonist who  feeling disconnected from his surroundings  leaps from a high bridge and experiences a transformative journey into an alternate reality. This act serves as a metaphorical gateway  prompting him to question the nature of his existence and the world around him. Throughout the series  the protagonist confronts various challenges that interplay between reality and illusion  compelling him to make choices that define his identity and destiny. The narrative explores themes of self-discovery  the courage to pursue one's convictions despite societal pressures  and the quest for authenticity in a world rife with facades.
A boy has a normal day at school but after things go incredibly wrong  he applies to be an exterminator at the Deity Extermination Association where he would change his life forever.

A dragon once existed  in the distant past but is now known as a myth... 14 years ago  Inoue Hikari  the emperor of the Hikari clan and a member of the 10 Emperors  declared war on the other 9 clans holding the world in balance. After the bloodshed  he emerged victorious  and since then has ruled over the world as the supreme emperor. Himura Daichi is an orphan boy who is determined to put an end to the colonial rule of the Hikari clan  and get revenge for the pain and suffering caused by their emperor.

Suzu Yotsuya is a high school girl who loves to eat. While eating by herself in the cafeteria like usual  she is invited to eat with Majima-san  a tall and popular classmate. However  there are some suspicious rumors going around about Majima-san…⁉

title_en: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san
description: "И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."  Alya  the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over  occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she's badmouthing me... but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me  too." to me! Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension  but Alya has no idea about that... and that's why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language! ___ Alternate Official English: [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/alya-sometimes-hides-her-feelings-in-russian-manga)

In 1912  a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi  determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi  the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859  when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon  in his quest to find stronger people to fight  Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami  who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.
On one rainy day  high school girl Komae Shouko learns that her classmate  Katagiri Sui  has a special ability.
Follow the final moments of a shinsengumi first squadron captain  Okita Soji  as the author tells his version of the story.

Spica Virgo is an apprentice witch  but she can't use magic. She needs a tutor to get into the magic academy she's always dreamed of  but she doesn't have the money or the connections... But suddenly  Spica meets a mysterious  talking black cat who can use magic! He agrees to make her his apprentice  but only if she promises to rid him of his curse! But to break it  she has to kiss him on the...!?

title_en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - UmaYome Uma X Tore♂ Kekkon Seikatsu Goudou (Doujinshi)
description: An anthology book series containing many different artists and their favorite Umas enjoying their life after marriage.

title_en: Daily Life of a Couple in Which the Boyfriend Became a Girl One Day
tags: Genderswap|Romance|Girls' Love|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: A couple's daily life as they adjust to the boyfriend turning into a girl.

One hundred years ago  monstrous creatures known as Meijuu (溟獣) suddenly emerged from the ocean  staining the waters black and preventing humanity from advancing into the seas.  In response  humanity turned to submarines and  with only a faint glimmer of hope  began challenging the Meijuu.  Among them is a young man named Ven  who cannot let go of the childhood stories his older brother once told him about the "blue sea." Driven by that longing  he boards the submarine Stier as a Meijuu observer.  What color will ultimately be reflected in Ven’s eyes? A marine battle fantasy begins—one to reclaim the seas!

title_en: VOCALOID - The Daily Life of Master & Hatsune Miku (Doujinshi)
tags: Comedy|Virtual Reality|Video Games|Doujinshi|Web Comic|Slice of Life

title_en: Fuguu na Ossan no Kekkai Jutsu Musou
description: “The barrier mage’s job is done  right? Then  why not join the Kingdom’s Royal Mage Corps?” For the last 30 years  a protective barrier shielded the kingdom from the Demon King’s forces. Initially maintained by a hundred barrier mages  their numbers dwindled until only one  Blake  was left to uphold it. At last  came the day when a hero defeated the Demon King. But  in this peaceful world  barrier mages were now considered “useless”— a bottom-rung job with no real purpose. Blake was at a loss on what to do until he received an unexpected invitation to the capital from said hero. Alice  the Hero who he once saved  encouraged him to join an elite squad reserved for only the best in the kingdom. She insisted that  if he could prove his worth  even those who doubted him would have to yield. “Barrier mages are useless!” “Then  all he needs to do is show his strength  right?” The story unfolds as this underestimated middle-aged man  unaware of his unparalleled skills  wields and strengthens his barrier magic! The tale of a fantasy hero’s rise in another world begins here!

title_en: Reborn as a Demonic Cultivator: Starting with a Zombie Planet
description: Chu Xuan traveled through the Cangxuan world and became a demon cultivator of Wuji Sect. The so-called demon cultivation is to plunder the essence of heaven and earth and seize the essence of all things. After slaughtering thousands of people  he became the Great Demon Lord. However  killing is not tolerated by the heavenly way of the human race. Wuji Sect was also destroyed by the righteous sect. When he was helpless  Chu Xuan accidentally got the blood mirror  which could take him to a doomsday planet full of zombies! He suddenly discovered that this place is simply a paradise for demon cultivators!

Set at beginning of the 100 Years War in 220X  sometime after World War III devastated 90 percent of the global population  "the surviving nations have realigned into northern and southern superpowers."      What remains of mankind have burrowed deep underground to escape the deadly radiation that permeates the surface. In order to continue fighting  the militaries of the world developed special gigantic combat armor  the strongest of which  Mazinger  is piloted by Major Koji Kabuto.      After a great battle  Mazinger gets caught in an enemy explosion that rips a wormhole in space/time that sends him to a world of giants  called Lithgor.

The 72 Demon Kings  who received the order to destroy the earth  each went through a trial by the Great Demon King Astrea. Those who passed the trial earned the title of Demon King  and each Demon King was granted special powers by the Great Demon King.  So far  each Demon King had been granted extraordinary abilities. When Karos became a Demon King  he received a power from the Great Demon King  but…   “Great Demon King  no matter how much I think about it  there is a problem with my power.” “Problem?”  Among the Demon Kings with extraordinary abilities… Karos received the [Gacha] ability.   “Gacha as the power of a Demon King? How am I supposed to rule the world with Gacha?!'”

**When it's your livelihood on the line  you've got to be willing to do anything to get your hands on the treasure!**  It is the twilight of the shogunate in Japan--the Bakumatsu--a time of tumult in which ruffians from all walks of life vie for supremacy. Hanagusuku Muta  a Ryukyuan boy from a disgraced clan of nobles  now lives in poverty  stealing just to survive. But one day  he hears rumors of a massive cache of treasure left by a legendary pirate on a small island in the kingdom  one valuable enough to throw all of Japan into disarray. After getting framed for a crime he didn't commit by a group of Satsuma samurai  Muta gets dragged into the vigorous  bloody struggle for the treasure...!!

title_en: Arcadia Service - Kaishi kara San Nen Imasara Hajimeru Kasou Sekai Kouryaku
description: Despite its ultra-premium price tag of 3 million yen per unit  the full-dive VR game "Arcadia" continues to captivate players. Haru  who spent all three years of high school working part-time jobs  finally gets his hands on an "Arcadia" system where a fateful encounter awaits him in-game...?!

title_en: Nade Nade Skill de Maryoku Chuunyuu!!
description: Caressing the lewd monster girls’ XXX ♥  The deadpan-faced boy  Fushimi Mahiro. Because of his facial expression  he's feared in his school  without a place to belong. One day  he gets transferred to another world by a squid he picked up! The squid then turns into a beautiful girl  calling him "Demon Lord-sama"  and gets attacked by a hero...?! Scouting lewd monster girls & strengthening them to protect the demon castle!!

title_en: Sensou wa Onna no Kao wo Shiteinai
description: Based on *The Unwomanly Face of War* by [Svetlana Alexievich](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Svetlana_Alexievich)  which can be bought [here](https://www.amazon.com/dp/0399588744).  In *The Unwomanly Face of War*  Alexievich chronicles the experiences of the Soviet women who fought on the front lines  on the home front  and in the occupied territories. These women—more than a million in total—were nurses and doctors  pilots  tank drivers  machine-gunners  and snipers. They battled alongside men  and yet  after the victory  their efforts and sacrifices were forgotten. ___ **Supervisor:** [Hayami Rasenjin](https://mangadex.org/author/2bd63053-4100-4118-b7bc-d8e3a1fe4f78)
Two siblings are roaming a post-apocalyptic world destroyed by a zombie epidemic 10 years ago. For some reason these two kids aren't getting attacked by the zombies.   (Source: Manga Mogura RE)

title_en: Bishuu Gyakuten Sekai de Chiryoushi Yattemasu
description: One day  Towa was suddenly transferred to a new world. This world resembles a world from a novel that Towa recently read.   It's been half a year since he came to this world. Towa opened a clinic as a Healer using the ability he received from the Goddess. However  the only ones who come are well-groomed  servile beauties. This is because this was a world where the value of beauty and ugliness were reversed.   He is kind to everyone  no matter how ugly (beautiful in Towa's eyes)  and wins the hearts of the ugly beauties in the world. ___ **Character Designer:** [Mizuno Sao](https://mangadex.org/author/9ce6f19c-6235-4ca0-8e76-46951f114062)

A world where the machine civilization has perished and immortal monsters called "Monotsuki" ("Possessed") are rampant. Isana  a girl born in a remote village  meets an android who lost her memories and looks exactly like her sister  who should have disappeared in the ruins she wandered into. Convinced that her sister is alive  Isana gives the mechanical person the name "Hime" ("Princess") and they set out together on a journey to find her sister.

Akane Nishimura is a shy and gloomy elementary school girl with an unfounded dire reputation in her class due to her appearance. Taiyou Takada is a transfer student in her class who came from a small countryside school  and who is fascinated by the aspects of Nishimura that her classmates use to pick on her  finding her "darkness" cool beyond compare. Through the unbridled and fundamental joy Takada finds in being her friend  Nishimura starts realizing that being herself is not as bad as she thinks.

Sparkling love is not the only kind there is. Keita is a high school student who likes his friend Masato. However  his love could not be more different from the sort of sparkling love often seen in BL… This is a delicate  bittersweet story of adolescence.

title_en: I Become A Villain In My Novel
description: A third-rate writer that is destined to go to hell because of it's bad novel ending  got reincarnated in his own novel instead  reborn as the villainous son-in-law - Li Yu Guo. The battle of wits and courage between him and the original protagonist begins now…     ---

title_en: Yomei Ichinen to Senkokusareta Boku ga  Yomei Hantoshi no Kimi to Deatta Hanashi
description: "It was the happiest day in the world." Our sad and fleeting "love with a deadline" has begun.  In the winter of his freshman year of high school  Akito Hayasaka is diagnosed with a heart disease and told that he has little time left to live. In the midst of despair  Akito meets Sakurai Haruna  who is hospitalized at the hospital. Haruna  too  is seriously ill and has only a few days left to live. Akito begins to talk with her  hiding his illness  and becomes interested in Haruna  who says she is not afraid of dying. Can I still be in love with her? The days that pass by as he asks himself these questions begin to change?

title_en: Slime wa Saikyoutaru Kanousei wo Himete iru
description: In a world where one's entire life is determined by contracts with magical beasts  Zeke  a pauper who formed a contract with the weakest of them all - a Slime - lived a life filled with regret and scorn from those around him. He eventually grew old and met a despairing end... or so he thought  until he found himself regressed to his childhood! Determined to give [Fios] - the only partner he truly connected with in his previous life - a better fate this time  Zeke resolves to turn his life around. Aiming to rise from a slum cleaner to the head of a grand merchant association  he sets his sights on the slime's ability to dissolve anything. What's more  it seems his slime partner also possesses a hidden power...?

Ryou is a third-year high school student who is enjoying his otaku life to the fullest  but one girl is giving him a headache. She's Asahi-chan  a cheeky childhood friend two years younger than him who attends the same high school! Even though Asahi-chan is his junior  she always teases and teases Ryou! And yet  when someone teases her  she is at a loss for words and makes a defeated face. She is also a cute girl who has few friends  is shy  and not very honest. Today  I have to teach this cheeky Asahi-chan a lesson!

Everyone in the world uses smartphone apps. But inside them lurks unknown creatures called "Appli Monsters " or "Appmon." The Appmon are AI lifeforms with the ability to think and act  and exist in the boundary between the human world and digital space to allow people and the system to interface and function. But in the vast sea of the internet  the "last boss AI" Leviathan takes control of the Appmon with a virus and begins hacking every system  thus starting to control the human world from the world of the net.      The protagonist  Haru Shinkai  is led to acquire the Appli Drive  and uses it to materialize Gacchimon  a search app monster. What is the secret hidden within the Appli Drive? What is the mysterious field that exists between net world where the Appmon exist  and the real world? What is the "App Combine" that can combine two Appmons? What is Leviathan's true goal?

title_en: Nise Seiken Monogatari - Osananajimi no Seijo o Uttara Michizure ni Sareta
description: My childhood friend  Magary  was chosen to be the saint. From here on out  she'll have to maintain a smile at all times while at the royal capital and take lessons in etiquette and dance. She'll be living in an excruciatingly stifling world. Having been together since birth  there was naturally one thought in my mind.  While feeling a little bit of loneliness... I pushed my childhood friend (who was trying to escape with all her might with her arms still bound) towards the knight that came to pick her up.  "Alistaaaaaaaaaaaaar!!"    I feel as if there was some deep resentment in her voice  but that's probably just my imagination. As her last act of futile resistance  she had me see her off to the royal capital… but  that ended without any problems.  "Now that that's over with  I'll be heading home. Good luck ^^"  I turned my back towards my childhood friend who looked me with deep resentment in her eyes. While I was making my way home... I had to turn around as I was chased by goblins.  "Noooooooo!! Someone  helpppppppp!!"

Bash  the Orc Warrior  is a Hero. During the war  he crushed and defeated all that stood in his path. He is respected by all Orcs as the Orc among Orcs  however Bash has a secret.  He has no experience with women – he  the Hero  was a virgin. For Orcs  who hold combat and sexual prowess in high regard  being a virgin is tremendously shameful. [The fact that I’m a not only a virgin  but a virgin Orc Hero  is a shame for all of Orcish society. I want a wife too!] With this in mind  he decides to embark on a journey.  In order to protect the pride and honor of his race  but mostly to finally get his d*ck wet  he decides to go to leave on a grand quest to find himself a woman. ___ **Character Designer:** [Asanagi](https://mangadex.org/author/ede1fdec-c265-4076-b60a-d2cfe5aaf694)

title_en: Kuchidome no Gohoubi wa Dansou Otome to Ichaero Desu!
description: Kay Brennan is a hero  no doubt about that. They're the strongest person in their school in terms of combat strength and magical power. Compared to Kay  Dino Turner - the eternal 2nd place - might as well be nothing  and as such Dino has declared Kay to be his archrival. However  Kay has a secret: she's actually a girl crossdressing as a boy. And Dino is the only one who knows her true nature.
An alternate Great Mazinger manga by Outa Gosaku. Not to be confused with the version by Nagai Go.

In the deep  deep forest. a Tamagotake mushroom fairy who has been left alone in the world after her parents were killed is chasing after the culprit  a Tsukiyotake  to take revenge on him. In the Sea of Trees  where life and death intersect  can the young Tamago take revenge on the hated Tsukiyo? An unprecedented mushroom suspense begins.

Watanabe Kei can see the “connections between people”. Because of his ability  he avoids popularity  withdraws into himself  and leads a self-indulgent life…  One day  after being questioned by police officer Zen  Kei finds out he has the ability psycho eyes  is forced into a super important police investigation  and ends up playing a part in solving the case!?  This is the story of a young man who leads a depressing daily life  who meets a mentor who also has the ability to see  and changes his destiny and the world!

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Boys' Love|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: "Young Master Chi  you're not going to help me unconditionally  are you?"  "You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now  all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"  "Yes  I do."  Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first  but eventually  he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.

Dan was "the strongest and bravest" when he was young. But because of his lazy life  he is now a divorced  unemployed old man! He tries to earn money through quests for a living  but age has taken its toll on his strength and all that! He was approached by a silver-haired elf  a handsome man  and an S-rank adventurer... a young man of today’s generation!

*The wife and daughter he left behind...*  The fourth time I met my father's new wife was at his wake...
