An encounter with the "Medicine Witch" will change the destiny of Zero and his friends.  (Source: Dengeki Bunko  translated)

Gokurakugai  a bright and bustling working class district with a hidden dark side. In this area without order  Tao and Alma work as troubleshooters for hire. Their missions involve helping a young boy find his lost friend  a person who disappears without a trace  and disfigured animal corpses. All the while  the evil spirits who live in the shadows bring out a different side to these troubleshooters! ___ **Official English Volumes:** [VIZ](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/gokurakugai)

title_en: Unaware His Majesty Is a Girl
description: The new emperor  Qi Nian  acceded to the throne many years ago. He kept refusing the requests by his officials to choose a consort  brushing them off by saying "the affairs of state are important  and I am busy with my work". But Qi Nian finally relented as rumors that "the emperor is impotent" spread ever more widely.  Yu Dingdang was a particularly dim-witted girl  but born to a prestigious family. This led many to say: "Madame Yu exchanged her brain for her looks". Who could have expected that Yu would be selected by the emperor to be his empress consort?  A happy and dramatic girl-girl romantic comedy set in the imperial palace. Yu couldn't have expected that this lofty emperor up on high was actually a girl?!

Following an unfortunately timed case of the mumps  Hana Ichinose misses all of her high school entrance exams and ends up having to spend a gap year as a ronin. Moving to a new location and starting high school a year late  Hana becomes friends with her classmates  Eiko  Tama  and Kamuri  while keeping it a secret that she is a year older than them.
Izumokami Kanesada & Horikawa Kunihiro
A fan made interpretation of the never made Heaven Chapter of Saint Seiya

The Class Rep and the Student Council President couldn't be more opposite to each other. Unfortunately  they have no choice but to convince their high school that they're in love. When every little thing can end with the two at odds against one another  no one knows how long it will be until they can't keep up the act. Or what might happen if they do.      When does it stop being an act and become. . . something else?

From the author of Gokusen and Koudaike no Hitobito comes the story of Yui Hayakawa: an ordinary  uninspired high school girl who's only good at one thing - running!  But because of her genius younger brother Takeru and his latest experiment  a time machine   she accidentally gets sent back to the Sengoku Era missing her beloved dinner steak!  Will young Yui finally find that 'something' where her entire potential was hiding?  And will she ever be able to eat that delicious steak her mother made for her?

Beautiful People is a manga comprised of six profound and thought-provoking short stories. It includes a tale of a vampire who raises a child as his own  a story of a young man who copes with an alcoholic father amongst other problems with the help of an online friend and four others short stories.

title_en: Negatte mo Nai Tsuihou Go kara no Slow Life? ~Intai Shita Hazu ga Nariyuki de Bishoujo Gal no Shishou ni Nattara Naze ka Mechakucha Natsukareta~
description: Reito Harukaze  who had climbed to the highest rank of adventurers  had retired. One day  as he was thinking of living a quiet  retired life  a beautiful gal named Karen Hiiragi appeared before him.  "Hey  mister  buy me a meal!"  Upon hearing that Karen was in trouble with money  Reito decided to give her a basic lecture on dungeon conquering.  "Thanks to you  I was able to conquer my first dungeon! Master!"  He actually wanted to retire and live a slow life...

title_en: Genkai OL to Joshi Daisei ga 〇〇 Suru Hanashi
description: Segawa-san is the star of the office who everyone depends on. But she's stretched thin  and the state of her apartment has gotten dire. After a fateful encounter  the college student next door offers to lend a helping hand!

title_en: Touhou - Lady Celestial and the Black Cat (Doujinshi)
Munou wa Fuyou to Iware "Tokei Tsukai" no Boku wa Shokunin Guild kara Oidasareru mo  Dungeon no Shinbu de Shin mo Chikara ni Kakusei suru
description: In a world where skills are supreme  Cyclo Owen is given the incompetent skill of "clock-user". One day  Cyclo  who is looked down upon by others  is accused of rape and sent to the frontier  where he is pushed down a hole that leads to a dungeon's deepest level. In the depths of his desperate situation  he thought to himself  "If only I could use my clock-user ability to stop my stomach clock as well. Then the hunger would stop." This triggered the awakening of his skill "clock-user". Eventually  he makes full use of his abilities and is recognized as an SSS-class adventurer--.

title_en: Hunting in Another World with My Elf Wife
description: In modern Hokkaido a brown bear has appeared near an elementary school  so a member of the local hunters' association is dispatched to exterminate it. However he gets killed by the bear and wakes up in a fantasy world  armed with only the Remington M870 shotgun he had when he died. ___ **Character Designer:** [Yuunagi](https://mangadex.org/author/58f536f6-3ede-40cc-8b41-82efb77d1919)  **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/48586)

After diligently practicing "wall ball " Bungo Ishihama meets Yukio Noda  a member of Japan's youth baseball national team in a fateful encounter. The two then advance to middle school and join the ultra-competitive "Seio Senior" team. Aiming for the top of middle school baseball  they engage in fierce battles! As time passes  the duo moves on to high school  setting their sights on achieving "five consecutive Koshien championships " once again striving for the top!
Toru Hitogata  a dollmaker fated to die at 27  throws himself into deadly combat with the cursed Jinkan Doll to fulfill his destiny.

Kazuya Aoshima  who was appointed as a temporary teacher  is told by the vice principal that if he can solve the problem of Erika Shimeno  who is rumored to be bullied at school  he might have a chance for full-time employment. He starts working towards resolving the issue  but her true nature is…!? A psychological horror!

I am a hungry Vampire. I longed to suck the blood of my destined one  which is said to be the finest  but somehow I satisfied my hunger on social media as an internet influencer. But one day  I got a hateful comment--.  Based on the song Vampire by DECO*27

This apartment complex has a problem with perverted women!  Yoshida is a tiny  frail highschool graduate who became an unwilling manager of an apartment complex when his father  the former manager  injured himself. Unbeknownst to him  this apartment complex houses quite a few women with very... unusual sexual preferences. This becomes a problem when a mysterious entity begins giving "Libido Cloth" to these women - skimpy outfits that give them superpowers and cause them to go on lewd rampages! Will Yoshida be able to stop them?

One day  the hero-adoring highschooler Oda Nobunaga  together with his sister stepped into a mysterious other world. There  were all the strongest and famous historical heroes and figures of the Warring Kingdom period. The curtain rises on the battle to decide who the strongest hero is  and who will be the ultimate ruler.
A story of a hardworking Big brother doing different exercises all to achieve his dream.
On the surface  she's a typical victim of bullying... but could something else be at play?

In the whole world there lay twelve paths to climb the Tower of God  and in legends these twelve pathways lead towards the legendary road of immortality. However the paths in the Tower of God  are far too long  without end.   In ancient times there once were many types of martial arts  sadly the world underwent terrible changes  and only three were left: Flame  Dragon and Star Martial Arts. Generations of experts of those three martial arts search for road of immortality. Accompany a Star Martial Arts practitioner on his lifetime journey  with young beauties at his side  and plans to become the Highest God.   ---  **Links:** - [Alternative English (Mangatoon)](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/141/episodes) - [Alternative raw (BiliBili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc25608)

“Maybe Inner Gods can never defeat Outer Gods…” so thought Yuwon Kim  a plucky  high-ranking warrior  after a bitter defeat.  But Yuwon is too tenacious to give up. His loss becomes the dawn of a new journey as a returnee. With renewed determination  Yuwon starts back from where he began  smashing monster after monster and relearning his skills before taking on the Tower once again.  But can he fight his way through the tutorials and level up once more  or will his conquest crumble before him?  ---  - [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xhObyLPUq6w)  - [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%8B%A0%EA%B3%BC-%ED%95%A8%EA%BB%98-%EB%A0%88%EB%B2%A8%EC%97%85/2708)  ---  - [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12982/)  - [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82357)  - [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%9E%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%88%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2/215)

tags: Monsters|Action|Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Martial Arts|Adventure|Virtual Reality|Video Games|Magic|Drama|Fantasy|Web Comic|Cooking|Adaptation|Full Color
description: The man forsaken by the world  the man a slave to money and the man known as the legendary God of War in the highly popular MMORPG Continent of Magic. With the coming of age  he decides to say goodbye  but the feeble attempt to earn a little something for his time and effort ripples into an effect none could ever have imagined. Through a series of coincidences  his legendary avatar is sold for 3 billion 90 million won ($2.7 million)  bringing great joy to him  only to plunge him into despair at losing almost all of it to vicious loan sharks. With revelation of money through gaming  he rises from the abyss with new found resolve and steps forward into the new age of games led by the first ever Virtual Reality MMORPG  Royal Road.      This is the legend of Lee Hyun on his path to becoming Emperor with only his family loving heart  his boundless desire for money  his unexpected mind  his diligently forged body and the talent of hard work backing him. This is the legend of the lowest becoming the strongest. This is the legend of WEED.

title_en: Magan to Dangan wo Tsukatte Isekai wo Buchinuku!
description: Ataru  a young man who lost his life in an unfortunate way  receives three special powers from God and is reincarnated into a different world. A powerful gun of his choice  the ability to create bullets freely  and all-seeing eyes known as "Magic Eyes". Ataru  who is the only gunner in this world  joins the adventurer guild with his companion Caro  a beastwoman  who is rescued from slavery. The story of an up-and-coming gunner hero  who eliminates any enemy with a single blow  begins now.   - [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7346dt/)

The survival action manga is set in the not-so-distant future  where a new virus that turns humans into zombies has spread around the world. Despite plans of wiping out the zombies with weapons of mass destruction  the zombies still roam the world  spreading fear among humans. Months and years pass  and a zombie hunter named Niki travels around the world with his partner. Niki faces a horde of mutated zombies  psycho zombies  and odd zombie "creatures" as he tries to find a place to live peacefully.
Kuruma Suuna  a gloomy and socially awkward girl  begins her high school dorm life only to discover her new roommate  Hamanasu Ruka  flirting with another girl!

title_en: Mahou Tsukai no Hako - Starlit Marmalade
description: Chikagi Katsuragi enters Kagamisaki High School with the firm intention to have a quiet school life  but not if her hyperactive classmate Hino Hibiki has something to say about it!      Chikagi is fighting a losing battle  as she happens to be the younger sister of the wonderfully eccentric former Student Council President Chidori Katsuragi  and that alone assures that her high school life will be anything but quiet!

I became a eunuch as soon as I transmigrated? Fine  a eunuch it is  I'll climb my way up to the top and find a way to wear modern clothes and become a normal man again. My mind is a tangled mess  and I'm going crazy....suddenly  someone interrupts my hopes and dreams: "Mister Xie  tonight the Emperor will sleep with you."   "......Nani?!"

title_en: Cute Baby Arrives: Mommy is Super Fierce
description: When the not-so-famous actress Jane wakes up in the morning  her cute-but-nagging son Ian already had her day plan out for her – go on a blind date and find a father for the household. However  her date turns out to be Mark Quinn  the biological father of her son. The sullen business man obviously doesn't have the best impression of Jane and would not have expected that they will enter marriage soon with the help of Mark's father and Ian...

In today's Japan  "rental" services can deliver an afternoon with a "friend " a "parent " even a fake girlfriend! After a staggering betrayal by his girlfriend  hapless freshman Kazuya gets just desperate enough to give it a try. But he quickly discovers how complicated it can be to "rent" an emotional connection  and his new "girlfriend " who's trying to keep her side hustle secret  will panic when she finds out her real life and Kazuya's are intertwined in surprising ways! Family  school  and life all start to go wrong  too...  (Source: Kodansha Comics) ___ **Additional Links:** - Alt Official English: [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10001/episode/312699) - United States  Japan  Canada  Australia  New Zealand  & Singapore only. - Official English Volumes: [Kodansha USA](https://kodansha.us/series/rent-a-girlfriend/)

Just another average day at your average high school. Fuyuki Hino is a typical student with an ordinary set of friends... except for Sakuba Yomina. Yomina is unbearably shy and can't talk to boys... or girls  for that matter. Even stranger  Fuyuki vaguely remembers some kind of vow he made to her when they were children. But when he accidentally walks into the girls' locker room  he makes a shocking discovery  Yomina is a devil  wings and all! However  this irregular girl still has regular high school problems  including dealing with bullies and just wanting to be liked by others.
Hiiragi visits Chikage Komori  a transfer student who has never come to school. His chastity is at stake when he comes across a beautiful girl wearing nothing but a jacket!?

Mochizuki Nobara  who is often described as "serious" by those around her  is an ordinary second-year high school girl who yearns for romance but has yet to experience her first love. At the start of the new semester  the teacher asks her to help a student who has been absent from school to catch up with classes. However  that student is Setohara  an infamous boy who is the subject of many unsavory rumors around school.  (Source: Natalie  translated)

In the vibrant realm of Balchados  where countless cultures thrive  some seek strength above all else. They come together for the Chaos Combat tournament—a brutal contest that will push them to their limits. Fighters from all corners of Balchados clash in battles fueled by ambition and desperation. Only one can emerge victorious  as the true test lies not just in strength  but in the will to win at any cost.

title_en: Fuguushoku to Baka ni Saremashita ga  Jissai wa Sorehodo Waruku Arimasen?
description: Shirosaki Reito was suddenly sucked in by a mysterious crack and got transferred in between dimensions. He got reincarnated as a baby in another world. He was born in the royal family and was the heir to the throne but he was driven/kicked of the palace. The reason was that he was born as a Support magician and had Alchemist as a job which was the lowest job that existed in the new world and people who had that were considered jobless. But there was a secret hidden in that job!! ___ * Bookwalker LN: [link](https://bookwalker.jp/series/182424/) * Official LN: [link](https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/312278148/185185579)

Momo spends her days posting pictures on social media and survives on the few "likes" she gets. One day  she suddenly receives an invitation to meet up with her idol  Ichika  an influencer. Momo is overjoyed by the unexpected good news  but what awaits her ahead? Is it heaven or a one-way ticket to hell?

Jiang Wang was betrayed by his sworn brother Fang Pengju  who stole the Daoist Academy's reward of a Meridian Opening pill that he had earned with his blood and sweat. On the verge of death  he inherited the relics of Zuo Guanglie  the genius of the Chu Dynasty  opened his meridians and embarked on the path of cultivation. He was confused and hesitant  but he always held on to the light in his heart  which was a pure heart that remained true to its original intention.

Allie Abel  a girl who came from the countryside wishing to become a witch who can make people happy with magic  meets Yoshino-York  an unusual witch who sells ordinary flowers and believes that "people can be happy without relying on magic". Allie  who has been assigned to work at Yoshino's florist as an apprentice witch  is now making "happiness" that was supposed to come true through magic come true with her own hands...?

title_en: "Sono Hen no Kusa demo Kuttoke" to Tsuihou Sareta Munou Skill [Shokubutsugui] Mochi Tenseisha  Elf no Sato de Maboroshi no Shokubutsu wo Tabete Musou Suru
description: "Just go and eat some of that grass over there " was what Aki  a reincarnated person  was told when he was banished from the Viscount Guinas Household because of his useless skill  [Plant Eater].  However to Aki  being banished was an opportunity for him to break free from the constrained life of a noble and enjoy his second chance at life.  "Your stats have been drastically increased."  "Skill [Absorption] has been acquired."  Aki's skill which should've 'only' allowed him to eat any vegetation  truly manifested after he ate various mythical plants  including a leaf from the World Tree itself.  By using his skills  he became a legendary existence sought after by the whole country. After saving the elf girl Saras  he became the only human to gain the elves' trust. Brushing aside the nobles  royalty  and other people in power who wanted a connection with the elves  he became an existence that could represent the entire continent.  As for the Guinas family and Aki's younger brothers who banished him  it became difficult for them to get a connection with the elves  and what's more is that they  got themselves into a nasty predicament  but...

title_en: Mujihina Akuyaku Kizoku ni Tensei shita boku wa Shouaku Mahou wo kushi shite Mahou Sekai no Chouten ni tatsu ~Heroine nante inai to Akiramete itara Mukou kara katte ni Yottekimashita~
description: I was reincarnated as the villainous aristocrat  Vanitas  and decided to defy my destined destruction. By using the absolute power of Domination Magic  I will protect the heroines who were originally meant to be taken away  and push forward on my path to the top of the magical world.

title_en: My Adopted Daughter is an Eldritch Horror?!
description: "My Adopted Daughter is an Eldritch Horror?!" is developed by [Crystal Blitz](https://www.youtube.com/CrystalBlitz) and Artists!  If you would like to support us  follow the additional links. _____________ **Additional Links:** - Twitter: [X (Formerly known as Twitter - Follow us for Updates!)](https://x.com/chasiibles)

title_en: Kuzumi-kun  Can't You Read the Room?
description: Erika Sakura is the school's most popular female high schooler  and only met with envious gazes since she is out of everyone's league. However  she is recently interested in a certain male high schooler who can't read between the lines  Kuzumi. While having a relationship between the two is out of the question  her unrequited love will soon change in this romantic comedy. Follow this new inevitably heart pounding  out-of-contact short love comedy!

Otomegi Otome  who has become a female college student  had a rough dream of "taking a new step." At that moment  there was a pretty amazing car that looked dashing across in front of her... That car is a fiery red roadster! The driver is a girl who loves cars  Subeyama Yae! After Yae's passionate appeal  he started purchasing a pure white Copen!? Along with the open car  Hana's life as a female college student begins!!

Bei Yao  a cheerful four-year-old  was reborn into 1996 and found herself living next door to a boy destined to become a formidable villain in the future. This boy  Pei Chuan  was only five at the time  confined to a wheelchair and deeply insecure.  Years later  when they were teenagers  Bei Yao had blossomed into the school's most admired beauty. Despite her popularity  Pei Chuan remained guarded and distant. When Bei Yao confessed her feelings for him  he reacted with a mixture of fear and longing.  Having known each other for two lifetimes  Bei Yao was determined to understand the complexities of Pei Chuan's character. As their bond deepened  she discovered a sensitive and vulnerable soul beneath his tough exterior. Their story is one of a healing love that blossoms between childhood sweethearts  as Bei Yao's warmth gradually melts away Pei Chuan's emotional barriers.

title_en: The Most Beautiful Girl in the School is in Love With Me  the xx Artist!?
description: Amesaka Sora  an ordinary high school boy  usually enjoys drawing erotic pictures as a hobby. Since his failure in junior high school  he had planned to hide his hobby in high school... But one day  the student council president and the most beautiful girl in the school  Kisaragi Uguisu  finds out his secret...!?  A coming-of-age rom-com between a beautiful girl at the top of the caste system and one of those male extras!

Takeda and Arita haven't met since their high school graduation  but after taking in an abandoned cat one rainy day  their relationship begins to change. It's not romantic love. They don't have a reason to live together. And yet  they still want to be by each other's side. Faced with these feelings  the answer they decide on is...  A slice of life manga series about trying to break free from the urge to label relationships a certain way. ___ Note: Nominated for the 2022 Next Manga Award (Tsugi ni Kuru Manga Taishou) for Best Web Manga.

title_en: Tensai Dai Ni Ouji wa Hikikomori Tai: "Koku Kaishi" no Mujikaku Musou
description: Neet van Avadora  the second prince of the great kingdom of Astoria  is a homebody who loves nothing more than staying indoors. After cutting himself off from the outside world for years to devote himself to magical research  he has  without even realizing it  grown into a true prodigy of magic.  One day  however  under orders from his father the king  Neet is forced  much against his will  to enroll in the Magic Academy. There  he gradually begins to enjoy student life  blessed with quirky but kind friends. But because of his overwhelming magical talent  he constantly finds himself caught up in one troublesome incident after another…!  Meanwhile  Alex  the first prince  and the very cause of Neet’s growth into an unknowing genius  sets a certain “plan” into motion. This plan will spark a great incident  one that will change not only Neet’s fate  but also the fate of the entire kingdom of Astoria…

Based off of the critically acclaimed manga series Dragon Ball and Dragon Ball Z by Akira Toriyama  Young Jijii sets the stage for an excellent story and awesome adventures in the Dragon Ball Universe! Dragon Ball AF takes place three years after the end of Dragon Ball GT  following the adventures of the Z-Fighters and their fight against the all-mighty Lord Ize  son of Frieza!    Dragon Ball AF has no affiliation with Akira Toriyama  Funamation  Toei Animation  or Fuji TV. Dragon Ball AF is a fan-made doujinshi created by Young Jijii and is made purely for entertainment.

title_en: I  Who Have the Natural Charismatic Traits  Was Targeted by Yandere Disciples
description: After losing all magical powers  Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions  the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion  intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly  instead of disappearing  she became the legendary natural beauty  with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time  the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master  you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies  would you?

title_en: Sekai wo Sukutta Saikyou Yuusha ni Stalker sareru Mura Musume no Hanashi
description: Freesia  a plain  bespectacled village girl  is for some reason being stalked by the hero of mankind  Hero Irving!   When she tries to ask the people around her for help  all she gets are congratulatory messages. After he proposes to her with an ‘Unremovable Ring’  she tries to escape the village  but is immediately discovered by [Clairvoyance] and then held hostage to have a date with the hero for the sake of world peace.   Out of options  she decides to defeat him with her own hands (but her fighting skills are crap…). So to become stronger  she decides to go on a journey to train…?

title_en: Rikujou Jieitai Tokumu Chouhou Kikan - Beppan no Inu
description: In the Special Operations Group  an elite unit of the Ground Self-Defense Force  there is a female member who is bored with her daily routine of training. One day  at the behest of her superior  she heads to a certain garrison and is recruited by a mysterious man to join a black-ops unit known as “Beppan”. Given the name “Nana”  she finds herself on the front lines of a national defense war filled with schemes and violence.

Laid off and running out of cash  Michiru stumbles on a hotel looking for a clerk  room and board included! She jumps at the opportunity  but there's a surprise catch: the hotel exclusively serves nonhumans. But for a job with room and board included  anything is possible!!

title_en: THE iDOLM@STER: Shiny Colors - Coherent Light
description: Serizawa Asahi  Mayuzumi Fuyuko  and Izumi Mei  members of the idol unit *Straylight*  openly declare themselves as rivals. While they occasionally clash  they further polish their talents  shining even brighter. The new manga adaptation of the game *The iDOLM@STER: Shiny Colors*  compatible with the *Enza* platform  is here!

Megumi  a 32-year-old surgeon  navigates heartbreak  unexpected romance  and personal growth. After her boyfriend of seven years  abruptly ends their relationship  Megumi's world crumbles. Even worse  she gets invited to his engagement party. To avoid embarrassment  Megumi enlists the help of her junior colleague  Dr. Akiho  to pose as her boyfriend.

Living in a world filled with Heroes and Villains. Jamy once wanted to be a hero more than anything  but being born with a failure of a body  he believed he was destined to be nothing in life. Then one night an encounter with his best friend Kyoko’s mysterious past  gives him the chance to change his destiny…

title_en: Tsuyoshi - Daremo Katenai  Aitsu ni wa
description: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him  even though he doesn't like fighting.

"My Eldritch Girlfriend" is developed by [Crystal Blitz](https://www.youtube.com/CrystalBlitz) and Artists!  If you would like to support us  follow the additional links. _____________ **Additional Links:** - Twitter: [X (Formerly known as Twitter - Follow us for Updates!)](https://x.com/superficialmoth)

title_en: Uchi no Musuko wa Tabun Gay
description: A sweet  open-minded mother starts suspecting one of her sons might be gay.

This necklace shall transform its wearer into their desired form... A boy who obtained this magical necklace x the prince he yearns for. What will become of this love whose true nature cannot come to light...?

title_en: My Disciples Are All Big Villains
description: Lu Zhou wakes up to become the world’s most powerful and oldest villainous Patriarch  and finds that he has nine notorious disciples who are full of evil. His eldest disciple is the leader of the Nether Sect with thousands of minions  and his second disciple—Sword Devil—always slaughters others at the slightest disagreement…

Yayano  an eighth grader  moved to Atami with her mother from Tokyo. A somewhat rustic hotel is her mother's new workplace. Yayano is full of anxiety  but there she witnesses her mother's surprising appearance...! For Yayano  this is the first turning point in her life!? ___ [Official X Account](https://x.com/polestar_mo)

*"As long as you're the master of that sword and I'm a witch  someday you'll have to kill me for real."*  As a child  Oscar  Crown Prince of Farsas  had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20  he paid a visit to Tinassha  the strongest witch in the continent  to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector  and in the one year until his contract with her expired  he got embroiled into her past  and an even greater destiny.

title_en: Dore dake Doryoku Shite mo Mannen Level 0 no Ore wa Tsuihou Sareta ~Shin no Teki to Yobareta Shounen wa  Shachiku Megami to Deatte Saikyou no Chikara wo Te ni Ireru~
description: No matter how hard he tries  adventurer Tinto he can't raise his level  and is called [God's Enemy]. When he was finally expelled from the party  the goddess Esther appeared to him - and got down on her knees. To his surprise  Tinto was still at level 0 because of her mistake!

Collection of oneshots from author Tatsuki Fujimoto.  Volume 1: 17-21  - Chapter 1. **There were Two Chickens in the Garden (Niwa ni wa Niwa Niwatori ga Ita  庭には二羽ニワトリがいた。)** A strange world where aliens have taken over the human world  and only two humans are left which are apparently disguising themselves as mere chickens.  - Chapter 2. **Sasaki-kun Has Stopped the Bullet (Sasaki-kun ga Judan Tometa  佐々木くんが銃弾止めた)** To Sasaki  his teacher Kawaguchi is God. She taught him not to be ashamed of his own dreams and made him feel fully capable to forge forward and make them come true  no matter how low the odds. Yet one day  trouble from Kawaguchi's past follows her into the classroom. With his god in danger of total humiliation  Sasaki sets out to protect his teacher using her very own teachings: to strive for the impossible.  - Chapter 3. **Love is Blind (Koi wa Moumoku  恋は盲目)** A one-shot story about a boy that is blind to everything but love. Can he confess to his crush?  - Chapter 4. **Shikaku (シカク)** A notorious hit-man bites off more than they can chew when their newest target turns out to be holding a supernatural secret. Bullets fly and love is in the air.  Volume 2: 22-26  - Chapter 1. **Siren Rhapsody (Ningyo Rhapsody  人魚ラプソディ)** In a world where sirens are common  the protagonist is a hybrid of a human father and a mermaid mother. He's always playing the piano under the sea  when a strange siren approaches him…  - Chapter 2. **"When I Woke Up I had Become a Girl" Disease (Me wo Sametara Onnanoko ni Natteita Byou  目が覚めたら女の子になっていた病)** A boy wakes up to discover he has become a girl! How will this affect his daily life?!  - Chapter 3. **Nayuta of the Prophecy (Yogen no Nayuta  予言のナユタ)** A tale about a prophecy involving a girl with horns who is said to bring destruction upon the world  and her brother.  - Chapter 4. **Little Sister's Elder Sister (Imouto no Ane  妹の姉)** A story about sisters aspiring to be artists.

Mito is a boy with a big heart and the frightening face of a thug. He wants people to rely on him  but he scares people off at first sight. That is  until his schoolmate Yumesaki asks him to help her.      Yumesaki has a problem. Every day she is given a new  random supernatural ability by an mysterious being called God  as she has to test them in order to stop a giant meteorite that will destroy the planet in a year.      Sure  the goal is to save the planet  but when a boy and a girl spend time together  there are more tender things to discover too!

A young Taiwanese assassin codenamed "Glass Heart" committed suicide by jumping off a building  and her heart was pierced by a metal fence. Miraculously  her life was saved by heart transplantation. During her recovery she began to experience strange dreams  which led her to Japan looking for the donor of her heart  who happens to be Kaori Makimura  former partner of City Hunter.  Note: direct continuation of Angel Heart  renewed in Monthly Comic Zenon after the cancellation of Bunch.

title_en: Mahou Shoujo Madoka☆Magica: The different story
description: Mami's warm personality has made it difficult for her to adjust to her solitary life as a magical girl  where survival often takes precedence over kindness.    When she meets Kyouko Sakura  a fellow lone wolf  she is excited at the prospect of working together with another magical girl and forging a friendship built on ultimate trust. But many are the sacrifices all magical girls must make  and the consequences of Kyouko's choice are only just becoming clear to her.   When the pain becomes unbearable  will Kyouko remain standing beside Mami as a force for the greater good…?

title_en: Blade Skill Online: Crushing the Competition with My Abysmal Stats  Useless Class  and Garbage Weapon!
description: Though Yuri may look like any other high schooler  his life is a ceaseless onslaught of the worst luck imaginable — so when he hears about Blade Skill Online  the ultra-immersive VRMMO where luck is a stat you can control  he can’t wait to start playing and escape his IRL problems.   Following the advice of an online guide  he chooses the summoner class with a bow for his weapon  and for his stats  he pours every last point into luck  naturally. Thus begins his blessed online life! Or at least  that was the plan. He soon learns he’s been trolled — summoners are useless  the bow is garbage  and the game’s barely playable with his abysmal stats!   To top it off  a bald barbarian starts hitting on him barely a minute into the game because the avatar randomizer made him into a hot girl! Still  Yuri’s used to dealing with whatever life throws at him  and he’s not going to let the trolls have the last laugh!   He’ll push his luck to the limit and leave the rest of BSO’s players racing to keep up!  [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/blade-skill-online-crushing-the-competition-with-my-abysmal-stats-useless-class-and-garbage-weapon)

I was reincarnated as Blanca  a villainess in the world of an Otome game that I loved in my previous life. It's unfortunate that I was reincarnated as Blanca  a character I don't like very much  but maybe I can witness a flirtatious scene between the heroine and her capture target without being charged for money! In order to make the love of the captured target and heroine more exciting than the game  I will do my best to be mean to the heroine  but for some reason the love doesn't seem to be progressing....The villainous daughter's all-out love comedy finally begins!

In the year 1520  the reclusive island of 'Kodornacht' suddenly falls into a deep winter  one whose intensity is enough to freeze the very sea it resides in  opening its shores to the outside World for the first time in over a millennia.  With untold riches up for the taking  it gives birth to a gigantic treasure hunt. However  Kodornacht hides something much more important and mysterious: The Phantom Court—a trinket with the power to control winds  fortune  and  some say  even resurrect the dead.   The Hunt begins. ___________________ My third manga project  Phantom Court is a story containing fantasy elements that hopes to bring to the readers enjoyable characters and high-stakes conflicts.  I've been working on this one for a while; I hope you'll join me for the ride.  More of my garbage on: https://linktr.ee/redbowcr

*Minami-ke* ("The Minami Household") is a manga following the three Minami sisters  Haruka  Kana  and Chiaki in their lives at home and school. It's a funny manga that depicts how these characters interact with each other and their classmates. Although they are ordinary girls  their ordinary adventures are told in an extraordinary manner. **Source:** MangaUpdates

A story of youth and sensuality. A thrilling real high school love story! High schooler Nachi Shinohara is a social butterfly. He can get along with anyone. On the other hand  there's the lone wolf  Takizawa Yuuri. A chance exchange of words leads to a relationship that no one knows about.

title_en: I Had Only given Him a White Handkerchief 'Casually' at the Ball  But now this Knight is Pressuring Me to Become his Fiancée!
description: Melietta  a daughter of a Count  was now of marriageable age. At a ball held to find potential suitors  she casually handed a handkerchief to a knight present as a token of their meeting— Only to have him storm into her estate the very next day and propose! Initially hesitant  Melietta finds herself drawn to the kind knight. But his true nature... “I won't let you escape—no matter what it takes.” His overly protective  possessive nature (yandere) becomes increasingly apparent?

title_en: The Lady Knight and the Beast-Eared Child
description: A different world where demons are rampant and murderous. Olivia  a female knight  lives with her apprentice Noah  an animal eared child. A tale of a master and apprentice growing up  adventuring and being healed by the strong bond between each other.

Astra Ludger Doomsday  former captain of the royal knights has finally achieved his dearest wish: To retire and use his savings to get his very own house.   But not long after finally arriving to his sanctuary  a young girl crashlands into his house. The girl is an apprentice witch  and seems to mistake Astra for someone else…

title_en: Kinki Chihou no Aru Basho ni Tsuite
description: My friend Ozawa  who has gone missing. He was an editor of an occult magazine  and before his disappearance  he had covered ghost stories related to an area called "●●●●●". Quotes from past magazine articles  strange stories from readers  and Internet bulletin board posts - as we follow his footsteps and decipher the materials he had collected  certain connections emerge between the ghost stories that had been treated as separate incidents.

A pair of sisters living in N City  Saitama prefecture…      The older sister earned a large fortune while she was young. and now  She's a celeb neet who's sometimes afflicted by net addiction. Her name is "Midorikawa Ranko " or commonly called as "Ran."      The younger sister is living off her older sister's fortune  wishing to progress in the normal society. her name is "Midorikawa Hikaru " commonly called as "Pandora."      The gothic loli neet sisters are bringing you a somewhat harsh  moe comedy!
Maki meets a man named Tomonori who pays well. What does the word "dole" that he often uses mean? This is the story of a woman who falls for a scumbag man who nests on the dark side of society.
M Byleth x Linhardt

title_ja: Clevatess -Majuu no Ou to Akago to Shikabane no Yuusha-
description: He killed the heroes  killed the king  the devil beast then found the "baby of fate"...  Having both superior intellect and destructive power  such is Clevatess  the devil beast king. Angered by the 13 heroes' attempt to take his life  he had decided to bring ruin upon humanity  but he gets entrusted with an unexpected nuisance: a newborn human baby. Is this the tale of a world close to apocalypse or a diary of new-era childcare? ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [LINE Manga](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000841)
Kwon Yong-jin  a protagonist who doesn’t believe in superstitions  experiences unbelievable events right after his 16th birthday.

Handyman Saitou has never been anyone special. All his life  he's had average grades  ordinary athletic skill  a commonplace job... But his unremarkable path takes a turn when he wakes up in another world. Here  warriors  wizards  and elves accompany him on quests delving deep into dungeons  and Saitou realizes for the first time what it's like to be needed. After all  who other than the handyman could be trusted to open locked treasure chests or repair his allies' equipment?

title_en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure  Part 6: Stone Ocean (Official Colored)
description: The highly acclaimed sixth arc of Hirohiko Araki’s JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure shifts the action from Italy to America  as Jolyne Cujoh—daughter of Jotaro Kujo—is sentenced to 15 years in prison for a murder she didn’t commit! In a bizarre turn of events  the prison is filled with Stand users. Some become her allies  but many are sent to kill Jolyne and her friends in a scheme to resurrect the scourge of the Joestar family—DIO! It’s a battle for survival in a prison where death lurks around every corner while Jolyne fights to save her father’s life in JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Part 6—Stone Ocean!

Chika  who just started her career as a manga artist  was trying to find a right story for her first manga but her editor was rejecting all of her stories. Exhausted  Chika suddenly came up with an idea to travel somewhere. Somewhere  not here. She asked her social media followers which direction she should go. When the direction was decided  she sets out for her trip--a trip without any plans. First  she travels north--despite not knowing what awaits her  she manages to eat and see amazing things which she never expected. She stays in a fantastic place  enjoys everything. Sometimes  her friends join her trip... which she enjoys also.

title_en: Onna Chara de Isekai Teni shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin wo Mezashimasu!
description: A little weary salaryman. One day  after waking up… he found himself in another world in the body of a female character  Susie  from the MMORPG he liked to play. Confused  he tried an attack… and made all the monsters flee to the place people live  afraid of his destructive power that’s able to smash a mountain. Having dealt with them  he ended up saving Howard  a local tribune who invited his savior to the village  but…

title_en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure  Part 9:  The JOJOLands
description: O’ahu  present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician  and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother  he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day  his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal  but for someone with a stand...

If you're born in Japan and you play football  you'll eventually want to wear the national team uniform! It's the same for everyone! Ichijou Ryuu is a boy whose dream is to become a Japan national team player. With his twin childhood friends  Yuuto and Yuki  their first goal is to win the Japan Under-12 Football Championship!   The excitement of a one-on-one! The tension in front of goal! The elation from pulling off the perfect link up play! The essence of what makes football enjoyable is here.      Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Best Shonen Manga in 2014.     ---

Sakuma  a teacher at an all-girls school  sees his wife in the red-light district cheating on him one day. In response  he runs away and decides to tour Japan  going wherever his heart may lead him. He finally reaches Odawara and meets a young girl  that looks like the one he always sees in his dreams. He barely manages to stop himself from crossing the line with the girl  and he eventually returns to his normal life  having discovered that his wife's alleged cheating was all a misunderstanding. But then...

Science or magic?   « Welcome to Paris  elected for the 68th month in a row as the least polluted city in the world. Thanks to cyanel  the air we breathe inside our houses is purified. »   In a futuristic Paris  pollution is so prevalent that all greenery has disappeared. Recently  a gigantic plant appeared in the heart of the city  and the authorities are making sure no one gets close… Thomas  a young science student  is secretly studying the phenomenon  hoping for a better life.  Raised by his witchcraft-loving grand-mother  he is often prone to hallucinations. One day  he crosses paths with a strange young girl with very bright eyes  who faints in the air. From then on  his fate changes…

tags: Psychological|Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Girls' Love|Philosophical|Drama|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: They met in a town of peaches.  Mu Xiaoen  a willfully incomplete moon  and Shi Xingyuan  a star who could not sparkle.  *Hey  my dear lass. I want to give you the entirety of Peachtown's summer.*

title_en: Oukoku e Tsuzuku Michi Dorei Kenshi no Nariagari Harem Life
description: This is the story of a young slave gladiator in an underground arena. He doesn't know about his past or how he got to where he is  only that his name is Aegir  and that he is strong. One day he kills the boss and escapes the arena  joining a band of mercenaries as a new recruit. During one mission  they encounter the vampire  Lucy  who slaughters the band with her inhuman strength. After learning that Aegir only knows how to kill  Lucy lets him stay at her house  educating and taking care of him.  Two years pass  and on the day of Aegir's departure  they both exchange a promise that if Aegir becomes a king and owns the land of Erg forest  he can come and take her as his woman. Making this his life goal  Aegir set out on a journey to become a hero  a king  and found his own kingdom.

Jin Takahara is the 16th student in Class D of the prestigious Shirataki Gakuen High School. He is a gutsy guy who proudly proclaims  "I am a genius." From the first day of school  he drives a racing machine to school.   However  on the way to school  he steps on a ball hit by Kiriyama  a member of the baseball team  and falls over  causing an early mess...   Whether it is a fight or a baseball game  the game is played with guts. Hit them with an angry slap!

title_en: Black Moonlight Heroine Always Wants to Mark Me
tags: Long Strip|Romance|Girls' Love|Isekai|Fantasy|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: A scheming  manipulative alpha pretending to be an omega × an omega pretending to be a cool-but-cowardly alpha  Gu Yu  who was originally a top designer at a high-end bespoke fashion boutique  happened to read an ABO novel without purchasing a subscription. Shortly after  she was inexplicably forced to transmigrate into the story. Worst of all—she became the novel's evil side character  a fake alpha who was actually an omega  left to the grim fate of being burned alive by the heroine for abusing her. As she stared at the blackened "two-faced" heroine Su Yue kneeling in the rain outside  Gu Yu felt completely devastated.  To save her life  Gu Yu decided to risk acting out of character and she secretly—yet while openly caring for the female lead—designed the most beautiful and unique evening gown in the world for her  clung onto her tightly  provided her with resources  and helped her dominate the entertainment industry and reclaim everything that was rightfully hers. But Gu Yu never expected that the "innocent little princess" she had been caring for so preciously not only turned out to be a fake omega  but an alpha! This wasn’t how the story was supposed to go! Believing her days were numbered  Gu Yu waited for her impending death in despair. However  Su Yue  exuding a strong red wine-scented pheromone—pinned Gu Yu down and whispered  “Are you prepared to be marked by me?” That familiar voice rang in Gu Yu’s ears  completely disrupting her soft heart.

tags: Time Travel|Historical|Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Boys' Love|Isekai|Fantasy|Web Comic|Full Color
description: After traveling into a historical BL novel  the actor Lin Yan gains a special ability: fast-traveling through a skill called [Escape Death]. His first mission? To secretly orchestrate an attack on Prince Qi Zhen  which leads to the prince becoming the villain. Lin Yan’s first identity in this world is none other than Lin Shou Yan  the prince’s foolish fiancé. But as he plays his role  he accidentally captures the prince’s heart  and his fake death turns out to be the key reason Qi Zhen becomes a ruthless tyrant! A cold  overthinking tsundere prince and his scheming  perverted fiancé—chaos ensues!

title_en: Misato-san wa Amasugi Joushi ni Chotto Kibishii
description: Misato-san  a very beautiful office lady who is good at her job  and her boss—Konishikawa-san  a middle-aged man who spoils his subordinates. Misato-san has a strict attitude toward Konishikawa-san  but what are the hidden feelings behind it?! The gap between the seriousness and cuteness will make you faint in anxiety  and this office love comedy with a difference in age begins! (MTL) ___ **Links:**  - [Alternative Raw](https://shukanmanga.jp/work_list/detail/misatosan)

title_en: Shinyuu ni Imouto no Furi o Shita Hanashi
tags: Romance|Comedy|Boys' Love|Crossdressing|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: this is a story from the point of view of the "little sister(?)" in the series "a story about my best friend who apparently has a little sister(?)"

title_en: The Hidden Muse of the Boys' Academy
description: Shiomi harbors a secret while attending his all-boys school  which is creating self-portraits in drag within the privacy of his art studio. But his most protected moments are witnessed by the absolute worst person possible  Aihara. With his secret now exposed  Shiomi's life is about to be turned completely upside down.

title_en: Douyara Ore wa Imadoki Gal na Toshiue Osananajimi kara Gekiomo Kanjou wo Mukerareteiru Rashii
description: Yuito Kujo  a high school student  constantly compares himself to his exceptional older brother and sees himself as a lesser  "degraded version." Caught in a spiral of self-deprecation  his adolescence turns even darker when he discovers that his childhood crush  Suzuno  is in love with his older brother. But just as Yuito begins to lose hope  Suzuno's older sister  Kano—a college gal—develops intense  overwhelming feelings for him...!?

title_en: Gal to Dungeon to Shuukai Okure no Tansaku Eiyuutan ~Moto Legend Ima wa Wakeari tei Rank Tansakushana Ore ga  S-Kyuu Gal ni Natsukare Makutte Ikusei wo Makase Sareta~
description: Kaoru Kunou  a former legend known as the "Dungeon Maniac " is now  for certain reasons  a bottom-tier explorer. Though worn out by reality  he continues to chase the fleeting dreams and youth of his past. One day  by chance  he saves S-class gal streamer Shion from a crisis  and she falls for him at first sight. Initially flustered by Shion’s overwhelmingly bright and charming advances  Kaoru gradually finds himself healed and drawn to her. Eventually  the two form a temporary mentor-student duo and set out to challenge the depths of a dungeon tied to their pasts  but what lies ahead!?

title_en: Tensei Shite High Elf ni Narimashitaga  Slow Life wa 120-nen de Akimashita - Highelf with a Long Life
description: Life in the Great Pulha Woodlands is the very definition of stillness and tranquility—and Aesir's had enough of it! That's right. Aesir isn't quite like the other high elves of the forest. For starters  he remembers living a past life as a human in another world... meaning he's got a taste for meat  adventure  and plenty of other decidedly un-elven things! He's also bored out of his skull after 120 years of the peace and quiet of their serene sylvan lifestyle. So with nothing more than his trusty bow  a bundle of life-giving fruit  and his close bond with the spirits of nature  Aesir leaves the monotony of the forest behind to seek a new life  one that's more his pace. ___ * [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/enough-with-this-slow-life-i-was-reincarnated-as-a-high-elf-and-now-i-m-bored)

tags: Animals|Long Strip|Comedy|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: A mysterious duck chases Jiwoo  who dropped her wallet on the street.  Jiwoo takes the duck into her home  and the duck quickly becomes immersed in their new home. And so begins... the days of the duck race!

title_en: Hacking Ghost ~Karada ni Shika Kachi no Nai Gakuen~
description: In an era where one in every twenty people awakens to a "special ability " Hiroto Takigami is a weak ability user who can only communicate with spirits. However  for some reason  his stepsister Rei  the most powerful ability user  harbors deep hatred toward him. The moment he graduates from an ability training institution and gains full control over his power  Rei kills him. With only one year left to live—his "remaining lifespan" set—Hiroto falls into despair. Just then  a certain spirit appears before him  revealing an unexpected secret about his ability...

title_en: Solving the mystery of the mystery-loving literature club president
Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Nankai Soujou-hen
description: Spring is here  and the graduating seniors of First High are planning a getaway to sunny Okinawa. At the same time  Tatsuya and Miyuki will be on the island as the Yotsuba family’s representatives at a memorial service for the victims of the invasion there several years earlier. Of course  this is just a cover for their true purpose: foiling a terrorist plot hatched by some deserters and Australian operatives. Their primary target is a party that Shizuku and Honoka will be attending—What are the chances? Romance is in the air  and danger is on the horizon  making this a vacation they’ll never forget!  Manga adaption of the 'Southern Sea Riot Arc' from the 20th light novel.

Due to a misuse of a word joke on live TV broadcast  girl group otaku  'Jin-Kyung' ended up becoming doxxed and labeled as a "child predator"  and ended up getting Social Anxiety Disorder. 3 years later  because of his past incident from the 3D world  his love for only the 2D world manifested  and ended up becoming a "Shut-In Otaku"! Then one day  as Jin-Kyung was no-lifing as usual  he was summoned to ‘Another World’  and came face-to-face with a bright-eyed  hopeful Summoner… Interesting enough  in the world that Jin-Kyung was summoned to  his Social Anxiety Disorder disappeared  and he was also able to wield immense power  and became the strongest summoned being there ever was!! The story of a former girl group otaku turned powerful 2D otaku  and the story of a weak and feeble Summoner commences now!
Meet Shinichi Honda and Mako Wakamiya. One’s a boy  and the other’s a girl. But both don’t hesitate to say exactly what’s on their mind **IN CAPITAL LETTERS.**

“Ubunchu!” is a Japanese manga series featuring Ubuntu Linux. Three school students in a system-admin club are getting into Ubuntu!  Several extra chapters have been released after the original run of the series  compiled here: [Ubunchu! translation](https://sirtetris.gitlab.io/ubunchu-translation/)

tags: Animals|Comedy|School Life|Monster Girls|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Supernatural
description: No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan  a transfer student with antlers  enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo  chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer  a girl  or something in-between?  Trivia: - The author is the illustrator/'mama' for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata (天音かなた)](https://www.youtube.com/@AmaneKanata). Because of this  physical copies on Amazon sold out within a day.

title_en: Tatsumigahara-san no Ai Kara wa Nigerarenai
description: At a party  Mondo  a typical college student  meets Tatsumigahara Aoi  a well-known beauty. But after having a few drinks with her  he passes out and wakes up chained in Aoi's home. Even though Aoi looks after Mondo in every way (including in explicit ways)  Mondo tries to flee from her home. The outcome is uncertain.

title_en: Osananajimi wo Erabanai Yatsu wa Kasu da!
description: The protagonist  Nekomiya Kotone  loves her childhood friend the heroine  but hates fateful encounters. Every day she dreams of a future where she is together with her childhood friend Kitsunezaki Sakino  but one day she herself had a "fateful encounter...?" A bright yuri comedy!

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Crossdressing|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Losing memories after a confession?! A crossdressing boy and the one he loves are cursed to never fall deep in love  and are forced to repeat their confession over and over. What is the antidote to love? Can there be miracles in true love?

After years of studying  Hanazawa Saburou  AKA Suzuran's legendary Zetton  has finally become a high school teacher. But on his first day at work  the principal tells him he was actually hired not to teach  but to make the students of his homeroom class drop out of school?!

A slightly offbeat slice-of-life comedy starring… a golem schoolgirl?!  It’s spring of his second year in high school  and Otonashi can’t help but notice the girl sitting next to him  cheerful  bright  and  well… a golem. Her arm pops off at the drop of a hat  flowers sprout from her head when she’s happy  and she overheats whenever she’s embarrassed. Every day with her brings something new and unexpected. Not quite a romance  but definitely not your average friendship... here begins the surreal  slightly strange daily life of two unusual classmates.

Seiji has had unnaturally bad luck ever since he inadvertently went to the underworld as a kid. That day  when he brought back Hades's pomegranate from the Underworld  is when his world suddenly turned into disarray!  Distinguished manga artist Kanno Aya takes on the underworld in this dark fantasy!

A gluttonous monster  Yattara  is drawn to a city of splendor and opulence. Its only pleasure in life: eating. It finds its favorite meal  children  and is ready to dig in as usual but then... a flash of inspiration strikes?

title_en: The Plain Salary Man Turned Out to Be a Hero: He Was Invincible  Only to Be Exposed on His Niece's Dungeon Stream
description: Keita Sato (41  single) is overworked at his corporate job  dealing with tedious and stressful tasks day in and out. How does he relieve his stress? By sneaking into modern-day "dungeons " using them as a batting cage  and blasting away ferocious monsters! One day  his live-in niece Hikari secretly follows him and livestreams his adventures  only for his unbelievable strength to go crazy viral!! Keita unknowingly captures the attention of not only viewers  but other big-name streamers.

Middle schoolers  Shiro and Masumi  encountered a mysterious dragon that brought them back to the time of the Three Kingdoms; situated in ancient China. As soon as they arrived  they were rescued by the Han Kingdom. Not long after these events  Masumi was kidnapped and Shiro barely escaped death… Soon the story gets more complicated as they are stuck in the past.      In 1997  Ryuurouden won the Kodansha Manga Award for shōnen manga.

Some dude with memory loss  village done burned to the ground and can’t stop seeing this silver haired girl. He embarks on a journey to defeat the demon king but has to face a bunch of obstacles blah blah blah and gets a harem.
A super cute and tad chaotic parallel spinoff comedy!!

A manga that revolves around an old-fashioned all-night food stall  the various dishes that the stall owner prepares to suit the tastes of different customers  and the joys  griefs  trials and tribulations of his faithful patrons.      - Nominated for the 2nd Manga Taisho Award (2009)   - Winner of the 39th Japan Cartoonist Awards Grand Prize (2010)

title_en: A Boyish Girlfriend in High Humidity
description: **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/115806876)

title_en: Nekomimi Shoujo wa Mori de Slow Life wo Okuritai ~Mofumofu wa Shomou Shimashita ga  Seijo to ka Ouji-sama to ka wa Chuumongai desu~
description: Let’s strive for a soothing and fluffy life at the forest atelier! ♪  Chise was an office worker who could not touch the animals she loves because of allergies. One day  she died while protecting a cat  but God saw her good deed and reincarnated her in another world! Reincarnated as a cat-eared girl  Chise has the skills to tame and summon spirits  as well as the knowledge to make potions  and is surrounded by the fluffies of her dreams...?  (*Note: This section requires further editing.)

title_ja: Tonari no Kuroki-san wa Nomu to Yabai
description: Hajime Goto is a new university student who moved to Tokyo alone from the countryside. In the room next to his  lives a super office worker  Asami Kuroki  who is beautiful  has a great style  and is very good at her job! Hajime is excited about his new life and the girl next door  but Kuroki-san has a fatal “weakness”…  A funny and exciting neighborly love comedy begins!

title_en: Henjo ~Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko~
description: Amaguri Senko is a high school girl with a cool personality (as in kuudere) and a big pervert. She openly reads porn  masturbates and isn't perturbed in the slightest at the sight of penises and such. The story centers around Senko's daily life with two male handymen working for her father's company  which she also helps out with  Takamura Ryou and Sugita Kouhei. Takamura ends up being constantly sexually harassed by Senko  partially due to his phimosis dick that caught her interest   but little did he know  she wasn't joking when she bluntly said "I like you"...

While the title suggests a story of simple  everyday school life  the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories  like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.  (The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)

title_en: Me no Mae no Sangeki de Zense wo Omoidashitakedo  Amarini mo Mondai Yamazumi de Ippai Ippaidesu.
description: After witnessing injured soldiers get abandoned  the countess of a remote region  Neon regained memories of her past life as a nurse. Although she started using modern medical techniques like triage in order to treat the injured soldiers  problems like her husband  who is the leader of the knights order in the remote region confronting her  are piling up――?!

title_en: Solo-fessional: Solo Katsu Danshi to Bocchi Joshi no Koubousen
description: Hasama Shin is a solo guy who loves being alone. He even changed jobs to enjoy his time alone after coming home  and one day  a girl living in the apartment next door asks him if he wants to hang out with her. It's creepy that she asked me out on our first meeting  and more than anything  I don't have time for other people! ...Or so I thought  but I was tempted and ended up hanging out with her  and she started following me around every day...?! A comedy about the struggle between a solo guy and a lonely girl!!

title_en: Yopparai Reijou ga Eiyuu to Shirazu Kyuukon Shita kekka
description: Viera  a poor noblewoman working tirelessly in the Magic Bureau’s Technical Department  has no money  no time  and no connections. One day  she's suddenly tasked with finding a husband!  On a whim—and under the influence of alcohol—she proposes a contract marriage to a nearby stranger  a knight named Lukash  offering a deal: “We can divorce after a year.”  To her surprise  he agrees.  But later  she learns who Lukash really is...?!  What was supposed to be a divorceable contract marriage born from a drunken promise takes an unexpected turn when he says  “I have no intention of letting you go.”  A marriage fantasy filled with romance between a highly capable  broke noblewoman and the country’s strongest divine beast knight!  --- * [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7038hv/)

"My wife made a rule for our home: 'Don't talk to Dad.'" "Isn't that domestic violence? Weren't you sending me an SOS for help?" Reitarou Shinotani has been long ignored by his wife and daughter  left all alone  and forced to do nothing but eat and sleep in a small  dark  cramped room in the house. What fate awaits him  as he aims to revitalize his family...?

A legend spreading among the whole universe says whoever collects Zaha Sanko's bones will have any kind of wish granted.  Thus  he and his skeletal buddy Avakian will use their dark powers to fend off any murder attempts while they search through  space for whoever put this curse on Sanko’s bones: killing them might end the madness.

Sanae Kitajima is a psychiatrist specializing in end-of-life care. Her boyfriend  Takanashi  who once struggled with a deep fear of death  returns from an Amazon expedition profoundly changed. What happened during the expedition? What is the true meaning behind his cryptic words  "I can hear the whispers of angels"?  A complete manga adaptation of Yusuke Kishi's original novel  known for producing numerous masterpiece horror novels such as The Black House and Lesson of the Evil.

Somewhere in Tokyo exists a general hospital where cunning and heinous criminals who’ve slipped through the cracks of the law are admitted.    Working there is nurse Reiko Mikazuki — beautiful and brilliant  admired by both patients and fellow medical staff.    But behind her angelic face lies another side.    She is an enforcer who delivers merciless punishment to evildoers.    With blood on her hands  is she a beautiful angel in white... or a seductive demon of judgment?    A complete good-vs-evil  spine-chilling suspense thriller!

Tsukumo Yamada is a simple and unremarkable college student.   As he is getting ready to go home after finishing his university lecture as usual  a solitary beautiful woman  Mao Yoshida  who is rumored to be a "mermaid princess " passes by. While the boys are in an uproar  Yamada is secretly summoned by Yoshida. When they are alone  Yoshida presses against him. In fact  Yamada and Yoshida have an intimate relationship...   However  he is unable to grasp the romantic distance between them because Yoshida is too expressionless  and he is having a sweet but bittersweet college life  unable to go from "friend" to "lover".

title_en: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de
description: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

One day  the most beautiful girl in school suddenly shows up at Kento Ikuno's door. She shows him a "ticket" written in awkward handwriting. This is the start of a romantic comedy about a "ticket to do anything I say" that came from his childhood.  [Alternative Raw](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/60455)

"I was always thinking about you  Airi."    Motoki continued to send emails that were never delivered to his beloved.    Until one day  he receives an answer that will transform his depressive life.    A unique mystery about an unforgettable "girlfriend".  --- **Links:** [ComicFuzz](https://comic-fuz.com/series/2415) | [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/926770)

High school teacher Shibasaki was well-liked by everyone around her because of her kind personality and the genuine care she showed towards her students. One day  she witnesses a scene where a girl named Masono  who was not attending school  is being bullied—and decides that she needs to help her. Shibasaki goes to Masono's house to try to talk to her  but the words she hears back are completely unexpected...!?

The story follows Kiyotake  a man with no aim or accomplishments in life. He’s an actor who lands extra roles at best  works multiple part-time jobs to barely support himself  and has few personal attachments. His best friend Shun died when he was 19 in an accident and he now has a few casual friends. This expands when an old acquaintance moves in next door…
The story centers on the supporting character Tachibana from Saraiya Goyou during his childhood.

Visiting home after a long time away  Nao bumps into her first love Yuzuru who informs her of his upcoming wedding to their childhood friend  Suzu. But when Nao returns to Tokyo in shock  someone decides to show up at her door…?
Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job  she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!

Waka is a 13 year-old Go-lover! Learning from her grandfather  a pro go player  she comes to enjoy connecting with the people around her  regardless of age or gender. One day  she meets the young genius go player  Sagisaka Souji  in a match that tore at both body and soul  and so she decides to become a pro go player herself!

title_en: Eroge no Sekai de Slow Life ~Issho ni Isekai Teni shitekita Yarisaa no Daigakusei-tachi ni Tsuihou sareta node  Henkyou de Muteki ni Natte Shin no Heroine-tachi to Yoroshiku Yarimasu~
description: The more you do it  the stronger you get!? Iijima Satoru. 32 years old. Virgin. Today  he was idly masturbating while listening to the vibrator of the woman living upstairs... but suddenly the ceiling collapsed  and the woman  completely exposed from the waist down  fell! And then... she landed on him...?!  He suddenly found himself in another world... the world of an eroge  famous for its goofy setting. In this game  the heroines always have some parts completely exposed  whether it be their breasts  their lower bodies  or wearing thongs - a veritable paradise!   What's more  Satoru has the skill "Ero Note." When the favorability rating of the person whose name you've written reaches the maximum  it becomes an unstoppable skill that allows him to do whatever he wants with them!

title_en: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica - Mami Tomoe's Everyday Life
description: Mami Tomoe's Everyday Life is a slice-of-life featuring a lonely  single  30-year old Mami Tomoe. It is a remake of the author's original doujinshi series  Mami Tomoe 1X Years Later Mami-san Around 30 Years Old Collection.

Takagi Kaito  a low status high schooler  your typical mob character so to say  was just a normal everyday explorer who hunted slimes every day in the dungeons that appeared in Japan  earning pocket money while admiring his childhood friend  the class queen  from afar. One day  a golden slime he had never seen appears before him. After he defeats it  he obtains an extremely rare item worth hundreds of millions as a drop  a servant card that can summon mythical beings!! After he makes up his mind and summons it  a warrior maiden with unparalleled beauty appears. ___ **Links:** - [Web Novel (JP)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8930fk/)  - Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55183)

title_en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - Horseshoe Animus
description: Showdown between 12 girls with all of their might

title_en: My Second Life is a Healing Life?
description: Eugene Pellivia  the youngest son of a legendary warrior family  is on the brink of death—until he’s visited by Pellin  the fabled Mage of Creation  and given a second chance at life. Determined to follow in the footsteps of the one who saved him  Eugene sets out to become a great mage and use his powers for good. But fate has other plans  and before long  he's drawn into the shadows of a darker world...

October Hall (Juugatsudou)  a secondhand bookstore where people and books may meet anew. Run by a laid back young man with a ponytail  the shop is visited by all kinds of customers. Join him as he interacts with anyone from a book-loving regular  a high school girl growing into adulthood  a man looking to simply get rid of some books  and a widow selling her late husband's collection. A gem of a slice of life story for all lovers of books and those whose lives have been changed forever by their encounters with books. ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [KADOCOMI](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_006231_S?episodeType=comics)

From Nyan-Nyan Rampage:      "The final arc of the story begins…      When Takao Osugi receives the mysterious "Universe of the Four Gods" book from his mentor  Einosuke Okuda  he does everything to keep it away from his young daughter  Suzuno. But when disaster strikes Tokyo  can he still protect her from her fate?      Shortly after the tragic finale of Genbu Kaiden  young Suzuno Osugi's tale as the Priestess of Byakko beings to unfold!"

Suzuki Ryuuto is an introverted  timid college student. Every day he puts on a fake smile  trying his best to blend into a group of outgoing students even despite cruel teasing about his virginity.      But one day  he comes to a drinking party where he meets a beautiful girl  Kokoa. Per her request  he starts to pretend to be her boyfriend to ward off the stalker who is harassing Kokoa.      That tender love was the beginning of a tragedy…

title_en: Isekai Shachou - Maou Gun de Nariagaru!
description: The president of a board game company suddenly finds himself transported to another world!? And the place he ends up in? A monster-infested land with no humans in sight… It’s an isekai story — but there’s no cheat ability at all! His only weapons are the management skills and business experience he built up in the real world!! To find a way back home  he starts from the very bottom of a strangely corporate-structured Demon Lord’s Army— and sets his sights on becoming the Demon Lord himself to defeat the Hero!?  (Humbly provided by ChatGPT(free btw))

title_en: The Advanced Player of the Tutorial Tower
description: After being trapped for 12 years in a tower full of regenerating monsters  Hyeonu Kim is more powerful than just about any human or monster on Earth. Now that he’s free  he’s determined to find out who was behind his imprisonment  even if that means he has to kill hordes of monsters -- and inadvertently save the world -- along the way.

*Reads from left to right.*  A collection of poem manga and full color manga filled with warmth and childhood innocence.  Includes: - **Rosebud Rosie**: A precocious little girl named Rosie finds a kindred spirit in Paco  a boy from the circus. A short serial that was one of the launch titles in *Lyrica*. - **The Bright Gray House**: A girl reflects on herself  her neighborhood  and her home in the period where two-story homes were only just beginning to become widespread in this full color poem manga. - **The Child in the Box**: A full-color picture book (ehon) manga on a little boy who isolates himself from others. - **My Neighbor Ippei-kun**: The daily life of a little boy named Ippei and his family. - **The Light in August**: A short poem manga about a girl and a game of hide-and-seek she played when she was younger. - **Etchings of the Seasons**: Two-page poem manga by Kimura that cover various subjects  often reflective and contemplative.

title_en: Elf Dorei to Kizuku Dungeon Harem - Isekai de Netotte Nakama o Fuyashimasu
description: Mars  a boy who was reincarnated in another world  travels with the Elf slave  Lilia. His goal is to conquer the world's main dungeon and obtain a "forbidden magic book" that has powers beyond common sense. But... since he fucked with Lilia every day  his conquests tended to be delayed.

In this world  Magical Girls are the only ones who can fight the "monsters " the invaders from another realm. They must be courageous  inspire hope in people  and above all  they must never be defeated! However  some girls crumble under this heavy responsibility and lose to the monsters  tarnishing the name of Magical Girls. In the courtroom of the "Defeat Trial " their disgrace is exposed  and they face severe punishment. To save these unfortunate girls  the rookie magical lawyer  Misago Yuuri  rushes to their aid!

2012 manga running in Comic Meteor.      Crest of the Stars follow Jinto Lynn  a young count whose world is taken over by the space-dwelling race of the Abh. When Jinto was a young boy  his father  Rock Lynn  under threat of invasion  handed over their world  Martine  to the Abh in exchange for a position within Abh society. Young Jinto is sent off to school to learn the ways of Abh nobility and the story of Crest of the Stars picks up as he meets the young Abh princess  Lafiel as they are about to travel to military school for Jinto's further training.      However  in the midst of their travels  Lafiel and Jinto (along with the Abh ship Gothlauth  a.k.a. Gosroth) find themselves at the very beginnings of a war between the Abh Empire and the Four Nations Alliance of humankind—an anti-Abh alliance of the democratic nations of the United Mankind  the Federation of Hania  the Republic of Greater Alcont  and the People's Sovereign Union of Planets.

title_en: My Co-worker Is an Eldritch X!
description: An Eldritch being disguises itself as a convenience store worker to understand the meaning of life.

title_en: Secretly More Powerful than the Hero
description: From a young age  I've always dreamed of being that “unassuming hero ” appearing ordinary but possessing unmatched strength. But one day  fate took a turn when I was hit by an eight-ton truck  and suddenly  reincarnation was on the table!   "What would you like to be in your next life?" asked the goddess of reincarnation. Eagerly  I replied  "I wish to become a wimp  but secretly OP!”  She granted my wish  but with an unexpected twist: if anyone ever uncovers my true abilities  my heart will explode!   This isn't quite the “secretly-OP-wimp-life” I had in mind…

Trepanation is the procedure of drilling a hole in the skull. It is said to increase the blood circulation and improve pressure inside the skull. It is also said to bring out a person's sixth sense  the ability to use ESP  see ghosts  move objects with one's mind. This is speculative fiction based on the concept of trepanation.

Meet Eikichi Onizuka  a 22-year-old ex-biker. He's crude  foul-mouthed  and has a split-second temper. His unlikely goal: to be the Greatest High School Teacher in the World! Of course  the only reason he wants to be a teacher is so he can try to score with the hot students…   Before he can become a full instructor  he's got to work as a student teacher to earn his credentials. Onizuka may think he's the toughest guy on campus  but when he meets his class full of bullies  blackmailers  and scheming sadists  he'll have to prove it.      --- - **Won the 22nd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen**

tags: Monsters|Action|Demons|Ghosts|Long Strip|Comedy|Adventure|Self-Published|Magic|Fantasy|Monster Girls|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Supernatural|Full Color
description: Do you ever find yourself in need of unicorn horns  dragon scales  goblin boogers  or any other object once possessed by a magical creature? Then you have come to the right place. Dealing with magical creatures can be dangerous business for the average human.
