That's why at Owl-Light Bridge  we track down magical creatures and collect what you need from them so you don't have to (humanely of course)! Welcome to Owl-Light Bridge!

title_en: Apocalypse Bringer Mynoghra: World Conquest Starts with the Civilization of Ruin
description: Bedridden and abandoned  Takuto Ira spent his days in the hospital trying to beat the illness that was slowly killing him. His only solace lay in the nation management strategy game Eternal Nations  where he had built a reputation as the greatest player to ever live.   After succumbing to his disease  Takuto awoke within the game next to Atou — the Hero unit for his favorite civilization  Mynoghra. Now they’ll set out to conquer the world together (again)  one unit  settlement  and level at a time!

title_en: Zatsuyou Fuyo Jutsushi ga Jibun no Saikyou ni Kizuku made
description: Wim Strauss is a "granting caster" - a support mage who can increase the strength of his allies through the power of his spells. It's a useful talent  but since it can't be used directly in battle  it gets zero respect from the other members of his party. As far as they're concerned  support magic is dead weight. It isn't long before they toss him out on his ear  leaving Wim to wonder if his career as an adventurer is over. Luckily for Wim  he has one big chance: His childhood friend Heidemarie is able to get him an audition with her elite A-rank party  Nachtlibelle. The two of them know his magic is good for more than just menial backup  but now he'll have to prove it. It's time to show the world that support mages can do more than just stand on the back lines!

The protagonist is Shiraishi Atoi  who hasn't been able to communicate well with others and hasn't made any friends. After entering high school  he enters a special class at a rural school. But instead of being a normal class  it's full of unusual classmates. A story full of fluff!

tags: Demons|Romance|Comedy|Sexual Violence|Harem|Drama|School Life|Vampires|Monster Girls|Slice of Life|Supernatural
description: One day  Takafumi Ayanokoji  an ordinary high school boy  is warned by a suspicious fortune teller that he is in trouble with women. Immediately after that  along with heavy rain and lightning  a beautiful girl with blonde hair and red eyes appeared. The girl follows Takafumi to his house and says she wants to keep him as a pet  but...!?

title_en: Boukensha ni Narenakatta Ore  Skill [Oppai Kyousei] de Nayameru Anoko wo Hitotasuke!?
description: More than ten years have passed since dungeons suddenly appeared on Earth. In a world where people with excellent skills play an active role as adventurers  the skill that high school student Takeshi Miyamoto has discovered is... "Breast Correction"!? Takeshi is confused by the unique skill he has never seen or heard of. But there seems to be a surprising number of girls who need it...? ___ **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66639)

A shy schoolgirl decides that today is going to be her 'Miniskirt Debut'  because miniskirts are all the rage at school and her friend decided to wear one.  Can she make it to school without dying of embarrassment?

title_en: Yamu ni Yamarenu! ~Tensei Kenja no Heion(?) na Nichijou~
description: After losing his life because of his own womanizing badness  the reincarnated former Great Sage Akiba Kenji contracts with the Great Demon Gremory in order to become the Great Sage once again  but that contract provides the opportunity for his MAX-level yandere followers  who continued loving him even after losing him  to find him  and they won't let him get away......!? All heroines confirmed yanderes!

title_en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 7 - Steel Ball Run
description: In the American Old West  the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end  contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions  traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.      The youthful Johnny Joestar  a crippled former horse racer  has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli  a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power  compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action  Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs  allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls  Johnny decides to compete in the race  and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.

title_en: THE iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls - Daremasu Battle Royale (Doujinshi)
description: 30 popular idols from The Idolmaster Cinderella Girls are gathered on a remote island by a mysterious management. They must survive and fight each other in order to survive and escape from the island.

The king who came out and claimed the world with only two fists!  ---  - [Original Webtoon <RidiBooks>](https://ridibooks.com/books/845010758)  - [Original Webtoon <MComics>](https://www.mcomics.co.kr/contents?idx=2003)  - [Original Webtoon <Mootoon>](https://www.mootoon.co.kr/comic/moo_list.mg?tcode=trfo)  - [Original Webtoon <Toomics>](https://www.toomics.com/webtoon/episode/toon/4652)  - [Original Webtoon <Comico>](https://www.comico.kr/comic/3522)  - [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/comic/C000049465)  - [Original Webtoon <Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/invincibility_fist)  - [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=48475105)  - [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=2319214)  ---  - [Original e-Book <RidiBooks>](https://ridibooks.com/books/845009465)  - [Original e-Book <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/comic/se_0058)  - [Original e-Book <Aladin>](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=104104824)  - [Original e-Book <Yes24>](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/93592312)
Follows two girls born in Japan during a civil war. Shimon Hanazawa is a woman who participates in her school's "volunteer activities " and Momoko Takasaka is her classmate and instructor.

title_en: Guild no Uketsukejou Desu ga  Zangyou wa Iya Nanode Boss wo Solo Toubatsu Shiyou to Omoimasu
description: "It's safe because it's a desk job  super stable because it's public work!"  Alina Clover thought being a receptionist for the Adventurers Guild would be her ticket to the good life... but her dream gig turns into an overtime nightmare whenever adventurers get stuck clearing a dungeon. To save herself from paperwork  Alina turns to the simplest solution at hand — beating down the monsters herself! A mysterious adventurer showing up out of nowhere  soloing the boss  then disappearing without taking credit is bound to create rumors  and Alina's treasured job forbids side hustles. So there might be trouble when the leader of the Silver Sword party discovers her secret...!

title_en: Kyoto-ben na no ni Shoujiki Sugiru Onna

description: The development of a gentle  warm relationship between a bookstore owner and a high school student.

In the room of Hagino (university student)  there is a ghost (?) of a man who was supposed to have died in an accident. That is Enomoto. Enomoto is the best friend of a senior student whom Hagino has a crush on  and is a bold man with a mean look in his eyes. Like the Grim Reaper  Enomoto declares  "If I can take my best friend's life within 49 days  I can come back to life in his place." A BL story of secret nemeses between an egocentric freeloader and a doggy-like landlord!

title_en: Katainaka no Ossan  Kensei ni Naru ~Tada no Inaka no Kenjutsu Shihan Datta noni  Taisei Shita Deshi-tachi ga Ore wo Hottekurenai Ken~
description: Middle-aged Beryl Gardinant has only ever accomplished one thing: running a humble sword-fighting dojo in the quiet countryside.   But when he’s paid a visit by his former pupil  Allusia  he discovers that she has become an elite commander — and she’s hardly the only ex-student who’s a renowned warrior!   Now forced by Allusia to become a special instructor to the strongest order of knights in the kingdom  can Beryl reach his full potential even though he’s an old man? ___ **Additional Links:** - **Official English Light Novel:** [J-Novel Club](https://j-novel.club/series/from-old-country-bumpkin-to-master-swordsman-my-hotshot-disciples-are-all-grown-up-now-and-they-won-t-leave-me-alone)

Baki is bored. After the conclusion of the epic battle between father and son  he continues to fight in the underground arena and train nonstop  but he always has to suppress his yawn caused by the overbearing boredom. No amount of stimulus or danger can bring excitement to him at this point.      Now  with the inclusion of the Prime Minister of Japan in the loop  a massive cloning project is attempting to clone Miyamoto Musashi  one of the fathers of martial arts in Japan. Another fight of historical proportions awaits Baki!      Link:   [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18746) (OAV)

Cursed to take the life of anything she touches  the only cure to Bella’s ailment is an act of ‘true love’. However  shunned by the town  the ‘Poisonous Witch’ spends her days living alone in the forest. That was until one fateful day when she meets an unsuccessful painter named Anna…  A oneshot published on Ciao Plus in October 2024.  Compiled into an anthology with "Ouji-chan no Suki na Hito" and "Ningyo Hime" in 2025.

title_en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Dai 4-shou—Seiiki to Gouyoku no Majo
description: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin  and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup  but new turmoil awaits them...

title_en: Mainichi Ie ni Kuru Gal ga Kyorikan Zero Demo Yasashiku nai
description: Class queen Manami Fuwa has been gaining weight lately. To make matters worse  a rival girl is taunting her in class  calling her a "kin-nikuman" (golden meat bun). When Taichi Utsuki can't contain his thoughts about her weight  he's forced to accompany Fuwa on her diet!

title_en: Gacha wo Mawashite Nakama wo Fuyasu Saikyou no Bishoujo Gundan wo Tsukuriagero
description: For some reason  he was invited to another world after he rolled the gacha like he usually does. The gacha from the social game is available in his trusted smartphone. It was a convenient and cheat tool that can give out equipment and beautiful girl characters. He now aims to create the world's strongest army of beautiful girls in another world.

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Girls' Love|Drama|School Life|Delinquents|Slice of Life|Full Color|Gyaru

description: Yugoslavia during World War II. Fierce battles between the Germans and partisans were undeniably drawing people into the fray. What is a country  a people  a human being? A war tale that vividly brings ideals and reality  love and hatred to life!   Krillo and Phee are living a peaceful life while attending school  even though they hear some disturbing stories. One day  however  the Nazis invade their village  and their lives change drastically.   The village is burned to the ground  and Krillo and Phee are sent to a guerrilla organization and a concentration camp  respectively. What will be their fate..?  (from ebookjapan)

In the year 20XX  reports start coming in about psychics appearing throughout the countryside of rural Serbia in the former Yugoslavia.  The government creates a law to punish those who use their powers  which manages to keep the peace - at least  on the surface.  Ten years later...  Cyzki  a boy who has moved to Belgrade  the capital of Serbia  has just run away from home. Abandoned for four years after the construction was halted  he wanders into the abandoned Belgrade Metro. However  it is a hangout for people with abilities who have no time to spare.  Due to the "hunt for Psychics" started by the Golden Dawn  a large corporation that controls Belgrade  he was placed in a difficult situation.  Furthermore  Cyzki meets Mariya  the daughter of Golden Dawn  and falls in love with her at first sight. In an attempt to get close to her extreme male chauvinist ideology  he ends up dressing as a woman in order to get close to her. As he pursues the mystery of the psychics  the more involved he gets into her life  the more ambitious our hero becomes.  Adaptation of [Children of Belgrade Metro](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1355500/_/)

Otakura is a high school boy who's clearly an otaku  and Narumi is a high school gal. Normally  these two polar opposites would never cross paths  even at school. But by a strange coincidence  it turns out Otakura is able to use his inherently handy nature to help out Narumi with her own hobby-related requests  one after another?

title_en: Rezu ga nonke ni horeta jiten de makeikusadatta noda
I Became the Daughter of the Ghost Duke
description: Theresia Oblene  eight years old.  As her dead mother’s things which she left were taken hostage  she was threatened by her wicked biological father and was forced to be adopted by the Ghost Duke family.  “But he only told me to go to be adopted  right? He didn’t tell me not to have this adoption undone  did he?”  Now that it has become like this  I’ll leave my name behind as the fastest child to get a dissolution of adoption in the history of the Empire.  ===  An heir’s duty? What’s that? Is it something to be eaten?  It was my plan to become a lout and get kicked out on purpose.  Until I met the Ghost Duke who was cursed.  [Let me do this kind of thing as a parent  Terry.]  [I will become the Miss’ wooden horse!]  [Thank you  Miss!]  The Duke is too kind  and the employees are too sweet.  If so… then change of plans!  I decided to raise the Duke Family which is doomed  and buy the whole Viscount family.  Shouldn’t I use the ability to see ghosts at times like this?  But…  [Hey  you. If you keep pretending not to know… I will tell the ghosts of the mansion that you can see ghosts.]  My ability was found out by some ghost possessing a teddy bear.  Will… I be able to survive here safely?

Yanagida Ryuunosuke suffers from a complex... He just can't look girls in the eye! It makes him extremely nervous and his face turns bright red every time. One night  by sheer chance  he sees his neighbor through the window... And she's masturbating!?  That neighbor is Sasaki Ami  his classmate and one of the most popular girls at school... with a peculiar condition she can't tell anyone about. As the two come to share each other's secrets  they form a strange but special bond... This condition is going to make their school lives truly unique!
Cute girls doing risky forex trading.

title_en: Listener ni Damasarete Dungeon no Sai Kasou kara Dasshutsu RTA suru Koto ni Natta
description: A dungeon explorer  or dungeon tuber  is a person who explores dungeons while streaming. On his first day of broadcasting  a rookie dungeon tuber  Sekai Kotoba  is accidentally transported to the lowest level of the dungeon  which he has not yet explored. The bottom level is a sea of lava  and he is suddenly doomed!  He is level 2  his skills are non-combat related  and he has no knowledge of dungeons. The only people he can rely on are the listeners on the feed! Aim for the upper levels by relying on the comments!

title_en: Kirawaremono no Akuyaku Reisoku ni Tensei shita no ni  Naze ka Mawari ga Hanatte Oite Kurenai
description: A modern Japanese office worker suddenly dies and finds himself reincarnated into a game world... as the ugly  pushover son of a villain  Klaus Muller!   Realizing that if he plays out the game as it is in the original  he will be condemned and executed by the hero  he begins to take action to avoid the catastrophic ending. Klaus puts in a lot of effort and gains the trust of those around him  including the heroine and his family. In the midst of all this  he unintentionally makes a big impact and attracts attention...!?

As the son of retired Japanese national team ace Shishiya Kei  Shishiya Gaku was the ace of his middle school club team  but he wondered if he was suited to be an attacker. One day  Kei came to watch Gaku practice and met Noboru  who had exceptional talent as an attacker  and declared that he would make him the best volleyball player in Japan. The father-son relationship ended. Gaku vowed to prove his own limits as an attacker and beat his father and Noboru with the volleyball style he had pioneered.

Machiavelli and Gerrard are just one of the many names the new professor of Ceoren Academy uses to disguise his identity - and now he can add one more to his list  Professor Ludger Cherish.   The real Ludger Cherish dies on board a train during a terrorist attack  making him the perfect target for a new identity. Little does the new professor know  Ludger Cherish was involved in something deep and secret.   The new Professor Ludger has to be careful to not get caught by the school and the dangerous secret society.

Since the last eruption of Mount Fuji  the nights of Japan  and this city  have completely changed... Some of the humans who were covered in volcanic ash became like vampires with incredible powers  and then began an era of killing and blood washing blood! Among those who have reached the height and dictate the rules of the World  Domino  the young woman who came to ruins  climbs her way to the top!

title_en: Bungou Stray Dogs - Tantei-sha Setsuritsu Hiwa?
description: Over a decade before the events of the manga series  a chance encounter leads professional bodyguard Yukichi Fukuzawa to begrudgingly take an arrogant boy genius named Ranpo Edogawa under his wing. Their first job brings them to a local theater on high alert after receiving a bizarre death threat — a challenge that will require both Ranpo's brains and Fukuzawa's experience. The aftermath spurs Fukuzawa to establish the Armed Detective Agency  an organization that takes on dangerous jobs even the police won't handle!

The Civil War continues to wage on the island nation of Alistria.  The Waldrons lead a small arms shop on this island when they receive a large rifle order from the army.  However  this turns out to be a ploy by the colonel who made the order.  He uses his ties to the rebel army to have them ransack the shop.  Having her husband killed  her daughter taken away and her own left eye lost   Sophia Waldron decides to take the only remaining sniper rifle and sets out for revenge!

title_en: Makemasen kara to Iiharu Kao no Ii Onnanoko wo  Zenryoku de Kuppuku Saseru Yuri no Ohanashi
description: The Hyper Onee-sama  forged by hard work vs. The Flawless  Natural-Born Beauty! Who will be the one to... submit first!?Kureha Sara is the reigning "Super Onee-sama" of an elite ladies' academy  a position she's earned through nothing but relentless effort. Her status is suddenly challenged by Mareshino Rui  an effortlessly perfect beauty who proposes a secret contest to determine who is truly fit to get on top.With the school-wide popularity poll just two months away  they need a way to settle the score  just the two of them. Rui's method is... quite unexpected."So  that's why... you're going to be my girlfriend.""Huh...?"The rules of their new relationship are simple: the first one to make the other completely submit proves she is worthy of ruling the school! And so begins a secret war of seduction  with each girl launching an all-out offensive to make the other fall for them first. In this heated battle  whose heart—and body—will be the first to surrender? And who will be the one to conquer them? Prepare to be dominated by this romantic comedy showdown between two pretty girls!

title_en: Yarinaoshi Kizoku no Seinjinka Level Up
description: One winter day  Selim succumbed to the Devil's Temptation and transformed into a Demon. Before being killed by the Hero  he slaughtered the people of the Royal Capital and the nobles  and pulled the trigger for the devils to invade the Kingdom. After Selim's death  the devils overthrew the Royal Capital and destroyed the Kingdom. Selim  who was trapped by the devil and watched the Kingdom fall  somehow found himself returning to his 14-year-old self. A message written on a transparent panel floats in front of him.  "You have become a seeker. By doing the right things and accumulating virtues  your level will increase."

Since he was a child  Yukishiro Ibuki has always had a complex of getting red-faced whenever someone gets close to him. But thanks to his efforts  he successfully creates a persona of being the "aloof student council president"! His high school life is smooth-sailing... until his childhood friend Kagachi Rin  who knows his past  transfers into his school! Ibuki is wary of Rin's assertive advances  but...?  This is the start of an electrifying "special training" with his childhood friend who gets too close.

title_en: Tsuma no Kigen de Tenkou ga Kawaru Hanashi
description: Cloudy couple love comedy between the god of thunder and a human being.

title_en: Tobioriyou to Shiteiru Joshikousei wo Tasuketara Dou Naru no Ka?
description: Yusuke Yuki  who has spent his entire high school life studying and working part-time in order to keep his special student tuition exemption  finds himself desperately desiring a girlfriend. On his way home  he looks up and accidentally sees a girl attempting to jump off the roof of an abandoned building. A strange encounter leads to a new way of life and a love story with the mysterious girl named Kotori Hatsushiro.

In Confucian Era 14276  a violent showdown unfolds in the space surrounding Planet Lagra. And with that  the story begins. Unfolding on Earth and in far-off galaxies  in the past  the future  and across dimensions  the curtain has risen on the final war between light and darkness. A great  galactic epic spanning the author’s career begins here!      Kyomu Senki is made up mainly of four series: “The Tiger of 5000 Light Years” serialized in 1980-82. “Kyomu Senshi Miroku” and “Jaki-oh Bakuretsu”  both of which started serialization in 1987  just a few months apart. Lastly  “Skull Killer Jaki-oh”  a mech series set in the 20th century that originally started in 1990.      Along with the four main series  it also includes four short stories: “New Rashoumon”  “Ninja Arts at Honnou Temple: The Black Magic of Koji Kashin”  “The Strange Living Dimension  Dogura”  and “The Dogura War Chronicles”.

The National Police Agency Security Bureau has a secret organization known as the Next Generation Crime Information Center. Their job is to stop the murders by using a certain girl’s precognitive “dreams” before they actually happen! Written by the same author as Shinrei Tantei Yakumo.      Adapted from a novel.

title_en: Oni Ure Idol ga Kyou mo Watashi wo Oshitekuru
description: Unpopular underground idol and actress  Enatsu Sayuki  faces her work diligently everyday to achieve her dreams of making it big in the world of acting. But  for some reason  the superstar idol Touma Sera – who should be her rival – becomes her biggest fan! Adorable enough to make Sayuki jealous  Sera takes every chance to passionately declare her love  throwing Sayuki’s life into chaos. Will Sayuki be able to achieve her dreams? And what will become of the one-sided love(?) between Sera and Sayuki...!?

title_en: A World of Gold to You
description: Once upon a time  the world had been divided into the Moon Kingdom  inhabited by humans  and the Sun Kingdom  inhabited by demons. Estelle  a knight of the Moon Kingdom  loses her family to an ambush from the demons and is sentenced to life in exile after becoming entangled with a mysterious demon child. To survive  she sets out to a mysterious tower in the north with her companions. A timid knight  a slave boy  and a shadow who was once the Demon King.  This is an alluring story about three people embarking on an adventure to find their true selves.

title_en: Ochikobore Taimashi wa Isekai Kaeri de Saikyou to naru
description: Hoshimori Maya is a young exorcist deemed a failure and mocked by those around him. Through god's guidance  he travels to another world  joins the hero party  and together  they fulfill their duty of defeating the Demon King before he returned to the current day. However  the one waiting for him was man burning for vengeance  a new battle.

title_en: Mitsuya Sensei no Keikakuteki na Edzuke
description: "This pounding in my chest is more than just admiration!?" Tomoya Ishida is a newbie editor at fashion magazine Sophia Monthly. After his senior's sudden hospitalization  he's hastily assigned to collect a column manuscript from the famous culinary researcher Ayumu Mitsuya. He pays him a visit soon after  and to his surprise  finds an affable  older man who speaks in a Kyoto dialect. Being asked to wait  Tomoya is served a simple dish that entices his stomach  and soon he finds himself eagerly awaiting their next encounter!

title_en: Ore ga Isekai no Goshujinsama!? ~Daredemo "Ore no Senzoku Maid" ni Suru Skill wo Te ni Ireta Ken~
description: Exhausted from working at a black company  the protagonist longed for a peaceful life and is reincarnated into another world. But the one overseeing reincarnation was a strange goddess who loved maids.

title_en: Class no Daikirai na Joshi to Kekkon Suru Koto ni Natta.
description: High school student Hojo Saito married his classmate  Sakuramori Akane  the girl who's his worst enemy in school.  "If you tell the rest of the class we’re married  I'll kill you." "I don't want them to know either. There’s no point in that."  Their newlywed life wasn't going so well  and they were constantly at odds. However  as they progress through their daily lives  the distance between them closes  they have more enjoyable moments together  and they gradually come to understand one another. Saito learns about Akane's cute side  which he never saw before  and Akane gradually began to recognize the feelings that she’s been keeping inside...

A dream-like story between a king and his subjects.  One night the oracle Legna dreamed of a voice that shouted "Die!"  Thus  he began to search for the owner of that voice.  To protect the beloved young king  the oracle begins to investigate in private.  --- Legna  one of the last members of a dying-out clan of dream-seers known as 'Oracles'  serves as a courtier of the childlike and (apparently) well-loved king of his country.  One night  he has a prophetic dream of impending danger towards His Majesty - but is unable to discern the source of the threat. Determined to protect the young royal  Legna then begins an investigation which takes him deep into the realm where dreams and political conspiracies intertwine...

Based on the original Digimon V-pets  V-Tamer certainly brings a whole new twist on the world of Digimon. It opens with Taichi  the main character of the series  attempting to enter a tournment with his V-pet  only to be disqualified because the monster on his V-pet cannot be identified and therefore was not a Digimon that was supposed to be programmed into the V-pet.       A short time later  Taichi finds himself in the Digital World and meets up with his Digimon  Zeromaru  or just Zero for short. Zero is a V-dramon (Veedramon)  and between himself and Taichi  they have a battle record of 100%. For this reason  the two of them were chosen by Holy Angemon to save the Digital World from the supreme evil  Arca Demon. With the help of their guide  Gabo  Taichi and Zero set off to defend the Digital World from Arca Demon.

tags: Long Strip|Comedy|Boys' Love|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Unlikely love of a bully & a bookworm. After returning to school following a suspension for fighting  Thomas's classmates are fearful of him. When Zachary finds him crying alone  Thomas makes him swear to tell no one. Zachary  an A+ student  begins tutoring Thomas... until Thomas realizes the one he fought with was Zachary's brother.

title_en: Maou Toubatsu Shita Ato  Medachitakunai node Guild Master ni Natta
description: The Kingdom of Albein was blessed with the appearance of the Miracle children  individuals with the greatest talents ever seen. Despite being around ten years old  with abilities many times stronger than the average adventurer  they managed to reach a strength score exceeding 100 000 points  granting them the adventurer grade SSS. With a mere party of five persons  they defeated the Demon Lord regaining the kingdom's peace.      After that journey  Dick Silver  the most balanced between them  racked his brain to not draw public attention. In the end  he decided to become the guild master of a suburban guild as a reward  becoming its twelfth successor. After five years he reached his aim and then became a regular of his own guild's bar. But one day  as he was drinking at the bar as always  the daughter of a certain aristocrat came to pay him a visit.

The story of Shin Devilman is supposed to take place between the second and third volume of the original Devilman series. Here we have Akira and Ryo who mysteriously manage to travel in time. Where they discover the have been sent back to dispatch demons that are invading history to end humanity. They visit several time periods including pre-World War Vienna  ancient Greece  France during the Hundred Years' War  Rococo period France  and wild west America. The end of this series also includes a new epilogue for the Devilman series.  * *NOTE: The US official release of Devilman is based on a version that has both the main Devilman manga and Shin Devilman.*

Towa has a big complex towards her brother. One day she meets Miyatake  a friend of her brother and her first impression is not at all positive and on the contrary  she is annoyed by the boy; however  every time she has a problem Miyatake appears and stands by her. Will his sweetness be able to reach her?

title_en: Classmate no Moto Idol ga  Tonikaku Kyodou Fushin Nan desu
description: Saegusa  who retired from idolry when she went to high school  is good-looking and intelligent. She is always cheerful and friendly  and is the most popular person at school. Takuya  however  knows a certain side of the highbrow Miss Saegusa. Today  too  a suspicious-looking woman in a dubious disguise appears at the convenience store where he works part-time. She is  in all likelihood  that Saegusa-san...?

In the year 200X  a Japanese fleet consisting of 3 vessels leave on a mission to South America. After encountering a storm  the ship JDS Mirai find itself without its escorts and in the year 1942  traveling towards the island of Midway to face the American fleet in one of largest battles in naval history. The crew of the Mirai must decide whether or not to change the course of history by involving itself in WWII.    ---   - **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2002**      Published in Indonesia by Level Comics.
The Steam Dragon Express is a magical flying academy

title_en: Inaho-kun wa Nise Kanojo no Hazu na no ni
description: Mori Shintaro  a new first-year student  yearns for the sparkling high school life of having a girlfriend and experiencing youth  but is ridiculed by those around him. His classmate  Inaho Sawatari  entered the school as the top student and is a highly regarded beauty. The two are not supposed to cross paths  but after an incident where they are mistaken for a couple  Inaho makes an unexpected proposal: "Shall we pretend that we're really dating?"  --- **Notes:** - The pre-serialization series is [Houkago no Cinderella-kun](https://mangadex.org/title/147b8fd6-5232-45df-993f-35c908cf41a2/houkago-no-cinderella-kun).

title_en: Isekai ni Otosareta... Jouka wa Kihon!
description: One day  a dull young man from Japan gets caught up in a heroic summoning and goes to another world. The next time he wakes up  he's not in a castle with a king  but in a deep forest since the summoning failed! You'd think he'd be at a loss  but he starts living a life of survival with a positive attitude that doesn't involve deep thought! Then  before he knows it  he saves the cursed forest and magical beasts one after another with his magical powers  and is befriended by wolves and dogs in a healing paradise! However  he doesn't realize that they are actually legendary demonic beasts and spirits at all. What's more  that they are adored! ___ [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/flung-into-a-new-world-time-to-lift-the-200-year-curse) [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0223eu/) (Japanese)

tags: Action|Long Strip|Martial Arts|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Full Color
description: While Im Sejun settles things with his fists  his best friend  Hajin Seo  eats and breathes grappling. Together  they fend off bullies on their school campus  but everything changes after a fight that sets Sejun on a mission to hold those responsible accountable for their crimes.   What began as a schoolroom brawl quickly turns into a fight for justice and truth as Sejun hits the streets looking for any leads as to what happened on that fateful day.

A high school girl  Shiho Ozaki  whose tail grows back every day. Invited by her  a senior who visits the PE storage room almost daily finds himself at her mercy  with her tail  her ears  and whatever else she decides to do.

Winner of the 2014 Bookstore Award and the Yoshikawa Eiji Literary Newcomer Award  this blockbuster historical novel has captivated over 1 million readers and is now fully adapted into a manga!  The enemy? The legendary warlord of the Sengoku period  Oda Nobunaga! What destiny awaits the courageous pirate princess who boldly stands against him?  Set in the turbulent Sengoku era  after the chaos of the Ōnin War  the Ashikaga shogunate's power has crumbled. Across Japan  formidable warlords are emerging  each declaring their ambitions in this age of conflict. But did you know there was a woman who dared to challenge the unstoppable forces of Oda Nobunaga  leaving his armies astounded?  Rooted in historical events  this story delivers heart-pounding battles and more! Follow the journey of a striking warrior princess and her encounters with powerful  charismatic heroes. Experience the ultimate Sengoku entertainment!

It's been 10 years since the hugely successful *Insect Princess* was born. Is Kikuko back!? *Insect Princess* has been given significant revisions and is now back in this *Complete Edition*! A terrifying  violent horror that depicts everyday life as it is corroded by evil and swallowed by death!  **Note:** This new version sets things up for [the sequel](https://mangadex.org/title/e94fafaf-2390-4162-8c41-6dd7c4eef978).

On Christmas Eve night  Meiko  a female college student  planned to spend a peaceful evening alone on the island. However  when she woke up  a corpse was lying in front of her. From that moment  she was faced with a series of grueling trials unlike anything she had ever experienced before. To reunite with her parents  whom she parted with in an unfortunate way  she must survive—even in this twisted world.

The world's misfortunes never cease. In the river of forgetfulness  the flowers and leaves have the same root but never see each other as messengers  can she unlock the secrets of each soul to free them?

Rui  an unremarkable high school student  somehow ends up with Miya  a stunning beauty admired by the entire school  as his girlfriend. However  just then  his childhood friend Ayana  with whom he had grown distant  reappears and starts to shake things up for him.

The presence of 'it' can be felt everywhere. Kanata  a woman who lost her sense of fear after a certain incident  searches for moments that freeze her heart as she follows the traces of 'it'...!? In parks  on emergency staircases  and in the cracks between walls  people who accidentally draw close to the presence of 'it' experience indescribable terror  leaving their everyday lives irreparably changed. After all  ghosts really are the scariest...

The martial arts master Chu Wenshan has lost his memories  but the only clue to finding out about himself is a threatening letter… Huh? My brother was kidnapped? Wait  who’s my brother? No  even if I don’t know  I have to rescue him. Excuse me my friend  have you seen my brother?

title_en: Dare ga Yuusha wo Koroshita ka
description: Four years have passed since the Demon King's defeat. To honor the deceased Hero  the now-at-peace Kingdom launches a project to compile his many achievements. The Hero's former companions  the Sword Saint Leon  the Saintess Maria  and the Great Sage Solon  are interviewed. All of them are unclear about the truth behind the Hero's death. Why did the Hero die? Was it the Demon King who killed him  or his companions? ___ **Character Designer:** [toi8](https://mangadex.org/author/eef8ef8e-a7f5-48a0-83cb-608a09790a37)  **Additional Links:** - [Official X](https://x.com/daregayu)

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Sexual Violence|Girls' Love|Drama|Web Comic|Full Color
description: Pah Doyeon  a college student living in an old apartment building  gets used to the thugs coming to her neighbor's door every day. One day  when she sees the thugs trying to break into her neighbor's house  she unwittingly hides her next-door neighbor  Jinju  in her apartment... Looking at Jinju  who is much older than her  Doyeon gradually becomes engulfed in an unknown desire. How will their awkward cohabitation end?

Lyle Walt is a young noble boy and heir looking forward to the day he can inherit his family’s territory. Except around when he was 10 year old  his parents started neglecting him more and more in favour of his little sister  Ceres.  On his fifteenth birthday  he is challenged to a duel by his sister to see who will inherit the household and horribly loses  being cast out of his family. Afterwards  he gets treated by the family groundskeepers and receives the family heirloom Gem from him that Lyle’s grandfather had entrusted to him. From there  he begins an aimless journey with his childhood friend and former fiancée  Novem  and the Gem-turned-Jewel that houses the memories  personalities  and Skills of seven of his ancestors.

Komada is a short high school girl who is constantly troubled with something. Her junior  Kagai  who is big in various ways  is always playing with her and annoying Komada! However  there is a reason why Kagai annoys her  and that is simply because... The more you love someone  the more you want to annoy them!

title_en: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w
description: After I beat a noob in an FPS  he challenged me to a fight in real life!? I decided to go along with it just for fun  but when I got there  a cute girl was waiting for me!

title_en: Isekai wa Neko to Tomo ni
description: Matsumoto Yuu  a systems engineer  was transported to another world along with his pet cat  Orihime. There  he meets Annemarie  an impoverished noblewoman  and decides to help rebuild her territory... Using his programming knowledge and skills  he works hard to restore the land! Moreover  Orihime also gains an incredible power... What will happen next?! The revolutionary fantasy of a development-loving systems engineer begins in grand fashion!

In the year 2031  in which elementary school student Yuma Ashihara participates in a beta test of the world's first full-dive VRMMO-RPG called "Actual Magic (AM)"  only to lose consciousness while playing and wake up in a world where the game and reality have merged. A death game then unfolds in "mixed reality."

Within the winding streets of Kyoto's geisha district lives a 16 year old girl named Kiyo. After failing to become a Maiko  a traditional dance apprentice  she starts working as caterer for her troupe. ___ * **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen Manga**  Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Juru Masak Para Maiko**.

title_en: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury - Vanadis Heart
description: Five years have passed since the "Vanadies Incident" that denied all Gundams. The mobile suit  nicknamed "The Curse " runs across the earth. The first official side story manga of "The Witch of Mercury'' featuring Chika Tojo from "Tanjo Senki''!

Two children unexpectedly meet in the midst of war. After running away from the chaos  they come across a long empty road. With no adults to rely on  the two strangers  now become friends  walk alongside each other to see what's at the end of the road. All they hope is to keep being able to move forward. Just what kind of trials and tragedy awaits them during their journey for survival?     ---  **Links:**   - [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/drama/horizon/list?title_no=2169)   - [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1853/) - [Original Book (Aladin)](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=97911543)   - [Original Book (Yes24)](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/33667823)   - [Original Book (Naver)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.nhn?productNo=4458915)

title_en: Shokuba to Jitaku de Gap no Aru Papa
tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Office Workers|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: This charming  full-color story about a devoted family man began as a popular webcomic!  His colleagues at work see him as handsome  cool  and distant…but the moment he’s back home  this frosty-looking salaryman shows his true colors as a doting father and husband. Playing silly games with his young daughter  showering kisses on his beloved wife – talk about a gap between his appearance and personality! These sweet stories about a wholesome family are sure to warm your heart.

title_en: I Became a First-Class Guide Thanks to My Childhood Friends
tags: Long Strip|Romance|Boys' Love|Reverse Harem|Drama|Fantasy|Web Comic|Supernatural|Full Color
description: [The twin brothers love me too much. What should I do?] D-class guide Qiao Yang  because of a drunken accident  discovered that he could use the two A-class sentinels  his childhood friends Zheng Jia and Zheng Yan  to enhance his own class. In order to retain this rare S-class status  he chose to conceal his exploitation of them. However  during the repeated interaction with the two  he gradually becomes aware of their feelings towards him...

Takasu Ryuuji has learned the hard way that appearances can be deceiving. For despite his inwardly sweet personality  his unintentionally sharp gaze and aggressive features give him the air of a delinquent thug  putting his chances at making new friends  let alone a girlfriend  next to zero.      It's Ryuuji's first day of his second year of high school and it seems as if things are looking up. He gets to sit in between his only friend  Yuusaku  and more importantly  the girl he's secretly crushing on  Kushieda Minori. But just when he thinks the stars are aligned in his favor  he unwittingly crosses the most feared girl in school  Aisaka Taiga  making her into his arch enemy. To top it off  Taiga has moved in right next door to Ryuuji and happens to be Minori's best friend! Can this school year possibly get any worse?!

Park Da-som is a timid high school girl weighed down by bullying and insecurities about her appearance. One day  she discovers the “shell” of the perfect girl  Cha I-seul—someone she’s always admired—and enters it as if under a spell. Although Da-som is briefly enthralled by I-seul’s dazzling life  she soon comes face-to-face with the horrifying truth lurking in that household. Where is I-seul  and what exactly is this “shell”?
A Fate/Grand Order oneshot published in TM Ace 17  featuring Artoria Avalon journeying through the Singularities and Lostbelts.

title_en: Oroka na Tenshi wa Akuma to Odoru
description: Masatora Akutsu has just transferred into class in Japan from a long way away - all the way from Hell  to be exact. Akutsu is a demon who's come to Earth to find someone who can motivate the forces of Hell to fight back against the invading Heavenly army. He immediately sets his sights on one of his classmates  the kind and beautiful Lily Amane  but ends up in way over his head when it turns out Lily has some secrets of her own!

title_en: D-kyuu Boukensha no Ore  Naze ka Yuusha Party ni Kanyuu Sareta Ageku  Oujo ni Tsukimatowareteru
description: If you become a hero and defeat the Demon King  a lazy life awaits you!! That's what Jirey  a young man  believed  and he worked hard day and night  achieving results.   However  when he found out that the role of the hero who defeated the Demon King was a very hard job  he retreated into seclusion. He wished to spend his days in idleness  but the girls Jirey had "unknowingly" saved up until then started to flock to him one after another  trying to win his heart and body...!?
The band Mayonnais has never had an audience at their live shows. So they pray to God for someone to listen to their performance  but who appears before them?

title_en: Osananajimi no Koukousei no Aida ni Nikutai Kankei wa Seiritsu suru ka.
description: The innocent Oota Yuka  the sexually curious Niiyama Kasumi  the elusive Horie Yasuo and the lovesick Onosaka Ryuhei. The four high school boys and girls  who have grown up like a family  are bequeathed a house by an elderly woman  Hasebe Haru  for four million yen and a fixed term. Under one roof  the high school students' eccentric love and friendship unfold.

title_en: Seraph of the End: Vampire Reign
description: One day  a mysterious virus appeared on Earth which killed every infected human over the age of 13. At the same time  vampires emerged from the world's dark recesses and enslaved mankind. Enter Hyakuya Yuuichirou  a young boy  who along with the rest of the children from his orphanage  are treated as livestock by the vampires. Even in captivity  Yuuichirou dreams big. He dreams of killing vampires. He dreams of killing them all.

title_en: TenPuru -No One Can Live on Loneliness-
description: That's right  I'll become a monk! Not knowing what to do with his worldly desires  Akagami Akemitsu aims to live a stoic life. However  the thick karmic blood flowing in him will not permit it!

title_en: "Hitokiri" Shoujo Koushaku Reijou no Goei ni Naru
description: Shurine  a girl raised for the sole purpose of becoming a bodyguard  is framed by the state and branded a "hitokiri."  Following a life on the run  she meets Lutecia  a duke's daughter  aboard a magical train. With Lutecia's life in danger  Shurine offers a solution:  "If you need a bodyguard  why not hire me right now?"

Hyouka Shinonome is Iori Majima's childhood friend. They used to be close  but partway through middle school her attitude changed drastically. The once‑sweet Hyouka became  true to her name  an icy girl who greeted Iori with frosty words whenever they met. Yet when another childhood friend—You Amaya  who boldly pursues Iori—enters the picture  Hyouka's behavior toward Iori also starts to thaw...

Toma Funasaka is offered an unusual recommendation for his next school by his homeroom teacher. The school in question is Toyashihara Academy—a national  full-boarding institution that accepts only students through recommendation  with no general admissions. It also happens to be his teacher’s alma mater.  The low tuition and full-boarding system seemed like the perfect opportunity  so Tōma decides to enroll.  But what awaited him was an academy that defied common sense—a place built atop a vast underground dungeon  ruled by sex and violence.  Though bewildered at first  Toma quickly adapts to the decadent academy life. While indulging in a corrupt and hedonistic youth  he also joins comrades to form a party and challenge the dungeon’s depths!

A comedy about a man who exorcises drunk demons while working a night job in Kabuki Town  a fictional downtown area.  **Note:** The name of the area takes the name of the real place  歌舞伎町 [Kabuki-chou] and replaces the 伎 [ki] for “skill” with the 鬼 [ki] for “demon”. ___ **Additional Links:** - [Official X](https://x.com/kabukionmyoji) - [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2504776)

Having become a managing director  Shima Kōsaku is appointed to be supervisor of Shanghai Hatsushiba. Now the story is brought to a highly competitive marketplace for electronics manufacturers the world over  China. Facing language and cultural barriers and some persisting deeply-rooted anti-Japanese sentiment  Shima Kōsaku keeps up his fight without ever giving up his personal style in this new world.

title_en: Black Snow. White Moon. Eternal Blossom.
description: For what reason  do they continue to live? For what reason  do they continue to eat? They put on the most beautiful masks and commit the cruelest acts. White moon  Black snow  Withered maiden  Eternal blossom. Vicious X Evil  Tyrant X Unhinged  Maiden X Maiden  Hunter X Prey. This is a poem of self-reflection  or a stimulating speech for this numbing world...

title_en: Sekai Saikyou no Assassin  Isekai Kizoku ni Tensei Suru
description: The most dangerous prey... When the most accomplished assassin on Earth meets his end just before retirement  he finds himself standing before a goddess. Her world is headed for disaster  and she has need of his particular set of skills. Armed with powerful new abilities and decades of deadly knowledge  he begins his second life as Lugh  young scion of the Tuatha Dé clan of assassins. His mission: to find and eliminate the strongest individual in this world—the hero!

title_en: Dungeon Busters ~Chuunen Otoko desu ga Niwa ni Dungeon ga Shutsugen shita node Sekai wo Sukuimasu~
description: Ezoe Kazuhiko suddenly finds a mysterious underground space in his yard. When he steps into what turns out to be the very first dungeon in this world  he ends up activating the Dungeon System and learns from the mysterious beauty who appears to him  Akane  that the world is doomed to destruction if the 666 total dungeons that will be appearing in this world are not all cleared within 10 years. As countries begin taking measures in response to the dungeons appearing all over the world  Ezoe seeks out companions together with whom he establishes Dungeon Busters Inc.  a company dedicated to clearing all the dungeons in the world! ___ * [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3255fp/)  (jp) * [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/dungeon-busters)

This world revolves around me.  While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world  Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling  the girl was destined to die  but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.  Her stepmother  fearing Mitsuba's "death " takes away her aristocratic nature and she is enrolled in a military academy. However  this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.  The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

title_en: Guide-yaku no Tenshi wo Naguritaoshitara  Shiryou Jutsushi ni Narimashita ~Gekikawa Goth Loli Majin-sama  Saikou!~
description: After starting the super-high-quality VRMMO "Meltis Online"  Rindou Amane (Rinne) got so annoyed at the guiding angel that she beat her up. Deadlocked? Just when she thought so  an extremely cute gothic lolita evil goddess descended and offered her the hidden profession of "Necromancer"! With a pile of corpses left behind in her wake and servants in tow  she's off to conquer the game as fast as she can!

The fourth year of the Kowa era.  Some time has passed since the last Emperor of the Holy Britannian Empire  Lelouch vi Britannia  was defeated by the unrivaled hero Zero.  The world  which has had a long history of conflict and hatred  has moved towards the future  hand in hand  with dialogue instead of force  with compassion instead of hatred  since the death of the evil Emperor Lelouch  who plotted to conquer the world.  There have been small-scale incidents such as the kidnapping of Zero and Nunnally a few years ago known as the "Confusion in Hashvess"  but these were quickly resolved by the Black Knights and Glinda Knights  under the direction of the United Federation of Nations.  Yes. The world has changed. It has been reborn into a world where peace is the norm  and not conflict.  However...  Even though the world has been reborn into peace  conflict has not been eradicated.  There are those who cannot live without conflict  those who want to gain wealth through conflict  and those who want conflict in the first place.  As long as people live and society is formed by people  conflict will never completely disappear. The unrest happening here in Krygyzstan was one of them.

The popular four-panel comic strips from the official Arknights Twitter account have finally been collected into a book!  In addition to the individual episodes of the 22 operators  the stories "The Great Chief Returns"  "Mansfield Break"  "Under Tides"  and other event comics are also included. This is a must-have book for fans  to help you find the operator who is just right for you!

title_en: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Dai 5-shou—Mizu no Miyako to Eiyuu no Uta
description: The 5th arc of the Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu manga.  Subaru and Emilia receive an invitation to a party from Anastasia and decide to go to Priestella  the city of the watergates.

title_en: S-Kyuu Boukensha ga Ayumu Michi - Tsuihou Sareta Shounen wa Shin no Nouryoku "Buki Master" de Sekai Saikyou ni Itaru
description: Haise is a young boy who has been gifted with an unknown ability. He becomes an adventurer together with his childhood friend Sasha  but is kicked out of the team for being unable to use his ability and being a hindrance. Furthermore  while continuing his solo adventure  he is caught in a trap and falls into dire straits. Just as he is on the brink of death  Haise's ability "Weapon Master" awakens! It is a power that shakes the laws of the world  summoning weapons from another world!?

After rigorously training for three years  the ordinary Saitama has gained immense strength which allows him to take out anyone and anything with just one punch. He decides to put his new skill to good use by becoming a hero. However  he quickly becomes bored with easily defeating monsters  and wants someone to give him a challenge to bring back the spark of being a hero.      Upon bearing witness to Saitama's amazing power  Genos  a cyborg  is determined to become Saitama's apprentice. During this time  Saitama realizes he is neither getting the recognition that he deserves nor known by the people due to him not being a part of the Hero Association. Wanting to boost his reputation  Saitama decides to have Genos register with him  in exchange for taking him in as a pupil. Together  the two begin working their way up toward becoming true heroes  hoping to find strong enemies and earn respect in the process.

title_en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure  Part 7: Steel Ball Run (Official Colored)
description: In the American Old West  the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end  contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions  traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.  The youthful Johnny Joestar  a crippled former horse racer  has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli  a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power  compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action  Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs  allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls  Johnny decides to compete in the race  and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.

"Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life  whether it's making friends  going to school  trying to make money  or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh  her sister Nobue  and her friends Miu  Matsuri  and Ana.

title_en: Zense wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji
description: He was called a Sword Emperor who lived for the sword and died by the sword. And his end was a tragedy.   However  by strange coincidence  he was reincarnated as the third prince in a country. He was enjoying his lazy lifestyle away from swords and heroism. As a consequence  people began referring to him as Prince Trash.  He never cared about his derogatory name until one day  he encounters someone who gets the wheel of fate to move in motion.
10 short humorous stories on each character from the main roster of the Soul Edge game.

Tiny Law is a female soldier belonging to the 12th Company of the 4th Division of the Laos Liberation Army. Born between a Japanese father and a Laotian mother  Tiny is a sniper who is known as a sniper despite being only 17 years old. One day  Muang Loa Air Base  where Tiny and his friends are stationed  is attacked by a helicopter unit of the government army. The base was destroyed  and her brother  who was her only blood relative  was a tragic corpse.  Three Japanese mercenaries  Takaoka  Inomata  and Todo  betrayed the Liberation Army and leaked information to the enemy. The three of them once saved Tiny's life on the battlefield  but they were blinded by the huge rewards from the Japanese yakuza who wanted to develop a drug route with Laos and sold their friends. By order of the Liberation Army Headquarters  Tiny follows the three of her returning home to Japan  which is also her late father's home country. Set in Shinjuku  a fierce battle between a talented sniper girl  yakuza  Chinese mafia.

A new student steps up to the gates of Kuoh Academy junior division. Zekka  a descendant of Miyamoto Musashi  wields the sword-shaped Sacred Gear "Tensei." Her goal? To make friends at Komaou Academy!? A new "DxD" series begins  guided by unique friendships and by Rias and the other high school students!

title_en: Touhou Ibara Kasen ~ Wild and Horned Hermit.
description: In this 10 volume official Touhou series  spanning the time period of nine long years between the UFO and WBaWC games  we follow the misadventures of the business inept shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei and her ever-curious friend Marisa Kirisame  who meet a mysterious  young hermit woman named Ibara Kasen.      Upon seeing how sloppily the Hakurei Shrine conducts its business  she decides to become a regular shrine visitor  determined to lend her near unlimited wisdom to the shrine maiden  in order to make her place a proper Shinto Shrine. Does the nagging  yet well meaning hermit bring nothing but good-will with her advice  or is there something more sinister hiding behind the friendly face and her bandaged arm?

The story revolves around Taira Yunokami a boy in fifth grade that helps his father run a food truck. One day  he meets a famished girl in a park on his way to school. After helping the girl  the city is suddenly attacked by Glutton  an inter-dimensional threat that endangers the world.   Amidst the chaos Sworg  a young member of the Space Administration Bureau Braver saves both Taira and the girl. Sworg has come to Earth to pursue the enigmatic and malevolent Glutton. When fate brings Sworg and Taira together  they'll find themselves unexpectedly thrust into an extraordinary journey through multiple dimensions.

title_en: Yurige no Heroine ni Tensei Shita Ore  Nazeka Are ga Haeta Mama desu
description: "Why do I still have a dick?!" I was reincarnated in a yuri game  but there's something very familiar dangling between my legs... How will I enjoy my school girl (♂) life now?!

title_en: Rascal Does Not Dream of Siscon Idol
description: Sakuta is eager to finally have a chance to spend time with Mai again  but instead  he's greeted by a stranger who looks just like her. Apparently  Adolescence Syndrome is paying Mai another visit and has forced her to swap bodies with Nodoka Toyohama  a flashy up-and-coming idol... who also happens to be Mai's half sister! With no resolution in sight  each sister must pretend to be the other and go about their respective lives as best they can. Trouble is  it seems like Nodoka is preoccupied with something besides walking in Mai's shoes...

title_en: 35-sai Dokushin Yamada  Isekai Mura ni Risou no Second House wo Tsukuritai ~Isekai to Genjitsu no Iitokodori Life~
description: Yamada  who works as an ordinary company employee  goes to visit the family home left behind as an inheritance by his late grandfather  and there he finds a door to another world!! Beyond the door  he meets a talking black cat and a homunculus girl  and as he begins living together with them  he enjoys a cheat magic life in modern Japan and a heartwarming slow life in another world♪

title_en: Boku no Kanojo ga Majime Sugiru Shojo Bitch na Ken
description: When high school student Shinozaki confesses his feelings to the beautiful and aloof class representative  Akiho Kosaka  the last thing he expected was for her to say "yes." Like everything else in her diligent life  Kosaka takes dating quite seriously. In an effort to be a good girlfriend  Kosaka decides to meticulously study (and bluntly suggest) all manner of ways to keep Shinozaki sexually satisfied in the theoretical sense  that is. This innocently lewd relationship is only just the beginning.

Become a Chetamja! Turn your rage into a weapon that defends the kingdom! When young Gwiyeong loses his family in a brutal Jurchen raid  he swears to hunt down every last one of them. His skill in battle soon catches the attention of King Sejong  who offers him a chance to join Chetamja—an elite force of secret agents serving as the king’s eyes and ears in the north. Now  alongside his comrades  Gwiyeong must carry the flame of vengeance and forge it into a blade of duty that will defend the kingdom of Joseon from the shadows.

title_en: Isekai Shounin - Skill <Isekai Tokou> wo Kushi Shite  Yuuyuu Jiteki na Okanemochi Slow Life wo Okurimasu
description: One day  the protagonist Allen  who has been reincarnated from Japan into another world  realizes that his unique skill  Moon Gate  allows him to travel freely between Japan and the other world. With this power  Allen comes up with the idea of traveling between Japan and the other world and making money by selling various items to people from the other world  those who have been transferred  and those who have been reincarnated  who are hungry for entertainment! Before long  he gets to know the daughter of a large company and the princess of a kingdom in the other world  and enjoys the other world to the fullest...!!
**Alt Official Raw:** [X](https://x.com/uminonaka0x0/media) - *Posted with the caption Fushigi na Ikimono o Hirou Ohanashi (不思議な生き物を拾うお話) "A Story About Taking in a Strange Creature"*

One fateful day  a girl time slipped into the Sengoku Era. It was an abrupt enough event to be dubbed god's whim  done to sate hellish boredom. The girl has no power to change the world. She was a very ordinary  common  and plain girl that can be found anywhere. And that girl can do no more than a single thing... Survive the Sengoku Era – that's all. ___ Adapted from [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8406bm/) (Raw)   Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/62898/)   Alternative Manga Raw: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/3714)

Aki Uchiyama  the writer who led the "bishojo" (beautiful girl) and "lolicon boom" in adult magazines  brought the flavor of his works published in adult magazines directly to boys' magazines in this extremely problematic work. Although the story is styled as a science fiction fantasy comedy about a pretty elementary school girl named Tsukasa  who is a test subject for strange inventions. She is made to wear underwear  diapers  and half-naked clothes  not to mention all the tricks she's played on. Perverse and erotic expressions are the main themes of the works. The author  Aki Uchiyama  also published an adult-oriented self-parody work  "Ankoro-Trio " at about the same time as this work.  While originally published as shonen  later prints are labeled for adults because the contents was considered harmful. [+18 don't tag as shonen]

There is a Gothic-style mansion in a distant  rarely-visited part of Japan. There  the world's greatest surgeon  Naomitsu Madaraki  once lived but he hasn't come home in ages.      Instead  the professor's "daughter " Fran Madaraki  lives there with a large amount of her own ghoulish creations and her "younger sister" Veronica. She's a very unusual girl  what with the stitch patterns on her face and the giant bolts on either side of her head. Just as skilled at surgery as her father  and if you're willing to pay her price  she can do everything up to and including raising the dead. Fran believes that a life should be saved no matter the cost  and keep that in mind  since the results of her surgeries are rarely (if ever) pretty.         Fran can make anyone into anything  raise the dead  switch heads and bodies  and give you those eyes that you've always wanted. But do you actually want them? Is it a good thing to raise the dead? Do the ends justify the means? And does Fran care?
This is the compilation of comic  art  anything I made on my free time about Palestine/Gaza.

When Light Yagami finds a notebook giving him power over death  will he use it for good—or evil?   Light Yagami is an ace student with great prospects—and he’s bored out of his mind. But all that changes when he finds the Death Note  a notebook dropped by a rogue Shinigami death god. Any human whose name is written in the notebook dies  and Light has vowed to use the power of the Death Note to rid the world of evil. But will Light succeed in his noble goal  or will the Death Note turn him into the very thing he fights against?

title_en: Syd Craft: Love is a Mystery
description: Famous detective Syd Craft. He's solved the toughest cases and he's adored by the public  but even he has a major problem!

When Sousuke Yamada stumbles upon a shocking video online  his life is shattered. A woman who looks exactly like his wife is caught in an intimate act  filmed in their daughter's elementary school classroom. Is it really her? Who is this other man? Just how will Sousuke uncover the culprit hiding among the PTA's members?

title_en: Goblin Slayer Gaiden 2: Tsubanari no Daikatana
description: Set 10 years prior to the original series  the story centers around Sword Maiden's party of six adventurers on their journey to the Dungeon of the Dead to kill the Demon Lord. ___ **Note**: *Goblin Slayer Gaiden 2 - Tsubanari no Daikatana* is a spin-off series of the main Goblin Slayer! light novel. This is the second manga adaptation of the light novel after the cancellation of [the first one](https://mangadex.org/title/46704) after only 3 chapters.

title_en: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi
description: Mukouda Tsuyoshi has been summoned from modern Japan to a different world of sword and magic. He eagerly thought of what kind of a huge adventure was waiting for him  but actually  Mukouda is just a civilian who got caught in a Hero Summoning. On top of that  Mukouda's base status is shabby compared to the legitimate heroes. Suspecting the king of foul play  as he's morbidly obese in a kingdom in crisis  apart from being war-happy  Mukouda decides to leave the castle by presenting his lack of martial prowess. The only thing that Mukouda can rely on in this world is his unique skill Net Supermarket  that can only order goods from modern Japan's internet to the new world.

title_en: Nail-chan to Fukazume-san. Sakura no Shita de Machiawase-hen
description: The third volume of the *Nail and Fukazume* series  themed around ghosts and the supernatural.

Goku and friends battle intergalactic evil in the greatest action-adventure-fantasy-comedy-fighting series ever! Legend has it that if all seven of the precious orbs called “Dragon Balls” are gathered together  an incredibly powerful dragon god will appear to grant one wish. Unfortunately  the orbs are scattered across the world  making them extremely difficult to collect. Enter 16-year-old Bulma  a scientific genius who has constructed a radar to detect the exact locations of the Dragon Balls. She’s on a mission to find all seven orbs  but first she must convince young Son Goku to join her on her quest. With a monkey tail  superhuman strength and a magic staff for a weapon  Son Goku is ready to set out on the adventure of a lifetime…

After losing her father  bratty brother  and the Elias Empire to her traitorous fiancé's schemes  Princess Regina makes a wish upon a magic ancestral stone and returns to when she was fifteen.   With one last chance to right everything  she comes up with a plan: train her spoiled sibling to be the next ruler by becoming an even bigger brat and get Aaron Vestein  the most beautiful man in the empire  to replace her fiancé!   But will just wits  resolve  and a new suitor be enough to change Regina's fate?  --- **Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56415968)  [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=9074379)  [Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/content/59989313)  **Official Translations:** * [English](https://tapas.io/series/crowning-a-spoiled-prince/info) * [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16547/) * [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Crowning-a-Spoiled-Prince/618) * [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/120622) * [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A5/459)
The little devil who barged into the detective agency  Rin. Also known as Kotetsu. Solving tough cases with martial arts skills that you’d never expect from her loli-like body!

The power of Valhalla's warriors is called Saga. It is the mighty  magical power born from their achievements and deeds in their former lives. Thus  the more stories and legends of these warriors spread and linger in the hearts of many  the stronger their Saga becomes.  Tae Ho himself was certainly no warrior. However  he was the world's top professional gamer. In the game world of Dark Age  his character  Dragon Knight Kalsted could rightly be called a legend in his own right.  His achievements  his story.  All the accomplishments that the Dragon Knight Kalsted had accumulated in the game! [Saga: Immortal Warrior] The story of the immortal warrior  Lee Tae Ho  unfolds on the battlefield of the gods  Valhalla. To put an end to Ragnarok  which threatens the world's very existence  a new Saga begins at this very moment.

On the day that Song Yu moved into her new home  she was bitten by a vampire who popped out of a strange stone statue in her yard. Wei Lei  a hot vampire  was awakened by Song Yu  a sweet innocent university student. Wei Lei seduced her with gold coins to make her stay and serve her. And so thus  the two began living a complex life with each other.

title_en: The World's Strongest Rearguard: Labyrinth Country's Novice Seeker
description: Workaholic assistant Atobe Arihito fell asleep in his company's bus that was traveling for a vacation. When he awoke he learned he had died due to the bus getting into an accident  and that he had reincarnated into a world of reincarnators - to the Labyrinth Country. To his surprise he was discovered by his slave driving manager  Igarashi Kyouka  who further explains their role in this world.  In Labyrinth Country  Reincarnators are expected to choose a job and form parties to fight against monsters in Labyrinths. "Valkyrie" Kyouka had expected Arihito to work with her once again  but he declines due to his knowledge of her demanding nature. As they depart she vows to make him regret not choosing her.

After a strange encounter with a mysterious carcinogenic fetus he found inside a patient’s skull  brain surgeon Minakata Jin slipped back through time. Equipped with modern medical knowledge  he faces various fatal diseases and injuries. He meets the ordinary people of Edo as well as illustrious figures  as his surgical knife carves out a new history. ___ Notes: - Won the Grand Prize at Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2011. - Author Murakami Motoka fully commissioned an English translation of the manga himself. It can be found on [his Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/motokamurakami)  [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0D23CB5NS)  or [Mangamo](https://www.mangamo.com/manga/jin).
The story of Aikawa Kuon  the quiet college student and Shirahane Nanao  the devilish young man continues...

title_en: Shio no Kikan ~Moto Yuusha no Ore  Jibun ga Soshiki Shita Chuunibyou Himitsu Kessha wo Tomeru Tame ni Futatabi Isekai ni Shoukan Sarete Shimau~
description: "How can my past self get so excited doing all those embarrassing things?!"  When he was in the third year of middle school  Hizaki Shiou was summoned to another world to save it. After defeating the Demon King  he was forcibly returned back to the present day. Yet another three years later  he is summoned to the other world once again  this time to stop the rampage of the secret society "Helheim."  That organization was supposedly actually the one that he had founded during his *chuunibyou* phase  where he called himself the "Corpse King"—a dark past too embarrassing to remember!  Someone seems to be impersonating the name of "Helheim" and tarnishing its reputation. To uncover the truth behind this mystery and clear the organization's name  the Corpse King reunites with his former subordinates  the "Hakkai " who once made Helheim the strongest it had ever been. While agonizing over his dark past  he begins to take action in the other world once again.  Their first stop is the Steel City of Gagiul—rescue the city struggling through famine as well as the pale-looking count's daughter in distress.  "Helheim  moving out."

title_en: Final Tensei – Hazure Skill wo Hikitsuzukeru Ore to Kaku Isekai Saikyou no Nakamatachi
description: A boy who dreamed of being OP in another world finally gets his wish and is reincarnated into a fantasy world - but instead of getting cheat powers  he ends up with useless skills!?  Each time he dies an untimely death  he’s granted a new skill… but every single one turns out to be a dud. Until - on his fifth reincarnation - does he finally pull an OP skill!?  "No more dying. No more starting over!"  A story about having overwhelming power born from new encounters and hard-earned experience in another world - the ultimate OP tale begins!

When Kanade was very young  she went to a ballet performance of her neighbour  Risa  and was overwhelmed by her amazing dancing. She decided then and there that she wanted to dance like Risa  and her parents agreed to let her take ballet lessons. Ballet is much harder than Risa's beautiful dancing may have led her to believe  but Kanade is determined to endure and become a wonderful ballerina!

title_en: Ore no Koto Suki da to Omotteta noni
description: Hana Yoshikawa  a scatterbrained high schooler  leads the person sitting next to her in class  Haru Miyao  to believe that she has feelings for him. However  when he confesses his feelings for her  she rejects him. But is there more to it? A series consisting of short  4-page chapters.

Yuuichi  a poor college student  spends his days studying for a scholarship and working part-time. One day  the world-famous supermodel Reo Ichinose visits the café where he works. As the store goes crazy at the unexpected celebrity appearance  Reo tells the clueless Yuuichi: "I've come to pick you up " and proposes to him...!? Much to Yuuichi's confusion  he finds himself swept up in a fairytale-esque love story that started from a promise he'd long since forgotten.

title_en: Mujaki na Kanojo to Hatsu Ecchi Suru Mae to Ato

description: Benzo and Soji witnessed the death of Tatsugoro  leader of the Akame Gang. His last words to them were "I'm leaving you two in charge"   but it was Jinzaburo  the former leader's friend  who was chosen instead. Displeased with the widow's decision  the two left the gang.  They then set off on an aimless journey  vowing to accomplish something big.      Spin-off of [Saraiya Goyou](https://mangadex.org/manga/24096) featuring Souji the Saint and Benzou the Demon as young men.

A town full of woodland creatures finds a human child... and has no idea what it is! The arrival of a mysterious furless creature sets the town of Treehollow into a tailspin: what is she  and does she have anything to do with the ominous Abroad?

Dependent on her boyfriend of seven years  unable to communicate well with others  and lacking self-confidence  Miki feels like a bird trapped in a gilded cage. In the midst of all this she meets a callous young man named Kamaya at her post in the students affairs office. Although Kamaya seems to have no qualms about invading her personal space  he saves her when she's in trouble  and Miki gradually begins to see him in a new light.
A slice of life manga with a supernatural twist. Peak into Clair and Claude's whimsical lifestyle as they spend their final year together before a mysterious deadline.

tags: Historical|Monsters|Long Strip|Magic|Girls' Love|Drama|Horror|Fantasy|Monster Girls|Web Comic|Supernatural|Mystery|Full Color
description: In a 17th-century seaside town  this is the story of an oyster girl whose fate is transformed after an encounter with a mermaid...

Kairan Girls' Academy. A boarding school rich with history and tradition  attended only by orphans. It has a special system in which students are given "roles" that align with their individual goals. Hanako Shimura  a kind-hearted girl filled with dreams and expectations  enrolls into the academy hoping to make friends with everyone at school. But will she be able to?

title_en: Bushinden - Ikenie ni Sasagerareta Ore wa  Kami ni Hirowaretakeshi wo Kiwameru
description: Toma Godo is considered incompetent because he has not been able to use magic since he was a child. He was sacrificed to the [Extreme Demon Island]  where ferocious demons were raging  and there he met a [Demigod] who had mastered the art of combat! After being accepted by the [Demigod] as a disciple  Touma awakened his extraordinary talent  practiced martial arts day and night  destroyed all kinds of demons on the island  and finally evolved into an invincible person in the world.  One day  a mysterious girl drifts to the island  completely changing Touma's fate. Touma left [Extreme Demon Island] with a beautiful girl calling herself Lise  but...
