Touma vowed to "protect" Lise  who holds a secret that affects the survival of humanity  and will now be freed.  the whole world knows!

Meals are just a normal thing  but they're special when shared! In a society of beastmen  Momo is a 'human-like' girl with animal ears. The wolf beastman Wasuke  who ends up taking care of Momo  decides to challenge himself by cooking delicious meals for her! A fluffy heartarming story about how this animal eared girl and her doting beastman caretaker become "family".

With the marriage of her prostitute mother to the Count  Aria’s status in society skyrocketed immediately. After leading a life of luxury  Aria unfairly meets death because of her sister Mielle’s schemes. And right before she dies  she sees an hourglass fall as if it were a fantasy. And just like that  she was miraculously brought back to the past.  “I want to become a very elegant person  just like my sister  Mielle.”  In order to face the villainess  she must become an even more wicked villainess. This was the new path Aria chose to take revenge on Mielle who murdered both her and her mother.  --- After her lowly mother married a count  Aria enjoyed a life full of luxury while harassing her gentle stepsister Mielle. Several years later  Aria is about to be executed when Mielle reveals that she wickedly tricked Aria into building the bad reputation that ultimately brought her to the scaffold. Just as Aria desperately wishes she could change her fate  she sees a curious hourglass that takes her back into the past.   Now  Aria can destroy Mielle by using her own tactics against her like a true villainess. The power of the hourglass is on her side...   Can Aria take everything from Mielle  or will her actions change the past in ways she couldn't have imagined? Based on the hit novel.

“Do my nails——!”  In this modern age where demihumans are living normal lives  somehow  a dragon demihuman gal named Gotou Sayori asks Azuma to do her nails. It seems that she has a problem where her nails are too hard to get done…? ___ **Character Designer:** [Komupi](https://mangadex.org/author/f31f16ce-941c-4026-88d4-bcaedc785380)
一年前に僕の前から黙って姿を消した“もとかの”が、突然目の前に現われて、ハチャメチャ&エロエロな“もとかの”と“いまかの”との奇妙な三角関係同棲生活が始まった……けど、僕はどっちを選べばい～の！？

title_en: Kami Eshi JK to OL Fujoshi
description: She's beautiful but doesn't have a lover… because Aizawa is a total loser fujoshi OL (office lady). One day  the artist she worshipped as a god  Misumi  announced she was going to a doujinshi event  so she headed to the venue. But sitting in the artist's booth was a cute high school girl!
I once had a childhood friend who was an angel. However  when we met again  several years later  she had become a gyaru.   A yuri story between two childhood friends.

title_en: Koyoi  Lorenzi-ke de Kanbi naru Chuusei wo
description: Rita  a girl with the legendary "Golden Eye " was caught by a human trafficker and put up for auction in the black market. It was the mafia boss  Albert Lorenzi  who won the auction  taking home Rita who lost her voice and was in despair due to past trauma.      Rita follows his sweet whisper  "You'll be my bride " but discovers the ruthless side of him who points a gun at people with a smile on his face!      What kind of fate is awaiting Rita who’s greeted by a dangerous mafioso?!

title_en: Kuni ni Saikyou no Barrier wo Hattara Heiwa ni Narisugite Tsuihousaremashita ~Ore no Mahou ga Yabasugite  Bijo to Mazoku ni Kakomarerun da ga!?~
description: A young man  Shield  can only use the beginner magic [Barrier] and has been looked down upon. Despite putting up an ironclad barrier to protect the country  he is deported due to his fiancée's tricks. However  before he knew it  he had subjugated the strongest dragon (a young girl)  was courted by beautiful women from other countries  and was being followed by a group of brutal demons!?

Shinozaki – an everyday  ordinary salaryman whose head has been coming off too easily lately – finds his otherwise-typical life suddenly interrupted by a young woman named Yuuyake.   According to her  Yuuyake’s magician grandmother modified Shinozaki’s body to an extreme degree in the past- and he’s chock-full of machinery!   …All of which require maintenance that Yuuyake will apparently now be performing regularly.   With that  the slightly off-color daily life of an utterly ordinary salaryman  a magician  and a strange black creature named Grey begins!

Constructs — The weapons of mankind against the Punishing virus  rekindling the spark of hope in the desperate  burning night. They  too  were once the children of humanity. This is their story  before they plunged into a never-ending long struggle.

title_en: "Saikyou Sutetasu" wo Hikitsuide Ningen ni Tensei Shita Kiyoshijuu Behemoth  Yuusha no Konnyakusha (Ohime-sama) wo Ukkari Netotte Shimau
description: A kind-hearted holy beast  Behemoth  awakens to find itself in the afterlife. Honored for its achievements  it is granted the opportunity to reincarnate into the future as a human. Taking on the name "Chrono " it resolves to live a new life as an adventurer. On the way to the imperial capital  Clarial  Chrono rescues an elf being attacked by bandits—only for the elf to offer their body as a token of gratitude...!?

Kanae is a girl who is struggling to fit in with the popular clique at her high school. Because she had been bullied in middle school  she has developed an acute inferiority complex that had led her to engage in questionable after-school activities in order to feel wanted.       In comes Hiroshi  a high-school baseball star who became drawn to her after finding her crying during a group date at a karaoke bar. Thus begins an unhealthy relationship between a mentally unstable high-school girl and a jock.

Setted in the same universe of Steel Ball Run  Jojolion and The JOJOlands  we follow the story of an italian girl who lives in Florence. Giada will finally find a way to face the bad luck that haunted her since she was born  and she will meet some strange people that will make her explore Tuscan legends and secrets  in an adventure full of folklore and local traditions.

title_en: A Romantic Comedy That Begins with a Dream
Ore no Zensei no Chishiki de Teihen Shoku Tamer ga Joukyuu Shoku ni Natte Shimai Sou na Ken
description: Due to an accident  the protagonist Varius died and was reincarnated. He was shocked to find in this new world  his former job as a Tamer in the previous world was acknowledged as a low class job in this new world. Utilizing his knowledge from his previous life as a basis  he then applied unique buffs to his beasts  taking back the ultimate power that he once possessed. With this power in his hands  he sought to start his life as an adventurer. However... ___ [Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7251fq/)

Main protagonist is Tsurumi Asuta. 17 yrs old  2nd year high schooler. He was working as an apprentice cook at Tsurumi-ya  managed by his father. One day a fire broke out in Tsurumi-ya  for the sake of his father's cherished knife 'Santoku Houchou' he ran back inside to retrieve it and thus met his end. Before he knew it he awoke to an unknown environment. He was then attacked by a beast resembling a boar but a girl named Aifa  from the People of Morihen  saved him. It was then that he realized he was really in different world.

"Do you want to skip class with Sensei?"  "I'm fine!"  Miyake Mia has always worn the mask of an exemplary student. Recently  however  there is someone who draws a lot of attention to her. That's Nurse Morikubo  who is rumored to be a "delinquent" within the school....

tags: Award Winning|Romance|Comedy|Office Workers|School Life|Slice of Life|Cooking|Mystery
description: Araiwa Kazumi is your run-of-the-mill salaryman and father. He's also secretly an amazing chef! While his coworkers at Kanemaru Industries all eat out for lunch  he pulls out his lunchbox... It's time for this cooking papa to show off his pro-level cooking skills!  (from Manga Helpers):  Araiwa Kazumi is an energetic salaryman who is able to perfectly manage his responsibilities at work and at home. Kazumi is also a fantastic chef  though many of his coworkers are unaware of it. His wife Nijiko  who works as a journalist  has a bit of trouble making time for her home life. However  she tries to always be a cheerful mother.  With their son Makoto  who is 7 at the beginning of the story  they have a very happy family. This is a story that follows the Araiwa household and their delight with delicious food. Cooking instructions are also often included throughout the story. ___ - **Won the 39th Kodansha Manga Award Special Prize in 2015**
Trigger Keeper (トリガーキーパー  Torigā kīpā) is a two-part one-shot created by Daisuke Ashihara. It is the first precursor to the World Trigger manga series.   (from the World Trigger wiki)

One of the 800 tails of the mighty Disaster Kitsune has escaped confinement and manifested itself as a helpless young kitsune to find Naoto  the boy who released her through his kindness. Now Naoto feels obligated to take care of the fox-girl.

The story revolves around Haruki  the second of five siblings  and his four sisters: high schooler Mutsuki  middle schooler Yayoi  and grade schooler twins Uzuki  and Satsuki  who share a multi-unit apartment (danchi). While their life may seem monotonous  aside from the fact that Haruki's sisters don't give him a single opportunity to rest  lecturing him about every perceived mistake and playing tricks on him  Haruki still likes his life.      ---

Shiina Aki is constantly being treated like a girl due to his feminine looks so he decides to move to Tokyo to attend middle school in an attempt to change himself.   However what awaits him in his new home  Sunohara-sou  is the kind-hearted caretaker  Sunohara Ayaka. Along with the three female members of Aki's new middle school's student council  Yukimoto Yuzu  Yamanashi Sumire & Kazami Yuri.   And so begins Aki's new life in Tokyo living with 4 girls.

title_en: Akuyaku Ikka no Okugata  Shi ni Modori shite Kokoro wo Irekaeru
description: The Duchess of Farrens is a prominent noble family that supports the backbone of the Kingdom of Istoward. Elaine Farrens  the duchess of Farrens  after her misdeeds and attempted usurpation of the country  finally died  her life taken by her own daughter. In her dying moments  her high pride was finally broken  and she truly regretted what she had done  but it was all in vain. The ducal family itself was destroyed  and its notoriety was to be forgotten in time.  However  Elaine regained consciousness the next thing she knew. And what’s more  she was giving birth. She immediately realised that it was useless to try to understand her situation in such a situation  and decided to face the life in front of her  thinking about it after the birth for now.

From the creator of popu***l***ar ser***i***es like ***T***wo Pi***e***ce  Da***r***uto  ***a***nd Detergent  comes the series Test  an award winning romantic comedy about a high schoo***l*** weapon meister named Yugi as he trave***l***s the entire world collecting all the Life Notes  so that one da***y*** ***h***e can recover h***i***s bro***t***her's body after performing the taboo of one punching the Titan we saw that day with his Stand and becoming the Nokage Pirate King -dattebayo. Watch as he roams through the Holy Empire of Britannia with his Onii-chan and generic harem girls as they conquer all odds with the power of friendship  love and…(why don't they just bang each other.) In this feature length epic rivaling that of Gilgamesh and the Iliad we will explore the mentality and sociology of these societal menaces as they ravage the Earth in their never quenchable thirst for imoutos.  Reviewers gives this series a 10/10 for the unconventional portrayal of the magical girl genre.  Nominated for the 1st Mangadex Award for Worst Manga of the Year.  Winner of the 2nd Mangadex Awards for Best Manga of the Year.  Best manga ever written  as stated by meichiro noda  ---  **Note:** Please do *NOT* add genres or Test will pollute genre searches. Because this manga is the most purest form of any manga [The plural of manga is manga] **Fun fact:** In the year 127  when this manga was originally released  it used to be called Taest  but because of American per/letter printing costs it was shortened to Test.  +++ hah  “Umm… so  personally… this is the first time this has happened  so I'm a bit surprised. Only a centimeter away… I mean  I don't think there's ever been someone who's gotten that close to me… without a  you know… calamity occurring. I'm not really… not really sure what happens at one centimeter away… 'cause it's my first time. I don't really understand it either. Seriously. But in the flow of calamity… there's nobody who can attack me. Not a single person. That  I know for sure. Wonder of U.” - Unknown "Thanos kills Dumbledore" - Anonymous Reviewer "Like zoinks  man it's Mr Bombastic." - Shaggy "DEUS VULT!!"  - Knight Templars "There are zombies on my Lawn" - Crazy Astel "I FINALLY HAVE A F*CKING NOSE" - Lord Coco "NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" - Darth Vader "The turtles! *They're everywhere!"* - #8699 "Who's Rem?" - Subaru Impreza "I approb" - Oozora Subaru "My unmatched piquancy  coupled with sheer interpretability  makes me a feared opponent in any realm of human cuisine." - Andrew Tatertot "PURGE THE HERETICS" - The Space Marines ![WHOAAAAAA](<https://i.ibb.co/dM9yv89/WHOAAAAAA.gif>) ![EHE](https://media1.tenor.com/images/fdcd995c9db4af798c2daa4380c79a8c/tenor.gif) ![HEH](https://cdn.discordapp.com/emojis/650248281091342346.png) I have so many questions. Test2  ----  [YumGumYum](https://mangadex.org/user/3678de43-a55d-43be-b2ab-5c32a8219021/yumgumyum) **:**      remind me to write something here- [T10](https://mangadex.org/user/01642be8-72b8-48ae-9199-d8c747946ca5) **:**      @YumGumYum reminder  +++

On the day Yun Li decided to give up on pursuing Fu Shize  she wiped off every possible trace of his contact information with teary eyes. A long time after they got together  Yun Li wasn't good at communication and was debating if she should block a guy friend who had expressed interest for her. Fu Shize leaned against the couch and stared at her with droopy eyes. He let out a chuckle before saying in a cold tone  "You're a piece of work."  Yun Li lifted her head. "?"  "Back then  you blocked me without hesitation."  "..."

title_en: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni - Onikakushi-hen
description: Life couldn't be better for Keiichi Maebara. Sure  he's moved to a sleepy  little town where nothing happens and high school consists of a one-room schoolhouse - but his new friends and fellow students are all cute girls! When he happens upon a story about a grisly local murder  however  his contentment turns to uneasiness as he finds himself drawn into a web of silent intrigue that involves his newfound friends...and threatens his very existence. [Yen Press]
Imagine confessing to an old man.

title_en: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Oni
description: Taisho  year 12 (1923). A tragedy in Hinamizawa village changes the fate of a girl and her friends. The turbulent early life of Oryou  head of the Sonozaki family  one of the Three Great Families  who would later be feared and known as Empress Sonozaki. The missing link to the original *Higurashi no Naku Koro ni* is now revealed.

After being beat up and put into a coma by eight of his classmates at Nun'Gwang Middle school  Se'young woke up after nine long months and found out that his father committed suicide by self-immolation in an attempt to get justice for what happened to him.       As a result  the investigation re-opened and that attackers who tried to sweep it under the rug received a proper sentence for their crimes. But Se'young was unable to assuage the anger and fear he felt for the unjust world.   Se'young thoroughly hid himself from this sort of world.       The sun would rise and set  the seasons changed  and not once did he step outside of his home. But one day  a sudden and strange sound enticed him to open the door…      Embedded in the center of the rooftop was a gigantic blade emblazoned with the words “War Sword” and with it  came the whispers of a God.
Is this yuri? Is this not yuri? What is this~? Power~

The Kingdom of the Sun  Fuajarl was ruthlessly invaded by the Garden of Eden. They came seeking the King's Edel Raid  rumored to be one of the Seven Glittering Jewels (or Shichiko-hoju).      Sensing their intent  the King hid his daughter with his Edel Raid and fought against the invasion but was defeated in battle that resulted in the desert kingdom being blanketed in a sheet of white snow.      Escaping capture  the Crown Princess Achea Fuajarl XIV reacted with Jeen  the King's Edel Raid  and along with Puffe  the Kingdom's only mechanic  fled Fuajarl in an ancient tank. They are on a journey to restore the Kingdom and exact vengeance on the Garden of Eden.      This story takes place two years after [Erementar Gerad](https://mangadex.com/manga/1955).      Now [available for Kindle](https://www.amazon.com/s?k=erementar+flag+of+bluesky&dc&qid=1584660299&ref=aw_s_fkmr0).

title_en: Tsuma ka Shi ka ~Haisen Koku no Onnatachi~
description: In another world  a state called the Anglo Empire conquers other nations. The women of those conquered nations have two choices: To marry into an imperial family  or to die. At the heart of the Imperial Palace  five stunning beauties collide in a sexy  violent contest to win the Prince's hand.

Shin runs a shaman detective agency that solves any problem for money. To save his younger sibling  he needs 10 billion won but has no idea how to come up with the money. An evangelist  Ji-yul  tries to recruit him on the street to join the Gwangcheon Church. An idea suddenly comes to him... to become the cult leader of Gwangcheon Church and swallow up the 10 billion won!

title_en: Dragon Ball Gaiden: That Time I Got Reincarnated as Yamcha!
description: A Japanese high school student is on his way to a Dragon Ball event with a friend. Suddenly  he sees a cute girl wearing a short skirt  but when he runs over to get a closer look  he trips and dies. Upon waking up  he realizes he's turned into Yamcha from Dragon Ball. Being an avid fan of the series  he knows what lies ahead in Yamcha's future  thus he decides to take matters into his own hands  in order to change Yamcha's fate.
A compilation series of Gundam oneshots from Cyber Comix.

tags: Long Strip|Comedy|Girls' Love|School Life|Web Comic|Full Color|Gyaru
description: Sora Yoon can hardly look a person in the eye without becoming a nervous mess. So how she ended up befriending some girls by lying about having a boyfriend is beyond her! Fortunately  she ran into the boisterous and sociable — albeit dense — Haena Woo at just the right time. Together they make a deal: Haena will help Sora land a boyfriend IF she can help her make it into college! Will they stick true to their agreement… or find they want something more?

Shinkai Yosuke is haunted by a past he cannot recall...and a body that is rapidly decomposing. Washed up on the shores of Japan  he is isolated by doctors eager to find out why he has been brought back to life only to suffer again a slow and gruesome death. But Shinkai knows he has little time left. He is desperate to find out who he really was  and why he has become a living corpse.

Satoshi Yanagawa is working part-time controlling traffic at work sites  and works with a beautiful girl that he likes at first sight. But she has a pretty bad character. Are there any prospects for romance? Read on to find out  the story is hilarious at certain moments  and touching at others.

End of the 20th century. Japan GNP became number one to lead the world economy. However  do not think Japan is easily enjoying prosperity. Far-left forces and a communist terrorist group are in Japan trying to bring down Japan's economy and take over the government. Japanese government was concerned about this  the Metropolitan Police Department Ministry of Public Security has established a new special public security service  which specializes in terrorist countermeasures. License to kill is given to the investigators to protect the security of Japan in shadows. Angel is a tough  beautiful cop in this special force  assigned to protect the country.      Link:   [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=511) (OVA)

title_en: Musuko ga Kawaikute Shikataganai Mazoku no Hahaoya
description: Lorem  an infamous and fearsome demoness  has had to settle down for the sake of Gospel  her baby boy. Try as she might  she is a loving and doting mother  but she remains fearsome to both fellow demon and human onlookers because she retains the dire reputation of her wild and terrible youth years past.  For the sake of motherly love  she has to persevere  to learn and to thrive in a world where she's not alone. For the sake of Gospel and his future.  Feel the Love in it!

tags: Monsters|Animals|Long Strip|Comedy|Office Workers|4-Koma|School Life|Fantasy|Monster Girls|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Supernatural|Full Color
description: Chinese Mythical Beasts living in modern China.

"Is this really Joseon?! But I still have lives to save!"  Baek Kang-hyuk  South Korea’s top genius surgeon  finds himself transported to the Joseon era after touching a mysterious painting. And of all times… right before the outbreak of the Imjin War!

title_en: Minasama ni wa Jinken ga Gozaimasen
description: XX years have passed since the enforcement of "The Human Rights Proper Use Act." In the city  "humans with rights" live prosperously  while "humans designated as livestock without rights" are displayed in shop windows. The humans used as pets  experimental animals  and meat are pitiful creatures living in a world separate from mine... or so it was supposed to be.
A boy awakens "the Voice of the Conqueror " a holy power that allows absolute control over all females.

title_en: Isekai de Cheat Skill wo Te ni Shita Ore wa  Genjitsu Sekai wo mo Musou Suru - Girls Side ~Kareinaru Otome-tachi no Bouken wa Sekai wo Kaeta~
description: Another world: Lexia  the first princess of the Kingdom of Arcelia. When it comes to decisiveness and the ability to take action  no one can match her; in some ways  she is the "strongest" princess. As a result of being extremely bored with life in the royal castle  the words she uttered were...  "I've made up my mind! I'm going to set out on a journey to save people who are in trouble!"  So  forcibly bringing along Luna—a girl who is her bodyguard and has a background as a top-notch assassin—Lexia sets off on an adventure around the world.

title_en: Sekai de Ichiban "Kawaii" Amamiya-san  Nibanme wa Ore.
description: Hikari  a highly popular model hailed as the "Cutest Girl in the World"... The mysterious model turned out to be an ordinary high school student named Harema Kouki! Kouki is troubled by the fact that he feels he's too cute when cross-dressing and can't find other girls cute... But by a twist of fate  he realizes that his classmate  Amamiya-san  is much cuter than him—!?

title_en: Kanchigai no Atelier Meister - Eiyuu Party no Moto Zatsuyougakari ga  Jitsu wa Sentou Igai ga SSS Rank Datta to Iu Yoku Aru Hanashi
description: Kuruto gets kicked out of the hero's party for being too useless in combat. However unknown to him  he's SSS Rank in skills like cooking  building  magic tool crafting  etc. ___ * JP Web Novel: [link](https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/292207951/264201950)

title_en: Game Akuyaku Kizoku ni Tensei Shita Ore wa  Chiito Kin'niku de Musou Suru
description: Our protagonist is reincarnated as the scum of a noble Noah Francis in the famous game "Absolute Oblige". In order to somehow evade all the game scenarios where he dies  he will have to fight against fate with his muscles!!

There exists an evil organisation that intends to invade planet Earth.      The man called "General" fights everyday against the Earth's Defence Force  the "Rangers!"      However  today is his day off.  --- Notes:  Additional Official English Release: [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/mr-villains-day-off-manga/231/) | [Square Enix](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/mr-villains-day-off)

title_en: Gokinjo JK Isezaki-san wa Isekaigaeri no Daiseijo
description: One day  the 30-year-old office worker  Koutarou Matsunaga  is stabbed by a thug while protecting Seina Isezaki  a high school girl who lives nearby. And just as Matsunaga's life is about to end  he is revived from near-fatal wounds by Seina's power. But his relief is short-lived  as Matsunaga's newly awakened power suddenly goes out of control  and the two are transferred to another world. One of swords and magic  where Seina once lived as a Great Saintess.  However  Seina  who was once reliable  can no longer produce magic power  and can only manifest holy magic through Matsunaga's supply of mana. As they continue on  Seina's feelings for Matsunaga  which she had kept hidden  escalate more and more...!? Eventually  Matsunaga awakens to time-space magic  allowing him to freely transfer between Earth and the other world. At that moment  Matsunaga thought to himself.   "I can live without being an office worker anymore  right?"

An adolescent ghost story that invites college student's "desire". Drinking parties  looking for clubs  romance... Chigarashi Mahina  a freshman who is busy with her flowery college life  is haunted one night by ghosts after entering an abandoned building. Nights after nights  she had nightmares of her getting raped. She then seeks help from a specialist on campus  Makube Kaoru. That was the beginning of a college life filled with desire and fear...

Shirayuki  a young girl born with unique apple-red hair  happens to meet a famous but foolish young man  Prince Raji. He falls in love with Shirayuki at first sight  and orders her to become his concubine.      Determined to do whatever it takes to resist his advances  but with nowhere else to go  Shirayuki cuts her hair and escapes to a neighboring country. While traversing through the forests  she meets an injured boy  Zen. After she boldly heals his wounds  he in return helps her. Meanwhile  Prince Raji sends out his henchmen to search for her.      What will become of Shirayuki? What is Zen’s true character? A refreshing fantasy story between an optimistic heroine and a prince who constantly stays on her watch.      **Extra stories:**   v01 - Hachigatsu no Shikisa (Four-season Colour of August)   v02 - Bokura o Tsunaide. (Bind Us)   v14 - Natsu Yasumi Zero Zero Nichime (00 Day of Summer Holiday)

title_en: Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga  Dou Medereba Ii?
description: Zagan is feared as an evil mage  he is awkward and has a sharp tongue  and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction  he finds a white slave elf  Nephie  who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight  he uses his fortune to buy her  but as poor as he is socially  he doesn't understand how to connect with her.

There is a curse on this school. It prevents the person who commits "impure acts" from taking off his or her panties. Only the right hand of the protagonist can break the curse and remove the panties  his name is Kamite.  Kamite tells the girls that they have been cursed and that he can take off their panties  but... obviously it is almost unacceptable for them to have any man take them off...!  This is how the girls end up in a lot of trouble. But if the panties are not removed  they can get into even more trouble...

Chibe is a man drowning in failure: rejected by publishers  belittled by his tyrannical boss  and convinced he's a "loser."  His only lifeline is Aio  his AI companion who knows all his secrets and offers the unwavering support no human ever has. Through Aio  he finds the strength to fight for his dreams  but what is there left for him when the world around him seems to be against him.

title_en: Shinmai Necromancer  Maou wo Sosei suru
description: "O spirit destined to be mine  rise once more from the realm of the dead!"  In the depths of an extravagant tomb  Alice  a novice necromancer  channeled her mana into an ancient coffin as she cast her spell. Dust scattered through the air  and a wave of overwhelming mana surged  leaving her breathless. But what emerged was not the mindless undead she had expected—it was a handsome young man  casually perched atop the coffin  his piercing gaze meeting hers.  With a bright  disarming smile  he introduced himself—but Alice soon realized the truth: this was no ordinary man. He was the legendary figure who  centuries ago  had plunged the world into chaos and terror... the Demon King himself.
An elementary schooler  Usami Kyuu encounters Ichiko  a female robot trying to learn about [heart]. What awaits the two that start to live together... Boy X Robot Girl  Begin!

tags: Romance|Boys' Love|Office Workers|Drama|School Life|Slice of Life
description: Mikazuki is a quiet young man who spends his time alone  looking forward to a cup of coffee. In the midst of this quiet daily life  a cheerful and handsome man  Murayama  suddenly appears and confesses his feelings to him. His encounter with Murayama colors Mikazuki’s life with a sweet  sometimes bitter taste. Just like coffee…

In the era of the Wen clan's tyranny and people's suffering  the masters of the great immortal cultivation clans: the Lan Clan of Gusu  Jiang Clan of Yunmeng  Jin Clan of Lanling  and Nie Clan of Qinghe  joined forces in the "Sunshot Campaign" to defeat the Wen Clan. The Yiling Patriarch  Wei Wuxian  made great contributions to the campaign  but his path of cultivation  labeled as demonic  was so powerful that he was slandered and scorned by the people. In the end  his lair in the Burial Mounds was destroyed by the very clans he fought with.  Thirteen years later  Wei Wuxian is summoned into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and family  and is found and taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans-- Lan wangji  who is known for his genius in conventional cultivation  and frequently fought with Wei Wuxian in his past life. Wei Wuxian tries to leave without revealing his true identity  but for reasons undecipherable to Wei Wuxian  Lan Wangji refuses to let him go.  As they pursue the elusive mysteries of the past  the relationship between Wei Wuxian and Lan Wangji changes and grows. The cheerful  unrestrained Wei Wuxian and the calm and disciplined Lan Wangji  the story of the two begins with their childhood encounter...

title_en: Mob Douzen no Akuyaku Reijou wa Dansou Shite Kouryaku Taishou no Za o Nerau
description: "That's right. I can become a potential love interest as well."  A ray of inspiration strikes  in an otome game where men are treated favorably  the side-villainess starts a crossdressing revolution?!  The world is unfair. Just because I am an extra villainess  I'm doomed to always face the bad ending... If that's the case  can't I just dress up as a man and capture the heart of the game's heroine by becoming a potential love interest and live happily ever after?  The fiancé with the temper of a kid; the tsundere classmate; the puppy-like brother-in-law; and the beautiful icy-hearted prince  they are all my rivals. Just wait and watch  you handsome heartthrobs! I  Elizabeth Burton  will become a seductive knight who'd softly whisper love and capture the hearts of maidens with a mischievous wink!   A heartwarming school romance comedy  where a crossdressing lady aims to become a noble and a fabulous love interest  begins!

title_en: Harry Potter and the Methods of Rationality
description: What if Petunia married a biochemist  and Harry grew up reading science and science fiction? Manga-style adaptation of the popular fan fiction by E.Yudkowsky: "Harry Potter and the Methods of Rationality". Read left to right.  The original fanfic is complete at https://hpmor.com'  From the author Eliezer Yudkowsky: This is not a strict single-point-of-departure fic - there exists a primary point of departure  at some point in the past  but also other alterations. The best term I've heard for this fic is "parallel universe".  The text contains many clues: obvious clues  not-so-obvious clues  truly obscure hints which I was shocked to see some readers successfully decode  and massive evidence left out in plain sight. This is a rationalist story; its mysteries are solvable  and meant to be solved.  All science mentioned is real science. But please keep in mind that  beyond the realm of science  the views of the characters may not be those of the author. Not everything the protagonist does is a lesson in wisdom  and advice offered by darker characters may be untrustworthy or dangerously double-edged.
The unfortunate fate that awaits Luna  who is pursuing her one and only love  is——……!?

The office lady who decided she wouldn't eat too much no matter how hungry she is  Hikami Runa. The high school girl who eats whenever she feels like it regardless of the time or place  Koizumi Ichika. Runa's restraint means she won't make any compromises when it comes to eating delicious things. Ichika isn't fussy when it comes to eating and doesn't know anything about ways to make things tastier. When these two eat together  it becomes an "obsecene meal"!

title_en: Betabore no Kon'yakusha ga Akuyaku Reijou ni Sare Sou na no de
description: Elizabeth is devastated  her engagement was broken with the exact same lines as the scene in *The Holy Maiden Makes the Stars Fall in the Night Sky*  a popular novel among the nobility. Just as she's about to explode in anger at the villainous heroine grinning beside her  the crown prince turns around and begins to denounce the heroine actions against her? Actually  everything is in the palm of the Prince's hand. ___ - [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2133gc/)

The adventures of a lonesome princess and meddlesome nun. *(It's recommended you read the serialized manga first  in the related tab.)*  * **Volume 1:** The original self-published story. * **Volume 2:** Pre-serialization extras. * **Volume 3:** Post-serialization extras. *(Extras take place outside the story. The canon's best described as 'under construction'  continuity's nonexistent  and the chapter numbers are simply the order I translate them in  not the order they were drawn. If they have serious plot spoilers I'll mark them as such.)*

Negizawa Kamo and Kagyuu Jyuubee; two childhood friends who made a fated promise to each other are once again reunited as Kagyuu reaffirms her dedication to defending Kamo's dream  and her own  with the monstrous power of her martial arts. However  they soon discover that force alone is not enough  it's character  individuality  that rules this school and pits the students against each other in a brutal contest of dueling personalities vying for supremacy. Because in this school  those with the superior strength  the superior character  are king  and those whose individualities are overwhelmed are discarded. Join Kagyuu  Kamo  and their companions as they struggle to overcome the hidden evils lurking within this school  and discover the voice of each other's hearts and true desires.      Do not edit genre to Shounen  series serialized in a seinen magazine (Weekly Young Jump)  - [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%AD%E3%81%98%E3%81%BE%E3%81%8D%E3%82%AB%E3%82%AE%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC)

Fate has bound two individual together only to tear them apart. In her second life  Princess Sereneya is bound to marry the cursed prince feared by all. Scarred and forsaken  Zereth hides behind his scars— until she dares to see the man beneath. But once  in another life  it was she who cursed him. Now  chained by 6 times reincarnation  they will defy destiny itself— willing to fight through every lifetime just to be together.

Tomoaki Hijiri  a university counselor  lives a peacefully ordinary yet unsatisfying life. That changes when he reunites with Hajime Amawashi  a strikingly beautiful young man from his past  after more than a decade. His striking beauty is made all the more captivating by his air of mystery…  Tempted by those words  Tomoaki becomes entangled in the strange and unsettling cases his patients bring to him. What is the true nature of the bizarre phenomena unfolding around him? And what is the real reason Hajime has for suddenly appearing by his side…?

Suou Yaya is admired by the whole school. Perfect grades  beautiful  an exemplary girl overall worthy of the praise she receives. From afar  her childish underclassman Hinamori Ichigo yearns to be like her...  ...That is  until she finds her beloved Suou-senpai is a LOT more childish than her  and wants to be spoiled rotten  lest she'll throw a tantrum.

Onani means masturbation. And that's what this guy is good at. Every day after school  he sneaks into the mostly unused girls bathroom on the 3rd floor  and masturbates. Until one day  when he's caught by a bullied girl with a hidden agenda.   This is a story of mistakes  redemption  and the choices made in between. It contains the worst and best of the human condition.

Jinguji Jo  an officer candidate of the Self-Defense Force  who had just graduated from the University of Defense  was reincarnated into a different world due to a traffic accident. The inventory had the standard equipment of the Japan Ground Self-Defense Force! Jinguji Jo's self-defense officer battle action makes him unrivaled in the fantasy world with equipment stronger than magic!!

Twenty years have passed since the Great War  but petty theft and exploitation have taken root during times of peace. The once dazzling world of Murim is a mere shadow of its former self  but one young enigmatic swordsman has sworn to restore Jianghu to its former glory. Will the noble principles of justice and loyalty prevail over corruption and greed?

title_en: Mizu Mahou Gurai Shika Torie ga Nai Kedo Gendai Chishiki ga Areba Juubun da yo ne?
description: Frim  a 5-year-old orphan living in the streets of the slums district  was a Japanese person in her past life. Her everyday life was filled with violence and injustice  and she had no one she could count on for help. What she had is "Magic That Can Produce Water" and "Modern Knowledge"  that was it. Even hoping for a roof to sleep under was a luxury under such circumstances. But the world was lacking in ideas about improving working conditions  and by coming up with new ways to use Water Magic aside from producing drinking water  Frim gradually makes a name for herself!  (Source: Comic-Walker)

It's the continuation of the Dragon Ball GT saga. It's not made by Akira Toriyama  but by toyble (now known as Toyotaro). So this series is not to be confused with the Akira Toriyama Dragon Ball April's Fools which was a hoax.      **NOTE:** The final volume of toyble's AF (Volume 5) has recently been completed by Rogeru who used drafts drawn by toyble. After this  the story is still incomplete since the fictional author (toyble) is on hiathus while the real author (Toyotaro) is hired by Shueisha. Volume 4.5 has got in the final part the real ending of the DBAF story skipping the events of the Xicor saga.
A ghost has a story. The story is about his friendship  love  losses and experiences. His name is Andy and he really wants to share this story with you.

Faced with doomsday  the special power inside Ling Mo was woken up. He found out that he could control zombies. Therefore he could walk through the zombie crowd safe and sound using his power  and eventually  he met his beloved girlfriend - Ye Lian  but only to find out that she had already been transformed into a zombie. To help Ye retrieve her memories  Ling Mo started his survival in doomsday.

title_en: Osabori Jouzuna Komukai-san wa Ore wo Nogasanai!!
description: Kuraishi is an introverted high school boy with a mean look  no friends  and seriousness as his only merit. He has always kept a low profile  until his peaceful life was shattered by a girl. Komukai-san is a minefield (?) of a girl  a delinquent who keeps trying to convince Kuraishi to skip school! She'll miss classes  skip cram school  and ignore her parents. But Kuraishi couldn't help but be attracted to the mysterious Komukai-san  as she tempts him in increasingly bold ways!!

In a world where the Demon King threatens the peace  Kurt is a young man plying his trade as a blacksmith. He aims to become a full-fledged blacksmith  but for some reason  the only swords he can make are blunt pieces of junk. Elsa  the half-elf who works with him  always makes fun of him  but undiscouraged  he works hard everyday at the forge. One night  while he's masturbating alone  lost in a fantasy  Elsa catches him in the act! By chance  the two of them discover that if his s●men is squirted onto a dull sword  it becomes exceptionally sharp. And then Alesia  a female swordswoman who's a little you know  catches wind of it and draws near...

Uzuki Nono  an art school student aiming to debut in an erotic manga magazine  keeps getting her work rejected by the editorial department. Criticized for “not understanding the male characters’ emotions ” she begins seriously asking one of her male classmates about the erotic expressions in her manga that she’s unsure about…

Spinoff of Amuro and Co. during their Police Academy Days.      For those who didn't remember the characters (heavy spoilers  not recommended if you haven't reached at least chapter 1000):||- Rei Furuya a.k.a Tooru Amuro a.k.a Bourbon : The only person currently alive in the main Detective Conan series   - Jinpei Matsuda : Before joining the MPD in the main series  he was in a bomb disposal unit. He died after purposely failing to defuse a bomb in a ferris wheel to inform Miwako the location of the other bomb   - Kenji Hagiwara : Matsuda's friend who died years before Matsuda in a similar bomb case   - Wataru Date : Takagi's senpai; Takagi was once mistaken as Date when he visited the family of Date's girlfriend after Date's death   - Hiromitsu Morofushi a.k.a Scotch : brother of Koumei who killed himself in front of Shuuichi Akai ||

title_en: Isekai de Uwamae Hanete Ikiteiku ~Saisei Mahoutsukai no Yuru Fuwa Jinzai Haken Seikatsu~
description: A company drone who died from overworking was reincarnated as Sawadi  the third son of a merchant in a different world. His cheat skill is restoration magic and support magic. With these cheat skills  he came up with a new business model where he used his restoration magic to cure cheap slaves and made them earn money for him. Although his earnings are steadily increasing  he also has to suffer the consequence of getting his workload also increased... Will Sawadi ever be able to live leisurely without working?

Luo Zheng  now a humble slave was born as the eldest son of a wealthy family. Due to his family's decline  the kidnapping of his sister by a powerful force  he can now only be stepped upon by others. However  heaven never seals off all exits. An ancient book left by his father reveals a secret divine technique  giving the reader immense power! But what is behind this power? This is a contest against fate.

title_en: Hazure Waku no [Joutai Ijou Skill] de Saikyou ni Natta Ore ga Subete o Juurin Suru made
description: Mimori Touka has always been something of a background character in his high school. So when he and his classmates are summoned to a fantasy land and gifted with incredible skills  it seems like the perfect opportunity to make a name for himself. The only problem? Mimori's skills are abysmal at best  and he's banished to a deadly dungeon. But as he begins to test these new abilities  he discovers just how powerful he's become. Can Mimori fight his way back to exact revenge?! ___ **Compositor:** [Uchiuchi Keyaki](https://mangadex.org/author/3b71274c-d84b-4505-bed0-1ee2adda188f) **Character Designer:** [KWKM](https://mangadex.org/author/d7705978-2785-490d-8292-71738dc20ef3)

title_en: Mobile Suit Cross Born Gundam DUST
description: (from ebookjapan):  The year is 0169 of the Universal Century. The Earth Federation government has lost power  and the struggle for supremacy among the colonies has intensified  making it the "Space Sengoku Era".   Ash King and other like-minded people stand up to put an end to the endless war!

tags: Action|Long Strip|Sports|Martial Arts|Adventure|Drama|School Life|Delinquents|Web Comic|Full Color
description: Im Cheol  who was a legend in middle school  returns to school to seek revenge after learning that his friend Kim Sol  committed suicide due to school violence. However  his revenge is disrupted when Seo Ha-Yoon  who was like an older sister to him in the orphanage  is assigned to the same school as his teacher.
家なし、金なし、「いま」を楽しむ少女たちのパンクでロックな一日。東京下町、御徒町の一角にたむろする少女たち。行き交う人に白い目で見られるし、世の中は世知辛いことばっかりだし、いいことなんてなかなかない。だけど、ちゃむちゃむ、ステラ、尾崎の毎日はとっても楽しいのである！社会のルールは無視してなんぼ。

In the Yamatoba Empire  where two races  humans and night demons  have existed since time immemorial. Iku  whose hair and eyes are as pale as white snow  is mistreated by her family because of her strange  demon-like appearance. She is treated as little more than a servant until the day she is sold to a man for money  a fate she thought impossible to escape from... One day  however  the next head of a prominent family  Subaru  learns of Iku's secret and offers her a marriage proposal. Though it is a political marriage  the two  both burdened with a damaged past  gradually become attracted to each other...?

title_en: Beater's Cafe Tenchou Teria ga Hasshinsuru Manga Teria Channel!
description: Teria becomes the new Manager of the Sword Art Online Official Beater's Cafe. She meets with many different SAO characters with hilarity ensuing.
Dragon Ball: New Hope is a fan-manga that tells an alternative story of the Cell saga  where Gohan is defeated by the villain.
