FUNNY FLOOP  is an independent manga created by BEMSIMH. Description about the manga: An ancient race that was hidden by the #$@#$#+#   now a new "ALFA" has come To "liberate" the ancient race. But it won't be easy  full of challenges  mysteries  and secrets. Wesley (the protagonist) is the last savior of this hidden race. ATTENTION Rating: 16+. This work contains mild language  mildly sensitive themes  and implied substance use. It does not contain explicit sexual or violent content.
A collection of short 4-Koma comics from various artists for Magi-Cu Magazine based off the Manyuu Hikenchou anime and manga

tags: Official Colored|Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Boys' Love|Video Games|Isekai|Web Comic
description: Barely scraping by as a part-time delivery driver  Taeha suddenly hits the jackpot when he wins the lottery. But on his way home  he gets involved in a motorcycle accident and blacks out. When he wakes up  he finds himself back in his high school days 10 years ago. What’s crazier is that he realizes he’s stuck in a weird dating sim!  “Find the capture targets and raise their affection levels!”  Can Taeha charm his way through the game and return to the real world?

Sakura Yoshitake is a 25-year-old salaryman working for a food production firm. One day he takes the day off to go to his grandma's 88th birthday. While driving home after the party he sees a UFO and crashes. He survives the wreck and finds a terrifying alien standing over him. He passes out and when he comes to  he is in his own bed in his own apartment  covered in bandages. Even more  he finds a beautiful blonde half naked woman sleeping next to him. When she awakes she tells him she has come to earth to be impregnated by him. However when he touches her  her embarrassment causes her to lose control and she turns back into the terrifying alien he saw before. How will he ever impregnate her if she can't control her embarrassment enough to ever let him touch her?

title_en: Watashi wo Center ni suru to Chikaimasu ka?
description: "If you really can make me the center of the group... I'll marry you."  Mizuki Natsuno is the least popular member of the idol group "Melty Strawberry." Koichi Okuda is the only person in the world who continues to support Mizuki. Two people who should never be connected  end up in a cooperative relationship under one roof  working her way up from the bottom of the ranks to become the leader of the group.
Amano Emi likes wearing cute clothes. One day  as she is arguing with a pick up artist who was harassing a girl  a drink is thrown at her. She is saved by a stranger...

Wataru and Ayumu are the office's heartthrobs  charming and successful. On weekends  however  they trade their suits for sweats and dive into video game marathons. Ayumu  secretly head over heels for Wataru  has perfected the art of playing best friend  even swatting away potential rivals to keep his spot. But when a client offers to set Wataru up with his daughter  Ayumu's carefully laid plans begin to fall apart...

title_en: Negi Haruba Short Story Collection: Mitoubun

description: The Photography Club is in danger of shutting down?! And the Cinema Club too?! Fret not  for they shall merge and become... Cinephoto Club! Now  club members Satsuki  An  and Sakurako are asked to be the main characters for manga artist Haruno's latest work that's centered around action cameras. The girls head out to capture the lovely sights of Japan  exploring gadgets around them  and of course  chomp on the local delicacies along the way!

title_en: The Secret of the Partner Next to You
description: Yang Kiryong is an ordinary high school boy who has a classmate named Yoo Jae-Kyung  who is somewhat clumsy and clueless. Both have a very good friendship  but without any kind of love attraction. Until one day  by chance  Kiryong discovered the deepest secret of his friend and because of this his heart began to beat  will it be beats of fear or love?

title_en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure  Part 4: Diamond Is Unbreakable (Official Colored)
description: In April 1999  Jotaro Kujo travels to a town in Japan called Morioh to find a young man named Josuke Higashikata  the secret love child of his grandfather  Joseph Joestar. Upon finding him  Jotaro is surprised to learn that Josuke also possesses a Stand. After their strange meeting  the pair team up to investigate the town’s proliferation of unusual Stands!

"In the year 1111 A.D  the Mexicas (Aztecs) abandoned Aztlan  guided by a sacred prophecy to find the land their gods had promised. Now  centuries later  Tlalli—a clumsy but relentless young dreamer—sets out to walk the same path  chasing destiny and something greater than himself.

I fought like a demon to live. I survived. I got lucky and survived this mission  but there’s no guarantee that I’ll survive the next. Next time  I’m going to be treated as a deserter just like my friends who never returned. I’m probably going to be fed by crows in valleys while everyone forgets my name. The smell of blood that forces you to hold your breath! Hell’s screams that howl from below! Now  I want to throw everything away and become the wind. Become the wind  free I fly.  ---  - [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_poong_wz)  - [Original e-Book <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/comic/C000048076)  ---  - [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66650)

title_en: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight - An Invitation From Afar (Doujinshi)
description: Maya  who is currently a member of the New National Troupe in Japan  has received an invitation from Claudine - her former acting partner - to go watch her new play that will be showing at the Theatre Du Flamme in France. Maya is excited to evaluate Claudine's progress since they last met  but feels internally conflicted when she sees Claudine acting alongside her new co-star.  [ Yuri MayaKuro (Maya x Claudine) One-Shot Doujinshi ]  Source Anime: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight  Pairing: Tendou Maya and Saijou Claudine

Twelve years ago  the powerful Nine-Tailed Demon Fox attacked the ninja village of Konohagakure. The demon was quickly defeated and sealed into the infant Naruto Uzumaki  by the Fourth Hokage who sacrificed his life to protect the village. Now Naruto is the number one knucklehead ninja who's determined to become the next Hokage and gain recognition by everyone who ever doubted him!

title_en: Dorobou ni Haittara Kai Inu ni Mitsukatta

description: The demon queen was defeated by the dog I raised… I  who merely wanted to return to the countryside  was transmigrated into a foreign world. I managed to become a foundation level existence in a novice village. Even the demon queen  who dominated the world  was defeated by the dog I raised. From then on  the demon queen has lived in my house  and my adventures in aforeign world began.

title_en: Tokidoki Kaette kuru Onna Tomodachi no Hanashi
description: Unrequited love of a woman who loves stability (32) and a woman who cannot be stable (24).
Dragon ball Z: What if Raditz had killed Goku and Piccolo?

title_en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Ibun - Makoku Kurashi no Trinity
description: This Spinoff Manga has content based starting from Volume 4 of the Light Novel.  Against the odds  the little slime Rimuru has established Tempest  his magical country for all monsters  and it’s thriving. Three visitors  Phos the fox girl  Stella the dragon girl  and Nemu the winged girl  come to pay Tempest a visit  and they’re stunned at just how quickly it’s developed.
A series of short stories about conversations various people have while waiting at railroad crossings.
Ichimonji Norimune x Magoroku Kanemoto

title_en: Shuu ni Ichido Classmate wo Kau Hanashi ~Futari no Jikan  Iiwake no Gozen'en~
description: Once a week  Miyagi pays 5 000 yen to her classmate Sendai. The 5 000 yen is to buy three hours of Sendai's time  which gives the right for Miyagi to give her orders. Miyagi is at the bottom of the school caste while Sendai is at the top. The two  who never crossed paths at school  spend time together after school under such a contract. Miyagi's orders are determined by her mood of the day  and Sendai cannot disobey. One day after school... Miyagi calls Sendai to her room and gives her an order that she usually does not give.

tags: Oneshot|Romance|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color

description: Saruta Torasuke  an idiot who loves to fight  senses the hidden strength of student council president Fujishiro Senju  and challenges him to a match. In the midst of their fight  something changes in Fujishiro...?

Mysterious Rain Jack is a short Star Wars parody with a main character who looks like Kurikinton Soramame. The manga marks debuts of Thunder Ogre Goronbo  Drop-kun  and R2-D2; three characters who also make appearances in Toriyama's later manga Dr. Slump. As well as several aliens who also make cameo in Dr. Slump.  --- * **Won the Monthly Young Jump Award in 1978**

A series of three manga tankōbon released between 1983 and 1997 that collect several one-shots written and illustrated by Akira Toriyama. The stories were originally published in various Shueisha magazines between 1978 and 1994.  Volume 1 (1983) - Wonder Island (1978-1979) - Tomato  Girl Detective (1979) - Pola & Roid (1981) - Mad Matic (1982) - Chobit (1983)  Volume 2 (1988) - Today's Highlight Island (1979) - Escape (1982) - Pink (1982) - Dragon Boy (1983) - The Adventures of Tongpoo (1983) - Mister Hō (1986) - Kennosuke-sama (1987) - Sonchoh (1988)  Volume 3 (1997) - Mamejiro (1988) - Clear Skies  Karamaru (1989) - Cashman - Saving Soldier (1990) - Dub & Peter 1 (1992-1993) - Go! Go! Ackman (1993)
Wolf (actually an Akita Inu) tells you all about what a cool lone wolf motorcyclist he is.

title_en: Rumors Say That She's Gorgeous and Kind
description: 【two-faced!villainess x yandere!villain】 If the villain gets killed by the bandit  then the happy ending will be achieved! Xiao Mian Niang has had to pretend to be an innocent flower all her life  but she finally reveals her true dark nature and personally shoves the villain off a cliff. But... did she get the script wrong!? It's saying there's only one way to achieve the happy ending—to fall madly in love with the villain. "Sister-in-law  I've adored you since childhood. Yet you deceived and betrayed me." The villain gave her an icy smile  "Now that I despise you to my core  you seriously expect me to fall in love with you again?"

At a Hygiene Exhibition  a mysterious friendship blooms between Akihiko  a boy who dreams of becoming a military doctor  and Hisao  who has an iron prosthetic arm. But each time Akihiko meets with him  Hisao's body deteriorates  and the number of prosthetic limbs increases... A retro Sci-Fi drama overflowing with darkness and beauty that questions humanity and its agency!  Winner of Kodansha Afternoon Four Seasons Manga Award-Spring 2024

Yasumi Ai is a first-year high school student living on Izu Ooshima  an island off the coast of Toukyou. She loves reading manga  but a certain event causes her to become aware of "creating" manga for the first time... What is the world that awaits this girl!? ___ **Awards:** - 16th Manga Taisho Award (2023) - 70th Shougakukan Manga Award (2025)

title_en: Hazureta Minna no Atama no Neji
description: Junior high school student Misaki Nanao realizes the people of the town she lives in are slowly going insane. At the same time  she starts seeing Beherin  a mysterious demon. "If you make me believe you  I shall help you." Misaki believes the demon's words and talks about her terrifying personal experiences; however she gets dragged into people's increasing insanity  horrific incidents and a huge conspiracy

I fell in love with fate. But the memory of that love disappeared. Four men were waiting for her when she lost her memory. It seems that just before she lost her memory  she chose one of these men as her fiancé. She had even decided to get engaged  but now she has to redo her first love. You might already be in a trap!  All of them are seriously trying to get married  and the exciting reverse love story is about to begin!

title_en: Seijo Sensei no Mahou wa Susunderu!
description: Despite being the most powerful saint  Tia was accused of being a heretic and banished from the royal capital. She became the teacher for three girls who had failed as candidate saints.
What are the chances of running into an ex-lover at the recycling station? A newly written story of two women reunited as apartment neighbors.

title_en: Toki no Ori ~Shini Modori no Reisou Tsukai  [Copy] Nouryoku de Saikyou e to Itaru~
description: "I'll kill the Demon Lord who's trying to wipe out humanity no matter what it takes..."  In a desperate battle against the Demon Lord  Link loses one of his dearest friends. Fueled by his comrade's dying wish  he unleashes a desperate final blow. But it's not enough. The Demon Lord’s army of magical beasts overwhelms humanity  and the world falls. Link should've died. And yet... he wakes up  back in time  as his ten-year-old self?! Now  with the memories and battle experience from his past life  Link vows to change the future. This time  he'll do whatever it takes to defeat the Demon Lord once and for all.

title_en: Bijo to Kenja to Majin no Ken
description: After falling into the gap between worlds  I gained "the ability to identify something's status" for the cost of a single limitation. However  other than this skill I was completely ordinary. All I could do after landing in a strange world  was see through the status of things and use that information for my own growth. One day  after being assaulted by enemies  a lone figure appeared and saved my life. What's more  that person had an incredible "secret". ___ **Links:** - [Original Web Novel](http://ncode.syosetu.com/n4191cj/) (Raw)

“Your game ends here.”      Every 100 years  in a competition that will grant them more than one wish  there is only one final winner.      The young boy Han Si-Joon jumps into a fierce battle while risking everything to save his family.

The year is 2072. In the ruins of a shattered civilization  countless people in need of help went missing without a trace. The transportation and logistics conglomerate "Metrogradus" began restoring the infrastructure of the destroyed world. Seemingly out of nowhere  the emergency rapid-response unit "Lunarithm" joined the effort  rescuing those still trapped beneath the ruins. However  not only people wander the abandoned catacombs...

tags: Long Strip|Comedy|Self-Published|Harem|Doujinshi|Monster Girls|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Minecraft enemies re-imagined as Waifus.

The start of high school life. To the girls  that also meant the start of their love lives. For brand new first year student  Takahashi Nanami (Nana for short)  it was no different… She happens to end up in the same class as the incredibly popular Yano Motoharu  who rumors say that two thirds of all the girls are guaranteed to fall in love with. But will that hold true for Nana  who says that if she had to choose between like or dislike  she'd say she dislikes him!?      ---  - **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shojo in 2005**

Kouguchi Ruri  a skilled yet socially awkward male manga artist  has built a career creating niche "loli" manga. His carefully structured life takes a chaotic turn when Shiina Karen  an energetic young woman claiming to be a university student  joins him as his assistant. While Karen appears eager to learn  she harbors a mysterious secret and ulterior motives for working with Kouguchi. As they navigate the creative challenges of manga production  their quirky relationship evolves  blending humor  tension  and unexpected revelations.

title_en: Chika Idol wo Kage de Sasaeru Ore
description: Kageyama  an unremarkable boy  secretly receives a message from gal classmate Natsukawa  saying  "Meet me at the usual karaoke place after school." He goes to karaoke with her alone. There  Kageyama reveals something he had been asked by Natsukawa to show her.

Mary  a girl who moved from Tokyo to the countryside  meets the mysterious girl Colin in a "secret garden" up in the mountains. With nowhere to go  they share a "secret" in the garden that they can't tell anyone. They didn't realize the consequences of what they did.......  (Source: Yuri-Hime  translated)

title_en: March Comes in Like a Lion
description: A youth named Kiriyama Rei  who lost his family as a child  endures loneliness to become a professional shogi player. Then  through a chance meeting  he develops a relationship with the three Kawamoto sisters (Akari  Hinata  Momo)  who hail from a working-class district of the city  and little by little his frozen heart begins to thaw. ___ - **Won the 4th Manga Taisho Award in 2011**   - **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2011  which it shared with Space Brothers** -  **Won the 18th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2014**

title_en: Akuninzura Shita B-kyuu Boukensha - Shujinkou to Sono Osananajimi-tachi no Papa ni Naru
description: Gray  a B-rank adventurer  was supposed to be just a mob character in the RPG *Bright Fantasy*. However  by chance  he saved an orphan who was attacked by thugs on the roadside and decided to raise him as his father. But the orphan turned out to be the protagonist of this world  “Iska”! This choice would greatly change the fate of the world. ___ **Character Designer:** [Hara Kazuhiro](https://mangadex.org/author/edaf7a28-c9c9-4b83-a3be-4087b3e4fcae)

Kenta is a young boy who dreams about being a super hero called Wingman. All his classmates love it when he disturbs the courses to apply his holy judgment  as much as the teacher hates that. One day while coming home he finds a beautifull girl in a bikini. Aoi Yume  she gives him a wonderful item  the book of dream which can make anything written on it true  and so began the life of the real super hero for our dear Hirono.

In a quirky convenience store known for having everything  a weary cashier faces a daily parade of strange customers.  "Damn it  and it's minimum wage too!"  the cashier complains while ringing up a di*do.

title_en: Skill "World Tame" ni Mezameta Ossan wa Dungeon de Seikei wo Tateru Koto ni Shimashita ~Mushoku kara Hajimeru Shihai Musou~
description: After his company suddenly disappeared overnight  a worn-out corporate slave found himself unemployed — but what he gained was the ultimate skill to dominate monsters  humans  and all things...! In modern-day Tokyo  a mysterious phenomenon known as 'Dungeonization' begins  turning buildings into monster-filled labyrinths.

In Age 788  the Dragon World is at peace  when a tremendous threat appears… the strongest Saiyan warrior  Kakarrot  has awakened! Son Goku  the hero who brought peace to Earth  attacks his own family and friends! His fated rival  Vegeta  tries to stop him in a battle of destiny! Will Vegeta be able to defeat Kakarrot…? And what will become of the Dragon World…?
Choboraunyopomi x Vanguard  The crazy unit comedy four-panel story begins!

Sakura is an elementary school student who absolutely loves cute things. After seeing her friend's puppy  she begs her mom to let her get a dog  but gets turned down flat. Sakura pouts about it  but then her grandpa makes her a deal. If she can take care of a bonsai tree for a whole year  she can have a dog...
A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.

Office worker Li Yitai dies unexpectedly while working overtime and is taken to the underworld. However  upon checking the Book of Life and Death  they discover that his name isn’t listed. He doesn’t officially exist  and therefore cannot be reincarnated. Through a twist of fate  he becomes a “ghost errand runner"" and is tasked with capturing evil spirits. In the process  he also begins to uncover the hidden truth about himself.

title_en: From Now on  You're My Demon
description: Hina is a high school girl who has just lost her grandmother  who was her only family and guardian. In order to fulfill her grandmother's last living wish to see Hina dressed as a bride  Hina sneaks into the church on the night before the funeral...  (Source: Natalie.mu  translated)
The story follows the day-to-day life of a vagabond spirit trying to find happiness by performing assassination requests. Related to JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - Part 4: Diamond is Unbreakable.

In a world crawling with monsters and dungeons  Na Sunhoo and the other Awakeneds fight to protect humanity. But after he is killed in a deadly battle  a screen appears.  [Initiate Time Regression?]   Now with a second chance at life  Sunhoo returns to the past  determined to make as much money as possible to buy the land the dungeon is on and destroy it before the monsters can appear.   With innocent lives at risk  can Sunhoo strike it rich and vanquish the monsters once and for all?

Since ancient times  rumors have abounded of man-eating demons lurking in the woods. Because of this  the local townsfolk never venture outside at night. Legend has it that a demon slayer also roams the night  hunting down these bloodthirsty demons.   Ever since the death of his father  Tanjirou has taken it upon himself to support his mother and five siblings. Although their lives may be hardened by tragedy  they've found happiness. But that ephemeral warmth is shattered one day when Tanjirou finds his family slaughtered and the lone survivor  his sister Nezuko  turned into a demon. Adding to this sorrow  a demon hunter named Tomioka Giyuu arrived and was about to finish Nezuko off  but to his surprise she and Tanjiro started to protect each other. Seeing this oddity and Tanjiro's promising fighting skills  Giyuu decides to send them to his old mentor to be trained.   So begins Tanjiro's life as a demon hunter  bound on a quest to cure his sister and find the one who murdered his entire family.    ---- Alternative English: [MANGA Plus](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/titles/100009)

title_en: Obentou Uri wa Seijo-sama! ~Isekai Musume no Atta ka Recipe~
description: Suddenly summoned to another world  former office lady Fukuyose Mahiru becomes a lunchlady in order to cover her living expenses  as well as gather information. Then one day  she gets her hopes up when she hears a rumor that the genius Magician Randy may hold a hint to help return her to her original world——.      "To find the practitioner than summoned you here  we must uncover the motives behind it."      Things become messy after it's determined Mahiru holds a great amount of magical power  and must therefore cohabitate with Randy?! And on top of that  he finds eating to be too troublesome  making him the ultimate picky eater——!     ---  [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8472ex/)   [Original Light Novel](https://bookwalker.jp/series/202048/)

“The Fukurogi Incident” — a serial murder case in which 23 murderers met their end at the hands of an active police officer  Fukurogi Nodoka. Nodoka  presumed dead after her execution  awakens to find herself informed by a mysterious girl  Lassey  that she’s been made to participate in a battle royale between resurrected heinous murderers. Nodoka  driven by the desire to prevent further atrocities by these resurrected criminals and eliminate their kind from the world  plunges into this distasteful game.

A boy named Shi Shan and his little sister were offered as sacrifice to a demon that has been haunting their village. They were rescued by a martial artist who exorcised demons. He took the siblings in as his disciples and taught them the art of cultivation and about the demons that dwell in this world.  --- Translated raw sypnosis:  He said  "This world fundamentally should not have demons." And thus  all the lands became peaceful.

Gao Jing  you're a maniac. Almost exactly like Gao Sheng was. In your eyes  is the world truly so horrid  horrid enough that you'll go to such extremes to save it? Gao Jing  are these the rules you've laid down for every sect under the sun? You're so delusional your plans are something not even your great grandfather would've dreamed off. So be it then  go and execute your plan  I want to see  if all the sects in the world will be brought to their knees in front of you  or if the Jin dynasty will be destroyed by your very hands!

title_en: The Inn Where You Can Save and Load ~ It Seems an OP Reincarnator Has Begun Training Newcomers at an Inn ~
description: There was an inn with an urban legend among adventurers. "The Inn that won't let you die if you stay there."      Loretta arrives at the inn as part of her quest. What is the secret of the "Deathless Inn?"      "Save Point."      It was an inn ran by an maxed out adventurer with the ability to create "Save Points" who came from another world. He retired from being an adventurer and decided to run an inn  while training newbie adventurers. Loretta  who needs to become strong  will be trained by the innkeeper  Alexander.      If you die  don't worry about it  just hit load!         **TL;DR**:    Isekai + RPG Save Points + POV of a Native instead of the OP Otherworlder     ---  **WN Series Raw (12 different works)**:    <https://ncode.syosetu.com/s1747d/>

title_en: Negai wo Kanaete Moraou to Akuma wo Shoukan Shitakedo  Kawaikattanode Kekkonshimashita ~Akuma no Niidzuma~
description: Young orphaned adventurer tries summoning the devil to help his career as his own skills are lacking. The devil comes in form of a beauty who offers to grant him one wish.  He’s so enamored with her appearance that he asks her the first thought in his mind  to be his wife. She blushingly agrees to his surprising demand to join in his future adventures together.

title_en: BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!! Swaying in the Rain  Looking for the Sunshine
description: I believed it was destiny that brought us together. It's my irreplaceable home  warm like spring sunshine. Therefore… Here is the newly depicted story of the lost girls from the TV anime *BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!!*. (Comic Growl)

title_en: Azamukare Seijo to Shugoryuu no Konyaku
description: For some reason  Philia  who grew up in an orphanage  was able to use the "healing power" of a royal daughter. She was bought for her ability to act as Princess Lovetta's "healing power" behind the scenes. However  Philia's life was in danger due to Lovetta's scheme  who was driven by her jealousy. Just when she had prepared for her death  a dragon prince appeared...

title_en: Haibara-kun no Tsuyokute Seishun New Game
tags: Time Travel|Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|School Life|Slice of Life|Adaptation|Full Color
description: *- Note: Only this arc is completed! This series is still ongoing but with a new title. Please move to "Related" tab for more details*  Natsuki Haihara is a young man who failed to make his high school debut and is now in his fourth year of college following a terrible high school life. He was about to enter the workforce when he was unexpectedly whisked back in time seven years to just before he started high school!  Natsuki is given the opportunity to “redo” his regret-filled high school life  and he uses his prior experiences to successfully become a member of a group of six beautiful boys and girls at the top of the class caste!  What’s more  the beautiful girl he once had a crush on  Hikari  was also there…?!  The unconscious high-spec young man starts his second adolescence all over again in real life  a strong  new game school romantic comedy!

title_en: Watashi wo Suki Sugiru Yuusha-sama wo Riyou shite  Konse koso Nagaiki suru Tsumoridattanoni (Tabun  Mata Shippaishita)
description: Lisette  the daughter of an earl  is destined to be killed and eaten by a monster on her 20th birthday. She is currently living her fourth life with all her memories intact.  In order to live longer this time  she goes to live in a sanctuary (the countryside) where monsters do not appear  but one day she reunites with Ralph  the handsome son of an aristocrat.  He is the young man whom Lisette saved when he was an orphan in her childhood. The first words he says to her are  "I lived for you."  The first volume of a fantasy about a heroine who fights against her fate of death and a submissive  high-spec yandere hero  a devoted and doting love story!
A protector  with an arm of steel  able to deflect bullets  swearing never to take a life. That is Tate Karito  the Shield in the Dark.

The war surrounding the veil at the center of the world is over. However  the war was not the only thing the veil left in its wake. There are those who pursue the veil and those who seek to close it; those who wield special powers and those who are living weapons; those who disturb the peace and those who bring hope; those who collide with the paths they have walked and those who carry a coffin  seeking to resurrect the dead. Together  they are known as Actors.

title_en: Yugami-kun ni wa Tomodachi ga Inai - Tonari no Anata to (Unofficial Fanbook)
description: An unofficial addition to Yugami has no friends manga.   Featuring the web-published interludes of Yugami-kun  as well as secondary works (fan-created stories) of Yuuji Yugami and Chihiro Watanuki set after the final chapter.   Unofficial Fanbook created by Misumi (mr_ms_maker on X).  Note: Chapters can be read in random order.

In lands far..far away  where scary monsters and horrific creatures live. where hidden treasures and magic exists  where there are still undiscovered kingdoms and empires mankind discovered a new source of energy to empower their mechanical machines & weapons. we discovered vanilla the source of unlimited energy. follow the journey of gen orchid  rosa & altamiras as they seek the djinn chef master to grant their wishes  story & art by me & my wife  together we are couple comics #fantasy_Manga_to_read

Follows the tempestuous relationship between two writers  occasionally touching on the lives of those around them  both friend and enemy.      Vol.1 Hitodenashi no Koi (1999)   Vol.2 Itooshii Hito (2000)   Vol.3 Omoware Bito (2001)   Vol.4 Hitori ni Shinai (2002)   Vol.5 Aisareru Hito (2004)
First published in the December 7th 1972 issue of Young Comic. Mentioned in Junji Ito's autobiography.

title_en: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi: Sui no Daibouken
description: A spin-off of the series TONDEMO SKILL DE ISEKAI HOUROU MESHI told from Sui's perspective.

title_en: Level 1 kara Hajimaru Shoukan Musou the Comic
description: After losing his father in a tragic accident  Shinobu Iijima and his younger sister Megumi are taken in by their father’s old friend  Ayumu. Shinobu works hard in the hopes of starting a new life for himself. Megumi  and a mobile game called La Vita Online  are the only things keeping him afloat.  One day  Ayumu reveals his true intentions of tearing Shinobu down and getting his hands on Megumi. But just after Shinobu learns that Ayumu deleted all of his game data in La Vita  their high-rise apartment catches on fire and Shinobu falls to his death  Megumi in tow. He wakes up in a strange new world... and realizes he's been reincarnated into the world of La Vita Online.  An announcement from the devs tells him that Ayumu is already there  and a countdown to Megumi's arrival is ticking. Shinobu vows to protect Megumi after she arrives at any cost  even if it means he has to crawl his way up from level 1 to fend off all the other reincarnated players.

title_ja: Boku wa Isekai de Fuyo Mahou to Shoukan Mahou wo Tenbin ni Kakeru
description: Ostracized and tormented by his peers to the point of breaking  Kazuhisa Kaya set off into the nearby forest atop the mountain with one purpose: to dig a pitfall and bring about the death of the person behind his suffering. However  right when Kazuhisa was about to succeed in his revenge  a sudden earthquake throws his plans out of whack! Caught unaware  all he can do is patiently lie in wait until someone lumbering across the path happens to fall into his trap. Kazuhisa's excitement is short-lived  however  as the corpse at the bottom of his pitfall turns out not to be the bully he was expecting but a grotesque  pig-looking monster  and his confusion only grows as he’s suddenly greeted by a pure-white room and a RPG-like status screen.  Strange monsters now wandering the mountain and with newfound powers at his disposal  Kazuhisa is forced to throw all concerns over his tormentor to the wayside as he focuses on a new goal: survival. That's not going to be as easy as it seems  however  as he’s not the only one to have been wrapped up in this mess...  (Hanashi Media) ___ [Official English Light Novel](https://hanashi.media/another-world-survival/)

title_en: Ore no Level Up ga Okashii! ~Dekiru Otoko no Isekai Tensei~
description: Zarmen  an adventurer who can't level up decides to retire from the adventurer business. Furthermore  in order to graduate from virginity  he decided to splurge on all the assets that he had diligently saved up since his reincarnation at a high-class brothel.  The woman who appeared in front of him was the finest woman he would ever have known. Thanks to her hospitality  Zarmen fully enjoys his first time  but at that moment  his ears hear a mysterious announcement...  [Impregnation confirmed.] [Level up!]  "Does this mean that the more 'seeding' I do  the stronger I get?"  An extraordinary implantable foreign world adventure fantasy created by a bottom adventurer who has been at level 1 for many years levels up through sex!

title_en: Kurasu ≪Mushoku≫ no Eiyuu-tan ~Koushaku-ka wo Tsuihou Sareta ga  Jitsu wa Nagutta Dake de Sukiru wo Kakutoku Dekiru to Wakari  Tairiku Ichi no Eiyuu ni Noboritsumeru~
description: In a world where Classes are bestowed by the gods upon everyone when they reach eighteen  the existence of Skills within these Classes tends to overshadow any hard work  setting one's life path. Within this imbalanced system  Lythe  who trained in hopes of becoming a Holy Knight  was heartlessly classified as Jobless during the Class assignment  resulting in his expulsion from the town by his father  the Duke. As he scraped by as a luggage boy  there came a day when the merchant caravan he was with got attacked by bandits. Lythe  attempting to save the child  engaged in a battle with the skillful attackers  accepting his impending death. Yet  a mysterious voice echoed in his head when he punched a bandit in his last act of defiance... ___ **Links:** - [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9583gj/)  (jp) - Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58563)

title_en: Matantei Loki Ragnarok ~Shin Sekai no Kamigami~

description: An old MMORPG called Live Dungeon. Before the service was terminated  Kyotani Tsutomu made full use of 5 notebook PCs to clear the game and was invited to a different world. And then  Tsutomu was speechless when he saw a live relay of a dungeon capture in the different world. They bulldozed through without any thought of strategy. The misfortune of getting the healer position. Tsutomu reinstated the White Mage that had always been his favorite in games and aimed to conquer the dungeon to find the key to his escape from the different world.

title_en: Eroge Sekai ni Tensei Shita Ore ga  Oshi e no Ai de Netorare Heroine wo Shiawase ni Suru.
description: "Suck it nicely  you weakling!"  The one servicing that bastard's thing was my beloved girlfriend. There was nothing I could do before that scene...  After starting to play an erotic game recommended by a friend  Mitsuki falls head over heels in love with the game's main heroine  Kotoha. But this game is a NTR game in which the heroine is seduced by the player's best friend  Ryou?! While searching for a happy ending with Kotoha  Mitsuki accidentally falls onto the train platform. When he wakes up  he finds himself faced with none other than… Kotoha!? To his surprise  Mitsuki has been reincarnated as the player character of "that" game…!  With his vast knowledge and love of games  Mitsuki is determined to change fate this time. In order to protect Kotoha and the others from Ryou  he must achieve a perfect happy ending! ___ **Additional Official Raws:** - Individual Chapters: [comipo](https://comipo.app/series/web/20610/)  [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0CTHPS4K3)  [ebookjapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/811406/) - Volumes: [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/comic/work/=/product_id/BJ01208710.html)

title_en: Joou no Rakuin - Horobi no Kuni no Yotogi Miko
description: On Himon Island  where the legend of the Cursed Ancient Princess of Evil—the Immortal Princess—sleeps  shrine maiden Mikoto steps into a forbidden forest. In that very moment  an unprecedented earthquake strikes  awakening the curse…!?  Thus begins the battle of Mikoto and the lecherous Self-Defense Force officer Tatsumi against the cursed Immortal Princess!  From Katou Kyashii  author of Kigoku no Yoru  comes an erotic horror where deadly combat and forbidden pleasures intertwine!

Kuroki  a freshman in college  becomes infatuated with his senior Shirasawa  who enjoys dominating men  and plans to seduce him at the school's entrance ceremony  but ends up being the one who gets captured. Despite the setback  Kuroki is determined to win over Shirasawa's heart and comes up with a cunning plan to turn the tables.

After the death of his friend  Luciano Ojaverde breaks her final gift to him in a grief-fueled rage. When Luciano then finds himself in outer space  he's met with the fact that it's filled with life. ...But why has Earth been quarantined away from it all?

Can't get enough of Type-Moon crossovers? Ever wondered about the strange café in Carnival Phantasm?      Welcome to Ahnenerbe  where the casts of Fate  Tsukihime and Kara no Kyoukai hang out in their free time. Enjoy the random yet funny events that happen  as the three heroines get together in this café.

Kasumi Hana travels to meet her deceased older brother’s penpal  Urushizawa Lily  with the aim to inform her of his passing.  As well as the intent to kill her  if Urushizawa had only been using him.  But when they meet  instead Hana finds a woman who truly loved her late brother  and who has lost her eyesight.  For Lily’s sake  she resolves to take her brother’s place.

Rumor has it that there is a witch inside room 13 of the girls' dormitory  who lures innocent  unsuspecting girls into her room at night to perform indecent acts on them….    In truth  the girl in room 13  Herazato Shie  is just unable to fall asleep at night unless she tells someone a story about the movies she has watched. So every night  she invites anyone willing to come in her room and listen to another of her stories about movies.

Into this maelstrom of destruction go two veteran Mobile Suit pilots: the deadly Zeon sniper Daryl Lorenz  and Federation ace Io Fleming. It’s the beginning of a rivalry that can end only when one of them is destroyed. The lightning-streaked debris fields are about to become the stage for an epic duel where death is the only true winner.  (Viz)

Wakatsuki didn't want to reveal her relationship with her girlfriend so that they wouldn't become the gossip of the whole school  at least  until she kissed her girlfriend in front of their friends because of jealousy.
Blue Archive JP's second official manga drawn by Sergei.  --- **Links:** - [Blue Archive JP's Twitter](https://twitter.com/Blue_ArchiveJP)

title_en: Akuyaku Reijou desu ga  Shiawase ni Natte Misemasu wa! - Anthology Comic
description: Broken engagements  "serves you right"s  condemnation events  doting  royalty  reincarnated heroines  banishment endings… it's fully loaded with all the charms of villainesses! The comic adaption of popular villainess stories that were published on *Shousetsuka ni Narou*! An anthology of oneshots with happy endings!!  Cover Art: Maro  +++**Volume 1 Contents:** 1. "The Villainess Will Obtain True Love" (悪役令嬢は真実の愛を手にいれる). Art by Hoshino Soumei  Story by Nekomata Doremi. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1664fm/): A broken engagement at a graduation party?! 2. "The Tale of the Noble Girl Who Will Go to a Convent After Her Engagement's Breaking" (婚約破棄されて修道院に行くお嬢様の話). Art by Sorakura Shikiji  Story by Yuuki Satoru. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7933fg/): Banishment after her younger sister steals her fiancé?! 3. "I Will Definitely Get My Engagement Broken! ~I Will Become a Villainess!" (絶対に婚約破棄をしてみせます！～悪役令嬢に、私はなる！). Art by Kuroe Yui  Story by Reiga Utsuho. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1702fn/): To break off her engagement  she harasses the daughter of a baron?! 4. "Aku no Kadou wo Ikimashou" (悪の華道を行きましょう; "Shall We Walk Hand in Hand Down the Flowery Path of Evil?"). Art by Yamashiro Umeta  Story by Mafuyubi. "The Villainess Trifles with the Second Prince's First Love" (悪役令嬢は第二王子の初恋に翻弄される). Art by Ohitsuji Ei  Story by Mizuno Saaya. (婚約破棄を持ちかけられて十数年、そこまで言うなら破棄しましょう！; "It's Been 10 Years Since You Asked to Break off Our Engagement  If You Insist That Much  Let's Break It off!"). By Yoshimura  Character design by Maro: She's been told multiple times since they were young to break off the engagement?! 2. "The Villainess Laughs Innocently" (悪役令嬢は無邪気に笑う). Art by Ohitsuji Ei  Story by Yoruru. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1629cz/): A condemnation event after being called out to the rear garden?! 3. "The Art of Rebuilding a Nation Begins With a Broken Engagement!" (婚約破棄から始まる国家建て直し術！). Art by Kawano Akiko  Story by Hazuki. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4551ft/) 4. "You Were Set up  You Know?" (貴方は嵌められたのですよ？). Art by Koyuki Iroha  Story by Yuki Yukiko. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6502eu/): At the graduation party  my older sister's engagement was broken?! 5. "The Villainess Exploded" (悪役令嬢は爆死しました). Art by Nanso  Story by bouro. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4564fw/): The villainess tells the second prince "Serves you right”?! 6. "I Reincarnated as a Villainess. Come Quickly  My Engagement-Breaking Event" (転生したら悪役令嬢になりました。婚約破棄のイベント、早く来い). Art by Mochida Moo  Story by Kyouka. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4699fn/) | [Serialization](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2863gc/): The only ally the reincarnated villainess has is her valet?! +++ +++**Volume 3 Contents:** 1. "One Day  I Was Able to Hear the Inner Voice of My Fiancée" (ある日婚約者の心の声が聞こえるようになりました。). Art by Chuugyaku  Story by Enju Subaru. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/s6234f/) 2. "My Bethrothed's Personality Is Way Different From the Game!" (婚約者の性格が原作と違うのですが). Art by Mochida Moo  Story by Kozuki. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/s5772f/) 3. "I Was Supposed to Marry to Someone Who Hated Me  but  Before I Knew It  I Was Being Doted on" (嫌われている相手に嫁いだはずがいつのまにか溺愛されていました). Art by Potagi  Story by Mikoto. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4692gb/) 4. "Shall We Continue Down the Flowery Path of Evil?" (悪の華道を追いましょう). Art by Yamashiro Umeta  Story by Mafuyubi. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5872cw/) 5. "I Shall Take You up on Your Offer With Pleasure" (そのお言葉、喜んでお受けいたしますわ). Art by Oshitsuji Ei  Story by Kiraku Naohito. By Kanade Yumika 3. "I Love You So Much I Can't Help It" (愛しているから仕方のない話). Art by Kida Yonoichi  Story by Sakaki Dora. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8011gg/) 4. "Reincarnated Ladies Want to be Wedded to Their Loved Ones" (転生令嬢たちは愛する者と結ばれたい). By Chiaki Rie 5. "The Nightmarish Graduation Party" (悪夢の卒業パーティー). Art by Yatsuhashi Hachi  Story by Funineko. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3653gl/) 6. "Akuyaku Reijou Sasenasai" (悪役令嬢…させなさい!!; "Make Me Into a Villainess"). By Kawano Akiko+++ +++ +++**Volume 5 Contents:** 1. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9230cy/) 3. "The Melancholic Noble Girl Clad in a Jet-Black Dress" (やさぐれ令嬢は漆黒のドレスを纏う). By Hizuki 4. "Now That My Engagement Is Broken  I Can Have My Fill of My Beloved Sweets" (婚約破棄されたので愛するお菓子を満喫します). By Kagari Touya 5. "Shall We Lay Waste to the Flowery Path of Evil?" (悪の華道を潰しましょう). Art by Yamashiro Umeta  Story by Mafuyubi. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8188gz/) +++ +++**Volume 6 Contents:** 1. "Let's Burn the Flowery Path of Evil" (悪の華道を燃やしましょう). Art by Yamashiro Umeta  Story by Mafuyubi. [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/s6442c/) +++ +++**Volume 7 Contents:** 1. "The Villainess Will Happily Break Her Engagement for Her OTP" (悪役令嬢は推しカプのために婚約破棄をご所望です). By Kashii Aoi. 2. "The Villainess Becomes a Bad Girl to Become Happy" (悪役令嬢は幸せになるために悪い女になる). Art by Mimasaka  Story by Maa (まぁ). [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0522gu/)  [English Translation](https://www.novelupdates.com/series/the-villainess-becomes-evil-to-live/) 3. Violent Action Comedy about a talking stray pug who's waiting for someone to pick him up from the streets. He happens to save a young woman from rape & abduction and the girl agrees to take him in aftwards. As it turns out  she's not a normal girl but a yakuza clan daughter. Luckily  the pug isn't a regular dog either  but a super strong badass fighter.    (Synopsis by Manga Mogura)

tags: Monsters|Action|Demons|Comedy|Office Workers|Post-Apocalyptic|Sexual Violence|Gore|Horror|Monster Girls|Slice of Life
description: A semi-fictional autobiography of the creation of Devilman.

The much-anticipated serialization of the popular SNS sensation "Rabbit × Miniature Garden × Dark Fantasy" begins!! With white ears  pale skin  and red eyes  Teddy the rabbit is shunned at the orphanage due to his unusual appearance. One day  he receives an invitation from someone claiming to be his father  leading him to a mysterious Western-style mansion. There  he meets Adele  someone who shares the same peculiar traits as him...

After the soldiers' mercenary group where he used to work had been utterly destroyed  Loren  who survived the disaster  decided to walk the adventurer’s path as a way to make a living. However  for Loren who had no acquaintances and empty pockets  receiving a single quest seemed like a faraway aim. So  as he was contemplating about what he should do next  another adventurer called out to him. ___ **Character Designer:** [peroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/18c02af4-21c4-4b2a-a75a-6f0c5ee3d172/peroshi)

Manga adaptation of Romance of the Three Kingdoms  illustrated by the legendary Mitsuteru Yokoyama. Serialized from 1972~1986  it has since become the most famous manga adaptation of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms.  ----  **Won the 20th Japanese Cartoonist Association Excellence Award in 1991**

title_en: Lalalab☆ ~Gal to Kagaku to Seishun to!~
description: Lala Mizusawa might look like a flashy gyaru and act high-energy  but don’t be fooled—she’s a hardcore science geek and a third-year biology major with dreams of becoming a great scientist! While her lofty goal sometimes shakes her confidence  she’s got her quirky labmates to keep her going: the refined and otaku-spirited Karen Naito  and the lazy pajama-wearing Toki Busujima. Together  they celebrate the thrill of growing microbes  steam sweet potatoes in the autoclave  and dive headfirst into their delightfully chaotic campus life (if you can call it that)! ☆

title_en: A cross-dressing man (usually a serious salaryman) whose cross-dressing was probably discovered by the moving company.

description: Subaru  a third grader  was telling her twin brother Kazuma  who had only a few days left to live  about the daily events of her life through dancing. She thought she was dancing for Kazuma  but the joy of dancing was already burned into her mind. However  because of this incident  she will have to carry a heavy sense of guilt for the rest of her life....

Sakura  the last surviving princess of a fallen kingdom  is being hunted down for the power of Ambrosia she possesses - the ability to grant divine strength  but only to a human. With no human companion  she decides to summon one from another world in a desperate attempt to find a knight to protect her  but the man who answers her call is less than what she had hoped for.
Suzu-chan wonders how Sacchan can read her mind so well. Is it a sign Sac-chan is her soulmate? All Suzu-chan knows is she can't help how crazy her feelings are.

title_en: Dragon ball An Earth without Goku
description: This is a non official-non DBM cannon copy-paste fancomic based in the Universes 3 and 9 of Dragon Ball Multiverse: what would have happened if Goku never went to Earth?  In Universe 3 Bardock organized a saiyan rebelion  overthrowing the frost demons. And Kakarotto wasn´t send to Earth (though he lived to adulthood in the Saiyan Empire). This events are described in the chapters written by Salagir and drawn by Faye.  In Universe 9  as seen in the first pages of this copy-paste comics. Kakarotto is shot down by Coola.  That´s why in both U3 and U9 (and U1 and U10 also we´ll see someday) there was an Earth without Goku  and so events there were identical  for a time  in both Universes

15-year-old swordsman Souta Kazama owns a katana with a turquoise gem. However  he discovered that the world is bigger than he thought. Advanced cities  digital swords  and strong fighters! But his dream is to travel around the world!  (Translated with author's permission)

Meet Harada Takumi—not even in junior high and he's the best pitcher in the region  although he's frustrated and ready to give up  because he can't find a catcher who is good enough to keep up with how he pitches in this backwater town his family has just moved to. Then along comes a kid named Nagakura Gou…

Lured into a small village that hold a great history  linked by blood  to his silver hair; Damien discovers a village of otherworldly beings and his not so great connection to them. ‣ Update with new chapter once every 2 months
Gold Award in the 21st Dengeki Grand Prize.  Later published in Weekly Comic Dengeki Daioh magazine in September 2014.

A demigod's purpose is to serve gods and mortals from birth to death  reincarnating to repeat the cycle. Carrying out her duties  a young demigod is sent out on a routine mission to exorcise a spirit but finds more than she bargained for. Secrets are unearthed  conspiracies are formed  and the demigods find themselves as pawns in a divine game played by gods.

What do world governments do when they learn that fantastical beings are not merely fiction  but flesh and blood-not to mention feather  hoof  and fang? Why  they create new regulations  of course  like the Interspecies Cultural Exchange Accord! When twenty-something Kimihito Kurusu becomes an involuntary “volunteer” in the government homestay program for monster girls  his world is turned upside down.  A lamia named Miia is sent to live with him  and it’s Kimihito’s job to make sure the sexy snake girl integrates into everyday life. While cold-blooded Miia is hot for Kimihito  the penalties for interspecies breeding are dire. Even worse  when a buxom centaur girl  and a scantily-clad harpy move into Kimihito’s house  what’s a full-blooded young man with raging hormones to do?

title_en: Takuran Joshi wa Takaraka ni Warau
description: A Wonderful Husband  a Wonderful Life  and an Adorable Child with the One I Love— I want to live the perfect married life! But that was just a dream.  Office worker Rena marries Ryūsuke  a senior colleague with a high income. "I'll seduce this rich guy and make him mine♪" —It was a calculated marriage from the start.  But Ryūsuke turns out to be not only emotionally abusive but also unbearably creepy in bed! (I don’t want to have this man's child…!) He has money  but the ideal marriage filled with love is nothing more than a distant fantasy.  Then  in her lowest moment  Rena reunites with Kento—her old crush! Kento is kind  handsome… but completely broke!  —Then why not just have his baby and raise it with her husband's money♪  What will be the fate of Rena  the cunning "cuckoo woman" who lives by her own rules!?
Sex

Kaji Ryusuke is a second son of a great politician. However  his father and brother both pass away from a car accident. Now  those who supported Ryusuke's father want Ryusuke to carry on the family business as a politician. At first  Ryusuke tries to get out of the responsibility  but he eventually enters an election to become a politician.   The manga chronicles Ryusuke's rise in the world of Japanese politics.

A struggling voice actress who goes by the name of Yunimaru is barely making ends meet. Constantly thinking about when she will escape her miserable life  she's contacted by Konno Sayaka—a beautiful and successful woman working for a big company—with a job offer: to read a farewell letter at her own funeral. While grappling with whether or not to accept such an absurd job offer  Sayaka makes her a proposal that she can't refuse. Now with an opportunity to escape her situation  Yunimaru also finds herself aiding Sayaka in the completion of her letter.

Kojiro is an impoverished young teacher and the supervisor of his high school’s kendo club. He doesn’t have the leeway to spend time on his students–he can barely feed himself as it is. So when an old friend makes him a bet with an entire year’s worth of deluxe sushi on the line  Kojiro finds a new purpose in life: to beat his friend’s kendo team! But before he can arrange a kendo meet for both schools’ kendo teams  he needs to actually put together a five-woman squad–and the first girl he needs is Tamaki Kawazoe  kendo athlete extraordinaire and daughter of an elite kendo dojo master. The problem is  she isn’t really interested in doing kendo for fun. What can Kojiro do to convince her to join the team?

Usami Nagisa is a yankee who suffers from a supposed "rare disease" which causes her health to decline if she feels lonely. Sewa Natsuhito  the boy who sits next to her in class realizes this and keeps her company  but the only way Usami believes she can cure her "illness" is to make lots of friends  a process she might find quite difficult due to her aggressive looks and personality.

Ayumu is a hardworking yet timid kid who is constantly being bullied. After one day of being bullied  he finds himself being punched into the air… and waking up in a boxing gym! Thus  Ayumu's quest to become "just a little bit" stronger begins with the two wacky members of the Gold Boxing Gym. Will Ayumu finally stand up for himself or will his timidness get the better of him?
Three chapters have been published in ALL KAIDAN from Issue 04 to Issue 07.

"I ended up seeing that girl in my class who didn't want to be seen by anyone"—The bright and cute Mizuki who selflessly takes care of her sick mother—Seemingly the perfect “good girl” in every respect. But what about Umino  who saw a girl like that in a way she absolutely should not have? What is arriving at the end of escaping from reality? This is sure to be a road trip story about sad girls

Many myths  folktales  and legends are filled with themes related to sexuality!! What is the true fieldwork of Daimaru Todoroki  an associate professor at a university who researches these myths and local traditions?!

After turning 30 as a NEET  Kyousuke was kicked out of his parents' house.  That's when Rui  his closest friend  proposes a solution: to get married  then divorce!   A guy and girl who've been 'just friends' for around a decade decide to enter a pretend marriage. He's a romantic and she's just a pragmatic girl.  A pair unsuited for marriage. What will they discover after 100 days together?

Yoshida Yoshio  a boy who has been playing the violin since he was a child in order to live up to his parents' expectations. He feels burdened by this situation and is unable to fit in at his new school  leading a lonely life. One day  Yoshio spots a girl he has never seen before  Amano Tessera  in his classroom. Suspicious of her existence  Yoshio chases after Tessera  but...  (Source: Natalie  translated)

"From now on  keep an eye on me  okay?" Ichinose Kaname and Aizawa Ryo are high school boys who live in the same dorm room and practice together after school despite belonging to different clubs . One day  Ryo is suddenly asked by Kaname to "protect him." Kaname says it's because the seniors in his dorm are teasing him too much  and Ryo accepts. However  when it comes down to it  Kaname has an even more serious agenda...  Chiaki-kun Mimamori Kurabu (Spinoff From)

title_en: Honkai Impact 3rd - Secret of the God Keys
description: A story arc that explores the fall of the previous civilization at the hands of the Honkai despite their unmatched technological capabilities. It Unravels the mysteries of the surrounding God Keys  a series of thirteen powerful weapons that were a statement of humanity's last stand.     ---  Main Story :    [# Book 1001 = Escape From The Sky](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)    [# Book 1002 = Cherry Blossom Recall](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)    [# Book 1003 = Mystery of Stigmata](https://mangadex.org/manga/26804/honkai-impact-3rd-mystery-of-stigmata)    [# Book 1006 = Anti-Enthrophy Invasion](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)    [# Book 1007 = Gratitude Arc](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)    [# Book 1008 = Moon Shadow](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)       ---  Side Story :   [# Book 1004 = Violet Sea Tales](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)    [# Book 1005 = Dark Sakura Tales | Guns Girl SchoolDayZ EX - Sakura Arc](https://mangadex.org/manga/15560/guns-girl-schooldayz-ex)    [# Book 1009 = Purple Kite's Tales](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)    **# Book 1010 = Secret of the God Keys**   [# Book 1012 = 2nd Herrscher/Lawman](https://mangadex.org/title/30935/honkai-impact-3rd-2nd-lawman)       ---  Spin-off :   [# Book 1011 = When Kiana Play Honkai Impact](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   [# Book 1013 = Valkyries' Dining Escapades](https://mangadex.org/manga/26179/honkai-impact-3-valkyries-dining-escapades)   [# Book 1014 = Summer Memories](https://mangadex.org/title/30931/honkai-impact-3rd-summer-memories)
Fanbook following the Justice Task Force  specially their leader  Tsurugi.

Joseph lived an ordinary life and it all took a turn when he realized he was being stalked. First  his school  then his locker  his phone and eventually his home- every aspect of his life was infiltrated by his stalker. Joseph is at his wits' end when Glen  a stranger  steps into his life at just the right moment and offers him a helping hand.     ---

Konakai Futaba loves her older sister more than anything else in the world. Kind  beautiful and intelligent  Ichina was everything that Futaba wished that she could be… she even encouraged Futaba when she was feeling down.      As such  Futaba went to the same highschool as Ichina  hoping to be reunited after two whole years of being apart…      …but sadly  Ichina has completely changed from the sweet  gentle sister that Futaba remembers.

Moscow Calling takes place in Russia in 2000. This story is about Georgiy Lastochkin  an 18-year old Russian student with a mysterious stand. Living in Vladivostok  he studies at a local university  and happens to have a crush on one of his classmates. On one end he has to deal with his everyday life as a student - on the other  he needs to deal with the mysteries of his Stand.      One day he begins travelling throughout Russia  all the way from Vladivostok to Moscow! There are sure to be faithful friends and clever enemies  comedy and drama  and of course - Stand battles. Learn what it means to be a Russian Stand user in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Moscow Calling!

"Alcafus" is the story of Tasuku—the protagonist—who one day as a child meets a mysterious girl with animal ears and tail. Finding her collapsed at the shrine  Tasuku presents her some candy and looks after her. 10 Years later  hearing her voice calling for him he returns to the shrine  and strays into a mysterious world.

Ren Yoruno is an ordinary high school boy whose hobby is writing web novels. However  he finds that due to his lack of interactions with the opposite sex  he has no idea how to write female characters. That’s when he finds an ad about a miracle drug that can make you understand the feelings of women. But when he drinks it…

title_en: Mob Kousei no Ore Demo Boukensha ni Nareba Riajuu ni Naremasuka?
description: It has been decades since labyrinths first appeared in the modern world of Japan  bringing with them monsters and related catastrophes. With this brought many changes; the biggest one being a new profession called 'Adventurer' and the monster cards they use to summon their own monsters to fight and conquer labyrinths with.  Kitagawa Utamaro  nickname Maro  is a mob highschooler who becomes an adventurer due to being incited by a former friend of his having sudden social success among their peers simply by becoming an adventurer himself. However  things aren't quite as easy for Maro. Just becoming an adventurer in name only isn't enough for him to gain his spotlight  giving him no recourse but to actually tackle labyrinths with the peculiar and not very versatile monster cards that he barely manages to scrape up. ___ [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0112fi/)  (JP)
This content is a brand webtoon from FL Mobile Korea  telling the story of the mobile game Invincible through the creators Yoon In-wan and Yang Kyung-il.  The legend of the Nine Dragons begins!

Yuichi Shiro is a foolish  narcissistic  and oblivious teenage boy. After a sudden incident his once ordinary life goes through great changes. How will the optimistic self proclaimed genius handle the life he will lead from now on? As well as handle the new acquaintances and enemies it brings with it. Let the story of action  life  romance and stupidity begin. (Original Web [Novel](https://www.fictionpress.com/s/3068594/1/Soul-Anomaly)).

A “yandere cafe”… It’s an interactive cafe where you can safely enjoy yandere! The yandere loving high schooler Kuraki-kun is thrilled by the yandere moves of the staff!!! Huh  but wait… The staff who act out the yandere role gradually become captivated by the naturally adorable Kuraki-kun… and what was supposed to be an act becomes the real deal…?! This is a comedy about staff acting like yandere x a yandere loving high school boy who unconsciously creates yandere! Volume 1!
A story about a man called Jamy Trying to achieve his goal of becoming a great Hero YouTube: DerpresoJay  IG:@jays_artarchive34     @Derpreso Jay  Twitter: jay_art enjoyer

title_en: Ore no Imouto ga Saikou no Okazudatta
description: Miyu  my own sister  catches me masturbating to my favorite "sister" erotic game! She's always cool  straightforward  and a bit salty  but for some reason  she ends up helping me masturbate...! I began to cum on my little sister's skin and have her touch it! After a lot of skinship  now I can't bust a nut unless I'm thinking of her!  Genichiro Kazami's popular Web novel about little sisters is now available as a comic book by Hayate Asakura  a moe illustrator!

Nagai's ecchi parody of Mikiya Mochizuki's [Wild 7](https://mangadex.org/title/b5e3ba0f-f735-4a32-a617-2bd3db500091/wild-7?tab=chapters)  (from ebookjapan):  The Seven Soldier Family is the world's most powerful mercenary family. We call them the "Mild 7"!  Wherever they go  they have no enemies. Where the Mild 7 goes  Mild 7 kills everyone who stands in their way! Led by hippie dad Dolaemon  36 years old  the Mild 7 make use of machine guns  missiles  rockets  tanks  fighter planes  and even a submarine battleship  the Yamato  which was converted from the sunken Yamato  in their basement.   This is Go Nagai's quintessential masterpiece  a messily erotic and violent work!

The Gokumon House  a bloodline originating from hell. Within the mystery-filled ancient city of Kyoto stands their citadel; they are feared not only by the seedy underworld of sorcery  but by monsters too. Gokumon Nadeshiko  a descendant of this cursed family  is fated to devour monsters. A most beautiful girl  born from the flames of cremation; her very being brings about bad omens.  However... "Nadeshiko. I see. You are as lovely as your name." Ichijiku Amana  a most peculiar  mysterious  yet gorgeous woman. Their encounter changed Nadeshiko as Amana faced her with a fearless smile. A creature lurks in the painted ceiling. Boxes packed with human sacrifice. A twisted curse upon a school. A beast who deceives humans. Haunted by a formless ghost. As the two are faced with one mystery after another  they are ultimately confronted by what they tried to leave behind.  "If it weren't for you  I would've remained an Oni."  An Oni with the heart of a human  and a human burdened with a corrupt soul. The bond they form will cut the seal on this blood-soaked tale.

tags: Comedy|Fantasy|Monster Girls|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: The daily experiences of modern monster girls.       Original comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821)  uploaded to MangaDex with permission.

Childhood friends Rokuto and Nanami are boyfriends.  To Rokuto  Nanami can be stoic  yet spoils him with his affection. Yet  there are times where Nanami comes off as weirdly disconnected at times that there may possibly be…?

Komori Shuri is a junior high school girl who is too nice to decline requests. Constantly doing favors for other people has given her incredible powers?! But even so  she is also an adolescent junior high school girl.

Yuri  a high school student obsessed with efficiency  gets his hands on a watch that can make time feel twice as fast. What starts with skipping boring classes soon leads to him speeding up his entire life.

**From Toriyama's World:**   Yaiba's whole life has been spent training to be a samurai and he doesn't know about anything else  not even girls. When he returns to Japan  a pair of cursed swords makes life even more exciting… and hilarious.      Note: Starting at chapter 80  EMS Team started using bunko scans  so the volume numbering is a little different.      --- - **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award in 1993**  - Published in Indonesian by Elex Media Komputindo as **Yaiba**

Yuki  a girl living in a rural town  studies art with the goal of becoming a painter in the city. One day  her sister leaves the town to fulfill her own dreams. Yuki boards the train with her to see her off  but during the journey  she is struck by a strange phenomenon!? Is it reality or an illusion... A chilling horror.

One day  the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him  but why...?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward  she's actually a kind and adorable girl.
Developed as instruments of war  the existence of the young Adou's have yet to be known by the residents of a futuristic globalised Japan. Join Riko as she spirals into a government conspiracy.

title_en: Legend of The King of Wolves
description: Iba decides to live as Genghis Khan  the "King of Wolves " and while ruling the surrounding countries  he trains his own son  Kublai  to become a military commander with the help of his trusted subordinate  Benkei. However  the facts of history are undeniable  and the year of Khan's death (1227) is approaching!! Now  the most powerful and greatest enemy appears in front of them!! Before reading this read "King of Wolves"!! (From the back of the book)

title_en: Shikabane Shoujo to Ai ga Omoi Sei-kishi no Toubatsu Gakuen Life
description: In a world where humans and fantastical creatures coexist. Shurika  a zombie  enters a boarding school where she learns to battle the "kyoujuu " creatures that threaten both races. There  for three years  the students live in pairs with members of the other race. Shurika is paired with Marie  a paladin with whom she has a certain affinity. But for some reason  Marie's affections for her is strangely overbearing...?   Serialization began in August 2023 in Yuri Hime.

The adventurer An is hit by the Peepee Devil's beam and grows a thing. An's thing stands up out of anger at the Peepee Devil! The curtain opens on a violently crazy ☆ fantasy comedy! ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/70185)

"Black as the devil  hot as hell  pure as an angel..." Is that love or coffee?  Kusama Kou isn't sure  especially after he rediscovers that his first childhood crush is now a widowed coffee shop owner by the name of Sakurada.  Sakurada-san's kind  soothing  with an amazing voice  and much older than Kou - i.e. exactly Kou's type. So he wastes no time in getting himself hired part-time at Sakurada Coffee Shop  but is there really any hope for his love to be returned...?

Universal Century 0121: A battle known as the First Oldsmobile War erupted on Mars. The Earth Federation Forces 13th Experimental Combat Group thought they had quelled the Mars Independent Zeon Forces. But the battle for the Fastest Formula is far from over!

Born as a daughter of a gangster family  Hanazame Ranko longs for an "ordinary romance". However  the young head of another group  Sumikawa  always bothers her! People are scared away because of Sumikawa  who is said to be the worst in the underworld! However  he always sticks by her and if she falls in love with him  whe can't go back to "normal" anymore. A heroine who never wants to fall in love x a young head who plays with her  a love struggle without justice  breaks out here!
A serialization of the webcomic about a maid  Meika  who can't completely suppress her feelings for her master  Kouta.

title_en: Wotaku ni Koi wa Muzukashii Comic Anthology
description: Minekura Kazuya ([Saiyuki](https://mangadex.org/title/cc8643f2-5ede-4b0a-9bcd-8994a201b45b/))  Azusa Kina ([After School at the Coffee Shop](https://mangadex.org/title/eab8c668-0030-413d-97f9-c6f0cae8ed42/))  Namori ([YuruYuri](https://mangadex.org/title/6306c976-d776-48c3-b29f-d345e65f272b))  etc... A splendid writing team participates! The official comic anthology of the popular manga [Wotakoi: Love Is Hard for Otaku](https://mangadex.org/title/65263bf9-4f87-4513-b72f-ad6436b3911c)  which has sold a total of over 9 million copies (including digital editions)!  ---  Contributors: Cover: Fujita Illustrations: Akiyoshi Shima  Sachiko  Namori  Haida Nanako Manga:  1. Azusa Kina 2. Konno Paru 3. Hachiya Kujira 4. Shiromanta 5. Yamaguchi Eito 6. Dorokawa Megumi 7. Kakitsubata Waka 8. Nagao Uka 9. Anno 10. Tachi Aoi 11. Medamayaki 12. Nouichi Nye 13. Minami Kiri 14. Megane 15. Asahi Noboru 16. Minekura Kazuya

A mystery murder case shatters Lan Zhiqing's serene and blissful life into pieces. The past she has long forgotten returns in the form of a nightmarish case  encroaching ever the closer... Shocked  Lan Zhiqing discovers that the most dangerous existence may just be the person she shares a bed with.

title_en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity I: Quarantined Territory of Malice  Shinjuku - Shinjuku Phantom Incident
description: The curtain rises on Pseudo-Singularity I. The stage: Shinjuku. Fight alongside mysterious new Servants in a prison district cut off from the outside world.

title_en: Maseki Gourmet - Mamono no Chikara wo Tabeta Ore wa Saikyou!
description: A reincarnated boy with a secret skill aims to become the great king!  Ein reincarnated as a noble with the skill "Toxin Decomposition EX". The skill was not something he wanted  so he was disappointed... but then learns that he has a very rare talent to absorb magic power by eating magic stones. They even taste good! He then found out that his real identity was a prince of the largest kingdom of the continent. He was luckier than he thought!  (Source: BookWalker Global)

tags: Award Winning|Action|Comedy|Sports|Martial Arts|Fan Colored|Philosophical|Drama|School Life|Slice of Life
description: Hajime no ippo is a manga that has been ongoing for 33 years  and us at UnderStar studios thought we would color the whole thing  Premise of story: Hajime No Ippo is a Japanese boxing manga series that follows the story of Ippo Makunouchi  a timid high school student who discovers a passion for boxing after being rescued from bullies by a professional boxer  Takamura Mamoru  leading him to pursue a career in the sport and overcome various challenges to become a champion  going through strong opponents with special signature moves and struggling to claw his way to the top. ALL RIGHTS GO TO MORIKAWA GEORGE.

Choi Yeon was abandoned by her friends and family. Now a university student  she has started working as a private tutor for a son of a rich family in Seongbuk-dong to hide her poverty. By chance  while working there she met Ji Shinhyuk  the older brother of her student.  Shinhyuk  the real owner of the house  completely ignored Yeon as if she was a mere object. But one day  he began to call on Yeon to perform menial errands. Some days  he would be crude; others  disrespectful. He would provoke Yeon with his indecipherable expression. Despite that  Yeon began to foster a growing attraction toward Shinhyuk  and hoped she would eventually catch his eye...  --- **Official Raws** [Ridibooks R15 ver.](https://ridibooks.com/books/3093001461) [Ridibooks R19 ver.](https://ridibooks.com/books/3093001173)

Ayato  a boy who spent his childhood being raised by an overseas terrorist organization  is troubled by the fear of his own power and his own worth. The school that came to scout him is... "Murder School". A vivid dark action that fights the good and evil of life with the words "There is a life that can be saved by killing"! Re: imboss

A forty-year-old single woman  obsessed with City Hunter manga  is hit by a train only to find herself in the world of her favorite manga.  Big fan of Ryou Saeba since her teenage years  she will do all she can to live a love story with him.  --- Official Release: - French release by Ki-oon (2019) - Indonesian release by Akasha (2020) - Italian release by Panini Comics (2019)

title_en: Blink Master of the Magic Academy
description: In the game Aether World  **Baek Yuseol** is considered the most useless character because he can't use magic like everyone else. His only skill  Blink  is a short-range teleportation ability most players consider worthless. But when he’s tasked with reaching the game's true ending  Baek Yuseol decides to use his unconventional skill to achieve this impossible goal.   Can this so-called "**TRASH**" character outsmart his powerful peers  form unlikely alliances  and ultimately master the game?

I  Ji Qing  crossed into the Gaowu version of the Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period.  You have a sword  I can't die!  You have the magic of the world  I can't die!  You have a nearly-godlike move  I still can't die!  An ordinary person who can't die no matter what  how will I fare in this war-torn world of rigorous battles?

In a small town on the outskirts of Tokyo lives a little shop  "Hibana's: Cafe & Flowers " owned and tended to by Anna Hibana. With the outgoing Emil Yamanishi moving into the apartment above  Anna's calm shop-life will now be mixed with action and excitement! ...and some quiet and slow relaxation and romance.
Spin-off of Sakamoto Days.

title_en: Please Give Me Your Blood  I Will Serve You in Gratitude
description: A young man rescues a young vampire girl who has fallen ill; she tries to give her all to repay him for his blood  but she's too clumsy to do so. A vampire rom-com that depicts a warm life among different species where no one is left behind or abandoned!  A long-awaited new series by the author of "Demon Mother: My Son is so Cute  I Just Can't Help Myself!"

Noel Cerquetti  a girl who lost her arms and legs in a contract  works together with the great devil Caron  to get her revenge against one man.      This man – dubbed the "pride of the citizens" – is Burrows  the mayor of LaPlace.      Why is this girl furiously seeking revenge against this unrivalled man  loved by the people for bringing peace to LaPlace that was once overrun by the mafia?      While unsteady without her limbs  Noel doesn't give up on her path of revenge  as Caron watches mercilessly  at times risking his own life to support her.      With vengeance  the pair begins their chase after Burrows.

title_en: Classmate wa Isekai Ten'i nanoni Watashi wa Isekai Tensei
description: While her classmates all get transported to another world  Akari alone dies and is reincarnated as a beautiful girl in that world. Even when trouble comes her way  she remains positive and cheerful  boldly embracing her second chance at life. Her days are filled with crushing shitty nobles  taking down criminal organizations  and staying extremely optimistic... It is clear why she was so well-liked by her classmates!!!

title_en: Isekai de Mizu no Dai Seirei Yattemasu
description: When the laid-back high school student Saejima Nagi wakes up from a nap  he finds himself in a lake in another world!? After learning that he is the "Great Water Spirit" whose essence is the lake  Nagi uses the power that resides within him to heal those suffering from injuries and illnesses. One day  Nagi is led by a voice calling for help and is summoned by a boy. This encounter will greatly change Nagi's fate...

The Yakuza boss is... a cat?! The "brown tiger" group boss  Oyaji. Yanagi  the new recruit in the Yakuza  and the gang members are once again at the mercy of the carefree Oyaji today... But it's not that bad. ___ The title "Like a Cat"  or "Neko ga Gotoku"  is a parody of the Yakuza game series' title which is "Like a Dragon" or "Ryu ga Gotoku".

title_en: The Guy Who Tried to Pick Up a Girl With a Girlfriend
description: A guy gets more than he bargained for.  - [Original Oneshot](https://twitter.com/minori_chigusa/status/1455072509494054914) - [Character Intro](https://twitter.com/minori_chigusa/status/1464506968882565124/photo/1) - [Extra #1](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/94002091) - [Extra #2](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/94153143) - [Extra #3](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/94454357) - [Extra #4](https://twitter.com/minori_chigusa/status/1467755669944418308) - [Extra #5](https://twitter.com/minori_chigusa/status/1470295384857915392)

title_en: Neko ni Tenseishita kedo Hima nano de Geema Joshi to Issho ni VRMMO wo suru
description: I am a cat. My name is Nanahoshi. In my previous life  my name was Hokuto Kurokawa. I lost my life in an unexpected accident. I was then reincarnated  not as a human  but as a cat...! Moreover  not in another world  but in the same world just several years in future...! But don't worry  because I was taken in by a household that has a full dive VRMMO that even cats can play. The game world basically takes the place of another world! Because of this  I might even be able to use cheats in this world(game world)!? Alongside my master  the super popular actress "Kanako Nakamura " her popular voice actress friend "MYU " and many pretty NPCs. I should be able to have my fill of adventure inyaa this game world(Isekai.)

Side story of the Young Kindaichi Case Files. The cases in this series are:  1. "File 1 Testimony Puzzle/Alternative title: The Murder Train" (FILE1 証言パズル  "Fairu Ichi Shōgen Pazuru"?) 2. "File 2 Killing Poker/Alternative title: Unlucky Men in the Rain" (FILE2　殺人ポーカー  "Fairu Ni Satsujin Pōkā"?) 3. "File 3 Dead Person's Checkmate/Alternative title: The Great Chess Player  Akechi" (FILE3 死者のチェックメイト  "Fairu San Shisha no Chekkumeito"?) 4.
