"File 4 Ghost Hotel Murder Case/Alternative title: The Encounter" (FILE 4 幽霊ホテル殺人事件  "Fairu Yon Yūrei Hoteru Satsujin Jiken"?) 5. "Special Story Supt.Akechi Morning's Pretty Scenery" (スペシャルストーリー明智警視　優雅なる朝の風景  "Supesharu Sutōrī Akechi Keishi Yūga Naru Asa no Fūkei"?)

The story follows antique store worker Imagawa  aging doctor Kuonji  and writer Sekiguchi  who are all fascinated by mysterious events happening in Hakone  including a series of murders of Buddhist monks and a little girl in a kimono who wanders through the mountains.      Tesso no Ori is an adaptation of the fourth novel of Kyogoku Natsuhiko's Hyakki Yakou series.
Extermination of swarming dragonflies.  On my first job as a psychic’s assistant  I thought it would just be odd jobs unrelated to spirits.

Honda  who lived that day while erasing his traces  meets a mysterious transvestite man  Himemiya. Himemiya makes Honda work at a rain fog security company. The face behind the rain fog guard is a spy who sneaks into the truth of a person and reveals the truth. It was human intelligence. A honey trap battle action full of laughter and sadness presented by Matsuri of "Bakemono no Yoru Tsuzukushi"!

After 150 years of terraforming  Aqua  the planet formerly known as Mars  now has over 90% of its surface covered by water. A young girl named Akari Mizunashi arrives at the city of Neo-Venezia  an exact replica of the old Italian city of Venice  hoping to become an Undine  the most coveted job on Aqua. Follow Akari's adventures as she discovers the wonders of Aria in this prequel to the popular Aria anime and manga series.

I feel like I forgot about someone important...  Plagued by nightmares of his old hometown  Yuuma Kurose  a lonely boy with the ability to see ghosts  feels inexplicably drawn back to the place from his dreams. There  he stumbles upon Kaito Kiriyama  a boy shrouded by terrifying spirits. With a serious look in his eyes  Kaito vows he'll protect Yuuma. But the moment their skin makes contact  the spirits surrounding Kaito started to possess Yuuma!

A very special prison with only women!  Ahn Taeseong  one of the world's leading conglomerates  creates a very special women's prison in order to protect his precious daughter Jiae. There  Jiae forms her own harlem and continues her debauchery life. However  there she also meets Eunha  who has been charged with attempted murder. Intrigued by the other woman  Jiae pretends to help Eunha in her jailbreak plan  but falls into a world of lust with her...
All we have left to do is eat.
A story of a high school girl named Mochikawa.

title_en: Cheat Eater Isekai Shoukan Kotogotoku Horobubeshi
description: A common scene. A person dies  their soul sent to the great beyond. A goddess plucks it from the ether and offers a deal - she will send the soul to another world she has created. She will also bequeath the human with skills that are so powerful they could be considered cheats. The goddess only asks for one thing in return: that they use their special powers to save her world from destruction.   The soul is summoned to another world and given the powers of a demigod. And as power corrupts  so too do the summoned humans abuse their abilities for wanton greed and violence.   Zyzz is a slave of one such otherworlder  who voluntarily became his servant to search for his sister. Then one day  he meets Kaina  a woman who calls herself the "last summoned person"  who was hand-picked by the goddess to eat those who have reneged on their promises...
The wacky adventures of Fran  Veronica and the other strange creatures continue. More experiments  more medical miracles and more wondrous surprises.

One night in 2006  when they were young  the two brothers Mutta (born 1993) and Hibito (born 1996) saw what appeared to be a UFO heading for the moon. They decided that night to both become astronauts and travel out into space.      In 2025  Hibito has become an astronaut  and he's going to go to the moon. Mutta ended up following a more traditional career path with an auto development company. However  Mutta just ruined his career through a violent altercation with his boss. Now  not only has he lost his job  he appears to be blacklisted in the entire industry. Maybe this is a rare opportunity for Mutta to once again chase his childhood dream and become an astronaut like his little brother!

As the author of "Swordmaster Sade " Cha Sungmin had no idea how dangerous his plot-hole-riddled novel could be until he's reborn as Rasen Mayton  a spoiled side character destined to die at 17. As if being stuck in the body of a rude scumbag despised by everyone wasn't enough  Sungmin also discovers that he was reborn at a point before his story began.   With almost no knowledge about the current timeline  will Sungmin be able to survive in this unwritten world as House Mayton's youngest?

title_en: Shokei Sareta Kenja wa Lich ni Tensei Shite Shinryaku-sensou wo Hajimeru
description: The Sage Dwight  along with the Hero  defeated the Demon Lord who sank the world into darkness. However  they were falsely accused of becoming the next Demon Lords because of his power  and were thrown to The Valley of the Dead to die... But though his flesh has rotten away  he lives on as a skeleton because of his grudge against the world. Dwight has vowed to deny that wrong world  and with a power that surpasses even the Demon King of the past  and also leading countless Skeletons he's going to start an all out war...!

When he was a child  Ritsuki brought home a kitten and named it "Tama".  He spent his days raising the cute ball of fluff only for it to take the form of a young beast-man who goes by the name of "Shuri". However  as they become high schoolers  Ritsuki mysteriously starts to distance himself from Shuri who had always been by his side...

title_en: Elf ga Gendai ni Itara: Freeter-hen (Pre-Serialization)
description: **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55153) (Compiled with [Elf ga Gendai ni Itara (Anthology)](https://mangadex.org/title/1ecd7a5f-5854-4b40-9c1a-c5588f9e4c71/if-elves-existed-in-the-present-day)) - Defunct Official Raw - [Twitter Moment](https://twitter.com/i/events/1490269318818713602)

tags: Romance|Comedy|Fan Colored|Office Workers|School Life|Slice of Life|Adaptation
description: Following the spirit of the origins of our popular big-breasted girls of Himura Kiseki-sensei  presenting a special Blue Edition of the weekly chapters of Yanmaga magazine's serialization "Getsuyoubi no Tawawa"!  ---  Be sure to check out the published volumes released in Blue format in the Retail section  and the official English licensing by Denpa US (also in Blue)!

title_en: Tensei Kusushi Wa Meikyu Toshi Sodachi
description: Yulianne died right after taking the entrance exam for the Faculty of Pharmacy  only to find herself reborn in another world as the second daughter of a pharmacist. The labyrinth city of Trian  where she lives  is filled with adventurers who delve into dungeons  making it a fierce battlefield for apothecaries. Upon regaining the memories of her previous life  Yulianne resolves to build knowledge as an apprentice bookseller  hone her magic  dive into the labyrinth with her companions  and fulfill in this world the dream she once had. Yes—to become a first-class apothecary!

title_en: Uchi no meido ga kurasu no sukina ko ni nite iru
description: Eiga  the next head of the prestigious Kujo family  is in a serious predicament. That is  love. He wants to approach Himeka  a girl in his class whom he secretly has feelings for  but because it is his first love  he can't think of a good way to do it... At that moment  he decides to ask for advice from Maria  a maid of the same age who serves the Kujo family...!?

In a grand annual production secretly funded by the mafia  washed-up actor Lu Huaming is unexpectedly cast as the second male lead  alongside the wildly popular actor  Lu Zuo. However  filming delays test everyone's patience  especially that of Long Xiaoyue—the project’s supervisor and mafia boss's son. Frustrated by Huaming’s lackluster acting performance  Long Xiaoyue quickly becomes hostile toward him. Yet  as their interactions deepen  Long Xiaoyue begins to suspect that Huaming is carrying a hidden and painful burden.

Washing up on the shores of an unknown land  Benedict Arnold is plagued by voices detailing his life and all that has been said of him since his act of treason  true or otherwise. ‘THE ODYSSEY OF BENEDICT ARNOLD’ is an ongoing adventure tale following the infamous traitor  Benedict Arnold.

Muramoto is a dull university professor despised by his wife and disrespected by his students. His only salvation is the presence of Yoshino Misao  who treats him favorably. However  he discovers that his wife is having an affair. Muramoto  sinking into despair  is gently embraced by Misao...

Farewell  Koha-Ace! (For the fourth time)  The Koha-Ace series is finally running out of ideas and is about to be axed! Type-Moon fans will bear witness to Koha-Ace's final battle! You will see the tears of time... (Sixth and final entry in the Koha-Ace series  after Koha-Ace GO)

title_en: Henkyou ni Tsuihousareta Dai 5 Ouji wa "Kouun" Skill de Sakusaku Ikinobimasu
description: "Don't underestimate my reincarnation cheat!"  Elroy  the fifth prince of the Norgard royal family. He possesses the memories of his previous life and a cheat skill bestowed upon him during his reincarnation  which grants him luck that can turn the tide in dire situations [Luck - All or Nothing]. Although Elroy was recognized as a prodigy from a young age  his brilliance made him a target of disdain from his brothers  leading to his forced exile to the desolate and remote region of Ouroboroslant  where he was destined to die a miserable death. However  liberated from the palace's constraints  Elroy  alongside the strongest maid  utilizes his reincarnation cheat to transform the barren wasteland into a magnificent territory!

This is a four-panel comedy manga about Kobeni Yonomori  who on her 16th birthday suddenly has a young man with little presence named Hakuya Mitsumine and his little sister Mashiro appear in front of her. It turns out that Hakuya is her fiancé  and Mashiro is her future sister-in-law. The three (and Kobeni's overprotective big sister Benio) start living together under the same roof  and hilarious happenings occur.

A group of employees from the Fujitani Pharmaceutical Company are on a hiking trip. After the company suffered a crisis  the CEO hopes to improve teamwork and morale among new and old employees with this trip. Not everyone is as excited as he is. Unfortunately for them  they soon find themselves having to deal with problems that they weren't prepared for.      What's going to happen to these employees? Will they fall in love with hiking? Will they be able to work together  get along well  and bring the company back to its feet? Read and find out in this heartwarming story of adventure  friendship  and teamwork!

title_en: The Girl I Like Confessed to Me While Handing Me Cash
description: After being confessed to by his crush  Tachibana  Fujiwara finds himself in complete bliss. When faced with such a joyful occasion  one would normally accept the confession immediately. However  Tachibana's method of confession is quite peculiar—she tries to show her love by handing him a wad of money! Reluctant about exchanging money for love  Fujiwara turns down the offer. Thus begins Tachibana's adorable attempts at gaining Fujiwara's affection.

title_en: Imouto no Tomodachi ga Nani Kangaeteru no ka Wakaranai
description: My sister's friend Tsuyu-chan is a quiet girl who and I can't figure out what she is thinking. However  it doesn't seem that I'm much disliked… Acclaimed as "cute" on SNS! Daily popular short love comedy with a total of 1.1 million likes.

Mizuki and Kazuya  childhood friends  are 3 years apart.   It's not really a so-called "Age Gap" but that makes some distance between them during their youth.   From their childhood to the present  the story will be told about these two who are 3 years apart.        ---  **Links:**   - [![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Artist’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=596062)   - [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Artist’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/shimazakikazumi)
Fantasy adventuring comedy starring Karla the dark elf cleric who invested too much on her taunting skills and Alvin the swordsman who has to put up with her.

Everyone dreams of knocking out their insufferable boss  but what if that boss is a war hero  a duke  and constantly breathing down your neck? For Chloe  enduring Curtis's relentless inspections was a daily struggle... Until a royal marriage decree offers her an unexpected way out.  --- Everyone has had the urge to punch their infuriating boss  but actually going through with it is hard. Especially when that boss is a war hero and a grand duke  no less. Chloe could only grit her teeth as she watched Curtis constantly conduct service inspections… but then  a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity presented itself. The king ordered Curtis to marry a noblewoman from another country  and he put forward his lieutenant  Chloe  as his lover. Now  the gun was in her hands… “First  get on your knees  Your Grace.”

title_en: Hitozuma Medusa-san to no NTR Seikatsu
description: Bookstore manager Tenma hasn't shown up for work or called in today. His employee  Asuka  worried about him  goes to his house and discovers... he's been petrified by his medusa wife! But surely they can return him to normal? Tenma left a letter saying that if anything happens to him  Asuka should take care of his wife. But Asuka is a guy who can only get excited by other mens' wives. Also  and most importantly for the plot - hot medusa wife.
Sumiko Kiyota is a plain  ordinary girl with a serious demeanor. While eating lunch alone as usual Yuki Shirakawa  the most beautiful and popular girl in class  calls out to her…

title_en: Hitori Camp shitara Isekai ni Teni shita Hanashi
description: Kaede  an office worker  is on a solo camping trip in the mountains to heal from a broken heart  when she finds herself in another world. At first  she is intimidated by the strange demons she has never seen before  but she gradually grows stronger and tougher. Fenrir and fairies also become her friends.
中でも過激な言動と、キュート＆クールなルックで高い人気を誇る、レベッカとその兄ピラル。いつでもどこでもトラブルばかり起こす彼らにも幼い頃から目指すものがあった…。それは、父親のような伝説的な「エッジランナー」になること──  テクノロジーと人体改造が一般化した巨大都市“ナイトシティ”で彼らは必死にもがき、苦しみ、そして破壊する…！そんな彼らの日常に、突如現れる謎の男“サフラン”とは…？

title_en: Shiro no Necromancer ~Shiryou Ou e no Michi~
description: After dying of sickness at 15  I had been reincarnated into the world of the MMORPG "War Chronicles of Desgarde"! The help feature taught me the basic summary of this world  but there seems to be additional secrets about me  aside from my reincarnation. Let's survive in this Isekai world to become the character I played in my previous life  a necromancer!  (Wait  there's a Necromancer King? What's that?!)

The story begins in Europe  during the first years of the XX century. On a background of intrigues  machinations and a Europe that is going straight toward World War I  three kids meet at a strict conservatory in Germany. Julius met Isaac at the famous Orpheus' Window and later in another event met Klaus there. The legend told that two lovers met at Orpheus' Window would end in unhappiness. But Julius met two different persons  and they didn't know Julius' secret. In fact  Julius is a woman who's forced to dress up and pretend to be a guy. But she isn't the only one who has secrets. Klaus  for example  is Russian. Is he a communist spy? Then the whirlwind of fate began.  Outside of Rose of Versailles  Window of Orpheus is considered to be Ikeda's representative work and the culmination of the themes of her works up to that point.  Note: Has a gaiden known as Collage. Additional gaiden were written by Ikeda  but illustrated by her longtime assistant Erika Miyamoto.
When I confessed my love to Sasaki-san... she's floating!? But only by 1 cm off the ground...!

A new Gundam war picture scroll  where giant "Tetsuki" scatter the sparks of conflict  is born!  "Sankin Koutai" a large battle tournament where fierce fighters selected from all over the country board giant armored warriors known as Tetsuki to determine the strongest. In order to fulfill his wish  Kotetsu Kisaragi with his "Gundam" Burai  throws himself into the harsh battle...!
Kazuyo hired a milf to be his girlfriend

Sano began his laid-back life in the middle of nowhere  with the three chicks he just happened to buy at a festival. But before he knew it  they had tails that reminded him of dinosaurs  became very large  and even started speaking.  "Why...!?" "Why?" "Why?" "Why?" "Don't ask that too!"  It's a strange  but full of healing mountain life with the chickens!

title_en: Isekai de Skill wo Kaitai Shitara Cheat na Yome ga Zoushoku Shimashita: Gainen Kousa no Structure
description: ***A harem cheat fantasy with super-enhanced slaves!***      When an entire bus of people was summoned to another world  Souma Nagi doesn't go along with the idea of being a Hero like the rest. Thus he leaves the palace and starts his life in another world with his ability to restructure skills. This is the first time I've ever been to a game where I've been able to do that & the first time I've ever seen a story about a girl who is a slave  a wife  and a cheat!
He loved her from a distance. He thought she was the one. But the wind never blew in his direction. A bittersweet tale os one-sided love  quiet efforts  and the pain

title_en: Henkyou Gurashi no Maou  Tensei shite Saikyou no Majutsushi ni naru
description: There was once a mage called The Lone Demon King on the frontier. He was just a creature that never grew old  but was also loved by the villagers as something of a guardian deity. However  he was destroyed by a magic organization that sees his existence as dangerous. 200 years later  he is reincarnated as the second son of an aristocrat and obtains the strongest magic power.  "Let's pretend to be a human this time."  However  being a human lover  he didn't particularly think of revenge and has decided to pretend to be human in this life. In his past life  he was the guardian deity of a region  and in this life  he's a local aristocrat who lacks common sense. He doesn't know how to take it easy. As the second son of an aristocrat  he is loved by his family and friends  and while he is regarded as a master of magic in the magic guild  he becomes an 'Immortal Mage' behind the scenes.

Translated from Amazon.com.jp.  Ordinary days  they are quite a blessing... A genius presents  a yonkoma about the daily life of a newlywed couple.  Iroha-san and Hajime-kun have just moved into a new house. They start from scratch  steadily building their lives together. Going out to buy home appliances  or visiting the convenience store late at night  such ordinary daily life is an irreplaceable happiness for the couple.  This is a book that gives readers an irresistibly warm feeling (while keeping the jokes just as sharp).

The story is about a boy who wants to confess his feelings to his childhood friend. Unfortunately  after choosing the place to confess  he gets crushed by a train and loses his lower half. He gets saved by a scientist that turns him into a monster instead of a regular human being. How is his life going to be like under the guise of being a monster? And what would his childhood friend think?!
Spin-off of One Piece  which takes place post-timeskip  showing the cast in SD/chibi form and features their hilarious antics around various islands while out in the sea.

Long  long ago in Neraland  the pious human built a great tower to show the respect to their Goddess Nera.   Goddess Nera was deeply moved by human piety; to reward them  she opened a door at the top of the tower. This ethereal door connected to another world; it was known as *Heaven's Eye*.   However…

Jaeshin sees dead people  and Officer Han can sniff out evil. Literally. Their search for a missing friend leads them and professional stuntwoman Yuhyeon into a tangled web of vile cover-ups and twisted violence. Can they handle the overpowering stench of evil?  ---  - [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/SUSPENSE/echou/list?title_no=1701)  - [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/thriller/stench/list?title_no=1744)  - [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/horror/rotten/list?title_no=2769)  - [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/horror/the-smell-of-evil/list?title_no=2110)
One day a young warrior girl meets a dwarf who dedicates himself to constructing houses for monsters. A tale of building houses for myriads of creatures begins! After all  everyone needs a home.
From their worst encounter comes a story about their ultimate happiness! This romantic comedy explores the ups and downs of a serious relationship.

title_en: Kono Bijutsubu ni wa Mondai ga Aru!
description: A girl with violently too much common sense  a boy whose sole ambition is to draw the perfect 2D bride  an addlebrained ghost member  and their always-sleeping president — what is *wrong* with this art club?!      [Alternative Raw](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM01000007010000_68/)

The meeting in Ueno between Lin Ge and Hiroki Asano began with a misunderstanding  but the two gradually built up their friendship despite language and cultural differences. This is a cute and funny story of a Chinese boy and a Japanese boy!
A young lady employs the services of a feline maid  but they both come to realize that the lines dividing them between "mistress" and "servant" are becoming increasingly blurry.

title_en: Advance of Z - The Flag of Titans
description: Set in U.C. 0084  before Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam  the story follows the Titans Test Team  Black Otter Team  on their mission to test new mobile suits for the Titans. It begins with Eliard Hunter  an Earth Federation mobile suit pilot being assigned to the Titans and transferring to the Aswan  an Alexandria class carrier. There he meets Carl Matsubara  another new Titans recruit  Audrey April a skilled pilot and chief of test operations and data gathering  and Wes Murphy  a veteran of the One Year War and the Delaz Conflict. The Black Otter team doesn’t just carry out test runs  it also participates in real combat missions against Zeon Remnants and later  against AEUG.       Manga adaptation of the photonovel of the same name.

title_ja: Yatara to Sasshi no Ii Ore wa  Dokuzetsu Kuudere Bishoujo no Chiisana Dere mo Minogasazu ni Guigui Iku
description: Koyuki Shirogane  a girl known for her beauty and equally harsh tone  giving her the nickname "Venomous Snow White " is saved by Naoya Sasahara as a man tried to hit on her. She may try to act strong  but on the inside  she is merely a young girl. Having been saved by Naoya  Koyuki falls for him  and Naoya on his end falls for Koyuki's innocent and cute attitude. Both fail to be honest with each other  but eventually bring themselves closer to admit their feelings for each other.  [Official English Light Novel](https://tentaibooks.com/en/books/from-toxic-classmate-to-girlfriend-goals-v1/)

title_en: Rental Kareshi no Oshiri o Goshimei
description: Sadistic corporate slave salaryman x party-animal university student. University student Iori Kakeru  who works hard at his part-time job as a rental boyfriend  receives a request from a man named Tamaki. His sincere appearance wins Iori over  and he falls for Tamaki's surprising plan…

tags: Psychological|Long Strip|Romance|Boys' Love|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Adaptation|Full Color
description: As soon as Jiang Cheng finds out he's adopted  he's abandoned by his adoptive family and sent to live with his deadbeat father  who has a gambling addiction. Everything about his new life  from his pathetic father to the unfamiliar environment  makes Jiang Cheng depressed. But then he meets Gu Fei  who's like a shining bright light in this run-down city  and the two become each other's salvation and hope. (Source: Tappytoon)

The long-awaited comic book adaptation of the popular social media series! How will the twisted relationship between the two end?  In a world still engulfed in war  Theo  who serves as a military lieutenant  feels uncomfortable around Kaguma  the captain of another unit  who constantly hits on him. However; one day  while shielding Theo from a sniper  Kaguma sustains an arm injury that takes a month to heal. Feeling responsible  Theo offers to nurse Kaguma for the month until he recovers  but... When he witnesses Kaguma masturbating  Theo ends up helping him deal with "that" as well...?  An army BL story between a doting captain and a tsundere vice captain  featuring awkward soldiers.

As the rates of **depression** rise abruptly around the world  **President** Elior Nova and  his *« family »* embark on an **introspective adventure** that will (or not) allow them to answer the **main question of life** :   *"What is the answer to this cryptic puzzle that is Happiness?"*

(from ebookjapan):  Joining the Rhythmic Gymnastics Club  a fateful encounter ensues! Hikari Kamijo transfers to Aika Junior High School  where she fatefully meets the next Rhythmic Gymnastics Queen  Hazuki Shiina  and the Gymnastics Club's Hope  Takaaki Oishi!  In the midst of a crowd of top athletes  Hikari faces an athlete selection test to compete in a national junior high school competition....　  This is the first volume of the rhythmic gymnastics manga that was a big hit in Weekly Margaret in the 80's  depicting the agony and love of an athlete with a flexible brush stroke!

title_en: Enishi-kun wa Masho (Harem) Taishitsu ni Mezamemashita
description: Enishi Kazumichi is a teenager who still acts like a child of death  because of that attitude he is often considered like a child even by his own childhood friends. When his feelings for the girl he likes are destroyed by his childhood friend  Kazumichi decides to be alone and starts eating his lunch in a quiet place at his school. But someone suddenly appeared out of nowhere and asked Kazumichi for help. Then  from that moment on  Kazumichi's life changed  filled with complicated harem problems. Will he be able to overcome the problem? and what kind of harem troubles will he face?

tags: Award Winning|Long Strip|Romance|Crossdressing|School Life|Web Comic|Full Color
description: Can true love really overcome any obstacles? Saki  a high school student  confesses her feelings to Makoto. Taken aback  Makoto reveals his secret  but the sudden discovery doesn’t seem to bother Saki who is already head over heels for him. After being rejected  Saki asks Ryuji  Makoto’s childhood friend  for some advice on how to win his heart. A love triangle unfolds when Ryuji realizes that he might also have some feelings for his old friend...  --- **Official Translations:** * [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/romance/senpai-is-an-otokonoko/list?title_no=5137) * [Chinese (Traditional) / 中文 (繁體)](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/bl-gl/senpai-wa-otokonoko/list?title_no=3770 ) * [Chinese (Simplified) / 中文 (简体)](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/CAMPUS/qianbeishinanhaizi/list?title_no=1935) * [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romance/senpai-wa-otokonoko/list?title_no=3984) * [Korean / 한국어](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8154605) * [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/romance/senpai-wa-otokonoko/list?title_no=4068) * [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/romance/my-crossdressing-crush/list?title_no=4235)

One day  10-year-old Yamato and his friend Miku discover a man in a back alley who's suffering from vicious stab wounds. The man recognizes Yamato  and uses his last breath to share a secret with the children: Yamato's father was the perpetrator of a bank robbery that is known throughout the country as the most puzzling unsolved crime of the 20th century. He warns them to "never trust anyone."   Miku makes Yamato swear to keep the man's final words a secret. A few days later  Yamato's father is found dead  and the boy is taken in by Miku's family. The death is ruled as an accident  but Yamato has his doubts. Six years later  Yamato still can't stop wondering about the incidents  and resolves to take action.

Since he was a child  Madoka has been in love with Tamaki.  However  high school student Madoka is always regarded by college student Tamaki as a “cute younger childhood friend” and not as an object of romantic interest.  As time goes by  Madoka graduates from high school and goes to the same university as Tamaki without telling him  and succeeds in renting an apartment next to his.  Then  Madoka begins to make a fierce appeal to Tamaki.

title_en: The Spearmaster and the Black Cat
description: After a tear in reality pulls Kagari Shuya into a white room he discovers a futuristic interface for reincarnating in a different world. After looking through the different races and skills he unlocks a new race  Lucivault  a type of vampire with none of its characteristic weaknesses. All set to start his life in a new world  Shuya is confused to discover that he is enveloped in darkness. As it turns out something went wrong when he was transported and instead of appearing where he was supposed to  he appeared in an underground cave. Shuya faces untold dangers  runs for his life  before finding his way out of the underground world. After escaping he meets his Shishou and begins to learn to fight with a spear. There is also a cute black cat named Rollo.

Follow the Main character "Mero" in his journey for freedom. Being betrayed in the gang he used to work for. He was sold into employment by a man who looks scarily similar to him. Seeing him work his way up the company ladder  meeting friends and foes with his team. Following his adventures of self realization  and connecting with the people closest to him. While taken down the scum of the world. With a paycheck.

Shanley is a young girl living in the forest in a country where the legend of dragons remains. While every child in the village yearns for the legendary hero  she yearns for the "dragon". She has lived her life as straight as her longing for the dragon  but when she comes into contact with malevolence for the first time  her inner destiny awakens. A new royal fantasy that continues the legend of dragons and heroes!

title_en: I Will Live the Life of a Villainess
description: On her way home  the protagonist  Jung Yuna  gets into a traffic accident. And just when she thought she had died... she opens her eyes to find herself in a splendid bedroom?!  Observing for about a week  she realizes that the person she has possessed was the notorious villainess from the novel she had read before her death  "The Lady of the White Rose."  Not only that  but she was the ultimate villainess who only did wicked things to the heroine and ended up dying at the hands of the male lead! Can Elena successfully avoid her novel's fate?

title_en: Kawaii no wa Ore de Aru
description: Yuki  the visual representative of a famous dance influencer group with one million subscribers  had a problem. He could never maintain a relationship for long! He was immediately labeled as frivolous  suspected of cheating (even though he wasn’t)  and dumped—over and over again. Even though he was dating them because he truly liked them...! One day  at a drinking party  Yuki became intrigued by a reserved and elegant girl  Yurino  who was trying to leave early. Curious  he followed her out of the venue.
Short stories about two anthropomorphic white cats who have no respect and are just plain cruel. Dark humor warning.

In a world governed by Chi and dimensional hierarchies  Shinra Yamada’s life changes when he consumes a mysterious heart  allowing the entity Akuma Obscura to possess him. Joined by Espertha Yakuzu  a vessel for dangerous energy  and Noboru Kojima  a cunning wind Chi user  Shinra embarks on a journey of self-discovery and cosmic ascension.  As he rises through six tiers of existence  from mortal to godlike  Shinra battles clans  gods  and abstract beings while uncovering the secrets of Chi and his connection to the multiverse. Tai Chi Convergence is a tale of power  sacrifice  and the struggle to reclaim hope in a universe teetering on chaos.  (Source: MangaPlus for Creators)

title_en: Seibetsu Fushou ni Koi wo shimashita.
description: 大学一年生のヤマトが教室で出会った理想のヒロイン、ハルの性別はなんと…!? 恋愛も性別もグラデーション…!?
The story depicts the mental struggle of the main character Ryuu as he continues to fight against the "waves of murderous intent" that lie dormant in his body.

"Let's resolve your issues."  The monk approaches the deceased  delivering them salvation and sending their souls to paradise.  Their wishes are... love  anger  hatred... a world both beautiful and sorrowful.  Where does he truly go? What lies beyond paradise…?

In the aftermath of the war  the world's hierarchy had been shaken up and enforced with an iron fist. Once a high-ranking officer among the beastkin  Qing Ti ends up at very bottom—reduced to a mere plaything—and falls into the hands of her nemesis  Chen Xilan. Just when people thought Qing Ti would be tormented to the point of wishing for her own death  the game of taming and being tamed had only started to begin.

The "Kenshin Kaden" basically refers to the last extra chapter (comes after the end of the manga and after Yahiko no Sakabatou) of Rurouni Kenshin entitled "Cherry Blossoms in the Spring Time."      It was published in the Kenshin Kaden Artbook.

title_en: Isekai de Kojiin wo Hiraita kedo  Naze ka Darehitori Sudatou to Shinai Ken
description: Masatsugu was brought from another world in a hero summoning and ended up being part of the lowest possible caste. Awaiting this boy  who possess nothing but elementary skills  is managing an orphanage full of beautiful girls! But  his annoying days are just starting as he finds the building in ruins  and he also has to pay off the huge debt the former director left! And that’s not all  he has no time to rest from all the scumbags threatening the orphanage! Will Masatsugu and the orphans be able to protect their precious home?

title_en: Forced to Be an Invincible Saintess
description: The true identity of the saint that is worshipped by all the people in the kingdom is actually an average boy? With the beautiful priest  the big breasted knight  and the loli doctor at the side  the road of a saintess is really difficult...

Keigo Westwood  nicknamed "Bullet"  is a Wyoming police officer involved in the takedown of the Mexican drug cartel La Llorona. True to his name  he charges straight in and rushes through the cartel's defenses  leading to the arrest of all of its leaders. However  at that same time Yellowstone's volcano  which is said to be powerful enough to wipe out all of humanity  explodes. The earth splits  Keigo and the arrestees are swallowed up in it  and when he comes to Keigo is in the 19th century--the era of the Wild West. It is in this world  where all manner of men run free of the law  that Keigo teams up with a vengeful Abraham Lincoln in hunting down the members of La Llorona once again.

title_en: Doukyonin ga Konoyo no Mon janai Rensai-ban
description: The young man's new apartment is haunted  but as it turns out  even the dead have their own personal shortcomings... issues of the flesh included. For the dead have lingering desires  and are more susceptible to the world of the living than what one may think. There's anger  there's hate  there's curiosity… and there's love too. Here he finds a ghastly girl who observes him quietly  certainly desiring *something*... (No wonder the rent is cheap!)

title_en: Dokushin Kizoku wa Isekai wo Ouka Suru ~Kekkon Shinai Otoko no Yuuga na Ohitori-sama Life~
description: Toshinori Dokuraba  35 years old. A so-called single aristocrat in Japan who enjoyed a single life without wife and children  even though he was tall  handsome  highly educated and had a high income. One day  he died alone at home. However  he was liked by Hitorigami  the God of another world  and was able to reincarnate in that world. Reborn as Zirc Louren with skills and blessings from the God  he lived a new rosy life in a different world - then he turned 28 years old and enjoyed the single life again...

Vegeta's time machine goes out of control and he finds himself in Gensokyo. Vegeta is cool. "Fight me!" (Cirno) An ongoing Touhou and Dragon Ball crossover series featuring Vegeta and many Touhou characters.

Seishiro Sakaki leads an unremarkable college life. One day  a beautiful woman with elegant features moves in across from his boarding house. As Sakaki's feelings for her grow  his affection slowly takes a dark and twisted turn...

title_en: Koi wo suru Hi no Lingerie
description: Nazumi is looking for a new job for the first time since her job was closed. When a customer makes fun of her chubby figure at a lingerie store she started working at through a friend  she is taken out by Leo  a junior high school classmate and former delinquent whom she has been wanting to meet for a long time.

title_en: Kokugensou wo Item Cheat de Ikinuku THE COMIC
description: This is the story about a bashful and inconspicuous high school student surviving a harsh fantasy world with wisdom  bravery  and very few skills. Apparently he wanted to become a hero with a magic sword  but unfortunately for him  he possesses no swordsmanship or talent for magic. The only thing he can count on is his half-baked knowledge he acquired previously from modern Japan. Now  in order to survive  he's forced to convert that knowledge of his into money. While doing so  the main protagonist will rise into becoming a secretary assistant  trade company owner who manages slave girls  knight  and a hero.

title_en: The Small Sage Will Try Her Best in the Different World from Lv. 1!
description: Kujo Yuuri  an avid player of the MMO game Elyushia Online  successfully switches to her desired sage job. However  apart from starting at level 1  she suddenly gets transported to the real Elyushia! Furthermore  she became a small child. Now she has to brave a land like the life of a video game in the hope that she will be able to return to her own world.  - Web Novel: [Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8991ct/)    - Light Novel:  [Japanese](https://bookwalker.jp/series/174602/)

Kamihate Uryuu  orphaned since childhood  receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school  but after arriving there  he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine.

title_en: "Zako ni wa Kaji ga Oniai da www" to Iwareta Kaji Level 9999 no Ore  Tsuihousareta no de Boukensha ni Tenshokusuru ~Saikyou Buki de Musou Shinagara Guild de Tanoshiku Kurashimasu~
description: Makina  a blacksmith who worked in the renowned guild “Silver Wings ” is expelled from his guild. The reason? Guild members who don’t value their weapons believed it was more cost-effective to buy them rather than employ his services. Lost and uncertain about his future  Makina receives an invitation from his childhood friend and adventurer  Aria. He joins Aria’s guild  “Rainbow Butterflies.” It’s here that Makina’s blacksmithing talents truly shine. With his weapons in the hands of guild members  they collectively rise to become the mightiest of all.

title_en: Saitei Rank no Boukensha  Yuusha Shoujo wo Sodateru Orette
description: The old man who joined just to fill out the party is actually a legendary adventurer!? A hidden hero turns a talented S-class party of beautiful girls into full-fledged heroes! The greatest training fantasy from "Let's Become a Novelist"!!

Tatsumi lives a tired life because of his work at a sketchy company. His only reason for living and his passion is reptiles. Kotani lives next door to Tatsumi and unexpectedly one night after a misunderstanding ends up helping him create a channel to talk about reptiles.

title_en: Baki Gaiden - Retsu Kaiou wa Isekai Tensei Shitemo Ikkou ni Kamawan
description: After the events of Baki-Dou  the famous Kenpo master Retsu Kaioh wakes up in a new world unknown to him. ___ **Note:** This is the official entry  not to be confused with the Doujinshi from Twitter user @sakuramankiti.

In year X of Reiwa  an undersea landslide caused a massive tsunami in the Pacific Ocean. However  this was only the beginning of a new disaster. Monsters have appeared  but there are no heroes. Can humanity win peace by its own strength?! Inoue Junya of *BTOOOM!* presents with history and military specialist Shirato Seiichi a mega-realistic monster-busting story!  - [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%80%AA%E7%8D%A3%E8%87%AA%E8%A1%9B%E9%9A%8A)

A world overrun by zombies  and 100 chances for Ryu Min-Seok to save his daughter. But just when he's about to fail for the 100th time  he comes back to life?!   The zombie apocalypse survival story of a father who awakens as a zombie to protect his daughter!

title_en: Duo Progressing but She's My Master
description: (BASED ON DEEPWOKEN!) Yumi is the weakest perma-freshie this world has seen. So much so that he ends up being pushed to the verge of death by the weakest monster in the verse! Forcing himself to sign a pact with the illusive woman  Misumi  his life is saved and now in her hands. As Misumi teases and messes with Yumi  he remains focused on obtaining his goal- becoming the strongest in the world!

Feelings may come and go  but true love always remains in the heart. Tsumiki Miniwa is in love with her best friend  Io Otonashi. For her  confessing is nearly impossible; but to her friends  they seem to be the perfect match. Cute and petite  Tsumiki comes off more as a friend  and Io's attitude toward her is friendlier than toward others. Despite the constant teasing and obvious hints that his friends have been dropping  Io always seems to miss the signs.      Throughout her everyday school life  Tsumiki spends time with her friends and Io. Will she finally muster enough courage to confess her true feelings?

tags: Award Winning|Historical|Long Strip|Crossdressing|Girls' Love|Drama|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Jeong-Nyeon has no money or education  but she is a Mokpo girl with a talent for singing! Her dream is to join a women's traditional theater company  and make it big. But she has a lot to learn and a long way to go before becoming a lead actor. Will Jeong-Nyeon achieve her dream of becoming a big star and getting rich?   The story begins in 1956 (post-war Korea) in the southwestern port city of Mokpo.      Winner of the 2019 Our Manhwa of the Year award  and is set to release as as a Drama by the end of 2024.    [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/namonnamon14)   [Artist's Tumblr](https://jinamong.tumblr.com)   [Artist's Naver Blog](https://blog.naver.com/babomj14)

title_en: Kyuuketsuki ni Kawareta Shoujo no Juunen-go
Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Sweet Encounter
description: In this world  NIKKE and their friends live peacefully.   A light-hearted comedy about N102  woh works as a maid at a maid café called *Maid For You* with Cocoa and Soda!

The main character  who promised to get married when he turned 18  looked at his family and realized "marriage is hell " but it was already too late. His childhood friend has grown up into a super duper nutjob woman he can't escape from?!

Mitsuno Hiiragi is an ordinary high school student who works part-time at a conveni  but he's troubled by a strange-looking woman with a contorted body who visits the store every night. Desperate to do something about it  Hiiragi puts the rumor that's been going around town to the test  half-believing it  and is greeted by a mysterious beauty named Tsutsuji who calls herself the “Filler”.  “Sukimamono” (gap monsters) are strange creatures that have strayed into the human world  and it seems that Tsutsuji makes a living by “doing something” to them… She's extremely beautiful  but no matter how you look at her  she's suspicious  shady  and just strange…! Swept away  Hiiragi tries to find out the woman's true identity together with Tsutsuji  but…

title_en: Gyakkou Shita Akuyaku Reijou wa  Naze ka Maryoku wo Ushinattanode Shinsou no Reijou ni Narimasu
description: She was once known for her powerful magic — the very reason she was chosen to be the crown prince's fiancée. But when a "saintess" appeared  fear of losing everything drove her to make desperate  reckless decisions. Accused of committing evil acts against the saintess  her engagement was broken off and she was exiled to a monastery. On her way into exile  she was ambushed by bandits... and killed.  But death wasn't the end. When she opened her eyes  she had gone back three years into the past! Yet her body was now frail  and her magical power had all but vanished. This time  she resolves to choose a different path — to pursue happiness  even if it means breaking off the engagement herself. The twist? The crown prince refuses to let her go! And even more shocking... a mysterious dark spirit  one never before seen in this world  chooses her as its master!

Chubby and plain  Taeko's biggest worry is whether she'll ever have the courage to tell her crush how she feels. Then one day a mysterious cousin comes to stay and Taeko's world is shattered. Cast out of her own home after her mother's death  Taeko stumbles into the night and is hit by a truck. When she wakes up  she's greeted by a doctor who promises to turn her life around. And thus begins a tale of revenge and intrigue that's a roller coaster of cracked out soap opera fun from start to finish.

title_en: Doki Doki Literature Club - Your reality (Doujinshi)
description: A DDLC fan manga where everything is same but at the same time isn't. The story follows a young boy called Michael and his friends in the literature club. One day they got an emergency and Michael with Monika will go fix it. Little did they know it was a trap.

The year is Universal Century 0133. Ten years have past since the armed resistance of the aristocratic fraction  the Crossbone Vanguard  was subdued. Tobia Aronnax is an exchange student onboard the spaceship Smashion to Jupiter  but during a surprised attack by a group of space pirates who call themselves the Crossbone Vanguard  he finds out that there were actually hidden agendas among those in the Smashion and in Jupiter itself.      After being saved by a member of the pirates named Kincaid Nau  he was taken aboard the pirate ship  the Mother Vanguard  and was convinced by its captain  Berah Ronah  to join them. The pirate group's true identity was revealed to be a guerrilla group resisting the secret fraction within Jupiter  the Jupiter Empire  which intends to conquer Earth. Now Tobia must pilot one of the three powerful Crossbone Gundam to help this new Crossbone Vanguard in their quest to oppose the Jupiter Empire's plans.

Minato Haginouchi  heir to the prestigious confectionery company "Haginouchi"  is transferred to its headquarters in his third year to begin successor training. But at a company party  his father publicly names him the next president  declaring that any woman who wants to be the president's wife is free to pursue him. Suddenly  in a workplace already teeming with his ex-girlfriends  Minato becomes the unwilling target of their relentless advances!?
A oneshot manga published in TYPE-MOON Ace 2  based on the "Fate/Unlimited Codes" video game.

title_en: The Complete Works of Fujiko F. Fujio - Doraemon
description: The Fujiko F. Fujio Complete Works release of Doraemon  containing previously unpublished chapters.  Doraemon is the popular masterpiece of Fujiko F. Fujio  a member of one of Japan's most famous mangaka duos (that being Fujiko Fujio; Fujiko Fujio A had no involvement in Doraemon.)  Doraemon  a cat-shaped robot from the future  travels back in time from the year of 2112 all the way to the time of Nobita Nobi  a young boy with various struggles & problems that will affect his future. Doraemon assists Nobita in saving him by letting him use useful gadgets from the future; The two become best friends & many adventures are had with their other friends  Shizuka  Suneo  and Gian.  Alternative entry. [Doraemon](https://mangadex.org/title/e36da8b0-feca-46dd-9120-d5dc2f3feae8/doraemon)

Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team  which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented  gifted  and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices  the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team  Ryoma Echizen is confident  cool  and collected. Some might even say he's cocky  but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve " Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.      Join Ryoma and the other first years  as they train hard  make friends  and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team  but are THEY ready for HIM?

title_en: Iya na Kao Sarenagara Opantsu Misete Moraitai Manga
description: This oneshot is part of the well-known series of doujins by the same artist called "Iya na Kao Sarenagara Opantsu Misete Moraitai Hon"  featuring cute and/or sexy girls showing you their panties while looking at you with disgust.

title_en: Fairy Tail x The Seven Deadly Sins Christmas Special
description: Hiro Mashima of Fairy Tail and Nakaba Suzuki of Nanatsu no Taizai team up for a special Christmas story  based on each other's work: Meliodas  Elizabeth Liones  and Hawk are visiting the city of Magnolia for Christmas  and Meliodas' offer to buy a present for Elizabeth goes awry. Upon returning from a job  Natsu Dragneel and Happy spot a suspicious visitor on the roof of their guild  which leads to an odd confrontation.

Through posting a "Best Comment"  I somehow became the main character of a webtoon!  ---  - BGM done by [<Team MSD>](https://www.youtube.com/c/TeamMSD/search?query=%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4)  ---  - [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/beipochengweiwanjia/list?title_no=1631)  - [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/player/list?title_no=2256)  - [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000964)  - [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/player/list?title_no=2985)  - [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/player/list?title_no=2649)

What if Vegeta had gone to Earth instead of Goku  how would events have unfolded?      Super Vegeta Den mainly focuses on the 'Z' portion of events in Vegeta's life  with a small focus on his younger years. It was a work written and drawn by Dragon Garow Lee on his blog <http://m-pe.tv/u/m/bbs/read.php?uid=syugyo&id=15&tid=6> but was never actually published or released in high resolution.       Featuring entirely redrawn artwork. The Super Vegeta Den HD restoration project aims to bring this notorious little fan manga to a wider western audience to give it the attention it deserves.

title_en: Level ga Shihai Suru Sekai de
description: One day  the high school boy  Tooru  was summoned by an aristocrat to [a world where levels rule]. Upon discovering that Tooru's level was the absolute lowest  he was then treated as a slave and trapped in a high-level dungeon. He vowed to defeat the fearsome monsters in the high-level dungeon  level up higher than everyone else  and return to his original world. ___ **Original Planner:** peep **Producer:** taskey STUDIO

title_en: Busaneko ni Kaerareta Kiyowa Reijou desu ga  Saikyou no Gunjin Koushaku ni Hirowarete Kizetsu Sunzen desu
description: Cursed to be an ugly cat--but maybe you're happy!  "I'll have you turn into a cat  sister." Marie  the viscount's young daughter  lost her fiancé to her younger sister Emilia and has been cursed even more. Her reflection in the mirror - an ugly cat!  Running away from her sister for her life  Marie  who escaped from their house  collapsed from loneliness and hunger  unable to speak. Then  a kind hand reaches out to her  "In the middle of this rain  poor thing...Would you like to come with me?"  The figure is the "ruthless  merciless  undefeated duke" who is rumored even in social circles.  An unfortunate girl gets her one and only happiness  and a happy cat life begins!

The ex-goddess Izumi spends her days looking after her little girl Mika and mommy blogging. Once the goddess of a spring  her life as a human looks very different. In this world  supernaturals and ex-supernaturals — vampires  werewolves  mermaids  and more — navigate life (and parenthood) post “happily ever after”.

Daily yandere girls.  **Note:** Since Chapter 134  the author has published a deredere version on their [FANBOX](https://rinrin83.fanbox.cc/). ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [X](https://x.com/RinRin200001/media)  **Buy:** [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/maniax-touch/work/=/product_id/RJ420882.html) (1–50)

Chigachi Fuuta an ordinary high school student who really admires ninjas is gifted with an extraordinary legacy  namely the soul of Hattori Hanzo  a legendary ninja. But because of that legacy  Chigachi Fuuta is targeted by various shinobi and ninja who still survive in the modern era. Can Chigachi Fuuta overcome these obstacles?

Nobody enjoys a good fight more than "Kiibo" Miyazawa  a high school student whose father is training him in the family's secret martial art. Kiibo dreams of becoming the next Bruce Lee  but his awesome fighting skills may soon surpass his idol's!

tags: Action|Long Strip|Crime|Adventure|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Sharks don't have lungs  but they do have to breathe oxygen to survive. Instead of breathing air  though  sharks get oxygen from the water that surrounds them. So they have to move around  if they stop moving for a while  they sink into the water and die  So Sharks have to move and move constantly from birth to death. The same goes for you. If you want to survive  keep moving  then you will be the best hunter… like a shark.

Ouichi Masaki was waiting for a miracle to happen to change his life and it came out of the sky! An egg-like meteor crashes into the ground and hatches. In the egg is a young girl that sees Masaki as her…father?
32 convicts. 1 tournament.  Who are they? And why do they fight? Where is this "colosseum" held and for who's entertainment?  And most importantly... Who will win it all?

Endo's recurring nightmares make him question their meanings. As certain elements from these dreams start to manifest in his life  he embarks on a journey of self-discovery and protection of his beloved younger brother. Meanwhile  Tego is determined to surpass Endo. He dedicates himself to rigorous training  but cannot seem to catch up to his older brother. As unusual events start unfolding  the brothers must set aside their rivalry and unleash their hidden abilities to save the day!

title_en: Arafoo Kenja no Isekai Seikatsu Nikki
description: Satoshi Osako  a 40-year-old man  had become addicted to a virtual reality role-playing game and rose to become a top player. Tragically  a fatal accident during a login session abruptly ended his life. But this was not the real end for him  as he found himself reborn in a world brimming with swords  magic  and monsters!   To his surprise  he retained the skills and abilities from his previous life's gaming experience. His life takes an unexpected turn when he is tasked with tutoring a young girl.   Delve into the diary of a sage residing in this fantastical realm  where his guiding principle is "Peace and tranquility every day."

Poverty-striken Yang Jinghua dies in an accident. The moment he wakes up  he seems ten years younger. At first  Yang Jinghua thought he was reborn. However a white-haired  rich and handsome man  named Duanmu Xi  reveals the truth. In order to stay in the world  Yang Jinghua must become Duanmu Xi's soul image and therefore  creates a soul contract that binds both their souls.

title_en: Ryuu to Yuusha to Haitatsunin Shikaban
description: Bonus chapters that never made it into volumes  infodumps  behind-the-scene stories  new bonus chapters  and much more from "The Dragon  the Hero  and the Courier"  a rather strange medieval fantasy manga. This book was self-published by the author with permission from Shueisha.
**Link:** - Alternative Official Raw - [X (Formerly Twitter)](https://x.com/libre1907/status/1654985641262981120)

A new teacher is assigned to Momotsuki Academy. Her name is Rebecca Miyamoto  or Becky. She is short  but she is pretty smart. This is a school comedy performed by Becky and strange students… and animals!?

title_en: Akuyaku Reijou wa Slow Life wo Enjoy Shitai!
description: "I'm breaking off my engagement to you!"  The crown prince threw this line at Sylvie at the school's graduation ceremony  and the villainous daughter Sylvie smiled with satisfaction. With a smile on her face  she says  "Yes! I will gladly accept! I will gladly accept!" She was accused of bullying the crown prince's girlfriend  but she debunked the allegation with a brilliant alibi: "I was digging radishes in the dungeon." With the fee she had collected and her S-class adventurer's license in hand  Sylvie moved comfortably to a farm.  She is ready to start living the slow life she has dreamed of for so long! But then  the second prince  the brother of her former fiancé  arrives on the scene! It seems that he sees Sylvie as a dangerous person who is avenging the royal family  and he often stays in the house to watch over her...  --- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5268fw/)

Hinahoshi  a world-renowned millionaire  is a collector of rare and expensive objects. The best item in his collection is Mizar  an immortal. Through dialogue  the two come to an understanding. ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [X](https://x.com/noririn4696/status/1538510303226642434)

Yamato loves his little sister. His sister is the cutest and sweetest girl in the world  and he won't settle for second best. Unfortunately  everyday life and the rest of the world intrude on his idyllic plans  and he finds it's not as simple as he imagines it should be. Follow along with tough Yamato and cute Masaki as they deal with the problems of an otherwise normal family life.

Kumagai Hinano  a regular office worker  relieves her stress with baths  alcohol  and Vtubing! She is a streamer of video games. Her favorite Vtuber is Emori Ato  a character with a seductive and sexy voice that just makes one melt!  As chance would have it  Hinano decided to collaborate with her fave. When she went to meet up with her  the person waiting for her was...?!  The story of a tired office worker Vtuber and a mysterious JK onee-san who collaborate with each other in a very exciting way.

In the Lapland region of Finland  the domain of snow  midnight sun  and auroras  there is the small Hotel Metsäpeura  run by two older gentlemen. One night during a terrible blizzard  a mysterious young man named Jun arrives at the hotel. He is clearly in dire straits  with a large tattoo on his back  no relatives and no money. However  the gentlemen warmly welcome him in and offer him a job at the hotel. The kindness of the people living in the harshness of nature will melt the heart of this awkward young man.

Satou Kanna  daughter of a yakuza boss and known for being loyal to her friends and her slightly delinquent appearance. Mochizuki Mito  class president and the school's most envied upon young lady. Just what unexpected secrets did these two girls find out about each other!?

This is a test that puts your life at stake. Pass the test and survive. When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo  the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However  they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world  you are still the first person I met. The world is brilliant and grand. Welcome home.

title_en: Ii Hito. - For New Natural Life
description: Yuuji Kitano  a college athlete newly graduated from his university  got a job in a big sports equipment corporation. He soon finds out that he is surrounded by numerous obstacles: gets involved in corporation politics of high level executives; lacks of trust from capable female coworkers; being rotated  promoted  and demoted all around; last but not least  a tough HR manager who's also his landlord. However  no matter how difficult the situation is  he is always optimistic and diligent  and his positive attitude not only motivates people around him but also touches the hearts of his female colleagues.

Tanaka-san is a legendary hotel man (concierge)  and after his death  he became a legend in the underworld. In the underworld  Mei works at the dilapidated Hotel Helheim. It was once a glorious hotel  and one where Mei has many fond memories. One day  Tanaka-san appears  ready to restore the Hotel Helheim to its former success. Mei will become the famous Tanaka-san's assistant  as he works to make Hotel Helheim a top-class underworld hotel!      *Originally published in Jump Square as a 3-volume series from November 2014 to September 2015  the series was later republished under the Shonen Champion Comics label from December 2019 to January 2020. The volume count reflects the republished version  as it is the only one currently available.*

After their parents are killed in a plane crash  Ryuuichi and his younger brother Kotarou are taken in by the chairman  who they never met before  of an elite academy. Ryuuichi becomes the school daycare's new babysitter.

title_en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! - A Day of KazuMegu (Doujinshi)
description: A parody of ["This Croc Will Die In 100 Days"](https://mangadex.org/title/44625/this-croc-will-die-in-100-days)

title_en: Tensei Akuma no Saikyou Yuusha Ikusei Keikaku
description: Kakyu  a former Japanese who was reincarnated as a low-level devil in hell  has acquired unparalleled strength over two thousand years. However  unexpectedly  he is exiled to another "different world " liberated from the harsh underworld. Kakyu  who was enjoying his dream slow life  witnesses the village he owes everything to being attacked. Despite rushing to the scene  the village is annihilated. Picking up the only surviving baby  Alus  Kakyu resolves to raise Alus to become the happiest person in the world to repay the debt...!?

In Kyouto  where humans and youkai coexist and spirits run rampant  a succubus named Saki attends a school transformed into a magical land. Using her beauty and abilities  she has become the school's princess!! However  there is a formidable rival who challenges her reign: Ashiya Yuu! This tough-looking man seems immune to her charms and  to make matters worse  is adored by other demi-humans! Saki  who claims to be a queen  can’t stand this situation. Determined to make Ashiya fall for her before anyone else  she devises all sorts of seductive tactics...!! ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67453)

A young traveller  when looking to take on a mercenary as protection against bandits  is forced to go with the cheapest: a young  cheerfully drunken warrior girl  who spends her income mostly on alcohol.

title_en: A Tactical Genius on the Field
description: If there is one thing that Ma Jungwoo is good at  it's football. Although he is a genius strategist  others look down on him because of his lack of education and debt. But things seem to turn around when he finds out he has just inherited his late grandfather's British football team. He plans to sell the team and start fresh  only to find out the team has massive debt! Left with no other choice  Jungwoo must use his tactical genius to help this team rise from the ashes and be number one!

Kurumi Yoshizawa  the student council president  has excellent grades and an inviting  friendly personality... on the surface at least. In reality  her days are spent struggling against her domineering mother and agonizing over her teachers' expectations. One day  Kurumi reluctantly goes to meet Naoi  her truant classmate  at her homeroom teacher's request to look after her. The situation sours quickly as Naoi sees through Kurumi's facade and makes her animosity clear. On the verge of a meltdown  Kurumi is barely able to stop herself from shoplifting  unaware that she's being recorded by Naoi…

title_en: When the Villainess Is in Love
description: I’ve transmigrated into the body of a princess  living on borrowed time. It’s okay  though  we can cure this illness! My goal is to lead a life where I can do whatever I want! First  I decided to rave over all of my favorite characters in the novel! But  because I am a villainess  people around me tend to be wary…  “You will die soon  and yet… how can you laugh like that?”  Well  it’s ‘cus I’m super hot.  --- When a young girl wakes up in the body of her favorite character  villainess Princess Libertia  the very first thing she decides to do is... fangirl her heart out! And why not? In a novel where all of her favorite characters are doomed to die  this is her chance to give them all a happy ending. But will the story play out as she expects when people start to see Princess Libertia in a new  forgiving light? One fangirl’s love might be what it takes to turn this villainess into a heroine!  --- [Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55602918)  **Official Translations:** * [English](https://tapas.io/series/when-the-villainess-is-in-love/info) * [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.manhuaren.com/manhua-dangenvzhuiruaihe/) * [Chinese (Tradtional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%95%B6%E6%83%A1%E5%A5%B3%E6%88%80%E6%84%9B%E6%99%82/124) * [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/quand_la_mechante_tombe_amoureuse) * [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2010106) * [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/When-Villainess-Falls-in-Love/39) * [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/53076) * [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81/142) * [Vietnamese / Tiếng Việt](https://pops.tv/comics/ac-nu-khi-yeu-60effff37d1f09005a6dc218)
Suou Shuuichi is your typical otaku neet. But what happens when his latest figurine order turns out to be something completely out of this world.

Kotoha is a second-year high school student who puts all her energy into her part-time job  her studies  and her fashion sense. One day  when she returns to her boarding house  she finds out that Itsuki  a university student  is her temporary landlord!? Itsuki is great at cleaning  cooking  and being considerate  but Kotoha can't hide her excitement and confusion at his perfect landlord skills and his doting attitude!  A peaceful battle between an independent-minded honor student gyaru and a naturally charming university student begins.  (Source: Pixiv  translated)

Chiaki and Subaru have been the closest since they were kids. Chiaki has always liked him but as Subaru walks further into the world of entertainment  Chiaki decides the time has come to move past her one-sided feelings and find new love. Does she have enough resolve to meet someone better  or will she find herself shaken by her long-time love? A close  yet distant love story between a normal girl and her actor childhood friend!

Levou  the half human and half dryar who can communicate with crows  tells of their life story. Tis a tale which tells of their adventures throughout their stormy youth.  Warning! The series will contain mature elements! eg. Violence  nudity  very sensitive topics  etc. These themes won't be the main focus nor do I intend to belittle the severity of these topics  nor do I desire to offend any individuals.

The mafia boss of the Iwashi family is a high school girl named Konomi Minoko. But don't let her appearance fool you; she has done and seen things normal citizens can't even imagine. Under her control are two assassins who have gained legendary status for their deadliness and ability to get any job done. Ishikawa Rushia  codenamed Bullet  uses a modified handgun that uses a custom made hollow point bullet that explodes the target from the inside. Shirato Mine  codenamed Francesca  uses a original weapon that is a mix between a throwing axe and battle axe. Both of them are Minoko's high school classmates and seem like normal teenagers but are two of the most feared killers in the mob world who handle missions often involving other assassins and underground groups.
A certain Succubus-san arrived out of nowhere.  She is beautiful and always trying to have sex with me. Furthermore  she has transferred into my school. What will become of me tomorrow?

Evie Ariatte  a lovely saintess candidate  has her bright future shattered when a sudden curse forces her to answer every question with the truth. This unexpected twist of fate threatens her reputation and jeopardizes her dream of becoming the saintess. As her blunt honesty earns her both friends and enemies  will Evie uncover the hidden truths of Thiendavis and bring about its perfect salvation?

Haruto Harukawa  a 28-year-old working as an assistant producer for TV dramas and aspiring to become a main producer  is suddenly put in charge of planning a brand-new tokusatsu hero show. The original story is written by Shōyama  who served as the head writer for Kamen Rider Zi-O and Shuriken Sentai Ninninger  with Maitake adapting it into manga form.

title_en: Haru no Hikari ni Nomarete mo

description: High-school student Yota Moteuchi is so unpopular that his classmates have given him the nickname "Dateless." So it's no surprise when the love of his life  Moemi  is not interested in Yota but instead is in love with Yota's best friend  Takashi. Yota turns to a video rental shop for comfort  but little did he suspect that the shop was magical and that the cute girl on his rented tape would pop out of the television and try to fix his ruined love life!

title_en: Childhood Friends with a Pet and Master Relationship
description: One is the master  the other is the pet  but who is who?

title_en: My friend turned into a woman
Those Who Try To Squeeze Their Way Inbetween Yuri

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Office Workers|Girls' Love|Web Comic|Full Color
description: A girl who secretly enjoys taking nude photos in a company where no one is around late at night gets caught by Kwon Cha-young  the head of the marketing department  who is working late!
serialized in Weekly Shonen Champion No. 50 as one of the 40th anniversary commemorative projects.

In our current society  most porn consumers are males  we are the ones who think with our d**** many times  we worship the female body and our society  products  advertisements and many other things are centered around that. But what if it wasn't that way? What if  instead of men being the ones controlled by their sexual urges  women were the ones who bought porn magazines and had the most interest in sex? What if the moral standards between men and women were reversed? ___ Note: This is a non-H adaptation of a doujinshi series with the same name.
serialized in Champion Red  July 2004      compiled in Kakugo no Susume bunkoban(Champion Red)

Teppei Sakamoto is a boy living in the countryside. He loves soccer  and all his soccer skills were taught to him by his sister. Finally  his sister wants him to join the Mizumoto High School soccer team. Teppei's turn in life has come!! How will this soccer newbie fare in his new environment?

Kuruhi  first prince of Gahama Kingdom  is the epitome of a spoiled brat with his arrogant attitude and behavior. After countless misdeeds  he is finally banished from the royal family and reduced to a commoner! The wandering  mud-covered former prince finds himself at an inn run by Emma  a girl who has a severe obsession with royalty drama. Emma is bewildered by the sudden appearance of her "Oshi"  and determined to get him back on his feet  she embarks on a grand project!

title_en: Koi Hajime wa Ochi Yuku Tsubaki no Shita de
description: Haruichi Azuma lost his parents in an accident and was left on his own. He was treated coldly and betrayed by the relatives who took him in. One day  an old friend of his father's invites him to his house to take care of his daughter. However  what awaits him is Tsubaki  the second daughter of the Yaotome family  who is selfish and arrogant. He is fed up with this type of person  but like Haruichi  Tsubaki also has loneliness in her eyes.

title_en: The Revenge of the Betrayed Strongest Knight
description: Klein  who fell from the throne of the King of Knights  was betrayed by his comrades and sentenced to be burned at the stake. In his final moments  Klein scoffs at the foolishness of this world and his past self. Now  having returned from hell  Klein has gained unparalleled power. He will make those who betrayed him pay the price...

title_en: How to End an Unrequited Love
description: Kim Boksil  is better known for having no success at love having gone with unrequited love for 20 years now. She's now on her 9th failure of unrequited love since graduating from high school. Boksil  who vows that she will have a wonderful relationship when she becomes a college student  falls for her kind and handsome sunbae  Doyoon.

A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! ___ Official Release: - English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd)  [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing) - Indonesian release by Level Comics ___ In 2010  this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.

title_en: The brightest giant star in the world
description: She  the prodigious girl that stood at the pinnacle of the Global Martial Arts Competition  won the championship for five consecutive years  dominated the arena  and was dubbed the undefeatable king! He  a top tier superstar born into a wealthy family  possessed transcending beauty  was cold and black bellied  and had countless fans. When she accidentally reincarnated  as his fiancée  a sky full of blackmail material from trivial white formicas flying around  facing a world full of black fans  Lin Fan laughed coldly: If the whole world dissed her  then she’ll make the whole world tremble! Even if the wind blows against her  she would never back down!         tl/n: white formicas(白富美）are slang for women who have fair skin  are financially capable  and are beautiful

The city of freedom  Neo York  is targeted by villains day and night  but it's also home to the strongest hero  Golden Man!!! But one night  during a rescue operation at a fire at an abandoned factory  Golden Man suddenly disappears. Left in his place  a single amnesiac young man with the Golden Man suit in his hands... Who on Earth is he? ___ - **Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550668106005965940) - [Official X](https://x.com/goldenman_comic)

title_en: Tonari no Seki no Inkya Joshi ga Oshi Utaite Datta ~Ore no Kyoku wo Uttatekure!~
description: "Why is my favorite singer singing my song!?"  Tsunagu Kurose  a high school student with a passion for musics composing but a terrible singing voice  often receives criticisms whenever he posts them on the Internet. One day  while shouldering the responsibility of taking commemorative photos of the culture festival reluctantly with Otoha Hinomori - a quiet classmate sitting next to him  his childhood friend Tetsu Tamura was in a dilemma because of unavoidable accidents occuring on the stage run by his club. Without hesitation  Tsunagu gives him the demo instrumental songs he composed to save the situation. Unfortunately  Tetsu open the wrong music file with Tsunagu's terrible lyrics  making him feels like he wanna hole up due to that unfortunate disaster. In despair at this miserable situation  Otoha takes off her thick glasses  tightly grips the microphone and hums that song!   "Isn't this voice similar to icy - the singer I've always admired...!?"  (Source: Takeshobo  translated)

What does it mean to be strong? What attracts men to fight in hand to hand combat? These and many other questions are explained and detailed in Garouden  a novel series by Yumemakura Baku (illustrated by celebrity manga author Itagaki Keisuke).      Fighting expert Bunshichi Tanba enjoys defeating TV fighting champions and celebrities on the street  until he stumbles upon the underground wrestling club known as FAW (Federation of Amateur Wrestling)  and unfortunately he is defeated by one of the underdogs of the wrestling world. He forces himself to improve and looks for a rematch.   Years later  he returns better than ever  and his fights attract the attention of the two "monsters" of the fighting world who are in constant competition  Makoto "the Great" Tatsumi  owner of the FAW and possessing a power and charisma unrivaled in the ring  and "the Demon of Karate" Matsuo Shozan  owner of the best Karate schools in Japan and possessing a power and speed that's almost godlike.   Both will try to recruit Tanba to their own side  and Tanba will experience a wold of fighting like he has never seen  with friends and rivals everywhere  and he will have to step up to the many challenges that confront him.   Features other martial arts characters from his other fighting novel series  The Gate of the Lions. Currently the best "serious" martial arts manga title in Japan  this is another of Baku's masterpieces that  unlike his other fantasy epic titles  has surprising realism in its deep exploration of martial arts and those who use it.

Having carried with her the grudges of wronged women for 1000 years  this vengeful spirit will teach men the error of their ways.  Originally published in the December 1998 issue of Kadokawa's The Horror.

"To be the strongest in the world!" That is Baki Hanma's dream. The mysterious  young  martial artist aspires to follow in his sinister father's footsteps as the world's strongest creature. But to what lengths will Baki go? We follow the young grappler as he matures in a world full of some of the strongest fighters and how he overcomes all obstacles in order to face his father one day in the fighting ring.  From the jungles to and underground martial arts tournament  Baki is put to the test from fighters all over the world.

"I was a Queen from the Joseon Dynasty who was murdered by the royal consort?!"  Kim Minju  who suddenly remembered her past life while taking an exam.
