She was very confused when she remembered but tried to calm down because the most important thing was her college entrance examination and not her previous  life. But the Consort  who was her enemy in the past life came to find Minju.  And soon after  even the King who was her husband in the past life appears in front of her and puts her student life into a crisis.   "I don't care about the past life or whatever  just please let me study!"

Shiki Tsubasa has just moved from Tokyo to Hokkaido in the middle of winter. Not quite appreciating how far apart towns are in the country  he gets off the taxi at the next town over from his destination so he can see the sights around his home  but he is shocked when he learns the "next town" is a 3-hour walk away. However  he also meets a cute Dosanko (born and raised in Hokkaido) gyaru named Fuyuki Minami who is braving 8 degrees celcius below 0 weather in the standard gyaru outfit of short skirts and bare legs!
A boy was deprived of emotions and color vision in order to make him a shinobi. A stranger stretches out the hand towards him in the ruined village. His new life begins as the boy takes it…

Itsuki and Haru are childhood friends. But Haru is secretly in love with Itsuki. And when he proposed to him  the latter didn’t take it seriously. Just being by his side will be enough… so Haru thought. Until one day Itsuki came to stay at Haru’s place for a week. Will all Haru's suppressed desires finally come out?!

Rinri Kuroda is a tired office worker at an advertising production company. One day  a young lady named Hakoniri Heil comes to the seat next to her as a new employee! If you read this  you might learn a thing or two about design work!

Uno Hinako throws herself into makeup  fashion  and falling in love  hoping that will make her seem “normal” to the other people at her job. But no matter how hard she tries  she’s a self-doubting mess inside  and her attempts at “normal” romance with men just keep failing. When she starts to think she might be alone forever  a new normal presents itself in the form of her relationship with Asahi Sato  a level-headed woman who works at her company. It starts as respect  and then it becomes far more intimate. [Seven Seas]

Two women who are just friends make a pact… "If both of us are still single in 5 years  let's get married." Five years later  they meet again  and their married life begins.      [Serialised in Yuri Hime starting in November 2020.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-10-17/donuts-under-a-crescent-moon-shio-usui-launches-new-manga-in-november/.165322)
Koyori is a high school girl who wants her childhood friend Nagi-kun to see her as a woman instead of treating her like a little girl…!?

title_en: New Super Robot Wars Comic Anthology - Iron Maniacs
description: A series of short stories in the world of the videogame "New Super Robot Wars".  Along with the SRW original mecha and characters of the SRX team  we have those from:  Voltes V  Invinvible Robo Trider G7  Mobile Fighter G Gundam  Dino Mech Gaiking  Mobile Suit Gundam Char's Counterattack  Mobile Suit Victory Gundam  New Mobile Report Gundam Wing  Mazinger Z  Shin Getter Robo  Blue Comet SPT Layzner  and Brave Raideen.

A pessimistic man hits 30 and accepts a high-paying illegal job. He and another thug are asked to rob a bag from an old lady. But what should have been an easy gig suddenly turns into chaos when the old woman shoots his accomplice in the head. The man manages to flee with the bag  but when he opens it he can't believe his eyes. It's...!?

The hero in this story is struggling with depression and feels like he has no purpose in life. One day  he is approached by a 500 year old demon lord who takes an interest in him. The demon lord  who is beautiful and powerful  offers to care about a depressed hero from another world the hero and take care of him.

title_en: Neko ni Hakucho  Hotaru ni Koban
description: Art teacher Hase Hotaru is confounded by one of her students  Nekome Yuna. Yuna fell in love at first sight with Shiratori Ako  a contract teacher at the same school  and she cannot do anything but pursue her. However  Ako has a quirk  the depths of which are yet unknown. A student hopelessly in love and the adults around her being yanked around. A new and vibrant work by Yodokawa that plays out with the school as the stage!

**Vol 1: Young Bad Education**  **Vol 2: Young Good Boyfriend**  Locked out of his home one day  Mizusawa runs across Takatsu  his homeroom teacher  drunk on a bench. In a stupor  Takatsu confesses he has been watching Mizusawa for three years and kisses him. Mizusawa had no interest in 37-year-old Takatsu…until that day. With a smirk on his face  Mizusawa begins teasing Takatsu about the incident  much to Takatsu's horror. But  when Takatsu starts attending marriage interviews  Mizusawa realizes he wants his homeroom teacher.

title_en: Disney Twisted Wonderland: The Comic—Episode of Savanaclaw
description: Hirasaka Yuuka  a high-school student who lived an average life  and a black carriage that suddenly appeared in front of her one day on her way home from club. After seeing it and losing consciousness  she awoke in another world called "Twisted Wonderland"...?

Cheers to you tonight! She is a graceful young lady  Miko Kanno  but her appearance is a little scary and she is feared by those around her. Recently  she has become addicted to “standing bars”! Potato salad  sea cucumbers  yakitori  fried chicken… ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/title/02015/episode/366588)

At the end of the battle  Insect Princess Kikuko disappeared along with Ryoichi. The town seemed to have regained its peace  but… Kikuko's genes continue to carry life  and finally  a new Princess is born who will bring terror to the world.

The past life died because of the imperial concubine  and he was born again in the high school era. It coincides with the recovery of the aura and the great changes in the world. When rejuvenating a teenager  he will follow the path of his journey  and he will protect his own friends. Loved ones. When he does not choose to stay  he will push him all the way.

**What is a *Human*?**  This is a world in which monsters and demons live. Every few years  a *Human* appears  almost as if they are reborn here.   These *Humans* require great care when picking food for them. They become sick at the slightest change in temperature. They get hurt from the smallest of falls.   But *Humans*  unlike Une (dogs)  Nosa (cats)  and Eshigu (rabbits)  have a unique kind of loyalty and intelligence  and even something endearing about them...    A diary manga about an encounter and their daily life. Along with its illustrated guide  this book is a great pickup for first-time *Human* owners!

A collection of short stories  centered around the theme of journey.  Table of Contents Chapter 1: Harukoma Chapter 2: The Pine Tree Occasionally Awakens Chapter 3: Traveling Prince Chapter 4: Six Months' Vacation Chapter 5: The Girl Underwater Chapter 6: How to Wake Up Your Lady Chapter 7: The Legend of the President's Glasses Chapter 8: Eru's House Sitting Chapter 9: Family Ensemble Chapter 10: Tazaki in the Desert Chapter 11: Taro and Tayura Chapter 12: Ran and the Gray World Extra Chapter 13: Toki's Journey Appendix Afterword

Inami  whose older brother doesn't go to school  and Kiyokawa  whose older sister doesn't go to school  both became the class pet caretakers when they were in fifth grade. Each carrying their own burdens  the two had supported each other through their daily lives. But then one day  an unexpected incident occurs…
The daily life of five girls who just became university students. They love delicious food  want to have lots of fun with everyone  and study a little harder to enjoy university life to the fullest!

title_en: I want to NTR the loser heroine

description: When Hiyori - a young girl whose deceased father taught her the joys of fishing - headed out to sea for some alone time  she never thought that she would encounter another girl there.   After a while  this girl - named Koharu - and her end up fishing and cooking together  and they get to know each other a bit in the meantime. During their brief time together Koharu finds out that the reason that Hiyori went out to sea that day was because she's hesitant towards meeting her new stepfamily that same evening. But what a coincidence! Koharu is also meeting her new family tonight! "No. It can't be a coincidence…" Follow these two 'sisters' and their new life together!     ---

title_en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Bangaihen - Toaru Kyuuka no Sugoshikata
description: **Warning:** This Spinoff manga has spoilers from the Light Novel.  After successfully completing the Founding Festival  which includes meetings with the leaders of various countries  a martial arts tournament  technology presentations  and the unveiling of the underground labyrinth  the peaceful daily life in Tempest has returned. Then  Veldora begins to say  "I'm also thinking of developing magic beasts"  and the three of them  including Rimuru and Hinata  who are interested in developing new magic  head for the Magic Tower  the sacred place of magic...?  This work is based on the Light Novel  and the timeline is from the end of Volume 9 to the beginning of Volume 10.

title_en: Shishikura Erika no Chō Suiri o 10 Pēji Gaman Dekireba Meikyūiri
description: A kinda 𝓯𝓻𝓮𝓪𝓴𝔂  kinda dirty proper whodunnit. Every 10 pages is a self-contained story  so you can jump right into it at any point! Original draft by Kurayamizaka Kyuushirou. Updates irregularly.

It is a romance story manga set in maid cafe between Tsubaki Tachibana  who never smiles at school  and Tsukushi Sugina  who happens to have the same part-time job.  ___ You can support the author by buying the manga in [Booth.pm](https://inadahime.booth.pm/)

title_en: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
description: At the beginning of A Link to the Past  a young boy named Link is awakened by a telepathic message from Princess Zelda  who says that she is locked in the dungeon of Hyrule Castle. As the message closes  Link finds his uncle ready for battle  telling Link to remain in bed. However  Link ignores his uncle's command  and after his uncle leaves  follows him to Hyrule Castle. When he arrives  he finds his uncle seriously wounded. Link's uncle tells Link to rescue Princess Zelda from her prison  giving him a sword and shield. Link navigates the castle and rescues Zelda from her cell  and the two escape into a secret passage through the sewers that leads to a sanctuary.

title_en: Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
description: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time manga is based off of the popular Nintendo 64 game of the same name. Young hero Link travels the world of Hyrule in search of the Spiritual Stones and encounters many friendly faces throughout his journey  including Zelda  the princess of Hyrule. The focus of Link's courageous quest is to thwart the evil king Ganondorf's plans to rule Hyrule. But when our hero is absent for seven years  Ganondorf has the opportunity to obtain the power of the gods  the Triforce.

In a world where humanity is struggling to fight off the demon threat due to the difference in magic between them  the humans choose to summon heroes from another world  hoping the heroes' unique magic can save them. But  both the "heroes"  and the world they were summoned to  are more complex than they seem...

A funeral. A man who won't stop following him. Orlando’s world begins to crack—first in his sleep  then in waking life. He’s no longer sure what’s real. At first  it's unsettling. Then it becomes unbearable.

title_en: Nine Methods of Ascending the Clouds: First Ranked Immortal
description: If you want to learn how to be a god  you can ride a crane to the sky. Turning stones into gold? You can do so in mere seconds!

Kaito Odagiri is a normal fifth grade boy who can hold his own in a fight and loves to show off. This attracts the attention of Makoto Kaibara  a boy at Kaito's school who reveals to him that he can use magic  but he needs Kaito's help to protect the peace of their town. Kaito jumps at the chance of being a magic-wielding superhero  but his excitement turns to horror when he realizes that he'll be protecting the town dressed as a typical magical girl under the name Thrilling Pink. Although initially reluctant  Kaito soon discovers that there’s more to being a magical boy than simply looking cute in a skirt.

title_en: Ikitsuku Saki wa Yuusha ka Maou ka - Moto Hai Player ga Iku Isekai Kouryakuki
description: "I've found you!"  Mamiya Yuuto was transported into another world after hearing those words  but all he got out of it were a younger body and the ability to see his status screen at any time — in overwhelming detail. Survive in a different world with skills and magic  armed with the experience of working life and the knowledge and perseverance of a retired gamer!
Follow the hilarious antics and adventures of Seika Academy's girls water polo club in this amazing 4koma.

Shungo is a normal high school student living in a huge house. One day  his sister Ryoko sends Mayu and Mikihiro Tsukimura  two siblings  to live with him to help Mayu overcome her problem. Mayu's problem: androphobia (fear of men)  and Ryoko wants Shungo to help her overcome it. How? By making Mayu and Shungo share the same room  bed  and even take baths together. To make things even worse  Reika Hojo  the student-council chair  somehow ends up becoming their maid.
What happened in room 207?

Nicholas Abott wanted to act forever. When the mysterious and beautiful Elise Morin pulls him aside from a filming event  she grants his wish with a blood-stained kiss. But as Nico embraces his new vampiric power  can he also embrace the girl who turned him?

The story of Fine Art paintings whose subject is "feminine beauty" begins. Set in places such as France  Germany  the Netherlands  and Italy  it tells of the Great Masters: Lucas Cranach the Elder  Caravaggio  Velázquez  Sir John Everett Millais  Walter Ophey  etc. When the artists and beautiful women of the world intersect  a strange "colour" appears. The colour is  for example  the lustre of the rainbow. Guided by its brilliance  the seeker of beauty embarks on an endless journey.

On an idyllic vacation island in the southern seas  a young couple is trying to overcome the death of their only son. But for Kirishima Seiichi  the husband  the trip has a different purpose altogether. He plans to kill his wife and dispose of her body deep inside the forest. However  when his plan goes awry and his wife manages to escape  Seiichi follows her into a dark cave  only to find himself trapped inside and soon hunted by a savage creature with an insatiable hunger for human flesh…  ---  Official Release: - Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Hideout**
A popular girl meets a... strange guy in detention.

Naoto Date is a feared heel wrestler in America known as Tiger Mask who is extremely vicious in the ring. However  he decides to change after returning to Japan when a young boy tells him he wants to be a villain like Tiger Mask when he grows up. The boy resides in an orphanage  the same one that Tiger Mask grew up in during his childhood. Feeling that he does not want the boy to idolize a villain  Tiger is inspired to be a heroic wrestler.      The main antagonists are Tiger's Cave  a mysterious organization that trains young people to be villainous heel wrestlers on the condition that they give half of their earnings to the organization. Tiger Mask was once a member of Tiger's Cave but no longer wants anything to do with them  instead donating his money to the orphanage. This infuriates the leader of the organization and he sends numerous assassins  including other professional wrestlers  after Tiger Mask to punish him.      Most of the environment and characters are fictitious  but real-life pro wrestlers Antonio Inoki and Giant Baba are included in the story as well.

A boy and his "friends" like to play hide-and-seek in a scrapyeard. When their bullying drives him to his breaking point  things take a dark turn...  Originally published in the September 1995 issue of Suspense & Horror.
条件で結婚したけど。もうパパとママだけど。秘密があるけど。よそで遊んでるけど。もう空気みたいなもんだけど。夫が…妻が…大大大好き…!!!!! 世間に溢れる夫婦問題、なんのその!!

This series is a precursor to Hiroshi Masumura’s Atagoal. It was serialized in Monthly Magazine Garo (月刊漫画ガロ) from May 1975 to March 1976.  The story depicts the people of Yonezard  rising up against the re-invasion of King Kurmel  who once ruled the continent of Yonezard.  Many characters in Atagoal would make their first appearances in this series (Ex. Tempura  Gilbars  and Pantsu) although their roles are significantly different in this series than those from future Atagoal publications.

title_en: Yarinaoshi Reijou wa Ryuutei Heika wo Kouryaku-chuu
description: The curtains rise on the tale of a young lady who once stormed the battlefields now getting to start her life all over again! The young noblewoman  Jill  was sentenced to death by her fiancé  the Crown Prince. Just as she was on the brink of death  time rewinds back to when she was 10 years old  to the party where her engagement had been decided! Determined to avoid going down the same path to ruin  Jill hastily proposes to the person behind her  only to discover that he’s none other than Hades  the Emperor of the neighboring kingdom who’s (set to) fall into darkness  ergo the worst villain.

Kunimi Hiro and his best friend Hideo were baseball wonders… Until Hiro found out his arm was permanently damaged  rendering him unable to play anymore. A frustrated Hiro goes through the trouble of specifically finding a high school with no baseball team… Only to later on find out the doctor who examined him was a quack and his arm is perfectly fine. Hiro is quick to reinstate his dream: Creating a baseball team for his school and getting to face off against Hideo in the Koshien… The number one premier league for high school baseball.

title_en: CMYK - Sameda Kazuou wa Chuunibyou ga Naosenai
description: Sameda Kazuou who has finally escaped from his Chuunibyou syndrome  wants to erase the fact that he was like that at all  and decides to bury all of his school photos that are engraved with his past. However  there are three beautiful girls in the school who want those photos...

tags: Award Winning|Ghosts|Long Strip|Comedy|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Haejoon Goh  who ran from home  and Eunyung Baek  the problem child who lives in a tent.    These two  who met under terrible circumstances  are forced to live together in an abandoned dormitory.    This is a story of difficult growth between two people who hate both the dorm and each other.
In the depths of the Magamaga Mountain range  dark and sinister events await all who dare to enter.
It's exhausting to live as a human  so I hope I become a cat instead.  Then one day  my wish was granted?

Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together  because her grade school was in a different school district.

title_en: Mukuchina Sensei ni Zenryoku Kokuhaku Shitara Manzarade mo Nakatta Ken
Aru Hi  Totsuzen Gal no Iinazuke ga Dekita
description: Miran Katsuki  a positive gal who reigns in the upper class of the school caste  often asks Shuji Nagasawa  an otaku. I was confused by her suggestive behavior  but she unexpectedly announced that she was his fiancée!?
Kaiji is visited by a godlike spirit that grants him the vast and versatile power of... knowing how to use a computer...!
This is a ONE-OFF remake of Grappler Baki's chapter 1  created in honour of Weekly Shounen Champion's 50th publication anniversary. It is in two parts.

title_en: Baki Gaiden: Gaia & Sikorsky - Sometimes Nomura—Two yet Three People Living Together
description: After approaching Gaia for a revenge match  Sikorsky is instead greeted with his new home...?!

The story follows a dark place inside the world of the Baki series  the so-called "Amusement Park". The main character is Mumon Katsuragi  older brother of Katsumi. He ventures into a dark place where money is everything and lives are cheap  the "Amusement Park"  motivated to find the killer of his mentor and master Taizan Matsumoto. The killer left a few trails behind and with his wits and physical prowess  he's been able to track him down to the ultimate dangerous fighting arena.

This is the almighty Dogeza Manga!!   Dogeza is the act of kneeling on the ground in order to prostrate oneself until the head touches the floor. It can be a form of gratitude  apology  or prayer!   Experience the miracles it causes with the eccentric teacher  Ogami. He is the "Shaman"  a man of spiritual and a man who kneels. Don't miss this bizarre and touching masterpiece from Keisuke Itagaki.

title_en: Isekai Sniper wa Onna Senshi no Mofumofu Aigan Doubutsu
description: A gun otaku dies after toying with a homemade pistol that explodes in his face. In the afterlife  he is told that he will be reincarnated into another world. When the otaku wakes up  he finds that he is no longer human - he's now just some little furry thing. Near death  he comes across a beautiful warrior  who decides to take care of him because he's fluffy. However  things take a turn when he finds out that firearms exist in this world?
In the world  there is a gambler here named Saga.
The centuries-old evil spirit Okiku has decided to return with one objective: flirting as much as possible with Hijiri Ryouyou - the most powerful and beautiful exorcist of modern times.

title_en: Shiori Experience - Jimi na Watashi to Hen na Ojisan
description: Shiori was once a guitarist in a light music club in high school. But her first live performance was dashed when her brother ran away from home with a lot of debt  to become a musician in Tokyo. A decade later  Shiori is now a high school teacher  leading a boring  uneventful life and paying off the debt... till she runs into the ghost of none other than a famous guitarist Jim-you-know-who.

title_en: P.S. Waiting for You by the Lake
tags: Long Strip|Boys' Love|Drama|School Life|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Leo and Alexis lived in the same small town when they were kids and were best buddies. The two loved to spend their summers at the Green Rock Lake summer camp near town. But during the summer when they were eleven  Alexis ended his friendship with Leo over a stupid reason. After that  the two did not see each other again because of their families' situation. But during the summer when they were eighteen  the two met once again at Green Rock Lake...

Hunters are a special breed  dedicated to tracking down treasures  magical beasts  and even other men. But such pursuits require a license  and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas  amazing stores of information  and the right to call themselves Hunters.

Kang Hyo-in has been secretly in love with his best friend of eight years  Jin Ye-geon. So smitten that he’s practically lost a screw  Hyo-in comes up with a meticulous plan to finally become Ye-geon’s boyfriend. But all his careful effort is rendered pointless when  after a one-night stand he barely even remembers  their “relationship” suddenly begins—more like Ye-geon squeezing it out of him than anything else(?)!  Wait a sec… so between the two of us  who was on the bottom last night? ... Don’t tell me—it was me?!
謎の男に託されたスーパーヒーローになれる力。ただし変身は一度きり、たったの30分間だけ!?　ストーカーの魔の手から愛する彼女を守る為に生粋の怠け者が今奮起する――（『ジェットエメラルダー』編）。陰湿ないじめを目の当たりにした気弱な教師が怒りの炎を燃やす――（『スカーレットマンA』編）。

title_en: Te ni Ireta Saimin Appli de Yume no Harem Seikatsu wo Okuritai
description: I've never had a girlfriend. The app installed on my phone was a hypnosis app that could control anyone. After testing it  the app's power was real. With this  a harem life isn't just a dream...  "Why do all the girls I target have troubles!?"  A beautiful gal  a plain girl with hidden beauty  a cool ojou-sama junior—by the power of the hypnosis app  their secrets that they couldn't tell anyone are revealed! (I just wanted to do erotic things...!) The self-proclaimed loser  but fundamentally a good-guy protagonist  ends up running around helping people!?

title_en: Advance of Zeta Re-Boot: Gundam Inle - Black Rabbit Had a Dream
description: Set in U.C. 0091 after the end of the First Neo Zeon War  the plot follows ReZeon forces which have regrouped on Mars under a woman proclaiming herself Supreme Commander Alicia Zabi and absorbed Titans remnants who fled the Earth Sphere.

tags: Historical|Long Strip|Comedy|Adventure|Fantasy|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Lanxi Zhen tells the story of Laojun  Xuanli  and Qingning during the war. It shows a different world of demons and gods.

title_en: Sarashina Subaru-kun no Meirei wa Zettai!!
description: "You're mine." She finds herself perched on his lap  on the receiving end of a steamy kiss. On top of that  he's carrying her bridal-style to a bed…! Hatoko's getting sick and tired of being pushed around by her childhood friend and professional model  Subaru (a.k.a. The Sadistic Prince). One day Subaru drags her along to… a photo studio!? Filling in for a model  she is forced to play the role of Subaru's girlfriend. Amid the confusion  Subaru tells her he loves her as his face gets closer to hers… How is she supposed to react when he's looking at her like that!? Her heart's hammering in her chest…!!  ---  Official English : [Renta!](http://www.ebookrenta.com/renta/sc/frm/item/91008)  [Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/5)  [Pocket Comics](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)

At a certain café  there are many different people with unique attributes such as tsundere  little sister  etc. The new part time worker Maika has been asked by the shop owner to fill the role of super sadist?! Now  while doing her best to work hard  she also blossoms as a super sadist.

tags: Sci-Fi|Traditional Games|Action|Long Strip|Survival|Martial Arts|Magic|Drama|Fantasy|Web Comic|Supernatural|Adaptation|Full Color
description: "It isn't the strongest who survives. The one who survives is the strongest."  After being discharged from the military  Jin Seowoon did nothing but play games like a loser. One day  he was invited to the world of "Cloyd Survival " which resembled a game he enjoyed.  In that world were masters of martial arts  kings from other worlds  and notorious killers...  It was a gathering of monsters that surpassed human imagination.  Jin Seowoon had just one objective — to survive and become one of the top ten.

tags: Genderswap|Action|Long Strip|Isekai|Drama|Fantasy|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Adaptation|Full Color
description: "After returning from hell  the first thing I did was pick up my sword again."  Meet the Returning Warrior's swordsmanship broadcast in comic form!  [Original Novel](https://novelpia.com/novel/148845)

Koji Aiba  who had been living a school life unrelated to girls  suddenly encounters a mysterious phenomenon called "Lost Time" where time stops for one hour a day. Takashi  who is trying to regain his youth in such a static world  meets Tokine Shinomiya  a girl with amber eyes who can also move in the stopped time. In a world where only the two of them can move  they gradually grow closer and closer  and eventually his feelings for Tokine turn into his first love. However  she seems to be harboring a big secret that blocks her feelings.
A murdered boy is buried in a flowerbed. What strange fruits may grow from his decaying flesh?  Originally published in Gakuen Mystery 26 in 1994.

In a world where opposites attract  a chance encounter sparks a connection between a serious black-haired girl and a charismatic blond delinquent  painting a cute tale of young love and friendships. As the series unfolds  their seemingly carefree lives take unexpected turns  delving into the shadows that haunt their lives.   An artful blend of laughter and heartfelt moments  this manga tells about the complexities of youth  friendship  and your past catching up to you.

The story of Plamo-Kyoshiro is about Shiro Kyoda  a young boy from Tamiya City and a student of the Bandai Elementary School. Shiro is an enthusiast of plastic model kits and "Plamo Simulation"  a plastic model battle game. Shiro's dream is to become the representative of Japan in the World Simulation Tournament and be able to fight in the finals in the Battle of Hobbytopia. In addition to that  the manga contained original designs that would later inspire the Mobile Suit Variations and BB Senshi series.

title_en: Midori no Kaze ni Kimi wo Hiraku
description: A house surrounded by lush  overgrown greenery  and a beautiful  but distant man - this is what the gardener Nishikigi finds at his new workplace. He's not sure what to make of the master of the house  Kuraoka  especially when he asks to observe him and his work for his new children's novel.  Nishikigi is only certain that the two of them are from different worlds and see everything differently - maybe even irreconcilably so. But just like the light and wind start to come in once he tames the overgrown garden  so love begins to flow into their hearts.  And thus  a slow and beautiful romance begins between two complete opposites.

title_en: Kuroki Kemono to Yoru no Hana
description: Shiga Azuma  a promising young leader of an underground organization  stops to buy flowers for his father's grave from the flower shop of the blind Anji Haruki. And he keeps coming back  drawn to Haruki's inner light and comforting presence - the complete opposite of his world. But their relationship unearths darkness  obsession and secrets on both sides  and threatens to destroy them both.

Melon is clumsy and bad at everything - he knows this much about himself  and he's never let it bother him.  What does bother him  though  is that he has no money  no place to stay  he's quit school  he's hungry  he's in a city he doesn't know well  and it's raining...  And yet  he meets someone who's having an even worse day than him  one Kawai-san  who wastes no time in inviting him up to his apartment for a hot meal and sex.  Melon decides on the spot that he'll be Kawai-san's kept boy! Why not? Kawai-san is rich  and Melon  as it turns out  likes sex with men. But are things between them really that simple...?

title_en: Watashi wa Futotte Imasen Kara! (Touhou Doujinshi)
Arknights: Sui's Daily Slices: Wanna Shoot a Picture?
description: Perhaps  this is a surer thing than memory could hope to be.

title_en: New Testament - Star of the Giants
description: Mitsuru Hanagata  the genius little league pitcher. He injured his shoulder in a little league match and withdrew from baseball. His shoulder should have healed  but in a match against the a baseball club full of hooligans  he realises that his shoulder is permantly injured. He will never be able to pitch again. So he turns to becoming a genius batter instead!

title_en: Shinyuu ni Sukina Hito ga Dekitarashii
description: Ayame was dumped by the boyfriend she was living with and decides to move in with her best friend  Ema  a free-spirited woman who secretly harbors affection for Ayame. "I want to be happy!" Seeing Ayame retain her optimism on life  Ema decides to confront her own feelings and cuts her hair short  transforming into a handsome woman who makes even Ayame's heart race!
A spin-off manga created by Toyotaro  and based on the arcade game Dragon Ball Heroes. It debuted in the November 2012 edition of V-Jump  the release date of which was October 20  2012.

In Eastern History  humans and spirits exist in this world. Fox spirits have long acted as matchmakers  holding a prestigious position among spirits. In this story  the lives of a fox spirit and a man who have both rejected the idea of true love become intertwined  and their exciting adventure begins.

tags: Award Winning|Romance|Comedy|Sports|Martial Arts|Office Workers|Drama|School Life|Delinquents|Slice of Life
description: Yawara Inokuma is just another young high school girl. Well  not quite for Yawara is being raised by her grandfather  7th dan Judo master Jigorou Inokuma  to be Japan's great hope for the women's Judo competition at the 1992 Olympics in Barcelona. All the same  Yawara just wants to live a normal life...    --- - **Won the 35th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 1990**
Caio was born incredibly lucky. But in a world where gambling can "break you"  even he will discover that playing with a tiger has a price...

Rai Raitoningu was born not to long after a Great War that left is county in a fragile state  even worse his parents  the king and queen suddenly disappear one day leaving the country in chaos. Gangs and turf wars now happen all the time and Rai decides to try and stop every single one while he awaits his parents return  but something much worse lurks in the background that could destroy the whole country…..

title_en: Let's Play the Pokémon Card Game XY

description: Humanity’s home is no longer Earth. Intersellar travel is now a common occurence  and technology has replaced blood and flesh.  Luka  who grew up in the slums  has turned fifteen and taken the selection exams. His aptitude is of the Imperial Guard.

title_en: Attouteki Gacha un de Isekai wo Nariagaru!
description: Overworked Salaryman Jinta dies in a traffic accident and meets the Goddess Leafa. Due to Jinta's good karma he was supposed to be sent to Heaven  but during an argument the two of them were accidentally reincarnated to another world  much to Jinta's delight. Discovering that his Luck stat has gone beyond the maximum of 99 to 999999  Jinta plans to live his life to fullest by taking advantage of the Gacha system that this world runs on.

The almighty Demon Cultivator Xie Tian gave birth to a child during the demon king selection and lost his place as the demon king! Now at the bottom of the pit  he decides to bring his son Duoduo and get his man back from the succession and marriage ceremony of the righteous sect! Who is the father?!       Bai Jing: Since you're already  then you won't be going anywhere else. I want both the father and the child!   Xie Tian: Marriage? Sure. But I'm on top!

"Hikaru to Hikaru" is a comedy about Hikaru Katsuragi  a boy who is a descendant of the Iga ninja  sneaking into a girls' school.  In the Katsuragi family  if you don't master the secret "Kunoichi no Jutsu " which turns your body into a female body  by the age of 18  you won't be recognized as an adult  and his mother was worried about Hikaru's immature technique. In order for such a Hikaru to become a full-fledged woman  he is ordered to attend a prestigious school for young ladies  Kazami Girls' School  in the form of a woman.

Vash the Stampede rises again! It's been two years since the mysterious and super-nice gunman went into hiding  and the people of his desert planet are suffering. It takes a friend in peril to bring him out  and when he does  his enemies come chasing… as well as those crazy insurance girls  Millie and Meryl. And Wolfwood the wandering priest? Well  that's who found him in the first place! The gang's all back  and the trouble is coming in Trigun Maximum.  Notes:  - Nightow changed publishers to Shonen Gahosha and the series continued to be serialized in Young King Ours magazine. Due to the original publisher retaining the name Trigun  Nightow had to change the title to Trigun Maximum  which isn´t a sequel but a new name for the rest of the series.  - The first 3 volumes were published under the title 'Trigun' and the entire series compiled into 14 books as 'Trigun Maximum' (the numbering was also restarted when the title changed).  - Won the Seiun Award at the 48th Japan Science Fiction Conventionwere for the best comic of the year.

After two decades of battling extradimensional monsters and protecting the world  Lim Dae-in is finally ready to retire and enjoy a peaceful life. However  the morning after his retirement party  he wakes up to find himself back in time… before he even gained his powers.   Armed with knowledge of the future  Dae-in is determined to secure his fortune and retire again  but this time within three years.

title_en: Tsuihou Sareta Renkinjutsushi  Adult Goods de Sekai wo Sukuu ~Donna Monster mo Zettai ni Ikaseru Otoko~
description: **You've been making... nothing but adult toys?!**  Oruga Zumu  a man whose alchemy always turns everything into adult toys  is expelled from his party for **lowering the status.** However  the female knight Kuu Korosse  who appears before him  recognizes Oruga's true power.

Yu☆Gi☆Oh! Arc-V centers around Yuuya Sakaki  a mysterious Entertainment Duelist known as "The Phantom" along with his three other personalities: Yuuto  Yuugo  and Yuuri. He was chased after by Leo Corporation for hacking into their Solid Vision with mass system and used it for his own purpose.      While on the run  he meets Yuzu Hiiragi  the daughter of the principal of Syu Zo Duel School that was on the verge of bankruptcy and tricked Yuuya into a contract to become a teacher at her school. However  before Yuuya could teach at the school  he first must find a card called Genesis Omega Dragon that said will determine the fate of the world that also connected to his scattered memories.      The story is set in alternate version of Miami City where Leo Corporation  run by its president Reiji Akaba  dominates most of Solid Vision system throughout the city. The spread of the company's Solid Vision with mass not only gave birth to "Action Duels" but also help improving the city in saving lives and repair damage in case of disaster  becoming a vital part of people's life.

Except for being a little short  Kanta Date is a completely ordinary high schooler. This nobody however  managed to get a girlfriend. This girlfriend is a real poker-face and to the world  seems cold as ice. However  just for Kanta  she is really sweet. Different from her outward appearance and sweeter than sugar  she always manages to overwhelm Kanta.

This unusual duo brings the hidden truth into the light! Ron Kamonohashi  a private investigator with serious issues  and Totomaru Ishiki  a pure-hearted but dim police detective  team up to solve the most baffling mysteries!

title_en: The Apple With A Human Face
description: A family drives into the countryside to pick some apples  when  to their horror  they discover that the fruits have human faces...  Originally published in the January 1998 issue of Suspense & Horror.

One day at school  Youta sees someone strange entering his school. Out of nowhere this being appears next to him and makes him fall from the 3rd floor. He lands in a strange world  where beings like dragons exist! Youta meets a young paladin  and discovers that he is the only man inhabiting that planet  and that its inhabitants are extremely 'weak' to his presence. Could this be paradise?

Gotou-san  the prettiest girl in school  tries to get the attention of Maeda-kun  who sits in front of her. She secretly harbors a crush on him  but Maeda  who lacks self-confidence  doesn't notice her feelings. What is the future of Gotou-san's unwavering love?

title_en: A Transparent Girl with Visible Thirst
description: You can't see her. But you can feel her. And she wants to be loved  completely.

Lee Ki-joo realized that to escape his miserable life as an outcast  he needed a girlfriend. But the girl he fell for at first sight just happened to be the daughter of a boxing gym owner.  While trying to turn his life around by getting a girlfriend  Lee Ki-joo instead begins to fall for the true charm of boxing in the ring.  “Endurance doesn’t just come naturally!”   The story of an outcast’s life-changing journey through boxing!
A prince has been cursed to turn into a frog by a witch. Things went wild from there.

Yugo  who is deeply in love with the heroine  Shiina  has witnessed her death countless times. His abnormal love for her has given him the power of a magical gun to transcend space and time. However  every reset comes at a cruel cost: causing her memories to fade one by one. Even so  his burning flame of love never fades. To save Shiina from her untimely demise  and until Yugo can reach the one irrefutable "proof of love"—a kiss—he won't stop pulling the trigger.
Saya suddenly loses a year's worth of memories. She begins living with her guardian  a man called Touji  but she can't shake the feeling that there's something off about who she used to be...

A Shoujo version of The Living Corpse that was later adapted into the film "Dead Girl Walking".  On  her yearly health checkup Yuri Ohara receives a terrifying diagnosis: she has zero brainwave activity  no respiratory function  and no pulse. She is dead...but she is still alive...

High school boy Koguchi Torao sees Mogusa Minori  a quiet  reserved girl in his class  walk into the restaurant run by his family and order an unbelievable amount of food  and even more surprisingly  sees that she keeps unagi pie (a sweet biscuit made with powdered eel) in her wallet?!      The story revolves around Koguchi and Mogusa's meetings in daily life and Koguchi's observations of Mogusa's unbelievable (and quite eccentric) eating habits.

title_en: Dokyuusei no Oshi Sakka ni Yuri Mousou ga Bareta Kekka
description: What happens when a classmate finds out about another girl's secret yuri obsession/feelings? A yuri comedy ensues!

The series follows Kyouko Okita  a buxom housewife who's just recently moved into a new neighbourhood with her husband. There she tries to adjust to her new neighbourhood  make new friends  and deal with the quirkiness of her everyday life.

Suzuki Saburo is the typical isekai MC. A high school boy who started to get into cooking after getting an injury during baseball  he suddenly found himself in another world one day. With the only thing on his person being his custom knife  he wandered a desolate prairie for three days before falling unconscious.       When he woke up  he found that a nomadic tribe of elves took him in. However  there’s one big problem - the tribe has terrible cooking. Can Saburo help teach the nomadic elves the true meaning of deliciousness?    --- **Links:**    -  Alternative Raw: [Pixiv Comics](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/3951)

title_en: Gakuen Kishi no Level Up! Level 1000 Koe no Tenseisha  Ochikobore Class ni Nyuugaku. Soshite
description: Soma  who reincarnated with the memory of the previous life  was awakened to the rare ability "trial and error" that can confirm the skill level numerically  and thanks to that  he was able to raise various levels evenly. At the entrance ceremony at the knight training school that I admired  the student's skill level and skill level are judged and classified  and the top class "Soryu (Blue Dragon)" is certain if it exceeds the total skill level "200". The thing is however  the total level of Soma at this time was "1012"  which should have been far above the margin  but the judgment machine was a specification that could not measure the 4-digit level!! As a result  it was wrong even though it was the academic ability of the top grade. Soma enters the problem child class by judgment  but with the skill of "trial and error"  Soma causes a big revolution in the aristocratic school!!

Once upon a time a thousand years back from now  there was a legendary man that trembled Japan  in the era of peace.  The man was Musashibou Benkei. Spending his time as a priest soldier under control of Honen of Mount Hiei  he started to feel the emptiness of his own overwhelming power somewhere down the line. One day  Honen descended the mountain with his armed priests including Benkei. And Benkei happened to see...  Why he was born  how he should live? Only heaven knows the meaning of his life. It is an unprecedented saga of a man with passion for Japanese people.

Kaede Momose leaves the hustle and bustle of Tokyo for a new life alone in the mountains. On his first day there  he goes to greet his neighbor and meets Riku Tsukumo  who also lives alone in the mountains. Clean air and mountain fare; so begins a cozy mountain-life romance!

title_en: Tensei Shite mo Neko wa Neko
description: A story about a cat reincarnated in a different world where there are no cats.

Shoutaro is a man of few words. He manages a used books store called Mononobe Koshoten and has an efficient young boy named Shiro to help out with the work while he reads the day away. But behind this normal and mundane facade Shoutaro has another job: the collection of some rather unpleasant old books…      Author's Twitter: [Link](https://twitter.com/kn_sousaku)

Dae Ho  who became an orphan at the age of 13  was adopted by his father's friend. However  Dae Ho in adulthood knew nothing about the relationship between men and women. Aunt and sisters decided to give pure Dae Ho a secret class…

The innocent and independent Mian Hua and the cautious and conservative Lan Bao. The two people met coincidentally while one was renting a house. What kind of love sparks will emerge from two people who have very different worldviews  values  ​​and outlooks on life? From the same creator of the fluffy love story <One Minute Underwater>  Bao-Ah. How will she utilize her elegant writing style and an adorable plot to create a “next-door neighbor” type of romantic drama set in Hong Kong…~

A very unique  funny manga that follows the exploits of Ebichu  a talking female hamster with a dirty mind. This manga includes sexual dialogue  some nudity  and the occasional sex scene. There's also some violence against hamsters. It's all pretty lighthearted  but if any of this stuff offends you  don't read it.

Event planner Yuka Sawatani‘s life ended as the result of overwork. Reborn into an Otome game with her memory intact  she becomes the villainess Elizabeth. She tries to resist her fate  but at the ending of the game  she is promptly banished.
Peaceful human society is threatened by monsters called fears! In such a world  No. 28  a fear fascinated by human life  lived quietly as a human  but……?

title_en: Rebirth of the Urban Immortal Cultivator
tags: Time Travel|Action|Martial Arts|Adventure|Wuxia|School Life|Web Comic|Supernatural|Full Color
description: Chen Fan died in the midst of divine tribulation  having reached the pinnacle of the cultivation world in less than 500 years. Somehow  despite the loss of his cultivation base  he was able to return to his youth as a high school student living on Earth. He decided to once again tread the path to immortality  armed with the knowledge he had gathered in his past life  to overwrite his past mistakes  remove his lingering regrets  and set a firm spiritual foundation that will guarantee success in his inevitable attempt to once again ascend to another plane of existence.

Set in the Taisho era  Kurasawa Heigo  the son of a trading company president  reunites with Sakaguchi Isamu  his childhood friend from 10 years ago. They both used to play together like brothers but now they are master and servant. Heigo is left feeling lonely because of Isamu's now unfamiliar politeness. In order to restore their past relationship  Heigo tries to treat Isamu not as a servant but as a friend instead. However  one day  Isamu discovered old love letters addressed to Heigo from a man. Heigo was upset by this discovery and when Isamu comes to hold him in his arms  he whispers... "I will never tell anyone about this. So  please let me be the only one you open up to about this worry..."

Since the alien Gitai invaded the Earth  humankind has been retreating. Now that Japan is almost surrounded by the Gitai  Keiji Kiriya is just one of many new recruits forced into a suit of battle armor and sent out to kill aliens. On a joint mission with the US special force led by Rita  known as the Bitch of the War  Keiji dies on the battlefield  only to find himself reborn.    After 4 times of "death " Kiriya realizes that he has to win the battle to get out of the loop…      **Notes:**    - [The 2014 movie 'Edge of Tomorrow' starring Tom Cruise](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vw61gCe2oqI) is an adaptation of the original novel (with a different ending).       [Official Vietnamese](https://www.fahasa.com/all-you-need-is-kill-cuoc-chien-luan-hoi-manga-bo-2-tap.html?attempt=1)

New horror work by Noroi Michiru that spoofs classic shoujo b-horror manga. Bloody bizarro horror!  Noroi Michiru has been highly recommended by the most popular horror mangaka at the moment  Junji Ito!  Chapter 2: https://x.com/ComicJUMBLE/status/1907343991714296062  Started 26/12/2024
All the members of my sect are abnormally strong. All my disciples turn out to be big shots  and I'll definitely become invincible in this world!
A devoted cleric's journey alongside a Draganonian warrior who suffers under an ancient curse of Lust.

title_en: I Can't Fall in Love With Paperman
description: When a BL comic artist transmigrated into the princess of Liao  she resumed her career... but encountered her "dear son" who crawled out of the book and refused to be gay! Faced with a sword to her neck  will she surrender or resist? What's worse  the plot is no longer under her control; who's the mysterious person behind the scenes controlling everything?
The Venomous God Shinie Antsu presents stories about the venomous nature of humanity...  These two chapters were published in the first two issues of the ALL KAIDAN horror manga magazine in 1997.
The story of an otherwise 'average' office worker discovering her true potential. One of the three winners of Shogakukan's 83rd New Manga Awards.

title_en: Tomodachi no Joshi ni Josou Saserare Danshi

description: Jay is a guy that wanted to talk with his friend about their secret crushes  When Jay was about to confess who he has a crush on  his friend Jiwoon  who’s crush is actually towards Jay  was hopefull that Jay was going to confess his feelings towards her. But she felt shocked when she learned that actually Jay’s crush was someone else  after that  Jay asked her about her crush  Jiwoon tried to avoid the question and gave him a vague description which caused a misunderstanding that his crush was actually towards Jay’s friend Seohyun. She and Jay are just good friends without anything romantic going on between them  The way Jay interacts with her is just in a friendly manner and tries to help her to get her “crush”….Let the romantic drama begin at school!

His feelings for his best friend changed from platonic into romantic. Ainosuke could no longer suppress his feelings for his classmate and best friend  Hibe. Determined to confess today  Ainosuke dozes off at school and dreams of having sex with Hibe for some reason...!

A girl named An  who dreams of prince charming  one day finds a mysterious book in the school library. When she opens the pages  the characters from the Grimm fairy tales sealed within the book are unleashed...!?

Demon Queen Abyss is worried… She's not able to defeat the Hero  considered the mortal enemy of the demons. This Hero is still an inexperienced young man—he should be easy to defeat! … However  the problem is that he  not knowing Abyss's true identity  considers her his “Master” and has become very fond of her…!? ___ **Producer & Supervisor:** [studioHEADLINE](https://mangadex.org/author/657c3108-5817-4669-a957-a9c7ec5080ee/studio-headline)

A Fantasy Love Story: A beautiful homunculus left behind by a great alchemist master―― Joshua  a young alchemist  travels with a homunculus named Coco. Even though he has no emotions  Coco is the only partner Joshua can trust. Coco pretends to be human to hide his true identity  but for some reason  he hugs Joshua every night with passionate eyes...!?
Amy is an ordinary girl who lives with her beloved father. However  she is not human  but a doll made up of cloth and cotton. Why was she created  and what does her future hold?

Nanashima’s high school baseball team missed going to the Koshien by one heartbreaking game during his 2nd year in school. Now as a 3rd year and the team captain  he sees that the team is nothing compared to last year. The all star starters from last year have graduated and Nanashima is left with unskilled and  more importantly  unmotivated players that have no shot at making the Koshien. That is when Mr. Toku  an old man in the neighborhood who has watched every practice and every game the school has ever played for the past few decades  secretly entrusts Nanashima with 10.000.000 yen. Mr. Toku wants Nanashima to use the money however he wants to ensure the team makes it to the Koshien. But that large of an untraceable fund is too big of a responsibility for a high school teenager and even a goodhearted kid like Nanashima might fall into its temptation.

Mahiro  the head of the disciplinary committee  is assigned to take care of Asuma  the most tardy student in school. Rumor has it that Asuma will never wake up once he falls asleep  no matter what you do. This makes Mahiro worried  but eventually  they become roommates...  One morning  when Mahiro tries to wake up Asuma  who is fast asleep  he is suddenly pulled into his bed! Asuma  who was not supposed to fast asleep  wakes up with a start and says  “It looks like I can wake up when I hug Mahiro-kun!!”  Since then  Asuma has become very attached to Mahiro  and the distance between them is gradually growing closer...!

Teora is a traveler who visits mysterious festivals all over Japan. At the festival she visits this time  where “girls search for a bell out of a large amount of food”  unexpected turmoil ensues…? ___ **Individual Chapter Buy Links:** - [BOOK☆WALKER](https://bookwalker.jp/series/458551/) - [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0CW18SYNQ) - [ebookjapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/815092/)
One of Hideshi Hino's final works before retiring as a mangaka. Four chapters were serialized between August 2000 and February 2001 in GARO. The fourth chapter ends with "To Be Continued...".

title_en: When My Organs Awakened  I Suddenly Became Invincible
description: After transmigrating  Ye Qing discovered that his organs could cultivate themselves under certain conditions  and sometimes they even had their own thoughts. With the help of these overly independent organs  Ye Qing advanced rapidly on his cultivation journey. While others were busy cultivating  comprehending  and breaking through  his organs had already paved the way for him. However  because his organs had too many of their own ideas  Ye Qing frequently encountered some 'small' troubles.

An abusive father  an indifferent brother  a mother forced to endure it all  and her  Kinomiya Aya  a girl living in a family that's fallen apart. One day she makes a wish: "I don't want to be here…"  and finds herself with the ability to turn invisible. This is the story of how one girl takes back her own pain and her chance at a normal life.

title_en: Okiraku Ryoushu no Tanoshii Ryouchi Bouei ~Seisan-kei Majutsu de Na mo na Kimura wo Saikyou no Jousai Toshi ni~
description: A man was reincarnated as Van  a boy of noble birth  who grew up to become a child prodigy through hard work. But when it was discovered that he possessed "production magic " he was immediately relegated to a remote village. However  his magic  which was called useless  turned out to be truly extraordinary  capable of producing anything as long as he had the right ingredients! With the knowledge from his previous life and the overpowered magic  the small  poor village will grow to become into a great city.

A party embarks on a journey to find the legendary sword and stop the Demon Lord’s awakening. There’s just one problem: their paladin  Alicia  is busty to a ridiculous degree  and in this world  that’s considered bad luck incarnate. Chaos  hilarity  and epic boobs await on this absurd adventure!

title_en: Boku to Koi no Hanashi wo Shinaika
tags: Long Strip|Comedy|Boys' Love|School Life|Delinquents|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: "Yana" is an infamous playboy who dumps people left and right. But his true identity is one with a pure heart pining for "Metsuki"  the area's worst delinquent. He saved Yana at the entrance ceremony and the latter fell for him immediately! Yana never stops yapping about his love day in and day out for Metsuki  who's tired of all this crap. So he asked Yana if he could kiss him like they do in shoujo manga. And...?!  Emeichi's newest  love story between two clumsy high school boys starts here!!!

At the bottom of an impregnable underground dungeon awaits the final boss  the mighty black dragon Obsidian. The one who dared to challenge Obsidian is Van  an experienced adventurer who has fought many battles with the dragon over the years.

Tsukatsuki Ran and Hanazome Nadeshiko are president and vice president on the student council  and are responsible for organizing the school festival. When Ran makes a big mistake  Nadeshiko takes advantage.

Yusei has lost both parents  while Hanami struggles with her relationship with her mother. Both grew up at the foot of Mount Fuji  and now they're faced with important decisions about their futures. Questions about themselves. About their families. About themselves and their families. After much worry and suffering  what "destination" will they ultimately choose? A gentle  tender human drama.
Noa Yoyogi has always dreamed of being someone special. One day  she meets a fairy named Mimi  but Mimi is actually a demon  and soon Noa encounters a man who claims to be an exorcist...?

Ichika  who has a crush on Asuka  decides to try a love charm. However  what appears before her is a self-proclaimed No.1 Cupid named Yashamaru Manjigahara  who dons a gang-style uniform! With this delinquent-like Cupid in charge  will her love actually work out...⁉︎

title_en: By Your Side: Where Happiness Lives
description: Manga artist Shizuka suddenly hits a creative wall. Nothing's going right  and she's completely lost touch with her own feelings... A touching one-shot about reconnecting with yourself.

The story begins when Azuma Shuri  a young man with an ambition to be a chef  trips into another world. Akari is picked up by Gungrave  the leader of a mercenary group. Shuri joins the group as an odd job and gradually increases his own value by demonstrating his cooking skills. Each leader of the mercenary group is a quirky character  but Shuri connects with them through his cooking. By improving the mercenary group's food situation and occasionally helping with inventions  Shuri is gradually recognized by his fellow members of the mercenary group. However  Shuri does not yet know that he will become a hero.

The manga will not only cover the original Aincrad arc  but also various Aincrad side stories  including those that were never animated  such as The First Day/The Day of Beginnings from volume 8 of the novels.
When a magic creature is discovered by a sister and her younger brother  they decide to keep it! However  it's new place in the family may tear these sibling apart.
Pairing: Todoroki Shouto x Bakugou Katsuki

title_en: Kuzuu sensei to Shiomoto-kun no mondai no aru jikkenshitsu
description: Kuzuu  who teaches Cosmetic Science at university  is asked by his student  the famed 'cool beauty' Shiomoto  to help with an experiment involving male hormones by doing XXX. Telling himself it's for research and for his cute student  he reluctantly agrees… but Shiomoto's demands grow more intense with each passing day... The more he thinks "No  we can't  we shouldn't"  the more unstoppable it becomes! This research is downright addictive?! A problematic experiment begins between a natural airhead and a tsundere beauty!

The Office Lady (OL-san)  who looks forward to stopping by at the convenience store on the way home from work. And Shibasaki-kun  the poker-faced high school part-timer  who gets stirred up by OL-san for some reason. A heartwarming manga about two people who pass by each other at the convenience store! ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [Square Enix](https://magazine.jp.square-enix.com/yg/introduction/conveni/)

title_en: Raise ni kitai suru shika nai kana

description: The continuation of Inazuma Eleven ten years later.

Guesthouse Yadori is a seaside inn with a view of the Pacific Ocean. Also  it's run by a 34-year-old tanned gal! In an unexpected turn of events  a university student named Youichi Sakimori ends up freeloading there. The playful and alluring innkeeper Hana Yadori has him dancing in her palms from morning till night…!?

Living in the house of anthrophobic high school student Akutsu Takuma are nine Valkyrie sisters! In order to exterminate the fiends threatening to wipe out humanity  he has no choice but to raise these girls levels. But to do this  he needs to get these girls really turned on. ___ **Alt Official English:** [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/val-x-love)

When I woke up  I had been reborn as a baby. My mother passed away and I was neglected by my father. Even though I was born in a Marquis family  my life started on HARD MODE. But I won't be discouraged. I will eat well  sleep well  move a lot  get whatever I can get and live happily. But for some reason  a lot of incidents happen. This is a story of a little girl with the power to create barriers in a world where the Hollows and Humans are in conflict. She gets other people involved in those incidents and becomes happy. ___ - [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2421eu/)

title_en: Ossan Teihen Chiyu-shi to Manasume no Henkyou Life ~Chuunen Otoko ga Kaifuku Skill ni Kakuseishite  Eiyuu e Nariagaru~
description: F-rank healer  Reda Dixon (30)  is expelled from his party due to his age. Heartbroken  Reda decides on a change of pace by moving to the rural town of Almus. On his journey there  he encounters a blonde-haired girl named Mina  who is dressed in ragged clothes. With no parents in sight  the kind-hearted Reda decides to become her guardian. In Almus  Reda  who starts a new life with the girl  becomes known as "Teacher" by the townspeople  thanks to his unconsciously cheat-level [Healing Magic]! Together  they solve various troubles and deepen their family bonds.

title_en: Itsuwari no Akujo Desu ga Suenagaku Shiawase ni Narimashou ~Wo Nozomi no Koioki Onna wo Enjite Irunoni Otto no Yousu ga Okashii~
description: Lynette  in place of her sister  is to marry Alfred  a rumored playboy who wants a young lady who can "wrap men around her fingers". In order to avoid being kicked out  she tries to act like the villainess Alfred wants  but his reaction isn't so good!? On the other hand  Alfred isn't actually a playboy either  but a very pure and innocent novice in love matters. But he decides to pretend to be a playboy in order to find out the intentions of Lynette  who was sent by the rival queen  are!?

The story is set in future Japan  in which the sea level has risen and flooded many of the coastal areas and Mt. Fuji has erupted within living memory.  The population has been considerably reduced and political and technological institutions have broken-down.  Local communities have become nations and telephone and television no longer exist (although coffee vending machines and streetlights stubbornly continue to work).  There are strange new animals and plants (like flying fish and glowing streetlight trees).      The remaining people have adopted a slower-paced  simpler way of life and rely more on each other. Along with the human population are some intelligent  humanoid robots.  One of the robots  a female named Alpha  runs a café by the same name in the country outside of what remains of Yokohama.  With her trusty motor scooter and her camera she travels around the area making friends with the humans and robots   having new experiences and observing the passage of time.    ---   - **Won the 2007 Seiun Award for Best Manga**

title_en: Sweet Home Mofumofu Tanuki Kyoudai to Kazoku ni Narimasu
description: The corporate slave meets a pair of fluffy brothers?! Hinata Chihiro is the so-called “corporate slave” who works for a black company. Today  after buying a convenience store box meal  as usual  he arrived home late at night just to find a lost kid wandering near his house?! Chihiro then welcomes the adorable small tanuki  Rio  and his tsundere older brother who hates humans  Itta. And that’s how his life with the fluffy tanuki brothers  who were driven out of their natural habitat  begins…!

Desharow  a Biology student at the Russian Maritime Academy  embarked on a long distance voyage with his mentor  Rhine  where the two caught a mysterious black scaled merman in Iceland. Little did he know that this mysterious black and evil creature had long viewed him as his prey…  Official Translations: [Official Korean Translation](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/11357)

Harukaze High School's photography club is anything but normal. All the oddballs in the school seem to join. And the craziest one has just arrived…an android built to take over the world! Though he'd rather just have a bowl of rice.  --- - **Won the 19th Seiun Award for Best Comic in 1988**

Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage All over the world  Monsters suddenly began appearing. The only person who could save humanity from “The Calamity” was “The Great Sage”  Ichikami Atsumu. But  despite being satisfied in his death  he was reincarnated into the body of a boy who was bullied into killing himself  Kusanagi Minato. Atsumu  waking up in a Japan fifty years into the future  is shocked to see a peaceful world  and where magic has become far weaker compared to when he was alive. For now  Atsumu decides to go back to Kamui Magic Academy as Minato  but learns that mages are nothing more than a relic of the past  and in their place exist a class of privileged nobles .After blowing off his bragging  low-levelled bullies  Atsumu gains the interest of a noble magician girl  Mizuha Yuika  as well as his schoolmates and teachers. What’s more  Atsumu finds a sign that the Calamity  which was supposed to have been subdued  will return–– “It looks like my power is still needed” Within the soul of student lies the Great Sage?! The strongest Great Sage will change this world drunk on peace. With his reincarnation in the future set  the curtain opens on a new Hero’s story!
Popular illustrator Oku's first  short manga comes in full-color.

title_en: Shigoto Kaeri  Dokushin no Bijin Doushi ni Tanomarete
description: One day  a young clerk named Haruhiko was suddenly asked by his boss to do one thing: get her pregnant.  "We won't have any deeper relationship... We just have to do it  that is  you have to get me pregnant  and I have your baby."

title_en: Manadeshi ni Uragirarete Shinda Ossan Yuusha  Shijou Saikyou no Maou to Shite Ikikaeru
description: The hero  Fried  confronts the demon lord with his student  Lyle. Fried killed the demon lord after a ferocious battle. "I'm going to put an end to this war!" Just as he was about to finish off the demon lord  he is betrayed by his student who attacked from behind. Fried  who was supposed to be dead  wakes up next to a demon girl who calls him the demon lord for some reason. It seems that Fried has risen as the new demon lord and will now have to protect the demonkind under his command while fighting his former comrades. ___ - [Webnovel Link](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0087ep/)

Previously a woman in science  she experienced a fated love in another world...  Seina Satou  who works as a pharmaceutical researcher  suddenly finds herself lost in a different world! One day  after managing to start life as the pharmacist 'Sena'  she encounters a mysterious man. He is the demon king Dermatitidis  a man of immense beauty and strong magical powers  but sickly and weak. Sena's knowledge and experience in herbal medicine is recognized  and she becomes his personal apothecary  with whom he shares a special and unforgettable time. And so  before long  the two are drawn to each other.

title_en: Kawaisugiru Danshi ga Ouchi de Matteimasu
description: Reo is a smart OL at work but an unkempt otaku at home. So she offered her friend Haru to come live with her rent-free if he'll cook  clean  and keep Reo away from bad relationships. It'll be great to have a good friend like Haru greet her with a cute smile and a warm meal when she comes home!

Ayamo  a girl who admires rock stars  comes across a band called "Devil Drive"  and she has to fight the existence called "Junk" that devours people's power of Yin? No Music  No World! The indestructible soul of rock leads to an unlimited battle and romance.
An invincible brother who's willing to do anything for his little sister.     ---

There's this pub (Izakaya) called "Gen" that was supposed to be in a certain place in the Kanto region of Japan. After opening the door one day  it was found to be connected to the city of Parisia  the Capital of the Eastern Kingdom Oiria. Individual residents from a foreign world such as crestfallen monks  warriors  noble female chevaliers  daughters of noisy famous aristocrats  etc. All visited the peculiar izakaya which they've never seen before  and gradually they'll become fans of the dishes.
The "violence gun action" manga's story centers on a dual gun-wielding protagonist who makes a deal with the devil to reap the souls of sinners.

Sitting by himself in the back of the class  10th-grader Yugi always had his head in some game–until he solved the Millennium Puzzle  an Egyptian artifact containing the spirit of a master gambler from the age of the pharaohs! Awakened after three thousand years  the King of Games possesses Yugi  recklessly challenging bullies and evil-doers to the Shadow Games  where the stakes are high  and even the most ordinary bet may result in weirdness and danger beyond belief! Let the games… begin!

title_en: Teru Teru Bozu of the Reiwa Era

description: Berserk  a survivor from the Shooting Star Rockman Tribe  goes to the continent of Mu to face Rogue (Burai)  the one responsible for destroying his tribe when they were young.

title_en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray Gaiden ~Far-off thunder~
description: How did Tamamo Cross and Masami Komiyama meet?
"Because I want to see that smile of yours again."      Official English translation on Comico's [Pocket Comics app](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)

Forget "saving face " this is "saved by face!" Roseny has been masquerading as a boy for years at the orphanage. But when the duke chooses her to be a playmate for his son  it isn't long before her secret is revealed. Instead of being sent back  her adorable complexion results in Roseny being adopted! What will this new future hold for her?

title_en: Amarimono Isekaijin no Jiyuu Seikatsu ~Yuusha ja Nai no de Katteni Yarasete Moraimasu~
description: Shinichi Sagara  or Shin  works in a corporate sweatshop when he's swept up in an off-world transport meant to bring heroes. Transported to the Kingdom of Tondemo  where they exploit these off-world heroes' abilities  Shin's quick to sense something amiss and flees to another kingdom to begin a happy idle life in a mountain village. One day  Shin meets a nobleman that's locked up in a remote part of a lord's mansion. Will this completely change that quiet life in the countryside?!  (Source: Alpha Manga)

title_en: Noroma Mahou to Yobareta Mahoutsukai wa Juuryoku Mahou de Musou suru ~Mada Juuryoku no Gainen no nai Sekai nite  Shounen wa Banyuuinryoku no Ou to naru~
description: Wade  a boy born in the slums and raised by terrible parents  finds a glimmer of hope when he becomes an apprentice adventurer. Enduring grueling training  he's promised to be taught magic if he perseveres. On the day of his fateful magic instruction  while others are granted promising fire and water magic  Wade receives what seems like the worst of luck—a magic called "Slow Magic." In despair upon realizing it's a spell that makes him clumsy  Wade recalls memories of his past life as a corporate s*ave.  "Huh? 'Slow Magic'? That sounds like gravity magic  a powerful spell!"  Yes! In this underdeveloped world  where the concept of gravity is largely unknown  Wade is underestimated. Determined  Wade faces his newfound gravity magic head-on. Increasing his own weight boosts his attack power  while being lighter makes him more agile. He can even float lighter than air and pseudo-create objects by manipulating gravity’s focal point. Thus  despite ridicule  Wade uses gravity to overcome those who mock him  defeat goblins  and even topple boss monsters.  Teaming up with a fellow unpopular magic user and a boy aspiring to be a hero  Wade delves deeper and deeper into dungeons in search of thrilling battles against the strongest foes.

title_en: Isekai Hoteru e You Koso ~Mazoku de Yuusha na Saikyou Ane-tachi Kara Dekiai Sarete Komattemasu~
description: Richii's parents died in an accident when he was in junior high school  leaving him alone with his doting sister Towa. Three years later  his sister also disappears  and even Riichi is summoned to another world where he is reunited with his sister. In the other world  Towa has become the most powerful hero!

tags: Award Winning|Psychological|Crime|Mafia|Office Workers|Sexual Violence|Philosophical|Drama|Slice of Life|Tragedy|Gyaru
description: During the past decades  Japan has become the shining star of Asia  with its noteworthy achievements in the fields of science  technology  medicine  quality of life  and many others.  Yet  while there are a great number of rich and successful Japanese people  there are even more of those engaged in a furious struggle for something as simple as earning to cover their day-to-day living expenses; all the while battling dangerous and money-consuming addictions such as gambling and alcoholism.  What would these poor and not-so people do when they require the money to fulfill their never-ending desires  the desires that are part and parcel of being human? Just how miserable and dangerous might their lives become were they to fall into traps laid by *yamikin*  the loan sharks of the Japanese financial world's dark side  whose only goal is to ensnare such weak-willed souls?  Adapted into film and a J-Drama.  ---   - **Won the 56th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2011** - **Won the 23rd Japan Media Arts Festival Social Impact Award in 2020**
A new era of adolescent love between an innocent girl who's a dom and a headstrong boy who's a sub!

title_en: Tomodachi no Nee-chan ni Nerawarete Shimatta Hanashi
description: Kouhei is a highschool student. His friend  Yuudai has a big sister  who is rumored to be a total slut  stealing someone's boyfriends and sleeping with anyone.  But Kouhei finds out that she's…

A tale of high adventure and survival on the Japanese frontier!   In the early twentieth century  Russo-Japanese War veteran Saichi Sugimoto searches the wilderness of the Japanese frontier of Hokkaido for a hoard of hidden gold. With only a cryptic map and a native Ainu girl to help him  Saichi must also deal with every murderous cutthroat  bandit and rogue who knows about the treasure!

In the final showdown between the Demon King and the Hero  the latter used all his power to seal away the former. To exact her revenge on her father's nemesis  the Demon King's daughter  Hel  resurrected the Hero and planned to use him as her personal servant. However  the resurrected Hero is unexpectedly dazzling and dashing  and Hel's composure begins to waver. Will she ever be able to torment her new servant?

The protagonist Hamada Katsuo  is your everyday pervert/loser character. He's starting a new semester in school  so he wants to escape from his loser days  the only problem is the new change in look/lifestyle he got is that of a gang member. He beats a strong guy that was bullying a friend of his by mistake and now  because of it he's the target for all the gangs in the region  even though he's still only a weakling and a pervert. Will Katsuo escape alive…? Find out.

When she was a student  she was a beautiful but cool loner. But 10 years later  we are married...... and she spends her days being all lovey-dovey with me! This is a collection of two-panel stories about the moe gap between the time skip  and the way she is becoming more and more doting on me!
A boy killed by his superhero idol  then he decided to become a Dark Walker. "Saving the world by destroying the world"

title_en: Watashi no Omen ga Toreru Made
description: "I've always thought you were cute."   Shinotsuka Rei  who has difficulty expressing her emotions  is kept at a distance by those around her and even given the nickname "Noh Mask." Apart from Sasabayashi Minato  who greets everyone cheerfully  she rarely speaks to anyone. One day  Shinotsuka's colleague invites her out to dinner. She decides to go  thinking it's a chance to chance her aloof personality  but she can't keep the conversation going and is subjected to harsh words. At that moment  Sasabayashi comes to the rescue...

History classes have never interested Saburo. He never saw the point of learning something that happened in the past  let alone a few hundred years ago. But when he falls off a wall  he travels through a wormhole and ends up in 16th century ancient Japan. He meets a very young Oda Nobunaga  one of the most influential figures in Japanese history  who turns out to be identical in appearance as Saburo. The real Nobunaga  sick of the castle life and wanting to travel  orders Saburo to take his place. Without knowing how to get back to his time  Saburo tries to make sure history isn't rewritten for the infamous Oda Nobunaga.  --- - **Won the 57th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen**

title_en: Super DB - Dragon Ball AF Magazine

description: Manga adaption of Morimi Tomihiko's 2003 debut novel.  Set at Kyouto University  a young man is taking his rejection hard  even going so far as to stalk the girl of his affection. ___ **Additional Links:** - [Official X](https://x.com/morimi_taiyo)

title_en: Tensei Shitara Ore ga Heroine de Aitsu ga Yuusha Datta
description: Keito Azumi  an ordinary high school boy  was reincarnated as the heroine in a different world when he woke up in an accident! The worst thing about this is that his best friend became the hero!

A girl walks alone in a world without humans. Her mission is to search for survivors and cleanse the land. Will humans be found? A story of loneliness and beautiful ruins.  --- **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Comic Walker](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_000736_S?episodeType=first)

Touhou official comic published by Kadokawa in Comp Ace that began publishing on October 26  2012. The story is written by ZUN  with illustrations by Moe Harukawa. It introduces a human book renter and collector Kosuzu Motoori as the main character  with the story centered around her mysterious ability to decipher any book no matter the language or script  and her assortment of various rare and dangerous demon books.

Seventeen year old Aya is the perfect high school student. Good grades  popular and sports prodigy. She is looking forward to summer break as her pen pal has invited her to his family ranch  but one day on the way home from school she hears a voice calling her name from....
