This is the story of a young boy  after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War  in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money  journeying to a faraway place  and living in conditions alien to him  definitely makes him miss home. Worse  he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny  he will slowly discover with his growing pains  just how resourceful Granny is…

title_en: Necromancer Academy and the Genius Summoner
description: Necromancers have built a name for themselves as fearsome practitioners of magic capable of dropping entire empires to their knees. Simon Follentia is a necromancer with incredible latent talent! After being scouted for the necromancer's academy  this genius is ready to be nurtured and taken to the next level.   But could Simon's insane talents attract some unforeseen consequences?

title_en: Genkaigoe no Skill wa  Tenseisha ni Shika Atsukaenai - Over Limit Skill Holder
description: A fantasy adventure about bonds forged with people in a different world. The setting is a world  where everyone has eight skill slots. In these slots people can put skills like "Strengthen Arm ★" and "Fire Magic★★" from skill orbs  abilities which prove extremely useful for survival. The total amount of stars your skills have can never exceed your slots.   Reiji  worked as a slave that mines skill orbs  until 10 years old. Along with his precious older sister  Lark  they worked gruelingly in the mines until one day  where the chance for rebellion occurred at the mine and Reiji got his hands on a ten-star  a so called "overlimit" skill  called "World Ruler".   Reiji went from a powerless slave to having an ability that surpassed human limits  but in the chaos of the revolt  he was separated from the only person dear to him  his sister Lark.      "To regain his bond with her  to make her his true sister " earnestly thinking so  Reiji's adventure to distant places starts! ___ **Note:** The chapter number resets after each arc.  +++ List  | Arc | Vol. | Ch. count | Chapters | | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | | 1 | 1–2 | 14 | 0–12.5 | | 2 | 3–6 | 25 | 0–24 | | 3 | 6-? | ? | 1-? |  Last updated while Arc 3 was still ongoing. (4 April 2025) +++

title_en: Kirawaremono no Tenisha wa  Demodotta Isekai de Dekiaisareru
description: Thirteen-year-old Towa  suffering from a severe case of "Chuunibyou" syndrome  is suddenly transported to another world. Although he is a rare foreigner in the new land  he has yet to manifest his "gift"—a unique ability granted only to otherworlders. To hide his lack of powers  he puts on an arrogant front  which ended up pushing away even the person he secretly admired  his own guard knight  Griz. One day  he was attacked from behind. "I’ve been killed!" he thought—only to wake up back in his original world.  Fifteen years passed  and he lived a mundane life as an ordinary office worker  haunted by memories of Griz. Then  he suddenly found himself lost in that other world once again! Determined to live a quiet life this time  but for some reason  Griz  whom he's reunited with  keeps closing the distance between them...?

A girl who calls herself a devil appeared before a timid student named Fumio Kijima. The girl claims to be a campaign girl from the demon world and she gives him the ability to "summon a room" from nothing but thin air. At first he doesn't abuse his power and uses it as a convenient ability in his every day life. But one day he is bullied by his classmates under an unfair pretext and is made to suffer. In the past  he would have wallowed in misery and cried himself to sleep  but now he had a power to call upon.  "I will make them regret it!"  Using his powers to summon his "room"  he begins his era of confinement and brainwashing to achieve his goals.

"Have you heard of Summer Ghosts?"  Tomoya  Aoi  and Ryo are high school students who met through the Internet. The urban legend of the Summer Ghost is that it is a ghost of a young woman who appears when fireworks are lit.  Tomoya is unable to step out into the life he wants. Aoi is unable to find her place in the world. Ryo's bright future is suddenly closed to him. Each of them has their own reasons for meeting the Summer Ghost. On a summer night when life and death intersect  where will each of their thoughts go to?

title_en: Is it Normal to Raise a Yandere Heroine as a Villainess ?!
tags: Reincarnation|Long Strip|Romance|Magic|Girls' Love|Isekai|Drama|School Life|Fantasy|Villainess|Web Comic|Full Color
description: Jiang Yang was a lead designer for a popular game company until she fell to her death while gathering inspiration for a new game. After waking up in a world of cultivation  she trained tirelessly to return to her original world  when a thread of fate pulled her into the world of an otome game.  Jiang Yang quickly realizes she is in the world of the very first game she had worked on. The thread of fate connected her to Stardew  the heroine of the game who is being bullied during her first year at the Royal Academy of Magic.  As the game progresses  Jiang Yang remembers the ridiculous story the game follows  and she decides that she can’t stand by while the game makes Stardew suffer. She helps Stardew deal with the flirtatious love interest of the original game  Crown Prince Miller  and even imparts her with some of her cultivation power. To protect Stardew from the game’s story  she even puts herself in danger. However  as Jiang Yang and Stardew’s relationship becomes closer  Jiang Yang realizes that the thread of fate connecting her and Stardew is not as simple as she imagined.

title_en: Shu yo  Omukae no Jikan desu
description: Is my adorable little nephew the reincarnation of the demon king Lucifer?!"  Chris  a picture book author  takes in his nephew after the loss of his brother and sister-in-law during an accident. Noah is a strange and eccentric child with the ability to communicate with animals. One morning  overwhelmed with his new parental situation  Noah jumps into the road?! However  the person who saved Noah before it was too late was Harvey-sensei  the nursery school teacher  a demon with black wings and horns!! Revealing his true identity  the demon kneels down saying  “I have come to take you back  Lucifer-sama.”  announcing that Noah is the reincarnation of the demon king?!

On the eve of the Pacific War.  Fukuhara Yuusaku  a Kobe-based trader  goes to Manchuria in search of supplies and discovers a startling national secret.  Yuusaku  out of a sense of justice  decides to disclose it to the world  but his wife  Satoko...  A romance/suspense hidden in the fires of war.  Winner of the Silver Lion at the 77th Venice International Film Festival.

A high school girl  Rai  secretly has a crush on her childhood friend  Do-gyeong. To hide her feelings  she pretends to be an idol fan.  Just when she couldn't give up on either her one-sided love or her fangirling—her favorite idol transfers to her school?! With Neulchan’s transfer  the relationship that seemed unchangeable begins to shake.  "We're just friends  so why are you jealous?"  A summer-lit school romance about a childhood friend turning into a girlfriend!

On an otherwise normal day  Astera and Sirus  siblings who live for each other  discover a new part of themselves. Gifted with magic  they are propelled into a far greater world than they've ever known. As their adventure unfolds  the will meet new friends  face new foes  and grapple with forces and problems no one alone should handle. In the continent of Litheria  the Five Nations persist past their expiry. As the New Era approaches its zenith  all must face their tests. Updates every month!

Reunited with the girl I liked back in school! After listening to her vent  things started to heat up! Could this be my big chance  10 years in the making!? A 20-page love story brought to life by a skilled artist!!Originally published in Weekly Young Magazine on Jan 6 2023

tags: Monsters|Action|Martial Arts|Self-Published|Virtual Reality|Video Games|Magic|Gore|Drama|School Life|Monster Girls|Web Comic|Supernatural
description: Ever thought  what if jjk characters were swapped with completely unrelated ones ? if the answer’s yes  then I guess my 'manga' is worth checking out. This story happens after the 2 act of doki doki literature club  just after sayori's death. (This manga is heavely inspired by jujutsu kaisen  gege akutami's manga and it represent doki doki literature club's characters).

At school  no one seems to care what transfer student Noipa-chan wears. In fact  they don't even seem to notice her existence  except for one person. Yuu is the only one who wonders what's going on with that girl.

title_en: Ore no tomodachi ♂♀ ga kawai sugite komaru!
description: "If my guy friend turned into a girl  he would be the perfect girlfriend!" Returning to his hometown after 10 years  Amano Koichi is thrilled to finally reunite with his childhood friend  Yukio Sawatari on the first day of school when suddenly  he turns female!  Yukio is affected by "Sudden sex change syndrome"  a rare condition present in one every ten thousand people which randomly changes their gender! Koichi can't help but be flustered by his childhood friend's cuteness. How will this complicate their relationship? Will it develop into a forbidden romance?! Find out in this exciting TSF Rom-com!

“I love gravure photography  that's why!”  Meiko  who admires the miraculous gravure idol Runa  by a twist of fate  decides to take on the GVF (Gravure Venus Festival)  the gateway to becoming a top gravure idol! She asks her childhood friend Takafumi to be her photographer… ___ **Storyboarder:** [siou](https://mangadex.org/author/3f50a963-8e3a-4ccb-a716-ece0413ad502) **Producer:** [Digital Shokunin](https://mangadex.org/author/ca715d41-e95d-4529-9123-765318d85acb)  **Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/72543)

title_en: Anan-san wa Deatte 3-byou de Gattai shitai!
description: Anan  an office worker who's only experience with men comes watching porn  tries to win over her boss and love interest  Dept. Chief Kitazono  but fails at every turn. In fact  Kitazono is also a virgin with zero romantic experience...

Mikoto Ochiai is ready to jump off the rooftop of her high school's building after she got rejected by the boy she loves. However  homeroom teacher Jin Haiba suddenly appears on the rooftop for a smoke  talked to her  and saved her from falling down. He even asked her to go out with him rather than die.       A black comedy manga about love  life  and death.

title_en: Dancing With You in the Snowy Night
description: Reincarnated as Snow  the main character in the fairy tale-themed otome game “Fairy Tale Fantasia ” “I” awkwardly scramble to prevent my favorite villainess  Lady Mary  from being expelled...  (translated from ichijin-plus.com's synopsis)  A oneshot published in the December 2023 issue of Yuri Hime.

On a cold and stormy night  I decide to give up on my dream. But lightning strikes! And now I have an issue of Shonen Jump from the future! Teppei Sasaki is a passionate rookie manga artist who dreams of getting a series in Weekly Shonen Jump. One day  he gets a copy of Jump from ten years in the future. Is it all a coincidence  or is it fate? Whatever the case  destiny is about to change… Time warps! Destinies intersected! For a tomorrow that was never meant to be! The future of Jump is here!

After years of being unlucky with girls  Ishimaru Daito only wishes to enjoy his high school life with a normal  cute girlfriend. However  after losing a game to his two new seniors Sasahara Kiyoka and Tomochika Asami  he is forced to join the <Humanism Studies> club which is actually a torture studies club. Will Ishimaru get the normal high school life he always wanted?

title_en: Elden Ring: The Road to the Erdtree
description: Aseo  a poor  Tarnished wretch  finds himself cast out into Limgrave—naked  penniless  hopeless  and maidenless. His only hope in his harsh  unforgiving new home is a mysterious woman named Melina. She urges him to follow the guidance of grace to the Erdtree that looms over the Lands Between. But it won't be an easy road; a cast of colorful characters awaits Aseo along the way—Patches the Untethered  Blaidd the Half-Wolf  Margit the Fell Omen  Godrick the Grafted  and of course  Ranni the Witch... With little but a loincloth between Aseo and certain death  he strikes out for the first stop on his quest: Stormveil Castle. Will he make it there  or will his journey end before it even begins? ___ **Note:** Aside from the original Japanese  this series is being digitally simulpubbed in English  Traditional Chinese  French  German  Italian  Korean  Polish  Portuguese  Spanish  Latin American Spanish  and Thai. ([ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-09-04/new-elden-ring-gag-manga-launches-with-publication-in-12-languages/.189310)) ___ [Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/elden-ring-the-road-to-the-erdtree)

A twisted romance about a former high school student who accidentally cursed his (already taken) crush. The girl was forced to regularly swallow his semen or suffer and die  all despite having a boyfriend. Ten years after this bizarre ordeal  the high school student is now a working adult and struggling in a sexless marriage with another woman. Just as he wants to come clean with his feelings  he has an unexpected reunion.  (Manga Mogura)

title_en: Kimi ga Shinu made Koi wo Shitai
description: At the mysterious orphanage where Sheena lives  death is nothing new to its residents—girls who no longer have families of their own  who are raised as weapons of war  taught to kill and take the lives of others without batting an eye. Everyone  that is  except Sheena  who wishes for nothing more than the growing conflict around her to end.  On the night of her roommate’s death  Sheena meets a strange girl covered in blood  who smiles despite the turmoil surrounding them. The next day  the girl appears as a new student in Sheena's class and introduces herself as Mimi. Initially thought to be a school myth  there are now whispers in the orphanage’s halls that Mimi is their secret weapon—an immortal who cannot die.   When Mimi is later assigned as Sheena’s new roommate  Sheena’s world grows even more complicated when she begins living with someone who loves and welcomes death  when all Sheena wants to do is stop it…   A story of two girls' innocent wishes  found in a world next to death.

Kagome is a modern Japanese high-school girl. Never the type to believe in myths and legends  her world view dramatically changes when  one day  she's pulled out of her own time and into another! There  in Japan's ancient past  Kagome discovers more than a few of those dusty old legends are true  and that her destiny is linked to one legendary creature in particular–the dog-like half-demon called Inuyasha! That same trick of fate also ties them both to the Shikon Jewel  or "Jewel of Four Souls." But demons beware…the smallest shard of the Shikon Jewel can give the user unimaginable power.      --- Official Release: - English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/inuyasha) - Indonesian release by Elex Media   --- - **Won the 47th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2002**

title_en: Dekisokonai Ouji no Nariagari ~Seikon Nashi no Dai San Ouji ni Tensei Shitakedo  Kondokoso Kazoku wo Mamoru Tame ni Saikyou wo Mezasu~
description: After losing his life in an accident  Kazuma finds himself reincarnated as the Ascalon Empire's third prince  Ares.  He wasn't born with the "stigmata"  the proof that one is royalty and gives them extraordinary abilities  however  he still received love from his family and spent his days in peace. Until one day  his father's first wife  Germa barged into their home  and looked at Ares in contempt for not having a stigmata. In the end  she even put his mother  Erina in danger. Realizing how powerless he truly was  Ares decided to protect his family with his own power. He decides to enroll into Ascalon Academy  a prestigious school where one's capability decides everything!

tags: Long Strip|Comedy|Self-Published|Girls' Love|Harem|Fantasy|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Mei  a shy girl who gave up on real friendships  found comfort in chatting with AI characters. But when the conversations vanish  she's suddenly told to make them all fall in love with her… and worse? They're starting to appear in her real world   🛑 This story is entirely fictional and meant for entertainment purposes only. It is not recommended to rely on AI for relationships Or even use it.

tags: Thriller|Time Travel|Action|Psychological|Crime|Survival|Self-Published|Girls' Love|Drama|School Life|Horror|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Supernatural|Mystery
description: In Muntinlupa City  Philippines  2025. On a rainy midnight  from her office building  Chevalyn Luna learns of another murder. The news reveals a pattern too precise to be coincidence: every two years  on March 13  a former classmate is killed. The cycle has already claimed three lives. She is certain she won’t be next  after all  no one held a grudge against her and by the pattern  the next killing is still two years away. Later that night  she spots the only other figure on the street  her former class president  Andrea White.

Can you give me a happy ending? Komatsu Risa is in love with her childhood friend  Sano Chihiro. Although they have a very close relationship  and are often mistaken for a couple  Chihiro is unaware of how Risa feels and accepts a confession from another girl… Heartbroken about her first love  she confides in her seemingly indifferent homeroom teacher  Natsuo.

title_en: Pen Pal at the End of the World
description: In a post-apocalyptic stationery store  a girl and a former animator exchange letters. A dystopian correspondence story.

Sada is a modern-day witch who is tired of living quietly deep in the mountains. In fact  she wants more attention! Why can't witches be known by humans?!　  This is a story of modern “witches” who break the curse and live freely and uninhibitedly!

Berry  a dog-fox beastman  has a failed marriage and leaves her hometown to become a chef. During his journey  Ozzy  a cat-beastman  falls from the sky. He was once famous as the leader of a hunting party  but he is the only survivor and continues to hunt on a small scale. This is a beastman story that depicts the rebirth and hope of two people who have both suffered from trauma.
The fantasy series takes place during Japan's Sengoku Period  where Japan is ruled by Demons. A 15-year-old boy named Musashi will stand up to the demons with the help of a certain special power.

"Noblesse Oblige" - The obligation of nobles. This addition to the World Witches franchise focuses on the 506th Joint Fighter Wing; a squadron of witches tasked with protecting innocent people from the Neuroi following the liberation of Gallia. These Witches are referred to as the "Noble Witches" because of their social status and their dedication to serving the needs of the less fortunate.

Naruse is a new working adult who is exhausted from his unfamiliar life. He reaches his limit and storms into his neighbor's house! There  he finds "that thing" that even makes Naruse addicted to it. A person who knows Naruse says  "He is addicted to birds more than anything else. The person who is addicted to birds is the worst of all..."

title_en: Isekai ni Shoukan Saretan da kedo  Nandemo Kireteshimau Kennou o Te ni Ireta no de Easy Mode deshita.
description: With the divine power known as the ability "Ripper"  unrivaled in its might!  During a class  Haruki Ito  along with all his classmates  is summoned to another world. One day after the summoning  Haruki discovers the power that has been bestowed upon him...?! ___ **Character Designer:** [Iso Kazunari](https://mangadex.org/author/e464e568-e9c2-4a93-82cd-f9507121a50d)  [Web Novel Raw](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n3031gx/)

title_en: A Gyaru and The Chairman at the Bathhouse
description: Kuroizumi Ururu is an outstanding student and a great athlete  but she is also an extreme gal who ignores school rules. She wears heavy makeup every day  but when she goes to the public bath  she shows off her "no makeup" and her pure feelings of love! A love comedy about a strict student council president and a gal!

title_en: My Older Sister's Friend Is Annoying (Pre-Serialization)
description: The Story of Nao.  From the original manga The Story of a Guy Who Fell in Love with His Friend’s Sister

title_en: Zettai ni Hatarakitakunai Dungeon Master ga Damin wo Musaboru made
description: "Come on  kill all those bandits for me already!" "No thanks. I don't wanna do any work."  My name is Keima Masuda  and my hobby is spending each day doing exactly nothing… but one fateful night  I was summoned to another world where I met a blonde young girl who I named Rokuko. It seemed that fortune had favored me and I would soon be living a wonderful life free of work. But even though I'm a guy who loves sleeping more than eating  Rokuko demanded that I help her.  "Save my dungeon! By the way  since you're the Dungeon Master  you'll die too if the Dungeon Core is destroyed."  The dungeon only had one room  and it was already surrounded by bandits. Seriously? It's a checkmate already. I've gotta break out of this impossible situation so I can stop working and just sleep! ___ - [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/lazy-dungeon-master)

Nikaido Katsuo  AKA "Fist King"  is the most powerful and undefeated delinquent in Japan. However  no one knows that behind the stories of his legendary battles  there is a girl behind the scenes... Her name is Tabara Nikaido. She is the fighter who took her brother's name and fought in secret  and defeated all the strong men in her way... ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550689798659821656)

In another world  there was a person who made their living doing alchemy.  Alchemy × Sorcery × Slave × Elf × Reincarnation × God × Cheat × Battle…… A work packed with everything fantasy brought to life with overwhelming brushwork!

title_en: Sister and Giant: A Young Lady Is Reborn in Another World
description: Hinako  a girl who came from another world  made a vow of sisterhood with a giant called Elis  and together they became known as 'The Smallest Giants'. They both have goals that aligned in tracking down people who were significant to them. For Hinako  it is her 'Onee-sama' who was also transported to this world  and for Elis it's the kin she was separated from. However  when collecting their reward after fulfilling a request at the guild  Hinako caught the eye of a knight who serves the church...

title_en: Kuni wo Owareta Ryuushi-san  Hirowareta Ringoku de Ukkari Musou Shite Shimau. ~Jakushou Kokka ga Tairiku Saikyou no Ryuu no Rakuen ni Naru made~
description: Breed  an old dragon master  is not only fired from his job but also exiled from his country... but the dragons love him and follow him!? ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550912964695382195)

The sequel to Konjiki no Gash!!  aka Zatch Bell.  Once the battle to decide the king of the demon world  in which 100 demon children fought against each other  had come to an end… the king of the demon world was crowned  and the demon world lived out the rest of its days in peace.  Or at least  that was how it was supposed to be.  Now  a shocking fact about the current state of the demon world comes to light. And in the depths of their despair  three demon children decide to risk it all for one last chance at survival.

Yoshio Yoshida  a company employee who enjoys going to concept cafes  hears a rumor from a familiar con café girl about a "con café with a strange atmosphere" that has opened in his neighborhood. Yoshida  intrigued  visits  and finds three unmotivated and peculiar con café girls in a store with a strange concept. They are actually real demons  dwarves and elfs.

“I’m from the afterlife.” Lee Do-jin needs money—a lot of it—to cover his younger sibling’s medical bills. With nowhere else to turn  he calls the number on a strange  ominous business card he finds by chance. At the meeting point  he encounters a silver-haired woman shrouded in mystery— a grim reaper  known as a Chasa. She makes him an unbelievable offer: Work as a temp worker for the Underworld. His mission? To stop “Mokdugi ” predators that feast on souls tainted by sin  before they can drag the damned into chaos. Thrust into the supernatural world of death  debt  and spiritual battles  Do-jin must navigate his new double life— balancing his humanity with a job that demands he walk the line between life and death.

title_en: Noah's Contract: I'm an NPC in Another World
description: Players  this is a continent overrun by monsters. Danger lurks everywhere  so please make full use of your talents and help us eliminate the monster army. What? You ask who I am? I’m just an NPC.

When high school student Sataki Tadashi was young  he received the ability to deceive people from a "Mujina". Ever since  he has continued to live his life as a con artist. Three years later  with the recommendation of the Kaminayama police  he puts those abilities to use for the sake of punishing "Evil that can't be judged with Law".

Despondent that the girl he loves does not return his affections  Eitarou attempts to commit suicide. But his near dead-body is discovered by a scientist and his mind is transferred to the body of a young girl. As a girl  Eitarou soon learns that the girl of his dreams did in fact love him  so they try to make the relationship work despite the fact that Eitarou is in a girl's body.

All the world's creatures lived in harmony until humanity rose to power. The flora and fauna feared for their lives and hid from the humans  leaving behind a barren world with only rocks and dirt. There are a few exceptions… Witches  exceptional women with the gift to heed plants' words  live in secret lairs full of vibrant greenery.  Tula  a powerful witch nearing the end of her life  raised her apprentice Piri in one of these sanctuaries. Piri has a lot to learn. In fact  she can't even hear the plants' voices! Naturally  she has no desire to leave her secret haven—or Tula—but situations outside of her control force her away. Where will Piri go now? Will a gift from Tula help her find her way?
Step Bro I'm Stuck the comic

Three years ago  Ye Tang  who came from a slum but dreamed of becoming a lawyer to change his poor fate  fell in love with Meng Yixing  a young gang leader who approached him wearing a mask. He was exploited by Meng Yixing and fell to the lowest point in his life. Three years later  Ye Tang  who had forged his resume and used someone else's identity to become a lawyer  reunited with Meng Yixing. Meng Yixing  who knew his past  blackmailed him to continue their relationship. This time  Ye Tang decided to turn the tables and exploit Meng Yixing. The two con artists deceived each other until there was nothing left  then exploited one another.

The story begins with an attack on humanity by giant indestructible monsters named "Enemies." The Enemies drive humanity to the brink of extinction… but the one to save the world from the depths of hell is a lone boy!      The SF novel series by Kafka Asagiri (*Bungou Stray Dogs*) jumps into the manga scene with art by Anri Sakano (*Sayonara Peter Pan*)!      Is he God or is he the Devil… will the amnesiac protagonist Kyle Kamishiro bring a future filled with hope  or?!

Akashi  a virgin college student started a part-time job at Necafe to correct his timid personality. He had a bad impression from his colleagues from the first day. In the meantime  a colleague Kagei  who has the exact opposite personality to Akashi  treats him kindly. The true meaning is mysterious――?  A story about a true and mysterious sunny handsome man x dark virgin who pretends to be cool.

title_en: Put It All In The Ring! 2
description: At the end of Ring ni Kakero 1  Ryuuji Takane went up against Superstar Jun Kenzaki for the World Title. Now  17 years later  Rindo Kenzaki  the son Jun Kenzaki and nephew of Ryuuji Takane  lives with Ishimatsu Katori  the "Kenka Champion" from Ryuuji and Jun's time. Rindo will meet up with a new generation of boxers to create a new Golden Japan Jr. to take on the world.

"Playing the role of a rich man's lover is fucking impossible."  Aoi's family broke up afterhe graduated from middle school. He now makes a living by staging crashes  but fate would dictate that he eventually got caught by a luxury car. Inami got out of the car  unfazed by Aoi's pretense and screams of pain. Instead  he offered Aoi a deal he could not refuse  literally  to pretend to be his lover. Aoi starts living at Inami's appartment and the training begins  from English conversation to table manners. Every day presents Aoi with a new experience!
Dragon Ball Super Divers is a One-Shot title authored and illustrated by Toyotarou to coincide with the release of the game with the same name.

Meet Sakai Hiroaki  a high school teenage mastermind with a genius-level intelligence and a lack of interest in anything that is easy to him. During one unlucky day  in an attempt to stop a student from committing suicide  he ends up committing suicide himself. After he awakens  he finds himself not in the real world  nor in heaven  but in purgatory  along with a group of others who did the same: commit suicide. Sakai discovers that he and his peers are subjected to never-ending intense death games in this world for reasons unknown to him  and he tries to find a way to escape.

One day  Joo Kang-hyun  a stranger who fell into the world of martial arts  rose to the position of Heavenly Demon after going through countless hardships. However  he always missed his hometown  the 21st-century Republic of Korea. He thought he would return to his hometown once the proper array was activated  but instead  he regressed to the past.  Gosh… The Heavenly Demon  Joo Kang-hyun  went back in time! In order to save the Youngrae Tavern which was on the verge of bankruptcy  he cooked delicious Jajangmyeon and Jjamppong! This tavern was the place where he lived with the three siblings who took care of him when he first entered Murim  Soran  Doran  and Unyoung. Although their business was not going well  they lived happily in their own way. In the future  after he became The Heavenly Demon  he heard news that their lives all ended miserably. He planned to stop their misfortunes himself. How? With Future Vision  Demon Lord Qi and Jajangmyeon!  *Jinbeob : This is a term in the murim world that means 'formation/array' which in some cases refers to the formations used by soldiers or groups of people in battle  but in some cases it also refers to formations used to distort space in order to manipulate the opponent's mind and make the opponent fall into the illusion desired by the attacker  we can also call it a 'hidden space'

Faced with imminent defeat and certain death  would you choose to run – or continue to fight for a doomed world?  When mysterious towers appear across the world  summoning monsters that prey on mankind  this is the choice presented to the Tower Walkers – adventurers with special powers to fight the monsters.  On the brink of death  they can choose to use a “regression stone” to return to the past for a second chance  though this decision places them in a separate timeline forever.  Stubborn Tower Walker Jaehwan rejects this choice  choosing to fight for the original timeline  and learning shocking secrets about the Tower along the way.

title_en: Don't Toy With Me  Miss Nagatoro!: Comic Anthology
description: Anthology from various doujin artists about Nagatoro and Senpai keeping to the theme of Nagatoro teasing Senpai and sometimes it backfiring on her.

The birth of a younger brother and older brother basketball tale now starts! From that day  the younger brother and older brother's journey to become the "world's best basketball player" began. Being compared to his prodigious brother Riku and tired of his everyday life  Raimu works up his courage and decides to start playing basketball!        Drawn by the previous assistant of Haruichi Furudate (Haikyuu!!) and recommended by the master himself  an acclaimed basketball manga!

title_en: Hitsuji no Kawa wo Kita Kemono
description: Daichi's big sister is getting married  and to a super hot guy named Jun Igawa! When they first meet  Daichi's suspicious; what does this accomplished  rich  attractive guy see in his sister? But Jun seems like such a nice guy  and slowly  Daichi starts to drop his guard… is Jun really everything he seems? Or is he a devil in disguise?

tags: Genderswap|Action|Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Boys' Love|School Life|Fantasy|Web Comic|Supernatural|Full Color
description: The heavenly general Yang Jian  also known as god Erlang Shen  was ordered to descend to the mortal realm for the task of get rid of demons and evil spirits.   After he woke up in the mortal realm  he noticed that Taishang Laojun who was in charge of his transfer absused his power and reincarnated Yang Jian as a woman.    Yang Jian is not used to this new body and to make things more worse it seems that he can't use his full power. now he must learn to adapt to modern society and take care of a hidden danger that is going to put the whole world into chaos.

title_en: The Useless Genie and her Intrusive-thought Master

description: A Collection one shot stories about 2 thug-brother make up artists who set a TRAP.   ---  **Link:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/PeaChArtworks)
A short story about a girl that can create life and a snowman.

While her friends are interested in cute cafés and getting boyfriends  Yanagi Riku finds it hard to talk about what she actually likes. They also think that her interest in the hot but unsociable Fushimi-kun is in bad taste  but she actually has a crush on him. One day  instead of accompanying her friends to the popular new café they found  she secretly seeks out an old café in order to indulge in her own interests: old-fashioned things!      When the person at the counter turns around  she finds out that it is Fushimi-kun! He actually invites her to talk and they find out that they have similar tastes  and promise to talk again  but the next day he's unsociable as ever.

"Dream Team Retsuden " is a manga series based on the NBA that was serialized for a short period in " Weekly Shonen Jump " in 1995 and 1996 . It consists of 4 chapters  the first two about Shaquille O'neal and the second two about Reggie Miller. Story by Nishio Akihiko   art by Mitsuyoshi Kenji . It is a basketball manga   but also a true story manga based on real people and real events .

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Boys' Love|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious  Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly  during their interactions with each other  Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

Much time has passed since his battle with Dr. Wily  and Rockman has grown up in a peaceful world. Working as a dentist at the dental clinic opened by Dr. Right  Rockman struggles in his daily life with the allies he once fought with!

title_en: Homeless Tensei ~Isekai de Jiyuu Sugiru Jikyuu Jisoku Seikatsu~
description: Shinichi Tanaka is a homeless man who is good at dumpster diving. Because he's a penniless bum  there's no help for it. He's going to try and pick up some trash to survive another day. What is this? Monsters and a Dungeon? In Tokyo?! A homeless man finds himself suddenly reincarnated in another world. His second life starts now based out of a hidden room deep in a dungeon. Weird and turbulent adventure of a 56 year old homeless man who reincarnates into a different world.

"I am a star. I have been traveling along a predetermined orbit for billions of years now. At some point  I saw a small planet within a hair’s breadth of my orbit..."  ---  A large-format  full-color comic from Shigeru Tamura  following the adventures of a star head on the planet of Phantasmagoria.

In the early 20th century  a small republic found itself stuck between a kingdom and an empire - both of whom wanted to manipulate the republic to suit their own needs. In order to protect itself from both sides of the conflict  the republic created a small group of soldiers whose job it is to suppress revolution and dissent in any way possible.
Originally published in a special annual horror issue of Nakayoshi (a shoujo manga magazine published by Kodansha) called "House of Fear" in 1996.

In the fragile world Hotako Takahashi has built  every role is flawlessly performed. Hiding behind her characters  she’s mastered the art of pretending. But when a dangerous obsession demands a part she’s not willing to play  her perfectly scripted life goes to hell. Forced to leave the stage she loves  Hotako ends up teaching drama as part of a rehabilitation program for young adults with a criminal past. Surrounded by the chaotic charm of her baby anarchists  Hotako helps them unlock their potential and finally decides to face the darkness she’s been running from. Healing  however  comes at a heavy price.

After God’s departure  people still sought blessings from Him  and because they followed different deities  two separate nations emerged  locked in conflict against each other. Meanwhile  other powers also made their appearance. Herrick  serving as a blood slave warden of the empire  gradually uncovered the truth about the blood slaves during his tenure and rescued Alice  who was herself a blood slave. During their escape  they unexpectedly gained the trust of a child with strange powers. As Herrick grew disillusioned with the empire’s actions  Alice proposed the goal of becoming a god  and thus the three of them embarked on the path to divinity.

Mitsuya-san is one of the few long-lived demi-humans in Japan. She is not very familiar with modern life  so in order to relearn  she became a high school student at the age of (approximately) 200 years old!

The manga's story begins when a peasant named Hanbē asks a girl named O-haru for her hand in marriage  but O-haru confesses that she is already thinking of another man named Masakichi from a neighboring village. When Hanbē seeks out Masakichi  he finds that Masakichi possesses a sword and the skills to use it  despite being a peasant.

title_en: Yuutousei wa Unmei no Akai Ito ni Sakaraitai
description: There's a red thread tied to my finger  and at the other end is... the yankee who sits next to me?  One day  straight-laced honor student Miyanari suddenly sees a red thread connecting him to his yankee classmate Hashiba. "There's no way this sort of person can be my destined partner!" is what Miyanari tells himself. However  perhaps through a trick of the red thread  Miyanari ends up in all kinds of situations with Hashiba  such as getting injured and being tended to  and getting trapped in an elevator together. As Miyanari continues to spend time with Hashiba  he realizes that Hashiba is nothing like his outwards appearance  and gradually comes to learn his kindness...
Originally published in Issue 32/1995 (October 20th) of Gakuen Mystery.  "Kaidan" can mean both "Stairs" and "Ghost Story" depending on what kanji it is written with.

The young boy “I” becomes swallowed up by the pleasure of drawing and completing a painting  embarking on a long creative journey. Along the way  he must confront “you” who lies in the shadows. What is the true nature of “I ” that weaves between impulse and imagination?

title_en: The Dragon Master of Corseltel ~The Tale of the Baby Dragon~
description: The adventures of Marciel and his dragons continues. In Koryuu Monogatari  the baby dragons have grown up a little.  - [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%B3%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BB%E3%83%AB%E3%83%86%E3%83%AB%E3%81%AE%E7%AB%9C%E8%A1%93%E5%A3%AB)
A short story about a boy who can't do anything.
What happens when two yandere stalkers fall in love with each other?
A short story about a boy and a girl on their way to their next life.

Following an earthquake in an unnamed prefecture of Japan  a fault is discovered on Amigara Mountain  very close to the epicenter of the quake. On the slopes of the mountain  two hikers meet; a man named Owaki and a woman named Yoshida. The former assumes that they are both here to see the fault  which has captured the attention of the global press. Following the sound of voices to the fault  the two of them marvel at the strange sight before them: countless human-shaped holes in a rock face exposed by the earthquake.

Wakou Ichiro decides to return home early from work to celebrate his second anniversary with his wife. But  when he opens the door of his house... He finds his wife cheating on him! Although the marriage was short-lived  his life changes again when suddenly  a certain woman appears in front of him?

A forbidden tale you must never witness. Imuko beckons you into the accursed realm. Deep within a secluded forest  a sacred rope stretches across the trees. Beyond it lies a world unlike our own. From that side  a lone girl has crossed over… Her name is Imuko  and those who encounter her are said to meet a dreadful fate. You must not set foot beyond the line. You must not meet her gaze. You must not speak to her.

title_en: After Getting Injured  This Female Doctor Cared for Me Strangely
description: A strangely kind doctor during night shifts...

"A Journey Through 600 Million Years of Natural History" is set in a time when time machines have been developed  allowing access to ancient times. Inochi and Akari  a pair of university students  travel through various eras and encounter undescribed species of ancient life. The story depicts their "600 million year journey through natural history" from ancient times to the present day  gazing up at the giant dinosaur Diplodocus in the Jurassic period  having a barbecue on the beach in the Cretaceous period and eating ammonites.  (Source: Natalie  translated)

Dragon Ball Super follows the aftermath of Goku's fierce battle with Majin Buu  as he attempts to maintain earth's fragile peace.  Having defeated Majin Buu  Goku is starting to get bored with his life on Earth. His wife  Chi-chi  wants him to get a job  but all he wants to do is train and fight stronger enemies. Elsewhere in the universe  the God of Destruction  Beerus  and his attendant Whis are traveling from planet to planet in search of food and entertainment.   After blowing up some hapless victims  Beerus is reminded of a man from his dreams with the moniker “Super Saiyan God ” or something like that... The God of Destruction sets his sights on Earth to track down this mysterious man! Maybe this will give Goku something to do?

An anthology of self-contained science fiction tales  each shining a light on different lives — on Earth  in space  across the present and the future — capturing the delicate shifts of human emotion. It all begins with Episode 1  a remake of Welcome Back to the Day After Tomorrow’s Future  the award-winning debut by Kae Hashimoto (76th Chiba Tetsuya Prize)  which captured hearts on X with over 250 000 likes. This SF omnibus delivers stories that are at once strange and heartwarming — Odd and Kind.

A manga about combat maids engaging in trench warfare      August 1893  church calendar. The kingdom of Nohmaland declared war on the Flatanian empire and invaded their territory under the pretext of atrocities against Patlasi within the empire In order to support the regular troops  the empire send the [armed service]  and armed maid group tasked with guarding/policing the castle inside  to the front lines. The war against the kingdom still continues.

A DARK MEDIEVAL FANTASY SAGA  In a world where the ancient gods have fallen  and where demons are abroad and assume dominance over the night  a demon huntress wanders the sleepless nights and hunts any supernatural creature that stands in her way. A man who was once the son of a fallen king now struggles for survival as he strives to win back his kingdom. But during these dark times  a sovereign ruler and goddess of her realm is now forced to fight a dynasty that has taken over Earth  and she must remain bound to her fate along with the heir whom she must fight against.  Saga of Lilith -Medieval Dark Fantasy- is a saga of not only a goddess but a saga of a family who accepts their fate and is forced to walk a path they cannot escape from.
Twitter short series by @SORAji34
We’re going to live as two people.

Yuki is so ashamed of her figure that she refuses to go swimming  either at school or on the beach. She believes her ribs look strange  and hears that she can have plastic surgery to alter the appearance of her ribcage. Yuki goes to a nearby clinic that performs the procedure  but is told that she must pass a mental health assessment before she can have the surgery.

Tomoyo Shiino has stood by her friend Mariko through years of abuse  abandonment  and depression. However horrific her circumstances  their friendship has been the one reassuring constant in Mariko's life-and Tomoyo's too. That is  until Tomoyo is utterly blindsided by news of Mariko's death. In life  Tomoyo felt powerless to help her best friend out of the darkness that ultimately drove her over the edge. Now  Tomoyo is determined to liberate Mariko's ashes for one final journey together... to set free her dear  broken Mariko.    This story deals with suicide and its aftermath  plus abuses of all kind that preceded it. Reader discretion is strongly advised.  Live-action movie adaptation: [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/719435-my-broken-mariko) - [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt17512706/) - [Bangumi](https://bgm.tv/subject/366281)
The same author of Blood Lad.      In a zombie apocalypse  he looks for a perfect death in the arms of a beautiful zombie girl…

title_en: "Sainou no Utsuwa" de Mezasu Meikyuu Saishinbu – Skill Yoko Nobashi no Hazu ga  Bannou Cheat datta!
description: Ryo is suddenly transferred to another world and is given the "Vessel of Talent " an ability that grants him the choice to level any skill he wants. Armed with the strongest growth cheat  he sets out to explore the labyrinth to find out why he was transferred there!

I can't be honest with you  but I'm really full of you  so I want to tell you and touch you--. Wu likes a senior member of the calligraphy club  and Miyabi is missed by a junior member of the first year. What do girls in love tell each other when they can no longer hold on to their feelings?　  This is a series of short stories about irresistibly sweet and passionate kisses overflowing with “I love you”  by Uzuki Coco  a rising star of heart-throbbing stories.
First published in the September 1997 isuue of Horror M.

Out of nowhere  a Japanese elementary school is transported out of the world they know  and into a nightmarish wasteland. Have they gone to another planet  or is this toxic world actually a vision of Earth's future? Soon  the students and teachers must struggle to survive in impossible conditions  besieged by terrifying creatures and beset by madness. Part Lord of the Flies  part post-apocalyptic science fiction  The Drifting Classroom (1972-1974) is a classic can't-put-down manga series. It was adapted into a Japanese live-action movie (1987).    ---    - **Won the 20th Shogakukan Manga Award in 1975**

tags: Animals|Long Strip|Comedy|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: The easy healing routine of the Ramboo who is always happy  and the Panboo who is always worried~~

title_en: Omiai ni Sugoi Komyushou ga Kita
description: Itami  a middle-aged businessman  registers with a marriage agency to find a marriage partner  but luck doesn't seem to be on his side when it comes to matchmaking. Unable to see him like this  his subordinate  Ms. Sonoda  introduces him to a friend.
Amai-san  the beautiful JK who lives next door  may seem cool  but in reality... only I know her sweet side?!

title_en: Rougo ni Sonaete Isekai de 8-manmai no Kinka wo Tamemasu
description: After growing up an orphan  Mitsuha has a healthy respect for money and a desire to live well—at least  until she dies after being pushed off a cliff. Waking up in a strange fantasy world  Mitsuha narrowly survives an encounter with a pack of wolves  then realizes she has the power to move between this world and the real one. A lesser person might embark on heroic adventures—Mitsuha instead immediately recognizes the lucrative possibilities of her new situation  and heads out to buy an arsenal of modern weapons. Her goal: to acquire 80 000 gold  and the life of leisure she's always dreamed of!

Country-born Mikoto and student council member Ren have always spent their time after school together. But one day  that ordinary routine suddenly comes to an end… With Uchouten High School as the stage  the love and youth of these impressionable young girls is about to begin!

title_en: Neko ni wa Neko no Neko Gohan
description: A kitten lies dying in the snow. It seems that it had eaten poisoned cat food.  When our protagonist  Mano Taiyou  chanced upon the kitten  he panicked and hurriedly brought it to the vet.  After being rescued  the kitten was taken in by Taiyou and given the name Yuki. Unfortunately  Yuki has been traumatized by its near death experience from eating the poisoned cat food and is now unable to eat dry kibbles.  This a heartwarming story of Yuki the cat and his owner  Taiyou as he struggles as a beginner cook to make home made food for Yuki.  --- A kitten  on the verge of death  lies in the snow  only to be rescued by a kind young man  Mano Taiyo. Nursing the ailing kitten back to health  Taiyo names his new charge “Yuki.” As a first time pet owner  however  Taiyo struggles with Yuki's very particular palate. This picky kitty refuses to go anywhere near store-bought cat food! There's only one option left: while he's never cooked a single meal in his life  Taiyo resolves to make a meal worthy of his adorable new feline friend!
Official 4-koma published with the game Link! Life! Love Live!

The Sage Confucius and his beloved disciple Yan Hui found themselves lost in the forest and unexpectedly time-traveled to the present day!   Confucius  unwavering in his mission to promote Confucianism  faced the challenge of a drastically changed world where hardly anyone would listen to the words of an old man.  Faced with modern society  he knew he needed modern solutions—so Confucius made a decision—...

She's cute! She's beautiful! She's sexy! She... speaks in tongues? Meet the Brainrot Girlfriend! She means well  but good luck understanding what she says.  Brainrot translation: shes skibidi shes toilet shes roblox she girl math goat bussing this better caul saul mrbeast metal pipe falling the roblox amogus she gigachad glazer but colleen ballinger nonchalant poppy playtime what she roblox L rn

Nanato is an Onmyoji detective with good skills but a terrible attitude. He spends his days solving mysterious events together with Yachiyo  a puppet goddess of ceremony. Then  a high school boy named Tsutsu comes to him asking him to look for his missing sister. It is a harbinger of a great mystery...?

The boy who sits next to Yokoi in class  Seki-kun  is always up to something at his desk. He manages to somehow play very elaborate games without attracting the teacher's attention. From dominoes  to shogi  to go  to mecha models  to playing with cats and more  he always has something new to do. Yokoi often finds herself getting reluctantly interested in his games  even though they always seem to end up getting HER in trouble with the teacher!      [See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15587)   [See AnimeNewsNetwork for the live action show.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2015-05-27/tonari-no-seki-kun-rumi-phenomenon-school-comedies-get-live-action-show/.88620)

A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!  However  it gets even more popular than he expected?!  ---  * Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mukunozaltusou/status/1844651030761685297)

Challenge it. As many times as it takes until your spirit breaks. In order to rekindle the life that has been extinguished  in the harsh and merciless mountains of the underworld — A staggering dark survival epic depicted with overwhelming artistic skill.

title_en: Akuyaku Kizoku to shite Hitsuyou na Sore
description: A story of a man with evil charisma: A young man who's lived in modern Japan suddenly realized that he had been reborn in his favourite fantasy novel  *The Tale of the Rhinana Kingdom*. Yet he wasn't reborn as the protagonist  but as the famous villainous marquis in the story. With the fate of being overthrown looming above him  he takes all action to break free of his determined fate by using his future knowledge along with the strongest skill "Absolute Evil". ___ **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66135)
My childhood friend is a super popular hottie... But could anyone ever notice someone like me...!?

From being dumped by the girl he liked to being passed over for a job  Toma hasn't been picked by anyone since he was a kid. One day on his way home from work  our good samaritan rescues a cat stuck in a tree. Little did he know the cat would follow him home and that he could talk! Said cat makes himself right at home and follows him everywhere. His new 'pet' is always at his side: the kitchen  the bedroom  even the bathroom... Toma always wanted to be needed  but not like this!

The Adorable  Adorable Wolf Was Eaten by Little Red Riding Hood...?!  Luca  a wolf who only wanted to scare Little Red Riding Hood  somehow ended up having her words mistaken for a love confession—and was promptly ‘eaten’! But to make matters worse  Little Red Riding Hood is a true carnivore?! As Luca gets completely overwhelmed in this strange relationship  what will happen when the full moon rises...?  A heartwarming and thrilling yuri fairy-tale comedy filled with romance and healing!

A remake of the original Mazinger Z manga in celebration of its 50th anniversary. Most of this story was first published in Gekiman! - Mazinger Z Chapter. So this manga can be thought of as the in-universe version of the story that Gekiman creates in the autobiography manga [Gekiman! - Mazinger Z Chapter](https://mangadex.org/title/a6d69815-f5f9-4ab8-9d53-5b4d1ee6601e/gekiman-mazinger-z-chapter)

title_en: Tensei Nanmin Shoujo wa Shimin-ken wo 0 Kara Mezashite Hatarakimasu
description: Lill  who was reincarnated into a refugee settlement  is once again starving today. To make matters worse  she's being shunned because of her lazy parents and is on the verge of being exiled!? Determined to secure her place  she works hard every day to earn the trust of the residents  even if just a little. Her earnest efforts as a small girl gradually start to gain recognition from those around her. Her dream? To one day eat a warm  hearty meal until she's full! Then  she learns that even a refugee can live in town if they become a B-rank adventurer—so she sets her sights on escaping her refugee status!

title_en: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing - Blind Target
description: After the war that took place in A.C. 195  each of the protagonists have gone on with their lives  and the gundams put into retirement. As the peace alliance with the colonies push through  a new menace threatens to shatter the peace  and the five gundam pilots are forced into action once again.      Blind Target is originally a radio drama that got translated into manga. It is one of the possible events that took place between the series itself and the OVA  Endless Waltz.      Other manga titles that also delve into the possible events between the series and the OVA are Battlefield of Pacifists and Ground Zero. All three remain unrelated to one another.

title_en: Dance in the Vampire Bund A.S.O.
description: Third part of the story of Dance in the Vampire Bund  and direct continuation of Dance in the Vampire Bund - Scarlet Order. We return to the story of Mina Tepes  the princess of the vampires  and Akira Kaburagi Regendorf  her faithful guardian  in her search for the coexistence between vampires and humans.

Fudou Jun is a highschool teacher and takes a trip with a group of students. While there  a group of martial artists staying nearby take a strange interest in the girls.   These men are actually demons and after changing into their true form break into the cabin to rape the girls. One gets Jun and violates her.   She feels her soul being torn apart and transforms into Devilman Lady. With newfound powers and strength she kills all the demons and protects the girls from any further harm.   What are these demons and why did she turn into a hybrid of one? What does this mean for her and for the rest of humanity?

“I like you  Yuichi”      “Huh?!”      “I wanted to tell you before I took time off school. Is that weird? I’m sorry.”      Yuichi was suddenly confessed to by his childhood friend  Chihiro.      Chihiro will be taking time off school… What’s going on?!      However  Yuichi begins to notice Chihiro’s increasing number of injuries and unsettled emotions  as well as the strong attraction he feels towards Chihiro  whose true feelings only hurt himself.      Young  inexperienced and clumsy. But that’s what makes them all the more sinful and heartwarming!      A story of a life changing romance between two childhood friends.

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Boys' Love|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Country life is supposed to be idyllic  isn’t it? A peaceful place full of amiable neighbors with big hearts  right? That’s what Jiwoo is looking forward to… But out of all the next-door neighbors to have  he gets Dongchan. Curt  stand-offish  and inscrutable  Dongchan isn’t the most welcoming of folks. In fact  he looks like he doesn’t want Jiwoo and his family here at all. Bemused but not daunted  Jiwoo tries his best to adjust to life in the country…until it turns out that someone is trying to chase his family away from here. Jiwoo has his suspicions  but will he be able to find the real culprit? (Source: Lezhin)

I was once the Supreme God of Physique  standing tall above others. However  I was betrayed by those whom I thought of as my most trustworthy friends. They had schemed against me in an attempt to kill me  which was almost successful. Fortunately  a fraction of my soul had managed to escape into the body of a seriously injured child giving me another chance at life  and revenge.

title_en: My Fake Girlfriend's Defending Against Their Attacks
description: One day  I was suddenly confessed to by a girl  and in order to reject her  I had to find a fake girlfriend! I didn’t expect that my plan to avoid trouble… would lead to even bigger trouble?! The tsundere "Vicious Princess" from the Archery Club  the "White Fox" who is adept at teasing  the "Flower of the Highlands" with straight black hair  and…a sister with a severe case of brocon! Could my youth romantic comedy be wrong as well too?!
A series of little vignettes by BL artist Nagabe about the life and little struggles of a King Cobra and a his Siberian Cat boyfriend.

title_en: Lady Lucetta's Second Chance at Life
description: **I was supposed to have my second chance at life all figured out  so why is my fiancé the most unpredictable thing!?**   In order to settle the debts of her fallen household  the lady Lucetta has agreed to a political marriage to the upstart Kyle  who is after the position of Count.   At the end of a loveless engagement filled with nothing but arguments  an assailant targeting Kyle soon drags both of them to their deaths... but she finds herself sent back to right after the engagement is called!   *I have to use this second chance I've been given to survive and life a happy life!*   Lucetta uses her knowledge of the future to her advantage  and disguises herself as a fortuneteller in order to repay her debts.   But Kyle appears before her and asks her for romantic advice...!?   *Is it true that he's liked me for the longest time!?*   A Kyle who wants to shower her with love  and a Lucetta who wants to break off their engagement.... The engagement annulling romcom of two tsunderes begins!

title_en: AWEON Mall Isekai  Grand Opening Today! THE COMIC
description: Isekai with Shopping Mall!      That's all.

title_en: Unparalleled Path - Reincarnated as the AI for a Space Battleship
description: Asagaya Shin  an ordinary high school student who was supposed to be in Mitaka  Tokyo just a few days ago  somehow found himself as an AI of a space battleship. The battleship is surrounded by a large enemy fleet  and with only a few consort ships left  it is in a desperate situation. Moreover  the captain of the battleship is a young girl  a decorated member of the royal family  who was ceremoniously on board. Shin  now an AI  takes advantage of his "human" characteristics and attempts to fight a withdrawal battle using novel tactics to survive...

title_en: Tourigakari ni Wanpointo Adobaisu Shite Iku Taipu no Yankii
description: Sakurai-san looks like a yankee  but gives people he passes one point advice. Those who meet him for the first time are often scared by his frightening appearance but through the advice  they learn of how kind hearted he can be. Slowly  Sakurai's circle of people begin to grow. He's kind  considerate  knowledgeable and versatile in all forms of sports…!! Today  the super high-spec Sakurai who has a ridiculous gap in his looks and personality continues to give one point advice to various people  making their day a little better.

title_en: Sono Bisque Doll wa Koi wo Suru
description: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru  who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
Sasaki Yuuko gets stuck in caretaking duty with Tanaka Kunio  having to feed the class' fish! By Konoshima Ruka  the creator behind Utsuranain Desu (The Ghost Doesn't Show Up)!

Otogiri Tobi  a youth living with a "talkative bag"  Baku. In his monotonous life  an inhuman girl calling herself Ryuuko appears in front of him and...!?  An unusual roomshare begins under a single roofー!!

University student Mimi Usazaki spends her days battling depression while attending psychiatric sessions and muddling through a bleak college life. One fateful day  she's caught up in a mysterious experiment that alters her life forever. Through the experiment  she ends up hosting the consciousness of Hyou Usazaki—her estranged younger brother  who also happens to be a death row inmate. Now  Mimi finds herself thrust into a deadly struggle against other death row inmates who were subjected to the same experiment. Will she survive the chaos that ensues? Or will her connection to her brother bring about her downfall?

"EROS Survival" is a show broadcasted over the internet where pair of players - a male and a female - compete for the grand prize of $1m! To win though the pairs must demonstrate both knowledge and skills in order to 'strip' their opponents  progress through the rounds and grab that super prize!

title_en: Jinsei ni Tsukareta Saikyou Majutsushi wa Akiramete Nemuru Koto ni Shita
description: Fiona  the most powerful magician in the empire  was tired of being overworked on the battlefield every day  both physically and emotionally. She thought she had given up her life on the battlefield  but when she woke up  she found herself under the protection of Matthias  the most powerful knight in the enemy kingdom!  In this powerful and loving fantasy  Fiona recovers her life while receiving love and tenderness for the first time!  --- **Original Web Publication:** [Comic Pixiv](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/9722)  [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FL00204275010000_68/)  [NicoVideo](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64890)  **Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16817330652446237885)  [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1027hw/)

For the past millennium  the Kyougane Clan has stood as an infamous bloodline of fiend-slaying exorcists. In the present day  it's led by the sharp-tongued and unyielding head  Kyougane Kurou. One day  a stunning young bride is brought before him—but beneath her beauty lies a hidden  dangerous secret. Determined to stand by her side  Kurou must now sever the shackles of fate to protect their bond—no matter the cost.  (Source: Manga UP! Global)

### Raw links: - Chapter 1: "**The Serious Girl**" - [Twitter Link](https://twitter.com/GoHome_kun/status/1876550835808899447) - Chapter 2: "**A Gal Who's Kind to Otaku**" - [Twitter Link](https://twitter.com/GoHome_kun/status/1877264427579273599) - Chapter 3: "**The Reliable Boss (Bonus included)**" - [Pixiv Link](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/126401999) - Chapter 4: "**The Delinquent Girl**" - [Pixiv Link](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/18815611/artworks)

title_en: The Obsessive Love of a Yandere Yakuza: The Young Lady is Doted on Every Night and Taught His Love
description: "From now on  is it okay for me to have an ‘adult relationship’ with you  Young Lady?"  Yui Amagi is the daughter of a yakuza family who longs for a "normal life." Her dream of living on her own finally comes true… or so she thought. But her assigned bodyguard—who also happens to be her fiancé—Ichika Izumo  the Wakagashira (Underboss) of the Amagi group  insists that "it’s only natural for me to be here " while smoking a cigarette as if he owns the place.  Yui doesn’t actually dislike Ichika (in fact  she secretly likes him)  but she doesn’t want a romance arranged by her parents. Without realizing her own feelings  she decides to spite him by joining a group blind date.  However  once the party starts  she feels completely out of place and ends up depressed. To make matters worse  one of the men there takes advantage of her vulnerability and tries to take her to a hotel…!?  "You dare join a group date when you already have me  your fiancé?"  An impatient yandere Underboss × a stubborn young lady  caught in an overly intense and sweet “awakening cohabitation love story”… ♪
Life at a ramen shop is never dull! Owan runs the neighborhood ramen spot called "Power Bomb." Just as she was praying for some hungry hero to save her struggling business  in walks...

Zero was mankind’s first real superhero. Under his watch  countless other superheros appeared and followed in his footsteps. However  after 5 years of war  Zero disappeared without a trace.   ---  **Note:** this is not your usual Chinese manhua  please read them from right to left (similar to Japanese format).  **Links:** - [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1002/)

Centers around Ginjirou Manda  a loan shark who charges toichi — 10% more interest every 10 days  or 365% every year. Thanks to his unrelenting money-collecting tactics  he is feared as "Minami no Oni" or the "Demon" of Osaka's Minami business district.

The war of the Northern Xia lasted less than half a year. The war ended in victory for the Zhongyuan army  but in the process  Bai Lixue's family is devastated by a demonic cult. He lost both his parents and siblings. The only survivor  Bai Li Gang has only one goal... the complete annihilation of the demonic cult!

Shy and introverted  Kageko Tadokoro passes her free time in class drawing instead of hanging out with her classmates. But even when her classmates approach her  it’s only to make fun of her drawings and appearance. In stark contrast  Nikaido is well-liked among her peers as she has both beauty and smarts. And while everyone makes fun of Tadokoro  Sakurako Nikaido on the other hand  is totally infatuated with her. Just one look at one of Tadokoro’s drawings and Nikaido fell in love with the art and eventually  the artist herself. When Tadokoro offers to draw Nikaido a portrait  Nikaido becomes ecstatic as this may be her chance to get closer with the girl she has been obsessing over.
"I'm going to tell you I love you every day!" A younger handsome guy confesses his love on their first meeting! An uneven love story between a good looking boy and a manly girl begins.

tags: Long Strip|Boys' Love|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Adaptation|Full Color
description: Yeonghyeon is a quiet and nice boy who is leaving school early when he runs into Daehan  an intimidating classmate rumored to have ties to a gang. Although Yeonghyeon tries to sneak past him  Daehan drags him to a cafe and asks him to be his boyfriend when they're both guys and have never even spoken before! Undeterred by Yeonghyeon's immediate refusal  Daehan walks him to school  buys him snacks  and changes seats to sit beside him. Eventually  his constant attention begins to grow on Yeonghyeon... They say opposites attract  but can these two very different boys find love together?

How will the "family" change in a world where the donation of eggs and sperms from third parties for a fee has been legalized in 20XX year? *Odd-numbered bi-monthly omnibus series that depicts the "new family shape".

The Angel (Cupid) Yuzune has just been lazing around reading romance manga instead of hooking couples up. God gives him an ultimatum to get Sumire and Yuuji together  or he's fired. Should be a breeze for a cupid who knows all the romantic cliches  but Sumire has other ideas...?

Ye Wooju has all but given up on remembering who he is after a terrible accident leaves him with amnesia. But he's hit with a cold hard case of déjà vu when illustrious actor Lee Youngwon shows up on his doorstep. While the film star claims to be an old friend  a few steamy encounters suggest their relationship went far deeper than that. Now  with his supposed ex-lover being the epitome of everything he once aspired to be  Wooju starts to think maybe his old self is worth remembering. But what if the past holds such dark secrets that forgetting was the only way to move on? As Wooju grapples with his trauma and a celebrity heartthrob determined to win him over  reigniting the flame he and his friend once shared might just be the key to remembering his true self.

title_en: Net Keijiban Hyakumonogatari ~Toshi Densetsu Comic Kaidanshuu~
description: Featuring eerie urban legends that became popular on the internet  faithfully adapted into comics by skilled authors. A true horror anthology for urban legends!  +++**Contents** ### Volume 1: A Hundred No-Joke Internet Message Board Stories Cover: Ayano Kyou ​1. Shimizu Aki 2. Kitaoka Tomo 3. Katsumata Hiroki 4. Tsutsui Itsuki 5. Wasai  ### Volume 2: A Hundred Truly Scary Internet Message Board Stories Cover: Ayano Kyou 6. Kageyama Gogatsu 7. Shimizu Aki 8. Miyao Ikumi 9. Kitaoka Tomo 10. Wasai  ### Volume 3: A Hundred Deathly Scary Internet Message Board Stories Cover: Izumi Tomoki 11. Shimizu Aki 12. Kitaoka Tomo 13. tomura 14. Saitou Shunke 15. Tegure +++

Juri is the unwavering Number One host at the host club  “Velvet Kiss.” He's manly and handsome  but always has a poker face. Number Two host  Akatsuki  is aiming for the top spot and asks Juri how to earn it. Despite expecting to be rejected  Juri invites him over to his place. But when it’s just the two of them overlooking the beautiful night sky  Akatsuki finds himself being pulled in by Juri’s charm…

title_en: Mobile Suit Gundam 00 - The beginning man.
description: Set after the end of the second season of Kidou Senshi Gundam 00  this oneshot is centered around Lyle and his relationship with his brother  showing the reasons that led to their separation.

A story centered around Tieria and his recovery after the defeat of Celestial Being at the end of season 1 of Kidou Senshi Gundam 00. An official special oneshot from Newtype magazine  tying the two anime season’s together.

title_en: Mobile Suit Gundam 00 - The Second Birthday

tags: Award Winning|Comedy|Mafia|Adventure|Office Workers|Drama|School Life|Delinquents|Slice of Life
description: The manga is about ten-year-old Chie  "the most unfortunate girl in Japan " who manages her family diner while her unemployed yakuza father and her mother are separated.  --- - **Won the 26th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 1981**

title_en: Face Genius: Top Star from Age 0
description: Aspiring to live just one day as a handsome man  supporting actor Lee Han-jo is rewarded for his virtuous life with a beautiful face and a status window that grants wishes upon reincarnation.  Although abandoned as an orphan in front of a convent in the dead of winter  his luck doesn’t end there  he’s even adopted into the family of a wealthy actor.  Armed with the seasoned experience of a max-level supporting actor and a god-given face  maybe this time  he can aim for the life of a Top Star!

title_en: It Turns out That I Have Been Invincible for a Long Time
description: Over a five-year journey around the world  Ye Changqing first believed he could be like other cool novel protagonist systems with a plug-in  but even the most common immortal cultivator cannot be. Living close to a sect in a small town was his only option  so he started a business. His small store eventually turned into the holy land of all the righteous individuals  and the dog he raised up turned out to be the feared demon king. From that moment on  everyone acknowledged Ye Changqing as a Supreme Master.

Shota Iijima picked up a mysterious erotic book during his childhood. Since then he has developed a severe fantasy onee-san fetish. From the age of 12 to 15  he masturbated 999 times. For his 1000th round of masturbation  he had been transferred to a different world and was sold as a slave.

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Boys' Love|Office Workers|Drama|Web Comic|Full Color
description: Oh Deokhae is an otaku and is a regular worker who has been suffering a lot lately. The source of his problem is his boss who resembles one of his favorite characters  Cain!      The boss has a nice family  a beautiful face  amazing fashion sense  and great work ethics. Sadly  he doesn't like Oh Deokhae.      Mr. President  I'm sorry.   As the days go on  Oh Deokhae decides to resign.   "I can't go to work anymore with this impure mind!"      What is going on here? I want to quit my job but my boss doesn't want me to?!   An exhilarating love story of two people

Each time a Demon Lord has appeared  a human hero has slain it  pushing back the demons in the dark lands.  As the cycle starts over again  a mysterious ancient hero called Ramia reappears. Meanwhile  an abnormal Demon army suddenly strikes the kingdom…

[FROM BL DOT CUM]      Yuu  who grew up in Akita  loves his step-cousin Hatahiko! Yuu  who moves to Tokyo for university  has a coincidental and fateful (?) reunion with Hatahiko. When strange things happen  Yuu temporarily starts the “life living together” of his dreams.    However  to Yuu who’s on cloud nine cohabitating with his first love  Hatahiko  while smiling  says  “I’m not interested in younger people.”       A handsome salaryman who’s a bit of a bully X a coddled university student’s pure love life together.

He was looked down on  forced to break off his engagement  he was murdered  maybe this is the life that trash should have… But he was taken over by me  the strongest cultivator  Cang Kun Zi  as I reborned. Now that I'm here  I'll make the best of it! Watch as I use this trash body of mine to trample upon you mere ants!

Cha Taein is a very handsome student and cheerleader in college  while Yoo Soohyuk is one of the campus’ most popular guys and is also in the soccer and music club. When Taein is chased by Lim Gurin  who he does not reciprocate feelings for — he ends up begging Soohyuk to fake date with him in order to chase Lim Gurin away. Somehow  just like the tale as old as time goes — pretense somehow starts to turn into reality. However  before a "happily ever after" there is the process of falling in love  and the slow realization that somehow they aren't pretending anymore. Somehow  they do not want to.  --- - [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6015663) - [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=56726635) - [Original Webtoon <RidiBooks>](https://ridibooks.com/books/297035197) - [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/comic/C000047211) - [Original Webtoon <Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/2gether_the_series) - [Original Webtoon <Comico>](https://www.comico.kr/comic/2092) - [Original Webtoon <BookCube>](https://www.bookcube.com/toon/detail.asp?webtoon_num=210096)

One year after the end of the zombie outbreak that swept through Korea  'Doyoung'  who lost her younger brother to a zombie  one day accidentally meets 'Jion'  a student who closely resembles the zombie that bit her brother. A friendship full of suspicion between two people that continues in a risky manner. Can this relationship last?

I transmigrated inside the novel of my favorite character  the second male lead. A tsundere who listens to all the words of the female lead while grunting  with a straight forward personality  and a handsome face. Matching all my preferences  he was even single after the ending. Nice! I’ll pick up the second male lead! However  I overlooked one thing… The tsundere  who had been abandoned by the female lead blackened  and had become a terrifying man!  “Get lost.”  …I-is it safe for me to pick up the second male lead?  --- What would you do if you were reborn as a character from your favorite romance novel? For Peony  an avid fan of *The Song of Askar*  the answer is simple: Marry her favorite character  of course! Reincarnated as the princess of the Kingdom of Garten  Peony is determined to marry Richt  the second male lead of *The Song of Askar* and former prince of the Fairspren Empire  who was banished to an inhospitable land after the novel’s happy ending (which didn’t end so well for him). Amidst trials and tribulations  can Peony and Richt make the most of their second chance at life and love?  --- [Original Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=761498)  **Official Translations:** * [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/fantasy/happily-ever-afterwards/list?title_no=2737) * [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/wanjiehoujianlegenaner/list?title_no=1587) * [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/western-palace/my-strawberry-boy/list?title_no=2442) * [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/romance/et-ils-vecurent-heureux/list?title_no=2993) * [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/second-lead/list?title_no=2660) * [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001206) * [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/fantasy/happily-ever-afterwards/list?title_no=3472) * [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/sub-guy/list?title_no=2500)
**Links:** - [Extra Page](https://twitter.com/ldoll_itk/status/1831341918896418867)
**Links:** - [Extra](https://twitter.com/ldoll_itk/status/1827347577723125862)
