title_en: Riajuu-kun ni usa-mimi meido o kisete riaru (genjitsu) o omoishirasete yatta
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure x Pokemon - Jotaro to Koduck Manga (Doujinshi)
Akatsuki no Majo Reishi wa Jiyu ni Ikitai ~Maou Tobatsu wo Oetanode  Nonbiri wo Mise wo Hirakimasu~
description: The witch Lacey has been under the control of the state since she was a child because of her excessively strong magical power. After defeating the Demon King with the heroes  her only remaining role was to give birth to a child who would inherit her magical powers. However  her fiancé's infidelity was discovered just as their marriage was about to take place. With the help of Wayne  the hero who traveled with her  Lacey's life takes a turn.

"He"  a police officer on his shift  happened to meet "her" on the streets  by chance.  Through its bold yet delicate brushwork and elegant prose  this stylish  full-colour comic illustrates the subtle air of intimacy between these two individuals.  --- A chance encounter. A handsome policeman. A beautiful woman. A tentative love affair smolders on the snowy cobblestone streets   out of sight from those that might keep them apart.   *Veil* is a beautifully illustrated full-color romance manga  told in stylish short vignettes  beautiful illustrations  and secret moments.

title_en: Hitorigurashi  Netsu wo Dasu. Koi wo Shiru.
description: The protagonist who caught a cold at Christmas and was absent from work and live alone at his apartment. Then  his condition take turn to worse  yet A strange blonde gal suddenly come to take care of him. Eh...who? While thinking  She have to nursing myself because of my poor physical condition.

title_en: My Husband Is Sleeping in the Freezer
description: One day  Nana  who has always wanted to get married  has a fateful encounter. Unfortunately  she had to endure violence since the marriage  so she decided to kill her husband and put his corpse in a freezer  but things aren't always like one want as she finds out when he comes back…

Nakajima Atsushi was kicked out of his orphanage  and now he has no place to go and no food. While he is standing by a river  on the brink of starvation  he rescues a man whimsically attempting suicide. That man is Dazai Osamu  and he and his partner Kunikida are members of a very special detective agency. They have supernatural powers  and deal with cases that are too dangerous for the police or the military. They're tracking down a tiger that has appeared in the area recently  around the time Atsushi came to the area. The tiger seems to have a connection to Atsushi  and by the time the case is solved  it is clear that Atsushi's future will involve much more of Dazai and the rest of the detectives!

title_en: The Count's Youngest Son Is a Gamer
description: Dohyeon is a top-ranking gamer in Connect  an immersive VR game that is overrun by corrupt guilds. After being murdered for discovering a mythical item  he wakes up as Lord Raul Ashton  an NPC in a closed beta version of Connect.   Now the sole player in this realm  he decides to use his knowledge from his past life to prevent the downfall of House Ashton and unlock unprecedented powers. For Dohyeon  Connect is no longer just a game—it’s now his reality.   Join him as he embarks on a thrilling quest to reshape his fate!

Hajime leads an unremarkable life as an undertaker  but he likes his job and has no reason to complain. Nor can he complain of being always called "onii-san" by one of the top star actresses in the country  Kidō Kotone  a childhood friend. Their relationship has always had a touch of awkwardness due to the parents of both having died violent deaths  but nothing could have prepared Hajime - or Japan - to the deed Kotone decides to perpetrate seemingly out of the blue.
Jia Ke  an ordinary university student is raising a very strange cat  but kitty is super cute

Finally  school life with Siesta!?  I did it!...But why? The detective is already...  A school romantic comedy that retains the everyday feel of the past  but also has some serious developments for those who have already read the original!!

title_en: Gamer ga Isekai Konten Shite Harem Jinsei e Continue suru Sou desu
description: After opening the last route of a certain FPS game  the protagonist jumps for joy  slips and dies. However  due to God - a game lover - feeling sorry for him  he decides to continue his life in a different world as the boy Wayne (although he seems to have no memory of his previous life). Life at military school in a world where magic and adventure are commonplace  and meeting heroines who truly love him.

title_en: Fukushuu Kansuisha no Jinsei Nishuume Isekaitan
description: Kousuke Kurono was an Avenger. After being raped  his beloved little sister was left out in the cold and froze to death. From the time he was 13-years old  Kousuke made use of any possible means in order to exact his revenge. 5 years had passed  he achieved his revenge  but having lived solely for the sake of revenge  at the moment his revenge came to fruition  afterwards he couldn't muster up the willpower to live on. That's why  with the same knife he used to kill the culprits  he slit his own throat. However  he then heard a voice; "Is that not wasteful?" When he came to  he found not his home  his country  nor his world——It was another world. ___ * [Japanese Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7225df/)
University students shipwrecked and forced to board a deserted island with a serial killer.
Keitarou  who's always had a disposition for attracting spirits  gets hired as a tutor for a little girl named Yayoi who can see spirits and is searching for the spirit that took away her mother.

Being flung from the world of Fate/Extra Kishinami Hakuno finds himself in a very strange predicament. Caster Route.      Note: There are no missing chapters. Chapter #32-33 are missing due to a difference in the volume and magazine numbering. Some earlier small chapters were combined in the volumes causing the number difference. Chapter 34 directly follows Chapter 31.
Hitomi stumbles upon an egg in the forest  and from it hatches Tokage-chan  a lizard girl who just wants to be recognized as a kaijuu.

"The reason I'm here right now is thanks to Ryuu."  Ryuu  with a complex about his looks  lives unable to stand up to his classmates who pick on him. One day  his classmate who's as beautiful as a celebrity  Fukuda Ema  calls out to him.  Ryuu rejects him saying "we're from two different worlds " but they were actually childhood friends back in first grade.  Ema  who used to be insecure about his looks just like Ryuu  has grown not just physically but mentally  says it's all thanks to Ryuu and quickly starts to close the distance between them...  Super beautiful popular boy × kind-hearted insecure boy glow-up love!

"I want to see Kitayama-san's erotic face!!"  A handsome guy who's too pure × a lewd boy who's often perverted. A 100% cute and happy love comedy!  Convenience store employee Minamiya can fantasize about "a person's most erotic face" just by looking at them. But  his work senior Kitayama's erotic face is the only one he can't see. Why is it just him? He's so curious that he ends up staring at him. One day  they start talking when they find out they have the same favorite band  and Minamiya goes over to Kitayama's house. Maybe with this he'll be able to imagine Kitayama's erotic face!? While thinking about his ulterior motives  he talks about his love for the band...  "I like Minamiya-kun too..." "...Huh!?" Minamiya was sure they were talking about the band  But he freezes when Kitayama gives an unexpected confession!?

title_en: Hakiri-san wa Kimi Dake no Shinigami ni Naritai
description: An ordinary high school student Nikami  has no interest in falling in love  let alone getting married. One day when he's leaving for school  the Grim Reaper is standing there  with a giant scythe! Rather than killing Nikami  she introduces herself as Hakiri  and she came form the Underworld to help Nikami die. She claims that he will only die if he gets married! A first in human history. Nikami tells her that he doesn't have a girlfriend  but Hakiri responds with a proposal!

Four years ago  Souda Gin and Hanai Kosuke worked a case together as two anti-organized crime police officers. Now they’ve both quit the force  Gin to become a private detective and Hanai to become a yakuza! A heartwarming romantic comedy unfolds in a retro cityscape!

Paw pads wrapped in white fur. Fluffiness around the neck. A bushy tail. A rounded figure that was the very definition of fur ball!  A certain Japanese girl had been reincarnated into such a fox cub  Milfiria. Milfiria was told to watch the house by her mother  as she left for the capital. However  unable to bear with the loneliness  she decided to follow her mother but lost her way until she reached a fort protected by strong knights.

A story between the handsome yet loving pilot Zhou Jingze and a gentle yet dependable doctor  Xu Sui. Summer has always been warm  so is the boy I love. Stay tune to see the undying love of the "infatuated playboy" Zhou Jingze.

It’s hard dating someone who won’t give you the time of day. Su-ae Shim knows that better than anyone  having dated her indifferent boyfriend  Minu Kang  for years. She sometimes wishes she could be more like her charismatic stepsister  Ra-im  who seems to have it all. But life takes a turn for the weird when Su-ae discovers Jellypop  a sentient flip phone  in her locker. Jellypop has a lot to say about her love life  especially as Su-ae drifts further away from Minu and finds herself running into Minu’s friend  Eunhyeok. Add to the mix a growing suspicion that Minu and Ra-im might be more than friends  and Su-ae might need a miracle to navigate the ups and downs of high school romance!

Hatogaya  a man who loved baseball and yet left it  is set up to take the fall for his company and gets sent to prison. A high-school principal and his former coach–whose school is about to lose its baseball program–bails Hatogaya out. But  in exchange for getting him out of jail  he has to coach the schools not-so-great baseball team.

Imagine going home after a tiring shift from work… when you open the door  there lies a paradise of three fluffy house cats! This story is about a tired office lady living with her three unique cats. They interrupt her meals and when she's cleaning  and has to put up with their moody attitudes. Her everyday life is constantly at the mercy of her cats!

One day  the completely normal human schoolgirl Yomi Haruka turned into a zombie!! Her head can't stay on her neck  and humans are looking very tasty to her...So she turns to the art of streaming games!

The year is 1962. The "Iron Curtain" is being lowered. An archipelago in the Far East. In Tokyo  a city divided into east and west and separated by a wall. A girl  Emilia  crosses a dangerous bridge as an escape contractor.
Mochi's Daily activity with her brother.

Gama Gama Aquarium  a small aquarium in Okinawa  is an hour's bus ride from Naha. Kukuru Misakino is an 18-year-old high school student who works there  and she knows about the "secret" of the aquarium: sometimes you can see mysterious things. One day Kukuru meets Fuuka  standing in front of a water tank with flowing hair and a tear rolling down her cheek. Fuuka has given up on her dream of becoming an idol and she has run away from Tokyo to Okinawa. Wanting to find a place to belong  Fuuka earnestly asks to work at the aquarium. The manga follows Kukuru and Fuuka as they deal with the issues of the secret of the aquarium and a looming crisis of its possible closure.
You know the old tale of the Honest Woodcutter? Well  its the same premise but...instead of an axe we got his friend and the reward? well  Let's just say He got quite the reward for his honesty!

title_en: Yondome wa Iya na Shizokusei Majutsushi
description: A tragedy wipes out Hiroto Amamiya's whole class. A god suddenly appears and says he will give all of them special protection and skills before reincarnating them in a new world. But when the god makes a mistake  Hiroto goes into his new life without anything at all. ___ **Character Designer:** [Ban!](https://mangadex.org/author/ecb0d0e9-d2ac-44fd-b40c-52ee54a2c336)

Lawyer Kim Dongwoo worked hard for all his life  yet he has achieved neither a family nor a career that brings true satisfaction. The lawsuits that fail to progress properly and a broken family have become overwhelming sources of stress for him.  Perhaps because of this  Dongwoo suddenly becomes a primitive boy living 25 000 years ago.  But it feels far too vivid and real to dismiss as just a dream.  The life of primitive boy Dongwoo unfolds with his primitive family and the great wilderness of nature.  How different is that life from the present one? Or perhaps  how similar?
A collection of short-stories by Ohsawa Yayoi  the author of [2DK  G-pen  Alarm clock](https://mangadex.org/title/10db587f-a232-485d-b4a8-68ee0cb15e3c/2dk-g-pen-alarm-clock)

A gate to another dimension has burst open  and from it emerge gigantic invincible creatures that threaten all of humanity. Earth's only defense is a mysterious group of warriors who have co-opted the alien technology in order to fight back!

In the town where he spent summers as a child. Yudai  a ronin student  returns to the town where he spent his childhood summers for the first time in a long while  Yudai is upset because a memory that he had kept in the back of his mind has been jolted back to life  a child suddenly appears and tells him something strange...?  The summer of the between childhood friends begins here!

“XX is a cuck.” “I hear OO is a slut.” “I bet I can get her to sleep with me.”  During lunchtime  all the juvenile dirty talk was giving Oogami a headache. He left the classroom and went to the gym's storage room in search of a quiet place where he could be alone. There  Oogami saw Seri  another loner in his class  masturbating… or is she… urinating? Oogami tried to hide  but she had already noticed him watching. To Oogami's surprise  Seri suggests that the two of them can do something to “relieve stress” together… ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [COMIC Doop’z](https://www.i-d-bunkasha.com/search/s103125.html)  **Buy Individual Chapters:** - [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0DDGH5B7Z) - [BOOK☆WALKER](https://bookwalker.jp/series/482999/) - [ebookjapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/844716/)

A human girl falls into the demon realm and can't seem to communicate with the local demon Kuro who found her. Humans are rare in the demon realm and many would love to eat a human. However  Kuro ends up falling in love with her and names her Pochi!      Kuro decides to help Pochi get back to the human world and protects her from demons that try to eat her. She ends up being able to at least understand them but still can't speak the same language. She meets a demon prince who also shows interest in her as well and their long journey back to the human world begins!
The pet I picked up at the sea is growing at an alarming rate.

title_en: Let's Meet at the Witches' Gathering
description: Unofficial compilation of [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/tags/%E9%AD%94%E5%A5%B3%E9%9B%86%E4%BC%9A%E3%81%A7%E4%BC%9A%E3%81%84%E3%81%BE%E3%81%97%E3%82%87%E3%81%86)/[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hashtag/%E9%AD%94%E5%A5%B3%E9%9B%86%E4%BC%9A%E3%81%A7%E4%BC%9A%E3%81%84%E3%81%BE%E3%81%97%E3%82%87%E3%81%86) oneshots with the hashtag #魔女集会で会いましょう  **Table of Contents**  ***Individual chapters aren't related unless stated otherwise***  Chapter #- Artist Ch 1 - [OguAnF](https://twitter.com/OguAnF/status/963408262241517568) Ch 2 - [metubusi](https://twitter.com/OguAnF/status/964061804769849344) Ch 3 - [Miyako Kakku](https://twitter.com/cak221) Ch 4 - [sakusya2honda](https://twitter.com/sakusya2honda) Ch 5 - [Yuzua](https://twitter.com/CocoRabbt) Ch 6 - [Izumi Tomoki](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/67351683) Ch 7 - [Milk Puppy](https://twitter.com/MilkPuppy77) Ch 8 - [O-Sashimi](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/18670912) Ch 9 - [Yaponishi](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/14089) Ch 10/11 - [Regura](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/803848) Ch 12 - [Yokoyama Moyo](https://twitter.com/4kymm4) Ch 13 - [Kunyu](https://twitter.com/kunyu_az) Ch 14 - [Yamakae](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/38013) Ch 15 - [Kloah13th](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/283027) Ch 16 - [Takura Mahiro](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/1519350) Ch 17 - [Goshi-san](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/15586405) Ch 18 - [Arcana Mi](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/3852957) Ch 19 - [Sakai Raku](https://raku-luk.tumblr.com/profile) Ch 20 - [Kajimoto Akari](https://twitter.com/kajimotoakari) Ch 21 - [Shabechan](https://twitter.com/shabechan) Ch 22 - [Nazo no Diaboro](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/4280363) Ch 23 - [Idonaka](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/1175093) Ch 24 - [Kishi Toshiaki](http://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=17468041) Ch 25 - [Niichi](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/97536981) Ch 26 - [Amenbo fiber](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/3726864) .... Ch 57 - [Paruko](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/10414935) Ch 58 - [Tsukinoyoru](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/105534263) Ch 59 - [Ota Minoru](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/6937120)

After a demonic ritual  20-year-old Shelley Highgate has mysteriously risen from the grave  and is under fire from a Grim Reaper for cheating death! The two form an unlikely alliance to find the cult that killed Shelley and traverse the gothic world of the Deadlands.

Ichiko and Kuran are members of the subculture research club. They like various subcultures and they like cute stuff. Read along as these two asocial gyaru spend their days in their new kind of "youthful moratorium."
The protagonist's name is Amemiya-san. The everyday happenings of this girl are never within anyone's guess  and neither are her numerous likes.

A new “Duel Masters” story begins! Kirifuda Win  who has lost all memories of his past  is now living alone in Tokyo. In the midst of his ordinary daily life  the footsteps of the world’s end gradually begin to draw near. The secret of Win’s hidden past is…?
Gekka Girls' High School is located in the hills west of Tokyo. The school is a traditional boarding school where no boys are allowed. All the female students attending this school are ninjas!

Tired of the dark and cold ocean depths  a mermaid heads to land to find love with a human! There  she meets Torao  a member of a gang. Life together with this dreaming mermaid becomes one turbulent adventure after another...?!  [Part of the 10th anniversary Jump+ One-shot collection](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2019/)

title_en: Yuusha Party wo Oidasareta Shiryou Majutsushi wa Lich ni Natte Maou-gun de Daisukina Kenkyuu Life wo Okuru
description: It was believed that the most powerful necromancer in the brave party died in battle and was left for dead.   But he wasn't dead.   He was resurrected as a "Lich"  a being "physically and magically the strongest"  and decides to leave the human race and live with the demons - the demons were richer and he could learn necromancy more freely! With Alice  one of the six demon generals  as his partner  the Lich plunges into his research.   Will the Lich be able to live the quiet life he has always dreamed of without the interference of adventurers?  --- **Links:** - [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57027)

A fan comic posted to r/AzureLane by [u/Cpl\_Ethane](https://www.reddit.com/user/Cpl_Ethane)  Akagi² is based on the mobile game Azur Lane  which is about anthropomorphised WWII ships.    This series is focused on Akagi-chan and her antics around the base. Note that this is drawn in an "American newspaper" style  and is read top to bottom  left to right.      Artist's twitter: <https://twitter.com/11975MHz>   Artist's patreon: <https://patreon.com/CplEFComix>

A mysterious woman claiming to be a witch steals a valuable bag from a man and claims that he can't satisfy her before vanishing into thin air. Having run across her himself  Shotaro and his trusted partner Philip take the case but quickly find that things aren't right in Fuuto  starting a new battle for the two-in-one detective Kamen Rider Double. ___  **Note:** The series is a direct sequel of the tokusatsu series Kamen Rider W and its subsequent specials. ___ Official Release: - Indonesian release by Akasha as **Futo Detective**

title_en: Uma Musume - Please Treat Aston Machan Well
description: A short story about Daiwa Scarlet  Vodka and Aston Machan

In a corner of our world  a number of sacred artifacts called "Yumeyori" were stolen! What challenges will Akane and the members of the locksmith shop face  when they are entrusted with solving the case??  "We will be the key to unlocking this case."

In Academy City  where esper abilities have been recognized as a general science. Behind the peace  there is a dark side organization that undertakes missions that cannot be made public.  "Item" is an elite unit consisting of four girls. Takitsubo Rikou is able to read and track the weak power emitted by those with abilities. Frenda Seivelun  who excels in combat using explosives and traps. Kinuhata Saiai  who can manipulate nitrogen at will and plays a defensive role. And one of the 7 espers that Academy City is proud of: Mugino Shizuri. They live freely in the darkness of the Academy City  and quietly set their sights on their target...!

Chikako Fujitani’s first kiss at 14 made her heart flutter. Megumi Kanroji fell in love with the idea of love at 17. Special extra chapters showing the young days of the “Find an idol” cast  depicting their pure  delicate feelings! Includes the extra oneshot of “Tsuki ni hoero onnatachi!”

title_en: My Quiet Blacksmith Life in Another World
description: One night  Eizo—a hapless corporate slave  saves a cat and gets hit by a truck. The cat which seems to be related to another world  in return for his help  grants Eizo a skill of his wish and reincarnates him to another world. Eizo  who has craftsmanship as a hobby and wishes to use this skill for a living  chooses to be reincarnated as a blacksmith. And so he starts his life in another world as a blacksmith just as he wishes. However  Eizo's creations are at another different level that will shake this new world. ___ **Links:**  - [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/series/my-quiet-blacksmith-life-in-another-world)

A good-for-nothing young master without a single redeeming feature is driven out of his house by his family with nothing but the clothes he has on. A street thug with a dark childhood who is plagued with a mental illness. A fight at the dumpster started a no discord  no concord* destiny between Cheng Ke  the young master who has an extreme disability in living and taking care of himself  and Jiang Yudou  the guy who loves using brute force without reason. Ever since then  they became the only redemption in each other’s dark life.      You’re my antidote  and I’ll take you when I’m sick.      (*Note: No discord  no concord is a chinese proverb that means if there is no fighting  there can be no friendship made.)

In a videogame based on a fantasy world  their players are know as Onmir. Our protagonist  a notorious killer of other Onmirs  logs in one day as usual but in the split of a moment  the environment changes giving a weird feeling  suddenly he realises that he cannot log off and that if he were to die  he will die in the real world. A fall into tragedy starts...

Thanks to various magic  the human race has been saved from calamity many  many times. Retaining his memories from his previous life  a boy  Shin  was picked up by an old man known to the world as the "Magi." Shin was brought up by the Magi  who had retired to a secular place  as his own grandson. With the memories of his past life  he absorbed the Magi's craft and grew to be able to develop his own magic. Then  the grandfather told him he has to become independent when he reaches the age of 15.  "Ah  I forgot to teach him common sense."  The grandson who has grown beyond the level of normal people  lacked common sense; the common sense of the world. So to learn how to socialize  he goes to Earlshide Kingdom City to be admitted to Earlshide Advanced Magic Academy.

Dungeons have suddenly appeared all over the world. People became "explorers" and dived into dungeons to obtain resources that could only be found there! Kurose Sakuto  too  was searching for the elixir that would heal everything in order to save his childhood friend who was suffering from an incurable disease. However  he receives a notice from his friends that he is no longer a member of the team. In the dungeon and in the real world  he faces off against demons and malicious humans.

Shizuka Kamishiro is 21 years old  with no money  no friends  and no girlfriend. He was stuck at home  after he got scammed by a college acquaintance who wasn't even really a friend  when he heard a loud gasp from his neighbor  a college girl who was fucking her boyfriend while he's lying on his mattress suffering all alone. The absurd difference in circumstances drove him crazy  and he punched the wall so hard that he broke through. The neighbors came over  and her boyfriend beat him almost senseless. As despair and dark emotions overwhelmed him  a messenger from the demon world appeared. Immediately  the boyfriend's head flew off  and the demon told him  "So  go ahead and XXX this girl."  (Source: Futabasha  translated)
‘Hexagon’ is the center of money  fame  and all power. A group of people losing their way in a world where success is the only answer.

title_en: Meet up at somewhere in Scorpio
description: “You'll never like me.” Takamura  a high school student  returns to the town where he lived as a child and  by chance  finds himself in the same class as Rei  a boy he had a crush on in elementary school. Homare also remembers Takamura  and feeling something akin to fate  Takamura begins to harbor a faint crush on him once again. However  when he witnesses Rei entering a hotel with a boy after class  he is surprised and asks him about it. Rei tells him that it was just a friendship  but his next words are: “I have no idea what it's like to fall in love with someone...”

title_en: Josee  the Tiger and the Fish
description: The story centers on the relationship between Tsuneo and Josee. Tsuneo is a university student  and Josee is a young girl who has rarely gone out of the house by herself due to her being unable to walk. The two meet when Tsuneo finds Josee's grandmother taking her out for a morning walk.

Panic disorder  depression  developmental disabilities  PTSD... Japan is said to be a country of hidden mental illnesses  where many patients suffer from mental illnesses without being able to talk to anyone. The suicide rate is one of the worst among developed countries. How has Japan fallen into this kind of situation? Psychiatrist Konosuke Yowai confronts the problems facing Japan's psychiatric care and sheds light on the shadows in people's minds.

It was suppose to be just a normal commuter train  but then they notice that all the other passengers have disappeared  and there are only four JKs left...! Although they have never met each other before  they get off the train at the next station  and start thinking about how to make their way home...?  This is the rumored supernatural train station...? Lost and unable to return home! The strange daily life of the four JKs begins...!

title_en: Gal no Haigo ni Rei ga Iru
description: A girl notices something lurking behind her friend.

title_en: Yuuyami no Koro  Kono Machi de wa Kanarazu Dare ka ga Warau
description: What if the town and life you’ve been living in felt like a lie…?

Naruto was a young shinobi with an incorrigible knack for mischief. He achieved his dream to become the greatest ninja in the village and his face sits atop the Hokage monument. But this is not his story… A new generation of ninja are ready to take the stage  led by Naruto's own son  Boruto!  ---  **Notes:** - Includes the one-shot "Naruto: The Path Lit by the Full Moon".

After a long war  Lycoris  a princess of the Wyvern Kingdom  and Leihua  a princess of the Dragon Kingdom  are to be married as a sign of peace. Former enemies  the two begin a new life together…  Lycoris has complicated feelings about the political marriage  but she can't help becoming attracted to Leihua  who seems so lonely  despite her outward indifference.  Two girls who do not know how to love  bond with each other as they heal each other's broken hearts.  (Source: Shiori-on  translated)

After the loss off his mother  Amon Catierre  embarks on a journey to learn the secrets of resurrection magic. Finding himself stuck living in a country suffering from poverty  war  and corruption without end  Amon sets out on his path to seek an opportunity greater then his provincial life and the consequences of his ambition.

He had sex with his own daughter—though  of course  only in a dream. Goto  a university lecturer  had seemingly built a happy family: a beautiful wife who is a painter and lovely  talented children... But that happiness was merely a facade. During the day  he suspected his wife of infidelity  and at night  he was tormented by nightmares  gradually wearing down his mental stability. One day  Goto returned home to find his room in chaos and his daughter in tears. Convinced that his wife was to blame  Goto vows to protect his beloved family...!?
A secret disclosing devil If you speak about it  the one who you tell the secret to will die

title_en: I Want to Silence the Telepath Girl
description: **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MS_sousaku1/status/1705786894607597943)

In a crumbling and dystopian Lousiana  Rilind  a zombie  aims to help those cast out from society using a peculiar power- Magic "strings" which can heal wounds. However  his world begins to change when he makes the unlikely choice to save a vampire in distress. Rilind soon learns he's way in over his head when he learns she has a bounty on hers!

The protagonist of the series is the lecherous Satonaka Ikkou  who transforms into a super-monk (being able to perform mass exorcisms) by his lust for the girls he live with. He lives in the Saien Temple as a Buddhist priest in training with six other nuns: Amanogawa Haruka  Ikuina Sumi  sisters Sugai Sakura & Hinata  Nambu Chitose and Atouda Yuuko  each of whom represents one of the bosatsu of the six lower realms of the traditional Buddhist cosmology. Chitose is the other main character and has a strange relationship with Ikkou; he seems to be in all the wrong places at all the wrong times  but they really care for each other in all actuality. A side effect of Ikkou using his ultimate power is that immediately afterwards he turns into an even bigger pervert that he normally is. The series is about Ikkou's self-destructive power and his attempts to control his own super-sensual sphere/powers.      See [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=5381) for the season 1 of the anime.   See [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6204) for the season 2 of the anime.

New Student by the name of Masato Takasaka transfers to a school full of delinquents which is currently undergoing a battle between the various student activities committees  his fleeting expectations of delicate and loving school girls and a peaceful school life go out the window  the moment he meets the declared queen of the school Onizuka while walking down a hallway  what will happen to the school life he dreams of in this romantic/comedy of two unlikely partners in school full of delinquents.

High schooler Ninamori Akane is assigned by the newspaper club to report on local places that are rumored to be haunted. She asks the new transfer student  Amemura Fujino  to join her  and together they discover the simple truths behind the spooky stories. Their friendship grows as they explore their town of labyrinthine paths and endless stairways. [Seven Seas]

tags: Long Strip|Comedy|Boys' Love|School Life|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Lu Bei  the delinquent big brother who dominates the entire district  suddenly declares that he wants to be a good student! Carrying the "Student Rulebook" like a Bible everyday  swearing not to get into fights again. When the Boss of a rival gang came to seek trouble  Lu Bei couldn't bear it and finally... goes to tell the teacher?! At the same time  700 points scorer Ye Siya transferred to this delinquent school to continue his studies. Getting preferential treatment from the principal and teacher  this perfect student  however  always speaks bluntly. In the end  Lu-ge  the only one with most courage took the initiative: hey  Ye Beicui classmate  teach me how to study? Transferred Student: Let go. My name is Ye Siya  not Ye Beicui.

Ryou had a sleepover and saw his friends - Issei and Tadahiro - kissing while they thought he was asleep. He asks them about it and feels betrayed as a childhood friend when they pretend nothing happened.      Determined to catch them red-handed  Ryou ends up inside a closet with Issei's little brother  Yuusei  who has an unexpected reaction to the situation.

Miyuki's classmate Kitayama Shizuku is on her way to study abroad.   For magicians  this is normally impossible  since allowing the genes of someone who can use magic outside their home country's borders is tantamount to giving up national secrets.   But it's allowed to happen in one case-exchange programs. And that's how Angelina has arrived in Japan from the USNA to study at First High. But it seems she's a part of something much bigger than a simple cultural exchange!      Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 9-11.

tags: Long Strip|Comedy|Boys' Love|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: In a world where humans gain plant characteristics (botanomorphism)  our cactus-infected protagonist  Zhu WuLiang  is faced with a dilemma. He'll lose hair whenever he gets shy! Now  enter Hao Xiaofeng  WuLiang's tumbleweed-infected crush  whose carefree lifestyle involves getting blown away by the wind on a daily basis… Surely  it's more than enough to wreck WuLiang's mundane life!       Shy cactus x Happy-go-lucky tumbleweed!   Our main couple's shenanigans are packed with tons of sweetness  sure to give you a severe case of toothache! Stay tuned!

title_en: Reborn as the Overpowered Genius Lord
description: When war-orphan-turned-warrior Agrick dies on the battlefield  his last regret is that he never got to fully develop his talents. The next moment  he's reborn... into a family of geniuses! Now  as Dane Sogress  he has to choose to be a spearman like his father  an assassin like his mother  or a summoner or mage like his sisters. But instead of picking  Dane decides to learn it all! Can Dane finally become the master of skills he was meant to be? Or will his take two at life end in failure again?

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Boys' Love|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: When the ideal man becomes his own bodyguard  he can't help but ogle over him while arguing with him! What should he do if he wants him  but doesn’t dare to reach out?

Welcome to The World  the most advanced online game ever created. Fourteen-year-old twins Rena and Shugo are two middle-school students who enter The World as level-one game characters–and now they're ready to take on anything…or so they think. When Shugo's character dies  he is transported to another level where he is entrusted to bear the Twilight Bracelet by the mysterious Aura. Shugo must find out who Aura is and why she gave him this powerful weapon to protect his sister from the dangers in The World.      The manga has been re-edited in Japan into two big volumes called "Complete Edition" ([I](https://www.kadokawa.co.jp/product/201011000008/) & [II](https://www.kadokawa.co.jp/product/201010000605/)) including some bonuses and a new short story.  - [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/.hack//Legend_of_the_Twilight)
If you think this has a happy ending  you read the title.

there's an old legend in Sereong's family: their flute 'Manpa' will turn into a person if you care for it with enough love! But Sereong doesn't believe in this legend and plans to sell Manpa.... But it was then when Manpa turns into a human and tells Sereong he can grant her wish.  A romance between one who grants miracles and one who doesn't believe in miracles.

title_en: Sono Apato  Zashikiwarashi-Tsuki Bukken ni Tsuki
description: Ryutaro Saeki (32) was divorced and returned to living alone again. He is quick to find a suspiciously cheap property  but in that room he was greeted by Zashiki Warashi. Bizarre and funny life of two people living together will start!

Sadai  looking for a place to die  headed deep into the mountains. There he encountered a mysterious and gentle girl who had lived alone in an abandoned village for 150 years  continuing to serve an intangible god. A man that had failed to die and a widow with a graceful aura — from the remains of their wasted lives  the two of them begin a new chapter of their story.

The year is 158 AD  and the Roman Empire thrives under the 20th year of Emperor Antoninus Pius’s reign. Lucius  a Roman bathhouse architect  is now sixty years old and plagued with back pain. His wife Satsuki has mysteriously disappeared  his son  Marius  is beyond comprehension...and to top it off  he still has the Roman bathhouses to worry about!

title_en: Dorei no Watashi-shi Mofumofu Shujin ga Toutokute Kyou mo Buji Shibou
description: A girl is sold and bought as a slave. She is prepared for a terrible life  but the master who was kind to her is actually a cat! A new life begins now for the unlikely combination of a slave girl and her cat master!

A father and daughter find themselves lost in a nightmarish gathering—a grotesque banquet where figures draped in animal forms feast. But here  humans are livestock. Human flesh is the main course. The ones who operate this "human farm" are not quite beasts  yet neither are they human. They are something else entirely. The unlucky pair is about to experience the most horrifying "hospitality" imaginable. Meanwhile  Nero  a wildcat laborer at a farm  encounters the village's enigmatic leader  a deer-man named Ernest. Their meeting stirs something deep within Nero—a buried memory long forgotten...
A life of a savage and proud Goblin King  Ish changed forever after being rendered into a human.

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Gyeono Kang  a lucky high schooler  used to enjoy the mutual love he shared with the prettiest girl in his class  Chanbi Baek. She was always all about him until an accident wiped her memories of the past year  and just like that  she no longer had feelings for him. But what about Gyeono  whose heart still beats for her? Is it even possible to win her back? Did she really like him back to begin with?! Somebody help!

title_en: Crispy on the Outside  Soft on the Inside
Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai
description: That day  Ishida Yamada was working his part-time job as usual. After finishing his shift  he opened the back door and stepped into a vast  empty space  where he encountered a mysterious figure claiming to be God. By sheer chance  Ishida was chosen by this God to be transported to another world. Although confused and uncertain  he resolved to adapt and make a life for himself in this strange new place. Using the skills granted by God  he focused on surviving and thriving. As he explored different lands and encountered various races  he made it his mission to form close relationships with many beautiful women along the way.

In the future  an app debuts that can simulate your romance with a partner of your choosing and calculate the compatibility score. Is this a way to have a romance that never fails? What is it that people look for in a romance anyway?      This series has adult situations and some explicitness  but not the level you'd usually expect from LEN[A-7]'s other works.

title_en: Onna Tomodachi wa Tanomeba Igaito Yarasete Kureru
description: Hisaya Minato  a normal high school student  has a female friend who is a bit peculiar. She is Aoi Hatsuki  the most beautiful girl in the high school. For some reason  they get along very well  and since they happen to live on the same floor  they gradually become good friends  coming and going from each other's houses. One day  Minato suddenly asks her to show him her panties. At first  Hatsuki is reluctant  but then she starts to roll up her skirt?

This is the story of two very different girls.  With a 32 cm height difference  the length of their strides  their clothing sizes  and even the clubs they were encouraged to join were all different.  As Ritsu finds herself drawn to Uno’s cheerfulness  the distance between them gradually grows smaller.

tags: Award Winning|Psychological|Romance|Girls' Love|Drama|Medical|School Life|Slice of Life|Tragedy
description: Shizuku Hoshikawa  a high school girl who lives avoiding contact with people  writes a novel which is accidentally read by her classmate Kaori Asaka.   She loves it but finds out Hoshikawa wasn't planning to write anymore due to lack of ideas  to which she ends up saying:   "Let's start going out  you and me… You can write a story about our own love."

When the clock strikes midnight  we're trapped in "After-School." In that world  there's no right answer  no end  no "game clear." There’s only our lifeless bodies  stacking up one by one. One day  Kei Nimori  a young elementary school student  suddenly notices his name scrawled on the classroom blackboard  alongside the mysterious words "After-School Duty." Thus begins a dark  midnight fairy tale of several young boys and girls risking their lives to record and contain monsters in a bizarre realm known as "After-School."

This is the official comic book adaptation of the latest in the popular "Kinkiro no Korda" series!  Yui Asahina is a violinist who failed the music course at Hoshinade Gakuin and entered a regular course. After a reunion with conductor Ichinose Ginga  she sets her sights on winning the "International Student Orchestra Competition " in which orchestras from all over the world compete...? From Yokohama Hoshinade Gakuin to all over Japan and the world. This is a story of high school students who regain their grand dreams.

title_en: Ore to Ichino no Game Doukoukai Katsudou Nisshi
description: A romantic comedy involving Souji Shirosaki a student  who is in high school  whose personality can not leave out people in need. And Ichino Moritsuka  16  a friend in the same class as Souji  who lives alone in an apartment near the mountains. Together  they discover they have strange psychic powers  founding a club game.      Adapted from the light novel series.

The story revolves around Daibutsu  a middle aged former rally driver who lives with his wife Kumiko and their son. Daibutsu is a former rally driver  who used to participate in the All Japan Rally Championship. Daibutsu proceeded to go to his garage to rebuild his  Mitsubishi Starion 4WD  named Jackie  a Group B rally car which was banned at the end of the 1986 season. He then proceeds to sets his return to racing by challenging people on the street with his car.

Rinosuke's useless and vagrant father is now dead. Now  at the age of 16  he is completely alone and will have to quit school to survive. On the night his father dies  a naked woman with large breasts falls from the sky and lands on top of him. She introduces herself as Sakamoto Marina  the future wife of the future Rinosuke. She states that she used a time machine to come back to the past  and start a new life with the younger Rinosuke. Rinosuke's new life with his future(?) wife begins.

title_en: Omae Imouto ja Nakute Iinazuke datta no kayo!?
description: "Humanity  adore thy little sister—." "I wonder when my sister Kana started becoming distant from me—."  Shina Takashi lamented his current days  where being ignored was not uncommon. One day  his parents dropped a shocking revelation. Not only was Takashi not their biological son... but he was also the fiancé of Kana  whom he thought was his sister! From siblings to potential romantic interests  it’s not easy to sort out feelings. The fluctuating emotions  the bewildering distance. Their relationship undergoes an inevitable change—! She's a sister but not a sister!

Released in 1997 in three parts in issues 3-4  5-6 and 7 of Weekly Shonen Jump. Tokimecha was one of Akira Toriyama's post-DB work. The story follows a young girl by the name of Tai who manages to create a "Tokimecha"  a machine that allows her to travel back in time where she meets a young caveboy by the name of Muu. Wacky hijinx quickly ensues when this girl of the modern age learns that life in the stone age can be savage and terrifying.

title_en: Maou Reijou no Kyouiku Gakari ~Yuusha Gakuin wo Tsuihou Sareta Heimin Kyoushi wa Maou no Musume-Tachi no Katei Kyoushi to Naru~
description: Flay Garnet has been fired from the academy after being set up by his colleague. He receives a job offer from a mysterious maid. The job offer is to be a tutor to the five daughters of the Demon King! At first  they didn’t trust him to be taught by a human  but as he demonstrates his abilities  he begins to gain the trust of the Demon King's daughters.

Ever since they were young  Cha Inwoo had a quiet crush on his next-door neighbor  Kwak Hajun. But Hajun was completely different from Inwoo. He was popular  outgoing  and part of a completely different world. The only connection between them was being neighbors. That was it. With the college entrance exams approaching  Inwoo believed their already distant connection would naturally fade away once they started their separate lives in college. But on exam day  a piercing scream shattered the stillness of the school hallway…
The school nurse feared by everyone  with her white underwear peeking out of her black tights. And then she caught me peeping at it... Thus began the s.e.c.r.e.t afterschool counseling.

Shao Yiliang has lived at an orphanage for his whole life  and surprisingly he meets his long-lost twin brother in the bathroom! Brothers reunite  and the big brother proposes an exchange: The younger brother goes to a national shooting competition in replacement of him. With identities swapped  how will the fates of these two change?

Within the tenth-floor boss room of the Sazardon Labyrinth  the mighty minotaur awakens once more. Unlike its predecessors  slain at the hands of treasure-seeking adventurers  this monster’s primal urges push it further than ever before. Kill. Consume. Grow stronger. The more powerful its opponent  the more powerful it becomes. Even the very rules of the labyrinth seem to bend to its indomitable will. Can none triumph against this bovine behemoth? Will the minotaur ever meet its match…?  ---  Notes:  - Was on hiatus since June 2022 till February 2024 - Official english translation of [light novel](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08F45DG62)
it’s a gender-bender ramen! But with…uh…other ingredients…yeah.
Slice of life story of a protagonist who can see and interact with spirits.
This story is about Ine and Shouzou  two pensioners well into their 80s who are mysteriously returned to their 20s one night.

Shigure Konno is getting bullied in class. One day  however  she leaves her physical body and is able to enter the world of spirit. Shigure can now look inside people's minds  discover their innermost secrets and even manipulate them.... When the seeds of trouble sown in the hearts of good citizens blossom  bizarre incidents will happen... "Six Consciousnesses Thought Changing Ataraxia" marked Kago's third version of the concept of a girl entering a cyberspace-like psychic realm wherein she can "hack" people.  He first utilized it in "Soul Diver Saga: Nirvana" (1992)  only three chapters of which were published before the magazine serializing it (Bandai's Cyber Comix) stopped publication. In 1995  Kago published a much less sexually explicit one-shot simply titled "ataraxia" in Young Jump (later collected in "Hannya Haramita") before this expanded and much kinkier version followed in 2000/2001. Additionally  various characters from this manga appear in other stories by Kago  some of them collected in "Super-Dimensional Love Gun".

title_en: The Life of the Witch Who Remains Single for About 300 Years!
description: Once  Kurokawa Mikage was the fearful “Witch of Moonlight ” but now  300 years later  she’s just an office lady and teased by her co-workers for still being single. Mikage thinks she’s fine with her ultimate spinster life  posting fake photos of a pretend relationship… Until the young and handsome Kobayashi Satoru joins her company! Is this the start of a real  bewitching romance at last!?

Himeno Yui  the oddball of the class  finds his “shounen manga artist who's on the edge of the cliff” side exposed by the class prince  Ouji Hinata! Meanwhile  Ouji harbors a secret of his own: he is a devoted “shoujo manga lover.” Tensions rise as Himeno teases him about romantic relationships. However  when the editor who works with Hinata suggests that he try writing shoujo manga  he decides to take the plunge and shouts to Ouji  “Teach me shoujo manga!” From that day on  the two opposites embark on a secret journey of “heart flutter lessons ” exploring their different worlds and the budding connection between them!

Seong-un Choi is the top-ranked player in the game “Lost World ” being the only player to have completed all its achievements. However  his triumph is short-lived as a mysterious message transports him to the real “Lost World ” transforming him from a mere gamer to a contender for godhood. Amidst others vying for divinity  will Seong-un be able to achieve true godhood and reign supreme in this new realm?

A collection of one-shots by Yokoyari Mengo.  - Chapter 1. **Hagane no Kokoro** - Chapter 2. **Neo Dutch Wife** - Chapter 3. **Stand By You** - Chapter 4. **"Kawaii"** Meet Yukiho Amamiya  a 14-year-old girl who becomes a gravure idol to help her sister. She's cute  and she knows it - but she can't seem to be cute around the boy she likes. Will she ever hear him call her "cute"?   - Chapter 5. **One Flower  (Ipponbana)** - Chapter 6. **Koi wa Zenkei Shisei** - Chapter 7. **Namu Amidaisuki**

In the world where only the aristocrats have the power to fight the monster – mana. A youth named Kufa is dispatched as a tutor to find Mareida's talent  a nuisance girl born in a duke's family. If she is not talented  assassinate her. That  is the dark side of his task.
Although she's pretty  she's widely rumoured to be the school's number one straight-laced girl. So when I gathered up my courage to confess to her…‽

title_en: Ane ni Naritai Ane VS Yuri ni Naritai Imouto
description: One day  Shio arrives home to find that her mother has gotten remarried and is going on a business trip with her new husband  leaving Shio with her new stepsister Kafka. Being only a day older than Kafka  Shio is concerned that Kafka will try to take the big sister position from her. Kafka  on the other hand  is determined to make Shio  who was her first love  fall for her.

title_en: "My Princess  You Must Die!" Said the Female Knight
description: The Western Kingdom of Fortinu is in a dire situation due to the incursion of the Demon Lord. The captain of the female knights  Klinfeid  fearful of her body being sullied and the long history of the House of Laz being smeared  decides to kill everyone including herself before the orcs get to them! However  the newly appointed princess Luka is having none of that  and decides to run away from the female knights. What will happen to her?!      *Based on an RPG.*     ---  **Links:**   - [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/pirethloid)   - [Official Game](https://game.nicovideo.jp/atsumaru/games/gm1524)

Kaiki Ningyou-kan's first appearance was in Shoujo Friend Zoukan: Suspense & Horror 01/1992  This volume collect 6 horror stories by Kanako inuki  the first 4 all being about dolls.  - **Playing with Dolls** - O Ningyou Asobi (お人形遊び) - **Mannequin** - (マネキン) - **Blue Eyed Marie** - Aoi me no Mari (青い目のマリー) - **Ventriloquist's Love** - Fukuwajutsushi to Koi (腹話術師と恋) - **Ritual** - Gikishi (儀式) Shoujo Friend Zoukan: Suspense & Horror 01/1991 - **I Can Fulfill Your Love Wishes** - Koi no Negai Kanaemasu (恋の願いかなえます) Shoujo Friend 06/1990

Ran  a chemistry teacher  is assigned to give a one-on-one remedial class to Chiaki  a problem child in his homeroom class  in order to avoid his retention. To get Chiaki  who has no interest in science  to take the remedial class  Ran proposes "cooking"...?
A herbivorous dinosaur cricket that has encountered a horrible carnivorous dinosaur.

title_en: Oh Great  the Tanuki are Done For
description: 次にくるマンガ大賞のWebマンガ部門にノミネートされました。 応援よろしくお願いいたします

tags: Action|Long Strip|Martial Arts|Adventure|Virtual Reality|Fantasy|Web Comic|Supernatural|Full Color
description: The genius top student played games in an attempt to flirt with girls  but was struck by lightning on a rainy day and transported into the world of the game?! To survive here  he could only rely on himself. Surrounded by monsters and gods  full of dangers  can he still return to his own world and continue chasing girls?!  --- - [Original Manhua <Tencent Comics>](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/650653) - [Original Manhua <Bilibili Comics>](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29992) - [Original Manhua <Kuaikan Manhuas>](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/11031/)

"No talent  no money  no education. A worthless person  bottom of the barrel." "But... just seeing you like that makes me feel so happy."  Shinba  an unemployed young man  is what someone could call a useless person. For some reason  such a man is dating a cool and beautiful woman named Hizumi. For the sake of Hizumi  whom he loves very much  Shinba tries to graduate from being a useless person  but his efforts are always in vain. She ridicule  sneers and deny him. She whisper words of love to him and stays by his side.

Kouta Takeda is a young office worker  who at the entry level at XOX Corporation is put under the direct supervision of Kyouko Takizawa  a stunning and voluptuous woman with a fearsome reputation at the company as an inflexible and cruel boss  but Takeda has the privilege of finding out that Takizawa is no iron lady  and that she's no stranger to kindness where it's dispensed.

Tick  tock... As the sound of the clock grows louder  another misfortune is about to happen.  Daysellers absorb humans’ negative emotional time for sustenance.   A story of daysellers delving deep into the minds of humans!

Acting more childish than actual children  a delinquent looking pediatric surgeon is here!  Appendicitis  phimosis  esophageal atresia  traffic accident... various diseases and injuries that happen to children. Sakurako Hoshino protects these young lives with outstanding operation!
A 4-koma parody spin-off series of Kakegurui featuring all characters from the series and their everyday lives.

title_en: Moto Dorei Desu ga  Oni no Dorei wo Katte Mitara Seiryoku ga Tsuyosugiru node Sutetai...
description: It has been seven years since Sora Ono was sent to another world  where she was enslaved. Because of a clerical error  her "slave" status was revoked  and Sora walked away a free woman. Then one day  she purchases a slave...

title_en: My Fiancé is in Love with My Little Sister
description: There my fiancé stood  gazing intently at my charming younger sister. When I saw them fall in love the moment they laid eyes on each other  I was hit with an overwhelming sense of déjà vu. Aah  again? My fiancé had been in love with my younger sister even in my previous life. There was nothing I could do but watch it all unfold. And for some inexplicable reason  I’m the only one who keeps returning to that exact point in time. Trapped by fate. And yet  amidst the turns of the hourglass  I still find myself falling for him…

"Why won't this city get destroyed…"    Chiho  a middle school girl teased for not having a smartphone goes to the seaside to vent her anger  there she meets the strange creature  Q!! Chiho takes a liking to Q  who feeds off human's negative emotions  then decides to secretly bring back and adopt Q  what mysteries does Q hold…?    Thus begins  in the port city of Numazu  the "invader life" of Chiho and Q.

Narumi Rokurou is still adrift in life in his forties  unmarried  and working as an editor at a publishing company while writing hardly lucrative literary fiction. His days enjoying life at his own pace are brought to an end one summer night  when a strange twist of fate brings Rokurou together with a mysterious beauty  beginning the story of their crazed love.  As once was spoken by Zarathustra: "Everything in a woman is a riddle."

In order to be bought by a rich family  Narumi Inoue  hiding the truth that he is a man  goes to a girls' school. As a trainee  Narumi was sent to serve a girl from a rich family who hates maids (only weekends). Keeping the 'heart of treating/serving people ' Japanese maid  Maid in Japan  Narumi's battle will start? If it is found out that Narumi is a man  he will be castrated.

title_en: The Splendid Job Of A Monster Maid
description: A demon world maid's cute and spooky fantasy action!      Sumire  a nekomata  who lost her favorite master was wandering around  got lost  and arrived in a foreign country in the demon world?! With the android and undead maids  clean the demon's house brilliantly to take back "that something!"      [Artist's twitter](https://twitter.com/yugata_tanabe)
Takagi Suzu  a normal high school girl  plays cheerleader after school for the Moon Knights  a small professional baseball team in Yokohama. A cute manga that manages to make baseball fun!

The previous lords have committed as many atrocities as possible to fill their bellies. I  the only daughter of that house  had discovered that my servant and lover was a spy.   And as the people wanted  my life ended with my execution.      However  with the memory of getting beheaded intact  I began a new life. I was planning to shoulder the sins of my past life and become a nun  but by some trick of fate  I came to work as a maid for the current lord.   Under my former lover  whose name  age and even hair colour were all lies.

title_en: Isekai de Saikyou no Skill wo Umidaseta node  Hitasura Musou Suru Koto ni Shimashita. ~Ore Dake ga Skill no Suuchi wo Katte ni Sousa~
description: When I was suddenly summoned to another world by some mysterious identity that said  "Pick three Skill Seeds". But wait  what does 'Skill Seeds' mean instead of just 'Skills'? Realizing the sole difference between the two  I awakened as the other world's first 'Hacker'  capable of arbitrarily enhancing skills by manipulating their values! To start  I manipulated the skills of a beautiful girl  Mia  who suffered due to her skills being unsuitable for combat and joined forces with her to surpass those who had looked down on us!

title_en: Genova no Deshi ~10 Byo Shika Tatakaenai Majutsushi  Nochi no Mao wo Sodateru~
description: Can a former strongest mage  with a 10-second combat limit  and his cross-dressing female apprentice (desperate to hide her gender) save the world? The former strongest mage's apprentice is actually the Demon Lord!? This is the story of a certain master and apprentice on their journey. The master  Valen  was once known as the "Strongest Mage " but after a tragic event  he lost his beloved master  his sight  and all of his magical power.  Now  Valen can only use his former powers for 10 seconds at a time  and he's awkward around women. His apprentice  Ria  is a magical prodigy who forced her way into becoming Valen's apprentice  almost like a wife barging in. However  she's determined to hide the fact that she's a woman at all costs. When Ria reveals the shocking truth that "Valen's master is still alive " their strange journey begins. But for some reason  their adventures lead to the potential destruction of the human world!?

Middle school brawler Noboru Haitani has never lost a fight. But the bitter taste of a soccer defeat gradually warms him up to the sport  until one day Haitani finds himself in a match against a team featuring middle school soccer prodigy Takami. An outlaw fights his way into the world of soccer!

title_en: Gyaru Maid to Akuyaku Reijou ~Ojou-sama no Happy End shika Katan!~
description: A gyaru named Serina is reincarnated into the world of an otome game as a background character who is sold off by her family and now works as the exclusive maid of the game's villainess Almelia. Yuri romcom hijinks ensue.
4koma comic of the Satsuriku no Tenshi manga.

A mysterious virus breaks out on board the Boat 82-08 out at sea. The people who find out about it first only want to use it as a weapon but quickly lose control over the virus.  Will the trio survive long enough to rejoin their friend Jinu? Or will it be Jinu who doesn’t make it out to meet his friends?

title_en: Isshou Watashi no Joshu de ite!
description: "The relationship between a detective and their assistant is not unlike romance!"  Due to his natural tendency to assist others (a "helper type" personality that makes him constantly want to lend a hand)  Mitomo Tasuku had always lived in the shadows. To break out of this  he made it his life's mission to "become number one." However  at the high school he transfers to  he encounters three detective girls  who happen to be his rivals from elementary school with whom he formed a detective club together. Thus begins Tasuku's fierce battle for the top detective spot! However  these girls seem to harbor passionate feelings of a different kind...!?

"As time to say goodbye approaches  everything seems so close to my heart." is what my late grandmother used to say. But that is a lie. When you say goodbye  I'm sure it feels sad and frustrating and you will hate it. Yoruko pours her feelings to Yamabiko  the boy who sent her grandmother's soul back to the mountains. Collection of five short stories full of emotions  including Kamu's debut work.   •The King and the Witch •The Night Before I Ran Away •The Ghost of The Night •Yamabiko •Night Store

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|School Life|Delinquents|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: From the same author as Orange Marmalade. Han Tae-Woong is a financially unstable high school student trying to support his single mother. His dream is to become a bodyguard after he graduates. He is destined to cross paths with Kim Gavin  the granddaughter of Korea's richest chairman. Since she is stuck in a trashy high school  she gets continuously bullied. Thus  Tae-Woong is hired by her grandmother's company to protect her. The issue lies in her HATING when others invade her privacy. Will Tae-Woong’s attempts to break through her antipathic personality ever succeed?

title_en: Yurufuwa Nouka no Mojibake Skill: Isekai de Catalog Tsuuhan Yattemasu
description: Tatsuya  a 29-year-old bachelor  gets accidentally summoned to another world and obtains [Agricultural Skills].   In order to survive  he starts a vegetable garden in a secluded forest. He thought that his life in another world would be extremely difficult  but the ingredients in this other world were delicious and the crops he grew on his own were also very delicious! Furthermore  he's also very happy with the dishes he made with Japanese seasonings!   (Typical. Rice and sake are going to be a staple apparently  but you guys know the drill. )  Besides  if there are beautiful brides  isn't it okay if he lives in this other world? Loose and fluffy  a relaxing other world harem life!
I got a little sister recently.   And these are my little sister's panties.      Short oneshot about two siblings.

Sanjou Arashi is a serious and reliable second year high-school student working part-time at a detective agency. Her boss is a gambling  irresponsible  tobacco smelling oji-san. The pair are complete opposites  but this is the story of a scruffy oji-san X high-school girl romantic comedy!

When my favorite childhood friend Sei-chan moved in with us  he started teasing me such as pushing me over  sneaking into my room  and taking other liberties! The daily flirting attack from the handsome Sei-chan is too overwhelming!

Ira Megumi is a 31-year-old woman who is currently at the top of her career. She's a beautiful woman who's brimming with pride and totally has no interest in love or marriage. Though the next morning  she wakes up and finds the new employee  Aoki Shun  sleeping next to her. Just what in the world happened?!

Da-kyung  who was an active member of a corporate criminal organization  belatedly learns of the death of her boss  whom she cared for like a father. Times later without knowing why her boss's death  she gets a clue  a college of rich people with most of the children of important people in Korea. Da-Kyung will go back to being a student to try to find out what happened  she is a well-trained assassin  but dealing with bullying and the stress of school life may not be as easy as it seems...

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Boys' Love|School Life|Web Comic|Full Color
description: “Come on in! It’s your first time at a boarding house  right?” The unemployed Sulwon has taken over his parents’ boarding house so they could return to their hometown to farm. A story about life with boarding house tenants of all kinds!

tags: Psychological|Long Strip|Romance|Boys' Love|Crime|Mafia|Sexual Violence|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Adaptation|Full Color
description: Seo Jeong-in  the second son of a wealthy judge's family  fails to get into the university his father wants  unlike his older brother. Consequently  he ends up in a dormitory at a rural cram school catering to upper-class students. Having been aware of his sexual identity from an early age  Jeong-in has been enjoying a free-spirited and indulgent gay lifestyle. However  things turn for the worse when his dorm roommate  Seunghyun  captures footage of Jeong-in in a sticky situation with his friend Han Minwoo using a hidden camera installed in their room... (Source: Lezhin)

"What shall we play with today  young one?" With these words  the worn-down-looking older sister accosts the grade school protagonist into yet another playful game. With her nostalgic toys  from Beyblades to yoyos to modern eccentricities like Youkai Watch and Duel Masters  she'll one up anyone twice her junior in the ways of play and enjoyment. ___ **Additional Links:** - [Official X](https://x.com/MissDownerplays)

title_en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon (Official Colored)
tags: Loli|Official Colored|Monsters|Action|Girls' Love|Drama|Fantasy|Monster Girls|Shota|Slice of Life|Supernatural
description: Miss Kobayashi is your average office worker who lives a boring life  alone in her small apartment–until she saves the life of a female dragon in distress. The dragon  named Tohru  has the ability to magically transform into an adorable human girl (albeit with horns and a long tail!)  who will do anything to pay off her debt of gratitude  whether Miss Kobayashi likes it or not. With a very persistent and amorous dragon as a roommate  nothing comes easy  and Miss Kobayashi’s normal life is about to go off the deep end!

Short stories included in Crimsons: Akai Koukaishatachi volumes.  Volume 1 contains "Crimsons Gaiden: River Side Story" parts 1-3. Volume 2 contains "Crimsons Gaiden: River Side Story" parts 4-8. Volume 3 contains "Crimsons Gaiden: River Side Story" parts 9-11. Volume 4 contains "Crimsons Gaiden: River Side Story" parts 12-16.

title_en: Shinmai Ossan Boukensha  Saikyou Party ni Shinu hodo Kitaerarete Muteki ni Naru.
description: It is common knowledge that it is best to become an adventurer when you are as young as possible  because the magical power that is the basis of an adventurer's strength will hardly grow if you don't train it while you are young. But this man  Rick Gladiator  who became an adventurer when he was over thirty years old  had the combat power of an S-rank adventurer  the highest rank in the world. In fact  Rick has lived an unimaginable life with the members of the legendary Orihalcon Fist  a party of the continent's strongest adventurers. From dragons to vampires  Rick's fighting prowess  trained by his literally "monster" mentors  allows him to defeat elite adventurers one after another who try to underestimate him. ___ **Character Designer:** [Tea](https://mangadex.org/author/71d4c549-2476-4803-a9c2-c48a15cc0fd4)

title_en: Otoge ni Trip shita Ore ♂ Reload
description: Otoya Otonari is a university student who moved to the world of Otome games by chance. He has a trouble with the characters who are boldly setting up love events even though they know he's a man  but he gets a normal ending and is living a peaceful life.  Then  a support character suggested to him that he should try (the game) again...! A business love comedy that unfolds in a different world! I'll start dancing again...

title_en: Kuroko no Basket - Aru Shounen to Neko no Tenmatsu (Doujinshi)
description: Pairing: Akashi Seijuurou x Kuroko Tetsuya

Wandering traveler Kurotsuki Yukiji goes from town to town enjoying the women  food  and culture each has to offer. He is the master of the Kurotsuki style martial art where instead of using brute force  it uses the aiki form where you use the opponent’s strength and manipulate their force against them. It focuses on settling the conflict without hurting both sides and harnessing the “bladeless soul.” Yukiji is traveling to perfect this style and trouble usually finds him although going by his outward appearance  he looks like a peace-seeking man.       The oneshot was released in issue 20/2012 of Weekly Shounen Jump.   The serialization for this series begins from issue 24/2013 of Weekly Shounen Jump.

Summary: What do you do when the person you are entrusted to protect happens to pique your interest as well? Zhen Hao  who was asked by his best friend to take care of his love interest ends up falling in love with him as well. Who will win the affection of this love interest?… An exciting love triangle awaits~     ---  **Links:**   - [Original Webcomic on Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/mistake_lover)   - [Original Webcomic on Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/mistakelov)   - [Original Webcomic on Mr.Blue](http://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_mistake_wz)

Tankathlon is a new form of tank sport gaining slowly gaining popularity among Senshado enthusiasts. While also involving tank battles  Tankathlon is distinguished by its lack of official oversight allowing any school with tanks to participate in a battle anywhere at any time  and a 10-ton weight restriction on tanks used  limiting battles to light tanks and tankettes.

From Ivyscan:   Asako lives her life day-to-day– acutely aware of how lonely she is. That all starts to change when she meets Hongo  a boy who thought she was trying to commit suicide and tried to stop her. They form a bond and find how much fun life really is. Until Asako finds out about Hongo’s past.

Unable to achieve results at work  the protagonist is troubled - until a woman who seems to embody all her ideals appears before her...  A girls' love story about a woman who becomes conscious of romantic feelings for another woman for the first time.

Sakuraba Sakurako is at the entrance ceremony of Neo Mogitori Academy  a school for training young ladies. She tries to enter the school with a dog as her companion  but the teacher stops her and she ends up fighting the dog. Sakurako narrowly wins the battle and meets the boys and girls who will work hard together to become the ultimate ojou-sama.

Eiji is a teenager who's rough and rude and loves to fight. However  Eiji has a strange power; when he comes in contact of certain objects  he can see memories contained within the objects themselves.  When he finds himself involved in a dark murder case  he assists a beautiful young profiler to find the murderer. Afterwards  she continues to ask for his assistance in more complex investigations.  A detective manga with intriguing and complicated cases!  ---    NOTE: This manga contains rather a lot of violent imagery  scenes  cases and situations.      Was adapted into a live action TV drama. See [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%B5%E3%82%A4%E3%82%B3%E3%83%A1%E3%83%88%E3%83%A9%E3%83%BCEIJI)  a little past halfway down the page.

title_en: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de (Fan Colored)
description: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/ed18c276-08f0-4378-99fa-41b622bb7203/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

Hinata  a Heisei gal  died from an incurable illness. When she was reincarnated  it was into a fantasy world where imagination literally becomes magic—known as imagical. While renowned imaginaters (magical artists) are being reborn into this world  Hinata is just an ordinary girl who loves handicrafts… deemed useless and unfit for the task of protecting people from monsters  she’s cast aside. Even so  with her trademark positive attitude  Hinata decides to go out into town to buy some cute clothes―Only to find that not a single stylish outfit exists! This is a world with zero interest in “art” or fashion! However  a chance encounter between this outrageous gal and a cynical artist sets the stage for a bold new stroke of color across the world… a remake fantasy where a wild gal and jaded artists transform a world with zero imagination!

title_en: Yandere-chan ga Kowasugiru node Gorioshi de Yarisugoshitara Tondemonai koto ni Natta
description: **Links:** |Raws|Short Hair|Long Hair version| |:-|:-|:-| |X|[Link](https://twitter.com/kota2comic/status/1581918070087770112)|[Link](https://twitter.com/kota2comic/status/1583367882141929472)| |Pixiv|[Link](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/102122260)|[Link](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/102122260) |Fanbox|[Link](https://kotatsu358.fanbox.cc/posts/4610339)|[Link](https://kotatsu358.fanbox.cc/posts/4629483)| |Fantia|[Link](https://fantia.jp/posts/1532443)|[Link](https://fantia.jp/posts/1539462)|

title_en: GIRLS und PANZER - Motto Love Love Sakusen desu!
description: Part of the series [GIRLS und PANZER](https://mangadex.org/?page=search&title=Girls%20und%20PANZER&author=&artist=&genres=).

BioMega follows a character by the name of Kanoe Zouichi and the mysterious Kanoe Fuyu whose luminous form is integrated into the system of his bike. They are agents sent by a powerful organization to retrieve the human with the ability to resist and transmute the NS5 infection that is spreading across the world  named Yion/Ion Green.       However  their mission is delayed by the reckless actions of the Public Health Department's taskforce and the kidnapping of Yion/Ion Green. Will they complete their mission? Where has Yion/Ion Green been taken?  --- - [Official Chinese](https://www.books.com.tw/products/0010546582)    - [Official Korean](http://www.kyobobook.co.kr/product/detailViewKor.laf?ejkGb=KOR&mallGb=KOR&barcode=9788953282490&orderClick=LAA)

title_en: I Fell in Love  so I Tried Livestreaming.
description: Inuzuka Yuu is unable to make any friends due to his mean face and awkwardness. But because of his enrollment to high school  he has the opportunity to enter the dorms. However  it was a share house between 6 people  3 girls and 3 boys filled with secrets!?

Saint☆Young Men is slice-of-life or divine-life  tale of Jesus and Buddha as they try to experience the modern world  in this case  Japan. The manga places a funny twist on religion  attitudes  culture and customs in Japan through the eyes of Jesus and Buddha. You see Jesus and Buddha experiencing Asakusa  public baths  theme parks  and the internet. Throughout the manga  we get a little history of their divine greatness only to see their apparent insignificance in modern Japanese society. Suffice to say  before people can recognize that they're actually Jesus and Buddha  people think of them as someone who looks like Johnny Depp or a guy with a button on his forehead. For real. ___ * [Alternative Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/saint-young-men/) ___ - **Received the 2009 Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize for Short Work Manga**

A computer continues to live on in order to complete a mission in a world where all life  including Mankind  has gone extinct. This is a record of those 27 million years of its heroic struggle.      (Different from the compilation "Hotel" in that this one was published earlier (2004)  has a somewhat different ending/narrative).

Alice is a senior high school student who lives with an uncle that spends his time tormenting her everyday. One day  Alice witnesses the death of her uncle by the hands of an assassin called "Kumo" (Arachnid in Japanese). She then falls unconscious  and upon waking up  she finds out that she's in Kumo's house… Now  this Alice who no longer has any family is being raised by the assassin himself..!        ---
The Great Demon Lord travels to the Human Realm in order to take it over. However  her long and hard journey leaves her needing to relax at the Chigiri Bathhouse!!

Miyako is stressed out at work. Seeking solace  she tries to get a cat  but is unable to do so. She returns home dejected… only to find a child with cat ears and a hoodie lying on the floor…! When she rushes to take care of him  she finds out that he is a very beautiful boy!  The cute and dangerous life together of a beautiful boy and an office worker begins!

title_en: Musket Girls! ~Tensei Sanbou to Senretsu Otome-tachi~
description: After my previous life was cut short  I was reincarnated in a world of early modern-style warfare where line infantry exchanges gunfire. Being a commoner second lieutenant  I was shunned as "Krombertz the Grim Reaper" because of the many deaths of my men in battle. With that  I was assigned to the 6th Special Duty Brigade  an all-female unit  as a staff officer. The brigade commander  who is up to something  and the carefree non-commissioned officers are women  while the foot soldiers are just girls who are practically amateurs. In this world  if you don't fight  you will be killed. That being the case  I have to do something about this... but how?!

title_en: Isekai Souzou no Susume: Smartphone App de Wakusei wo Tsukutte Shimatta Ore wa Kami to Nari Sekai wo Meguru
description: Saito Kenji  a middle-aged salaryman  installed a mysterious smartphone app called *Guide to Creating Another World*. It was a game in which you could freely manipulate planets  lives  tribes  eras  and all sorts of other things.   However  as a result of being transferred to the world on the screen through a new function  he found himself able to travel back and forth to Japan!   You can explore and time travel in other worlds  and the different abilities you get can be used either way and use dimensional storage. And you can take things and people with you as much as you want…!   The life of an ex-salaryman with an "anything goes" life starts now!

title_en: Akuyaku Reijou no Ani ni Tensei Shimashita
description: "Onii-tama?"  Cain  who reincarnated as one of the love interests of an otome game  screamed at the loveliness of his sister  Diana.
