Miyuu Nanahara is just your average ordinary girl: she has school  friends  and love troubles. Especially love. She loves the most popular guy in school. Secretly  he loves her too! What's keeping these two from getting together?

1) If You Touch Me   After school ended  in the nurse's office. I found out about Senpai's "secret." Don't make that pained face. For now  forget about that girl and please indulge in me.      2) Monopolize   Hana's friend Shinobu was a nerdy kid who developed into a super cool guy  but he doesn't know it! Hana keeps him in glasses so no one will notice how handsome he is. Hana is torn between her guilt and her possessive nature.      3) Masshiro Valentine   When Misa's boyfriend breaks up with her to date her friend  she's crushed. Handsome stranger Yuki tells her  "I know of you  because I love you."       4) Love Costume   Ichigo loves cos-play and her boyfriend  Hayato. But he only seems passionate when she's in costume…      5) I Will Comfort You   Nanami loves Ichijyou. But Ichijyou's already has a girlfriend. Then he breaks up with her and turns to Nanami…

Ruho Miyatsuki wants to fall in love  but she is totally unable to! One day she discovers a club that will help girls with any problem. There she meets three hot guys… Will she be able to be cured and find her prince?

1. Midara na Senritsu Hiwai na Yubisaki (Lewd Melody Obscene Fingers) by SHINJO Mayu   Yurika has grown so used to doing what others tell her to do that she never realized she was like a caged bird. She accepted it as a matter of course when arrangements were made for her to get engaged to Satoshi  her controlling piano teacher. That is until piano genius and fringe element Hibiki teaches Yurika how to put emotion in her music–how to fly from her cage–among other less innocent things…   (Also included in Motto Oshiete)      2. Hyoutenka no Maria by MINAMI Kanan   A story about a girl named Miona who saved the drunken university student Rikuya from freezing to death. To thank her  he takes her to an amusement park… they get along very well and Miona kinda fell in love with him. Next day she sees on tv that a female student from the same university as Rikuya was stabbed… and she begins to think that it was him…      3. Abunai Houkenshitsu (Dangerous Health Room) by AYUKAWA Mio   Fujimori-sensei has a secret that involves the health room. Could he be meeting someone there…!?      4. S no Junjou M no Yuuwaku by KOUSAKA Yuuka   Yuu is in love with Makoto  only to find out that her mother is engaged to Makoto's father. Now she must live with Makoto  and his equally handsome twin brother.      5. Kare no Taion Kanojo no Toiki (His Body Temperature Her Long Sigh) by ASAMI Miyabi   Yukina is on the same committee as Narimiya. She notices the cologne that he is wearing and stares at him sadly. Could the fragrance be the cause…!?   **Also included in [m]Kedamono Shounen Shoujo[/m]      6. Kakusei Full Moon (Full Moon Awakening) by YUUHI Ryuu   Yuzuki and Takara are childhood friends and so close that people consider Takara to be Yuzuki's girlfriend. But it's all in good fun–because Yuzuki is eighteen and Takara is only thirteen. Now that Takara's body is maturing  though  the joke isn't as easy to brush off as it once was…especially with a full moon pulling Yuzuki's desires to the surface.      7. Tomodachi Ijou x H Miman (More than Friends  Not Up to Sex) by USAMI Tae   Making a confession is the most difficult part in a love relationship. Follow Miku in her way of saying "I LOVE YOU TEPPEI".

Takamatsu is a college student working part-time at a video rental shop. He starts falling for his cool older coworker  Mano-san... A sweet yet agonizing love story about a guy punching above his weight in romance!

title_en: I Confessed to a Lone Wolf Girl
description: A man confesses his love to a lone wolf girl.

1. Outrageous Men   Mari and younger Eiji work for the same company  and they are secretly in love. Mari feels happy with him  because he is gentle  dependent on her  and cute. When she visits him at home for the first time  she is shocked to know that he is a brother of her former boyfriend Yuichi…! In her college days  she couldn’t get along with Yuichi because he was too pushy. Therefore  she chose to part with him  but…      2. Love Communication   Tanabe Sumire has trouble dealing with her client Haga Takahiko… but when her mom pushes her to go for a match-making session her partner is none other than Takahiko and after a pretening to date him she realized she is falling for him. Will love communication help in solving her problems…?      3. Marriage Pink   Yamashita Riko and Hayashi Ryoji are lovey-dovey couple about to get married. But after her first time staying with Ryoji  Riko realizes that sex with Ryoji is so violent that it drains her out. Worried she might not be able to get wedding preprations done she started avoiding Ryoji's invitations… Is this another case of wedding blues or rather wedding pinks in case of Riko…?      4. Can't Take Away My Treasures   Kondou Miyuki is a host of show "Cooking in 10 Minutes" but a lousy cleaner because she can't throw anything away. The next show that requested herappearance is a Live Broacast called "let's go people's Home!". Panicked Miyuki decides to clean her room. Luckily she runs into Hasegawa Nozomu a pharmaceutical consumer researcher while purchasing cleaning items whom she asks to prove the products use by cleaning her apartment. What will become of her messed-up house and her Live Broadcast…?      5. Calling For Love   Kitou Kazuki after becoming jobless  homeless  and divoced ends up at Shibata Kouichi's place. Kazuki always sees Kouichi as her junior from high school but that changes when he declares his love for her. Will Kazuki respond to his call of love…?

title_en: My TS Friend Is Sick and Adorable
Inaka no Kuro Gal JK to Kekkon Shimashita
description: Koichi quit his job and became a novelist. However  he could not think of any topic and was unable to write a novel. One day  in order to concentrate on his novel  he decides to move to the countryside to live in the atelier owned by his grandfather. Koichi is stunned by the empty countryside  but there he meets Ichika  a tan high school girl who is out of place in the countryside. She's sexually uninhibited  promiscuous and she'll let anyone have sex with her right away  but she also has a strong desire to get married  and she's good at cooking and managing people. Koichi is attracted to Ichika  and before he knows it  he wants to make her the heroine of his own novel. For some reason  I ended up living with Ichika!!!?

Kaori is a freshman photography student in a women’s art college. Finding friends was her dearest wish when she was accepted  yet she finds herself isolated and alone. Depression sinks in as she longs to join the vibrant campus life around her.  However  she falls in love at first sight with Asuka  a striking woman sporting a centipede tattoo. Is this the beginning of a spicy campus life for Kaori?  The two of them  complete opposites at first glance  slowly start drawing together.  Exciting! Heart-pounding! Billowing! Their campus story rises like wisps of smoke!

title_en: Koori no Hime wa Chiisana Hidamari de Tokasaretai
description: Aoba is a first-year high school student who takes care of his younger siblings in place of his busy parents  and ends up at a sibling playdate in the home of his classmate Mizudori  a cool beauty known as the "Ice Princess".

title_en: Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de
description: A girl in my class is always injured somewhere on her body  and it's not unusual for her to come to school covered in bandages. At a glance  one can tell that this girl is saddled with problems and so no one tries to get involved with her. Even so... I couldn't help myself from being concerned about her.  This is a story about a pair of classmates whose hearts will be brought together under extreme circumstances.  (Source: Kadokawa)  ---  Note: The original Twitter series has been collected and published into 1 volume under the name Azadarake no Classmate (痣だらけのクラスメイト) by Kadokawa through their Dengeki Comics EX label.  Additional Links  * [Kadokawa](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322312000753/) (Publisher) * [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20079655/vol_no/001)

Takanashi Haru  a plain and unassuming boy with black hair and glasses  secretly has a crush on the popular teacher Nanjou. His crush is accidentally discovered by his classmate  Sanada Kazuki  a flashy and popular guy who is the complete opposite of Takanashi. Sanada takes an interest in Takanashi's unrequited love for Nanjou and tries to help Takanashi attract the teacher's attention.  But as Takanashi starts spending more time with Sanada  he begins to experience Sanada's kindness... Maybe Sanada isn't just the flashy guy he appears to be...? What will become of this usual pairing...!?

title_en: Kyoukai Meikyuu to Ikai no Majutsushi
description: When Theodore was dropped into a waterway by his half-brother  he suddenly recalled the memory of his past life. He had been a Japanese citizen known as Kirishima Kagehisa  placed inside VRMMO character he had made in Break Force Online. "Theodore" is a Combat Mage that Kagehisa played within BFO  and he realized his skills were progressing well even in this other world. Theodore  who had lightly brushed off his half-brother to make his own place in the world  had ventured off to the large labyrinth existing at the Boundary City  Termuilles.

One minute  he was choking on water  and the next  he found himself in a canyon and turned into a willow tree! Before he could reconcile with this new sad reality  the world decided to throw him another curveball. With the return of spirit energy  every living thing started to mutate  and his life was soon turned into a game of survival. Luckily  he was gifted with the ability of infinite evolution. But was it really a blessing? Or was it also a curse in disguise?
True feelings  can you understand it through observation?

Bowsette has gotten hitched with Mario! Things seem like they're going to be just dandy until Princess Peach plants the seed of doubt in our poor Bowsette's mind. Now she's going to do everything she can to make sure her latest change is permanent.       Posted with [Author Consent](https://twitter.com/Athorist/status/1082509381227499520).

As the vampire Zach nears the end of his search for his lost love  he finds himself looking upon an old house in the middle of a quiet Japanese town. In it resides 3 people — an old lady and her granddaughters. Despite sharing neither their lifespan nor their sense of values  he decides to live with them. And as time goes by  he learns what it means to be human  leafing through the stories in the life of the woman he holds dear.

One day  Nayu  who quit her job due to social phobia  meets Karen  who is as beautiful as a jewel. Karen has a high fever and is curled up outside. Unable to bear the sight  Nayu takes Karen into her house  bathes her  and takes care of her. However  Karen is homeless and moves from one friend's house to another  and by chance  they end up living together. Sensitive Nayu and free-spirited Karen. Nayu's closed heart gradually opens up as she sees the contrasting lives of the two  and she begins to have special feelings for them. However  it seems that Karen is hiding a secret from her past--!?

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Office Workers|Drama|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Adaptation|Full Color
description: Are we really friends? Or are we something else? Seohee and Eunho have known one another for 15 years  and they've always been each other's top priority. Their relationship blurs the line between friends  family  soulmates  and lovers. But one day  it comes to a tipping point when Seohee suddenly declares  "Eunho  I can't do this anymore."  --- - [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Before-Losing-You/3490)

title_en: My Hero Academia - Nanda Kanda de 10-Nen Tachimashite (Doujinshi)
description: Pairing: Todoroki Shouto x Bakugou Katsuki

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Girls' Love|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Full Color
description: A story about girls who want to be similar to someone else.  For her own reasons  almost-third year Minamo Hiratsuka doesn't talk with girls. But then  at night in a train station  she saw the most popular girl at school  Yurika Ayase  kiss a woman.

One day at a funeral  after Chiharu's mother remarried  Chiharu met the child from her new stepfather's previous marriage  Rui. Rui decided to live on her own after the death of the grandfather who raised her  and Chiharu decided to live with her.

Having defeated Boo  Goku is starting to get bored with his life on Earth. His wife  Chi-chi  wants him to get a job  but all he wants to do is train and fight stronger enemies. Elsewhere in the universe  the God of Destruction  Beerus  and his attendant Whis are traveling from planet to planet in search of food and entertainment. After blowing up some hapless victims  Beerus is reminded of a man from his dreams with the moniker “Super Saiyan God ” or something like that... The God of Destruction sets his sights on Earth to track down this mysterious man! Maybe this will give Goku something to do?

Should a doctor save lives or ... spirits? No doctor in this world would ever ponder this question except for Chu Han  a muddleheaded medical student who has a life-changing encounter with Shen Xingzhi – the egotistic spirit of a self-claimed medical expert.  ---  **Official English Translation**: - [Webnovel](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/get-off!-dr.-ghost_21288715006080801) (Dropped at ch.81) - [Wecomics](https://wecomics.com/comic/index/id/747?id=747) (Defunct)

From Starlight Scans:      Meirin  a junior high schooler  is the real identity of the famous "Dr. Rin" who heads a very popular feng sui website. She is in love with her best friend Asuka  a member of the soccer team. "Dr. Rin"'s advice has granted success for many  yet Meirin's own love life doesn't seem to be going too smoothly?

A continuation of the manga "Ultimate Path Private High School"  this story follows Toratora Tora on his quest to become the most notorious gangster in all of Japan. When he encounters Schoolcap Masa  the boss of the Gokumasa family  he immediately admires him and joins the family on their rampages. Full on both laughter and violence  the manga takes reader everywhere from a juvenile reformatory all the way to the halls of the Diet.

Ho-Kyung likes the violin  but born to a normal family  he has no intention of pursuing it as a career. When he was young  it was the small violin given to him by his friend Uiju that created the small passage connecting him to music. Now as a high school student  one accident destroys the precious violin and leads Ho-Kyung to an encounter with the violin repair workshop… A journey begins with a very simple wish  the desire to have his own violin.

Joe  a Brahmin  is a man of self-sacrifice and devotion who has dedicated his life to the mysterious woman Maggy. He is also the fearsome pet dog of the assassin cult "Thugs" who has the killing techniques... "Maggy's Dog"!!
One of the first published works by famed Berserk mangaka  Miura Kentaro. It's a short story about survival in a post-apocalyptic era.

The Pesern Empire is trying to protect the Crocus Frontline for the Henka Inland Allied Forces trying to break through. The drawn-out war and butter cold forces two men from opposite sides under one blanket. But loyalty to one's country cannot be stopped by just a measly blanket.

"Secchan" by Oshima Tomoko is about a girl who sleeps with anyone and a boy who doesn't have interest in anyone. These two young university students meet due to a certain incident and their lonely lives intermingle. (from Manga Mogura)

title_en: Mukatsuku Douryou to Sefure ni Narimashita
description: While he pretends to be straight at work  Hiro Naruse likes searching online for guys to hook up with. One day  he agrees to meet a guy at a hotel… who turns out to be his worst enemy  Kagami! "Wanna give it a try?" Kagami suggests they do the deed anyway  but there's no way Hiro's going to let Kagami take the lead… and so begins their hardcore love life!

What started out as an ordinary day turned upside down when an unknown catastrophe struck Earth  transporting Suho Park to a different planet. He eventually learns how to adapt and fight for his survival in this foreign world  but one day  just as suddenly as he was sucked into this new planet  Suho is pulled back to Earth!   He quickly learns that return to life as he remembers it is no longer possible  as Earth is in constant battle with monsters who’ve managed to infiltrate the planet.  How will Suho fight against the monsters attacking Earth  and will he be able to survive this time with his current skills?  --- - [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/guilaideyishijiewangzhe/list?title_no=1771)  - [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/druid-seoul-station/list?title_no=3367)  - [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001631)  - [Official German Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/the-druid-of-seoul-station/list?title_no=3642)  - [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/druid-seoul-station/list?title_no=3586)  - [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/seoul-station-druid/list?title_no=3301)

title_en: Soshite Hero to Uso wo Tsuku
description: Defeated by the heroes  the monster Lurio is not left to a cold death  but is reborn as a young girl in a rehabilitation facility! Distrustful at first  Lurio gradually warms up to her caretaker  Yukihito. However  the rehabilitation facility has its own agenda...  (Source: ComicWalker  translated)

Two childhood friends—Black  an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia  and White  a rational writer who’s been absent for two years—reunite to confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood. Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery  about friendship  and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.

Miori is always fighting with her boyfriend  a middle-school teacher  about her job as a hostess. After one such argument Miori goes out and ties one on and afterwards meets a young man who lends an ear and a shoulder… But then later on  she discovers something quite unexpected…

Maiko Ninomiya is college freshman again this year! All because of the accident a year ago that put her in the hospital for half a year. Not to let the fact that she was held back a year dishearten her  she made a complete recovery. But recently she keeps seeing erotic dreams… On top of that after meeting novelist Yukiya Nagase  strange things keep happening!?

Aiko falls in love at first sight with a guy who lends her an umbrella on a rainy day. Later  she meets him again on the train to school  but no matter how hard she tries  she still can’t confess her love to him. Will Aiko be able to convey her feelings to this guy  whose name she doesn’t even know  or will everything remain simply a beautiful memory of a rainy day?

Soon after transferring to a new school  Mayu Kodabutsu recieves a love letter from a cute girl named Yuuko Hai… Expecting the envy of his classmates  Mayu is surprised to recieve condolences instead. You see  Yuuko Hai is no ordinary 5th grader… She's an exorcist. And Mayu is destined to experience her 100 terrifying ways.   --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media as **100 Kutukan Yukochan** (2006)

A collection of short stories from the pages of Sho-Comi!      Story 1: Side Seat de Daite by Shinjo Mayu   Mamii is in love with Sawaii  the person everyone considers to be a dork. When she confesses to him  he tells her he has conditions for dating her. What are the conditions? And is Sawaii the person she really thinks he is?      Story 2: Brazen Lovers (3 chapters) by Mio Ayukawa   Yuuna's mother moves them everytime she breaks up with a boyfriend. This new place is a real dump. Annoyed  Yuuna heads off to the beach where she meets a very sexy guy. Sou says "Lets always be together." but when Yuuna wakes up he's gone! Two people like this are bound to meet again…      Story 3: Feel It  Roast Virgin by Kousaka Yuuka   Rika is a virgin and is very nervous about her first night with her boyfriend Yuuya. It doesn't help that Yuuya tries to do it everywhere  outside  at school  he's ready! But will Rika be ready?      Story 4: St. Gal Chick Valentine's Day by Ibuki Kaede   Mika's school has separate buildings for boys and girls and the girls have asked Mika as a student representative to get them co-ed classrooms so they can spend Valentine's Day with school idol  Subaru. Mika vows to try her hardest  even though Subaru annoys her. But maybe he's not such a bad guy.      Story 5: Secret Apple by Toda Megumi   Sakura Kazuki and Katou Ryu are lovers who have been meeting secretly for two years. Because they were once step siblings  and their parents had a messy divorce  they can't tell anyone. Will they ever be able to love freely?      Story 6: Double Face The Dangerous Classmate by Uchuuda Kai   It seems Kuroda has been caught in yet another dangerous situation! The boy; whom she considers rudest in her class  Yuuki; has locked the door to the sport supply closet..

Arisa is a former "yankee" (delinquent) who changes her ways to gain the attention of Ren  a studious boy. Her efforts finally pay off when Ren asks her out. She's supposed to be really happy now that she has a boyfriend  but for some reason she can't stop thinking about Issei  her next-door neighbor. What happens when Issei forces Arisa to be the lead vocalist for his band? Arisa has to decide: who does she really belong with?

1. Real Kiss by Miyasaka Kaho   The player  Fujikawa Mitsuki  likes to tease Haruna. One day their cell phones get switched. What will happen next?   (Also published in volume "Real Kiss" as the first story.)      2. Body Talk by Doumoto Nao   Yuuri falls in love at first sight with Shingo  a basketball player from another school. From that moment on  she pursues him relentlessly. How will their relationship work out?   (Also published in volume "Body Talk" as the first story.)      3. Atashi no Mannaka by Watanabe Shiho   In their school  dating was forbidden. Unknowingly  their secret kiss was seen. Now the principal's son is interested in her and takes matters into his own hands. Enmeshed in a dizzying spiral of desire and betrayal  where will she find love?      4. Uso to Koi no Hajimari by Shimaki Ako   Akane does a favor for her friend  Tomoko  by agreeing to show her childhood friend  Ken-kun  around Tokyo while pretending to be Tomoko! Will she be found out?      5. Aa Itoshi no Caramel Boy! by Kayono   Akira and Yuujirou  who are childhood friends  both love to surf  and both have an unrequited love for each other. This is because after Yuujirou kissed Akira a year ago  she slaps him! Now all he does is bully Akira and Akira has feelings of regret for slapping him!      6. Renai Sensou by Sugi Emiko   When Hiromi appears to be cheating on his girlfriend  she become furious and goes in search of a new boyfriend.

tags: Monsters|Animals|Romance|Mecha|Anthology|Virtual Reality|Video Games|Post-Apocalyptic|Magic|School Life|Slice of Life|Music|Full Color
description: Book compiling art and oneshots showcased at the "Moshimo  Tokyo" exhibition.  Contains a **different** oneshot by Inio Asano to the one titled "Moshimo  Tokyo".

The Rich and Powerful Sagiri Kaoru is taking Rin with him because Rin's father owes a one hundred million dollars to his father. Now  he can do whatever he wants with her. Can Rin show him real 'Love'?

A collection of naughty tales:      1. II40°C (Shigano Iori)   Yuiiko is dating Seki-sempai  but he's very protective of her. One night at a party her friends get him drunk so she can have fun  but she ends up sleeping with sexy DJ Ritsu! But she'll probably never see him again.      2) Sensational Love Lesson Ensnaring Melody (Murata Yuka)   Nana is a slave to her piano teacher  Satsuki. Satsuki has a split personality and only Nana sees the dark abusive side. Trapped in this relationship  can newcomer Tsukamoto help her break free?      3) I Want the Enchantment from Your Lips (Kuchibiru kara Toroketai) (Ayukawa Mio)   When Mifuyu was a child her brother told her kissing tastes like slugs  then made her kiss one! She's scarred for life  and serial dates to try to find a guy who she can kiss. But she's left a trail of broken hearts behind her and some of them are bitter…      4) The Love Textbook (Renai Kyoukasho) (Harushiro Amami)   Mimi Kawashima bought a sexy novel because the author has the same name as her beloved teacher  Shingo Toono. But the girl in the novel is named Mimi Kawashima too  and she has a very intimate relationship with her teacher…      5) I Want to Be Melted by You (Anata ni Toketai) (Watanabe Shiho)   Mebuki has a crush on Kasuga who goes to school across the street. She decides to confess to him  but Kasuga might not be the guy she thinks he is.      6) Pure Heart Urges (Junjou Shoudou) (Ibuki Kaede)   Hagimoto is in love with Kei  but he turns down every girl who confesses to him. So she decides to give a very physical confession  but will this ruin her chances with him forever?

- 1) Hoshi sae mo Nemuru Yoru by Miyuki Kitagawa   (The Banquet of Stars) Kana goes along with her friends on a trip for Golden Week  and they happen to visit an island that she had once seen a picture of the stars from.      - 2) No Panties Musume by Ako Shimaki   Roux comes from another country and lives with Ichiko  a smart player who fools around with all the girls. She doesn't wear panties because it's not a part of her culture…? And kissing is a casual greeting!?   (Also included in Boku ni Natta Watashi vol 2)      - 3) Tomodachi Shikkaku by Akane Kasuga   Riku  a cute girl  steals the attention of all the girls from a jealous guy. He doesn't see her as a real girl  but she still likes him.      - 4) Koi no Neiro by Shin Yumachi   (The Melody of Love) Chizeru believes that Kaitou hates her  and is therefore scared of him. Things just aren't what they seem on the surface though.      - 5) Yuuwaku Lesson Itashimasho by Hina Sakurada   (A Lesson in Temptation) Himawari has never had a boyfriend in all her seventeen years  and she has also rejected every person who has ever confessed to her. But when she meets her new  shining and beautiful student  Taiyou  all reason just flies out the window.      - 6) Platonic Porno by Komomo Yamada   The go-to girl for love advice has never had a boyfriend? Her geeky chameleon teacher finds out  but how? How can a chameleon teacher also be an erotic novelist?!   (Also included in Kojin Jugyou)

1-3) Ubatte Agemasu   The greatest  wholehearted  female loving wild animal story in the history of Cheese! Onizuka descends! A super sweet love story!      4) Akuma na Motokare (Devil Ex-Boyfriend)   Once a boy and a girl got separated. They knew it was something forbidden  but their lips met to be sure. "Does he love me?" The body is burnt  a passionate love.      5) Fake na Kanojo

- HeartBeat Mail   Uehara has always liked her classmate Kaji  who sits behind her  but cannot find the strength to talk to him. One day  Kaji left his phone on his desk so she decided to leave a note with her mail address on it. Soon  they started mailing each other; but what will come out of it?      - 7Kiss   Asano is transferring soon. However  7 days before she does  she sees Andou-sensei shoveling and she went up to him and kissed him  using her cellphone to take a picture of the scene! Using the picture  she blackmailed Andou-sensei into agreeing to kiss her every morning for seven days till the last day before she transfers…      - Love Lover (Part 2 is called Love Honey)   Due to Shinji and Misaki’s parents remarrying  Shinji now becomes Misaki’s younger stepbrother. But that isn’t the only thing  Shinji and Misaki are also a couple  with their parents support! One day  when they come home from school  they find out that their parents have won a prize for a trip! What will happen on that trip?! And what will Misaki’s insecurity lead to?!      - Ojousama no Okiniiri (Ojousama’s Favourite)   Ayaka is the daughter of a rich family and the madonna of her school – beautiful  intelligent  and graceful  she’s the perfect modern day princess. Ever since she was small  she has always been the target of kidnapping  which is why her father hired Masaki  a boy the same age as Ayaka  to be her bodyguard. With such a perfect bodyguard who’s good at everything he does  Ayaka feels pressured to become perfect as well. And then one day  her father informs her that she’s going to get married…

title_en: Special Public Security Fifth Division Third Mobile Assault Eighth Unit
description: Set in a part of Tokyo that has descended into a quagmire  the story follows Unit 8 of the 5th Special Public Security Section's 3rd Mobile Assault Division  popularly called "The Eighth " who don powered armor "Willwear" exoskeletons to counter the rise in crime.      Assistant inspector Asami Kazari is assigned to The Eighth with the task of assessing the unit's status and reporting it to her superiors. But her true goal is to rehabilitate this sloppy  haphazard  justice-less group.      Based on Production IMS' original TV anime series of the same title      See [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=17703) for Season 1 of the anime.   See [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18458) for Season 2 of the anime.

"Let me help you gain some dating experience." One day  rookie male teacher Moegi is approached by a male student seeking relationship advice. But what happens when Moegi himself has zero dating experience? A romantic comedy about "learning about love" by Akari Kajimoto.  [Part of the 10th anniversary Jump+ One-shot collection](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2019/)

**Junjou Romantica:**   Takahashi Misaki is suddenly having some unexpected and odd problems. What started as a need for some college entrance exam tutoring has somehow led him to being romanced by a suave older man who also happens to be his big brother's best friend. Confused by all of these brand new emotions  Misaki struggles to deal with his suddenly very odd life. And if that wasn’t enough  his suitor  Usami Akihiko  has plenty of issues of his own. A man-child who decorates his room in giant teddy bears and toys  Usami is a famous novelist who also writes steamy boys' love novels on the side. When Misaki cracks open one of these books and reads sentences like "Usami licks every inch of Misaki’s hot body"…well  let’s just say that all hell breaks loose.      **Junjou Egoist:**   Kamijou Hiroki is a broken man  consumed by unrequited love for his childhood friend  Usami Akihiko. Along comes Kusama Nowaki – whose name "Nowaki" means "typhoon" – an orphan working his way through life since middle school. Like the typhoon he is named for  he whirls into Hiroki's life and his heart  blowing all resistance away before him.      **Junjou Terrorist:**   As fate would have it  Miyagi Yoh – whom Hiroki is working for  as assistant professor – and Takatsuki Shinobu  a high school student  cross paths. Bits and pieces start to link together from the first two stories. That aside  Miyagi  who has a sad hidden past involving a relationship with a teacher  is faced with Shinobu  who just says whatever is on his mind. The wheel of destiny is beginning to turn once again…

In an age long lost to legend and myth. In an age where humans had still yet to establish a system of writing. It’s said that there existed a Magus in a country named Scarlet. It’s said that he imparted knowledge concerning language and writing  taught how to cultivate the lands  instructed the ways of raising animals  and brought about the gift—nay  the magic of fire. It’s said that he was a dauntless youth  a dragon clad in scarlet red scales  a person worshipped far and wide. It’s said that this man was the God of Civilization. Yet strangely  his name had been virtually wiped from the records. Therefore  he was simply referred to as— —The Magus of Genesis.

title_en: Watashi no Hara no Naka no Bakemono
description: ***Awaken the "malice" sleeping inside you.***  Chinatsu is a middle school girl who's an honor student and highly trusted by her teacher. She gets along with her friends  and she spends her days happily without hating anyone. However  on her period  Chinatsu realized it. That she hated her homeroom advisor  and she's extremely irritated by her surroundings. She had put a lid on her own feelings and pretended not to notice  but when she became aware of it  the "monster" inside of her begins to rampage and reveal her true nature.  (Source: Comic-Days)

Do good or go to hell. The conditions of his new curse seem simple enough for once-hopeful hoodlum Jeonji Kim. Or so it seems when his perky guardian angel shows up on his doorstep one day and heals his limp. But will simply going through the motions of helping people be enough to appease a petty god with a grudge?

title_en: Celebrating Christmas Once My Part-Time Shift Ends...!

description: A new teacher enters an all-girls high school and as he tours around he sees a female student sleeping in a classroom. When she wakes up  however  she suddenly kisses him…

title_en: Muda da to Tsuihou Sareta [Kyuutei Juui]  Kemono no Kuni ni Kou Taiguu de Manekareru ~Mori de Tasuketa Shinjuu to Kemomimi Bishoujo-tachi ni Mechakucha Dekiaisare Nagara Slow Life wo Tanoshinderu~
description: One day  veterinary doctor Zeke is suddenly fired by the king  leaving him with nowhere to go but at a loss. However  after helping a divine beast  he is invited to the beast kingdom with excellent treatment. After Zeke is banished  the kingdom begins to decline  but he begins living happily surrounded by cute animal-eared girls.  (Source: Bookwalker)
A little little love story.   Leave  an incurable illness.      A story about a man dealing with the issue of insecurity and abandonment. To leave and to be left behind  are they the same?

title_en: Boku to Kanojo no XXX - Bangaihen
description: This volume spinoff offers a new ending to the original series. Will Akira and Momoi switch back into each others bodies? Also included are a few one-shot stories.

tags: Romance|Comedy|Superhero|Magical Girls|Crossdressing|4-Koma|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Supernatural
description: Misuzu Haruno is a handsome high school girl with a secret identity—she is Burning X  a super warrior protecting the peace. She  however  wants to become cuter  like the beautiful super heroine she admires  Blue Wing. But the truth is  Blue Wing is actually Aoi Ootori  an effeminate boy from the class next door! Indeed  Blue Wing is *his* secret identity  but he isn't exactly thrilled about it  and wants to be stronger and manlier  just like his idol  Burning X.  This is a romantic comedy in which two people are unable to reveal their true identities to each other!

Mira attends a private school in England and finds out that the boy who appears in her dream since her childhood really exists. He's Radley Macchiavelli  a beautiful model. When the two finally meet  the boy is transported to a parallel world connected from one spiral ("Rasen"). Mira follows him to try to save him and is swallowed into the parallel world dominated by the mysterious Black King…

Hyakkaou Private Academy. An institution for the privileged with a very peculiar curriculum. You see  when you're the sons and daughters of the wealthiest of the wealthy  it's not athletic prowess or book smarts that keep you ahead. It's reading your opponent  the art of the deal. What better way to hone those skills than with a rigorous curriculum of gambling? At Hyakkaou Private Academy  the winners live like kings  and the losers are put through the wringer. But when Yumeko Jabami enrolls  she's gonna teach these kids what a high roller really looks like! ___ Placed 3rd in the 2nd Next Manga Awards (2016). ___ **Official English Volumes:** [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/kakegurui-compulsive-gambler)  **Original Concept:** [Dominium ~The Gambling Legend Of Extremely Colorful Girls~](http://ushimilk.web.fc2.com/index.html)
Help! Why is my blind date my 'ex'-boyfriend?!

title_en: The Story of How the Girl of My Dreams Was a Stalker
description: The story of how the girl of my dreams was a stalker.

title_en: Magia Baiser no Nakayoku (Imishin) shinai to Derarenai Heya?! (Doujinshi)
description: Leopard and Magia Sulphur have made Magia Baiser seriously mad and now they've been trapped in a room until they have OO. The only way they can escape is for the two to start 'getting along'. See for yourself how they'll get 'closer'.

After his K-pop debut dreams were shattered  former trainee Takumi returns home and discovers skateboarding. As he slowly begins moving forward with his life  Takumi starts to feel something new... The latest work from Yujiro Koyama!  [Part of the 10th anniversary Jump+ One-shot collection](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2019/)

title_en: Arknights: Rhodes Island's Records of Originium - Rhine Lab
description: Ifrit discovers an uninvited guest aboard Rhodes Island  a girl named Darya. Darya's small form casts a long shadow over Ifrit  Silence  and Saria as she conjures in them memories of a buried past.

I've always had a fascination with the occult; you might even call it my specialty. I've been brought in as a consultant on many supernatural and strange mysteries. But nothing could have prepared me for this house. It seemed so ordinary at first  except for that one room. It had no doors  no windows  and was tucked away  leaving anyone to think it was just a wall. I knew that there was something more to it. It shouldn't be there  it shouldn't exist  and yet…  Just what is this house  and what dark secrets does it hold? ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361390601088)

title_en: Tokusou Sentai Dekaranger the Movie: Full Blast Action
description: A criminal gang called the Gas Drinkers have transformed Planet Lesley into a dead world. To fight them  the Leslian Dekaranger Mary lends her assistance to Earth's Special Police  the six Dekarangers  to fight for peace! Special Police Dekaranger The Movie: Full Blast Action finally hits the pages in manga form!

title_en: Oshi no Bishoujo ni Kokuhaku sareru Hanashi
description: A yuri romcom manga where an otaku is confessed to by the pretty girl she declares as her oshi and they start dating.

A story of murder and violence  **"Unhinged"** follows Erika as she walks a path of vengeance. Seven years ago  Erika came home to find her husband murdered. Unable to find any other suspects  Erika was found guilty and spends most of a decade plotting her revenge from the inside of a cell. Once freed  she finds herself moving past the boundaries of *"respectable"* society and beyond the shackles of morality. Laws will be broken  lives will be lost  and  yes  there will be blood.   ---  **Note:** The series was cancelled by Lezhin after Season 1 (72 chapters+ Prologue). It has since resumed serialization on Comico.  ---  **Links:** - [Original Webtoon <RidiBooks>](https://ridibooks.com/books/3498015731)

tags: Award Winning|Action|Long Strip|Martial Arts|Adventure|Wuxia|Fantasy|Web Comic|Adaptation|Full Color
description: He stood at the pinnacle of the world. Surpassing all since birth in the art of the sword. But fate has left him crippled moments before reaching the apex. But the story continues and the legend will rise again…  --- - **Note:** 2nd Place in 15th Chinese Golden Dragon Manhua Awards

tags: Long Strip|Magical Girls|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Mystery|Full Color|Tragedy
description: The era of the anonymous hero has ended  and the world's protectors - the Magical Girls - now live their lives in near celebrity status. But it turns out these protectors are really school bullies in their everyday lives. One day  a new  never-before-seen Magical Girl appears with a proclamation of war against the original Magical Girls! With imagery reminiscent to your favorite planetary protectors  Miss Guillotine promises nostalgic visuals with a dark premise.  ---  **Links:** - [Alternative Raw (RidiBooks)](https://ridibooks.com/books/4419001974) - [Alternative Raw (Bomtoon)](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/penalty_gl) - [Alternative Raw (Comico)](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1112) - [Alternative Raw (Mr.Blue)](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000047956) - [Alternative Raw (Naver)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5075743) - [Alternative Raw (Kakao)](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=54468599) - [Official Japanese Translation (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/25387) - [Official Japanese Translation (Comico)](https://www.comico.jp/comic/7281) - [Official Japanese Translation (Lezhin)](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/_miss_guillotine) - [Official Korean Book (Aladin)](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=88806839) - [Official Korean Book (Yes24)](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/30296806)

A collection of drawings  concepts  comments  and ramblings by Akihito Tsukushi  author of Made in Abyss and Gears' Maiden.   It includes "behind the scenes" commentary to some of his works  as well as sneak peeks to some unpublished or future projects.

The official adaptation of the TYPE-MOON phenomenon that has become one of the most popular mobile games in the world! The year is 2016  and glitches found in humanity’s past threaten the sustainability of its future. The Chaldea Security Organization - tasked with preserving human history for as long and as strongly as possible - has developed a new method of time travel to repair these events  stabilizing humanity’s future. But when an unknown threat pushes mankind to the brink of extinction  young recruits Mash Kyrielight and Ritsuka Fujimaru find themselves at the helm of the rescue mission: Obtain the Holy Grail in a face off against fate itself …

Mitsuhiro  who works for a loan shark  hits a girl on his way home. With no sign of movement or pulse  it seems all is lost. But then she suddenly comes back to life and stays at Mitsuhiro's house! It seems the girl is not human  and it's her first time living on Earth. Mitsuhiro ends up teaching her about "human life"...

Initially started as short comedic segments at the end of main series chapters  this modern “school life” parody features popular characters as high school students and various Pillars as the academy’s teachers.

Monk Sanzang from the "Journey to the west" has time slipped to the present-day Korea.       She has lived her lifetime constantly fighting yokai but her most dangerous opponent turns out to be just one guy?!      On the orders of Buddha  Monk Sanzang and her companions pilgramaged the Western regions in search of his teachings.   Unlike Sun Wukong  Zhu Bajie  and Sha Wujing  who hoped to become gods in recognition of their contribution  rather than being tied down to the life of Buddhism  Sanzang wanted to remain in the human world and enjoy a new life as an ordinary human.      But as she was being dragged to Heaven by orders from the Buddha  she notices a strange tunnel leading to the human world in which she escapes into…      And the place where she fell is the Republic of Korea's Jeju Island!   And she meets a guy named Lee Hyun?!      The time-slipped Monk Sanzang a.k.a Hyeonjeong and the tsundere Lee Hyun's turbulent romance!

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Sexual Violence|Philosophical|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Yeon Woo possesses such a delicate appearance that he could be mistaken as a female student. However  he has a secret crush on the school idol  Kang Haesol. But the shy and timid Yeon Woo has never said a word to her…  --- **Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5483716)  [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=752532)  **Official Translations:** * [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/yanyudechunqing/list?title_no=1786&page=1) * [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romance/yeonwoo/list?title_no=2335&page=1)

I suddenly became a couple with my childhood friend one day?! Two model students 'Yoon Sae' and 'Kim Jaeha' have created an alliance in order to reassure their controlling parents and live freely. To avoid getting caught  they start a fake relationship!

This is a story about Kumura  a student at Grape Academy  who cooks for his Snorlax  who has gourmet tastes. The delicious-looking original dishes drawn by the artist Taku Kuwabara are especially noteworthy!

title_en: Hero x Demon King x Villain
description: A noble <Hero> who punishes evil while under the protection of gods. A demon born with tremendous demonic powers  is the last surviving <Demon King>. And I’m an experienced third-rate <Villiain> that roams around the land.  I want my Villain’s life to be over. I was going to retire and spend the rest of my life in comfort but the child I picked up by accident turned out to be the demon king and the hero is chasing me to "repay the favor". My comfortable retirement years are ruined!  The 99 demons that guard the Villain ? Prepare to die… Yes  may God bless you  now die!

Tokyo  1968: between political turmoil and student riots N  a man with a criminal past   casually meets T  a young comedian intent on making a career in the film industry.  T wants to shoot "Unlucky Young Men"  a chronicle of a disillusioned Japanese youth ready to do anything to realize their dreams; to finance the film   the two begin to plan attacking a van carrying 300 million yen...

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Girls' Love|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Full Color
description: University student Kang Ji-ho  accidentally saw Seon Woo-hui's breasts at a drinking party  and avoids her because she couldn't resist the desire to see them again.   "Just give it to me straight. Why are you avoiding me?"  “…If I tell you straight up  won’t you get angry?”  "No. If you don't tell me  I'll kill you."   I-I mean...  “When I look at you… I keep wanting to see your boobs…”   At first  she thought it was a joke. But when she realized it wasn’t  Woo-hui decided to pull a mean prank.   "Shall I show you my boobs?"  “…Do you want to touch it?”

Before she died  Taga Reiji's mother made arrangements to ensure her son would not be alone. What Taga did not know about these "arrangements" was that he would be enrolled in a special class at the school his mother founded where prospective fiance candidates would all vie for his hand in marriage. How will Taga's new life of constantly being surrounded by girls unfold and will he be able to choose just one?

One day  a four-year-old boy came to a sudden realization: the world is not fair. Eighty percent of the world's population wield special abilities  known as "quirks " which have given many the power to make their childhood dreams of becoming a superhero a reality. Unfortunately  Izuku Midoriya was one of the few born without a quirk  suffering from discrimination because of it. Yet  he refuses to give up on his dream of becoming a hero; determined to do the impossible  Izuku sets his sights on the elite hero training academy  UA High.      However  everything changes after a chance meeting with the number one hero and Izuku's idol  All Might. Discovering that his dream is not a dead end  the powerless boy undergoes special training  working harder than ever before. Eventually  this leads to him inheriting All Might's power  and with his newfound abilities  gets into his school of choice  beginning his grueling journey to become the successor of the best hero on the planet. ___ **Note: Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series  fan translations of My Hero Academia are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/my-hero-academia)  with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MANGA Plus for free at the link below.**

_A shooting star grants a zoo's favorite penguin's wish  turning him human?!_  Subaru  a flirtatious emperor penguin  wished to meet his soulmate. When a shooting star streaked across the sky  he transformed into a handsome man in the nude! He is then taken in with the stoic polar bear Kai  who also turned human. While Subaru is confused by Kai's lack of personal space  the two started rooming together with the zookeeper's support. ☆  Kai is now a 19-year-old college student. Subaru  on the other hand  works as a host. After showing what he can do as the guy who brought the most bank to the zoo  a drunken Subaru returns home and Kai helps him to bed. When Subaru teases Kai about his virginity  Kai pushes him down saying "teach me"?!  The Arctic vs the Antarctic! A spectacular ★ transformation on a starry night! A novel romance between a clingy polar bear and a lonely penguin! ♡

“Please be my friend.” Suzu  a young man searching for his missing brother  gets tangled up with Yakuza  but ends up being saved by Hana  a mysterious and beautiful boy. Suzu works with Hana to find his younger brother  but he almost gets drawn to the innocent looking Hana… Is this friendship? Obsession? Or maybe… love? A pure and dangerous crime love story between a clumsy young man and a handsome yakuza boy!

Lin Tian is stranded on a mysterious island  only to discover it’s filled with goddesses from countless worlds—and deadly foes like demon kings and evil gods. By binding with powerful beings like Yuki-Onna  he gains ice powers; from Shiranui  he commands fire; and with Medusa  he unlocks petrifying might. Wielding countless divine artifacts and abilities  Lin Tian slays demon kings  cuts down evil gods  and rises as the island’s supreme ruler—founding a paradise for gods and legends alike!
Originally published in *Sunday mini* Vol. 69  a supplement to *Shounen Sunday S*'s June 2025 Issue.

Human beings have formed societies and created various civilizations on Earth.  At the same time  there have always been strange  unknowable entities that have slipped through the cracks  avoided the light of civilization  and festered in the shadows—gathering stagnation and decay.  Though born from human emotions and will  these entities were never understood  never named  and even now continue to lurk and squirm in the darkness of modern society.  They are information-based lifeforms.  Humanity calls them “phantoms.”  The most terrifying urban legend seminar—now in session!
The Haiboshi family's line of work is assassination. Takatori  their princess  picks up a boy named Raika who swore to dedicate everything.

Johan Kim is an ordinary 19 year old who loves basketball and hanging out with friends though there is one unique thing about him  his family are all exorcists and demons are real. But they have been hiding this from Johan his entire life. When his parents die suddenly and his grandpa confesses the truth to Yono he goes running and gets attacked by demons. Now that Johan has realized this other world  will he accept his destiny and fight for humanity to ignore and go back to living his normal life.

With the constant development of technology on Earth  people no longer need to worship the weather gods. Because of this  the rain god  Yushi’s  power starts disappearing. He decides to venture onto Earth under the name “Shiyu” in order to restore his power. Soon scouted by an evil boss into a near-bankrupt entertainment company. Shiyu is sent to participate in the show “I am an idol.” With absolutely zero common sense he somehow still manages to gain popularity and debut in the group SWEN alongside three other members. Overtime  Shiyu comes to discover that his groupmate  Yang Dongjun  and Zhong Yun were also gods who came to the world to work and earn faith…
Renge Kurosaki is your regular run-of-the-mill gal  but she hides a secret that she shares only with our lowly protagonist Yashiro: she loves card games.

In a world where magic has become a myth  Erthea is racing against time before it succumbs to darkness. A century after the defeat of the Titan  the source of magic and balance  four young heroes - Gem  Nexo  Rubi  and Atoū - embark on a desperate mission. They must deliver the Destiny Gems  created by ancient heroes  before they expire. These gems grant extraordinary powers and contain the souls of the heroes. However  Nickel Krants  a once-revered hero turned powerful antagonist  seeks to steal the gems to resurrect his lost friends. The protagonists will face rival cults  demons  and adversities. Guided by the mysterious cosmic entity Theo  they must overcome their limitations and unite to save Erthea. Can they fulfill their mission before time runs out?

A girl who is troubled by her father's domestic violence consults with the class president  who is known as a “genius at resolving problems”. She plans to learn real mixed martial arts and fight her father  but…!

"Wanting to forget something that had happened  Hikaru jumps off a building. Right before he hits the ground  a monster in a human shape breaks his fall. The creature's frightful appearance makes Hikaru cower  but as it continues to stay by his side without saying a word  Hikaru starts to question what its motives are...  A deeply moving BL that resonates with the heartbreaking feeling of being left behind."

tags: Ghosts|Long Strip|Romance|Boys' Love|Drama|School Life|Fantasy|Web Comic|Supernatural|Mystery|Full Color
description: On a pitch-black night  corporate wage slave Qi Yan sees his first love — the one that had passed 10 years before. After quite a bit of pestering and persuasion  he finds himself forced into the miserable lifestyle of working during the day and investigating at the night. The topic of the investigation? Finding out who the culprit is. Can the top who had passed years before successfully manage to be resurrected?

Ren Fujisawa could not find a place in her hometown or in Tokyo where the pieces of her identity fit together. She was about to give up on everything  when the person who appeared in front of her was the person she missed the most in the world  the person she wanted to see more than anything else in the world  the person she wanted to see so badly that she would die.  A promising  delicately and emotionally depicted human story that will sink deep into your heart  especially in this time when everyone is lonely.

title_en: The Secret Ingredient Is a Slightly Sweet Ulterior Motive
description: A slow-paced love story about a popular barista and a cross-dresser streamer  two people with a secret. I finally meet you  you're my favorite! Coffee shop worker Hirayama Shun is so handsome that customers praise him every day. However  he is fed up with being treated with contempt by a regular customer  Mao Nakadai. Then  one day  he meets MAO  a beautiful streamer girl on a video site and falls in love at first sight. He is actually an idol otaku  and when he watches her previous videos  he discovers that he is a cross-dressing guy. Although he is supposed to be straight  Shun is perplexed by his crush on MAO  even though he knows she is the same sex as him. He then discovers that MAO has similar characteristics to Nakadai  the regular customer...!

In the distant future  a new life form called Houseki (gems) are born. The 28 Houseki must fight against the moon dwellers who want to attack them and turn them into decorations  thus each gem is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the moon dwellers  Phos is a gem who is given no assignment until the gems' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.

1. Cry for the Moon 2. Pink for Tear 3. Ano Ko to Nakayoku Naru Houhou 4. Idol Yametara Shitai Koto (What I Want to Do Now That I'm No Longer an Idol) 5. Oujisama tte Yobanaide 6. Shirotae-sama  Himitsu desu yo 7. Futaribeya: Aozora ni Shiro Ribbon (Futaribeya: White Ribbon Against the Blue Sky) 8. Futaribeya: Aozora ni Shiro Ribbon (Futaribeya: White Ribbon Against the Blue Sky) 9. Futaribeya: Ashita Me ga Sametara (Futaribeya: Tomorrow  When I Wake Up...)

Mako  a high school girl who has been abandoned by her father who disappeared  is forced to resort to papa-katsu (dating a sugar-daddy) to survive. On her first night  while she is taking a shower after finishing her business  her sugar-daddy is killed by a hitman  and he is about to kill Mako as well  but the hitman seems to recognize her somehow. Caught in a desperate situation  Mako has one last chance! Selling flattery in order to survive!

title_en: Sasuga ni Bani Joso wa Bureki ga Kakaru Haruto-kun
description: Haruto-kun’s fine with dressing up cute—until the bunny suit shows up. Some outfits are just too much  even for him!

Spin-off story of 14-sai no Koi  featuring Aoi Shiki (a lesbian side character in an unrequited love with the FMC of the main story) and a new character  Iori Tachibana  in their 3rd year of middle school.

After an accident  the high school student Tanaka began being able to see ghosts. One day  Tanaka visited the school infirmary because he was feeling poorly  but the school nurse  Saejima-sensei  tells him a shocking fact!? A new and exciting horrorcom!
A autobiography about the creation of Getter Robo      Those chapters were included in Getter Robo Go Getter Saga edition and Getter Robo 40 Shuunenkinen Gengaten

title_en: My Virtual God is a Teenage Girl
tags: Reincarnation|Action|Long Strip|Comedy|Survival|Video Games|Drama|School Life|Fantasy|Delinquents|Web Comic|Full Color
description: I just thought life was unlucky  but it turned out that a high school girl was manipulating my life and bullying me
A series where a recently impoverished young lady will receive a yen for every like the comic gets on twitter each day.  Now rebooted!

[**Series is cancelled due to author's death**](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-02-27/though-you-may-burn-to-ash-manga-kakashi-oniyazu-passes-away/.143962)      For his beloved younger sister's treatment  Shinomiya Ryouma is working frantically to raise a billion yen while going to high school. One day  a mysterious woman asks him  "Can you put your life on the line for what you desire?" and after receiving a ticket from her  an accident befalls him! When he wakes up  he finds he's turned into a girl and what's more  he's participating in a "game" where a win means he can reverse his fate but a loss means he'll die instantly!

title_en: The Forbidden Lust of a Frigid Girl
tags: Psychological|Long Strip|Romance|Self-Published|Girls' Love|Drama|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color|Gyaru
description: Some people escape from reality by playing video games or drinking alcohol. For June  22-year-old asocial girl  it’s by exploring adult websites every time she finds herself alone. Despite doing her best in her love relationship(s)  she is unable to open up about her fantasies and desires which leads her to sabotage all of them. One day  she meets a beautiful and elegant co-worker named Poppy. Suddenly her intimate world is disturbed and she will have to overcome her fears… For the best or for the worst!

title_en: Kiwamete Goumantaru Akuyaku Kizoku no Shogyou
description: He was reincarnated as Luke Wizalia Gilbert  a hated villainous noble who  due to his overwhelming talent  would eventually be defeated by the protagonist in a "serves you right" moment. The only way to avoid this disastrous end is... "hard work"!! By defying fate  Luke gradually captivates the beautiful and talented daughters of prestigious families  and even attracts shadowy figures with hidden powers who were never meant to be involved  as well as the heroine who was supposed to side with the protagonist...  [Official English LN](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/the-misdeeds-of-an-extremely-arrogant-villain-aristocrat-light-novel/)

A short Matsumoto Taiyou story about a kid pretending to be a certain doctor. Produced in cooperation with Tezuka Productions (IP holders for Black Jack). First appeared in "The DNA of Manga"  a sort of tribute book to Tezuka Osamu.

tags: Action|Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Drama|Medical|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Adaptation|Full Color
description: The main character  Park Si-on  suffers from autism and savant syndrome. With his innate genius like two sides of the same coin  he enters a pediatric surgery resident at a university hospital. The prejudice of being a doctor with autism and the battle for power in the hospital are getting more and more dangerous...! Will I ever be able to become a real doctor?  ---  - Based on 2013 K-drama of the same name

title_en: The Hero Costume Can't Be Washed
description: This season's top hero Kabuto is so swamped with non-stop monster-slaying that he can't even find time to wash his suit - and boy  does it reek! Watch him struggle to squeeze some free time into his packed schedule...  [Part of the 10th anniversary Jump+ One-shot collection](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2019/)

title_en: Sono Me de Shikkari Daite oke
description: Ousuke Akiyoshi is a young model with no motivation. Even after being chosen for a special feature by an extremely popular photographer  Shogo Nowaki  he doesn't seem to care. However  on the day of the shoot  Shogo tells Ousuke that he's not beautiful anymore. Filled with anger  Ousuke goes to his hotel and confronts him  but it leads to a very different situation. Shogo's penetrating eyes reveal Ousuke's true self and warm his cold heart.

title_en: Hidan no Aria - G no Ketsuzoku
description: チーム・バスカービルのアリアたちメンバーは、襲撃を受け壊滅させられてしまう…。その襲撃犯の正体はキンジを「お兄ちゃん」と呼ぶ、ジーフォースを名乗る少女だった！ 「お兄ちゃんに近づく女は——全殺しだよ」

There are many perils in this desert world. Countries war and enslave  goblins prey on humans  monsters and magic run amok  and — most critically — wells run dry. Those desperate for water may undertake an ancient water prayer ritual  a grueling journey to beg the aid of Kahaku  the god of water. These are the various stories of people from all walks of life  each driven by their need to survive in that world and save the ones they love. Sometimes  these desperate souls cross paths with a pair of travelers  En and Jinghua  who help them on their journey.      A series of interconnected oneshots  each volume with a different title.      Volume 1: Kishibe no Uta   Volume 2: Kumo o Koroshita Otoko   Volume 3: Touzoku no Mizusashi   Volume 4: Akumujou no Aruji   Volume 5: Tabibito no Ki   Volume 6: Kageboushi-tachi no Shima   Volume 7: Kita no Ouji to Minami no Sakana   Volume 8: Kareno no Hanayome   Volume 9: Tsukikage no Choujou Volume 10:  Suna no Shita no Shirabe

title_en: Kamen Rider SD: Legend of the Stormy Age
description: In the wasteland left behind after a great battle between good and evil  a new enemy arises. Ten warriors must gather to fight Grand Shocker.
The story of a girl with low polygon count
A doormat of a realtor who's not over his last breakup got blackmailed by a foul-mouthed young female mangaka who ran away from home.    Put them under one roof and this is probably what you'd get.
Daily life of a group of foreigners working for a game company in Japan.

High school girl Kousaka Kako's life is turned upside down when two uninvited guests show up on her doorstep; Mirai  a self-proclaimed girl from the future  and Nozomi  who is supposedly Mirai and Kako's child.

title_en: "SHOPSKILL" Sae Areba  Dungeon ka Sita Sekaidemo Rakusyou da ~Hakugai Sareta Shounen no Saikyou Zamaa Life~
description: High school student Boji Nichiro is isolated from the rest of the world due to fierce bullying. One day  however  the world is transformed by the "dungeonisation" phenomenon! In the midst of the chaos  Nichiro awakens the unique skill "Shop". It was an out-of-the-box skill that allowed him to buy everything from food and daily necessities to unrealistic items!

A middle-aged detective  Eiji Kirisame (40)  meets a strange high school girl at the scene of a certain crime. She doesn't speak a word  but she helps solve the case using her drawings. However  suddenly this middle-aged detective is getting a marriage proposal from this girl!

Seiji Tajima is a single  forty-something shop owner who's close friends with police officer Shin Nakamoto. Shin  who's just been assigned a patrol in Seiji's neighborhood  has known the older man since he was in high school – back when Seiji himself worked in the police force. Shin has harbored a crush on Seiji for years  but he has convinced himself that their relationship is as good as it gets—until one day out of the blue  Seiji casually mentions the possibility of trying his luck with men… His simmering feelings suddenly brought to the boil  Shin shoves Seiji up against the wall…

Black Jack is an "unregistered" doctor with a clouded  mysterious past. He works with his little assistant Pinoko (who has a massive crush on the doctor)  dealing with medical cases not very well known  which can be strange  dangerous  or not known at all. But he is a genius  and can save almost any of his patients' lives (as long as they have the money for it)  and is known to many around the world  especially to those of medicine and science. He's a man of science himself  and does not believe much until he has seen it  yet it is many times he is surprised by love and nature often overpowering the science he bases his life in.    Out of a total of 243 chapters chapter 113.5: 'U-18 Knew' was released in a Weekly Shonen Champion special issue and thos it's unnumbered. Also  11 chapters were not included in the Vertical English release  out of those 11 chapters: 3 were exclusively Included in the hardcover editions of volumes 1-3  and 5 of them are labeled as [Sealed](http://tezukainenglish.com/wp/?page_id=573) meaning they have been excluded from almost every collected release because they were controversial or Osamu wasn't happy with them.  --- - **Won the 1st Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 1977  which it shared with Tezuka's other serial  Three-Eyed One** - **Won the 4th Japan Cartoonists Association Special Excellence Award in 1975** --- **Volumes 151-168  366 and 367  370 and 371 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**  --- ### Links * alternative official raw: [Kodansha](https://kc.kodansha.co.jp/title?code=1000005202) * new edition: [Akita Shoten](https://www.akitashoten.co.jp/series/1828) * complete edition: [Fukkan](https://www.fukkan.com/fk/CartSearchDetail?i_no=68320833)
Mio and Subaru live together in a small apartment avoiding attention. While they masquerade as siblings with an age gap  Subaru holds a secret.

title_en: Saikyou no Maou ni Kitaerareta Yuusha  Isekai Kikansha-tachi no Gakuen de Musou Suru
description: Without possessing the unique skill blessed by the goddess  Kujou Kyouya failed to save the world. He was ridiculed as a "failed hero" at the interdimensional-level academy where returned heroes who had saved many worlds gathered. However  he became the strongest and most unique hero  having trained for 30 000 years in another world with the most evil demon king  Felice  who has destroyed 3 000 worlds! Now Kyouya's unique skill is so powerful that he cannot even be defeated by the strongest heroes! ___ **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58212)   [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/1299578/vol_no/001)
A high school assassin fails at her job for the first time. The cause:  the target was too handsome...?!

One day out of boredom  Tanaka decided to give her classmates nicknames based on their quirks. Her friend Kikuchi became "Ota" for her nerdy interests and her other friend Saginomiya became "Robo" because of her expressionless face. In retaliation  her friends decided to name Tanaka "Baka".
After the end of the Tournament of Power  everyone has returned to their lives when suddenly a wandering traveler from another dimension appears in Universe 7...

11-year-old Tsubasa Ohzora transfers to his new school where he quickly becomes the star of the school's soccer team. His Brazilian coach  Roberto Hongo  notices the potential of the young athlete and soon offers him a chance to come with him to Brazil. Young Tsubasa trains more and more and is with each passing game more confident in his abilities. Old enemies become his friends and the World Cup seems closer and closer for him.  --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media

title_en: Nurudenohana High School Lotion Sumo Club
description: Some say there are over 50 million participants in this national sport that needs no introduction - "Lotion Sumo." Asato Mizu brings you this classic coming-of-age sports story about young girls covered in sweat  tears  and lotion!  [Part of the 10th anniversary Jump+ One-shot collection](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2019/)

We were on the way home from school one day when she suddenly offered me a drink from her tea. The perfect chance for an indrect kiss! But wait... is there some sort of hidden motive here? Is she serious or just messing with me? I can't tell but I really wanna sip...

<<Honorable Mention>>Draw the game! Two major brands collaborate for a manga competition! Jump and top game publisher Ubisoft team up for a new manga competition! Four of Ubisoft's biggest games: Assassin's Creed  Watch Dogs  The Division and Far Cry are used as source material. Here are the 5 award-winning works! [Source: MangaUpdates]

At the end of the 21st century  humans have made great advancements in technology and were able to create a giant energy source to power that technology. However  this new source of energy overloaded and turned into a more devastating force than nuclear weapons. The catastrophe wiped out the majority of human civilization and those who survived lived in terror of the anarchy that took over.      Hagakure Kakugo comes from a secret family that has protected people for generations from powerful organizations and evil from taking over. They are only awoken in time of need and it has been decades since Kakugo was conscious. His body had been heavily modified by fusing it with metals to enhance both his offense and defense. He uses an armor called the Exoskull that attaches to him to greatly boost his already superhuman power. Thus begins a story about a young man and his armor’s journey through hell.

Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".      The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.

18 years ago  a prophecy emerged that a boy with a black ring  deemed inferior  would rewrite the survival rules of the world of the gifted. The only remaining descendant of the “Divine-Tier” status  Shannon  wears a black ring and lives as an inferior being in the filthy exile zone. However  his peaceful life is shattered when his identity is exposed  and the top-tier forces  seeing him as a threat  send out an assassination squad to kill Shannon. Five gifted individuals  who have existed since childhood to protect Shannon  are summoned at the same time. They rush to the exile zone to protect the last descendant of the “Divine-Tier” status  and a battle among the “rings” is about to ignite!
A series of slice-of-life 4koma strips featuring the characters from the popular mobile game Twisted Wonderland.

title_en: Disney Twisted Wonderland: The Comic—Episode of Octavinelle
description: From MangaUpdates:  Stranded in the world of Twisted Wonderland  Yu must brave a magical school filled with ghosts  monsters  and uncooperative students!  Yu is on his way to deliver food from his family’s restaurant when he’s whisked away to the world of Twisted Wonderland. Now enrolled in the magical school known as Night Raven College  Yu encounters a strange scenario—his fellow students are scoring too well on their exams! But there couldn’t be anything sinister behind great test scores  could there?

title_en: Saishin Game Ki wo Katte Agerarenai Okaa-san (Fan Colored)
Zenbu Kimi no Sei - Otoko ni mo Onna ni mo Naru Couple ga Onsen Ryokou no Tsumori de LoveHo ni Iku Hanashi (Doujinshi)
description: Officially released by the author of "[Zenbu Kimi no Sei](https://mangadex.org/title/82476383-e6a9-41a7-b98c-87cc8be9efbb/zenbu-kimi-no-sei)" at Winter Comiket 2023.  Alternative Online Retail: [Comic Seymour](https://www.cmoa.jp/title/285162/vol/1/)
Within a certain galaxy in a certain universe  within a certain planet in a certain galaxy  a girl is alone on her birthday.

Kurumi  the dumb android.   Chiaki  her guardian with a few screws loose.   Sakina  calm  composed  and easily amused.   Shiyuki  the only sane(?) girl.      Follow their exciting high school life as they tinker with and pamper Kurumi  as well as talk about nothing in particular.

A teacher and student romance.      Amai Yayoi  16 years old.    A high school girl who puts her heart into expressing her love for Shiota-sensei.      Shiota Tsuguharu  29 years old.   A high school teacher who is steadily beginning to accept Amai-chan.

title_en: I Saw the Cool Beauty Famous for Being an Iron Wall Secretly Going Out with Someone
description: The class's no. 1 most beautiful girl gets the tables turned on her by a plain girl.  | Namespace | Tags | | :- | :- | | female | big breasts  females only  fingering  yuri |  **Link:** - Defunct Official Raw - [X (Formerly Twitter)](https://twitter.com/kota2comic/status/1587357489724432389) - [Fantia (R18 extras)](https://fantia.jp/posts/1561162)

tags: Genderswap|Action|Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|Martial Arts|Drama|School Life|Fantasy|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: A violent and muscular boy who dreams of becoming a national champion  unexpectedly turns into a cute girl  how will “she” achieve “her” dreams?      [Official Chinese version](https://m.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/change/list?title_no=1259)   [Official Indonesian Version](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/change/list?title_no=1194)

title_en: Maou no Musume wa Yasashi Sugiru!!
description: The strongest Demon King  Ahriman  rules every part of the world. However  he had to stop his world conquest all of a sudden. What is the unexpected reason behind this...?

The life of a single-minded tengu bride and a lonely young man living together on the premise of marriage!  Kotaro  a lonely young man who has returned to his hometown for some reason  is reunited with Hime  a tengu girl  at Mt. Hime says that they must get married! A one-sided (?) marriage is assumed. Living together with a tengu is full of surprises! ___ **Note:** The series is authored by Nanao Tomo  which is an alias of Tsukizuki Yoshi.
The setting is 19th-century England. Day by day  bored young nobles come up with a certain "game" involving their maids.  A Victorian romance brought to you by a promising new author!!

When entering high school  Sakai Momone applied to the art course by mistake. She has to study overtime to keep up. There she meets new friends and learns to appreciate art.      [4-koma of the year 2017](http://4oty.net/2017/award) (new publications)   [Tsugi ni kuru manga 2018](http://tsugimanga.jp/nominate/2018/comics/) (nomination)

Yasokawa Akito  a high schooler social media influencer  discovered that his classmate  Maki Naofumi  a yankee  was uploading photos of the sweets he had made  onto social media. Akito's influencer spirit is ignited  and he manages to persuade Maki  who is stubborn about not wanting anyone to find out  to shoot a video and publish it. Maki is cool when making sweets  and his face is cute when he gets embarrassed when Akito compliments him. Akito is happy to discover this unexpected side of Maki  but each time Maki releases a video  he gains new fans  and Akito becomes increasingly possessive of him even though they are friends.One day  he sees Maki coming out of a hotel room with a guy...?!

Made in Abyss: Official Anthology is a compendium of short comics set in the same world and with the same characters from Made in Abyss.   It's a parallel series from the same publisher  Takeshobo  and with Akihito Tsukushi's blessing  that gathers the work of multiple guest professional artists to tell non-canon stories  with some of them being serious  while others are totally silly or humorous.    It has been published on Webcomic Gamma  alongside with Made in Abyss  since 2017.

title_en: Sentai Red: Isekai de Boukensha ni Naru
description: In the final battle against the evil Exterminators  Asagaki Tougo  a power ranger  traded his life for the enemy's. It seemed like everything was over  but suddenly he found himself in another world! He becomes an adventurer  transforming into Kizuna Red  and continues fighting to save people in trouble!

title_en: Datsuraku Shita Kizokuke ni Hirowaretanode Ongaeshi de Hukkou Sasemasu
description: Leon  a former abandoned child taken in by a fallen noble family ruined by deceitful aristocrats  determined to repay the love and kindness shown to him by his new family  vows to restore their household.  Using his talent for magic  he enrolls in a magic academy with the goal of becoming a great mage.  While he is blessed with like-minded friends  worthy rivals  and dependable mentors  he also faces many formidable figures—such as arrogant nobles who abuse their status  and a suspicious second prince of the kingdom hiding something beneath the surface. Academy life turns out to be far more chaotic and eventful than he ever imagined!  A heartfelt tale of a kind-hearted boy rising through the ranks with the power he’s honed—this full-fledged magical academy fantasy novel finally gets its long-awaited manga adaptation!

title_en: Kokou no Ou to Hidamari no Hanayome ga Saikou no Fuufu ni Naru made
description: Wilfred  known as the "Martial Tyrant " is a king feared by his subjects. Alicia  a princess from a humble background  is married to King Wilfred in a political arrangement. Alicia is afraid of the intimidating Wilfred at first  but over time  she begins to notice his hidden  more gentle side. In return  Alicia's kind and innocent personality also touches Wilfred's heart… This is a story of a marriage of opposites  where a solitary king discovers love with a sunny princess and become the happiest couple in the world!
高校1年生な橙田旭には、隣に住む同い年の幼なじみがいる。彼の名前は紫ノ宮和音、旭にとって唯一の推しで大天使で世界一尊い存在。可愛くて時にかっこいい…そんな和音がたまらなく大好きな旭のハピネスコメディー!

A mysterious stranger rides into town.
