The peaceful village of Gang-Ho is disturbed when Yongbi  a seemingly foolish bounty hunter  comes to town looking to claim the bounty for the leader of Gang-Ho's deadliest clan of assassins. Will Yongbi collect the bounty unscathed  or will he fall victim to a vengeful pack of assassins hell-bent on retribution for their captured leader?

6 strangers as they wake up with no memory of the past 3 months in a high-end tech facility. After converging in the cafeteria  a man of high authority tells them they all have one goal: "Find the culprit among you. A person too dangerous to leave and has the potential to render everything we’ve achieved as a species moot if allowed to roam free."  No cameras  no outside help  only human intuition and these strange abilities called peculiarities. The witch hunt has begun  but that doesn’t mean there’s no fun!
Maximum Cuteness! A heartfelt UMA comedy that'll change your life!!!
Atagoal Monogatari takes place in a fantasy world where humans and cats can talk to each other. The story revolves around the adventures of Hideyoshi  a big young cat  and his friends.

Despite being born in a family who specialise in Sichuan cuisine  and having superior cooking talent  Mo Ting is unable to hold a knife because of his injured hand. But before he can fall down from his status  it appeared a girl who called him “Dragon Chef” and without explanation  dragged him to a celestial realm called “Ling Lang”… From then on  the ability to cross both world of delicious cooking is given to him. This addicting story released at midnight will be opened to you!

tags: Award Winning|Action|Comedy|Sports|Martial Arts|Drama|School Life|Slice of Life
description: The story centers on first-year high school student Tatsuya Yoigoshi  a former ace soccer player who dislikes sports. He gets invited to join the team for an Indian contact sport called Kabaddi. He scoffs at the idea at first but becomes interested after watching a kabaddi practice.  Won the 70th Shougakukan Manga Award.

Izumi Wakakusa is a renowned actress obsessed with beauty. When an hideous mark shows up on her face she suddenly disappears and gives birth to a little girl: Sakura.      Sakura is always pampered and overprotected by her mother  until the day that she discovers why she was born.      NOTE:   The Scanlation comes from the 4 volume Bunko version.

title_en: Ponkotsu Skill Shika Tsukaenai Akuyaku Majo dakedo  Tame Shita Paripi na Slime Tachi to Tsuyoku Ikimasu!
description: One day  Elle  a village girl who remembers her previous life  realizes that she is a villainous witch in an Otome game. In the game  she is supposed to be a strong character  but for some reason  all that the young Elle awakens with are subtle skills! Still--  "Leave it to a little girl  that's what she is!"  Not wanting to be a villain  Elle aims for a fun slow life at a diner in town with the crispy slimes she has tamed with her skills! The events outside of the scenario with the characters to be captured and the events of the demon attack are no problem as long as there is a little girl and slimes! With her own ideas and utilizing her clunky skills  the villainous witch will live strongly today!

"In the face of justice  there are no taboos that should not be violated."  In the near future  humanity is in the depths of fear due to the onslaught of monsters. To protect world peace  the united Cross Rangers will enforce justice today! ...Or so it was supposed to be. Cross Red  also known as Akama Retsuo  is a man who is passionate about justice. With an overflowing sense of justice  he commits a taboo one night with Cross Pink. And so begins the days of muddy  terrifying  immoral and ruinous...!

Manga adaptation of the blockbuster *New Sword World RPG Replay Collection* that follows the adventuring party Heppokos.The 2nd volume  subtitled “Fresh off the Press” (“できたて”)  takes place before the 1st.

The life of a Japanese salaryman or OL (office lady) can be a thoroughly depressing one. Waking up early  working all day  staying out late for (mandatory) drinks with clients and coworkers  and then catching a few hours of sleep if you’re lucky  only to repeat it again and again and again.  This is the story of a "Single OL" and her pitiful lifestyle. ___ **Note:** Volume 5 is set as the final volume because Volume 6 contains entirely extra episodes.

title_en: Jikka kara Okurarete Kita Dekai Maid-san
Super Robot Wars α THE STORY: The Day the Dragon Died + Getter Robo Zan!!
description: The manga depicts the Mazinger Z and Getter Robo mecha battling it out after an elaborate ruse by their enemies caused them to oppose each other. At the same time  mysterious new pilot recruits for the Photon Power Lab are hiding a dangerous secret.

title_en: The Other Side of a Smile
description: In a quiet corner of Seiryou High School  a boy with many friends and a girl with none cross paths.

title_en: I Refuse an Ending Where My Mother Dies!
description: The moment I blew out the candles on my 7th birthday cake—  I realized I had reincarnated into the world of a novel. And not just as anyone  but as the daughter of the main characters! The problem is…  [The heroine ■ □ dies  and the male leads… cause the world to end?]  So  in the side stories  my mother dies and my fathers cause the apocalypse? Is this for real…?  ‘No way. I’ll stop it no matter what!’  I’m a brave seven-year-old now! So  I set out to lead my fathers and twist the original story by any means possible.  “You know what? You and I are destined to fall in love someday.”  I’m busy enough trying to save my mother  so who the heck are you?  After successfully twisting the original plot  I was planning to finally enjoy my youth  but —  “A son-in-law? Sure. I’ll accept anyone  as long as they meet one condition.” “What condition?” “They have to fight us and win.” “Whatever the reason  any guy who lays a hand on my daughter is as good as dead.”  It seems my fathers have no intention of living peacefully.  “That’s easy. Just tell them to come at me all at once.”  Why are you agreeing to that so casually?!

title_en: HP 5 desu kedo Auto Heal ga Areba Shinimasen!
description: Asoyama Aimi  a first-year high school student  comes up with a grand plan to search for a friend whose contact information she doesn't know by playing the popular VRMMORPG *Real LIFE Online 2* and becoming a popular streamer. She starts playing as the most attractive-looking apprentice saintess  but… it's an extremely unfortunate peaky job class with not a single active player in the world. With 5 HP  paper-thin defensive power  and super-specialized magic and MP that can't take on either the front or rear guard  it's a joke class. However  by chance  she acquires the unique skill Auto Heal and the world changes…? This is the legendary story of a slightly foolish saintess who becomes a popular streamer and leaves many legends in the history of gaming.

title_en: Ware ni Cheat o ~Hazure Cheat no Shoukan Yuusha wa Isekai de Yukkuri Kurashitai~
description: Amidst the annual summoning of over 1 000 heroes  Saburou's summoning bonus is a mere +1 to luck. Dubbed the most disappointing hero in a decade  he begins a laid-back life in another world with a doll princess as his companion. What adventures await him in this new life?

title_en: Dase to Iwareta Reijou no Kareinaru Henshin
description: Clarabelle  who grew up in the countryside  skipped a grade to enter the academy in the royal capital in pursuit of her fiancé Alan  who is from the same hometown. But as soon as she enters the school  she witnesses Alan cheating on her! He dismissed her  saying "I have no love for a plain  unsophisticated woman like you."  As Clarabelle was still crying from the shocking breakup  Victoria  the third prince's fiancée  consoles her. Victoria takes her to the student council chamber  where she meets Lloyd  a handsome but foul-mouthed classmate.  "I want a makeover  and become a proper lady."  Starting with her encounter with Lloyd and Victoria  Clarabelle will embark on new lessons to find her true love destiny!  (Source: Kurofune Pixiv  translated)

Killy is a man of few words. He wanders  seemingly endlessly  through a lonely  gargantuan labyrinth of concrete and steel  fighting off cyborgs and other futuristic nightmares  searching only for something called Net Terminal Genes. And he has a very powerful gun  which he uses without hesitation whenever anything resembling danger rears its ugly head.   Who is this quiet  violent  determined man and what are these Genes he seeks? The small communities he finds tucked into the crevices of this towering  dystopic ruin hardly give him leads on his treasure  driving him to find larger enclaves of civilization where people can reveal more about the world he lives in and the quarry he seeks.

Ms. Shitara is no ordinary school nurse: while directing her lustful affections at the young and resistant Takagi  she spends her days plotting new and increasingly perverted ways to bed him. Despite kinky exercising  suggestive pole stroking and even bribery  she just can't get the innocent boy to satisfy her urges!    From this shameless woman  to the hopelessly inept Sushi Cat and busty Mari-chan  there's more sexual innuendo than you can shake a stick at!

"I didn't even know what had hurt me." Min Jiho  a former second-tier idol  ended his idol career  leaving only confusion in his heart. Planning to leave the entertainment industry entirely  Jiho unexpectedly encounters his idolized top actor  Kang Taeyeon  during a variety show as a substitute. This leads him to become embroiled in a light scandal...

"I like you!" Beyond the world we live in lies a place called the Garden  inhabited by otherworldly divine beings known as Plantus.  An ordinary human named Lee Lumi happens to encounter Aleph  an incomplete Plantus who has arrived in this world.  Having read "The Little Prince " Aleph claims she came in search of "a one-of-a-kind friend." Reluctantly  Lumi agrees to be her friend.  But soon after  a figure who looks exactly like Aleph appears  calling Lumi a "gardener" and acting as though they've known each other for a long time.  Meanwhile  a suspicious professor seems to know far too much about Aleph and the Plantus.  As Lumi digs deeper  she begins to notice eerie similarities between the Plantus and the stories on SPR Institute  a paranormal website supposedly dedicated to protecting humanity.

A collection of SF one-shots by Tezuka from different magazines.  - **SF Fancy Free** - 9 short SF emonogatari with a touch of whimsy that observe and comment on human nature. - **Dauberman** - **Shammy 1000** - **The Seven-Day Terror** - **The Stranger** --- **Volume 80 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**
A man buys a succubus slave. The slave thinks she knows what is in store for her  but the man has other plans...

title_en: Kuzu To Issho Ni Oishii Meshi O

description: One day  humanity was faced with a threat it could not resist: dragons. The crown of a pitiful machine. The great divine beasts that descended from heaven. When two sentiments intersect  the world begins to spin violently.

Young horror writer “Bambi” (pen name: Kojika Kanoko; gender: male) never believed in the supernatural and therefore had no issue with moving into an apartment where a suicide had taken place. After his serialisation was discontinued  he was asked to start writing a short story based on actual experience. He then noticed a spirit in his apartment  an amnesiac high school girl by the name of “Ako.” Since Ako was a relatively friendly and talkitive spirit  not to mention harmless  with her permission  Bambi used her as a model for his next work. But there’s another “Ako ” Yamashiro Ako  a gloomy high school girl who dreams every night from the spirit’s perspective.

title_en: Death March to the Parallel World Rhapsody
description: 29-year-old programmer Suzuki Ichirou finds himself transported into a fantasy RPG. Within the game  he's a 15-year-old named Satou. At first he thinks he's dreaming  but his experiences seem very real. Due to his use of a 3-time-use special power (meteor shower)  he ends up wiping out an army of lizardmen and becoming very high level. He hides his level and plans to live peacefully and meet new people  though developments in the game story (like the return of a demon king) might get in his way.

Dotsuki Manzai is an anthology set in the worlds of Tsukihime  Melty Blood  and Fate/stay night.  Later in 2012 it received a reprint called Dotsuki Manzai Sanshin which contained previously unpublished chapters.

title_en: Kami no Mezame no Gjallarhorn ~Hazure Skill “Mezamashi” wa  Fuuin Kaijo no Nouryoku deshita~
description: In a world where gods bestow special powers known as "Skills" upon individuals  young Leon  an aspiring adventurer  is saddled with an ability deemed worthless: "Alarm Clock." Despite its lowly status  Leon diligently works as an alarm clock for the townspeople  supporting his ailing sister. However  his life is marred by constant debt to the cruel nobleman Gideon.  One fateful day  Leon's seemingly useless "Alarm Clock" evolves  unlocking the ability to "Unseal." A golden coin he possesses transforms into the goddess of the sun  Solana  and Leon is thrust into an epic adventure to unravel the mysteries of the gods' seals. With his newfound power  Leon embarks on a quest to become the "Gentle Strongest " defying the odds and rewriting his destiny.

title_en: Haru to Yuzu wa Mada Shitenai
description: Haruhito and Yuzuki are childhood friends who just started dating. Just when their feelings finally got requited  and their relationship seemed to be smooth-sailing  Yuzuki feels frustrated that they haven’t shared the kind of closeness most couples have... So he tries to take the initiative  but it seems like Haruhito has some issues...?!

I love long hair! Tatsu Yunoki  our MC who deeply loves beautiful long female hair  heard a voice scream his name. It was Kotoka Hatsushima  and  under the impulse of alcohol  both he and she decided to date each other. All they know is that… they love each other's hair and back?! It’s not necessary to know anything else! They clash fetish against fetish  and come together in a fun and romantic comedy! And  well… What is your fetish…?

In a distant world reminiscent of Arabian Nights  a mysterious young elf-child etched by a difficult life in the slums of a remote village with his elder sister. One day  he encountered Sedona  a librarian from the greatest library of the land  and the two formed a bond as they began their adventure in a fantastic and wondrous world. ___ **Officially Translated:**   - In French by [Ki-oon](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-697-magus-of-the-library-l-histoire.html)

During the Interwar Period (1925-1932)  Tomoji lives in the Japanese countryside  while Fumiaki works as a photographer in Tokyo. One day  they meet…  This story is inspired by real characters who founded later a branch of Buddhism.
Inse  a university student who belongs to the film research club  hates love so much that he declares that "I don't need love in my life." However  he has a life-changing encounter...

"I want to believe in my first love.   But then we met."      25-year-old Miku  who moved back to the house she grew up in two months ago  is studying to succeed her grandfather's Chinese medicine store  "Kusuriya Kyubee." Everyday she and her grandfather respond to the troubles of the customers who visit the store  prepare herbal medicine for them  or simply chat with them.      On the other hand  Miku is unable to forget her first love  but she meets an ultra-shy boy named Kanae who likes plants. Perhaps she is beginning to care about him little by little.

Tamako doesn't have any confidence  sex appeal  or romantic experiences. Caught off-guard while job-hunting  she is hired to work for an office full of suspicious people who specialize in designing for pachinko parlors. Thus  her days of agony begin to unfold.

tags: Monsters|Action|Comedy|Superhero|Martial Arts|Fantasy|Monster Girls|Web Comic|Slice of Life
description: A muscle-bound Kaiju woman suddenly appears in a certain town. She's a member of an army of monsters  but she's a friend of justice. A very lethal weapon who works hard even though her job gets in the way! Right now  the Kaiju woman is in critical financial debt!

A lazy surreal comedy about two men who look like bad guys  but are actually super nice!  Two suspicious-looking men  one long-haired and the other short-haired  appear in the usual park.They look suspicious and unapproachable  but they are good guys themselves  picking up litter and searching for missing cats!  Long-Hair somehow knows a lot about the life span of snakes and the organs of rabbits  while Short-Hair is questioned by the police even though he is just eating a meat bun.The two of them live at their own pace today  involving various people in town.
Prototype version of Beastars. This follows the story of an adult version of Legoshi and Haru.        ---

1: The Setting Sun   An art dealer deals with the impending death of a promising young artist.      2: Always a Holiday with You   A high school student’s fantasy becomes reality in an unexpected way.      3: Pandora's Elevator   Company politics interferes with the lives of two businessmen.      4: Coffin Under the Snow   After twelve years  young man returns to his home town and uncovers the secrets of his father’s past.      5: A Warm Box   A college student is obsessed with abandoned cardboard boxes.      6: I Want to See You at the Library: The part-timer at the college library finds himself in an unexpected love conundrum.  7: Hazy Springtime Weather: Is the cinema-lover friend Kobayashi makes at college really who he thinks he is?   8: Strange Fellows: Can a gay bar bring a family together?  9: Our Season

An old school yakuza  Nagamasa Ryumatsu  ended up losing his life due to certain circumstances. But  when he awakened to a strange sort of scenery he had never seen before  he found that he had somehow changed into a beautiful girl?!

Sarutorine Aldike  or Sari  is a bright  cheerful princess who wants to go on an adventure because she is bored of her tiny little castle in the countryside. One day  a hoard of vicious demons known as "Oni" come knocking on her doorstep  threatening the lives of everyone in the Kingdom. Thankfully  they are saved by a lone traveler named Kibitsu Mikoto who slays these monsters with a mysterious "Peach Eye". Shocked by the dangers of the outside world  Sari decides to set off on a journey of her own. Little did she know that she will set in motion a chain of events that will come to determine the fate of this magical world.  Remake version of Cool Kyoushinsha’s popular webcomic of the same name.

Twenty-four-year-old Kirara is on her way to her wedding when she is killed in a car accident.  However  her love for her fiancé is so strong that she is permitted to return to earth as a ghost to see him   but she is sent back 8 years in time when they first met.  Yet her own meddling in the past may make her 16 year-old-self turn away from her would-be fiancé...

High schoolers (and stepsisters) Yuzu and Mei have gone public with their relationship! The two are happy to be dating out in the open  but friends and family keep trying to butt in with advice. Can Yuzu and Mei figure things out on their own?
Winner of the 105th Newcomer Manga Award.

In a small village  a girl named Cheonghwa  as frail as she was beautiful  was sold to be the new wife of a rich  old man. He was not a good husband. Fearing she would gain weight  he kept her starved. With this  Cheonghwa found the gnawing hunger unbearable. Then one day  that husband suddenly passed away. Now  she could eat. She could eat to her heart's content. Both the food... and her handmaiden  Ohwol  standing right before her eyes.

Left to himself at an early age in the slummiest parts of today’s Japan  Kiichi learns how to survive on his own. As a teenager  how can he adapt to a society whose rules he rejects? Unless he creates his own rules… Kiichi  a raw icon of strength and integrity  stands alone against the world’s injustice and becomes an unforgettable character.

Set in a world riven by a strange rift that extends deep into the ground  the people dig into it to search for the resources known as "inheritance." The story begins when a traveler visits a village in poverty because no matter how much they dig  they cannot find any inheritance. The traveler locates a potential vein in the mine  and goes with the villagers to dig into it.

Twenty years ago  a wormhole suddenly appeared above Earth's orbit and opened a passageway to an alien planet full of untapped resources and mysterious life forms. Two decades later  Team Sierra  a small military squad of security specialists working for the Tiberius Coke Corporation  are thirty miles away from home base on that planet when their leader  Chief Yugi Oishi  spots an SOS flare coming from a theoretically abandoned mine. Despite the danger  she leads her four-man team to the facility to see who'd called for help  only for it to be attacked by a horde of powerful creatures almost as soon as the doors close behind them. Now  she and the stranded exploratory excavation crew Team Sierra finds inside must traverse the treacherous mine to reach the only vehicle that could get them to safety—without waking the terrifying monster that's been picking off the researchers one by one… (Kodansha USA)

title_en: Yowaki na Kimi to Nagai Shiawase
description: Tsukino Ryou  a university student  was questioning himself: "...Am I attracted to men?"   He wants to put himself out there  so he signs up for a gay Sex Community  "Polaris". However  on the day he meets his partner  when they're about to go to a hotel... He gets cold feet.  The one who suddenly appears there is a handsome man he had seen somewhere before.  The man  Shinji  who is also a Polaris member  takes him out of there  and sends him home  saying: "Don't come back."   For a short while  Ryou is relieved that he doesn't have to have sex with a stranger. But the next day  he discovers that Shinji is a senpai who goes to the same university.  Ryou attempts to thank Shinji for helping him out  but...

title_en: Baka Mitai ni Sukitte Ie yo
description: "If you just want to feel the excitement of romance  why don't you date me?"  Ao and Sora are polar opposites who  due to their bad grades  are forced to take extra lessons over summer break if they want to get into university. Despite their differences  they hit it off and quickly become friends. One day after class  Sora tells Ao he wants to get a girlfriend and experience that fluttery  heart-racing feeling of liking someone. Ao replies that it's a bit late to find a girlfriend to spend summer vacation with  and then suddenly asks why Sora doesn't just date him instead?!

title_en: Reiketsu Ryuuou Heika no "Unmei no Tsugai" rashii Desu ga  Koukyuu ni Hikikomorou to Omoimasu
description: Upon reaching adulthood  Efinia  the fairy princess  is set to have an audience with the Dragon Emperor. However  as soon as she meets Emperor Glendil  it is revealed that Efinia is his "fated mate." Shocked  Efinia overhears the emperor's heartless words  "It's outrageous that someone who looks like a child is my mate." In that case  fine! I don't desire the love of an arrogant emperor! Undeterred by the harassment from other concubines  Efinia thoroughly enjoys her life in the harem. She eventually befriends a small dragon that wanders into the harem  but it seems this dragon has a secret...

Yanai  a third year editor  is doing research on Toyoko when a homeless girl named Misumi approached him  wanting him to read her manga. Although he is normally a by-the-books editor  he's impressed with the rawness of her storyboards  so he takes her under his wing  aiming to get her to serialization. A story of an editor and a mangaka  fighting against the odds to leave their mark on the world.

This is a story about: a female lead who transforms into a child after losing her virginity  her identity switches between an adult and a kid. With the crown prince who has a dual personality too  there's equal parts love and bite.

PriPara is a place where anyone can be an idol. However  a major update went haywire and now PriPara is in danger of disappearing! In the fashion capital of PriParis  the former Prisiennes who used to be charming and sparkly idols have lost their memories and now go about their day-to-day lives feeling as though they’re missing something.   Things suddenly change when one of these Prisiennes receives an invitation card. On a sleepless night  the rich scent of casablanca fills the air and Phantom Thief Genius Neo appears.  “Bienvenue! Let us fall together into nighttime Idol Land PriPara!”  Shikyouin Hibiki’s brilliant play begins in secret while a detective named Chris searches for the truth behind Phantom Thief Genius Neo!

Top Korean hunter Siu 'The Rabid Hound' Min defeated the Demon Lord with his disciples  only to be trapped in a monster-filled otherworld for 100 years. However  a century of struggles did not break Siu—it drove him to break his limits instead. Now  he returns to Earth with Pred  his mysterious partner  only to learn that his name and legacy have been erased  along with his disciples’... and that only 10 years have passed on Earth. As new conflicts arise  will Siu and Pred prevail and uncover the truth?

title_en: The Apothecary Is Gonna Make This Ragged Elf Happy (Webcomic)
description: A humble medicine peddler comes across an elf slave  saddled with disabilities stemming from months of abuse. Can he save her? ___ **Additional Links:** - Alt Official Raw: [Jump Rookie!](https://rookie.shonenjump.com/series/pGBIkZkW9mc)

Jiang Hao Yi  a normal high school student who is extremely scared of getting into trouble  suddenly becomes the Harem King of his school and gets confessed to by a bunch of beautiful girls! The worst thing is  Jiang Hao doesn't know any of the girls who confessed to him! What on earth is happening? This is a manhua that shouldn't be missed by fans of the harem genre!

title_en: Uragirareta Touzoku  Kaitou Maou ni Natte Sekai wo Shouaku Suru
description: The thief Keith  whose family was captured  was forced to join the Demon King subjugation party. Thanks to his efforts  they managed to defeat the Demon King  but the king and heroes  who did not think highly of Keith  betrayed him and attempted to kill him. Barely escaping with his life  Keith found sinister horns growing from his head and transformed into the Phantom Thief Demon King  an embodiment of destruction and violence who can steal others’ skills and statuses! Along with the former Demon King’s subordinates  the Four Heavenly Kings  and monsters under his command  he exacts vengeance on the humans who betrayed him!

Souichi Kirisaki  who teaches at a private middle school  has a problem. Three of his students  Senka Yuzugami  Yuki Kitsuregawa  and Momoka Watarase  make fun of him. Souichi wants to be well liked  but the girls look down on him and tease him every day. Soichi is troubled  but the truth is that all three of them love Souichi  they just can't be honest with him  plus Momoka is a stalker...

Laid-back and somewhat absent-mindedly seductive umbrella craftsman Shiro  and hot-blooded officer Kojiro  who stands against all things undisciplined  become involved in a bloody and erotic thrill-ride in an off-kilter town. This action-packed jack-of-all-trades manga will have you swooning at its sexiness and leave you more addicted than opium!

title_en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
description: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was  until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death  a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazuma's choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike...

Nagisa Ootsuki shed her former self out of shame from failing her highschool entrance exams. On her first day in her new highschool  who does she meet but the girl who made her fail the exam! How does Nagisa deal with these complicated emotions?

title_en: Bocchi no Saki ni  Koi no Uta
description: A thrilling secret love story about a lonely high school girl and a popular boy.

title_en: A Story About a Former Classmate Who Showed Up When I Ordered a Prostitute

description: Kunon Gurion  who was born blind  has one goal in life: finding a way to use his magic to see  something no one has ever done before. Luckily  Kunon’s talent for magic leads him to quickly surpass his teacher. Before long  his name reaches even the royal palace  earning him the rare opportunity to study under a powerful mentor.

Robot is an all-color manga compilation compiled and edited by the elite manga artist Range Murata  character designer for Studio Gonzo's Last Exile and Blue Submarine No. 6. Murata's hand-picked contributors come together in a mind blowing experiment of what happens when top manga artists work in the unusual medium of color.      Robot was partially published in English  the first three volumes by Digital Manga Publishing from September 19  2005 to December 1  2006  after which the license was taken over by Udon Entertainment  who published volumes 4 and 5 from December 1  2007 to May 1  2008  before they too dropped the license. It has been published in its entirety in French by Glénat.

1-3) Royal Straight   Karen is a "half"  born of a Japanese father and German mother. Having always lived in Germany until now  as a present for her 16th birthday  she goes to Japan which she admired so much. Hoping to find her soulmate but…!?      4) Anata ni Koishite Watashi wa      5) Osatoudzuke no Misu Hanii -   Lily Amemiya has the perfect boyfriend–Yoh Tsuruta. Unfortunately  lots of other girls think so  too. How will poor Lily deal with all the attention her boyfriend gets!?      Italian:   5) Osatoudzuke no Misu Hanii -   Lily Amemiya ha il fidanzato perfetto  Yoh Tsuruta. Purtroppo un sacco di ragazze pensano a lui. Come farà la povera Lily ad avere tutta l'attenzione del fidanzato tutta per lei?

From Intercross:      Sendrick is a little bird that has always hated humans the most in the world. All his life  he's been running from them out of fear  but soon  he accidentally encounters a human tomboy-ish girl named Kayana. This unexpected encounter might actually change a lot in Sendrick's mind.

Collection of stories:      * **The Prisoner in the Miniature Garden (Hakoniwa no Toriko).** He has been a recluse for the past 10 years in that big house overlooking a bicycle parking lot. One day  a girl approaches and confessed to him  disturbing the world he's been cooping himself up in. A oneshot of their story.       * **Pinky Promise Princess (Yubikiri Hime).** Kiriko is a little girl who makes pinky promises with people who expect her to pay for them  but she looks forward to the day they run out of fingers to make promises with or break their promise. An adorable yet creepy 8 page oneshot.      * **Watashi to Watashi (Me and (the Other) Me).** Two girls with the same name; one beautiful and athletic  the other awkward and shunned. But who’s the lucky one?

Sad at the thought of spending Christmas alone  Kurumi goes out for a walk. While she’s crossing the street  a boy bumps into her and a rein suddenly appears that binds them together. The overjoyed boy tells her she’s his master  and that she’s a Santa Claus. Kurumi dismisses him as a crazy person  but then he transforms into a reindeer?!

Seventeen-year-old Chiyuki Matsuoka was born with heart problems  and her doctors say she won't live to see the next snow. Touya is an 18-year-old vampire who hates blood and refuses to make the traditional partnership with a human  whose life-giving blood would keep them both alive for a thousand years.      Note: Author decided to go on hiatus from series for Ouran Koukou Host Club.  Sennen no Yuki went on hiatus after chapter 9 was released in LaLa 2002-05 issue and a special chapter titled Chikai no Hi (誓いの日) was published in LaLa DX 2002-07 issue  which was later collected in volume 3 as chapter 10. The series resumed publication ten years later with chapter 11 in LaLa DX 2013-01 issue. (From MyAnimeList)
Alex and Rite are two souls who died at the same moment at different ends of the earth. This is the story of their interactions with humans who can see them as they travel towards each other.

Collection of short stories.      In the Anywhere But Here series:      Volume 1 "Yama e Iku"   1. Yama e Iku (Going to the Mountains)   2. Uchuusen Unten Menkyoshou   3. Eki made Mugen   4. Message   5. Anata wa Dare desu ka   6. Yureru Sekai   7. Kuroi Hitsuji   8. Message II: Kifujin   9. Vibrato   10. Yangai no Ki (The Willow Tree)      Volume 2 "Sphinx"   1. Message III: Oedipus   2. Message IV: Sphinx   3. Umi no Haru   4. Aoi Door   5-6. Sekai no Owari ni Natta Hitori de      Volume 3 "Haru no Ogawa"   1. Mizutama   2. Shampoo   3. Yuri mo Bara mo   4. Hanayome   5. Umi to Shinju   6. Haru no Ogawa
A woman awaits the return of the man she loves from a war in ancient Greece.

A special booklet that came with Yuri Hime 11. Most are mini-sequels to stories from Yuri Hime  Yuri Hime S  and Yuri Hime Wildrose.   ||   1. First Love Sisters (Hatsukoi Shimai) extra by Shinonome Mizuo is a version of Alice in Wonderland.      2. Hatsumoude Syndrome: In an extra in Kazuma Kowo's Pure Water Adolescence series  Nanao and Matsumoto celebrate the New Year.      3. Creo the Crimson Crises extra by Takewakemaru      4. Aoi Shiro 4-panel strips by Edoya Pochi      5. Getting Cozy: A group of 4-panel comics based on Morishima Akiko's The Conditions For Paradise (Rakuen no Jouken) collection.      6. Nanami and Misuzu extra by Minakata Sunao  featuring New Year's-related gags.      7. Apple Day Dream 2 by Jounouchi Nene is about how hard it is for Yuma and Kaoru to be apart. The first chapter's published in Sayuri-Hime 2.      8. Watermelon Sacchan by Yoshitomi Akihito is a mini-sequel to Suika from Nettai Shoujo. Rin buys Sacchan a watermelon.      9. Cassiopeia Dolchu by Takagi Nobuyuki is a short in the Cassiopeia Dolce series from Yuri Hime S.      10. The First Smile of the New Year: original by Mizuki Maya. A girl tries to make her friend smile.      11. The Vice President's Fortune by Hakamada Mera is a short of the "Kaichou to Fukukaichou" series from Comic Yuri Hime S.      12. A Maiden's Heart is a few 4-panel strips about Iwami Shouko's Yuri Hime S series flower*flower.      13. The Maidens' Salon is a few 4-panel strips about Sudoo Kaoru's Yuri Hime S series Otome -Kikan Gretel.      14. Girls Don't Cry: Ritsuko gets a shock –one of her friends thinks Sayo is cool! A mini-sequel to Sweet Little Devil (Nanzaki Iku) from Yuri Hime Wildrose' first volume and Heart and Soul from second volume.      15. Image Change: Izawa thinks Yoshikawa could use an image change. A mini-sequel to Blue (Hayase Hashiba) from Yuri Hime Wildrose       16. The Greenhouse New Year's Dream: Saki's first dream of the new year is naughty. A mini-sequel to The Greenhouse Witch and The Greenhouse Secret by Mikuni Hajime (Yuri Hime Wildrose)      17. Hao! extra: Haoran takes offense at a dictionary's definition of a particular term. A mini-sequel to "Hao!"  by Chi-Ran  that appears in the first volume of Yuri Hime Wildrose.      18. The Bridal Squabble by Tokitsukaze Otoha is a mini-sequel to "Ichiban Suki na Hito" from Yuri Hime Wildrose. Rinko and Ai fight over who gets to be the bride.   ||

Collection of Hagio Moto's one shots.   Included works (bold are scanlated  bold and italicized are ones with official release): - ***Hanshin: Half-God***: Conjoined twins Yudy and Yucy are as different as possible. Older Yudy is intelligent but ugly  as her nutrients are used up by her beautiful but simpleminded sister Yucy. Loving and hating so deeply  where does one girl begin and the other end? - **Ragini** (included in [this](https://mangadex.org/title/2c30af62-256e-4e43-a5b1-7d0ab7e6148a/comic-s-hayakawa-publishing-70th-anniversary-comic-anthology-sf-edition) anthology) - **Slow Down**: A young man volunteers to participate in a sensory deprivation experiment. Despite its apparent success  the experiment does leave him with some psychological aftereffects. - ***A Drunken Dream*** - Herbal Beauty - **The False King** - **Greenhouse** - Izzan the Leftovers - A Midsummer Night's Planet - **Friday Night Gathering**: Doug and Marmo can't wait to take their telescope and see the comet they have been waiting for on that Friday night. However  like all the other kids in town  their parents ask them to stay home as they will attend a town meeting? Where are all the adults going on this summer night? Will the boys still be able to see the comet?
Basically Just A guy who’ll wear whatever his friend gives him.

1. Natsu no Hajimari (The Beginning of Summer)   Two friends spend their summer together.      2. Suika   On a summer day  what makes a girl go for a watermelon…?      3. Yuudachi Kibun (Evening Rain Feeling)   On a hot and humid day  two girls searching for a place to do more than kiss come face to face with their emotional issues.      4. Sketch      5. Natsu no Ari   Yuko and Mika have been going out for a year now  but Mika seems to be too absorbed in watching ants dig than to pay Yuko any attention.      6. Tainai Kaiki (Inner Revolution)   Two girls are in the school pool when it begins to rain. They end up in the curtains in the multipurpose room. Mayu had previously confessed to Akami  but had been rejected as a lover  although not as a friend. But for some reason  Akami is moved to kiss Mayu today as she sleeps.      7. Himitsu no Seseragi (The Secret Stream)   Two girls  Risa and Tomoko  goes to a secret stream to purify their tainted hearts.      8. Natsu to Ieba (Summer Is All About)   Two friends enjoying summer and then realizing they have feelings for each other on their last day together.      9. Birthday

From Storm in Heaven:      In the future  a devastating war has forced mankind to take refuge under ground. While most of humanity is content  several people dream of the impossible–of seeing the sky. The Narise Corporation has been researching just how to do that  using a special robot  Ciel  who has the unique ability to conjure up images of the world above ground through his songs. However  when murder strikes the company  Ciel has to run away…but he won’t ever forget his promise to lead his friend to the sky.

tags: Monsters|Action|Demons|Long Strip|Post-Apocalyptic|Sexual Violence|Gore|Drama|Fantasy|Monster Girls|Web Comic|Supernatural|Full Color
description: "Mix with the devils  rob the devils of their power... With these hands  I will create a new Demon King for their destruction!"  10 years ago — Devils appeared all of a sudden  and the world was destroyed in 7 days.  Humans who have been sexually assaulted by devils will turn into demon beasts. Eiji  who lost his wife and lived alone with his very young daughter Miu  has also finally fallen victim and became the subordinate kin of a female devil  who is a chimera. He will turn into a demon beast after 1 year  and so he despairs over his fate of becoming separated from his daughter; but then he learns the True Name of the chimera  and this allows him to turn the tables on their master-servant relationship!  Eiji gathers his resolve: before he completely turns into a demon beast  he will raise this chimera to become the Demon King; all for the sake of creating a peaceful world for his daughter to live in!  (Source: Kadokawa)  ---  Note: this has an "all-ages" version where certain scenes are cut  but the story is the same. Tatesc publishes the full  uncut version.

title_en: Soubi Seisakukei Cheat de Isekai wo Jiyuu ni Ikite Ikimasu
description: Toji  a 29-year-old part-time worker who has been involved in the summoning ceremony of others has come to a different world. When he was driven out of the castle as a nuisance and gave up on everything  he saw the same status screen as an Online Game  what he used to play. What a convenient game system was available only for Toji in this world! Strengthen your weapons  summon cute monsters  etc… A free adventure of Touji begins here  focusing on wisdom and living in a different world!       The amazingly popular fantasy of Alphapolis Web ranking 1st place  long-awaited comicalization!

title_en: Soshite Watashi wa Kaeru ni Koisuru
description: Psycho Pandas: A cute 4 page color oneshot about a young man who compares his boyfriend to a frog throughout a single day.
Nagi ✕ Reo Happy Birthday! Birthday booklets of Reo and Nagi.

Collection of Mihara Mitsukazu's one-shots (2005):  - Ch. 1 - Slice of Black Chocolate (2001) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/wz4adqj?utm_source=mangadex) > "Generally… a story about really cute guy trying to hook up with this really egotistic girl… although it's not really like that."  - Ch. 2 - The Vampire & I (2001) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/9023ktd?utm_source=mangadex) > "A dark european ambient and the story of a vampire … just before dinner time."  - Ch. 3 - Children Can't Choose Their Parents (2000) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/eua0juz?utm_source=mangadex) > "A haunting story about a man and his chicken. You will never look at an egg the same way again after reading this story!"  - Ch. 4 - Cut the Angel with a Scythe (2002) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/7xes9iy?utm_source=mangadex) > "Angela is suffering from a terrible illness that keeps her confined… One day a magician comes to her window to visit… Will his magic change her fate?"  - Ch. 5 - The End in Common Ruin (2002) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/jmm0fja?utm_source=mangadex) > "A story about two twins…"  - Ch. 6 - Deserted Place (2002) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/al2hlpo?utm_source=mangadex) > "The story follows the journey of a mysterious boy who brings peace to deserted places and things…"  - Ch. 7 - Alice in Underground (2003) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/9kq7bop?utm_source=mangadex) > "This short oneshot tells the adventures of Alice  but with a slightly darker tone."

Takamura Uru takes her mother’s remarriage as an opportunity to strike out on her own and begin a part time job. Filled with the thought of “If only I could make someone happy…”  she begins working at Café Bohneur  a shop famous for cakes; but the employees  Ichirou-kun and Shindou-san  turn out to be incredibly unsociable. These two  though frightening at first glance  begin to change something inside of her. This is the start of a romance about Uru’s search for happiness.

On his first day of transferring to a new high school  a loner named Mori Buntarou  is cajoled by a classmate into climbing the school building. Despite knowing that one misstep could send him spiraling to his death  he moves forward  and upon finally reaching the top  Mori experiences a sense of fulfillment. That feeling  which seems to be telling him  "You're alive!" gives birth to an adrenaline for rock-climbing.

title_ja: Maou no Musume-Tachi to Maguwaeba Tsuyoku Narerutte Hontou Desuka?
description: Orphaned after the his parents were murdered  Uta Rain was ultimately auctioned off as a slave. Certain that he would be treated terribly no matter where he was taken  Uta was in despair. But what awaited him was... a luxurious meal and five pretty sisters. However  they were the daughters of the demon lord who was defeated by the hero 16 years ago?!

title_en: Moto Saikyou Kouryakusha  Nozomanu Dungeon Haishin de Musou shite Shimasu
description: The dawn of dungeon conquering. A group of boys who were once known as the strongest party is wiped out in an accident. Five years have passed since then.   Low-difficulty dungeons have been developed as leisure facilities  and dungeon conquering has become a popular content that video streamers have flocked to join. In order to survive the tough world of showbiz  current top idol Shinonome Kanami also decides to become a broadcaster who seriously conquers dungeons. The man introduced by her sponsor as the best mentor is a rather unreliable-looking man  Amano Fuyuki.  However  when they visit a dungeon together  an incident occurs right away  putting them in a desperate situation –!?

tags: Romance|Comedy|Girls' Love|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Gyaru

description: Sakuraba Junko is turning 27 years old soon  but even so  she is without a boyfriend. But who cares?! Junko has a stable job as an English teacher and she is fine with spending her upcoming birthday alone. Well  until she is set up with on an omiai with a Buddhist monk… which  of course  she rejects. But then he shows up at her school where he has enrolled in private lessons… what will become of our Junko-sensei?

For the sake of saving her most precious person  the fourteen-year-old girl Ai Wen enters a time machine. However  before she knows it  she has accidentally travelled to the future! There  she meets Ulysses and many other previously unimaginable characters…
Prince of hell is searching for the person who summoned and turned him into a superhero. Prince needs to find that host and return back to his realm.

”If I took this step now  I felt like something would change.”  Naoki had been fed up with just letting the same ”boring” days pass him by.  One day  his fiance dumped him  calling him “boring”  which further aggravated those feelings. Then  he meets Aisuke  a tattoo artist  at a tattoo studio he happened to pass by. Naoki is captivated by Aisuke’s mysterious charm and “the mark of a past flame” engraved on his chest. “A Tattoo Artist Imprisoned by a Past Love” x “A Straight Salaryman who Wants to Change His Mediocre Self”. A heart wrenching and sweet mature love story begins here.

It's a sad and beautiful tale about Pom the panda  a little fellow who dressed as a panda and hands out balloons to children. Pom loves a human girl  Fuu. Poor Pom dies before confessing his love to Fuu.   Pom becomes a ghost who waits for a long  long time on the bench where he got a date with Fuu  trying to find the right words to tell his beloved that he will never come back without making her sad.      Read left-to-right.

From mindlessly enhanced beings to those with identity-based powers  the state of New Virginia is invaded by a virus  causing all kinds of chaos! In fact  it's gotten so out of hand to the point where the city council is forced to announce a cash prize of $50 000 to whoever can stop the host from spreading it. Enter the failed writer  Ace Mirage! A comically hopeful man who claims this as his last shot at success. Can this joker fight his way through a sea of opportunities before it's too late? Or will the countries truth redirect his vision forever?

title_en: Arimono de nantoka suru TS musume
description: A Friend Visits His Male Friend who recently Ts-ed  got to see the state she's in.

title_en: Fate/Grand Order COMIC à la carte PLUS! SP Showdown!
description: Anthology of "one-shot" manga drawn by various artists and centered around battles between the Servants of Fate/Grand Order.

The definitive source of lore  background  and epic saga of Honkai Impact 3rd  a 3D anime-style ARPG game developed and published by miHoYo.  *History:* - 1952: 1st Honkai Eruption in Berlin - 2000: 2nd Honkai Eruption in Siberia - 2014: Honkai Outbreak in Nagazora  ---  Honkai is a corrupting force that manifests itself as supernatural disasters  monstrous creatures  plagues  and Herrschers who can bend physical laws on a whim. Human civilization has been at war with the Honkai since the very beginning. The Valkyries are the mightiest warriors of humanity. They are our only hope.  ---  +++ Extraneous information **Contributor note:** There currently is an ongoing cleanup with the goal of moving each book to it's own title. Help would be appreciated [[Link](https://forums.mangadex.org/threads/honkai-impact-3rd-data-fixing-cleanup.1071951)]  **Volume Guide (by chronological order):** Volume | Status | Year/Era | Details :- | :- | :- | :- 0.01 | Done | Ancient Era | !!Fu Hua's Empyrean tales!! 0.011 | New + Ongoing | Ancient Shenzhou | Blade of the Empyrean 0.1 | Done | 1476 AD. | Elan Palatinus. !!1470: After a disastrous Crusade  Schicksal attempted to seek power elsewhere while - Kallen Kaslana  the greatest Valkyrie of her time  began to question their actions.!! 0.2 | Done | 2000 CE. | Second Eruption. !!2000-FEB-01: The entire research staff of Schicksal Babylon Honkai research facility in Siberia disappeared in a single night. Overseer Otto Apocalypse dispatched his 2nd in command Theresa Apocalypse to investigate this mystery. Welt and Einstein of Anti-Entropy  a long-time enemy of Schicksal  prepare for the worst. They suspect the 2nd Eruption is about to happen.!! 0.21 | Done | 2012-2013 CE. | Gemini - Origin 0.3 | Done | 2012-2013 CE. | Azure Waters. !!2012: Bronya Zaychik  the Silver Wolf of the Urals  finds herself adopted by Cocolia in her orphanage. Bronya would later befriend Seele  unaware of the tragedy that lays in wait for them.!! 1 | Done | 2014 CE. | Escape from Nagazora 2 | Done | 2014 CE. | St. Freya High 3 | Done | 2014 CE. | Sakura Samsara. !!Theresa's innate eight-fold cherry blossom stigma malfunctioned and caused her to fall into a coma. To wake their principal  Mei entered the stigma data space to investigate the cause. Meanwhile  Theresa woke up in what appears to be medieval Japan and find herself embroiled in a never-ending Samsara.!! 4 | Done | 2014 CE. | Final Samsara. !!A vengeful entity dwells within Theresa's innate stigma  and she must do what she can to prevent Yae Sakura's will to become forever corrupted by this ancient terror. Can Theresa defeat this monster  or will she lose herself to the endless cycle?!! 5 | Done | 2014 CE. | AE Invasion. !!Anti-Entropy  a long-time enemy of Schicksal  made an attempt to kidnap the 3rd Herrscher - Mei Raiden. Will the Valkyries of St. Freya High defeat the invaders and save each other?!! 6 | Done | 2014 CE. | Moon Shadow. !!Fu Hua and Kiana goes to Singapore to recover a rogue scientist and a stolen gem  unaware of the terrible things that might happen.!! .22 | ? | 2016(?) | Gemina Invasions (Comedy) 7.1 | Done | 2015 CE. | London Holiday. !!Durandal gets a holiday as a reward for her hardwork  while a mysterious force known as the World Serpent tries hard to defend a hidden Divine Key.!! 8 | Done | 2015 CE. | Second Key. !!Schicksal initiated tests on the Second Key they've acquired from the city of London. Durandal didn't expect to find him inside the key.!! 9 | Ongoing | 2005 / 2029 CE. | Alien Space. !!Young Himeko got into Caltech and met a surprisingly young substitute space engineering course lecturer who also happens to share her interest in space aliens.!!  **Contents:** Book | Volume :- | :- 1001 | 1  2 1002 | 1004 | 0.3 1005 |  1006 | 1007 | 1008 | 1009 | 0.1 1010 | 1011 | 1012 | 0.2 1013 | 0.999 1016 | 0.22  ---  Visit the official site [HERE](http://www.global.honkaiimpact3.com) to learn more (and download) the action-packed 3D anime style ARPG Honkai Impact 3 that this entire manga is based on. The game is a great place to learn more about the Honkai-verse.  *Other Links:*   - [App Store link](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/honkai-impact-3rd/id1336342304)   - [Google Play link](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.miHoYo.bh3oversea)   - [Comic promotion PV](https://www.bilibili.com/video/av2457024)   - [Comic Commemorative MAD](https://www.bilibili.com/video/av6022195) +++

title_en: YuruYuri & Pokémon - Something about YuruYuri and Pokémon (Doujinshi)
tags: Long Strip|Comedy|Adventure|Video Games|Girls' Love|Isekai|Doujinshi|Drama|School Life|Fantasy|Web Comic|Slice of Life
description: One day at school  the Amusement Club pick up an odd game cartridge and suddenly find themselves transported to the world of Pokémon! They're trying their best to get home with the help of their newfound Pokémon  but will their adventure be as laid-back as their official story? Can they survive in this new world? Can Akari manage to catch her first Pokémon!?    A crossover between Yuru Yuri and Pokémon with over 700 pages originally published at <http://www.geocities.jp/manzyu2003/yurumon.html>      With Geocities closure  the author has migrated the series to <https://www.pixiv.net/user/929540/series/54941>

title_en: Ura mo Omote mo Kimi ga Suki
description: From Maiu Cafe : The boy everyone admires at school  the tough guy in class  the sweet girl from the club  that one smart guy… Be the only one to know their true selves! A series of emotional stories that will make your heart race!

title_en: Zettai Zetsubou Shoujo - Danganronpa Another Episode
description: Naegi Komaru  Naegi Makoto's younger sister  managed to survive despite being outside Hope's Peak Academy. There she meets Fukawa Touko  a.k.a. Genocider Shou. This is the story of their struggle to survive in a world full of despair.

tags: Romance|Comedy|Girls' Love|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life

title_en: Sasayaki wa Bara no Shita de
description: "Whisper Under the Roses" is a school story set in the early 20th century.

title_en: Akazukin  Tabi no Tochuu de Shitai to Deau.
description: On a journey  Little Red Riding Hood stumbles upon a corpse!? A series of mysterious cases packed with clever tricks  inspired by classic fairy tales like "Cinderella" and "Hansel and Gretel." Can these captivating mysteries be brilliantly solved?

From ShoujoMagic:      1) Lovers Flowers   It is believe that if a couple kisses during the fireworks festival  they will be together forever. In order to make the miraculous legend come true  Hayuri decides to confess. The one she likes is the basketball club’s captain  Hara-sempai. When she goes to see him  holding her letter  the guy who comes out is the basketball member  Konohana  Hayuri’s classmate. With Konohana’s idea  Hayuri becomes the club’s manager. But she gets introduced as Konohana’s girlfriend!?      2) Go Burst ☆ Girl!   Aki once beat her beloved friend Yousuke (whom she likes)  in karate. Now he says he doesn't have anything to do with that  so he acts randomly. She feels regretful. Trouble appears  and the kendo's captain wants to go out with her…?!      3) FAKE!!   Saori is able to tell counterfeits  or fakes  from the real articles. She uses this talent to suit her goal of getting back her dead mother's necklace from two men that treated her cruelly after her father's death.

Yuuri Onagawa is a young boy about to enter high school  who constantly pines over his childhood friend Kyouko. One day he meets her after years of separation  only to find out that she despises men now.   Upset  he prays at a shrine to have them become friends once again. The god fulfills his wish  but in a way he never expected…

title_en: Teihen Boukensha Dakedo Mahou wo Kiwamete Miru Koto ni Shita ~Munou Skill kara Kami Skill ni Shinka Shita "Mahou Souzou" to "Item Sakusei" de Musou Suru~
description: Loa is a bottom tier adventurer who is regarded by everyone as "incompetent". The only skill he possesses is [Create Item]  which is the ability to create an item in exchange for your levels. Because of this skill  Loa is still weak for his level when compared to others. However  Loa continued to raise his level without using the [Item Creation] ability in order to improve his ability as much as possible. He has been hunting low-level monsters such as slimes and goblins for a year.  When Loa finally reached Level 50  an extraordinary change happens to him. "[Item Creation] has evolved into [Magic Creation]." The [Magic Creation] skill allows you to create a new magic in exchange for levels. The more levels you sacrifice  the more powerful magic you can create. Furthermore  by using the [Item Creation] ability  you can supplement your status with powerful equipment  create high-value items  and it's super convenient!  [Item creation] and [Magic creation] ──The two skills have a synergistic effect  and Loa achieves tremendous growth.

Nanoka and Koshiro were separated at a young age when their parents divorced. Now  10 years have passed  and Koshiro has already forgotten about his younger sister. Yet  Nanoka has decided to attend the nearby high school and come back to live with her father and brother. However  the two had met just before Nanoka came back to live together and without knowing each other's real identity  they went on a date  only to find out that they were actually siblings…

Mahoro is a high school girl who loves her teacher. She studied hard to get her teacher to like her  but as a result  she is now a college student making her debut in a rural area  and is at a loss for what to do with her life for the first time! What will Mahoro see in the ancient city of Nara?

Kirisaki Karin was raised to be an assassin by an assassination organization.   One day on an mission  she attempts to kill a women's manga artist. She was just trying to get the job done in a professional manner as usual  but her world changes drastically when she reads *TokiMero*  the target's serialized manga! She develops a strong yearning for the heartwarming adolescent school life!  Hanashi immediately quits her job as an assassin  and for the first time  enjoys a normal student life  but an assassin is sent after her by an organization.  The start of the assassin's daily romantic comedy begins! ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [GANGAN ONLINE](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1986)

title_en: Ichaicha Suru to Okane ga Waichau 2-ri no Hanashi
description: Money will spring?! A pure comedy open love comedy!      A boy with a blunt but gentle heart  Aki  and a warm girl  Haru. When two poor college students flirt  they get money for some reason…? A comedy that aims to be a flirt while pretending to be "for money" while keeping their love for each other!      *Chapter numbering is based on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/events/1156379771955105792)*

The class representative  Saeki  uses an array of tactics to sleep during class. Tokimiya  the boy sitting next to her  tends to observe her different tactics and while doing so his interest begins to shift… In other words  Saeki wants to sleep.     ---

title_en: Lilia’s Pregnancy Spells the World’s End
description: “The world will be destroyed if you have sex with the Demon King's daughter.”  After defeating the Demon King and saving the other world  the Hero Takahiro returns to the real world. One day  Lilia  the daughter of the Demon King  suddenly arrives at Takahiro's place  where he leads a peaceful life. Takahiro braces himself for revenge  but her goal is to bear the strong Takahiro's child…!?

Sakuta goes on a trip to Shikoku with his dad  Renji  to see if they can find mom  who seems to have gotten lost and can't come back home. In such a historical town  in a house full of memories  where could mom have gone?  A heart-warming family journey through Shikoku  where the family's answer lies at the end.  (Source: GANMA  translated)

Uho-yeong had dreamed of becoming a soccer player. However  he was not blessed with the talent and died without realizing his dream  struck by lightning. It was then that the demon Mammon appeared  offering the ability to covet everyone's talents...

It was a life-changing incident... Kinaho lived by herself until the day her boyfriend  Akito  suddenly brought home two young boys. The brothers were Akito's relatives and had just lost their parents in a tragic accident. A very serious 2nd-year middle schooler called Touma  his 5-year-old brother Haruhi  and Akito start their life together in Kinaho's house.
Ichinose Haruma is handsome  but the girl he likes happens to be even more handsome…?!
Set 13 years after the original series  the story focuses on Miki and Yuu's little siblings.
As an UNLUCKY girl prepares to face her death  an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Vicious  violent and buck naked! ___ - Winner of the 2020 Tsugimanga award.

title_en: Haou ni Natte kara Isekai ni Kite Shimatta! ~Edit shita Game Character-tachi to Isekai o Juurin suru Ore Haou~
description: He was just an ordinary  unremarkable office worker— until one day  he woke up to find himself in the body of the character he played in a game: the Overlord Fells! Saying goodbye to his dull everyday life  he resolves to live on as Overlord Fells in the game world he loves so much. With a host of beautiful girls and ultra-loyal retainers at his side  he sets out to make some serious Overlord moves... but things don’t go quite as planned!?

Everybody at Seiyo Elementary thinks that stylish and supercool Amu has it all. But nobody knows the real Amu  a shy girl who wishes she had the courage to truly be herself. Changing Amu's life is going to take more than wishes and dreams—it's going to take a little magic! One morning  Amu finds a surprise in her bed: three strange little eggs. Each egg contains a Guardian Character  an angel-like being who can give her the power to be someone new. With the help of her Guardian Characters  Amu is about to discover that her true self is even more amazing than she ever dreamed. [Kodansha]

Twitter manga posted occasionally by Holiday Yasumi.  Each post is self-contained  despite being numbered by chapter  so you can read them in any order you choose. Certain characters also make recurring appearances.
Pairing: Akai Shuichi x Furuya Rei

Rosalyn  the Empire’s Strongest Knight… and a Closet Smut Addict?! At 34  Rosalyn is a legend—hailed as the empire’s greatest knight with goddess-like beauty  unmatched swordsmanship  tactical brilliance  and commanding charisma. But perhaps she was too perfect? Despite her glory  she’s still a virgin… and deeply lonely. To fill the void  Rosalyn secretly indulges in one guilty pleasure: steamy romance novels—aka smut. But when she’s suddenly ordered to crush a growing barbarian uprising on the eastern front  her life takes an unexpected turn. Ambushed by a cunning trap  Rosalyn ends up captured by the enemy. Wait… is this seriously happening? “Stripped by barbarians… humiliated… could this be—my first time?!” Just as her imagination runs wild  he appears—Atilla  the fearsome chieftain of the barbarians. What happens when a smut-obsessed knight meets her fantasy in the flesh?

This is a collection of eight stories (there are 9 chapters  because story 6 is composed of chapters 6 and 7).      Story 1: Teased and Stepped On  What Blooms is a Passionate Flower   Describes the relationship between a girl and her teacher.      Story 2: Lolita #7   Features the relationship between two cousins  an older male and a younger girl. One is a teacher  while the other is a student – both at the same school. When the elder cousin doesn’t come to class for several days  the school administrators send the younger cousin to the elder cousin's home to investigate further.      Story 3: Song of the Devil      Story 4: What If?      Story 5: Happiness      Story 6: A Room of Clouds (chapters 6 - 7)   A simple minded girl who tries to live her life the best she can.      Story 7: Indigo Elegy      Story 8: Underground Doll
From Psycho Pandas:   A short oneshot about someone who is taken in from the cold by the only person to notice him  a young man named Taiyou.

A collection of stories:      1. Expression of Love   Haruka is one of the stars at St. Teresa's school for girls; tall  beautiful  accomplished  friendly - she also has an unpleasant habit of molesting girls by grabbing their breasts. Particularly new transfer student Akiho's.       2. She-wolf   New transfer student Fuyuka is very excited to be starting a new life at an all-girl's school. Her anticipation soon turns to terror as she becomes the target of extreme stalker/molester behavior at the hands of one of the school's stars  Natsuki.      3. First Kiss   Story of the school counselor  Reiko  and Ayano  her childhood friend who's also a teacher at school. Included is a conclusion of two student couples' romance. Will a day out to the beach ends happily for Akhito  Haruka  Natsuki and Fuyuka?       4. Little Red Riding Hood Strikes Back   Fuyuka has accepted Natsuki's love  however Natsuki is still retaining some distance. Talking things over with Akihito  Fuyuka manages to make clear her and Natsuki's relationship.      5. Spring  Summer  Winter  Fall      6. Afterword       7. Her   Two girls  Inoue Chiharu & Aida Miho  plotting on seducing each other  each convinced they are the strange one.

From Storm in Heaven:      Mizuki is a girl who wants to run away from her life. As she smiles at everything sad that happens to her  her soul becomes heavier day by day. Her escape door is Adam  an English singer. But is he really real  or is everything they've been through just a dream? Adam sees his dead Japanese girlfriend in Mizuki  but strangely  nobody  apart from a girl who met her at the gates of heaven  can see Mizuki. This is a story that takes place somewhere between dream and reality.

Intent on being an independent young woman  high schooler Himeyuka lives on her own in an unremarkable apartment complex in a corner of the city. But one day  she discovers her ordinary building has turned into something extraordinary! Her beloved castle is covered in childish scribbles - both inside and out! And waiting for her at the end of this rainbow-colored messis the perpetrator of the crime: a little boy named Rozione  who seems to know quite a bit about Himeyuka  though she has no idea who he is. Is he really just someone's lost child  or is there a greater mystery behind his appearance?

This beautifully drawn short story by Yôko Nihonbashi  creator of G senjô Heaven’s Door  introduces the silent  beautiful Yaeko Shimura  a woman who brings new meaning to the words dutiful wife and good friend.

Once  there were two worlds that existed on this earth. In the sky where the deities lived was the Senninkai. On the ground where  of course  the people lived was Ningenkai. In the novel adaptation by Ryu Fujisaki  Houshin Engi follows Taikoubou on his mission to rid the Ningenkai of the evil immortals that have resided there. This colorful historically set manga keeps the reader on their feet and loving every minute of the in-depth characters and exciting adventures.

title_en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - Crown ga Hitomae nanoni Ukkari Amaeteshimau Hanashi
description: In Inukai Rippo's newest work  Satono Crown is the main character in this Romantic Comedy manga!  After finishing her work for the day  she thought it was just her and her Trainer in the room and went to get spoiled by them  but in reality Dia was there and saw it!   Also included is another story where in the span of Trainer leaving their seat  she reserved tickets for both herself and her Trainer without thinking~  So please enjoy this volume where you cannot take your eyes off of this adorable Crown.

title_en: Kamen Rider 11 Senki - Space-Time Hero Kamen Rider - Space 11: Kamen Rider Galaxy Battle
description: An omnibus release of 3 manga series published from 1989 to 1991  each being a crossover with the 11 Kamen Riders up to Black RX.   Kamen Rider 11 Senki: The Great Leader has revived past villains and monsters under a new organization Geist. The 11 Riders go out to thwart their world domination plans once more!  Space-Time Hero Kamen Rider: The evil alien General Jaoro comes to Earth in search of the Blutz  a crystal that can control time and space. The 11 Riders battle Jaoro's minions across history to recover the Blutz pieces before it's too late!  Space 11: Kamen Rider Galaxy Battle: The Murder Empire attacks Earth to transform every living being into metal slaves. The 11 Riders blast off into space to fight Murder in their homeworld  encountering enemies both old and new!

DSC= Digital Single Chapter version. The completed E-book/physical manga will have bonus material.  Luce is an inquisitive catholic girl  yearning to learn more about Christianity. She takes it upon herself to understand her faith and meet likeminded Christians.  This is a fanmade manga  we have no association with the Catholic Diocese  nor the Jubilee.

An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra. The being can take the shape of dying things  but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever? ___ **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** ___ **Official Translations:** * Alternate English Translations: [Inkr Comics](<https://inkr.page.link/Hmgv5BX51rftn9ar5>)  [K MANGA](<https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10076/episode/319887>) * [French / Français](https://www.pika.fr/serie/your-eternity) * [German / Deutsch](https://www.egmont-shop.de/to-your-eternity-01.html) * [Indonesian / bahasa Indonesia](http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/untukmu-yang-abadi-01) * [Italian / Italiano](https://www.starcomics.com/fumetto.aspx?Fumetto=281315) * [Polish / Polski](http://kotori.pl/nasze-wydania/ku-twej-wiecznosci/) * [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://www.lojanewpop.com.br/uma-vida-imortal-to-your-eternity-15576289) * [Russian / Ру́сский](https://istari.ru/katalog-knig/manga/to-your-eternity/)

One peaceful day on Earth  a meteor crashed—and the world was never the same again. Soon after  mysterious beings known as Immortals began to appear across the globe. Whenever they died  their bodies would reset to a specific moment in time—erasing every wound  scar  or mark that came after. Not even science could explain this phenomenon. Humanity spiraled into chaos. Two hundred years have passed. Despite the best efforts of scientists  the secret of eternal life remains unsolved. Now  Immortals live as fugitives—hunted by governments  subjected to brutal experiments  and trapped in a life where they cannot die… only repeat. But among the whispers and urban legends  a single name surfaces— “The Undertaker” A man who can kill even the unkillable. For those cursed with life  the ultimate salvation may come not from science… but from a man who brings death.

Mitsu Kumano  a JK who works part-time at a cafe  is a stylish and mature 16-year-old. However  she is "unaware" of everything she does  including her thoughtful remarks and bold behavior. Thanks to this  the manager of her part-time job  Yuya Higurashi  has his heart overloaded everyday!

At first glance  Kirari Aokigahara appears to be an average  happy-go-lucky first-year high school student. But instead of running late for school one day  she finds herself running late for a meeting at Seaside Cafe hosted by Lucio  the admin of a website called Suicide Cafe.  The sparkling  charming young lady stands out amongst the gathering's cast of suicidal individuals. She joins the group in swallowing sleeping pills and entering a car filled to the brim with toxic charcoal smoke. However  rather than dying  she wakes up from a dream about a girl's suicide and is surprised to see that the once-suicidal group appears to be revitalized. Upset that she did not die  Kirari goes home and attempts to kill herself  only to realize that she cannot die  no matter the method.  Lucio then appears to tell Kirari that she has been chosen to save people from ending their lives  including the girl in her dream earlier  and become a magical girl of salvation—a "Suicide Girl."

title_en: Ladies at Her Service: A Very Naughty Girl
description: On the surface Yeo-woo is the perfect college student—popular  flawless  and insanely good at what she does. But underneath that polished exterior  she hides a kinky side that thrives on being treated like a dog during S&M play.  The only obstacle keeping her from living this double life? Jin-young.   Jin-young approaches her and flirts with her saying she looks like a fox  but then she humiliates her  calling her "pineapple-haired sunbae " and takes full advantage of her weakness after an incident.  “That's not what you’re supposed to say to me  sunbae."  “You're a dog  aren’t you? Then bark.”

One volume of touching short stories revolving around life  death  companionship  and the deeper meaning to be found in the world around us.      Includes the following short stories:      1. Once Upon a Time   A lost little girl wants to find her way home…      2. See You Next Time   A girl calmly reminisces about her dead friend.      3. Imp in the Night   A little imp wonders why he's afraid of the night.      4. Sakura Antique Store   The story of an old watch sitting in the window display of the Sakura Antique Store.      5. Shiroi Kumo (White Clouds)   A beautiful and touching story about life  death  and the heartening belief that we will all arrive at the same place when our time has come.      6. Molehill   The story of a young mole who decides to become human so that he can see his girlfriend's face…      7. The Lands of Dreams   A girl is trapped in an endless dream…      8. Grape Picking   Two teachers discuss the godliness of children.      9. Let's Go Home   An elderly couple's reminiscences as they pay a visit to the village from their shared childhood.      10. The Story of a Flower   They don't have a mother  but…      11. The Road Where Flowers Bloom   A careworn man whose life stuck in a rut  a book with Sakura blossoms stuck in the pages  a mysterious woman who claims to have been killed by him  a childhood best friend's mysterious reappearance…      12. Egg Water   The taste of the water bubbling up from a well in the backyard of a little old lady's house…      13. Hoppie's Bear   The unlikely friendship between a lovelorn office worker and a strange – and strangely mature – girl.      14. To A Certain Place…   Returning home.

Serika's younger cousin  Taichi  6 years her junior had passed his university entrance exams and until he's found a place to rent  Serika will be looking after him. Although he appears to be as pretty as girl and a sweet angel  he's grown into a sadist devil in the time they haven't seen each other! He suddenly hugs her and kisses her - Serika's self control is on the brink of collapsing before Taichi  who has grown into such a splendid man.

title_en: Is the Only Option a Slave Merchant?: Harem? What is that  is It Tasty?
description: Zeolith wanted a chill life  but when he turned 15  his villages rule was that they had to go to the vocational school "Velciel" where each student will choose their profession. Zeolith wanted an easy job where he could laze around all day  but the only options he got were: "The Highest Peak of the Human Race [Hero]"  "The Strongest Ruler [Demon Emperor]"  "The Title of the Strongest Magician [Great Sage]"  "And the last one "The Lowest Title  a Job For Scum [Slave Merchant]".  None of the titles were a good option. He picked the lowest title [Slave Merchant]  which is inconspicuous among them and seems to be easy to live. But  He doesn't know it yet. It's the lowest occupation but it is the strongest for him and the most annoying-tiring ones. A harem struggle to be swayed by a variety of women  slutty alluring girls from elderly to younger ones who are his childhood friend's  the poisonous plantgirl  elves  cat ears adventurer  Loli Demon Lord  et cetera.

Komugi is a cat who has been reborn as a human  so that she can repay the love and kindness she received from Honami  the girl who was her owner in her past life. When she shows up at her old home  she learns that Honami has become the owner of a bakery. She inherited the bakery from her father  but things aren't going well and the bakery is practically empty of customers every day...  Komugi makes a proposal to Honami who worries that she'll have to close up shop: "Please let me work here!"  It's a workplace comedy that unfolds in a small bakery located at the end of a side street off the main road!!  (Source: Gangan Online)
Contains Rockman 4koma

tags: Reincarnation|Time Travel|Action|Demons|Long Strip|Martial Arts|Harem|Wuxia|Isekai|Fantasy|Web Comic|Supernatural|Full Color
description: In his previous life  he was a peerless genius in the Immortal World but was killed by 3 celestial beings.      He exploded to death and accidentally got reborn to his 20s back on Earth.      Determined to return to the Immortal World  he became the strongest man on Earth who can control clouds and rains at his will  and whoever offends him will have no choice but to disappear completely!        ---

title_en: Kawaii Ano Ko to Futari de Date
description: A fun little comic about a cute girl I posted on Twitter (@cak221).

title_en: The Cruelest and Most Beautiful Grimm's Fairy Tales in the World
description: Collection of short stories of darker and mature version of Grimm's fairy tales.      - Covered in Cinders (KOTOKAWA Aya)   The darker version of Cinderella.This is a oneshot is also in vol 9 of Cafe Minamiaoyama Kottoudoori.      - Rapunzel (SAKAMOTO Mimei)    SAKAMOTO presents a more mature version of the classic Brothers Grimm fairytale Rapunzel.      - The Frog Prince (HASHIMOTO Noji)   A more mature telling of the fairytale  The Frog Prince.      - Vampire Fantasy (Hanamura Rie)   A very creepy vampire story featuring a female vampire.      - Other

Shinji Ikari attends the NERV Foundation Academy and lives a life of relative normality. One night he encounters Rei Ayanami and Kaworu Nagisa fleeing the scene of a violent explosion and is eventually recruited to assist them and Asuka Sohryuu Langely in fighting the Angels  who have taken on human form  in order to retrieve their cores to support the world tree  Yggdrasil. Should the Yggdrasil die  their world would be thrown into a chaotic state where parallel streams of existence collide  eventually bringing about the destruction of all things

title_en: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer  Tsukaima wa Osananajimi
description: “But I’m powerless without you  my Master.”  After being suddenly summoned to another world and saving that world from a crisis  high school students Wataru and Rumi have safely made it back to the real world. But the real world has been completely transformed! Dungeons are popping up and people have awakened their skills… It’s as if the real world is turning into the world they just left behind…  A dungeon fantasy story where the returnees from another world  the tamer Wataru and his familiar Rumi  mow down everything in their way as the strongest combination that is closer than childhood friends but not quite lovers!

Aida is a man with a decent appearance who fell in love with the class idol Yano Kokoro and changed his seat in class to get closer to her. He studied shoujo manga which (as he claims) all girls on the planet love and tries to use that knowledge to win over her heart. However  Yano is a realistic girl who doesn't seem to be too fond of that approach…

title_en: The Legendary Hero is an Academy Honors Student
description: Back in the Age of Despair  Kyle defeated Erebos  the genesis of evil.  Then 5000 years later  he reincarnated as Leo with the memories of his past life intact.  His comrades — the Brave Arron  the Divine Blacksmitsh Dweno  the Poet of the Stars Luna  and the Wise King Lysinas — were all heralded as great heroes.
