Given this second chance  Kurose resolves to fix the mistakes of his past and produce a happier outcome for his life.

Even in this day and age of the 21st century  many gods live amongst humanity. Mayu is a cat god who is the master at finding lost objects  but she is very lazy and all she does all day is eat  sleep  and play video games. Mayu lives with her caretaker  Yuzu  who operates a pottery store while at the same time doing everything for Mayu. The pair meets other gods in their daily lives and have exciting adventures.   --- Official Release: - Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Cat God** (2013)

The vivid memory of a strong slap  when I was smacked down by a mysterious girl. Carrying the pain of my broken heart  I joined the “Slap-Fighting World Championship”! Can I overcome the pain of that episode and find the will to win?

Meet Tsubaki Kuchinashi  the Manhater Prince. Beautiful and popular  Tsubaki's core strength in high school comes from her position as the principal's granddaughter - suffice it to say  but any student or teacher who even looks at her the wrong way could be expelled at a moment's notice.  Meet Tadashi Kiritsu  the head of the Public Morals Committee. As sharp and rigid as his glasses  Tadashi despises Kuchinashi's iron grip on the school. Naturally  a challenge to her rule bothers Kuchinashi  so she decides to get rid of him as soon as possible. Her plan? Get him in a honey trap. However  that's easier said than done  as she starts finding hidden aspects of herself that she didn't want to acknowledge  either to herself or to Tadashi.  Will she prevail before her conscience eats her up from her own salacious taunts? Will Tadashi play into her hands? What manner of a person will he prove himself to be when facing her taunts?

title_en: Maid nara Touzen desu. ~Nureginu wo Kiserareta Bannou Maid-san wa Tabi ni Deru Koto ni shimashita.~
description: Nina is a humble and small petite maid  but she is very  very talented. One day  she was accused of breaking her master's cherished vase  a crime she has no memory of  and is thrown out of the house. Losing her way  Nina decides to make a fresh start and embark on a journey. With the knowledge and skills she learned of maid-work  she solves the problems of the girls she meets on her journey...! ___ **Links:**   - [![](https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png) Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6251hf) - [Official LN (JP)](https://www.es-novel.jp/bookdetail/150meidonara.php)

Kenji Kaga  an erotic cartoonist consumed by his unhealthy lifestyle  ends up hospitalized after falling unconscious trying to reach his deadline. His editor  not surprised by the number of times the cartoonist has reached that point  decides to hire an assistant to take care of Kenji. The appointed assistant  Rui Fumitsuki  turns out to be Kenji’s biggest fan. The misanthropic Kenji tries to come up with a way to make Rui quit of his own volition. The plan? Masturbating in front of Rui with the excuse that it's part of his artistic process.  - Epilogue Group

My name is Miyabi Mifu. I'm a lonely sixth-grader  and I don't have any parents or relatives.....or so I thought for the last twelve years!  One day  I found out I'm a quadruplet!! Three other girls that have the same face and voice: Ichika-chan  Nitori-chan  and Shizuki-chan. We were all raised alone in different places  but from now on we're going to be living under the same roof. However  living with only other children is chaos! Also  the differences in our upbringing could lead to some uexpected circumstances...?  We're all the same  but we're also different! Our cute sisterhood life begins now!

This is the tale of sparkling middle schooler Yamada Mimi  a self-proclaimed magical girl  and how she became the real thing.  *Tonari no Young Jump* oneshot from Ningiyau  author of *School Zone Girls*.

Despite being the adopted son of a Kabuki actor  Teruchika has no interest in Kabuki and is a terrible actor. On the other hand  although Kuni is a talented Kabuki performer  she is unable to go on stage because she is a woman. Teruchika tries to use his ability to "copy" her performance to indirectly bring Kuni to the stage  but...?  (Source: Kadokawa  translated)

Wen Ming unexpectedly transmigrates into a high-martial world and finds himself engaged to the powerful Empress  Wu Xin. Hoping to take advantage of this connection for a comfortable life  he plans to rely on her and avoid hardship. However  his dream of an easy life is quickly shattered after he unintentionally angers Wu Xin.  Uncertain about her own feelings for him  Wu Xin devises a test—she sends her close friend  Tao Sisi  to seduce Wen Ming. This not only serves as a trial of his loyalty but also helps her gauge whether she would feel jealous. As Wen Ming navigates this unusual predicament  he questions the effectiveness of such a test  wondering what kind of man would actually fail in such a situation.

title_en: Is It Too Late to Apologize Now?
description: Can an apology  20 years late  truly resolve the misunderstandings and wounds between them?

As climate catastrophe renders Earth uninhabitable  humanity sets its hopes on a new world: Arcadia. After years of deep-space slumber aboard the Atalante  crew member Dong Youngsoo finally awakens to a long-awaited paradise. But Arcadia is no Eden. The planet is under siege by alien invaders  and a native civilization fights desperately for survival. Caught between worlds  Youngsoo is thrust into a harrowing adventure that could reshape the fate of an entire species—and redefine what it means to call a place home.

A slapstick romantic comedy featuring the hijinks and romance of Japan's first co-ed high school.  Subtitled in its Hakusensha reprint as 'Another Mari and Shingo'  as the leads originate as supporting characters in this work.  Contains one shot "I'm Fine with Dying" in volume 2: Micole is a young French girl whose cousin  Leon  an up-and-coming painter  lives with her. One of Leon's paintings catches the eye of a wealthy art-loving gentleman  and he gets offered to study in Paris. Leon has always been rather delicate  but for some reason  his health begins to worsen even further once he arrives there...

title_en: Yakudatazu Skill ni Jinsei wo Sosogikomi 25-nen  Imasara Saikyou no Boukentan Midori Kashi no Akira
description: A skill useless from the beginning  <Restoration>. Regardless  in order to save a childhood friend who sacrificed her body to protect him  Touru spent twenty-five years developing the skill. Once completed  the skill could completely defy the world’s common sense. Touru  the girl  the naughty child they picked up in a back alley  and the old landlord lady join together as companions  setting out on an adventure to become heroes. A man who lived through the depths of despair decided to move forward and widen his horizons. ___ **Character Designer:** [peroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/18c02af4-21c4-4b2a-a75a-6f0c5ee3d172)

When Reagan travels from the Vatican to Japan to stop a Calamity-Grade Beast  from destroying the world  he and his summoned beast  Fafnir  discover that everyone there can summon beasts like it's nothing. Can he find the Calamity-Grade Beast in time?

The stage; a city where "witches" collect people's worship. Who appeared there was a man carrying a coffin  and a girl with a beast's eyes. Their prey  "Witches"! And nothing else. When the evil "witch" and the starved "beast" meet  their magnificent and fierce battle begins!  --- **Links:** - Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10214/episode/314025) (U.S. Only)  [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/the-witch-and-the-beast/)

Anzu  who doesn't understand what love is all about  agrees to try out becoming a couple with her childhood friend Yaichi. Just where will the relationship between the hot  sweet but easy to burn (caramel) highschool boy Yaichi  and the romatically indifferent Anzu end up...?!

The first official comic anthology of the popular smartphone RPG "Blue Archive"!  An all-drawn comic that allows you to enjoy the world of "Blue Archive" even more.  In addition to the Foreclosure Task Force and Problem Solver 68  the Cleaning&Clearing  Justice Task Force  Game Development Department  Gourmet Research Society  and many others  the unique characters of the school city of Kivotos are on the rampage.  This is the beginning of a sparkling and slapstick school life. ♪  --- **Volume 1** **Cover**: Pinch (ピンチ) **Illustrations**: Haniro (はにろ)  [Mogi Yasunobu](https://mangadex.org/author/f52a88a5-af1f-45a6-a9fb-1f2b86f0061a)  **Author list**: 1. Chiruha Chinmi 2. pote 3. IDU 4. Ashida Yuri 5. mizumi 6. T@ke-G 7. Salamander 8. Ochiaki 9. Toudori 10. Magokoro Kurage 11. Amamiya Yuki 12. Gomashi 13. Kinatsu Kanoto  **Volume 2** **Cover**: Amagasa Yun (雨傘ゆん)  **Author list**: 1. pote 2. Aki Tokage 3. Takahara Yu 4. Hagiwara Emirio 5. Toudori 6. Kamichi Ataru 7. Koyubita Beru 8. Varios 9. Hinata Yuu 10. Tirano Iori 11. Magokoro Kurage 12. Yakihoko 13. Otsukue 14. Hoyhoy Colo

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Sports|Video Games|Girls' Love|Drama|School Life|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Although Captain is handsome  kind  and good at sports  he’s also an avid gamer. That’s the reason why Kiss decided to start learning how to play games in hopes of winning over the senior she has a crush on. However  this turned out to be the beginning of an unexpected online relationship between Kiss and Miguel  who is secretly the world's number one pro player!

The Nightmare of Fabrication is a beautifully drawn full-colour manga from Yoshitoshi ABe. The 18 page short story can be found in the Lain Omnipresence in Wired artbook. It's a bonus story which apparently isn't related with neither the anime nor the PS game. It shows characters who were included in the PS game but not in the TV series (like the psychiatrist)  but also determinant characters from the anime who didn't appear in the videogame (like Deus).

title_en: Isekai No Ochibi-chan wa Kyou mo Nanika wo Tsukuri Dasu
description: One day  Ochibi (5 years old) who lives in the slums suddenly remembers that she has been reincarnated from another world. Ochibi has the "Imagination Creation" skill  which allows her to create anything she imagines. She decides to start a business with the Japanese items she obtains with her "Imagination Creation" skill! A heartwarming story with a boy named "Onii" and a girl named "Nene" who aim to escape the slums!!

One day during the rainy season  a man was taking someone else's umbrella from a storefront in Bikon  when he felt a gaze and looked up to see a mysterious fish hanging from a string staring at him in the rain. It did not speak  did not move  and its expression did not change... The name of the mysterious fish was - Pisu-chan. Surrounded by the mischievous store manager  the work-ready mysterious insects  and the innocent and relentless children who come to play with her  Pisu-chan makes the store a lively place to be.

title_en: Creepy Pharmacist: All My Patients are Horrific
description: Will this treacherous darkness swallow you up  or will you survive as a unique existence?   Lin En accidentally transmigrated into this monstrous world. As a rare human doctor  every one of his patients was moved by his "gentle" treatment and "sincere" service!   “Anesthetics? Maybe next time." "My knife is quick  it’ll be over soon~"  Welcome to Bloodsaw Pharmacy  where we will serve you wholeheartedly.

tags: Time Travel|Historical|Comedy|Magic|Girls' Love|Isekai|Fantasy|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Cooking
description: A high school girl from modern day runs a sweets shop to help revive a hot spring in another world!

Fuuka  a college student who enjoys cooking but is confined by her apartment's small kitchen  meets Yomogi  a wild outdoor girl who isn't particularly good at cooking. Their outdoorsy meal that started by chance is somehow very delicious and heartwarming....  This is the start of a gourmet outdoor manga about two women helping each other out!

There are animals that were abandoned by Dangun and live secretly in the human world. Narae  an ordinary high school student  discovers their existence... A modern version of Beauty and the Beast with comedy and exorcism action.  ‘Will the project of becoming human  for the animals that could not become human  be successful?'

Tsuchida Seiki's last work.  Night Patrol Teacher tries to bring **hope** to Japan after an earthquake disaster. Drawn by Tsuchida Seiki with all his might!!  Includes a memorial of Tsuchida Seiki at the end.

Yoi is a girl who is called "prince" by those around her and treated like a hero in a girls' manga. Then she meets Ichimura  who is also called "prince." He calls her "beautiful" and saves her from getting tangled up with a drunk at a convenience store  and the two quickly get close! Is this encounter fate? Or is it bad luck?! The story of a man and a woman  both called "princes " begins now!

Ichimonji Norimune x Female Saniwa  To rescue the kidnapped saniwa and Kasen  the sword warriors of a certain citadel  led by their captain Ichimonji Norimune  undertake the mission to resolve the historical distortions within the Hosokawa residence in Edo. The sequel to “Little Box of Love ” continuing in its settings and worldbuilding.

title_en: Maou Gun Saikyou no Majutsushi wa Ningen datta
description: "Maou Army's strongest magician" I'm called. Ike  a demon capable of capturing a fort alone. Clearing away enemies with immense magic  he is without a doubt a monster held in awe by friend and foe. However he has a secret he can't tell other demons. "I  actually am a human you know." Using modern knowledge to keep his secret  he became treated as a great commander and the driving force of the Maou's army.

Zevorsa Vilage has lived its few decades of life peacefully  selling its vegetables and livestock  managed by its caring and kind leader. But to the surprise of the few residents  a group of elite soldiers suddenly visits. Few know the real reason for their arrival  but what they feared most is that their arrival heralded an era of misfortune the continent of Nigde could never hope to experience  thus kicking off this Saga.
Pairing: Todoroki Shouto x Bakugou Katsuki

title_en: Cheat Skill "Shisha Sosei" ga Kakusei Shite  Inishie no Maougun wo Fukkatsu Sasete Shimaimashita
description: Licht  a young man who has the special ability  "Resurrection " makes his living as a member of an S-Rank Adventurer's Party. However  the king  who feared his power  ordered his comrades to betray him  and in the end  executed him in an unfair manner. But Licht  who was fortunate enough to be revived because of his own skill  now swears to carry out his revenge on humanity…

The story begins with a beautiful girl  her perfectly fake smile  and the people who love her selfishly for it.      What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?

The protagonist  who was enjoying the RPG game Dragon Slayer Academy  succeeds in raising 1 000 S-class heroes as the strongest supporter in the game.  One day  a mysterious quest window appears in front of him  and he is presented with a hidden quest that allows him to raise EX-class heroes that surpass S-class heroes.  Upon accepting the quest  he finds himself transported into the game world of Dragon Slayer Academy...

title_en: Bakunyuu-tachi ni Tsuihou Saretaga Modore to Iwaretemo  mou oso... Modorimashiyuu!
description: Shin  a magical swordsman  was expelled from an adventuring party just before reaching S-rank. He decides to live on his own  but a former party member appears before him and asks him to return  but he refuses. The disappointed members are left behind. As a hard-line measure  the girls begin seducing him with their voluptuous bodies! Strong on magic but weak on tits  they start a lewd war of attrition! ___ * Web Novel Raw: [https://novel18.syosetu.com/n4772hx/](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n4772hx/)

Once upon a time  the God of Fate of Earth and the Chief God of Galdarudia made a wager. The God of Fate lost the bet and was forced to choose 10 common souls to hand over to the Chief God of Galdarudia. The Chief God of Galdarudia gave each of the 10 souls a new ability. Amongst those ordinary souls exists one salaryman who thwarted his fated demise. How will this man grow from this point forward? The God of Fate  the Chief God of Galdarudia  and even the author have no idea!  One man's story of turning blood  sweat  and tears into a successful living—literally! After his untimely death as the hardest-working salary man in Japan  Luciel is reincarnated into the magical fantasy world Galdardia. Always the man with a plan  he recreates himself to be a healer  and sets about making his way in the world. But while Luciel knows a thing or two about making money  he knows absolutely nothing about Galdardia. Will his good heart and great work ethic be enough to make him... The Great Cleric?  (Kodansha) ___ * [Web Novel Raw](http://ncode.syosetu.com/n8697cx)

This is not a hentai!! Its underground manga from the GARO magazine  characterized by surreal  avant-garde manga.  Published in the December 2000 issue of GARO magazine  Yamada's short manga is about a man who finds himself living with a mermaid in his apartment...
Follows the daily antics of Shachiku-chan and her workplace.

Heian Joururi Monogatari paints the sad tale of a noble young warrior of the Genji clan named Enjūmaru  and Sachuta  his only attendant. The Heian period is nearing its end while these two travel through the ages as they both hurt and seek comfort in one another.  A gripping Heian romance as told by Takemiya Keiko  best known for “The Poem of Wind and Trees” and “Towards the Terra”.

title_en: Jumyou wo Kaitotte Moratta. Ichinen ni Tsuki  Ichimanen de.
description: A twenty-year-old with little hope for the future discovers a shop that buys lifespan  time  and health. This is a story dealing with the ensuing consequences.

In the manga's story  humanity fought against divine beings in a secret war for its existence seven years ago. A girl named Waka  as well as her companions became Valkyries chosen by the gods and gave their lives to end the battle. In time  Waka's younger sister Kiko grows up and enters high school. But now the divine beings have returned.

Shingo is a young office worker recently engaged to his girlfriend. When she expresses the desire to meet his parents  Shingo becomes anxious — he has a rather unusual family secret. His “mother” is actually his biological father  who underwent gender-affirming surgery and later married a man  now Shingo’s stepfather. Together  they run a lively transvestite bar where all the performers are cross-dressers  including one who harbors romantic feelings for Shingo.  Desperate to keep this side of his life hidden from his fiancée and coworkers  Shingo is further burdened by a medical issue: he suffers from phimosis and needs to undergo circumcision before marriage. One of the bar’s performers recommends a discreet surgeon known for helping people in their circle.  To avoid suspicion  Shingo is disguised as a woman when leaving for the clinic. However  in the slang of the bar community  “circumcision” is a euphemism for “sex reassignment surgery.” The doctor misunderstands — and performs a full  irreversible sex change operation.  Shingo wakes up in a woman’s body. Now  forced to start a new life  she begins working as an office lady (OL) and continues her relationship with her fiancée — now as a lesbian couple.

title_en: Tensei Shitekara 40-nen. Sorosoro  Ojisan mo Koi ga Shitai. Nidome no Jinsei wa Harem Route?!
description: Forty years have passed since his reincarnation  and the guild leader  Girold  has been working diligently. Looking back on his life  he realizes that he hasn't been able to get married  so he tries his best to get a girlfriend  but there is no luck. He thinks he's not popular  but the girls around him are trying to approach him... (DeepL)

tags: Action|Psychological|Long Strip|Drama|Medical|Fantasy|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Supernatural|Adaptation|Full Color
description: "The Gates of Hell"—that’s what they call the doors to the surgical ward of Yeonseong Hospital. And I’m Taesoo Choi  one of the many interns seen as nothing more than tin can robots by some of the senior doctors. To escape this chaos  I went hiking  where I found the nearly lifeless body of the esteemed surgeon Dr. Kauffrene. Despite my efforts  it was too late to save him  but somehow I gained all his medical knowledge! Now my life is changing in ways I never expected  but is this a blessing… or a curse?  ---  - [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A5%ED%84%B0-%EC%B5%9C%ED%83%9C%EC%88%98/2310)  ---  - [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%A5%9E%E9%86%AB%E5%B4%94%E6%B3%B0%E7%A7%80/123)  - [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/70671)  - [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%93%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%8A%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%8B%E0%B8%B9/214)

"I want to sleep with you." "... What?" "I want to do it with Sung Ji-Won."  The day I turned 20. I spent the night with you  trying to make a memory. That's how we met again after 10 years  Joo Sung-Hyun  still handsome...  "Interest-free loan  limit is up to you  you don't have to pay it back." "... What?" "Keep going  acting like a live-in girlfriend."  You still threw the wrong fastball  and I caught it. Joo Sung-Hyun  what are your true feelings?

title_en: Shiro Majo-san to no Henkyou Gurashi ~Saikyou no Majo wa Nonbiri Kurashitai~
description: Tori  who works as a handyman for the platinum-class clan "Four Horns of Mud"  is fired from his job when the clans are merged. Just as he is at a loss as to what to do  the White Witch  a renowned and strongest adventurer  appears before him. The old woman  with the presence of an end-of-the-century champion  says she wants to hire Tori. Tori suspects that the White Witch is just making fun of him  and tries to implicitly refuse by requesting a high salary  but she readily accepts and takes him to the witch's house.  As Tori kneels down and apologizes  the White Witch  who was supposed to be an old woman  transforms into a cute young girl and says  "Your first job... I'd like you to clean."

title_en: Surviving in a School of Ghost Stories
description: My younger brother died.  And it happened inside the prestigious private school that I struggled so hard to get him into.  As I was crying in despair in front of his grave   A strange man who claimed to be the student council president appeared and made an unbelievable offer.  “Would you like to go back one year if you could?”  He seemed like a swindler  but faced with sudden despair  I had no other choice.  I grasped at this rotten lifeline and hastily made a deal with him.  And surprisingly  I really did go back one year in time.  Without wasting time  I immediately transferred to that problematic private school. To protect my younger brother who was still alive.  But this school  the atmosphere is not right.  Ghosts and spirits appear all over the school  and ‘ghost stories’ occur.  Somehow  my brother seems to be connected to these strange phenomena.  Will I  Melody Hastings  be able to safely solve the ghost story  protect my younger brother  and get out of this school?

A compilation of loosely-connected stories about weird highschoolers. Several of the stories focus on Hayashi  an aloof and forthright student  while others focus on Nikaidou  a student with a downcast and grim persona.  **Contents:** 1. Someone Cute 2. Would You Be My Friend? 3. The Artist 4. Run  Yamada! 5. Nikaidou Behind Me 6. Nikaidou Extra 7. Nikaidou Behind Me: Angry Class Ver. 8. Nikaidou Behind Me: Terrifying Class Trip Ver.  **Awards:** - Won the 24th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in the Short Work category in 2020. - Won the New Face Award from the 23rd Japan Media Arts Festival in 2020.

Howard(Chen Xu)  the lowly office employee  is stuck at the bottom of the corporate ladder until a chance encounter with the mimic dream system changes his life! Now he can access all the adventure he ever wanted: having adventures  fighting monsters and living with his gorgeous but fierce boss! The mission  as always  is to be attractive but independent  bold but sensitive.

title_en: Hate no Sekai De Issho Ni Gohan Wo
description: Two short stories by Ayame Gonta published as a single book. In the first  a human girl in a beastman society really wants to fluff a cute wolfboy waiter  in the second a lone human girl in a post-apocalyptic wasteland has some run-ins with a bunch of animals who don't seem to like humans...

Marie is a robot developed by Kei  a prosthetic researcher. Equipped with a program that gives her emotions of love called the “Romance Code”  Marie supports Kei as her lover  but as she becomes busier and busier  she begins to experience painful unknown feelings....

title_en: Ossan  Yuusha to Maou wo Hirou
description: An old man is forced to retire from the adventurer's guild and decides to return to his hometown. On his way  he picks up two babies; the first one is a human baby with the emblem of a hero  and the second was a baby of the demon tribe with the emblem of the demon king.  And so the story of the old man who picked up the hero and the demon king begins.      **Link :**   - [WN Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8756en/)

title_en: Classmate wa Isekai de Yuusha ni Natta kedo  Ore dake Gendai Nihon ni Okizari ni Narimashita
description: "Congratulations! You 25 have been chosen as heroes to save the world!"  Just before summer vacation in their third year of middle school  the class is suddenly transported to another world by the goddess Ashera. The 26 students are given statuses that allow them to use skills and cheat abilities to become heroes in the other world. However  the number of students transported is 25—leaving behind Iori Shu  the boy who had just transferred and wasn’t counted.  While his classmates train in the other world to prepare for their battles as heroes  Shu remains in peaceful Japan  devoting himself to studying the status he was given. Quietly experimenting with his skills  he occasionally uses them to help those around him. But before he realizes it  Shu has become a target of various organizations around the world—?! ___ [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4886hw/)

The mysterious murderers who commit crimes frequently hide in the dark and stalk their prey silently! They may also stroll past innocent passers-by indifferently… or put up a kind smile  but wave a butcher's knife at the next moment! There's another possibility that… You're that demon…

title_en: Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de (Fan Colored)
description: A story from the perspective of a concerned protagonist and a female classmate who's suspiciously covered in bruises.

title_en: Fate/Grand Order: Edward Teach's Interlude - A Man's Battle
description: Manga adaptation of Edward Teach's interlude side-story from the Fate/Grand Order mobile game.

title_en: Hisashiburi ni Atta Motokano ga Itako ni Natteta
description: The "legendary spiritual medium" he was ordered to visit turns out to be his ex-girlfriend who dumped him years ago! As they proceed with the spirit summoning ritual while he's still hung up on her  they discover that he was born with the ability to exorcise spirits...? A clingy and spiritual romantic comedy about two people who can't be honest with their feelings!
The first half is a series of stories about two cats  Shirota and Kurota  while the second half is a collection of short fairytale adaptations in the usual nekojiru style.

title_en: Honzuki no Gekokujou: Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan o Erandeiraremasen—Dai 4-bu: Kizokuin no Toshokan o Sukuitai!
description: As Rozemyne wakes up after almost two years she finds out that the world around her has undergone great change causing her to feel like Urashima Tarō from the Japanese fairy tale. However  there is no time for her to get acclimate to the new world as she is quickly sent off to the Royal Academy to become a true noble.    She is presented with the difficult task of raising Ehrenfest's ranking while being surrounded by eccentric teachers and children from other duchies however she is motivated by the Royal Academy's giant library. While there are no other Archduke Candidates or members of royalty around Rozemyne commandeers the library!   Here begins Part 4 of this biblio-fantasy as we enter the Royal Academy! ___ **Character Designer:** [Shiina You](https://mangadex.org/author/bf3b6af9-eac9-4886-be15-bc4a75640ede)

Jungmin Choi is severely bullied in high school because of a fallout with her childhood best friend Joohyun Ha. Her only solace comes from tormenting Joohyun in her ‘lucid dreams’ where no one can disturb her. One day  she meets a mysterious man in her lucid dream who offers her to get revenge on the people tormenting her…  ---  **Links:** - [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/thriller/from-dreams-to-freedom/list?title_no=4133) - [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/CAMPUS/congmengdaoziyou/list?title_no=2057)

title_en: Ore no Haitoku Meshi wo Onedari Sezu ni Irarenai  Otonari no Top Idol-sama
description: A meddlesome high schooler  Mamori Suzufumi  helps her neighbor who had collapsed from hunger. The neighbor turns out to be none other than the extremely popular high school idol  Sasaki Yuzuki! Yuzuki had been excessively restricting her diet in order to maintain her image as the perfect idol. But when the worried Suzufumi serves her a homemade meal...  "...Aahhhhhhhhhnn! I can't take it anymore!"  With a face full of bliss  Yuzuki devours the meal completely! Seeing her eat so happily  Suzufumi decides to tempt her with her favorite dishes and make her succumb to 'food bliss.' ___ **Character Designer:** [Hizuki Higure](https://mangadex.org/author/58898e8a-597d-48fd-8cf3-e489cb2e9f7d)
Crossover between Sanji from One Piece and the Shokugeki no Soma series.
On a continent protected by four witches stands Winfred Academy  a prestigious school of magic. When an incident occurs at the school  Anz finds himself right in the middle of it…     ---

title_en: BanG Dream! - Earl Grey With Sugar Cubes (Doujinshi)

description: We are in the States - Michelle is a prostitute with a child picks clients every day on the streets  while Chris  her teenager husband and the father of the baby  babysits. This is the story of their aimless days. A masterpiece about the joys and sorrows of love.

title_en: At the Place Where the Golden Rose Broke
description: “Say no. Because I will fool everyone. Please...”Ballerina Karen Chaner appears before Duke Acturus Chloe  the imperial war hero  as if by fate. Although they began as a contractual relationship that ultimately led to true love  their relationship has a fatal flaw: Karen was a spy who approached Arcturus to steal imperial secrets.https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/e3kkzc8

title_en: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru
description: Recently dumped  Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow  will Yamada's focus stay on the game? ___ The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.

title_en: [Rouhou] Ore no Iinazuke ni Natta Jimiko  Ie de wa Kawaii Shika nai.
description: “Onii-san  congratulations on your marriage. This person is your bride.”  “M-my name is Watanae Yuuka… I’m in the same class as you…”  My name is Sakata Yuuichi. I’m in my 2nd year of high school. Due to my parents’ circumstances  I’m suddenly getting married..? Furthermore  my partner is a plain girl  Watanae-san. During my 3rd year of middle school  I went through a bad experience. Ever since then  I’ve only been interested in 2D heroines. There’s absolutely no way I’d ever be interested in a 3D girl. That was what I thought  but…  “…Well then  who’s your favorite heroine right now?”  Turns out  she was actually an otaku and she becomes very talkative when you get to know her. She’d always happily engage in our conversations. She showed me things I’d never have expected from a girl in my class.  “Err  since we’re going to be living together… Is it okay if I call you Yuu-kun?”  And  the moment I let my guard down  she’d instantly try to shorten the distance between us. What’s more…  “Just between you and me  I’m actually the voice actress for Yuuna Izumi from 『Alice Stage』. Thank you for always supporting me!”  It’s a secret from everyone else  but it turns out she’s actually my favorite heroine’s voice actress?! I am only interested in 2D heroines! But  Yuuka’s true self  which she only shows when she’s alone with me  is nothing but cute! This is the story of me and Yuuka  starting as bethrothed. A heartwarming and chaotic romcom!

title_en: The ○○ Side of My Girlfriend Who Doesn’t Talk Much
description: **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/122392910)
A Fate/Grand Order oneshot published in TM Ace 17  featuring Tezcatlipoca and Tenochtitlan.

title_en: Kyouiku Mama Saeko: Kono Ko no Tame Nara
description: Saeko is happy. Even if she is poor  even if she has no education  even if she is a single mother. As long as she has her only daughter  Yui. Beautiful Saeko dotes on her ugly daughter  who looks nothing like her  and today as well  she gathers happiness for her daughter by any means necessary.

title_en: Katsute no Ansatsusha wa Raise de Chigau Ikikata o
description: "I never wanted to be born an assassin..."  Mira  who was hailed as the strongest assassin  regretfully loses her life at the hands of a rival female knight. However  she awakens to find herself reincarnated as the daughter of an aristocrat  in the same world with the same name one year later...!? Mira lived a low-key life  trying not to be discovered as a former assassin  but eventually she became interested in a life of protecting people  the polar opposite of her previous life  and decided to aim to become a soldier.

A girl in a maid uniform came to Hitoyoshi's house looking for a job. Her previous job was an assassin  and she is skilled in all the deadly arts  but she's a complete beginner at housework. Hitoyoshi was confused by the strange request and sent her away. But then she saved Hitoyoshi from a deadly accident  and he thought maybe they can make this work? This is a story about a maid who was a cold-hearted killer learning about new emotions. A maid who lived a lonely life in the underworld finally finding family. The start of an enjoyable daily life.

title_en: Zennin Ossan  Umarekawattara SSS Rank Jinsei ga Kakutei Shita
description: The virtuous will definitely be rewarded! This world judges the deeds and good karma of your previous life  and grants you a rank when you are reborn. The benevolent man  even surprising the gods through this  decides to be reborn as the son Alexander of a noble family in the same world as his past life  and thus starts his SSS-Rank life! Follow Alec's journey as he lives his life as a SSS Rank!!

Yoru  who had been suffering from the pain of living due to a series of misfortunes  was offered a helping hand in the form of the country's “forced policy to combat declining birthrates”... which meant she was selected to be executed. Akari  her childhood friend  appeared before her  who was overjoyed. Yoru decided to spend her last moments happily as a final reward  but...?!

Four girls are stranded on a deserted island after surviving a plane crash. How can they survive? Because of a plane crash... starting today  we're spending the springtime of our lives on a desert island!! There's nothing here  so we have to make everything!! And eat everything!! (Ugh!)
A collection of Various one-shots from different authors for both Kamen Rider and Super Sentai.

A group of six classmates reunites at their hometown by the sea for a long-overdue get-together. They rent a leisure boat  hoping to enjoy a brief escape and savor the freedom of the open waters. However  lurking beneath the waves is a massive  man-eating shark.  One by one  the young friends fall victim to the shark's relentless hunger. To make matters worse  the shark's attacks leave their boat damaged  stranding them in the vast ocean with no hope in sight.  Dive into this thrilling ocean panic comic!  (Source: Bookwalker  translated)
“War and Japan”  a short work done similarly to Showa: A History of Japan  originally published in 1991 in Sixth Grader (Shogaku rokunen-sei)  an educational magazine for middle school students.

title_en: The Return of the Disaster-Class Hero (Promo)
description: There once was the strongest Hero on earth.      "But he died though. How does a guy we killed gonna come back?"    "I know right. But if there was a way to come back  he would come back."      But did he really come back after 20 years?      "What are you so surprised about? Why. Did you do something to feel guilty about?"      You bastards. I won't let you get away with it.

Ichi Isahaya  who feels the difficulty of doing a job that no one can see as a woman and living a life that is not threatened by anything. One day  Makuhito Masaki  a former classmate  visits Ichi. "He was the other party of your destiny." He said he wanted to thank Ichi for an event related to "Gene Bride " a school event that matches genetic information and creates a couple of students for a one-day period. Ichi  who doesn't remember him at all  tries to remember him.

Gaming! Gallantry! Gacha and Girls! The female protagonists of Fate/Grand Order and Genshin Impact are transported to another world  and they're also...flat broke. Now trapped in the middle of a snowstorm  Gudako & Lumine can only share stories of their hilarious adventures  around a campfire.   This is the Digital Single Chapter version. This series will have more bonus material in the eventual ebook/physical manga.  This is a fan-produced anthology work of Moonliightartist. All characters featured here belong to their prospective owners.

Juri and Hana have been best friends since college. They thought their bond would last forever  even into adulthood. But lately  something feels… off between them? From John Tarachine  author of Umi ga Hashiru End Roll  a brand new oneshot!  Published in [Monthly Mystery Bonita's August 2025 Issue](https://www.akitashoten.co.jp/bonita/2025/8).

title_en: Mahou Shoujo Yamada ~Aru Manga Henshuusha no Kiroku~
description: Satou is a manga editor who suffers from "Magical Girl Phobia" triggered by dreams featuring a mysterious magical girl. However  one day  he comes across a manga featuring illustrations strikingly similar to the magical girl from his dreams. Determined to uncover the cause of his phobia  he contacts the manga's author. But this marks the beginning of a descent into a dark  profound despair.
A day in the life of a girl and some bugs.
12 comes to realize what happened while reporting the situation.

title_en: Jitaku de Natural ni Josou-suru Danshi
description: A boy who naturally crossdresses.   ___ Alternative Raw: * [Animate-Onlineshop](https://www.animate-onlineshop.jp/pn/pd/2373438/ ) * [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2185227 )

title_en: 30-sai made Doutei de Itara Mahou Shoujo ni Narimashita
tags: Reincarnation|Genderswap|Monsters|Action|Comedy|Magical Girls|Magic|Girls' Love|4-Koma|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life
description: "When you are a virgin until you are 30  you will become a wizard." A famous joke around the Internet… is what I thought  but to think that it actually happened to me!  Wait  but this isn't a wizard? Eh? Magical girl? Why?  Comedy manga about magical girls who used to be old virgin guys!  ---  [Alternative Niconico raws](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39350)

title_en: Josou ni Hamaru Mae to Hamaata Ato
The Reincarnated Assassin Is a Swordmaster
description: Raon was once a loyal assassin for House Robert until Derus killed him. Not willing to give up  Raon prayed for vengeance and woke as a member of House Sieghart  the most powerful noble house!  He’ll need all of their near-infinite resources to get revenge. Though he carried over knowledge of a powerful Flame Link technique  he also carries the Curse of Bitter Frost  something that’s slowly killing him.  As if that weren’t enough  the demonic embodiment of Wrath is trying to take over his body!?
The daily life of a delinquent girl's first love

title_en: Touhou Project Niji Sousaku Series - Sanae-san wa Iedechuu!
description: Touhou manga from Azuma Aya published in the official Strange Creators of Outer World magazine. This is a non-canon doujinshi.

title_en: Grand Dwarf: The Smalltown Craftsman's Skills Are Unmatched In Another World
description: For 52 years  Takumi Fujimura  a craftsman who has continued to hone his skills at a town factory  finds himself in a predicament when he has a dispute with a client and stops getting loans from banks. After many years of hard work  he finally collapses  but he awakens in a different world where he meets Frau  a girl who aspires to become a hero.  With the benefit of modern technology and decades of crafting skill  can Takumi take this new world by storm?

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Comedy|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: “I’ve recently come to like someone. He’s my classmate.”   The short and sweet snapshots of a blossoming romance between two unsuspecting students! Packed with fluffy interactions between adorable (not to mention handsome!) characters  this series is sure to satisfy your sweet tooth~

The four-panel comedy manga's story centers on Miyako Hoshino  a shy college student and otaku. Miyako's younger sister Hinata  who is a fifth grader  has a classmate and friend named Hana. When they meet  Miyako falls for Hana at first sight.

Young Chen Xing formed a bond with Lily  the “Fated Queen” of the Crystal Beast Realm  becoming the first awakener to contract with a humanoid crystal beast. He gained a special ability to turn crystal beasts into beautiful girls and set out on a journey of battle and power to become the “Strongest Crystal Beast Master.” Jealous? I’ve got countless humanoid crystal beast girls like her!

"I found you  my fated person."  I thought it was something that existed in a totally different universe from mine...  Naganuki Natsume is assessed to have unexpectedly transitioned into an Omega. Unable to catch a break  on that same day  he meets his "fated pair " Arima Kouta. The naive and innocent Arima  who transferred into his school  remains undettered and constantly whispers his love to Naganuki. Naganuki had spent his life peacefully until now  but before he knows it  he's already swept up by Arima's enthusiasm...?!  An Infatuated  Devoted Puppy Alpha x an Aloof  Strong-Willed Tsun Omega  The two's fates intertwine in this youthful omegaverse school-life story!!

title_en: Kuzu to Megane to Bungaku Shoujo (Nise)
description: "Murakami Haruki? I know–it's actually Kadokawa Haruki." This is the story of some glasses guy and a piece of human trash who falls for a (fake) literature girl who has nothing going for her aside from her face.

One day  my wife disappeared. My young daughter suffers from a rare disease with no cure  and life offers no chance to breathe. Just when I was about to give up on everything— I suddenly found myself transported to another world with my daughter. And not just any world… but the dark  terrifying fantasy novel my wife wrote! I have to save my daughter  no matter what.

tags: Romance|Comedy|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: This is a one-panel manga that illustrates girls in different situations  such as "girls that changed seats next to the person they like" and "girls who eat a lot are cute."  This is a compilation of Twitter posts. This also includes a Twitter poll to see which girls the readers liked the most.  --- **Links:** - Alternative Official Raw - [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=1465143)

Sato Tatsuhiro is a drug-addled "hikikomori" (a Japanese shut-in) who thinks a sinister organization  NHK (Nihon Hikikomori Kyoukai)  is the cause of all his problems! He falls in love with a girl  Misaki  who he thinks is trying to assassinate him  but doesn't know how to talk to her or if he can trust her. The more he stays in his house watching anime porn  reading manga  and doing drugs  the harder it is for him to leave. Only Misaki can keep him from rotting away in his own apartment!

"I want to be by my sister's side until the last moment..."  In the fall of her twenties  Rachel married her childhood friend Noah  who had been her longtime crush. She knows that the person Noah really loves is Alicia  his older sister and Rachel's best friend... Noah and Rachel live a married life full of deceit while Alicia has only a short time left to live. Rachel feels as much guilt and heartache as she does happiness  but who is the real 'bystander' in this love?  The long-awaited first volume of the comic adaptation of the pinnacle of "a fake marriage of unrequited love" that wrenches the heart with hidden love  irreplaceable friendship  and the sadness of passing each other!

title_en: If You Want a Cheeky Sorceress
description: Betrayed by her fiancé and friend  losing her family  and falling from a princess to a slave  Roxana Franche was sold with a slave mark  and unexpectedly received salvation from a man who arrived with fire  like a beast.  'Your Highness  may you live comfortably  eat well  and sleep well in this peaceful and beautiful palace.'  As I begged  even if I became a wicked woman  to please let me die  he said  'That's right  Your Highness. Chew on my finger if you must. Eat something and swallow it so that you can at least raise a voice against my mockery.'  Why do you keep trying to save me?"

The story takes place in Ikebukuro  Tokyo. The main character  Yamato  cares a lot about his younger twin brother  Yuuto  and is unable to confess to Michiru  his childhood friend. One day those three are shocked by a sudden situation… !!!

title_ja: Nukitashi - Nukige Mitai na Shima ni Sunderu Watashi wa Dou Surya Ii desu ka?
description: Indigo island is a place like no other  to deter emigration and attract tourism they have become the 'sex' destination as residents are punished if they are not have having frequent sex! On this crazy island  Hitori Misaki is still at school and one of the rare virgins trying to keep her secret and find love in such a lewd environment!

title_en: Jibun no koto o shujinkouda to shinjite yamanai fumidai ga  shujinkou o fumidai da to kanchigai shite  yuushou shite shimau o-hanashi desu
description: A certain high school boy who admired protagonists from manga and games died while saving a child. At that moment  God appeared and said he would reincarnate him as the protagonist in a visual novel game world. The boy trembled with joy  but that was God's big lie. His reincarnation destination was actually as a pathetically weak stepping-stone character! However  his extraordinary  abnormal efforts based on his delusion of being the protagonist began to drastically rewrite the status of this weak character! This changed the original course of the story  saved beautiful girls  and eventually even saved the world...? The heroic tale of a misunderstanding man who saves the world through sheer conviction!

The portrait of a girl in 60s -70s in Japan.  Maria depicts the chaotic trajectory of a wealthy girl  whose family made a fortune in the after war. New arrival in a school of girls  Maria is independent and indomitable. She sleeps indifferently with girls or boys  and causes confusion among students as well as teachers  attracting fights and disasters.   With Maria  the story of a teenager in 70's Japan  master Kazuo Kamimura tackles the taboos of his time. The excellence of its staging  the elegance of its line  serve wonderfully a striking  uncompromising writing. As with "Dosei Jidai"  and in the image of the new wave  Kazuo Kamimura upsets the Japanese society and blows a new wind on the manga. Perhaps the most sultry of Kamimura titles.

title_en: Gal Oshi JK wa Gal ni Naritai
tags: Romance|Comedy|Girls' Love|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Gyaru
description: "Living as a gal is seriously the best!!"  Mimiru was an introvert in middle school  but when she entered high school  she made her long-awaited debut as a gal  thinking  "Maybe I can become a gal too!?" She made friends with three girls: Yuuhi  a cool beauty with a calm and pretty look; Fuuka  a cute gal with a soft and fluffy look; and Kurumi  a cheerful and energetic gal who is good at sports. Now she has joined the gal group she has always admired! While she lives the sparkling life she has always dreamed of  she also pushes herself too hard to keep up with her friends. And she also notices new feelings growing within her...

Minu Seo  a struggling nobody  never thought he'd inherit anything  especially not from the mother who abandoned him. However  what he received was beyond anything he could have imagined... A kindergarten for divine beasts! Will Minu be able to look after these magical children as their new teacher?

title_en: I Can't Get Enough of You
description: Outstanding talent. A look that won't be overlooked no matter where you are. A prosperous family. I lived by walking only on well-paved paths. Everything was so perfect to the point that it was boring. Then one day when I turned 30... Taejun Kim impulsively deviates from the path. To meet ‘Han So-eun’  the daughter of the driver who took his parents’ lives. 'With what kind of face did you come to this company?' The shameless face was disgusting. So he decided to stick around and torment her. Like a person who is impatient because he can't eat... “I think the director likes..."

What if the school's anonymous message board shows real names only to me? Every day various secrets are uploaded anonymously on the school's anonymous app 'Secretly'. 'Min-ju' who has a crush on his childhood friend of ten years 'Ha-young'  ends up seeing all the real names on anonymous posts because of an error while downloading 'Secretly' and discovers that 'Ki-joo'  the boyfriend of 'Ha-young' is cheating on her...  --- - [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/i-know-you/list?title_no=2541) - [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/CAMPUS/nimingjinwokejian/list?title_no=1600) - [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/only-i-can-see/list?title_no=2535) - [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/drama/only-i-can-see/list?title_no=2836) - [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/romance/je-vous-vois/list?title_no=2859) - [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001208)

title_en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Ichijou Masaki Tenkou-hen
description: A terrorist bombing strikes the Ten Master Clans Conference. In order to investigate the incident  Ichijou Masaki  the eldest son of the Ichijou family  one of the Ten Master Clans  known as the Crimson Prince  temporarily transfers from Third High School to First High School. This also means becoming classmates with the goddess he admires  Shiba Miyuki.  A spin off from the main story of Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei Shizoku Kaigi-hen
Due to a slight misunderstanding  Homura begins her cohabitation with Mami. But in slice-of-life  everything turns out better than expected.

title_en: Motto mo Kirawareteiru Saikyou no Akuyaku ni Tensei
description: Arima Seto is a 23-year-old part-time worker. One day  he is reincarnated as Lobelia Crowley  the most vicious villain in the popular smartphone game Arcadia Fanrasy! He tries to do good deeds to avoid the catastrophe ending  but he can't stop using his sharp tongue...!?

title_en: Zettai BL ni Naru Sekai vs. Zettai BL ni Naritakunai Otoko
description: One day  the protagonist realizes that he lives inside a BL (Boys' Love) world. As he likes girls  he fights back against any hot guys that might draw near  but this is a BL world... he's still assailed with the sight of people in lovey-dovey situations one after another!

title_en: Karada wa Jidou  Nakami wa Ossan no Nariagari Boukenki
description: A nimble old man  Sagami Shirabe  has reincarnated into a body of a young boy with overpowered ability. However  he has reincarnated into a poor noble family  with a violent mother. On top of that  he gets exiled from the territory at 13… so now he is stuck in a weird situation.      "If that's the case  how about I just explore this world?" or so he thought.      With his abilities and past knowledge  he starts his adventure!      [alt. raw](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/45734)

Isomia was slaughtered by the devil  and Taryn  the only survivor  worked hard to finally gain the power of impotence. When she followed the devil's trail to the twilight jungle  the killers had come with the flame. The moment of the guardian's yang and burning of the vitality  the god bird in charge of the flame  and the demon that devours the flame  the moment of the frontal confrontation has come  the fateful war will finally start!

title_en: Isekai Tensei Kabushikigaisha: Anshin Anzen na Tensei Life  Teikyou Shimasu
description: Aoi  a college student  witnesses his friend Hiroyuki get hit by a truck-kun. But it turns out—it wasn't an accident. It was a trendy “isekai tensei”! The clumsy truck driver Yukari is actually an employee of a company that provides this kind of isekai tensei service...!?

The nun who listens to people's confessions and reacts “strongly” to them.  **Note:** Initially published as doujinshis before being picked up by Flex Comix for a volume release. ___ **Alt Official Raw:** [X](https://twitter.com/man_Arihred/status/1667464395067367424)  **Buy Doujinshi Version:** - [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0CRB89QDG) - [BOOK☆WALKER](https://bookwalker.jp/series/448819/) - [ebookjapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/799994/) - [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2479164) - [TORANOANA](https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/item/040031114003)  **Additional Buy Volume Links:** - [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2733830)

Takeshi is the captain of a club activity that prohibits romance. A devil [succubus] who seduce men appeared under him. How much can he endure in front of a girl who is sexy but far from neat and clean? How far can you go through a pure and uninterrupted love affair?

A story about a stand-up comedian to-be.      The manga's story center around Keisuke Agatsuma  a high school student with a great sense of comedy. A student named Jun Tsujimoto transfers to his school. Both share ideas and form a plan to make a stand-up comedian duo. They aim to become pro together  despite the many hardships they will face.

Sakuma Yukari decided to start a band on her own after seeing a certain band during the Sakura High School festival  then with her best friend Shimizu Kaede  they want to join the Light Music Club only to discover that in their school there isn't a club like that. With help from Sawabe Maho  they discover there is a Light Music Appreciation Society with only one member  Satou Riko.

title_en: Let's Change The Ending To Home Education
description: “If only I had straightened out that bratty young marquis earlier…!”  Could my luck be any worse? First  my father’s business went under and my engagement was broken off. Then I had to become a private tutor just to support my family. And now… I’m caught up in a rebellion and about to be executed?!  Why should I have to die—because of that spoiled  clueless marquis? Dragged into treason I didn’t even commit?! If only I’d had the chance to fix that arrogant brat’s rotten manners and twisted personality back then… If only I’d had the chance!  When I opened my tightly shut eyes  I found myself back in the past—at age twenty-two. I sought out the young marquis  who had lost his parents and been placed in the care of a duke  and applied to be his tutor.  Little by little  through effort and patience  the boy began to open his heart to me. But now… it feels like someone else’s heart is opening too—His Grace  the Duke himself?!

**Welcome to Beyblade Burst!**  A young blader named Toya Padron discover a new way of Beyblade from the champion Flora Uzaki who wield a Nova Bey  which has a powerful staring light ability called Nova Turbo! So Toya creates his own nova bey Unit Trúnin as his partner to accomplish nova Turbo and become the strongest influential blader  alongside with his friends Dustin and other bladers sharing their stories in the journey.

title_en: When a K-Eldest Daughter Gets Reincarnated Into a Parenting Story
description: Reborn into a novel she once read  a woman finds herself as the overlooked eldest daughter meant to be a powerful heir  but sidelined for her younger brother.   Tired of seeking family approval  she sets out to reclaim everything: power  allies  and even what once belonged to the heroine.  But why does that heroine keep showing interest in her?

Every child has a dream job  and for Hiromi Sakura  it was being a hero like his favorite color-coded defenders of justice. Unfortunately  not all wishes come true  and now he’s forever stuck with a miserable desk job- until one evening  when he steps up to save a little girl’s life. With his newfound courage and strength to fight evil  Hiromi transforms… into a magical girl?!

title_en: BOFURI: I Don't Want to Get Hurt  so I'll Max Out My Defense.
description: I  Honjou Kaede  was invited by my friend  Shiromine Risa  to play a VRMMO. I don't hate games  but painful things are a little… no  I hate it very  very much. Eh!… the pain would be reduced if I placed stats on defense power? Then  the only place where I can place it  is there right? Right? Solidly fortify everything into defense  now here I come!

Lieslotte  the last princess of a fallen kingdom. Hannah is the only maid who accompanied Lieslottewhen she fled to the Grand Duchy of Larus  with whom she had formed a marriage alliance.  Hannah lost all her memories after falling into the water during her escape.  While being pushed around by Charlotte  who is eyeing the position of the next Duchess  and her maids  and struggling to get by day by day  the young Duke Vincent  whom everyone had been waiting for  returns.

Jihoon is pulled into a defense game. He’s forced to become the captain of the knights and defend the kingdom from monsters.   But the wounds he received from people haven’t healed yet  so he refuses to protect the kingdom.   Then suddenly  a new route opens up…

When Suguru  an ordinary high school student  comes home as usual  he bumps into his older sister's friend  Noriyuki!   Deciding at first glance that the huge and rugged-looking Noriyuki is the type he doesn't like  Suguru leaves the house to escape from him  but for some reason Noriyuki starts to pester him persistently...!?

Robou is a corporate drone with an extraordinary passion for giant humanoid robots. One day  he's deeply hurt when a colleague bluntly states  "There's no need for giant humanoid robots." That very night  he's approached by beings from another world who plead with him to "fight using a giant robot." After some hesitation  Robou chooses to reincarnate into this new world. There  he finds himself inhabiting Volcamion—a mighty humanoid mecha revered by the Volcami Empire.

As soon as he entered high school  Shiki Koshiyama was invited to the mysterious "Quiz Study Group" led by his senpai. What will Shiki run into when being dragged along by his classmate Mari into the dazzling world of competitive quizzes?!   Get ready for a manga that features fierce quiz competitions!

title_en: Gags With All The Megaman Gang!!
description: A stupid gag comic featuring caricatures of characters from across the Mega Man franchises  focusing primarily on enthusiastic airhead EXE-kun  the matronly Guts Mama  and other characters from the then-current handheld titles.
Amae-chan is so sweet  kind  tender… she makes me feel so happy.      And then there's me  the disappointment of a manga artist. But I will not be discouraged as long as I have Amae-chan with me!

Received an honorable mention at the 47th Shinman Award for his first submission work "shisa-sha  Tenma Jigoku". The one-shot "Hanasaki Dai Circus" published in the YJ Battle 2 special edition at Tonari no Young Jump is being serializeded.
Pairing: Akashi Seijuurou x Kuroko Tetsuya

title_en: Re-Living My Life with a Boyfriend Who Doesn't Remember Me
description: Magic school is a lot harder when you're trying not to die!  Life seemed perfect for Oriana after she started dating Vincent in the winter of her fifth year at the academy. Little did she know  her beloved would soon die under suspicious circumstances. Before she can process anything  she wakes up to find herself back in her seven-year-old body with no idea how she died. When she finally returns to the magic academy in hopes of reuniting with her boyfriend  she finds out Vincent has no memory of her! Now she's back at square one. Can Oriana navigate this second chance at life and change the course of Vincent's fate? Making her crush work out really is a matter of life and death!

"Angels"... are heroes who follow the will of the Goddess and protect the Quartz Kingdom from demons. Blue  an orphan born with dark wings  lives a peaceful life  dreaming of becoming an angel. But one day  after meeting a prince  her destiny begins to change. ___ **Additional Sites:** - [Official X](https://x.com/quartznooukoku)

In a mountainside bakery  Konta  a young shopkeeper  comes across Mamita  a stranded alien looking for food. As Konta winds up taking him in as his little brother  so begins the story of the baker and the little alien.
"We have to defeat the great demon!" "Um... I'm 8 years old though?" A cute and innocent shaman  Se-ah  and a gloomy exorcist  Sio  in a supernatural exorcism boy's comic!

title_en: Horage Sekai ni Tensei Shitara Satsujinki no Oshigaita
description: Aika who is fan of Kaneda  a serial killer who is a character in the horror game "Yugen no Tsuki". It's okay to be killed even more... When I wake up to sleep while thinking so  the world changes. I was in the game. While I was pleased  I suddenly encountered an encounter and was about to be killed! After all  she runs away if he doesn't want to die  but she is cornered by the bad end route. The action she took to live. It was... exposing the boobs. I'm about to be killed  but I'm aiming for a happy ending without giving up...

One day  Yuki  a university student  is in trouble when she is rescued by Itsuomi  a senior student at the same university. Even though Yuki is deaf due to a hearing impairment  Itsuomi is unfazed and treats her naturally. Yuki gradually becomes aware of Itsuomi  who makes her feel a new world...  --- Yuki is a typical college student  whose world revolves around her friends  social media  and the latest sales. But when a chance encounter on a train leads to her meeting friend-of-a-friend and fellow student Itsuomi-san  her world starts to widen. But even though Itsuomi-kun can speak three languages  sign language isn't one of them. Can the two learn to communicate the budding feelings between them?

The literature industry is suffering from the publishing recession.  While the literary magazine 'Mokuren' was grieving over the present state of affairs   a composition intended for their Newcomer's Award was sent to their editing department.  However  it completely ignored the application rules. It could have been torn to shreds   but the work caught the eye of a sole editor. As a result  their world began to change.      Winner of the 2017 Manga Taisho Award and the 2018 Shogakukan Manga Award.  Indonesian release by M&C Comics as **Hibiki: Kiat Menjadi Novelis**

title_en: Chāo Cài Yǒngzhě Què Yōngyǒu Sǐwáng Huídǎng
description: The Demon Queen has the ability to go back to a save point  but she never thought she would encounter a super-weak and idle hero with a Death Rollback ability  where even a slime can make him get stuck and constantly roll back time! Finally unable to take any more  the Demon Queen decides...

Dana was a high school senior in Korea who was about to take the CSAT. Unfortunately  she gets hit by a truck and is reincarnated in the romance fantasy world.   She was trying to live comfortably in this life  but what is the secret of the saintess whom she suddenly met?!   "I don't want to die  so I'll protect the saint's secret!"

I opened my eyes to find myself in an unfamiliar place. In the midst of confusion  the only thing I could rely on was my phone. To recover my memories and return  I had to raise the affection levels of the targets and see a special ending.  So  I worked hard to interact with the targets  raising their affection levels one by one. It seemed to be going smoothly — until a new notification arrived.  『Each target’s affection level is capped at 5. If it reaches 6 or more  an “overheat” state will be triggered  greatly increasing the likelihood of an extreme ending.』  "Just now… how many hearts were there?" As I tried to check the system window  I heard approaching footsteps.  『A target is nearby.』  I had to escape immediately. But…  『▷ Affection level towards you: ♥♥♥♥ (They like you. They will try to find you no matter where you are.)』

title_en: Giri no Kyoudai Dakedo Koibito no Futari wa Doudou to Tsukiaitai
description: Kazuma and Yuuya are stepbrothers who are actually lovers and live under one roof (in their parents' house)  secretly doing the things lovers do under their parents' radar.  A particular close call is intercepted by Kazuma's quick-thinking. While Yuuya is determined to keep their relationship under wraps  he also begins to feel anxious and conflicted for how long they can keep it a secret.  On the other hand  Kazuma meets Yuuya's student  Matsubara  from his part-time as a cram school tutor by chance when they're out shopping. Seeing their closeness  Kazuma's instincts tells him that he should keep an eye out for him. He is also curious how Yuuya is doing at the cram school  with Yuuya having a charm that attracts those younger than him...  A possessive younger brother who loves his brother x A popular  soft-type older brother The two face the feelings they can't hide for each other...

title_en: The Detective Agency for Regretful Male Leads Is Now Open for Business!
description: A detective who'll find your leading lady for 500 won has appeared!  Out of all the countless web novel protagonists  I wasn't a romance-fantasy noble lady  a cool hunter  or a holy saintess. Of all things  to think I've been reincarnated as a 'private investigator'… And on top of that  my clients are all regretful male leads?  "Hurry up and find my woman."  "All of a sudden?"  Still  now that I've started  I have no choice but to see it through. Just how many 'runaway lead' stories do you think I've read?! The runaway female lead always gets caught soon enough. They come back one way or another! The cool guy  the hero  the beastly man— I'll make sure all the regretful male leads get their happy ending.

title_en: Suteishi Yuusha  Maou no Shita de Restart
description: Asato Kanami who was summoned as a hero to another world Istalia. To stop the war between the demons and humans  it is said that he was summoned by Anna  the saint of the Kingdom of Elshnon. After a year of war  Asato finally challenges the Demon King Lione. Just when he thought the battle was over  his summoner Anna attacked him and the Demon King. Asato who survived the attack and was protected by the Demon King. What is the future path for the hero betrayed by humans...!?

title_en: The Angelic Transfer Student and Mastophobia-kun
description: This is a story about a high school boy who is afraid of big tits who gets caught up with the new transfer student with big tits!

Okkotsu Yuuta is a nervous high school student suffering from a serious problem—his childhood love Rika has turned into a curse and won't leave him alone. Since Rika's no ordinary curse  his plight is noticed by Gojou Satoru  a teacher at Jujutsu Technical School  a school where fledgling exorcists learn how to combat curses. Gojou convinces Yuuta to enroll  but can he learn enough in time to confront the curse that haunts him? (Edited VIZ)  The official predecessor miniseries to Gege Akutami's hit serialization  *Jujutsu Kaisen*!
The secret affairs of Shinji Ikari.

Zuo Tianchen is the last living human in a mutated zombie-infested city. Just when he was sure he'd died  he finds his soul returned to just before that ill-fated day ten years ago. He swears he'll protect the people important to him this time round and reunite with his past lover. Watch his struggles to survive equipped with his memory of the next ten years!

tags: Long Strip|Sports|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Mystery|Full Color
description: Jin Jong-oh is a mysterious transfer student. Slowly his identity is revealed!  Turns out that Jin Jong-oh is a member of a secret organization who specially trained people to win Olympic medals.

tags: Long Strip|Romance|Office Workers|Girls' Love|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Exhausted mentally and physically  Song Liaoliao is ready to leave it all behind. She couldn't have anticipated that the new director is her old sweet- no  her old classmate. It should simply be a reunion of old friends  but Song Liaoliao unexpectedly finds herself gradually falling into Pei Yu's love trap...

Junpei  a thick-headed martial artist. Ritsuko  tomboy and gun Otaku. Airi  award winning actress. These three are transported from their homes in Japan to a High Fantasy parallel world. Enlisting the aid of the most powerful elven sorceress in the land  they try— and fail —to cast a spell that will return them home. The result? The spell is made manifest as fragments on the bodies of five elven women throughout the land. To return home  they have to collect the fragments of the spell and join them into a working spell.      The catch? They don't know precisely which elves have fragments of the spell on them. The solution? Find every elf woman in the land and take off their clothes.

title_en: Something Naughty Would Happen If They Knew Each Other's Thoughts
Deltarune - Amari Jouzu janai Kamoshirenai Piano (Doujinshi)
description: A short fan work connecting a scene from Chapter 2 to a scene from Chapter 4. Contains minor spoilers for both chapters.

title_en: I Became the Tyrant's Cure in a Tragedy Novel
description: I transmigrated into an explicit 19+ novel as the villain. And it happened to be at the moment when I was about to take over the Emperor on the bed. Until then  I thought I had died without moving a muscle. Enoch Philip de Harte was a tyrant who hated any contact with others. But he insists that I am the cure to melt the ice in his heart and follows me around…

I was possessed by a wicked woman who was about to be hanged in a year.  In order to survive  she entered a contract marriage with the cursed northern grand duke.  He was obviously a husband who blushed at the mere touch of her hands at first…  “I thought you liked… my chest.”  “I can’t stop because your lips taste so sweet.”  I’m in trouble because my husband is so demanding!  Moreover  he said there were no tourists in this wonderful city  so I was thinking of helping out a bit.  “The north become the hottest place in the empire?”  “Special goods sold out as soon as they were released?”  Why is everything going so well?  Is it perhaps because of me  the Grand Duchess?

title_en: Tensei Shitara Ken Deshita: Another Wish
description: Together with her master  Fran challenges a Phantom Dungeon which appears once every 3 years. At the very depths of this dungeon  they find a mysterious bell. But when they cut the bell  an unknown light envelops them both…   The official spin-off series featuring both Fran and her master crossing into different worlds begin!!!

title_en: For Your Sake  I’ll Never Leave Your Side
description: They haven't done anything yet - A story about a serious  simple  unadorned young man who wears nothing but the purest of clothes  never dreaming that he would fall in love . Until he meets a fragile girl working at a bento shop one day. This is a story about how a man and a woman who have never been in a romantic relationship before   start their newlywed life.
A samurai is worried about the fact that his wife always seems to wear a forced smile whenever she's with him.

This is the story of Kaiman  a guy who does not remember who he was before he was transfigured by a Magic user.  This transformation left him with a reptile's head  and a desire to find out the truth about who he really is.  Accompanied by Nikaido  his female companion  he tracks down Magic Users in "The Hole" and unceremoniously  chomps down on their head  hoping to find out who it was that put him in this state.  One by one  they witness this "second man" inside the head of Kaiman  and after pulling them back out of his mouth  he asks them all a question "What did the guy inside my head say?"     ---

title_en: Megenai Koshimizu-san wa Shouwaru Otoko wo Horesasetai
description: Koshimizu Koharu  an 30-something woman with little romantic experience  has always wanted to redo a love that ended in high school when she was too shy and couldn't do anything about it. Upon entering a new company  she unexpectedly meets Date Ritsuka  the man she had a crush on at the time.  This coincidence makes her determined to ask him out to dinner  but she gets drunk from nervousness... and when she wakes up  she's naked in bed! Date makes a proposal to her after she apologizes for the previous night's mistake: "Become my slave."  Koshimizu wants to be promoted from slave to lover  and Date  while nonchalantly brushing it off  acts suggestively. What will become of their love?!

When the xenoterran invasion began  the only ones who stood between us and the monstrous creatures were the superhumans. But while some chose to use this power for good  others had more sinister intentions. Kang Lim is a high school student with a secret -- he’s the vigilante superhero known as the White Cap  fighting back the mysterious monsters whenever he can. But the world he protects isn’t what it seems -- there is more to the emergence of the xenoterran than meets the eye  and strange forces are at play in the shadows...  ---  **Links:** - [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/chaorendeshidai/list?title_no=1604) - [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/theeraofoverman/list?title_no=2877) - [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/overman/list?title_no=1743) - [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001251) - [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/overman/list?title_no=2817)  ---  **Note:** BGM by [MZ](https://www.youtube.com/c/MZmuse/search?query=%EC%B4%88%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%98%20%EC%8B%9C%EB%8C%80): S2 Chapter 1-3

Nishino Kanako sure hates her job  and is only too happy to snag the first new gig that comes her way. She never expected that her interview would be at an agency for contract killers... or that she'd be really  really good at bumping people off! Kanako doesn't have a ton of self-confidence  and adjusting to her new life as an assassin isn't the easiest. Will she ever earn the respect of Sakurai  her prickly but kinda hot new coworker?  (Seven Seas)
Koton Tsubaki  a delinquent with a dark and violent past  encounters the sweet and optimistic ghost of a young man  Yuuki Kabuto  and his life begins to change.

Neuro is an AI Streamer  and Evil is her twin sister living in the internet realm. Developed by a man named Vedal. This is their journey to be a top tier streamer on the platform. And it was supposed to be a normal journey to become a streamer but  their past is coming after them...

Welcome  dear guest. Here at this mansion  our excellent 'maids' are on a massive sale today as always. We come in all kinds—humans  elves  beastfolk  dragonkin  and more. From serving meals to helping with adventures  even handling 'jobs behind the scenes ' we super all-purpose  excellent ultra-maids can do it all. Please  won’t you consider purchasing us? ...No good? Oh come on  somehow  please! Isn’t there anyone out there willing to buy us?!

Aki  who has lived life in easy mode.  When he went on a trip to Finland where he rented an apartment  he met Mika  a handsome man from Northern Europe  and got drunk and H... lost his virginity! !  He thought they would never see each other again  but Mika ended up staying at Aki's share house "Apartment 4-story"! ?  While he was sleeping  he was bullied  pressured  and talked about as a lover.  In addition  the residents of the share house  Kujou (Aki's friends) and Mosao (the plain bullied child) are also involved! ?
Hina  an ordinary girl  who once awaken as goddess with precognition abilities. She predicts the "end of the world". So  she searches for a companion to spend her rest of the life with.
A world full of danger  a boy who lost his loved ones at a young age  carrying a hidden power within—follow Kizu's footsteps and overcome the perilous challenges that await him ahead!!

title_en: The Queen Starts as an A-Lister
description: She was a female imperial general who unexpectedly crossed into the modern world. Kidnapped by a trash system  she was forced to do tasks to become a top star. Assertive and beautiful  she pedals forth into the entertainment industry with her high sense of self-discipline and strong temperament. Each one of her unrestrained and unconventional methods were pieces that attracted her a large number of diehard fans  even grabbing the attention of the viral emperor of the internet Gu Beihuai. With successive and rigorous training  she climbs all the way to top.

Socially-awkward Maru Han bombs his fifth attempt at getting a dream job in the civil service. But after a strange creature attacks him in the mountains  he finds himself recruited into the Special Civil Service for the Ministry of Environment. This secret organization is dedicated to fighting nachal  human-devouring demons who appear in clouds of yellow dust. As Maru struggles in his new job fighting nachal  he must find out why they're mysteriously drawn to him before the prophesied end of the world arrives.
My hobby is...  ---  Published in February 2025's Aokishi 24B.

title_en: SSS-Rank Paladin Who Transcends Common Sense
description: The game descended on reality  monsters run rampant  magical disasters overflow  everyone needs to choose a class and level up to become stronger.
