Zhou Yi who has been unremarkable until now awakened the S+ rank talent Protection of the Sacred Angel on the day of class awakening  turning his class into the hidden class Sacred Knight! Weapon blessing  angel blessing  honor blessing… With all sorts of buffs  Zhou Yi destroyed the space itself with just his aura. Who was it that said sacred knight is just a mundane class?

Utilizing a system called "Sense " each player aims to create their unique character in the VRMMORPG "Only Sense Online." Joining this realm is Yun  an absolute beginner in the world of gaming  equipped with some of the worst customized "Sense" ever. While his two sisters  both veterans in this world  criticize his choices of equipment  he continues to delve into the skill sets he has acquired. Along his way  he meets the art of "production" and people that have mastered this art. Watch as a total novice creates a revolution in the gaming world and create the "ultimate" support class.
At that time  someone asked me  what kind of person is my dad? This is a story about my father.  --- - [Original <Tencent Comics>](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/649649)
After performing in their final middle school judo tournament  Michi and Sanae begin high school and walk in on Michi's final opponent fighting to save their new high school's judo club.

tags: Traditional Games|Romance|Comedy|School Life|Web Comic|Slice of Life
description: The manga is drawn and released by Souichirou Yamamoto @udon0531 on Twitter.   The author didn't plan to continue the manga at first  but he has decided to continue it.   Since he draws this manga when he has free time  the update schedule is not stable.

He thought that all he wanted was to see more faces of his. That was the start of it all...  Chitose is a novelist in college who had continuously submitted screenplays he wrote to scriptwriting contests in pursuit of a certain dream. After yielding no results  he finishes writing his script  "Apricot Heart"  deciding it will be his last. However  before he can submit it  he is shocked to learn that the actor Serizawa Kyouhei is going on hiatus. His dream was to have Serizawa Kyouhei act in one of his scripts... After giving up on submitting his work  Chitose ends up falling asleep  but suddenly  Kyouhei appears right before his eyes!?  Filled with dreams and romance  A sweet and sour youth love story.

Can sensei be the heroine? Please?  Due to a traumatic experience  I have a distrust of people called "sensei". I  Saigi Makoto  was called by after school by the most popular and beautiful teacher at my school  Fujiki Maka-sensei. "I... love you" Eh– a confession out of the blue!? "Until you say you love me  I will continue to pursue you." Ever since then  I've been called by for "guidance counselling" after school  somehow watched AV together  being given excessive skin-ship  went on dates together. Over time  I gradually became conscious of Sensei...? But isn't it bad for Sensei to go out with her student? Lesson start!

title_ja: Gyaru Sen
description: When Sora enters high school  his homeroom teacher is a sexy gal with huge breasts and she’s none other than the changed version of Suzune  the innocent girl next door who was his first love! As the teacher’s “educational guidance” escalates day by day  Sora is awakened to pleasures he’s never known before…!

En and Touma  two young boys who compete and push each other to excel in martial arts to host the proof of their mastery  a spirit beast. One day  En successfully hosts the spirit beast  but he becomes the target of enemies who desire it. At that moment  what will Touma do? ___ **Note:** - Published in Jump GIGA Spring 2021 on April 26  2021.

Ota-kun is being bullied. Yamagishi-san  who sits in front of him  can't bear to see it and starts exchanging letters with him. Ota-kun decides to give Yamagishi-san a hand-knitted bracelet as a birthday present  but…!? ___ Published in Weekly Shonen Jump No. 19 2022 (April 25 Issue) on April 11  2022.

In a land where there is no magic  a land where the strong make the rules and weak have to obey  a land filled with alluring treasures and beauty  yet also filled with unforeseen danger. Xiao Yan  who has shown talents none had seen in decades  suddenly lost everything three years ago - his powers  his reputation  and his promise to his mother. What sorcery has caused him to lose all of his powers? And why has his fiancée suddenly shown up?
A bespectacled pervert girl named Ling Yun discovered the domineering side of the seemingly weak and handsome Bai Ze. Thus  everyday was spent catching demons it was full of fear and welfare!

title_en: Reincarnated as a Misogynistic Freak ~The Sabotaging Character That Was Supposed to Spread Great Misfortune in a Bishoujo Game Wants to Keep His Distance from the Heroines~
description: “Women are such a pain. It’s easier to hang out with other guys.”  Our protagonist  a misogynistic high schooler  was run over by a middle-aged woman who wasn’t paying attention to the road while he was on his way to school one morning.  When he regained consciousness  he finds himself in an unfamiliar world where he has been reincarnated as Hawk Gold  a woman-loving  obese child of a wealthy family with no morals whatsoever perhaps due to his spoiled upbringing.  He began keeping his distance from the women who flock to him for money and power  including his beautiful maid  younger sister  and fiancée in this second life he was suddenly forced to live.  Being born in the ’00s  little did he know that the world he lives in is actually part of “Elements Eleven ” a classic bishoujo game released in the ’90s  and his character was supposed to sabotage them. > (novelupdates)

tags: Psychological|Long Strip|Romance|Boys' Love|Office Workers|Drama|Web Comic|Slice of Life|Full Color
description: Is the unbearable pain in my heart because of a distant lover? Or… is it the lingering fate and obsession that clings  like a love that never meant to be?

A collection of mermaid themed horror stories  1- 人魚の首 (The Mermaid's Head): Maki is shy and quiet  and after having her secret crush stolen by her friend  Rumi  Maki started holding a grudge and in her dreams  a mermaid constantly whispers to her  "Maki  eat me... And you'll become beautiful…"! 2- セイレーン ~人魚の歌声~ (Siren ~The Mermaid's Singing Voice~) 3- 人魚のいる海 (The Sea where Mermaids Live) 4- 花の名前 (The Flower's Name) 5- 夢のつづき (The Dream Continues)

Julia Green is a teenager who lives in California alone. When she was feeling her loneliest  she unexpectedly encounters an unknown yet strikingly beautiful boy in her closet. Following that incident  whenever she was going through a rough time  William magically appears in her closet. For example  when she spent her birthday alone  on the night of a dance party she has to go to unaccompanied  or having to spend a sad dawn  he appears. Julia naturally ends up falling for William  who stood by her side in every tough moment... A magical love story that transcends time and space  where they have to fight to stand by each other.

Aoi  landlord of a share house and a florist  can't keep his mind off his first love  Mukahi. One day  the two bump into each other at a wedding. They realize that they are still in love with one another  and spend a blissful night full of passion. However  Mukahi comes to live at Aoi's share house  and there's no doubt about it... Mukahi is a high school senior?!  From MangaPlaza

title_en: Bishoujokashita Oji-san dakedo  Gachi Koi sarete Komattemasu
description: Only terrible looks are waiting for the ex-uncle who turns into a beautiful girl and gets carried away...? Causal retribution or happy ending? Find out for yourself!!

title_en: The Hero Girl and the Green Magician
description: In the depths of a demonic castle filled with monsters  a young hero meets a boy gifted by the supernatural. With a common goal but wildly different motivations  the most unlikely pair sets out on a quest to defeat the Dark Lord!

title_en: The Nintendo All-Stars Free-For-All! Smash Brothers
description: The story takes place in the realm of the Toy Kingdom. The cast of the game exists in the realm as dolls  and when the clock strikes a certain time  these dolls come to life.

The drop-dead-gorgeous and high-sex-appeal Akasaka Hibiki is going through breakup blues. Soon after being dumped  she's asked to become her schoolmate Aoyama-kun's mistress?! Aoyama-kun will try to gain Hibiki's affections through different means  so let's just hope he doesn't nosebleed to death in the process.

title_en: Tensei Shite Shota Ouji ni Natta Kensei wa  Katsute no Deshi ni wa Zettai ni Baretakunai
description: Sword Saint Brise saved the country with his unique swordsmanship. At the end of his magnificent life  he is reincarnated as the country's youngest prince  still retaining his memories. He seeks freedom again and aspires to enter the elementary school of knight school. Even though he is an invincible swordsman  he unexpectedly fails!   "I came to get you."  He looks like a child  but inside he's an invincible former swordsman. In his reincarnation  he is picked up by his former disciple!?

Akutsu Sakura  a wallflower with no self-esteem to speak of  and Hiiragi Tsubame  a girl brimming with confidence and dignity. The meeting between these two polar opposites marks the start of their adolescence.

Recently  Yuki has moved in with his childhood sweetheart Akizuki Hime right as their high school lives were beginning. However  Yuki quickly learned about Hime's secret. With her glasses on  she's a cold sadist  but when they come off  she becomes a perverted masochist!    Yuki now has to work to help Hime keep her secret in school!

title_en: She Has Become a Distant Existence
description: Once she was his childhood friend who used to hang out with him all the time. Now she's a nationally recognized idol on television who still hangs out with him all the time. An existence so far away  its in another reality!

title_en: My Clumsy and Erotic Neighbor Sayuri-san
description: Series Follows Our Main Character and His Interactions With His Neighbor Sayuri-san.

title_en: My Dark Elf Step Sister Won't Leave Me Alone
description: Willford “Will” Diccard is a devout paladin who has sworn off romance after witnessing his father’s antics  but his life is upended when he encounters Zana  a seductive dark elf who later becomes his stepsister after their parents marry—forcing them to share a home as she relentlessly schemes to break his vow of chastity.  Meanwhile  his childhood friend Aubry  a caring cleric secretly in love with him  grows jealous as Will resists Zana’s advances  giving rise to a playful yet tension-filled love triangle. Set in a tongue-in-cheek fantasy world of dungeon crawls and magic  the story weaves risqué humor and fanservice with genuine character growth  as Zana discovers empathy  Will reevaluates his rigid beliefs  and Aubry finds the courage to express her feelings  delivering a deconstructive parody of ecchi and fantasy tropes.

Harboring an obsession with the second male lead of the novel series *The Flower Holds a Sword*. Like always I write a commend about Lancelot and went to sleep. But something is off?! When I woke up my *favorite character* called me "milady" and brightly smiled at me! I think I won the lottery. Or I saved earth in my previous life. If you do good stuff in your past life you'll have good luck in your next life. If it's not that how could this even happen? This lottery that I won  I should use it properly. I decided I'll make my *favorite character*'s happiness my number one priority.

A prequel to the (then) soon-to-release Devil May Cry 3. Dante is a demon slayer and bounty hunter with a demon heritage of his own that haunts his past. He's currently unemployed–and bored to death. Opportunity knocks in the form of a missing-child case  which his friend and manager  Enzo  offers him. But a four-million-dollar reward  an unexpected demon attack and a little girl named Alice all conspire to send Dante through the looking glass on a nightmarish adventure beyond his wildest imagination.

title_en: After Becoming Financially Free  They Offered Their Loyalty
description: Shen Yuan  handsome and rich  became a second-generation loser and was mercilessly abandoned by his money-worshipping girlfriend after his family’s business shut down. However  because of this  he obtained the [Perfect Life] system. As long as he spent money on the opposite sex with a favorability of 60  he could receive double the amount back. From that moment on  he made full use of the system to win the hearts of beautiful women and earn a fortune. The more he spent  the richer he became. He spent money like water and rose to the top 0.1%  living a happy entrepreneurial life filled with endless passion

One day  the protagonist suddenly transferred to another world.  "It looks like the world of the anime I was watching last night  but when I tried to imitate the hero of the anime  the status screen appeared in front of me! I was surprised by the high specs of my abilities  but I was shocked when I saw the name on the status screen! Surprisingly  I am a small fry character [fake hero] who is defeated by the main character in the early stages!"  Knowing that his role is "a fake hero to be defeated by a hero"  the hero abandons the empty life in his original world and lives a short life as a "fake hero" in a harem until the real hero defeats him. Make up your mind!

"My school suddenly turned into the romance fantasy novel I was reading?!"  Sanho  the protagonist  becomes the only commoner at a prestigious academy academy and the only one who remembers the real world.  While she's still trying to make sense of the bizarre situation  a sudden mission alert pops up.  To uncover the truth behind this strange new world  she must complete missions that involve winning over three male leads...  In a world unknown  can Sanho complete the missions and face the truth?
That day  the gal with a lovely smile… was a bookstore clerk!? A bookstore workplace comedy has arrived! Will this gal be able to save this small bookstore!?

title_en: The Top Ranker's Aspiring Writer Life Manual
description: A legendary hunter gives up his title to become a web novelist  only to realize his stories lack realism. To fix this  he disguises himself as a weak F-rank hunter and joins a struggling guild for research. What starts as simple observation turns into genuine admiration  pushing him to grow both as a person and a writer. Can a former god-like warrior succeed as an ordinary novelist?  ---  **Original Webtoon:**     - [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/66085559) - [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%83%91%EB%9E%AD%EC%BB%A4%EC%9D%98-%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%A7%80%EB%A7%9D%EC%83%9D%ED%99%9C%EB%B0%B1%EC%84%9C/4405)  **Official Translations:**       - [Japanese](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/181150)

title_en: Kin no Kanojo  Gin no Kanojo
description: The romantic comedy depicts a hapless protagonist and his beautiful love interest - The plot starts when the girl he likes fell into a lake and then appears the "Lady Of The Lake"  who asks  "Did you lose your golden girlfriend or your silver girlfriend?" This leads the original to be split into two girls: the "Golden Girlfriend" is the graceful and ladylike type  while the "Silver Girlfriend" is the mischievous  foulmouthed  and straightforward type.

title_en: My Hero Academia - Rondo of Opalus (Doujinshi)
description: Inspired by the fantasy AU illustrations. Todoroki Shouto x Bakugou Katsuki

tags: Time Travel|Monsters|Action|Long Strip|Romance|Boys' Love|Survival|Superhero|Drama|Fantasy|Web Comic|Full Color
description: Hunter Cha Euijae  sent to seal a rift over the West Sea  was flung out after closing it. When he regain consciousness  he found himself in a garbage dump — eight years in the future.  Starving  he stumbled into a hangover soup restaurant and realized the world had changed. Now  disaster alerts warn of rift openings  slime ASMR videos are trending  and hunters livestream A-rank sword unboxings. Instead of the looming apocalypse  the future is oddly peaceful  leaving Cha Euijae feeling empty.   Deciding to leave his hunter days behind  he chooses to work part-time at the restaurant. But his quiet new life takes a turn when he meets a mysterious figure in a gas mask…

title_en: Louie the Rune Soldier - Bastard of Crimson Flame
description: Few would consider Louie to be a sorcerer - especially Melissa  Merrill  and Genie. (After all  what kind of "sorcerer" spends his time drinking at bars and beating the stuffing out of the local street toughs?) But much to the chagrin of these three gorgeous female adventurers  divine will has dictated that Louie  the enchanter-gone-street fighter  is in fact a prophesied hero–who they must pledge themselves to serve! Could this bad-boy possibly have what it takes to be a hero? Or has the war god Mylee made a mistake? With a bevy of babes at his side  Louie launches into a series of adventures that range from the harrowing to the bizarre. Get ready for swords  magic  and lots of black eyes and broken noses  because when Louie fights  it's no holds barred!

Two girls  Ling Yue and Xiao Hui  decide to sneak out and go on a date in the middle of the night. Why now of all times? A story of two people  loving each other even from worlds apart. Sometimes the best decision you can make  is the hardest for you to choose.

Hatate Souta  a young man who can see the "flags" that stand at the crossroads of life  transferred to “Hatagaya Academy”  a prestigious school in the metropolitan area. Not only does he meet beautiful girls in his busy school life  he even goes as far as living with them under the same roof! Surrounded by these flags  this enviable romantic comedy begins!

title_en: After the weirdness came  I unlocked the Tower of Babel
description: On the day when the Demon Suppressing Tower appeared  the world turned into a hell where demons were rampant  and Su Zhe became the demon hunter who could never improve  until a monster got into his brain!

Nazuna enrolls in the Ninth Boarding School and begins a new life with her three roommates. On the first night  out of curiosity  the three of them go exploring the campus and encounter a terrifying monster... Will Nazuna and her friends be able to graduate from this special school where students are not allowed to go outside for three years?!

“You ate me  so at least give me some kind of compensation  yeah?!”  Dragon King: “Fine! I’ll give you a prepaid cultivation technique—comprehend it first  then catch up with the training later!”  Me: “You think that’s enough?! I had to smell your nasty dragon breath—mental damage times two  buddy!”  Dragon King: “What do you want from me?!”  Me: “From now on  we’re like immortals sharing a single health bar. All the damage? You take it!”  Dragon King: “Damn it! You lunatic! Why does my ten-thousand-war-chariots-level HP bar feel so short now?! Guess it’s time to get a job…”

Based on the ever-popular clan Bermuda Triangle from "Cardfight!! Vanguard"  this story is about the daughter of a world-renowned diva who aspires to one day become an idol as well. Throughout her journey  she encounters various friends and rivals as she perseveres toward realizing her dream.

title_en: Magokoro Scramble! What Lies in Your Heart?
description: Is this love natural instinct or fate? Koharu is born to a bloodline who can read people's minds. Although he told himself he would never open up to anyone besides his family  those plans are thrown off when he meets an eccentric girl by the name of Yuki. With their encounter  Koharu begins to fall deeper and deeper... into the pit of romance!

"Granma didn't tell' em like that..."  Everyone has a favorite hero from their fairy tales  but who's the strongest of them all!?  This is a tale of death and rebirth. In order to accomplish their dream  hopes  wishes  revenge and salvation  the heroes of classic fairy tales will engage in a duel to death!  The warriors are resurrected and summoned to the Nightmare Coliseum by a mysterious monster who calls himself "Grimm P." and he promises the ultimate prize "You can resurrect anyone you want and live happily ever after"  This tournament is filled with bloody carnage  if you want to win  you better toss common sense out of the way because it is not needed.      This is a dark fantasy battle action manga where bizarre characters from fairy tales come to life. Legends like Red Riding Hood  Snow White  Pinocchio  and Beauty and the Beast engage in surrealistic killing matches. Right of the bat  we have Son Goku versus Momotaro!    32 characters will engage in sudden transformations  bloody battles  and tragic stories that will keep you on the edge of your seat.    Sure grandma didn't tell 'em like that!!

Tosaka Subaru is an art student who lives next door to his university senior  Yumoto Youhei.   Subaru was captivated by Youhei's artwork during an open campus event  which led him to enroll in the same university. However  Youhei turned out to be a tad sloppy and needed some looking after.  As Subaru started making breakfast for Youhei and waking him up once a week  it naturally became a routine for him. But one day  when Subaru saw Youhei being close to a woman  he realized that his feelings for Youhei were not just admiration  but something special...  A heart-fluttering campus BL story where colorful feelings intertwine!

title_en: Guiding the Male Lead out of His Trauma
description: When the reader wakes up in a novel as Liliope  a guide who tragically dies because of the unstable male lead  Octaeon  she has her work cut out for her. Liliope's death traumatizes Octaeon in the original novel  but the female lead helps him recover  and the two fall in love.   However  Liliope’s brother  Hyacin  despises Octaeon for killing her and morphs into the novel’s villain. Refusing to let her death drag him into darkness and despair  Liliope decides to rewrite her ending.   As she weaves her new fate  she realizes her ending isn’t the only thing that's changing.
In a twisted world  an obsessive love clings like smoke... and never lets go.

title_en: Kandou saretanode Tanteiya Hajimemasu! Jitsuwa Boukoku no Oujoda nante Naishodesu
description: When it comes to light that Octavia de Reine isn't a legitimate member of the noble House of Reine  she swiftly finds herself disowned. At first she takes this in stride... until her power hungry father and ex-suitor start vying for the house full of mysterious heirlooms that her doting grandmother left her. Little does her family know that she's destined to inherit an even greater legacy. Olivia hopes to follow in Granny's footsteps and become a famous detective  after all! She'll face off against young noblemen  phantom thieves  and magical items corrupted by demonic forces. Oh  and one vengeful angel queen. Moreover  who's this suspiciously young marquis that seems so smitten with her...?

A male engineer transmigrated into another world  and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe  but at the same time  it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist  and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches  liberate the productive forces! Open map  fight demons  break conspiracies  climb up the science and technology tree  and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!

title_en: Don’t Worry  the Baby Pope Has Defeated the Fanatics!
description: I woke up inside a dystopian game... A world with no dreams  no hope  and definitely no mercy.  My assigned mission? Track down the fanatics and bring peace back to the world.  But...  "How am I supposed to save the world in a three-year-old’s body?!"  The order is on the verge of collapse. I rescued the pitiful protagonist of the game... only to somehow end up taking his place.  Now I’m the Pope. But this place is crawling with fanatics secretly worshiping an evil god  and spies from the royal court.  Even the holy knights who are left... have completely lost it.  "Daddy! Call me Daddy  Master!" "I told you  I’m the Pope  not Master!" "You're so cute! You need to eat a hundred meals a day!" "Shut it."  As both a healer and the Pope  I need someone to play the role of my "Daddy" and protect me.  The problem? Every single one of my Daddy candidates is completely unhinged. And even the male lead I let go so he could live a happy life...  "As long as I have you  I don’t care if the world burns."  ...seems to have come back not quite right in the head.  Can our crumbling order really survive and bring peace to the world? Watch the Baby Pope sweat it out to save the world!
Cumulative total of over 2.6 million copies & drama! A shocking work depicting polygamy"Hare Kon" is back!

title_en: Ansatsu Skill de Isekai Saikyou ~Renkinjutsu to Ansatsujutsu wo Kiwameta Ore wa  Sekai wo Kage kara Shihai suru~
description: Late has just accepted an assassination request from a mysterious client. To his surprise  it was actually the goddess Mises  a goddess from another world whose existence was on the brink of destruction after her defeat in war. Mises' quest... is to assassinate Masra Dzur  another god in her world. Can Late  the killer with a 99.9% success rate  fulfill this otherworldly assassination?
In order to achieve her goal  Yumeko Makino starts playing the game "Vivid Monsters Chronicle." This manga follows her and her friends who she meets along the way  in game and in real life.

title_en: Jimiko na Mitsuba-san ga Boku wo Yuuwaku Suru
description: The girl he thought was plain was actually a carnivore!!?  Takeya is an ordinary high school boy  and because of his experience of being rejected over and over again in the past  he is always careful not to mislead girls. But even though he is such a stubborn boy  there is one girl he is very interested in. She is Mitsuba Agari  who sits next to him. She is plain and often forgotten by others  and is like an invisible mob girl who keeps coming on to him!! Takeya tries to suppress his instinct to fall in love  but he is at the mercy of Agari who keeps coming on to him!!?

King Grey has unrivaled strength  wealth  and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However  solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man  devoid of purpose and will.  Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters  the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge  however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for  questioning his role and reason for being born again.  ---  **Original Webcomic:**   - [Digital](https://tapas.io/series/tbate-comic/info) - [Volumes](https://yenpress.com/series/the-beginning-after-the-end-comic)  **Official Translations:**   - [Japanese](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/19682) - [Spanish](https://tapas.io/series/el-comienzo-despues-del-fin/info) - [T.Chinese](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E7%B5%82%E6%9C%AB%E8%B5%B7%E9%BB%9E/575) - [French](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000303)   - **Korean**:    - [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%81%9D%EC%9D%B4-%EC%95%84%EB%8B%8C-%EC%8B%9C%EC%9E%91/3162)   - [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53142176)   - **Thai**:      - [Kakao Webtoon](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The_Beginning_After_The_End/468)   - [Lezhin](https://www.lezhinth.com/titles/1171)       - **S.Chinese**:    - [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6884/)   - [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/656549)   - [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc37565)

title_en: Heroine? Seijo? Iie  All-Works Maid desu (ko)!
description: “I’ll become the greatest maid in the world!”  With her black-and-white skirt fluttering in the wind  a girl declares her vow. Her name is Melody. The girl  a reincarnator of Japanese origin  inherited the dream of her past life and began working as the maid of a ruined count household in the Kingdom of Theolas. She can transform cheap black tea into a top-shelf drink as easily as she can quickly upgrade a ruined estate into a newly-finished mansion. From household cleaning to serving meals  hunting game to DIY construction  just leave everything to me! Anything’s possible with the help of all-powerful magic!  Truthfully  this is actually the world of an otome game  and the superpowered  omnipotent Melody is actually the Saint… except she hasn’t realized it yet.  “Falling in love? Fighting the Demon Lord? More importantly  I’ve got chores to do!”  What will happen to a world whose savior has put her all into being a maid? How does the world cope when its grand script is discarded in favor of menial labor?  Welcome to a fantasy where a single job has upended the cogs of destiny!  (Novel Updates)

The story centers around the card game Duel Masters  which revolves around five civilizations consisting of Fire  Water  Light  Darkness and Nature. The original storyline follows Shobu Kirifuda  a young boy who likes to play Duel Masters. He and a few duelists are known to bring the monsters on the cards to life in their duels. Shobu engages in this card game so that he can be the best duelist like his father was.

For incompetence  Lewin  a Demon-Tamer adventurer  was banished from the hero's party. Without being acknowledged for his achievements as a commanding officer... However  the moment he comes into contact with Sasha  the Demon King of Death  one of the sealed Seven Demon Kings  he awakens to become a Demon King with the ability to subjugate Demon Kings! Moreover  by shattering the seal  he tames the Demon King  Sasha—— Lewin  backed by Sasha  succeeds in drawing out the Demon King's power and works to subdue all Demon Kings  the root of the strife between the humans and the demons.

title_en: Dragon Ball & One-Punch Man - Dream DB
description: Part 1: Freeza  still upset over his prior losses  devises a plan to use Monster Cells to give his minions a power boost. However  while they expected Goku  instead a bald man in a cape came by…      Part 2: The ultimate question which has vexed every Dragon Ball fan! Who is the strongest Earthling: Krillin or Tien?

An "unknown boy" has defeated the Demon King and saved the world. The whole world waits to learn of who he is  but it turns out the boy himself has forgotten everything. Then two people appear before him  both claiming to be his "family".
A romantic comedy depicting the high school life of an ordinary high school boy and a cross-dressing boy.

A volume collection of sweet  short and fun 4 pages manga for everyone to enjoy and adore.   (All are independent stories  done by various authors. having something cute/sweet making it "Precious". They can be read in any order since they aren't related to each other)  Chapter List : 1. Battle of Intelligence [by Kudo Makoto] 2. The Story of how My Wife was a  Goddess [by Konbu Wakame] 3. My Tomboy Friend [by Akitaka] 4. Deep and Distinct [by Ikuhana Niiro] 5. Hamster Life [by Niichi] 6. Mimicking Game [by Wakai Ken] 7. Predation [by Shiro Manta] 8. Film Club Couple [by Fujichika Koume] 9. Delinquent & Doctor [by Arita Imari] 10. Subscience [by Rasupe] 11. Summer Festival [by Rei] 12.  Ice Gaze [by Yuzuchiri] 13. Miss Daydreamer [by Yanagida Fumita] 14. Absentminded Childhood Friend [by Azuma Fuyu] 15. GENIUS [by Takaki Tsuyoshi] 16. Precious bug [by Nakahara Kaihei] 17. Sibling Play [by Itoyoshi Ryouichi] 18. Taking The Initiative Against a Deadpan Girlfriend [by Kaze no ko] 19. Aperitif [by Namori] 20. Mamimi Always Fails at Teasing! [by Mizu Asato] 21. Ice cold Hyoudou-san [by Yoneda Kazusa] 22. Hypnosis [by Oohara Roron] 23. Wolf is scared of Sheep [by Rucchiifu] 24. Afro's Love [by Sorato Shunsuke] 25. Positive Advancement [by Kinoue Seiichi]

This is a ts story about two male bestfriends. One who is popular  cute and short while the other one's just tall and average. Usually you'd expect the cute one to ts but the other one ts instead hence the title. The ending is not what you would expect but it's still a wholesome ending nonetheless.

The year is 1949. Crushed by the Allied Powers  occupied by General MacArthur’s armies  Japan has been experiencing massive change. Agricultural reform is dissolving large estates and redistributing plots to tenant farmers—terrible news  if you’re landowners like the archconservative Tenge family. For patriarch Sakuemon  the chagrin of one of his sons coming home alive from a P.O.W. camp instead of having died for the Emperor is topped only by the revelation that another of his is consorting with “the reds.” What solace does he have but his youngest Ayako  apple of his eye  at once daughter and granddaughter?  [Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/ayako/)  --- **Volumes 197-199 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**

It's the 21st century  and the number of ESPers continues to increase. They are active in the military  diplomacy  politics  and in other places. They hold the key for global competition. A country that controls ESP can control the world! However individuals who posses higher than Level 4 are less than 3% of the population. There are only three Level 7 people who have government contracts. These three are Kaoru  Aoi  and Shiho  ten-year old girls  who work for B.A.B.E.L. With the guidance of Kouichi  a twenty-year old genius  they catch criminals and evil ESPers.
